Original_text:
Layered Tuna Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing
- 1/4 c. green onion, sliced
- 2 tsp. Dijon mustard
- 2 (6 1/2 oz.) cans tuna, drained and flaked
- 1 tsp. dill weed (optional)
- 4 c. shredded lettuce
- 1 1/2 c. (4 oz.) medium shell macaroni, cooked and drained
- 2 c. chopped tomatoes
- 2 c. chopped cucumber
- 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas, thawed and drained
- 6 bacon slices, crisply cooked and crumbled
- 1 c. (4 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese

Directions:
- Combine dressing, green onions and mustard; set aside.
- Toss tuna with dill.
- In a 3-quart serving bowl, layer lettuce, shells, cucumber, tomatoes, tuna, peas and bacon.
- Spread dressing mixture over bacon, sealing to edge of bowl.
- Sprinkle with cheese; cover. Chill several hours or overnight.
- Toss to serve.
- Makes 8 servings.
- Prep. Time: 25 minutes plus chilling.

- Mix together the Miracle Whip, Sweet 'N Low and vinegar.
- Pour over chopped vegetables.
- Add bacon bits and cheese.
- Best if chilled a couple of hours before serving.

Original_text:
Virginia'S Christmas Salad

- 1 c. boiling water
- 1/4 c. nuts

- 1 can whole cranberry sauce

Directions:
- Mix Jell-O and water regular way.
- Add nuts, celery, cranberries, apple and sour cream.

- 1 medium green onion, chopped
- 3 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
- 2 c. milk
- 1 c. water
- 3 Tbsp. catsup
- 1/2 tsp. rosemary, crushed
- 1 cube chicken flavored bouillon

salad_info: top secret dressing ingredient c evaporated milk tbsp vinegar tbsp parmesan cheese tsp italian seasoning c salad oil tsp garlic salt direction combine ingredient jar cover shake well chill cook macaroni drain cool mix favorite vegetable broccoli tomato etc pour dressing mix chill
Original_text:
Top Secret Dressing

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. evaporated milk
- 2 Tbsp. vinegar
- 2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
- 1 tsp. Italian seasoning
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 1 1/2 tsp. garlic salt

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients in a jar.
- Cover.
- Shake well.
- Chill. Cook macaroni.
- Drain and cool.
- Mix with your favorite vegetables, broccoli, tomatoes, etc. and pour the dressing over and mix and chill.

salad_info: cheese manicotti ingredient c chopped onion tbsp salad oil tomato sauce tsp sugar tsp dried thyme leaf crushed tsp salt manicotti shell fresh ricotta cheese pkg shredded mzarella cheese c snipped parsley tsp dried parsley tsp salt dash pepper clove garlic crushed tomato cut c water tsp dried oregano leaf crushed bay leaf beaten egg substitute direction quart saucepan cook onion garlic oil tender browned add tomato tomato sauce water sugar oregano thyme first teaspoon salt bay leaf bring boiling simmer uncovered minute remove bay leaf
Original_text:
Cheese Manicotti

Ingredients:
- 1/4 c. chopped onion
- 2 Tbsp. salad oil
- 1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
- 1 tsp. sugar
- 1/4 tsp. dried thyme leaves, crushed
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 12 manicotti shells
- 12 oz. fresh Ricotta cheese (1 1/2 c.; I use low-fat)
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. shredded Mozzarella cheese
- 1/4 c. snipped parsley or 1 to 2 tsp. dried parsley
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- dash of pepper
- 1 clove garlic, crushed
- 1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes, cut up
- 1/3 c. water
- 1 tsp. dried oregano leaves, crushed
- 1 bay leaf
- 2 beaten eggs or substitute

Directions:
- In a 2-quart saucepan, cook onion and garlic in oil until tender but not browned.
- Add tomatoes, tomato sauce, water, sugar, oregano, thyme, the first 1/4 teaspoon salt and bay leaf.
- Bring to boiling; simmer, uncovered, for 45 minutes.
- Remove bay leaf.

salad_info: easy cucumber salad ingredient large carton cottage cheese large cucumber medium onion c mayonnaise tbsp vinegar salt pepper taste direction mix ingredient serve ice cold bed lettuce
Original_text:
Easy Cucumber Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large carton cottage cheese
- 1 large cucumber
- 1 medium onion
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1 Tbsp. vinegar
- salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients and serve ice cold on a bed of lettuce.

salad_info: mexican cornbread ingredient c meal egg c buttermilk corn c salad oil tbsp onion red bell pepper hot pepper c sharp cheese direction mix ingredient put medium sized baking skillet bake minute
Original_text:
Mexican Cornbread

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 c. meal
- 2 eggs
- 1 c. buttermilk
- 1 can corn
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 1 Tbsp. onion
- 1/2 red bell pepper
- 2 hot peppers
- 1 c. sharp cheese

Directions:
- Mix all of the ingredients and put into a medium sized baking skillet.
- Bake at 350° for 35 to 40 minutes.

salad_info: jan sherrills shrimp salad ingredient large shrimp peeled deveined cucumber peeled sliced pitted black olive bunch parsley chopped scallion sliced c lemon juice c extravirgin olive oil tbsp cumin salt pepper taste direction salt cucumber place bowl hour wring moisture mix ingredient together large bowl cucumber ready add mixture let sit hour adjust seasoning serve bed lettuce serf
Original_text:
Jan Sherrill'S Shrimp Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 lb. large shrimp, peeled and deveined
- 3 cucumbers, peeled and sliced
- 1 can pitted black olives
- 1 bunch parsley, chopped
- 3 scallions, sliced
- 1/3 c. lemon juice
- 1 c. extra-virgin olive oil
- 2 Tbsp. cumin
- salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- Salt cucumbers; place in bowl for 2 hours.
- Wring out moisture.
- Mix other ingredients together in large bowl.
- When cucumbers are ready, add to mixture.
- Let it sit for an hour; adjust seasoning.
- Serve on bed of lettuce.
- Serves 6 to 8.

salad_info: hot chicken salad ingredient c chicken breast boiled chopped sliced water chestnut c mayonnaise can cream chicken soup c celery chopped tbsp onion chopped c crushed corn flake tbsp butter direction mix chicken soup celery onion water chestnut mayonnaise add cup cornflakes mix pour buttered casserole dish mix rest cornflakes butter spread top bake minute
Original_text:
Hot Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 4 c. chicken breasts, boiled and chopped
- sliced water chestnuts
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 2 cans cream of chicken soup
- 1/2 c. celery, chopped
- 2 Tbsp. onion, chopped
- 3 c. crushed corn flakes
- 3 Tbsp. butter

Directions:
- Mix chicken, soup, celery, onions, water chestnuts and mayonnaise.
- Add 1 cup of cornflakes and mix.
- Pour into buttered casserole dish.
- Mix the rest of cornflakes with butter and spread on top.
- Bake at 325° for 35 minutes.

salad_info: souped spaghetti ingredient c salad oil large onion c green pepper c celery ground meat tsp salt tsp pepper dash red pepper tsp chili powder tsp tabasco cream mushroom soup cream tomato soup direction saute first ingredient tender add ground meat chopped vegetable brown add salt pepper chili powder tabasco cover simmer minute add soup simmer minute serve spaghetti top grated cheese parmesan cheese serf freeze ahead
Original_text:
Souped Up Spaghetti

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 1 large onion
- 1/2 c. green pepper
- 1/2 c. celery
- 1 lb. ground meat
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. pepper
- dash of red pepper
- 2 tsp. chili powder
- 1/4 tsp. Tabasco
- 1 can cream mushroom soup
- 1 can cream tomato soup

Directions:
- Saute first 4 ingredients until tender. Add ground meat to chopped vegetables and brown. Add salt, pepper(s), chili powder and Tabasco. Cover and simmer 10 minutes. Add soup(s). Simmer 30 minutes. (I let it simmer longer; seems the longer it simmers, the better it is.) Serve over spaghetti (individual servings) and top with grated cheese and Parmesan cheese (optional). Serves 4 to 6. Can freeze. Can do ahead.

salad_info: layered salad ingredient head iceberg lettuce sliced green onion chopped stalk celery chopped water chestnut chopped bag fren pea c fresh shredded parmesan cheese bacon bit direction layer deep casserole dish starting lettuce green onion celery water chestnut finally pea spread dressing top layer sprinkle parmesan dressing garnish bacon bit
Original_text:
Layered Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head iceberg lettuce, sliced
- 3 to 4 green onions, chopped
- 8 or more stalks of celery, chopped
- 1 can water chestnuts, chopped
- 1 bag frozen peas
- 1 c. fresh shredded parmesan cheese
- Bacon bits

Directions:
- Layer a deep casserole dish starting with lettuce, then green onions, then celery, then water chestnuts, and finally peas. Spread dressing over top layer. Sprinkle parmesan over dressing. Garnish with bacon bits.

salad_info: pistachio salad ingredient large can fruit cocktail crushed pineapple pkg pistachio jello pudding large container cool whip flaked coconut pkg colored marshmallow can mandarin orange direction drain fruit put large mixing bowl add pistachio pudding mix gradually add cool whip add flaked coconut marshmallow mix well put large dish chill
Original_text:
Pistachio Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 large cans fruit cocktail
- 1 can crushed pineapple
- 1 pkg. pistachio Jell-O pudding
- 2 large containers Cool Whip
- 1 can flaked coconut
- 1 pkg. colored marshmallows
- 3 cans mandarin oranges

Directions:
- Drain fruit and put in large mixing bowl.
- Add pistachio pudding mix.
- Gradually add Cool Whip.
- Add flaked coconut and marshmallows.
- Mix well.
- Put in large dish and chill.

Original_text:
New Classic Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 bag (1 1/2 lb.) refrigerated, ready-to-cook red potatoes
- 1/4 c. mayonnaise
- 1/4 c. chopped kosher dill pickles
- 2 Tbsp. finely chopped shallot
- 1 Tbsp white wine vinegar
- 1/2 Tsp sugar
- 1/2 Tsp salt
- 1 Tsp olive oil
- 1 cup frozen whole-kernel corn, partially thawed

Directions:
- Cook potatoes according to package directions. Drain in colander under cool running water, 30 seconds.
- Set aside.

salad_info: curried chicken rice salad ingredient tsp vinegar tsp salad oil tsp curry powder c minced onion c cooked white rice c cooked chopped chicken breast c almond slivered c celery chopped c mayonnaise tsp salt tsp black pepper c green pepper chopped direction mix vinegar oil curry powder together dressing toss onion rice refrigerate overnight hour rice mixture add ingredient mix well chill least hour serf
Original_text:
Curried Chicken Rice Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 tsp. vinegar
- 2 tsp. salad oil
- 1/2 tsp. curry powder
- 1/4 c. minced onion
- 1 1/2 c. cooked white rice
- 2 c. cooked and chopped chicken breasts
- 1/2 c. almonds, slivered
- 1 c. celery, chopped
- 3/4 c. mayonnaise
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/8 tsp. black pepper
- 1/2 c. green pepper, chopped

Directions:
- Mix vinegar, oil and curry powder together as a dressing. Toss in onion and rice.
- Refrigerate overnight or 24 hours.
- To rice mixture, add all other ingredients and mix well.
- Chill at least 1 hour.
- Serves 5 to 6.

salad_info: heavenly hash salad ingredient large fruit cocktail c pineapple tidbit tbsp cornstarch c sugar egg yolk carton cool whip c chopped nut c miniature marshmallow c mandarin orange drained direction drain well reserving syrup fruit cocktail pineapple combine saucepan cornstarch cup sugar mix well combine add egg yolk cup reserved syrup blend well cover medium heat stirring constantly thickened cool thoroughly fold cool whip chopped nut marshmallow pineapple fruit cocktail mandarin orange cover chill several hour overnight
Original_text:
Heavenly Hash Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large can fruit cocktail
- 1 c. pineapple tidbits
- 2 Tbsp. cornstarch
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 2 egg yolks
- 1 carton Cool Whip
- 1/4 c. chopped nuts
- 2 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 c. mandarin oranges, drained

Directions:
- Drain well, reserving syrup from fruit cocktail and pineapple. Combine in saucepan the cornstarch and 1/4 cup sugar.
- Mix well. Combine and add the egg yolks and 1 cup reserved syrup.
- Blend well.
- Cover over medium heat, stirring constantly, until thickened.
- Cool thoroughly.
- Fold in Cool Whip, chopped nuts, marshmallows, pineapple, fruit cocktail and mandarin oranges. Cover and chill several hours or overnight.

salad_info: tangy corn salad ingredient pkg fren shoepeg corn cooked drained c chopped bell pepper c finely chopped celery c white wine vinegar c vegetable oil c sugar green onion chopped tbsp chopped fresh parsley tsp seasoned salt tsp garlic powder direction combine ingredient mix well cover refrigerate hour tossing occasionally yield serving
Original_text:
Tangy Corn Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (16 oz.) pkg. frozen Shoepeg corn, cooked and drained
- 2/3 c. chopped bell pepper
- 1/3 c. finely chopped celery
- 1/3 c. white wine vinegar
- 1/3 c. vegetable oil
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 2 green onions, chopped
- 2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
- 3/4 tsp. seasoned salt
- 1/4 tsp. garlic powder

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients; mix well.
- Cover and refrigerate 8 hours, tossing occasionally.
- Yield: 6 to 8 servings.

salad_info: tuna pasta salad ingredient c uncooked whole wheat shell spiral c plain nonfat yogurt tsp honey tbsp lemon juice tsp balsamic vinegar tsp dried dill weed tsp celery seed tsp paprika pinch white pepper light tuna drained flaked c fren pea thaw c chopped celery c chopped red pepper tbsp chopped green onion direction cook pasta boiling water minute taste drain rinse cold water large bowl combine yogurt honey lemon juice vinegar dill celery seed paprika white pepper stir pasta tuna pea celery red pepper mix gently thoroughly evenly coated dressing sprinkle green onion top serve room temperature salad need held hour cover refrigerate chilled let sit room temperature minimum minute serving yield serving
Original_text:
Tuna Pasta Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. uncooked whole wheat shells or spirals (1 1/2 c. cooked)
- 1/2 c. plain nonfat yogurt
- 1 1/2 tsp. honey
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1 tsp. balsamic vinegar
- 1/2 tsp. dried dill weed
- 1/4 tsp. celery seed
- 1/4 tsp. paprika
- pinch of white pepper (optional)
- 1 (6 1/2 oz.) can light tuna (packed in water), drained and flaked
- 1/3 c. frozen peas, do not thaw
- 1/3 c. chopped celery
- 1/4 c. chopped red pepper
- 2 Tbsp. chopped green onion

Directions:
- Cook pasta in boiling water 10 to 12 minutes to taste.
- Drain and rinse with cold water.
- In a large bowl, combine yogurt, honey, lemon juice, vinegar, dill, celery seed, paprika and white pepper.
- Stir in pasta, tuna, peas, celery and red pepper.
- Mix gently, but thoroughly, until evenly coated with dressing. Sprinkle green onion on top.
- Serve at room temperature.
- If salad needs to be held for more than 2 hours, cover and refrigerate.
- If chilled, let sit at room temperature a minimum of 15 minutes before serving.
- Yields 4 servings.

salad_info: macaroni cheddar salad ingredient tbsp vegetable oil tbsp wine vinegar tbsp water tbsp mayonnaise c celery diced tsp poupon mustard tbsp worcestershire sauce c green pepper red c pimento tsp sugar salt pepper c cooked macaroni cheddar cheese tsp onion direction combine first ingredient salad bowl smooth add remaining mix thoroughly chill
Original_text:
Macaroni Cheddar Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
- 3 Tbsp. wine vinegar
- 3 Tbsp. water
- 3 Tbsp. mayonnaise
- 1/2 c. celery, diced
- 1 tsp. Poupon mustard
- 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
- 1/2 c. green pepper or red
- 1/4 c. pimento
- 2 tsp. sugar
- salt and pepper
- 2 c. cooked macaroni
- 8 oz. Cheddar cheese
- 2 tsp. onion (if desired)

Directions:
- Combine first 8 ingredients in salad bowl until smooth.
- Add remaining; mix thoroughly.
- Chill.

Original_text:
Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 4 c. cooked chicken, cut into small pieces with scissors
- 2 stalks celery, chopped
- 1 c. seedless green grapes, sliced
- 1 pkg. Planters slivered almonds, toasted (1/3 c.)
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/4 tsp. pepper
- 3/4 c. Hellmann's mayonnaise
- 1/4 c. lite sour cream
- lettuce

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients except lettuce.
- Mix thoroughly. Serve over lettuce, if desired.
- Makes 6 servings.

Original_text:
Hot Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. diced, cooked chicken or turkey
- 3 hard-boiled eggs, chopped
- 1 (10 oz.) can cream of chicken soup
- 1 c. chopped celery
- 1/2 c. slivered, toasted almonds

Directions:
- Combine all, except chips.
- Put into greased casserole.
- Top with crushed chips and bake in 400° oven about 20 minutes or until bubbly.

Original_text:
Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. hot water
- 1 (13 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1/2 c. chopped walnuts
- 1 pkg. Dream Whip
- 1 large pkg. strawberry jello
- 2 bananas, sliced
- 2 (10 oz.) cartons frozen strawberries
- 1 large pkg. cream cheese, softened

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in 2 cups of hot water.
- Add strawberries and stir until thawed.
- Add bananas, pineapple and nuts.
- Pour 1/2 of the mixture into dish.
- Let set.

salad_info: german potato salad ingredient medium large potato cooked tbsp salad oil tbsp vinegar tbsp lemon juice tbsp grated onion tsp salt tbsp chopped parsley slice bacon cooked crumbled tsp ground pepper direction slice potato casserole bowl heat oil bacon pan add vinegar lemon juice onion salt pour potato sprinkle parsley bacon pepper heat warm toss serve yield serving
Original_text:
German Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 to 8 medium to large potatoes, cooked
- 6 Tbsp. salad oil
- 3 Tbsp. vinegar
- 3 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1 Tbsp. grated onion
- 1 1/2 tsp. salt
- 2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
- 5 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled
- 1/4 tsp. ground pepper

Directions:
- Slice potatoes in casserole or bowl.
- Heat the oil in bacon pan.
- Add vinegar, lemon juice, onion and salt.
- Pour over potatoes.
- Sprinkle on parsley, bacon and pepper.
- Heat until warm. Toss and serve.
- Yields 8 to 10 servings.

salad_info: grandma cherry salad ingredient crushed pineapple drained cherry pie filling c whipping topping sweetened condensed milk c chopped walnut direction drain pineapple well add rest ingredient order mix well refrigerate ready use least hour delicious poultry serve dessert salad
Original_text:
Grandma'S Cherry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 (21 oz.) can cherry pie filling
- 2 c. whipping topping
- 1 can sweetened condensed milk
- 1 c. chopped walnuts

Directions:
- Drain pineapple very well, then add the rest of the ingredients in order.
- Mix very well and refrigerate until ready to use, at least 3 hours.
- Delicious with poultry or serve as a dessert salad.

- 1/4 c. extra virgin olive oil

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients. Drizzle with vinegar and oil over the salad. Toss and season with salt and pepper to your taste.

- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 2 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 pkg. strawberry jello (small)

- Mix 2 1/2 cups boiling water with jello. Add frozen strawberries.

Original_text:
Coca Cola Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. lemon jello
- 1 pkg. black cherry jello
- 2 c. hot water
- 1 c. chopped nuts
- 1 can black cherries
- 1 can pineapple chunks

Directions:
- Dissolve jellos and hot water together. When
- mixture begins to thicken add nuts, cherries and pineapple. Refrigerate and allow to congeal.

Original_text:
Raspberry Pretzel Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 1/2 c. crushed pretzels (crumbs)
- 1 c. melted butter
- 3 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 large container Cool Whip
- 8 oz. cream cheese
- 1 c. sugar
- 2 pkg. raspberry jello
- 2 c. hot water
- 2 pkg. frozen raspberries (not the loose frozen raspberries)

Directions:
- Mix crumbs, butter and 3 tablespoons sugar; press in pan. Bake for 10 minutes at 350°.
- Cool.
- Cream the cream cheese and sugar until smooth.
- Spread on pretzel crust.
- Dissolve jello in hot water; add frozen raspberries.
- Let stand until thick and pour over top.
- Let set.

Original_text:
Shrimp Sandwiches

Ingredients:
- 1 can small shrimp
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 1/4 c. Catalina salad dressing
- parsley flakes

Directions:
- Soften cream cheese and add salad dressing.
- Drain shrimp and add to cheese mixture and add a few parsley flakes.
- Makes great party sandwiches.

Original_text:
Sunshine Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large pkg. orange jello
- 1 c. hot water
- 1 c. cold water

- 1 c. grated carrots

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in hot water, add cold water; stir. Add pineapple; allow to cool but not gel. Add carrots and stir to distribute evenly. Place in refrigerate to congeal.

Original_text:
Garden Chicken Salad

Ingredients:

- 3 Tbsp. low-fat milk
- 2 Tbsp. chopped green onions
- 1 tsp. grated lemon peel (optional)
- 1 tsp. sugar
- 1/4 tsp. pepper
- 6 c. cut up fresh vegetables
- lettuce leaves (to line platter)
- 1 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breast, grilled and sliced

Directions:
- To make dressing, in a small bowl, combine first 6 ingredients. In a large bowl, toss vegetables with half of dressing.
- Arrange on lettuce-lined platter.
- Top with chicken.
- Serve with remaining dressing.

Original_text:
Favorite Four Bean Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can red kidney beans
- 1 can green beans
- 1 can wax beans
- 1 can garbanzo beans
- 1/2 c. oil
- 1 c. lemon juice
- 2/3 c. sugar
- 1/2 c. water

Directions:
- Mix kidney beans, green beans, wax beans and garbanzo beans. Marinate overnight.
- Add onion rings just before serving for crispness.

salad_info: cauliflower salad ingredient head lettuce head cauliflower broken piece bacon fried crumbled c mayonnaise tsp vinegar c sugar sharp cheese direction layer first three ingredient bowl mix together mayonnaise vinegar sugar pour first mixture cover top cheese let stand refrigerator hour mix serve
Original_text:
Cauliflower Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head lettuce
- 1 head cauliflower, broken into pieces
- 1 lb. bacon, fried and crumbled
- 2 c. mayonnaise
- 1 tsp. vinegar
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1/2 lb. sharp cheese

Directions:
- Layer the first three ingredients in bowl.
- Mix together mayonnaise, vinegar and sugar, then pour over first mixture. Cover top with cheese.
- Let stand in refrigerator 24 hours, then mix and serve.

salad_info: pineapple chicken salad ingredient tsp butter c slivered almond pineapple chunk c cooked chicken breast chunk c thinly sliced celery tbsp wheat germ tsp honey tsp lemon juice c mayonnaise crisp lettuce leaf direction melt butter skillet saute almond low heat watching carefully get brown remove cool mix chicken pineapple celery almond small bowl mix wheat germ honey lemon juice mayonnaise blend dressing salad serve salad crisp lettuce garnished reserved almond
Original_text:
Pineapple Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 tsp. butter
- 3/4 c. slivered almonds
- 1 (13 1/4 oz.) can pineapple chunks
- 1 1/2 c. cooked chicken breast chunks
- 3/4 c. thinly sliced celery
- 1 Tbsp. wheat germ
- 1 tsp. honey
- 2 tsp. lemon juice
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- crisp lettuce leaves

Directions:
- Melt butter in skillet.
- Saute almonds over low heat, watching carefully so they do not get too brown.
- Remove and cool.
- Mix chicken, pineapple, celery and 3/4 of the almonds.
- In a small bowl mix wheat germ, honey, lemon juice and mayonnaise.
- Blend dressing with salad.
- Serve salad on crisp lettuce garnished with reserved almonds.

salad_info: seafoam salad ingredient small pkg cream cheese large pear cut small piece tbsp half half small pkg lime jello c whipped cream direction cool whip used whipped cream delightful
Original_text:
Seafoam Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 small pkg. cream cheese
- 1 large can pears, cut into small pieces
- 2 Tbsp. half and half
- 1 small pkg. lime jello
- 1 c. whipped cream*

Directions:
- *Cool Whip can be used, but the whipped cream is so delightful.

salad_info: six cup salad ingredient c cottage cheese c sour cream c fruit cocktail drained c coconut c miniature marshmallow c chopped nut direction combine ingredient mix well refrigerate several hour serving
Original_text:
Six Cup Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. cottage cheese
- 1 c. sour cream
- 1 c. fruit cocktail, drained
- 1 c. coconut
- 1 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients and mix well.
- Refrigerate several hours before serving.

salad_info: easy fren salad ingredient pie filling eagle brand crushed pineapple drained c chopped walnut pecan c lemon juice cool whip direction combine first fold cool whip put inch pie plate cover freeze hour overnight serve leaf lettuce garnish fruit
Original_text:
Easy Frozen Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can pie filling
- 1 can Eagle Brand
- 1 (8 oz.) crushed pineapple, drained
- 1/2 c. chopped walnuts or pecans
- 1/4 c. lemon juice
- 1 (4 oz.) Cool Whip

Directions:
- Combine first 5, then fold in Cool Whip.
- Put in 10-inch pie plate.
- Cover and freeze 4 hours or overnight.
- Serve on leaf lettuce.
- Garnish with fruit.

salad_info: autumn apple salad ingredient crushed pineapple c sugar pkg lemon flavored gelatin pkg cream cheese softened c diced unpeeled apple c chopped nut c chopped celery c whipped topping lettuce leaf direction saucepan combine pineapple sugar bring boil boil minute add gelatin stir dissolved add cream cheese stir mixture thoroughly combined cool fold apple nut celery whipped topping pour inch square baking pan chill firm cut square serve lettuce leaf make serving
Original_text:
Autumn Apple Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple (undrained)
- 2/3 c. sugar
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon flavored gelatin
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
- 1 c. diced, unpeeled apples
- 1/2 to 1 c. chopped nuts
- 1 c. chopped celery
- 1 c. whipped topping
- lettuce leaves

Directions:
- In a saucepan, combine pineapple and sugar; bring to a boil and boil for 3 minutes.
- Add gelatin; stir until dissolved.
- Add cream cheese; stir until mixture is thoroughly combined.
- Cool. Fold in apples, nuts, celery and whipped topping.
- Pour into a 9-inch square baking pan.
- Chill until firm.
- Cut into squares and serve on lettuce leaves.
- Makes 9 to 12 servings.

salad_info: grasshopper salad ingredient box pistachio pudding cool whip crushed pineapple juice c nut c mini marshmallow direction mix pudding mix cool whip together add rest ingredient stir well refrigerate may used immediately
Original_text:
Grasshopper Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 box pistachio pudding (instant)
- 1 (12 oz.) Cool Whip
- 1 can crushed pineapple with the juice
- 1/2 c. nuts
- 1 c. mini marshmallows

Directions:
- Mix pudding mix and Cool Whip together.
- Add the rest of the ingredients and stir well.
- Refrigerate.
- May be used immediately.

salad_info: christmas party pinwheel ingredient pkg cream cheese softened pkg ranch salad dressing mix cup minced sweet pepper cup minced celery cup sliced green olive cup sliced green onion flour tortilla direction mixing bowl beat cream cheese dressing mix smooth add red pepper celery onion olive mix well spread cup tortilla roll tightly wrap plastic wrap refrigerate least hour slice inch piece yield serving
Original_text:
Christmas Party Pinwheels

Ingredients:
- 2 pkg (8 oz. each) cream cheese, softened
- 1 pkg (4 oz.) ranch salad dressing mix
- 1/2 cup minced sweet pepper
- 1/2 cup minced celery
- 1/4 cup sliced green olives
- 1/4 cup sliced green onions
- 2 to 4 (10 inch) flour tortillas

Directions:
- In mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and dressing mix until smooth.
- Add red pepper, celery, onions and olives:
- mix well. Spread about 3/4 cup on each tortilla.
- Roll up tightly; wrap in plastic wrap.
- Refrigerate for at least 2 hours.
- Slice into 1/2 inch pieces.
- Yield 15 - 20 servings.

salad_info: cherry cola salad ingredient c water c sugar cherry pie filling large crushed pineapple undrained tbsp lemon juice c cold cola soft drink c chopped nut direction combine water sugar bring boil add pie filling return boil pour jello dissolve add rest ingredient pour x inch pan mold set
Original_text:
Cherry Cola Salad

Ingredients:
- 3/4 c. water
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 can cherry pie filling
- 1 large can crushed pineapple, undrained
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1 c. cold cola (Pepsi or Coke) soft drink
- 1/2 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Combine water and sugar; bring to a boil.
- Add pie filling and return to a boil.
- Pour over the Jell-O to dissolve.
- Add rest of ingredients.
- Pour into 13 x 9-inch pan or mold to set.

salad_info: german potato salad ingredient medium sized potato slice bacon c chopped onion tbsp flour tbsp sugar tsp salt tsp celery seed dash pepper c water c vinegar direction boil potato skin peel slice thinly fry slowly large skillet bacon drain paper towel saute bacon fat golden onion blend flour sugar salt celery seed dash pepper cook low heat stirring smooth bubbly remove heat stir water vinegar bring boil stirring constantly boil minute stir carefully potato crumbled bit bacon remove heat cover let stand ready serve make serving
Original_text:
German Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 medium sized potatoes
- 8 slices bacon (strips)
- 3/4 c. chopped onion
- 2 Tbsp. flour
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. celery seed
- dash of pepper
- 3/4 c. water
- 1/3 c. vinegar (I use white but other may be used)

Directions:
- Boil potatoes with the skins on.
- Peel and slice thinly.
- Fry slowly in large skillet the bacon.
- Drain on paper towel.
- Saute in the bacon fat until golden the onion.
- Blend in flour, sugar, salt, celery seed and dash of pepper.
- Cook over low heat, stirring until smooth and bubbly.
- Remove from heat.
- Stir in water and vinegar. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly.
- Boil 1 minute.
- Stir in carefully the potatoes and crumbled bits of bacon.
- Remove from heat.
- Cover and let stand until ready to serve.
- Makes 6 to 8 servings.

salad_info: macaroni salad ingredient shell macaroni eagle brand milk green pepper chopped fine onion chopped fine carrot shredded c vinegar c sugar c mayonnaise tsp salt tsp pepper direction cook macaroni drain cool mix green pepper onion carrot macaroni mix remaining ingredient separate bowl pour macaroni let set refrigerator overnight
Original_text:
Macaroni Salad

Ingredients:
- 16 oz. shell macaroni
- 1 can Eagle Brand milk
- 1 green pepper, chopped fine
- 1 onion, chopped fine
- 4 carrots, shredded
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 1 c. sugar
- 2 c. mayonnaise
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. pepper

Directions:
- Cook macaroni; drain and cool.
- Mix green pepper, onion and carrots in macaroni.
- Mix remaining ingredients in separate bowl. Pour over macaroni.
- Let set in refrigerator overnight.

salad_info: tomato soup congealed salad ingredient tbsp knox gelatin c cool water c mayonnaise c chopped celery tbsp chopped bell pepper small bottle stuffed olive cream cheese c cream tomato soup tsp grated onion c chopped nut direction dissolve gelatin cool water heat cream cheese tomato soup mix cool add balance ingredient congeal
Original_text:
Tomato Soup Congealed Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 Tbsp. Knox gelatin
- 1/2 c. cool water
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 1/2 c. chopped celery
- 1 Tbsp. chopped bell peppers
- 1 small bottle stuffed olives
- 3 (3 oz.) cream cheese
- 1 c. cream of tomato soup
- 1 tsp. grated onion
- 1 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Dissolve gelatin in cool water.
- Heat cream cheese in tomato soup to mix.
- Cool.
- Add balance of ingredients and congeal.

salad_info: chicken breast diane ingredient small boneless chicken breast tsp salt tsp black pepper tbsp olive salad oil tbsp butter margarine tbsp chopped fresh chive green onion juice lemon lime tbsp brandy cognac tbsp chopped parsley tsp dijon mustard c chicken broth direction place chicken breast half sheet waxed paper pound slightly mallet sprinkle salt pepper heat tablespoon oil butter large skillet cook chicken high heat minute side transfer warm serving platter add chive lemon juice brandy parsley mustard pan cook second whisking constantly add broth continue whisk stir sauce smooth whisk remaining oil butter pour chicken serve immediately good served noodle tomato sauce serf
Original_text:
Chicken Breasts Diane

Ingredients:
- 8 small boneless chicken breasts
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. black pepper
- 2 Tbsp. olive or salad oil
- 2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
- 3 Tbsp. chopped fresh chives or green onions
- juice or 1/2 lemon or lime
- 2 Tbsp. brandy or cognac (optional)
- 3 Tbsp. chopped parsley
- 2 tsp. Dijon mustard
- 1/4 c. chicken broth

Directions:
- Place chicken breast halves between sheets of waxed paper. Pound slightly with mallet.
- Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
- Heat 1 tablespoon of oil and butter in large skillet.
- Cook chicken over high heat for 4 minutes on each side.
- Transfer to warm serving platter.
- Add chives, lemon juice and brandy (if used), parsley and mustard to pan.
- Cook 15 seconds, whisking constantly. Add broth and continue to whisk.
- Stir until sauce is smooth. Whisk in remaining oil and butter.
- Pour over chicken; serve immediately.
- Good served with noodles with tomato sauce.
- Serves 4 to 8.

salad_info: orange salad ingredient mandarin orange drained pineapple tidbit drained small pkg orange gelatin small carton cottage cheese container fren whipped topping thawed direction mix ingredient together thoroughly refrigerate
Original_text:
Orange Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 can pineapple tidbits, drained
- 1 small pkg. orange gelatin
- 1 small carton cottage cheese
- 1 (8 oz.) container frozen whipped topping, thawed

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together thoroughly and refrigerate.

salad_info: cranberry salad ingredient ground cranberry whole orange cut large apple crushed pineapple raspberry jello large c water c sugar c walnut direction dissolve jello water mix remaining ingredient chill ready serve
Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. ground cranberries
- 2 whole oranges, cut up
- 1 large apple
- 1 can crushed pineapple (with juice)
- 1 raspberry jello, large
- 2 c. water
- 2 c. sugar
- 1 c. walnuts

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in water and mix remaining ingredients.
- Chill until ready to serve.

salad_info: carrot salad ingredient pkg carrot sliced medium green pepper chopped jar cocktail onion drained c sugar c white vinegar c vegetable oil tsp dry mustard direction cook carrot boiling water minute tendercrisp drain combine pepper remaining ingredient saucepan bring boil medium heat stirring frequently pour hot mixture carrot cover marinate refrigerator least hour yield serving
Original_text:
Carrot Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (2 lb.) pkg. carrots, sliced
- 1 medium green pepper, chopped
- 1 (7 oz.) jar cocktail onions, drained
- 1 c. sugar
- 1/2 c. white vinegar
- 1/2 c. vegetable oil
- 1 tsp. dry mustard

Directions:
- Cook carrots in boiling water for 15 minutes until tender-crisp.
- Drain.
- Combine pepper and remaining ingredients in saucepan.
- Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring frequently. Pour hot mixture over carrots.
- Cover and marinate in refrigerator at least 8 hours.
- Yields 12 servings.

salad_info: pink fruit salad ingredient cherry pie filling large crushed pineapple sweetened condensed milk carton cool whip c miniature marshmallow c pecan piece direction mix together freeze
Original_text:
Pink Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can cherry pie filling
- 1 large can crushed pineapple
- 1 can sweetened condensed milk
- 10 oz. carton Cool Whip
- 2 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 c. pecan pieces

Directions:
- Mix all together and freeze.

salad_info: black russian bundt cake ingredient pkg pillsbury yellow cake mix small pkg jello instant chocolate pudding c salad oil egg c water tsp cinnamon c vodka kahlua betty crocker milk chocolate frosting direction one bowl combine ingredient except frosting beat mixer high speed minute grease flour medium size bundt pan pour batter bake test minute every minute done cool pan minute turn rack frosted warm frosting melt sort glaze equally good frosted cool
Original_text:
Black Russian Bundt Cake

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. Pillsbury yellow cake mix
- 1 small pkg. Jell-O instant chocolate pudding
- 1 c. salad oil
- 4 eggs
- 3/4 c. water
- 1 tsp. cinnamon
- 1/4 c. each: vodka and kahlua
- 1 can Betty Crocker milk chocolate frosting (to frost)

Directions:
- In one bowl, combine all ingredients except frosting.
- Beat with mixer at high speed for 2 minutes.
- Grease and flour medium size (9 cup) Bundt pan and pour in batter.
- (This will give a high cake; larger pans will give a flatter cake.)
- Bake at 350°.
- Test at 45 minutes and then every 5 minutes until done.
- Cool in pan 10 minutes, then turn out on rack.
- If frosted while warm, frosting will melt to sort of a glaze.
- Equally good frosted when cool.

salad_info: sauerkraut salad ingredient c sugar c vinegar sauerkraut c celery cut fine onion chopped green pepper red sweet canned pepper pimento cut direction bring sugar vinegar boil let cool drain well cut sauerkraut add rest ingredient pour syrup let stand overnight important stand overnight delicious
Original_text:
Sauerkraut Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. sugar
- 1/4 c. vinegar
- 1 can sauerkraut
- 1 c. celery, cut fine
- 1 onion, chopped
- 1/2 green pepper or 5 or 6 red sweet canned peppers or pimentos, cut up

Directions:
- Bring sugar and vinegar to boil and let cool.
- Drain well and cut up sauerkraut.
- Add rest of ingredients.
- Pour syrup over and let stand overnight.
- Very important to stand overnight. Delicious.

salad_info: green salad orange dressing ingredient c fresh orange juice tbsp balsamic vinegar tsp grated orange zest tsp dijon mustard tsp salt tsp ground pepper tbsp olive oil c romaine lettuce bunch watercress small sweet onion navel orange direction mix orange juice vinegar orange zest mustard salt pepper olive oil shake refrigerate possible make day two ahead toss romaine watercress dressing arrange small salad plate use one bowl peel slice orange thinly slice small sweet onion arrange along orange slice top lettuce
Original_text:
Green Salad With Orange Dressing

Ingredients:
- 1/4 c. fresh orange juice
- 2 Tbsp. balsamic vinegar
- 2 tsp. grated orange zest
- 1 tsp. Dijon mustard
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. ground pepper
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
- 2 c. romaine lettuce
- 1/2 bunch watercress
- 1/2 small sweet onion
- 2 navel oranges

Directions:
- Mix orange juice, vinegar, orange zest, mustard, salt, pepper and olive oil. Shake and refrigerate; if possible make a day or two ahead.
- Toss romaine and watercress with dressing.
- Arrange small salad plates or use one bowl.
- Peel and slice the oranges. Thinly slice small sweet onion and arrange along with orange slices on top of lettuce.

salad_info: potato salad dressing ingredient egg beaten tbsp prepared mustard c sugar c cider vinegar tsp salt tbsp kraft mayonnaise miracle whip salad dressing direction cook egg sugar vinegar salt double boiler stirring often thickens remove heat add mustard mayonnaise pour salad
Original_text:
Potato Salad Dressing

Ingredients:
- 2 eggs, beaten
- 1 Tbsp. prepared mustard
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1/3 c. cider vinegar
- 1 tsp. salt
- 3 Tbsp. Kraft mayonnaise or Miracle Whip salad dressing

Directions:
- Cook eggs, sugar, vinegar and salt over double boiler, stirring often, until it thickens.
- Remove from heat.
- Add mustard and mayonnaise.
- Pour over salad.

salad_info: thai cucumber salad ingredient firm cucumber tbsp shredded fresh red chili c sugar tbsp white vinegar chopped onion taste cilantro leaf taste direction trim end cucumber scrape fork make decorative pattern quarter cucumber lengthwise remove seed cut crosswise thin slice put bowl add chili small saucepan combine sugar vinegar bring boil cook stirring sugar dissolved cool room temperature pour sauce cucumber mixture chill sprinkle cilantro serf
Original_text:
Thai Cucumber Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 firm cucumbers
- 1 Tbsp. shredded fresh red chili
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 5 Tbsp. white vinegar
- chopped onion to taste
- cilantro leaves to taste

Directions:
- Trim ends of cucumbers and scrape with fork to make a decorative pattern.
- Quarter the cucumbers lengthwise and remove seeds.
- Cut them crosswise into thin slices.
- Put in bowl and add chili.
- In small saucepan, combine sugar and vinegar; bring to boil.
- Cook, stirring, until the sugar has dissolved.
- Cool to room temperature and pour sauce over the cucumber mixture.
- Chill and sprinkle with cilantro.
- Serves 4.

salad_info: chitterlings ingredient chitterlings large onion spiced clove medium peeled whole tomato c vinegar tsp white pepper red pepper pod celery stalk top tsp salt direction thaw wash chitterlings water turn inside remove excess fat add spice add potato cover water boil low heat hour tender add vinegar last minute cooking cut small piece serve tasty cold slaw potato salad corn bread
Original_text:
Chitterlings

Ingredients:
- 10 lb. chitterlings
- 1 large onion, spiced with 6 to 8 cloves
- 2 medium peeled whole tomatoes
- 1/4 c. vinegar
- 2 tsp. white pepper
- 5 to 8 red pepper pods
- 2 celery stalks with tops
- 2 tsp. salt

Directions:
- Thaw and wash chitterlings through 4 or 5 waters.
- Turn inside out.
- Remove excess fat.
- Add spices (except vinegar).
- Add potatoes.
- Cover with water.
- Boil over low heat for 6 hours or until tender.
- Add vinegar last 20 minutes of cooking.
- Cut in small pieces.
- Serve with tasty cold slaw, potato salad and corn bread.

salad_info: macaroni salad ingredient macaroni bunch green onion hardboiled egg large cucumber peeled seeded chopped mayonnaise salt pepper taste direction chop everything fine mix mayonnaise
Original_text:
Macaroni Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. macaroni (alphabet)
- 1 bunch green onions (tops and all)
- 8 hard-boiled eggs
- 2 large cucumbers, peeled, seeded and chopped
- mayonnaise
- salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- Chop everything very fine and mix with the mayonnaise.

salad_info: fiesta salad ingredient c cooked instant rice c chopped green pepper tbsp lemon juice tsp seasoned salt tsp ground cumin c sour cream diced corn chip tuna c diced celery c chopped onion tbsp chili powder tsp garlic salt tsp ground oregano tomato direction combine cooked rice tuna celery green pepper lemon juice onion mixing bowl blend seasoning sour cream stir tunarice mixture chill hour garnish tomato serve corn chip
Original_text:
Fiesta Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 c. cooked instant rice
- 1/4 c. chopped green pepper
- 1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1 tsp. seasoned salt
- 1/4 tsp. ground cumin
- 1/2 c. sour cream
- diced corn chips
- 1 (6 1/2 oz.) can tuna
- 1/2 c. diced celery
- 1/8 c. chopped onion
- 1 Tbsp. chili powder
- 1 tsp. garlic salt
- 1/4 tsp. ground oregano
- 1 tomato

Directions:
- Combine cooked rice, tuna, celery, green pepper, lemon juice and onion in a mixing bowl.
- Blend the seasonings with the sour cream.
- Stir into the tuna/rice mixture.
- Chill for 1 hour. Garnish with tomatoes and serve with corn chips.

salad_info: fiesta potato salad ingredient c diced cooked potato c chopped green pepper hardcooked egg sliced c diced radish c chopped celery salt pepper taste c salad dressing lettuce direction combine ingredient except lettuce place lettucelined bowl garnish parsley additional egg radish
Original_text:
Fiesta Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 c. diced, cooked potatoes
- 1/4 c. chopped green pepper
- 2 hard-cooked eggs, sliced
- 1/2 c. diced radishes
- 1 c. chopped celery
- salt and pepper to taste
- 1 c. salad dressing
- lettuce

Directions:
- Combine ingredients, except lettuce.
- Place in a lettuce-lined bowl.
- Garnish with parsley and additional eggs and radishes.

salad_info: anns sweet heart salad ingredient large pkg cream cheese c powdered confectioner sugar crushed pineapple drained small jar maraschino cherry drained large container cool whip c nut chopped direction cream together cream cheese confectioner sugar add pineapple cherry cool whip nut save cherry nut top chill serve
Original_text:
Ann'S Sweet Heart Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large pkg. cream cheese
- 1 1/2 c. powdered confectioners sugar
- 1 can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 small jar maraschino cherries, drained
- 1 large container Cool Whip
- 1 c. nuts, chopped

Directions:
- Cream together cream cheese and confectioners sugar.
- Add pineapple, cherries, Cool Whip and nuts.
- Save some cherries and nuts for top.
- Chill and serve.

salad_info: overnight salad ingredient pea drained french green bean drained whole kernel corn drained c diced celery c diced green pepper medium onion diced jar pimento salt taste c sugar c vinegar c oil tsp water tsp paprika direction mix vegetable salt combine sugar vinegar oil water paprika stir sugar dissolved pour vegetable chill hour
Original_text:
Overnight Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (No. 2) can peas, drained
- 1 (No. 2) can French green beans, drained
- 1 (No. 2) can whole kernel corn, drained
- 1 c. diced celery
- 1/2 c. diced green pepper
- 1 medium onion, diced
- 1 (2 oz.) jar pimentos
- salt to taste
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 c. vinegar
- 1/2 c. oil
- 2 tsp. water
- 1/2 tsp. paprika

Directions:
- Mix vegetables and salt.
- Combine sugar, vinegar, oil, water and paprika.
- Stir until sugar is dissolved.
- Pour over vegetables. Chill 24 hours.

salad_info: cherry salad ingredient cherry pie filling crushed pineapple drained eagle brand milk c walnut carton cool whip direction mix ingredient without cool whip fold cool whip refrigerate overnight uncovered
Original_text:
Cherry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can cherry pie filling
- 1 (No. 2) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 can Eagle Brand milk
- 1/2 c. walnuts (1/2 on top)
- 12 oz. carton Cool Whip

Directions:
- Mix ingredients, without Cool Whip, then fold in Cool Whip. Refrigerate overnight, uncovered.

salad_info: lacking salad ingredient small pkg lemon jello small pkg orange jello crushed pineapple drained ripe banana large marshmallow c hot water c cold water direction mix jello hot water add cold water add one crushed drained pineapple mash banana add mixture add marshmallow place refrigerator jell
Original_text:
Lacking Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small pkg. lemon jello
- 1 small pkg. orange jello
- 1 can crushed pineapple (medium size), drained
- 3 very ripe bananas
- 10 large marshmallows
- 2 c. hot water (boiling)
- 1 1/2 c. cold water

Directions:
- Mix jello in hot water and then add cold water.
- Add one can crushed drained pineapple.
- Mash bananas and add to mixture.
- Add marshmallows.
- Place in refrigerator to jell.

salad_info: potato salad ingredient potato c chopped onion c chopped celery tsp salt tsp pepper sugar taste c italian salad dressing mayonnaise approximately c hardboiled egg mustard taste direction cook potato tender cool peel cut cube add remaining ingredient except egg toss potato well coated add egg serving
Original_text:
Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 lb. potatoes (about 6 medium)
- 1/4 c. chopped onion
- 1/2 c. chopped celery
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/8 tsp. pepper
- sugar to taste
- 1/4 c. Italian salad dressing
- mayonnaise, approximately 1 c.
- 2 hard-boiled eggs
- mustard to taste

Directions:
- Cook potatoes until tender.
- Cool and peel. Cut into cubes. Add remaining ingredients except eggs.
- Toss until potatoes are well coated.
- Add eggs just before serving.
- (Best when prepared several hours in advance.)

salad_info: polish stuffed cabbage ingredient solid head cabbage c rice large chopped onion stick butter meat loaf mixture egg salt pepper taste raisin can tomato soup direction core head cabbage set cabbage hole large pot inch water steam pull leaf one one cook rice saute chopped onion butter mix meat loaf mixture rice onion mixture hand add egg mixture salt pepper taste take cabbage leaf put meat middle wrap envelopestyle tightly put small box raisin bottom pan tightly pack row cabbage ball pot boiled cabbage sprinkle another raisin top add tomato soup can water cover bring boil reduce simmer hour serve mashed potato cucumber salad
Original_text:
Polish Stuffed Cabbage

Ingredients:
- 1 solid head cabbage
- 1 c. rice
- 1 large chopped onion
- 1 stick butter
- 2 1/2 lb. meat loaf mixture
- 2 eggs
- salt and pepper to taste
- raisins
- 2 cans tomato soup

Directions:
- Core head of cabbage.
- Set cabbage hole down in large pot with 1 or 2 inches of water and steam.
- Pull off leaves, one by one (total of about 22 to 26).
- Cook rice.
- Saute chopped onion in butter.
- Mix meat loaf mixture with the rice and onion mixture with your hands.
- Add eggs to the mixture and salt and pepper to taste.
- Take each cabbage leaf and put some meat in the middle. Wrap envelope-style tightly.
- Put 1 small box of raisins on bottom of pan.
- Tightly pack 2 rows of cabbage balls in same pot as you boiled cabbage.
- Sprinkle another few raisins on top.
- Add tomato soup and 2 cans water.
- Cover and bring to a boil, then reduce to a simmer for 1 1/2 hours.
- Serve with mashed potatoes and cucumber salad.

salad_info: avocado orange salad ingredient head lettuce avocado peeled sliced fresh orange peeled sliced c mayo c fresh orange juice tsp paprika tsp salt direction line serving bowl lettuce leaf arrange layer avocado orange slice top combine mayonnaise orange juice paprika salt small bowl mix well pour salad
Original_text:
Avocado Orange Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head lettuce
- 2 avocados, peeled and sliced
- 3 fresh oranges, peeled and sliced
- 3/4 c. mayo
- 1/4 c. fresh orange juice
- 1/2 tsp. paprika
- 1/2 tsp. salt

Directions:
- Line serving bowl with lettuce leaves.
- Arrange layers of avocado and orange slices on top.
- Combine mayonnaise, orange juice, paprika and salt in small bowl and mix well.
- Pour over salad.

salad_info: antipasto salad ingredient spiral macaroni c pitted olive sliced c chopped red green pepper hard salami cut strip small red onion ringed c parmesan c chopped parsley c italian dressing c mzarella cheese direction cook macaroni drain rinse completely cool combine remaining ingredient toss macaroni
Original_text:
Antipasto Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (12 oz.) spiral macaroni
- 1 1/4 c. pitted olives, sliced (black)
- 1 c. chopped red or green peppers
- 1/4 lb. hard salami, cut into strips
- 1 small red onion, ringed
- 1/3 c. Parmesan
- 1/4 c. chopped parsley
- 3/4 c. Italian dressing
- 1/2 c. Mozzarella cheese (optional)

Directions:
- Cook macaroni; drain and rinse until completely cool.
- Combine remaining ingredients and toss with macaroni.

salad_info: cranberry jello salad ingredient pkg raspberry jello cranberry sauce undrained crushed pineapple c ginger ale direction dissolve jello cup boiling water stir cranberry sauce add crushed pineapple add ginger ale put mold chill set
Original_text:
Cranberry Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (6 oz.) pkg. raspberry jello
- 1 (16 oz.) can cranberry sauce
- 1 (8 3/4 oz.) undrained crushed pineapple
- 1/2 c. ginger ale

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in 2 cups of boiling water.
- Stir in cranberry sauce.
- Add crushed pineapple.
- Add ginger ale.
- Put in mold and chill until set.

salad_info: bean salad ingredient small onion small green pepper sliced c sugar c vinegar c oil tsp salt tsp dry mustard tsp tarragon leaf tsp basil tbsp parsley juice lemon green bean wax bean kidney bean chick pea direction drain bean add ingredient let marinate least overnight salad may made several day ahead baby lima bean may added also ounce sliced mushroom
Original_text:
4 Bean Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small onion
- 1 small green pepper, sliced
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 1/2 c. oil
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. dry mustard
- 1/2 tsp. tarragon leaves
- 1 tsp. basil
- 2 Tbsp. parsley
- juice from 1 lemon
- 1 can green beans
- 1 can wax beans
- 1 can kidney beans
- 1 can chick peas

Directions:
- Drain the beans (drain the kidney beans after being rinsed with water).
- Add other ingredients and let marinate at least overnight.
- This salad may be made several days ahead.
- A can of baby lima beans may be added; also a 4 ounce can of sliced mushrooms.

salad_info: combination salad ingredient c mixed salad green c cheese strip tomato c sliced celery hardboiled egg sliced radish direction cut tomato egg wedge toss salad green celery large bowl arrange remaining ingredient green
Original_text:
Combination Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 c. mixed salad greens
- 1 c. cheese strips
- 1 tomato
- 1 c. sliced celery
- 2 hard-boiled eggs
- 5 sliced radishes

Directions:
- Cut the tomato and eggs into wedges.
- Toss salad greens and celery in a large bowl.
- Arrange remaining ingredients over greens.

salad_info: cornbread salad ingredient jiffy cornbread mix baked green pepper diced tomato diced large onion diced c pickle relish tbsp sweet pickle juice c mayonnaise sausage browned drained well paper towel direction crumble cornbread mix ingredient
Original_text:
Cornbread Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (8 1/2 oz.) Jiffy cornbread mix, baked
- 1 green pepper, diced
- 2 tomatoes, diced
- 1/2 large onion, diced
- 1/3 c. pickle relish
- 2 Tbsp. sweet pickle juice
- 2/3 c. mayonnaise
- 1 lb. sausage, browned and drained well with paper towels

Directions:
- Crumble up cornbread and mix with all other ingredients.

salad_info: linguini salad ingredient linguini cucumber tomato onion pkg salad crunchies bottle italian dressing direction cook linguini cut cucumber tomato onion small piece mix together linguini cucumber tomato onion salad crunchies dressing chill overnight
Original_text:
Linguini Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. linguini
- 1 cucumber
- 2 tomatoes
- 1 onion
- 1 pkg. salad crunchies
- 1 bottle Italian dressing

Directions:
- Cook linguini.
- Cut the cucumber, tomatoes and onion into small pieces.
- Mix together the linguini, cucumber, tomatoes, onion, salad crunchies and dressing.
- Chill overnight.

salad_info: congealed cranberry salad ingredient fresh cranberry c drained crushed pineapple reserve juice pkg lime jello c nut direction grind fresh cranberry add drained crushed pineapple make lime jello pineapple juice add mixture well nut sweeten taste let congeal
Original_text:
Congealed Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 3/4 lb. fresh cranberries
- 1 c. drained crushed pineapple, reserve juice
- 1 pkg. lime jello
- 1 c. nuts

Directions:
- Grind fresh cranberries; then add drained crushed pineapple. Make lime jello with pineapple juice.
- Add to mixture as well as the nuts.
- Sweeten to taste.
- Let congeal.

salad_info: congealed salad ingredient large lime jello cream cheese cool whip large crushed pineapple c nut chopped direction prepare jello per box direction put refrigerator half congealed add cream cheese cool whip jello beat add pineapple nut refrigerate
Original_text:
Congealed Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large lime jello
- 1 (8 oz.) cream cheese
- 1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip
- 1 large crushed pineapple
- 1 c. nuts, chopped

Directions:
- Prepare jello per box directions. Put in the refrigerator. When half congealed, add cream cheese and Cool Whip to jello; beat. Add pineapple and nuts. Refrigerate.

salad_info: ramen cabbage salad ingredient head cabbage shredded green onion sliced pkg chicken flavored ramen noodle crushed tsp toasted sesame seed c toasted slivered almond direction combine mix well
Original_text:
Ramen Cabbage Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/2 head cabbage, shredded
- 4 green onions, sliced
- 1 pkg. chicken flavored Ramen noodles, crushed
- 2 tsp. toasted sesame seed
- 1/2 c. toasted slivered almonds

Directions:
- Combine and mix well.

salad_info: cucumber melon salad ingredient cantaloupe large cucumber c water c tarragon vinegar c sugar tbsp tarragon leaf tbsp rosemary direction peel seed cantaloupe slice inch wedge peel cucumber slice half lengthwise slice thinly combine ingredient mixing bowl mix together chill one hour ready serve yield serving
Original_text:
Cucumber And Melon Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 cantaloupes
- 1 large cucumber
- 3 c. water
- 3 c. tarragon vinegar
- 1 c. sugar
- 3 Tbsp. tarragon leaves
- 3 Tbsp. rosemary

Directions:
- Peel and seed cantaloupe; slice into 1/4-inch wedges. Peel cucumbers.
- Slice into half lengthwise and slice thinly.
- Combine all ingredients into mixing bowl.
- Mix together.
- Chill one hour. Ready to serve.
- Yields 8 servings.

salad_info: apple cider salad ingredient box orange jello c apple cider c raisin c chopped apple c chopped celery juice rind lemon direction dissolve jello cup hot cider stir raisin cool add remaining cider chill slightly thickened add rest ingredient chill firm
Original_text:
Apple Cider Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 oz. box orange jello
- 4 c. apple cider
- 1 c. raisins
- 1 c. chopped apples
- 1 c. chopped celery
- juice and rind of 1 lemon

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in 2 cups hot cider.
- Stir in raisins and cool. Add remaining cider and chill until slightly thickened.
- Add rest of ingredients and chill until firm.

salad_info: hawaiian pineapple salad ingredient canned pineapple unsweetened cottage cheese pkg jello c cool whip direction add pineapple cottage cheese jello powder together mixed fold cool whip refrigerate several hour
Original_text:
Hawaiian Pineapple Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 oz. canned pineapple, unsweetened
- 16 oz. cottage cheese
- 1 pkg. jello (diet, small)
- 1 c. Cool Whip

Directions:
- Add pineapple (drained), cottage cheese and jello powder together until mixed.
- Fold in Cool Whip and refrigerate for several hours.

salad_info: mexican corn bread ingredient c corn meal tbsp flour tsp salt tsp soda egg beaten c salad oil c buttermilk small creamed corn chopped jalapeno pepper green pepper chopped green onion chopped c grated cheddar cheese direction mix cornmeal flour salt soda add buttermilk egg oil corn beat mix well stir pepper green onion
Original_text:
Mexican Corn Bread

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 c. corn meal
- 1 Tbsp. flour
- 3 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. soda
- 2 eggs, beaten
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 1 c. buttermilk
- 1 small can creamed corn
- 3 to 6 chopped jalapeno peppers
- 1/2 green pepper, chopped
- 4 to 5 green onions, chopped
- 1 1/2 c. grated Cheddar cheese

Directions:
- Mix cornmeal, flour, salt and soda.
- Add buttermilk, eggs, oil and corn.
- Beat and mix well.
- Stir in peppers and green onions.

salad_info: seven layer salad ingredient head lettuce torn small piece box fren pea head cauliflower torn strip bacon crisped broken pkg dry hidden valley ranch dressing pt mayonnaise shredded cheese direction layer first six ingredient large salad bowl cover refrigerate overnight add cheese toss serving
Original_text:
Seven Layer Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head lettuce, torn in small pieces
- 1 box frozen peas
- 1 head cauliflower, torn up
- 8 to 10 strips bacon, crisped and broken
- 1 pkg. dry Hidden Valley ranch dressing
- 1 pt. mayonnaise
- shredded cheese

Directions:
- Layer first six ingredients in large salad bowl.
- Cover and refrigerate overnight.
- Add cheese and toss before serving.

salad_info: old fashioned pot roast ingredient roast salt pepper tbsp flour tbsp oil medium onion sliced quartered potato carrot direction trim roast salt pepper sprinkle flour pat side roast sure well coated seasoning flour heat oil dutch oven brown side roast remove set aside enough oil remaining dutch oven add little make roux browning remaining flour oil adding water return roast pan onion cover bring slow boil lower heat cook slowly hour depending size roast last minute add potato carrot serve rice salad full meal
Original_text:
Old Fashioned Pot Roast

Ingredients:
- 3 to 5 lb. roast (beef or pork)
- salt and pepper
- 3 to 4 Tbsp. flour
- 2 Tbsp. oil
- 1 medium onion, sliced or quartered
- potatoes and carrots

Directions:
- Trim roast; salt and pepper.
- Sprinkle with flour and pat all sides of roast to be sure it is well coated with seasonings and flour.
- Heat oil in a Dutch oven; brown all sides of the roast, remove and set aside.
- If there is not enough oil remaining in the Dutch oven, add a little more and make a roux by browning some of the remaining flour in the oil and then adding water.
- Return roast to pan with the onion; cover and bring to a slow boil.
- Lower heat and cook slowly for 1 to 2 hours depending on size of the roast. The last 30 minutes, add potatoes and carrots.
- Serve with rice and salad for a full meal.

salad_info: beer cheese soup ingredient cube margarine c inch diced celery c flour pt chicken stock tbsp grated parmesan cheese tsp accent c inch diced carrot c inch diced onion tsp dry mustard grated sharp cheddar cheese beer salt pepper taste direction saute vegetable margarine tender browned blend flour dry mustard chicken broth cook least minute blend cheddar cheese parmesan cheese beer let simmer least minute season serve french bread tossed salad
Original_text:
Beer Cheese Soup

Ingredients:
- 1/2 cube margarine
- 1/2 c. 1/8-inch diced celery
- 1/2 c. flour
- 2 1/2 pt. chicken stock
- 2 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
- 1/4 tsp. Accent
- 1/2 c. 1/8-inch diced carrots
- 1/2 c. 1/8-inch diced onions
- 1/2 tsp. dry mustard
- 6 oz. grated sharp Cheddar cheese
- 1 can beer
- salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- Saute vegetables in margarine until tender, but not browned. Blend in flour, dry mustard and chicken broth.
- Cook at least 5 minutes.
- Blend in Cheddar cheese, Parmesan cheese and beer.
- Let simmer at least 10 minutes.
- Season and serve with French bread and tossed salad.

salad_info: hot cider dressing spinach salad ingredient c unsweetened apple juice c sliced purple onion c water c cider vinegar tbsp brown sugar tbsp cornstarch tsp poppy seed tsp dijon mustard direction combine apple juice onion medium nonaluminum saucepan cook medium heat minute onion tender add remaining ingredient stir well bring mix boil medium heat cook minute thickened stirring constantly serve warm spinach salad yield cup
Original_text:
Hot Cider Dressing For Spinach Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. unsweetened apple juice
- 1/2 c. sliced purple onion
- 1/2 c. water
- 1/2 c. cider vinegar
- 2 Tbsp. brown sugar
- 1 Tbsp. cornstarch
- 2 tsp. poppy seed
- 2 tsp. Dijon mustard

Directions:
- Combine apple juice and onion in medium non-aluminum saucepan. Cook over medium heat 4 minutes or until onion is tender.
- Add remaining ingredients.
- Stir well. Bring mix to a boil over medium heat.
- Cook 1 minute or until thickened, stirring constantly. Serve warm over spinach salad.
- Yields 1 1/2 cups.

salad_info: carrotraisin salad ingredient carrot scraped shredded c raisin c chopped walnut c mayonnaise tbsp cider vinegar tbsp sugar tsp lemon juice direction combine carrot raisin chopped walnut bowl combine remaining ingredient stirring well add carrot mixture toss gently
Original_text:
Carrot-Raisin Salad

Ingredients:
- 3/4 lb. carrots, scraped and shredded
- 1/4 c. raisins (or more)
- 1/4 c. chopped walnuts (optional)
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. cider vinegar
- 1 Tbsp. sugar
- 1/8 tsp. lemon juice

Directions:
- Combine carrots, raisins and chopped walnuts in a bowl. Combine remaining ingredients, stirring well.
- Add carrot mixture. Toss gently.

salad_info: cranberry salad ingredient pkg strawberry jello c boiling water cranberry apple pared orange c sugar c nut direction blender grind orange use juice grinding apple grind cranberry water strain mix sugar cranberry mix jello water fold ingredient
Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. strawberry jello
- 2 c. boiling water
- 1 lb. cranberries
- 3 apples, pared
- 2 oranges
- 2 c. sugar
- 1 c. nuts (optional)

Directions:
- In blender, grind oranges and use juice for grinding apples. Then grind cranberries with water.
- Strain.
- Mix sugar with cranberries.
- Mix jello with water, then fold in other ingredients.

salad_info: cranberry salad ingredient cranberry salad pkg raspberry jello small orange c sugar c grated apple direction grind cranberry add rind orange cut orange mix well sugar let stand overnight set jello begin thicken add cranberry mixture apple nut
Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- cranberry salad
- 1 pkg. raspberry jello
- 2 small oranges
- 1 c. sugar
- 1/2 c. grated apples

Directions:
- Grind cranberries; add rind of oranges and cut up oranges.
- Mix well with sugar and let stand overnight; set jello and when it begins to thicken, add the cranberry mixture, apples and nuts.

salad_info: bing cherry salad ingredient cream cheese sour cream c sugar bing cherry large pineapple c pecan piece c miniature marshmallow direction mix cream cheese sour cream sugar fluffy drain pineapple cherry add remaining ingredient cream cheese mixture chill well may made day
Original_text:
Bing Cherry Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 oz. cream cheese
- 8 oz. sour cream
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 can Bing cherries
- 1 large can pineapple
- 1/2 c. pecan pieces
- 1 1/2 c. miniature marshmallows

Directions:
- Mix cream cheese, sour cream and sugar until fluffy.
- Drain pineapple and cherries.
- Add remaining ingredients to cream cheese mixture.
- Chill well.
- May be made the day before.

salad_info: cranberry salad ingredient pkg raspberry jello can whole berry cranberry sauce crushed pineapple c celery c pecan direction dissolve gelatin cup boiling water add cranberry sauce undrained pineapple add celery nut mix well chill set
Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. raspberry jello
- 2 cans whole berry cranberry sauce
- 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple
- 1 c. celery
- 1 c. pecans

Directions:
- Dissolve gelatin in 1 cup boiling water.
- Add cranberry sauce and undrained pineapple; add celery and nuts.
- Mix well and chill until set.

salad_info: carol french fried shrimp ingredient c sifted allpurpose flour tsp sugar c ice water fresh shrimp tsp salt slightly beaten egg tbsp salad oil direction combine ingredient except shrimp beat peel shell shrimp leaving last section tail intact butterfly shrimp cutting almost center back without severing end remove black vein dry shrimp thoroughly paper towel dip batter fry deep hot fat golden brown drain paper towel serve immediately lemon wedge cocktail sauce ketchup
Original_text:
Carol'S French Fried Shrimp

Ingredients:
- 1 c. sifted all-purpose flour
- 1/2 tsp. sugar
- 1 c. ice water
- 2 lb. fresh shrimp
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1 slightly beaten egg
- 2 Tbsp. salad oil

Directions:
- Combine ingredients, except shrimp; beat.
- Peel shell from shrimp, leaving last section and tail intact (optional). Butterfly shrimp by cutting almost through at center of back without severing ends.
- Remove black vein.
- Dry shrimp thoroughly between paper towels.
- Dip into batter.
- Fry in deep, hot fat (375°) until golden brown.
- Drain on paper towels.
- Serve immediately with lemon wedges and cocktail sauce or ketchup.

salad_info: german potato salad ingredient bacon strip c chopped onion tbsp allpurpose flour c cider vinegar c water c sugar tsp salt tsp pepper c sliced cooked peeled potato direction large skillet fry bacon crisp remove set aside drain tablespoon dripping cook onion tender stir flour blend well add vinegar water cook stir bubbly slightly thick add sugar stir dissolve crumble bacon gently stir bacon potato heat stirring lightly coat potato slice serve warm yield serving
Original_text:
German Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 5 bacon strips
- 3/4 c. chopped onion
- 2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
- 2/3 c. cider vinegar
- 1 1/2 c. water
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/8 tsp. pepper
- 6 c. sliced, cooked, peeled potatoes

Directions:
- In a large skillet, fry bacon until crisp; remove and set aside.
- Drain all but 2 to 3 tablespoons of drippings.
- Cook onion until tender. Stir in flour; blend well.
- Add vinegar and water. Cook and stir until bubbly and slightly thick.
- Add sugar and stir until it dissolves.
- Crumble bacon; gently stir in bacon and potatoes.
- Heat through, stirring lightly to coat potato slices. Serve warm.
- Yield: 6 to 8 servings.

salad_info: calico cole slaw ingredient head cabbage chopped onion chopped bell pepper chopped large jar pimento chopped c vinegar c salad oil c sugar tsp salt tbsp celery seed direction mix first ingredient large bowl next mix saucepan remaining ingredient heat bring boil pour veggie
Original_text:
Calico Cole Slaw

Ingredients:
- 1 head cabbage, chopped
- 1 onion, chopped
- 1 bell pepper, chopped
- 1 large jar pimento, chopped
- 1 c. vinegar
- 3/4 c. salad oil (Crisco or Wesson oil)
- 1 c. sugar
- 2 tsp. salt
- 1 Tbsp. celery seed

Directions:
- Mix the first 4 ingredients in a large bowl. Next, mix in a saucepan the remaining ingredients and heat. Bring to a boil and pour over the veggies.

salad_info: hot spinach salad ingredient bacon slice diced egg slightly beaten tbsp sugar tbsp vinegar water c torn spinach green small onion chopped salt pepper taste hardcooked egg sliced direction small frying pan cook bacon crisp drain cup measure place egg sugar vinegar enough water make cup pour bacon grease cook stirring constantly dressing thickens season taste pour hot dressing green onion toss garnish egg slice serve immediately serf
Original_text:
Hot Spinach Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 to 4 bacon slices, diced
- 1 egg, slightly beaten
- 3 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 Tbsp. vinegar
- water
- 4 c. torn spinach greens
- 1/2 small onion, chopped
- salt and pepper to taste
- hard-cooked eggs, sliced

Directions:
- In a small frying pan, cook bacon until crisp.
- Do not drain. In a 1-cup measure, place egg, sugar, vinegar and enough water to make 3/4 cup; pour over bacon and grease.
- Cook, stirring constantly, until dressing thickens.
- Season to taste.
- Pour the hot dressing over greens and onion.
- Toss; garnish with egg slices.
- Serve immediately.
- Serves 4.
- (Endive or lettuce may be used instead of spinach.)

salad_info: kraut salad ingredient large kraut washed drained well c chopped green pepper c chopped celery carrot grated c sugar c vinegar c water direction mix together let stand overnight drain serve
Original_text:
Kraut Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large can kraut, washed and drained well
- 1/3 c. chopped green pepper
- 1/3 c. chopped celery
- 1 carrot, grated
- 1 c. sugar
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 1/3 c. water

Directions:
- Mix all together and let stand overnight. Drain and serve!

salad_info: marinated carrot ingredient carrot bell pepper c salad oil c sugar salt pepper taste tsp worcestershire sauce medium onion small tomato soup c vinegar tsp mustard direction peel slice carrot cook salt water tender drain well chop pepper add carrot combine remaining pour carrot still warm marinate day drain well serving liquid may reused keep week refrigerator
Original_text:
Marinated Carrots

Ingredients:
- 2 lb. carrots
- 1 bell pepper
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 1 c. sugar
- salt and pepper to taste
- 1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
- 1 medium onion
- 1 small can tomato soup
- 3/4 c. vinegar
- 1 tsp. mustard

Directions:
- Peel and slice carrots.
- Cook in salt water (don't overcook) until tender.
- Drain well.
- Chop pepper and add to carrots. Combine remaining.
- Pour over carrots while still warm.
- Marinate 2 to 3 days.
- Drain well before serving.
- Liquid may be reused. Keeps up to 2 weeks in refrigerator.

salad_info: orange salad ingredient container cottage cheese small box orange jello large crushed pineapple mandarin orange pt whipped cream plus tsp vanilla cool whip direction add orange jello cottage cheese drain crushed pineapple mandarin orange fold whip whipped cream add vanilla use cool whip
Original_text:
Orange Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 container cottage cheese (regular)
- 1 small box orange Jell-O
- 1 large can crushed pineapple
- 1 can Mandarin oranges
- 1 pt. whipped cream plus 1 tsp. vanilla or 18 oz. Cool Whip

Directions:
- Add orange Jell-O to cottage cheese.
- Drain crushed pineapple and Mandarin oranges and fold in.
- Whip whipped cream and add vanilla or use Cool Whip.

salad_info: spicy potato salad ingredient medium potato c diced onion c diced celery tbsp dried parsley flake tbsp seasoned pepper salt tbsp garlic powder tbsp red pepper tbsp mustard c hellmanns mayonnaise direction cook potato cool dice place large mixing bowl mix remaining ingredient add le mayonnaise salad pleasingly moist chill serve romaine lettuce
Original_text:
Spicy Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 5 lb. medium potatoes
- 2 c. diced onions
- 2 c. diced celery
- 2 Tbsp. dried parsley flakes
- 3 Tbsp. seasoned pepper and salt
- 2 Tbsp. garlic powder
- 1 Tbsp. red pepper
- 2 Tbsp. mustard
- 1/2 c. Hellmann's mayonnaise

Directions:
- Cook potatoes.
- Cool, dice and place in a large mixing bowl. Mix in remaining ingredients.
- Add more or less mayonnaise until salad is pleasingly moist.
- Chill and serve on romaine lettuce.

salad_info: sunshine salad ingredient pkg orange jello tbsp vinegar c chopped pecan c hot water tsp salt crushed pineapple c grated coconut direction dissolve jello hot water drain pineapple reserving syrup add water syrup make one cup add jello vinegar salt chill partially set fold carrot pineapple nut jello turn individual mold x x inch pan chill firm serve lettuce
Original_text:
Sunshine Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. (3 oz.) orange jello
- 1 Tbsp. vinegar
- 1/3 c. chopped pecans
- 1 c. hot water
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1 (No. 2) can crushed pineapple (2 1/2 c.)
- 1 c. grated coconut

Directions:
- Dissolve
- jello in hot water.
- Drain pineapple, reserving syrup.
- Add
- water to syrup to make one cup.
- Add to jello with vinegar
- and
- salt.
- Chill	until
- partially
- set.	Fold carrots, pineapple and nuts into jello.
- Turn into individual molds or 10 x 6 x 1 1/2-inch pan.
