salad_info: skroodle salad ingredient red bean mixed vegetable pkg skroodle noodle small jar pimento c chopped onion c chopped celery tsp celery seed tsp salt tbsp margarine c sugar c vinegar tbsp flour tsp dry mustard c chopped bell pepper direction cook noodle drain add red bean mixed vegetable bell pepper celery onion pimento cook celery seed salt margarine sugar vinegar flour dry mustard bubbly thickened pour noodle mixture let stand overnight
Original_text:
Skroodle Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can red beans
- 1 can mixed vegetables
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. Skroodle noodles
- 1 small jar pimentos
- 1 c. chopped onions
- 1/2 c. chopped celery
- 1 1/2 tsp. celery seed
- 1 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1 Tbsp. margarine
- 1 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 c. vinegar
- 3 Tbsp. flour
- 3 tsp. dry mustard
- 1 c. chopped bell pepper

Directions:
- Cook noodles and drain.
- Add red beans, mixed vegetables (drained), bell peppers, celery, onion and pimento.
- Cook celery seed, salt, margarine, sugar, vinegar, flour and dry mustard until bubbly and thickened.
- Pour over noodle mixture.
- Let stand overnight.

salad_info: sadies pretzel salad ingredient c crushed pretzel c melted margarine tsp sugar pkg cream cheese c sugar carton cool whip small pkg strawberry jello c boiling water pkg fren strawberry direction mix ingredient set aside minute pour ingredient let cool
Original_text:
Sadie'S Pretzel Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. crushed pretzels
- 3/4 c. melted margarine
- 3 tsp. sugar
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 (8 oz.) carton Cool Whip
- 2 small pkg. strawberry jello
- 2 c. boiling water
- 2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen strawberries

Directions:
- Mix these 3 ingredients and set aside for 10 minutes.
- Pour over all the other ingredients and let cool.

salad_info: corn bread salad ingredient pkg jiffy corn bread mix stalk celery green pepper medium tomato boiled egg c mayonnaise salt pepper taste mr dash parsley flake direction bake cornbread let cool chop celery green pepper onion tomato egg mix together add mayonnaise salt pepper parsley flake crumble cornbread add ingredient
Original_text:
Corn Bread Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 pkg. Jiffy corn bread mix
- 2 stalks celery
- 1 green pepper
- 2 medium tomatoes
- 2 boiled eggs
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- salt and pepper to taste or Mrs. Dash
- parsley flakes (optional)

Directions:
- Bake cornbread and let cool. Chop celery, green pepper, onion, tomatoes and eggs and mix together.
- Add mayonnaise, salt, pepper and parsley flakes. Crumble cornbread and add to other ingredients.

salad_info: shrimp crab casserole ingredient c cooked rice cream mushroom soup large pkg cooked shrimp c milk tbsp chive dash red pepper bread crumb cream shrimp soup pkg chopped fresh mushroom large crab meat pkg crab finger cut small piece dash lemon pepper c cheddar cheese direction mix together cook bubble mix buttered bread crumb cheddar cheese sprinkle top pop back oven cheese melt
Original_text:
Shrimp And Crab Casserole

Ingredients:
- 4 to 5 c. cooked rice
- 1 can cream of mushroom soup
- 1 large pkg. cooked shrimp (salad or bite size)
- 1 c. milk
- 1 Tbsp. chives
- dash of red pepper
- bread crumbs
- 1 can cream of shrimp soup
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. chopped fresh mushrooms
- 1 large can crab meat or pkg. crab fingers, cut into small pieces
- dash of lemon pepper
- 1 c. Cheddar cheese

Directions:
- Mix together.
- Cook at 350° until it bubbles (about 30 minutes).
- Mix buttered bread crumbs and Cheddar cheese and sprinkle on top.
- Pop back in oven until cheese melts.

salad_info: garbage dip ingredient tomato chopped can chopped green chilies can black olive sliced bunch chopped green onion small bag carrot chopped garlic salt taste salt pepper taste bell pepper chopped bottle italian salad dressing tortilla chip direction mix ingredient put refrigerator serve tortilla chip
Original_text:
Garbage Dip

Ingredients:
- 6 tomatoes, chopped
- 2 cans chopped green chilies
- 2 cans black olives, sliced
- 2 bunches chopped green onions
- 1 small bag of carrots, chopped
- garlic salt to taste
- salt and pepper to taste
- 1 bell pepper, chopped
- 1 bottle of Italian salad dressing
- tortilla chips

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients (except chips) and put in refrigerator. Serve with the tortilla chips.

salad_info: antipasto salad ingredient onion chopped pepper chopped pitted olive c chopped celery c tomato diced genoa salami swiss cheese box rigatoni bottle italian dressing direction cook macaroni drain add onion pepper celery tomato olive salt pepper toss cut meat cheese strip add dressing toss
Original_text:
Antipasto Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 onion, chopped
- 1 pepper, chopped
- 1 can pitted olives
- 1/2 c. chopped celery
- 1 c. tomatoes, diced
- 1/2 lb. Genoa salami
- 1/2 lb. Swiss cheese
- 1 box rigatoni
- 1 bottle Italian dressing

Directions:
- Cook macaroni and drain.
- Add onion, pepper, celery, tomatoes, olives, salt and pepper.
- Toss.
- Cut meat and cheese in strips. Add dressing and toss.

salad_info: friend joyce bathtub casserole ingredient ground beef mild pork sausage medium onion chopped green pepper chopped pkg pepperoni slice chopped crushed tomato spaghetti sauce jar mild salsa sliced mushroom drained jar pepperoncini salad pepper drained sliced pkg shell macaroni cooked c parmesan cheese grated c mzarella cheese shredded direction cook ground beef next ingredient large skillet medium heat stirring meat brown crumbles drain well set aside combine chopped pepperoni next ingredient large bowl stir meat mixture cooked pasta shell spoon half mixture lightly greased x x inch baking dish sprinkle half parmesan mzarella cheese top remaining pasta mixture bake minute heated top remaining cheese bake additional minute
Original_text:
My Friend Joyce'S "Bathtub Casserole"

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. ground beef
- 1 lb. mild pork sausage
- 1 medium onion, chopped
- 1 green pepper, chopped
- 1 (3 1/2 oz.) pkg. pepperoni slices, chopped
- 1 (28 oz.) can crushed tomatoes
- 1 (26 1/2 oz.) can spaghetti sauce
- 1 (16 oz.) jar mild salsa
- 1 (4 1/2 oz.) can sliced mushrooms, drained
- 1 (10 oz.) jar pepperoncini salad peppers, drained and sliced
- 1 (16 oz.) pkg. shell macaroni, cooked
- 1 c. Parmesan cheese, grated
- 4 c. Mozzarella cheese, shredded (1 lb.)

Directions:
- Cook ground beef and next 3 ingredients in a large skillet over medium heat, stirring, until meat browns and crumbles. Drain well; set aside.
- Combine chopped pepperoni and next 5 ingredients in a large bowl; stir in meat mixture and cooked pasta shells.
- Spoon half of mixture into 2 lightly greased 11 x 7 x 1 1/2-inch baking dishes.
- Sprinkle with half of Parmesan and Mozzarella cheeses.
- Top with remaining pasta mixture.
- Bake at 350° for 30 minutes or until heated; top with remaining cheeses. Bake 5 additional minutes.

salad_info: four bean salad ingredient lima bean green bean waxed bean dark kidney bean med onion chopped stalk celery chopped c sugar c vinegar c salad oil direction drain combine bean onion celery combine salad oil vinegar sugar mix well pour bean mixture chill
Original_text:
Four Bean Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can lima beans
- 1 can green beans
- 1 can waxed beans
- 1 can dark kidney beans
- 1 med. onion, chopped
- 1 stalk celery, chopped
- 1 c. sugar
- 3/4 c. vinegar
- 1/2 c. salad oil

Directions:
- Drain and combine beans, onion and celery.
- Combine salad oil, vinegar and sugar and mix well.
- Pour over bean mixture and chill.

salad_info: lemon chicken salad ingredient c uncooked corkscrew pasta c lemon yogurt c mayonnaise tsp lemon juice can chunk breast chicken drained flaked c seedless red grape c sliced green onion c sliced celery direction cook pasta rinse cold water drain large bowl combine yogurt mayonnaise lemon juice stir chicken pasta grape onion celery
Original_text:
Lemon Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. uncooked corkscrew pasta
- 1 1/2 c. lemon yogurt
- 1/3 c. mayonnaise
- 2 tsp. lemon juice
- 3 (5 oz.) cans chunk breast of chicken, drained and flaked
- 1 c. seedless red grapes
- 1/2 c. sliced green onions
- 1/2 c. sliced celery

Directions:
- Cook pasta; rinse in cold water and drain.
- In a large bowl, combine yogurt, mayonnaise and lemon juice.
- Stir in chicken, pasta, grapes, onions and celery.

salad_info: five cup salad ingredient small mandarin orange jar cherry small pineapple chunk large fruit cocktail pt sour cream small bag miniature marshmallow c sugar direction drain fruit mix sour cream marshmallow sugar refrigerate
Original_text:
Five Cup Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small can mandarin oranges
- 1 jar cherries
- 1 small can pineapple chunks
- 1 large (8 oz.) can fruit cocktail
- 1 pt. sour cream
- 1 small bag miniature marshmallows
- 1/4 c. sugar

Directions:
- Drain all fruit.
- Mix with sour cream, marshmallows and sugar. Refrigerate.

Original_text:
Turkey And Soba Noodle Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (12 oz.) pkg. soba noodles
- 3 Tbsp. sesame oil
- 2 c. snow peas, trimmed
- 2 c. cooked cold turkey, cut into strips
- 3 scallions, finely chopped
- 1/2 c. chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley

Directions:
- Cook the soba noodles according to package instructions. Drain. Rinse with cold water. Drain again. Transfer to a large bowl and toss with sesame oil. Place the snow peas in a colander and pour boiling water over them. Rinse with cold water and drain. Add the snow peas, turkey, scallions and parsley to the noodles and toss. Gradually add the Peanut Sauce and gently toss together until well combined. Serve the noodle salad chilled or at room temperature. Serves 6.

salad_info: carrot cake ingredient c sugar c salad oil egg yolk tbsp hot water c flour tsp cinnamon tsp salt tsp nutmeg tsp baking powder c grated carrot c black walnut chopped egg white direction mix together beat well sugar salad oil egg yolk hot water add flour cinnamon soda salt nutmeg baking powder add carrot walnut fold beaten egg white bake greased floured tube pan minute need icing
Original_text:
Carrot Cake

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 c. salad oil
- 3 egg yolks
- 2 1/2 Tbsp. hot water
- 1 3/4 c. flour
- 1/2 tsp. cinnamon
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/4 tsp. nutmeg
- 1 tsp. baking powder
- 1 c. grated carrots (fine)
- 1 c. black walnuts, chopped
- 3 egg whites

Directions:
- Mix together and beat well sugar, salad oil, 3 egg yolks and hot water and then add flour, cinnamon, soda, salt, nutmeg and baking powder.
- Add carrots and walnuts.
- Fold in beaten egg whites. Bake in greased and floured tube pan for 45 minutes at 350°.
- This needs no icing.

salad_info: orange jello salad ingredient mandarin orange drained small curd cottage cheese large tub cool whip crushed pineapple drained large box orange jello c chopped pecan direction mix cottage cheese cool whip jello well add remaining ingredient mix well cool least hour
Original_text:
Orange Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (11 oz.) can mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 lb. small curd cottage cheese
- 1 large tub Cool Whip
- 1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 large box orange jello (dry)
- 1 c. chopped pecans (optional)

Directions:
- Mix cottage cheese, Cool Whip and jello well. Add remaining ingredients and mix well. Cool at least 2 hours.

salad_info: pineapplebuttermilk salad ingredient crushed pineapple undrained tbsp sugar pkg orangeflavored gelatin container cool whip c chopped pecan direction combine pineapple sugar saucepan bring boil stirring dissolved cool add buttermilk stir combined fold whipped topping pecan spoon x x inch pyrex dish chill firm cut salad square serve yield serving
Original_text:
Pineapple-Buttermilk Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple, undrained
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 (6 oz.) or 2 (3 oz.) pkg. orange-flavored gelatin (I use sugar-free jello)
- 1 (8 oz.) container Cool Whip
- 1 c. chopped pecans

Directions:
- Combine pineapple and sugar in a saucepan; bring to a boil, stirring until dissolved.
- Cool.
- Add buttermilk and stir until combined.
- Fold in whipped topping and pecans.
- Spoon into a 12 x 8 x 2-inch Pyrex dish and chill until firm.
- Cut salad into squares to serve.
- Yields 12 servings.

salad_info: jello salad ingredient large box strawberrybanana jello banana mashed crushed pineapple box fren strawberry container cool whip direction use le water direction call mix jello use pineapple juice strawberry juice mix jello let cool
Original_text:
Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large box strawberry-banana Jell-O
- 4 bananas, mashed
- 1 can (medium) crushed pineapple
- 1 (16 oz.) box frozen strawberries
- 1 (8 oz.) container Cool Whip

Directions:
- You can use less water than directions call for to mix Jell-O, then use the pineapple juice and strawberry juice.
- Mix Jell-O and let cool.

salad_info: jello salad supreme ingredient pkg lemon jello pt boiling water tbsp vinegar tsp salt shake cayenne pepper c cabbage cut fine c tart apple cut fine stuffed olive cut fine direction dissolve jello boiling water add vinegar salt cayenne pepper chill slightly thickened stir cabbage apple olive chill firm serve lettuce mayonnaise serf
Original_text:
Jello Salad Supreme

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. lemon jello
- 1 pt. boiling water (less 2 Tbsp.)
- 2 Tbsp. vinegar
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- shake of cayenne pepper
- 2 c. cabbage, cut fine
- 1 c. tart apples, cut fine
- 8 stuffed olives, cut fine

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in boiling water.
- Add vinegar, salt and cayenne pepper.
- Chill.
- When slightly thickened, stir in cabbage, apples and olives.
- Chill until firm.
- Serve on lettuce with mayonnaise.
- Serves 8.

salad_info: angel salad ingredient pkg cream cheese c sugar cool whip tsp vanilla fruit cocktail crushed pineapple banana nut direction cream cheese sugar vanilla fold cool whip mixer drain pineapple fruit cocktail add banana nut chill serving made night
Original_text:
Angel Salad

Ingredients:
- 8 oz. pkg. cream cheese
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 8 oz. Cool Whip
- 1 tsp. vanilla
- 1 (No. 303) can fruit cocktail
- 1 (No. 303) can crushed pineapple
- 2 or 3 bananas
- nuts (optional)

Directions:
- Cream the cheese with sugar and vanilla.
- Fold in Cool Whip with mixer.
- Drain pineapple and fruit cocktail.
- Add bananas and nuts. Chill before serving.
- Can be made the night before.

salad_info: taco salad ingredient ground beef pkg taco seasoning head lettuce white onion firm tomato cheddar cheese grated tortilla chip catalina dressing direction cook beef taco seasoning according direction shred head lettuce large bowl add chopped onion tomato add meat cool grated cheese crush tortilla chip add serving add catalina dressing taste
Original_text:
Taco Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. ground beef
- 1 pkg. taco seasoning
- 1 head lettuce
- 1 white onion
- 2 firm tomatoes
- 8 oz. Cheddar cheese, grated
- 9 oz. tortilla chips
- Catalina dressing

Directions:
- Cook beef with taco seasoning according to directions.
- Shred head of lettuce into large bowl; add chopped onion and tomatoes. Add meat, when cool, and grated cheese.
- Crush tortilla chips and add just before serving.
- Add Catalina dressing to taste.

salad_info: crab olive quesadilla ingredient crabmeat flaked c miracle whip salad dressing c monterey jack cheese shredded c ripe olive sliced flour tortilla direction combine ingredient except tortilla spread tablespoon mixture onto tortilla fold half bake minute golden cut wedge
Original_text:
Crab And Olive Quesadillas(Makes 32)  

Ingredients:
- 8 oz. crabmeat (real or imitation), flaked
- 1/2 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing
- 1/2 c. Monterey Jack cheese, shredded (with or without jalapeno)
- 1/2 c. ripe olives, sliced
- 8 flour tortillas (6-inch)

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients, except tortillas.
- Spread 2 tablespoons mixture onto each tortilla; fold in half.
- Bake at 400° for 8 minutes or until golden.
- Cut each into 4 wedges.

salad_info: spicy peanut chicken ingredient fryer cut chicken breast russian salad dressing envelope dried onion soup mix apricot preserve tsp accent tsp lemon pepper tbsp peanut butter c chopped roasted peanut c cooked yellow rice direction place chicken greased baking dish skin side mix ingredient pour chicken bake hour minute preheated oven tender serve bed yellow rice spoon extra sauce rice desired garnish parsley tomato spring onion bell pepper
Original_text:
Spicy Peanut Chicken

Ingredients:
- 1 fryer, cut up or 4 to 6 chicken breasts
- 1 (8 oz.) Russian salad dressing
- 1 envelope dried onion soup mix
- 1 (10 oz.) apricot preserves
- 1 tsp. Accent
- 1 tsp. lemon pepper
- 2 Tbsp. peanut butter
- 1/4 c. chopped roasted peanuts
- 2 to 3 c. cooked yellow rice

Directions:
- Place chicken in greased baking dish, skin side up.
- Mix all other ingredients and pour over chicken.
- Bake 1 hour and 10 minutes in a preheated 350° oven or until very tender.
- Serve over a bed of yellow rice.
- Spoon extra sauce on rice, if desired. Garnish with parsley, tomatoes, spring onions or bell pepper.

salad_info: blueberry salad ingredient pkg raspberry jello c boiling water pkg cream cheese blueberry drained crushed pineapple drained pkg dream whip direction dissolve jello boiling water add cream cheese stir tiny fleck white remain add mixed pineapple blueberry juice add fruit chill almost set fold dream whip mixed following direction package
Original_text:
Blueberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. raspberry jello
- 1 c. boiling water
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 1 (15 oz.) can blueberries, drained (reserve juice)
- 1 (13 1/2 oz.) crushed pineapple, drained (reserve juice)
- 1 pkg. Dream Whip

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in boiling water.
- Add cream cheese; stir until tiny flecks of white remain.
- Add the mixed pineapple and blueberry juice.
- Add the fruits and chill until almost set.
- Fold in the Dream Whip which has been mixed following directions on package.

salad_info: marinade flank steak ingredient flank steak tbsp salad oil tsp parsley tsp garlic powder tsp salt tsp lemon juice tsp pepper direction mix ingredient place steak minute hour grill enjoy
Original_text:
Marinade For Flank Steak

Ingredients:
- 1 flank steak
- 3 Tbsp. salad oil
- 4 tsp. parsley
- 1/8 tsp. garlic powder
- 2 tsp. salt
- 2 tsp. lemon juice
- 1/4 tsp. pepper

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients and place them on the steak for 45 minutes to 2 hours. Grill and enjoy.

salad_info: bean salad ingredient green bean yellow bean kidney bean green pepper sliced onion sliced ring c vinegar c sugar c salad oil direction mix together vinegar sugar salad oil pour bean green pepper onion stir occasionally chill several hour drain serving
Original_text:
Bean Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can green beans
- 1 can yellow beans
- 1 can kidney beans
- 1 green pepper, sliced
- 1 onion, sliced into rings
- 1 c. vinegar
- 1 c. sugar
- 1/4 c. salad oil

Directions:
- Mix together vinegar, sugar and salad oil.
- Pour over beans, green pepper and onion.
- Stir occasionally and chill several hours.
- Drain before serving.

salad_info: pretzel salad ingredient c pretzel crumb tbsp sugar stick butter melted c sugar cream cheese softened cool whip pkg strawberry jello c boiling water pkg fren strawberry sliced direction mix pretzel crumb tablespoon sugar melted butter press x inch dish bake minute cool whip cream cheese sugar light fluffy fold cool whip spread crust refrigerate dissolve gelatin boiling water add fren strawberry mixture thickened pour cream cheese layer refrigerate least hour even better made day ahead
Original_text:
Pretzel Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 c. pretzel crumbs
- 3 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 1/2 sticks butter, melted
- 1 c. sugar
- 8 oz. cream cheese, softened
- 9 oz. Cool Whip
- 6 oz. pkg. strawberry jello
- 2 c. boiling water
- 2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen strawberries, sliced

Directions:
- Mix pretzel crumbs, 3 tablespoons sugar and melted butter. Press into a 9 x 13-inch dish and bake 10 minutes at 350°.
- Cool. Whip the cream cheese and sugar until light and fluffy.
- Fold in Cool Whip.
- Spread over crust and refrigerate.
- Dissolve gelatin in boiling water.
- Add frozen strawberries.
- When mixture has thickened, pour over cream cheese layer.
- Refrigerate at least 2 hours.
- Even better if made a day ahead.

salad_info: skillet chicken italiano ingredient chicken part tbsp salad oil creamy chicken mushroom soup c chopped canned tomato tbsp chopped onion small clove garlic minced tsp oregano leaf crushed direction skillet brown chicken oil pour fat add remaining ingredient cover simmer minute done stir occasionally make serving
Original_text:
Skillet Chicken Italiano

Ingredients:
- 2 lb. chicken parts
- 2 Tbsp. salad oil
- 1 can creamy chicken mushroom soup
- 1/2 c. chopped canned tomatoes
- 2 Tbsp. chopped onions
- 1 small clove garlic, minced
- 1/8 tsp. oregano leaves, crushed

Directions:
- In skillet, brown chicken in oil.
- Pour off fat.
- Add remaining ingredients.
- Cover; simmer for 45 minutes, or until done.
- Stir occasionally.
- Makes 4 servings.

salad_info: low calorie tuna salad ingredient can water packed tuna drained tbsp nofat miracle whip salad dressing packet equal brand sweetener salt pepper taste direction put drained tuna bowl shred fork tine add nofat miracle whip salad dressing pour equal sweetener onto miracle whip stir well salt pepper taste great toasted bread serf
Original_text:
Low Calorie Tuna Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 cans water packed tuna, drained
- 4 Tbsp. no-fat Miracle Whip salad dressing
- 6 packets Equal brand sweetener
- salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- Put drained tuna into bowl and shred with fork tines.
- Add the no-fat Miracle Whip salad dressing.
- Pour Equal sweetener onto the Miracle Whip and stir well. Salt and pepper to taste.
- Great on toasted bread!
- Serves 8.

salad_info: old fashioned waldorf salad ingredient c chopped unpeeled apple c chopped celery c chopped pecan walnut c mayonnaise lettuce leaf apple wedge pecan half direction combine first ingredient toss gently coat chill hour spoon salad lettuce lined serving bowl garnish apple wedge pecan nut yield serving
Original_text:
Old Fashioned Waldorf Salad

Ingredients:
- 5 c. chopped, unpeeled apples
- 2 1/2 c. chopped celery
- 1 1/4 c. chopped pecans or walnuts
- 1/2 to 1 c. mayonnaise
- lettuce leaves
- apple wedges
- pecan halves

Directions:
- Combine first 4 ingredients.
- Toss gently to coat and chill 1 to 2 hours.
- Spoon salad into a lettuce lined serving bowl. Garnish with apple wedges and pecan nuts.
- Yields 10 servings.

salad_info: pretzel salad ingredient c pretzel rolled crushed c melted margarine tsp sugar direction combine pretzel margarine sugar press x inch pan bake minute cool
Original_text:
Pretzel Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. pretzels, rolled and crushed
- 3/4 c. melted margarine
- 3 tsp. sugar

Directions:
- Combine pretzels with margarine and sugar.
- Press in 13 x 9-inch
- pan.
- Bake at 400° for 8 minutes.
- Cool.

salad_info: lettuce salad ingredient chunk pineapple mandarin orange c sliced almond tbsp plus tsp sugar head romaine lettuce head iceberg lettuce medium stalk celery chopped green onion chopped direction drain pineapple orange stir low heat coated almond sugar cool break apart set aside put remaining ingredient plastic bag
Original_text:
Lettuce Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (20 oz.) can chunk pineapple
- 1 can mandarin oranges
- 1/4 c. sliced almonds
- 1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. sugar
- 1/4 head romaine lettuce
- 1/4 head iceberg lettuce
- 2 medium stalks celery, chopped
- 2 green onions, chopped (scallions)

Directions:
- Drain pineapple and oranges.
- Stir over low heat until coated the almonds and sugar.
- Cool and break apart.
- Set aside.
- Put remaining ingredients in a plastic bag.

salad_info: fig preserve cake ingredient c flour c sugar c salad oil egg c fig preserve c chopped pecan c buttermilk tsp soda tsp allspice tsp nutmeg direction cream sugar egg salad oil well blended sift together flour spice dissolve soda buttermilk add flour mixture buttermilk egg mixture add fig preserve pecan bake greased tube pan hour done make large cake keep refrigerator indefinitely also fren
Original_text:
Fig Preserve Cake

Ingredients:
- 3 c. flour
- 2 1/2 c. sugar
- 3/4 c. salad oil
- 4 eggs
- 1 c. fig preserves
- 1 c. chopped pecans
- 1 c. buttermilk
- 1 tsp. soda
- 1 tsp. allspice
- 1 tsp. nutmeg

Directions:
- Cream sugar, eggs and salad oil until well blended.
- Sift together flour and spices.
- Dissolve soda in buttermilk and add flour mixture and buttermilk to the egg mixture.
- Add fig preserves and pecans.
- Bake in a greased tube pan at 350° for about 1 hour or until done.
- This makes a large cake that will keep in the refrigerator indefinitely.
- It can also be frozen.

salad_info: sugar drop cooky ingredient c margarine butter c salad oil c sugar c powdered sugar egg tsp vanilla c flour tsp soda tsp cream tartar direction large bowl cream light fluffy margarine oil sugar powdered sugar add egg vanilla mix well hand add mix flour soda cream tartar place covered bowl chill least hour preheat oven place inch ball dough cookie sheet flatten sprinkle sugar bake minute dough freeze well cooky rich calorie
Original_text:
Sugar Drop Cookies

Ingredients:
- 1 c. margarine or butter
- 1 c. salad oil
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 c. powdered sugar
- 2 eggs
- 1 tsp. vanilla
- 4 c. flour
- 1 tsp. soda
- 1 tsp. cream of tartar

Directions:
- In a large bowl, cream until light and fluffy the margarine, oil, sugar and powdered sugar.
- Add eggs and vanilla.
- Mix well. By hand, add and mix the flour, soda and cream of tartar.
- Place in covered bowl and chill at least 1 hour.
- Preheat oven to 350°. Place 1-inch balls of dough on a cookie sheet. Flatten and sprinkle with sugar.
- Bake 10 to 12 minutes. This dough freezes well.
- Cookies are very rich, 50 calories each.
- (You may add chocolate or nuts to the dough or decorate with M&M's or chocolate stars.)

salad_info: grandma potato salad ingredient potato boiled peeled chopped tbsp fresh parsley finely chopped cup onion chopped cup dill pickle finely chopped tbsp sweet pickle relish cup best food mayonnaise tsp mustard hard boiled egg direction mix ingredient well add egg last salt pepper taste
Original_text:
Grandma'S Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 5 lbs. Potatoes Boiled, Peeled & Chopped
- 2 Tbsp. Fresh Parsley, Finely Chopped
- 1 Cup Onions Chopped
- 1 Cup Dill Pickles Finely Chopped
- 1 Tbsp. Sweet Pickle Relish
- 3/4 Cup Best Foods Mayonnaise
- 1 tsp. Mustard
- 6-8 Hard Boiled Eggs

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients well. Add Eggs Last. Salt & Pepper to taste.

salad_info: taco salad ingredient c mayonnaise c sour cream pkg taco mix can refried bean avocado lemon juice lettuce shredded tomato diced black olive sliced c cheese shredded tortilla chip direction mix avocado lemon juice spreading consistency separate bowl mix sour cream mayonnaise taco mix set aside spread avocado mix bottom x inch pan large plate spread layer refried bean top avocado spread layer sour cream mix spread rest bean spread rest sour cream mix layer rest ingredient serve tortilla chip
Original_text:
Taco Salad(Cold Appetizer)  

Ingredients:
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 c. sour cream
- 1 pkg. taco mix
- 1 to 2 cans refried beans
- 2 avocados (ripened)*
- lemon juice
- lettuce, shredded (iceberg)
- 2 tomatoes, diced
- 1 can black olives, sliced
- 2 c. cheese, shredded (your choice - Mozzarella, Monterey Jack, Cheddar, etc.)
- tortilla chips

Directions:
- Mix avocados with lemon juice to a spreading consistency.
- In a separate bowl, mix sour cream, mayonnaise and taco mix.
- Set aside.
- Spread all of the avocado mix on the bottom of a 13 x 9-inch pan or large plate.
- Spread 1 layer of refried beans on top of avocados.
- Spread 1 layer of sour cream mix.
- Spread the rest of the beans.
- Spread the rest of the sour cream mix.
- Now layer the rest of the ingredients.
- Serve with tortilla chips.

salad_info: potato salad ingredient egg hard cooked chopped c chopped celery cooked potato cubed cooled tbsp diced drained canned pimento tsp minced onion tbsp plain lowfat yogurt tsp mustard dash salt pepper direction medium bowl mix first ingredient small bowl combine remaining ingredient mix well combine yogurt mixture potato mixture toss gently coat cover plastic wrap refrigerate hour
Original_text:
Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 egg, hard cooked and chopped
- 1/2 c. chopped celery
- 3 oz. cooked potatoes, cubed and cooled
- 1 Tbsp. diced, drained canned pimentos
- 1 tsp. minced onions
- 2 Tbsp. plain low-fat yogurt
- 1 tsp. mustard
- dash salt and pepper

Directions:
- In medium bowl, mix first 5 ingredients.
- In small bowl, combine remaining ingredients; mix well.
- Combine yogurt mixture with potato mixture and toss gently to coat.
- Cover with plastic wrap.
- Refrigerate 1 hour.

Original_text:
Mexican Lasagna

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 lb. hamburger
- 1 onion, chopped
- 1 can cream of mushroom soup
- 1 can cream of chicken soup
- 1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes
- 1 small can evaporated milk
- 1 medium bag Doritos
- grated cheese (Cheddar)
- garlic salt to taste
- pepper to taste

Directions:
- Brown hamburger and onion.
- Drain.
- Mix soups, tomatoes and milk and add garlic salt and pepper.
- Layer Doritos in casserole dish.
- Sprinkle hamburger over Doritos.
- Pour soup mixture over hamburger.
- Top with grated cheese.
- Bake 30 minutes at 350°. Serve with tossed salad.

Lemon Congealed Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large lemon jello
- 1 1/2 c. boiling water
- 8 oz. cream cheese
- 1 can of eagle brand milk
- 8 oz. cool whip
- 12 oz. crushed pineapple (drained)
- 1 c. pecans
- 1 can mountain dew

Directions:
- Dissolve lemon jello in hot water.
- Add cream cheese and eagle brand milk.
- Then add mountain dew.
- Add cool whip & crushed pineapple.
- Add pecans to top.
- Refrigerate.

Bean Salad

- 1/3 c. oil

- Mix all ingredients together.

Original_text:
Tracy'S Overnight Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. lemon pie filling
- 1 c. heavy cream (whipped)
- 1/2 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1/4 c. lemon juice
- 1 large can fruit cocktail

Directions:
- Prepare pudding mix as directed on package, use whole eggs. Mix in lemon juice with pudding.
- Add whipped cream, fruit cocktail and marshmallows.

Original_text:
Sirloin Steak Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 sirloin steak
- 1/2 c. slivered almonds, browned under broiler or in frypan
- 4 green onions, sliced
- 1 pkg. Ramen soup noodles (beef or mushroom)
- 2 carrots, shredded
- 1/2 head cabbage, shredded
- 2 Tbsp. sesame seed

Directions:
- Broil sirloin steak and cut into bite size pieces.
- Crush Ramen noodles by hand while in package.
- Open carefully and slide out flavor packet (to be used in dressing).
- Mix all the ingredients, except noodles, almonds and dressing.

salad_info: mississippi corn salad ingredient can shoe peg white corn large tomato seeded chopped tsp salt c plain yogurt substitute c mayonnaise green onion c mayonnaise tsp pepper direction slice green onion top stir together corn tomato mayonnaise yogurt salt pepper large bowl cover refrigerate hour make serving
Original_text:
Mississippi Corn Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 (16 oz.) cans Shoe Peg white corn
- 1 large tomato, seeded and chopped
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1/4 c. plain yogurt or substitute 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 4 green onions
- 1/4 c. mayonnaise
- 1/4 tsp. pepper

Directions:
- Slice green onions and their tops.
- Stir together with corn, tomato, mayonnaise, yogurt, salt and pepper in a large bowl. Cover and refrigerate for 4 to 24 hours.
- Makes 8 to 10 servings.

salad_info: mexican bean dip ingredient can refried bean tub guacamole dip carton sour cream tbsp salad dressing pkg taco seasoning bunch chopped green onion c chopped tomato sliced black olive shredded cheddar cheese direction pan layer refried bean guacamole next mix sour cream salad dressing taco seasoning together spread guacamole layer green onion tomato olive cheese serve tortilla chip
Original_text:
Mexican Bean Dip

Ingredients:
- 2 cans refried beans
- 2 oz. tub guacamole dip
- 1 (16 oz.) carton sour cream
- 3 Tbsp. salad dressing
- 1 pkg. taco seasoning
- 1 bunch chopped green onions
- 2 c. chopped tomatoes
- 1 can sliced black olives
- 8 oz. shredded Cheddar cheese

Directions:
- In pan, layer refried beans, then guacamole.
- Next, mix sour cream, salad dressing and taco seasoning together.
- Spread on guacamole.
- Layer the green onions, tomatoes, olives and cheese. Serve with tortilla chips.

salad_info: irvins salad ingredient crushed pineapple small pkg lime jello c sugar cottage cheese cool whip c pecan direction mix crushed pineapple jello sugar saucepan let cook minute hot pour mixture large bowl cool completely add cottage cheese cool whip pecan refrigerate night
Original_text:
Irvin'S Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (8 oz) can crushed pineapple
- 1 small pkg lime jello
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 1 (8 oz) cottage cheese (small curds)
- 1 (8 oz) cool whip (thawed)
- 1 c. pecans

Directions:
- Mix crushed pineapple (including juice), jello, sugar in saucepan; let cook for 1 minute or until hot. Pour mixture into large bowl and cool completely. Add cottage cheese, cool whip and pecans. Refrigerate over night.

salad_info: fren date salad ingredient crushed pineapple diced date cream cheese small container cool whip c chopped pecan direction soften blend cream cheese pineapple add cool whip ingredient freeze
Original_text:
Frozen Date Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple
- 2 oz. diced dates
- 8 oz. cream cheese
- 1 small container Cool Whip
- 1/2 c. chopped pecans

Directions:
- Soften and blend cream cheese and pineapple.
- Add Cool Whip, then other ingredients.
- Freeze.

Original_text:
Pizza Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/2 lb. ring macaroni
- 8 oz. Monterey Jack cheese
- 3 fresh tomatoes
- 2 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. pepper
- 2 c. croutons
- 1/4 c. vinegar
- 1/3 c. Parmesan cheese
- 1 purple onion
- 1 Tbsp. oregano
- 1/2 c. oil

Directions:

- Mix tomatoes, onion and cheese with cooled, cooked macaroni.
- Add all other ingredients except Parmesan cheese and croutons.
- Refrigerate 2 or more hours. When ready to serve, add croutons and Parmesan cheese.

Original_text:
Classic Macaroni Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. Hellmann's mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. vinegar
- 1 Tbsp. prepared mustard
- 1 tsp. sugar
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/4 tsp. pepper
- 8 oz. elbow macaroni, cooked and drained

- 1/4 c. onion, chopped
- 1 c. green or red pepper, chopped

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients except macaroni.
- Mix well.
- Fold in macaroni; cover and chill.
- Makes 5 cups.

salad_info: hot chicken salad ingredient c cooked chicken diced hardboiled egg sliced cream chicken soup tsp lemon juice tsp salt c grated american cheese c celery chopped c mayonnaise small jar pimento chopped fine tsp minced onion c crushed potato chip c slivered almond direction combine ingredient except potato chip cheese almond place large greased rectangular baking dish
Original_text:
Hot Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 4 c. cooked chicken, diced
- 4 hard-boiled eggs, sliced
- 1 can cream of chicken soup (undiluted)
- 2 tsp. lemon juice
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 c. grated American cheese

- 1/2 c. slivered almonds

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients except potato chips, cheese and almonds.
- Place in large greased rectangular baking dish.

Summer Salad

Original_text:
Strawberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large box strawberry Jell-O
- 2 c. hot water
- 1 pkg. frozen strawberries
- 1 can crushed pineapple
- 3 mashed bananas
- 1 c. pecans, chopped
- 1 small carton sour cream

Directions:
- Dissolve Jell-O in hot water.
- Add all ingredients, except sour cream.
- Let chill until lumpy.
- Put 1/2 mixture into a square Pyrex dish.
- Spread on sour cream, then put rest of the mixture on top.
- Let set in refrigerator until ready to serve.

Original_text:
Cathy'S Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head broccoli
- 1 head cauliflower
- 1 purple onion
- 1 bag grated cheese

- 1/4 c. sugar
- 2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar

Directions:
- Wash broccoli and cauliflower.
- Break into small pieces.
- Chop onion.
- Add cheese.
- Mix mayonnaise, sugar and vinegar in small bowl until creamy.
- Pour over salad ingredients.
- Stir until coated.
- Chill for 30 minutes.

Original_text:

Ingredients:

- 1 c. chopped onion
- 1/2 c. chopped celery
- 2 hard-boiled eggs, chopped
- 1/4 c. chopped sweet pickles
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 Tbsp. vinegar
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. sugar
- 1 tsp. sweet pickle juice
- 1 tsp. mustard
- freshly ground black pepper

Directions:
- Boil potatoes in well salted water; cool.
- Peel and cube potatoes.
- Place in large bowl with next 4 ingredients.
- Mix together remaining ingredients until smooth.
- Pour over potato mixture and toss to coat well.
- Cover and chill.

Original_text:
Orange Cream Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (20 oz.) can drained pineapple tidbits
- 1 (16 oz.) can drained peach slices
- 1 (11 oz.) can drained mandarin oranges
- 3 medium bananas, sliced
- 2 medium apples, cored and chopped
- 1 (3 3/4 or 3 5/8 oz.) pkg. instant vanilla pudding mix
- 1 1/2 c. milk
- 1/3 ??? thawed frozen orange juice concentrate
- 3/4 c. sour cream
- lettuce cups

Directions:
- In large bowl, combine fruits; set aside.
- In small bowl, combine dry pudding mix, milk and orange juice concentrate.
- Beat with rotary beater until blended, 1 to 2 minutes.
- Beat in sour cream.
- Fold into fruit mixture.
- Cover and chill.

Original_text:
Carrot Cake

Ingredients:
- 2 3/4 c. flour (heap a little)
- 1 tsp. baking powder
- 1 tsp. baking soda
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. cinnamon
- 1/2 c. nuts (optional)
- 1 1/2 c. salad oil
- 2 c. sugar
- 4 eggs
- 2 c. finely grated raw carrots

Directions:
- Sift together first 5 ingredients.
- Combine oil and sugar and mix well.
- Add eggs (one at a time) to sugar and oil mixture; beat well.
- Add carrots and mix well.
- Add nuts.
- Bake at 350° for 50 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean.

Original_text:
Banana Nut Bread(Diabetic)

- 1 c. Equal
- 3 Tbsp. salad oil
- 3/4 c. skimmed milk
- 1 egg
- 1 c. finely chopped nuts
- 1 c. mashed ripe bananas

Directions:
- Heat oven to 350°.
- Grease and flour 9 x 5 x 3-inch loaf pan or use a cooking spray.

Original_text:
Frozen Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple
- 1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip
- 1 c. sugar
- 2 bananas
- 1 (16 oz.) pkg. frozen strawberries

Directions:
- Cream the cream cheese and sugar until smooth.
- Add pineapple, sliced bananas and thawed strawberries.
- Fold in Cool Whip.
- Pour into the containers of your choice and freeze.

salad_info: taco salad dip ingredient sour cream cream cheese chunky salsa ground beef browned drained cooled small onion c shredded lettuce diced tomato shredded cheddar cheese small black olive chopped c sliced jalapeno pepper direction mix together sour cream cream cheese spread pizza pan spread salsa crumble ground beef next sprinkle onion add lettuce tomato cheese top black olive jalapeno pepper serve tortilla chip
Original_text:
Taco Salad Dip

Ingredients:
- 8 oz. sour cream
- 8 oz. cream cheese
- 10 oz. chunky salsa
- 1 1/2 lb. ground beef, browned, drained and cooled
- 1 small onion
- 2 c. shredded lettuce
- 2 diced tomatoes
- 10 oz. shredded Cheddar cheese
- 1 small can black olives, chopped (optional)
- 1/2 c. sliced jalapeno peppers (optional)

Directions:
- Mix together sour cream and cream cheese and spread on pizza pan.
- Spread on salsa and crumble on ground beef.
- Next, sprinkle onion.
- Add lettuce, tomatoes and cheese.
- Top with black olives and jalapeno peppers.
- Serve with tortilla chips.

salad_info: calico salad ingredient bunch radish bunch fresh spinach small head iceberg lettuce medium size orange medium size avocado thin slice bermuda onion direction wash radish spinach lettuce chill refrigerator save radish rose crisp ice cube tear spinach leaf lettuce bite size piece salad bowl slice radish thinly add green peel orange cut section cut avocado bite size chunk slice reserve large onion ring add remainder salad serving add dressing toss lightly garnish onion ring radish rose serf
Original_text:
Calico Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 bunch radishes
- 1 bunch fresh spinach
- 1 small head iceberg lettuce
- 3 medium size oranges
- 1/2 medium size avocado
- 4 thin slices Bermuda onion

Directions:
- Wash radishes, spinach and lettuce; chill in refrigerator. Save 2 or 3 radishes for "roses;" crisp with ice cube.
- Tear spinach leaves and lettuce into bite size pieces in salad bowl. Slice 5 or 6 radishes thinly.
- Add to greens.
- Peel oranges; cut into sections.
- Cut avocado into bite size chunks or slices. Reserve 8 to 10 large onion rings.
- Add remainder to salad.
- Just before serving, add dressing and toss lightly.
- Garnish with onion rings and radish "roses."
- Serves 6.

salad_info: mexican salad ingredient tomato ground beef head lettuce onion c grated cheese bag corn tortilla chip avocado kidney ranch style bean tsp salt direction toss cup grated cheese cup french thousand island dressing hot sauce taste crunch add one bag chip slice add avocado
Original_text:
Mexican Salad

Ingredients:
- 4 tomatoes
- 1 lb. ground beef
- 1 head lettuce
- 1 onion
- 1 c. grated cheese
- 6 oz. bag corn or tortilla chips
- 1 avocado
- 1 can kidney or Ranch Style beans
- 1/4 tsp. salt

Directions:
- Toss 1 cup grated cheese, 1/2 cup French or Thousand Island dressing and hot sauce to taste.
- Crunch and add one (6 ounce) bag of chips.
- Slice and add 1 avocado.

Original_text:
Carrot Delight

Ingredients:
- 2 lb. carrots
- 1 bell pepper
- 1 onion
- 1 can condensed tomato soup
- 1/2 c. sugar (may add up to 1 c.)
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 1 tsp. each: salt, pepper and dry mustard

Directions:
- Cook cleaned and sliced carrots in unsalted water until tender.
- Drain and place in bowl with chopped pepper and onion. Make a sauce of remaining ingredients.
- Bring sauce to boil and pour over carrots.

- 1 lb. sauerkraut, rinse well
- 1 (4 oz.) can pimento, chopped

- 1 c. onions, chopped

Directions:
- Mix and refrigerate overnight, the longer the better.

Jello Salad

- 1 lemon jello (step 1)
- 1 c. boiling water *
- 12 oz. carton cottage cheese, creamed (step 2)
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 small can Pet milk
- 1 large can crushed pineapple (step 3)
- 1/2 c. pecans

Directions:
- Mix cottage cheese, mayonnaise and Pet milk well.
- Mix all together.
- Put in refrigerator to chill.
- Serve on lettuce leaf with crackers or Ritz.

Crab Meat Dip

Ingredients:
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. mock crab meat, cut in small pieces
- 1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
- 1/4 c. frozen diced onion
- 1 c. real mayonnaise

Directions:
- Mix
- ingredients together and heat in microwave on High until bubbly, 2 or 3 minutes.
- Remove from microwave and stir vigorously until all ingredients are combined.
- Sprinkle with Salad Supreme.

Original_text:
Vegetable Rice Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 c. uncooked regular rice
- 1 1/2 c. diced celery
- 3/4 c. diced green pepper
- 1 3/4 c. diced tomatoes
- 1/3 c. chopped onion

- Toss lightly. Chill overnight.

Original_text:
Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
- 1 bunch broccoli, separated into florets
- 1 head cauliflower, separated into florets
- 8 bacon strips, fried and crumbled or 1/2 c. bacon bits
- 1/3 c. chopped onion
- 1 c. chopped tomato
- 1 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
- 1/3 c. sugar
- 2 Tbsp. vinegar

Directions:
- In a large salad bowl, combine broccoli, cauliflower, bacon, onion and tomatoes.
- Set aside.
- In another bowl, combine mayonnaise, sugar and vinegar; mix until smooth.
- Just before serving, pour dressing over salad and toss.
- Yields 6 to 8 servings.

Original_text:
Taco Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 lb. ground beef
- 1 c. celery, diced
- 1 c. bell pepper, diced
- 3 cloves garlic, diced
- 1 large head lettuce
- ground cumin
- 1 1/2 c. onion, diced
- 2 large ripe tomatoes
- 1 large pkg. corn chips
- 1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes
- salt
- chili powder

Directions:
- Brown meat.
- Saute vegetables.
- Combine the two and simmer. Season with salt, chili powder and cumin.
- In top of double boiler, melt cheese.
- Add Ro-Tel tomatoes.
- Cut lettuce coarsely and dice tomatoes.
- Put in large bowl.
- Add meat and vegetables and mix lightly.
- Add slightly crushed corn chips and toss.
- Top with hot cheese mixture.
- Serve immediately.

Original_text:
Italian Vegetable Dip

Ingredients:
- 1 c. mayonnaise or low-fat mayonnaise
- 1 c. sour cream or fat-free sour cream
- 1 pkg. Italian salad dressing mix
- 1/4 c. chopped red pepper
- 1/4 c. chopped green pepper

Directions:
- Mix until well blended.
- Serve with fresh, raw vegetables or chips.
- Makes 2 1/4 cups.

Rhubarb Salad

- 2 1/2 c. rhubarb
- 3/4 to 1 c. sugar
- 1/2 c. water
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. strawberry jello, dissolved in hot water
- 1 (2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained

Directions:
- Cook rhubarb with sugar and water until tender.
- While still hot, add strawberry jello and stir, then add pineapple and nuts. Cool and refrigerate.

Reuben Dip

Ingredients:
- 1 16 oz. can sauerkraut
- 1 C. Thousand Island salad dressing

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients in baking dish. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes. Serve hot with snack crackers.

Original_text:
Salad Dressing

Ingredients:
- 1 small onion
- 1 c. oil
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. dry mustard
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 1 tsp. celery seed

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients at once in a blender.

salad_info: chicken yassa ingredient chicken large green pepper bay leaf lime crushed peppercorn salt vinegar onion hot chili pepper c cooking oil chicken bouillon cube dissolved fluid water direction clean cut chicken half quarter put shredded onion top mix juice lime oil small amount vinegar bay leaf salt pepper pour chicken marinate several hour hour serving hot charcoal fire grill ready grill chicken browning side almost blackened pot heat small amount oil add chicken green pepper chili pepper chicken bouillon marinade ingredient cover cook gently chicken tender serve garnished sliced tomato lemon eat rice bread good served mixed green salad lamb beef liver used place chicken
Original_text:
Chicken Yassa

Ingredients:
- 4 lb. chicken
- 4 large green peppers
- 2 bay leaves
- 1 lime
- crushed peppercorn
- salt
- vinegar
- 1 lb. onions
- 1 hot chili pepper (optional)
- 1/2 c. cooking oil
- 1 chicken bouillon cube, dissolved in 1 1/2 fluid oz. water

Directions:
- Clean and cut chicken in half or quarters.
- Put shredded onion on top.
- Mix juice from lime, oil, small amount of vinegar, bay leaves, salt and pepper.
- Pour over chicken and marinate for several hours.
- About an hour or so before serving, have a hot charcoal fire with grill ready.
- Grill chicken, browning on all sides until almost blackened.
- In a pot, heat a small amount of oil.
- Add chicken, green peppers, chili pepper (optional), chicken bouillon and all the marinade ingredients.
- Cover and cook gently until chicken is tender (about 30 minutes).
- Serve garnished with sliced tomatoes and lemons.
- Eat with rice or bread.
- Very good served with a mixed green salad.
- Lamb, beef or liver can be used in place of chicken.

salad_info: hawaiian ambrosia salad ingredient crushed pineapple well drained large banana sliced large apple chopped maraschino cherry chopped c coconut c chopped pecan direction combine ingredient mix well pour cooled dressing stir well make serving
Original_text:
Hawaiian Ambrosia Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (15 oz.) can crushed pineapple, well drained (reserve juice)
- 3 large bananas, sliced
- 2 large apples, chopped (unpeeled)
- 12 Maraschino cherries, chopped
- 1 c. coconut
- 1/2 c. chopped pecans

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients and mix well.
- Pour cooled dressing (amount according to personal preference) over all and stir well. Makes about 8 servings.

Original_text:
Ambrosia Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can pineapple chunks, drained and cut up
- 2 cans mandarin oranges
- 1 1/2 c. green seedless grapes
- 1 c. coconut
- 1 c. tiny marshmallows
- 1 container Cool Whip

Directions:
- Combine fruits, marshmallows and coconut. Mix all together with Cool Whip.
- Refrigerate several hours or overnight.

Cottage Cheese Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 container cottage cheese
- 1 large pkg. Jell-O (any flavor)
- 1 large bowl Cool Whip
- 1 can mixed fruit, drained

Directions:
- Mix together cottage
- cheese
- and Jell-O (powder form), then mix fruit and Cool Whip in.
- Refrigerate.

salad_info: tortellini main dish salad ingredient fresh fren three cheese tortellini minced garlic c sliced mushroom fresh canned drained c thinly sliced red bell pepper c sour cream c vegetable stock jar artichoke heart rinsed drained chopped minced parsley direction prepare tortellini according pkg direction combine vegetable stock garlic artichoke heart mushroom pepper parsley medium heavy saucepan bring boil reduce simmer cook minute remove heat stir remaining ingredient toss cooked pasta stir copped sundried tomato desired serve hot main dish side dish serve cold main dish light salad
Original_text:
Tortellini Main Dish Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb fresh or frozen three cheese tortellini
- 2 T minced garlic
- 1/2 c sliced mushrooms, fresh or canned and drained
- 1/4 c thinly sliced red bell pepper
- 1/2 c sour cream
- 1/4 c vegetable stock
- 1 6-oz jar artichoke hearts, rinsed, drained and chopped
- 3 T minced parsley

Directions:
- Prepare tortellini according to pkg directions. Combine vegetable stock, garlic, artichoke hearts, mushrooms, pepper and parsley in a medium heavy saucepan.
- Bring to a boil, reduce to simmer and cook about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in remaining ingredients.
- Toss with the cooked pasta.
- Stir in a few copped sun-dried tomatoes if desired. Serve hot as a main dish or side dish.
- Serve cold as a main dish or light salad.

salad_info: rotelle salad ingredient c olive oil tbsp dried sweet basil leaf tbsp lemon juice tsp grated lemon peel clove garlic minced tbsp chopped parsley c broccoli floweret pkg rotelle c fresh cherry tomato c green onion sliced c grated parmesan cheese salt pepper taste direction mix olive oil lemon juice garlic parsley set aside cook rotelle directed package adding broccoli last minute cooking drain rinse cold water stop cooking process toss rotellebroccoli olive oil dressing well coated add tomato green onion cheese toss add salt pepper taste ripe olive added desired serf
Original_text:
Rotelle Salad(A Pasta Salad)  

Ingredients:
- 3/4 c. olive oil
- 2 Tbsp. dried sweet basil leaves
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1/4 tsp. grated lemon peel
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 3 Tbsp. chopped parsley
- 2 c. broccoli flowerets
- 1 (12 oz.) pkg. Rotelle
- 3 c. fresh cherry tomatoes
- 1/2 c. green onions, sliced
- 1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
- salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- Mix olive oil, lemon juice, garlic and parsley and set aside. Cook Rotelle as directed on package, adding broccoli during last 5 minutes of cooking.
- Drain and rinse in cold water to stop cooking process.
- Toss Rotelle-broccoli with olive oil dressing until well coated.
- Add tomatoes, green onions and cheese and toss again. Add salt and pepper to taste.
- Ripe olives can be added, if desired.
- Serves 11.

- Note:

- Mix the first 4 ingredients together.

- Chill overnight.

Original_text:
Orange Sherbet Salad

- 2 c. hot water and orange juice

Directions:
- Using juice from the mandarin oranges as part of liquid, dissolve gelatin in the hot water.

salad_info: taco salad ingredient qt romaine iceberg lettuce washed dried broken c diced green pepper medium cucumber sliced medium tomato sliced thin wedge cherry tomato halved c diced sweet red onion ripe avocado peeled seeded cut small chunk c cilantro chopped sliced black olive drained c salsa plus additional c ranch dressing batch chicken beef taco filling c shredded cheddar monterey jack cheese sour cream direction put lettuce pepper cucumber tomato onion avocado cilantro olive large salad bowl stir together cup salsa ranch dressing pour salad toss divide salad serving plate top one taco filling shredded cheese put salsa sour cream table folk add yield serving
Original_text:
Taco Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 qt. romaine or iceberg lettuce, washed, dried and broken up
- 1 c. diced green pepper
- 1/2 medium cucumber, sliced
- 1 medium tomato, sliced into thin wedges, or 15 cherry tomatoes, halved
- 1/2 c. diced sweet red onion
- 1/2 ripe avocado, peeled, seeded and cut into small chunks
- 1/2 c. cilantro, chopped (optional)
- 1 (4 oz.) can sliced black olives, drained (optional)
- 2/3 c. salsa plus additional (for topping)
- 1/2 c. Ranch dressing
- 1 batch Chicken or Beef Taco Filling
- 1 c. shredded Cheddar or Monterey Jack cheese
- sour cream

Directions:
- Put the lettuce, pepper, cucumber, tomato, onion, avocado, cilantro (if using) and olives (if using) in a large salad bowl. Stir together the 2/3 cup of salsa and the Ranch dressing; pour it over the salad and toss. Divide the salad between the serving plates and top each one with the taco filling and shredded cheese. Put the salsa and sour cream on the table, so folks can add their own. Yield: 6 servings.

- 1 small onion, minced

- 4 c. cabbage, shredded
- 1 tsp. prepared mustard

- Cook and drain macaroni.
- Combine the next 4 ingredients, mixing well.
- Mix remaining ingredients; blend well.
- Pour over macaroni.
- Mix; toss and chill 1 hour before serving.

6-Cup Salad("Quik-N-Ez")

Original_text:
Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 bunch broccoli
- 1 bunch spring onions
- 1/2 c. stuffed olives
- 4 boiled eggs
- pepper, garlic, salt and mayo to season to taste

Directions:
- Chop broccoli, spring onions, olives and boiled eggs.
- Mix, season to taste; add mayo.
- Chill in refrigerator at least 2 or 3 hours or overnight.
- You could wait and add eggs next day.

salad_info: seafood pasta salad ingredient c miracle whip c zesty italian dressing tbsp parmesan cheese c rotini pasta cooked drained crab meat c broccoli partially cooked c chopped green pepper c chopped tomato c chopped green onion c chopped celery direction mix miracle whip italian dressing cheese well blended stir ingredient refrigerate overnight
Original_text:
Seafood Pasta Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. Miracle Whip
- 1/4 c. Zesty Italian dressing
- 2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
- 2 c. rotini pasta, cooked and drained
- 1 (8 oz.) crab meat
- 1 c. broccoli, partially cooked
- 1/2 c. chopped green peppers
- 1/2 c. chopped tomatoes
- 1/2 c. chopped green onions
- 1/2 c. chopped celery

Directions:
- Mix Miracle Whip, Italian dressing and cheese until well blended.
- Stir in other ingredients.
- Refrigerate overnight.

salad_info: pasta primavera salad ingredient c tricolor rotini cooked drained c broccoli floweret c sliced carrot c quartered cherry tomato c sliced red onion bottle peppercorn ranch dressing parsley dill weed seasoned salt dressing direction mix pasta vegetable large bowl separate bowl mix dressing parsley dill seasoned salt taste pour vegetable mix well refrigerate several hour serving serf
Original_text:
Pasta Primavera Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. (5 1/2 oz.) tricolor rotini, cooked and drained
- 2 c. broccoli flowerets
- 1 c. sliced carrots
- 1 c. quartered cherry tomatoes
- 1/4 c. sliced red onion
- 1 (8 oz.) bottle peppercorn Ranch dressing
- parsley, dill weed, seasoned salt in dressing

Directions:
- Mix pasta and vegetables in large bowl.
- In separate bowl, mix dressing, parsley, dill and seasoned salt to taste.
- Pour over vegetables and mix well.
- Refrigerate several hours before serving.
- Serves 8.

salad_info: herbed pea salad ingredient pkg fren pea c french dressing herb spice tsp dried dill weed hardcooked egg sliced c sliced celery direction cook pea drain combine french dressing dill weed pour pea celery chill several hour overnight stirring occasionally serve lettuce top hard egg slice
Original_text:
Herbed Pea Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas
- 1/3 c. French dressing with herbs and spices
- 1/2 tsp. dried dill weed
- 1 hard-cooked egg, sliced
- 1 c. sliced celery

Directions:
- Cook peas; drain.
- Combine French dressing with dill weed. Pour over peas and celery.
- Chill several hours or overnight, stirring occasionally.
- Serve in lettuce.
- Top with hard egg slice.

salad_info: marinated carrot salad ingredient c baby carrot undiluted tomato soup c vegetable oil c vinegar c sugar prepared mustard worcestershire sauce black pepper salt medium bell pepper chopped medium onion chopped direction cook carrot minute let cool completely combine ingredient let marinate overnight refrigerator
Original_text:
Marinated Carrot Salad

Ingredients:
- 5 c baby carrots (frozen)
- 1 can undiluted tomato soup
- 1 c vegetable oil
- 3/4 c vinegar
- 1 c sugar
- 1 t prepared mustard
- 1 t Worcestershire sauce
- 1 t black pepper
- 1 t salt
- 1 medium bell pepper, chopped
- 1 medium onion, chopped

Directions:
- Cook carrots 6-8 minutes and let cool completely.
- Combine all ingredients and let marinate overnight in refrigerator.

salad_info: neimanmarcus white meat chicken salad ingredient c white meat chicken cut bite size dice c celery diced c mayonnaise dash white wine vinegar c half half salt taste white pepper taste toasted almond direction mix mayonnaise vinegar combine remaining ingredient spread choice bread garnish almond serving stand alone salad serf
Original_text:
Neiman-Marcus White Meat Of Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 c. white meat of chicken, cut in bite size dice
- 1/2 c. celery, diced
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- dash of white wine vinegar
- 1/2 c. half and half
- salt to taste
- white pepper to taste
- toasted almonds (to garnish)

Directions:
- Mix mayonnaise and vinegar. Combine with remaining ingredients.
- Spread on choice of bread or garnish with almonds if serving as a stand alone salad.
- Serves 4 to 6.

- 1/2 c. whole bran cereal
- 3/4 c. all-purpose flour
- 1/3 c. sugar
- 1 1/2 tsp. double-acting baking powder
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1 egg

Directions:
- Preheat oven
- to
- 400°.
- Grease
- a
- 12 cup (2 1/2 cups) muffin pan.
- In
- medium bowl with fork, mix first six ingredients.
- In small bowl, with a fork, beat egg slightly and stir in milk and oil.
- Add
- egg
- mixture all at once to flour mixture.
- With
- a spoon,
- stir
- just	until
- flour is moistened. (Batter will be lumpy.) Spoon batter into muffin pan cups.	In small bowl combine 2 tablespoons shredded orange peel, 1/2 cup chopped nuts
- and 1/3 cup sugar.	Sprinkle over muffins.	Bake 25 minutes
- or
- until golden and toothpick inserted in center comes out almost clean. Servings for 12.

salad_info: korean salad ingredient large bag spinach washed stemmed water chestnut drained well strip bacon fried crisp crumbled bean sprout rinsed cold water drained dried paper towel hardboiled egg chopped sliced red onion direction combine add dressing serving
Original_text:
Korean Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large bag spinach, washed and stemmed
- 1 can water chestnuts, drained well
- 5 strips bacon, fried crisp and crumbled
- 1 can bean sprouts, rinsed in cold water, drained and dried with paper towel
- 2 hard-boiled eggs, chopped
- 1/2 sliced red onion (thin)

Directions:
- Combine and add dressing just before serving.

salad_info: pumpkin pie cake ingredient c salad oil c sugar egg c canned pumpkin c plain flour tsp baking powder tsp baking soda tsp cinnamon tsp salt direction combine first ingredient mix dry ingredient together combine pumpkin mixture add cup coconut cup chopped nut bake minute
Original_text:
Pumpkin Pie Cake

Ingredients:
- 1 1/4 c. salad oil
- 2 c. sugar
- 4 eggs
- 2 c. canned pumpkin
- 2 c. plain flour
- 2 tsp. baking powder
- 2 tsp. baking soda
- 2 tsp. cinnamon
- 1 tsp. salt

Directions:
- Combine first 4 ingredients; mix all dry ingredients together and combine with the pumpkin mixture.
- Add 1/2 cup coconut and 1/2 cup chopped nuts.
- Bake for 45 minutes at 350°.

salad_info: easy coq au vin ingredient chicken breast c red wine c soy sauce c salad oil tbsp water clove garlic minced tsp ginger tsp oregano tbsp brown sugar direction place chicken covered casserole mix liquid spice pour chicken bake covered hour serf
Original_text:
Easy Coq Au Vin

Ingredients:
- 4 chicken breasts
- 3/4 c. red wine
- 1/4 c. soy sauce
- 1/4 c. salad oil
- 2 Tbsp. water
- 1 clove garlic, minced
- 1 tsp. ginger
- 1/4 tsp. oregano
- 1 Tbsp. brown sugar

Directions:
- Place chicken in covered casserole.
- Mix liquids and spices and pour over chicken. Bake, covered, for 1 1/2 hours at 350°. Serves 4.

salad_info: italian beef stirfry ingredient beef round tip steak cut inch thick clove garlic crushed tbsp olive oil small zucchini thinly sliced c cherry tomato half c bottled italian salad dressing c cooked spaghetti tbsp grated parmesan cheese direction cut beef steak crosswise inch wide strip cut strip crosswise half cook stir garlic oil large nonstick skillet mediumhigh heat minute add beef strip stirfry minute season salt pepper remove slotted spoon keep warm add zucchini stirfry minute crisptender return beef skillet tomato half dressing heat serve hot pasta sprinkle cheese yield serving
Original_text:
Italian Beef Stir-Fry

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. beef round tip steaks, cut 1/8 to 1/4-inch thick
- 2 cloves garlic, crushed
- 1 Tbsp. olive oil
- 2 small zucchini, thinly sliced
- 1 c. cherry tomato halves
- 1/4 c. bottled Italian salad dressing
- 2 c. cooked spaghetti
- 1 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese

Directions:
- Cut beef steaks crosswise into 1-inch wide strips.
- Cut each strip crosswise in half.
- Cook and stir garlic in oil in large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat for 1 minute.
- Add beef strips (1/2 at a time). Stir-fry 1 to 1 1/2 minutes.
- Season with salt and pepper.
- Remove with slotted spoon.
- Keep warm.
- Add zucchini and stir-fry 2 to 3 minutes or until crisp-tender. Return beef to skillet with tomato halves and dressing.
- Heat through.
- Serve over hot pasta.
- Sprinkle with cheese.
- Yields 4 servings.

salad_info: crazy bean salad ingredient pork sausage c plus tbsp brown sugar tsp dry mustard c fine chopped celery c fine chopped onion tomato soup tomato paste green bean drained waxed bean drained lima bean drained kidney bean drained pork bean direction brown sausage drain slightly cook onion celery combine sausage onion celery sugar mustard tomato soup tomato paste mix well add bean bake slow oven slow cooker minute hour
Original_text:
Crazy Bean Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. pork sausage
- 1 c. plus 1 Tbsp. brown sugar
- 1 tsp. dry mustard
- 1/2 c. fine chopped celery
- 1/2 c. fine chopped onion
- 1 can tomato soup
- 1 can tomato paste (small)
- 1 can green beans, drained
- 1 can waxed beans, drained
- 1 can lima beans, drained
- 1 can kidney beans, drained
- 1 can pork and beans

Directions:
- Brown sausage and drain.
- Slightly cook onion and celery. Combine sausage, onion, celery, sugar, mustard, tomato soup and tomato paste.
- Mix well; add beans.
- Bake in slow oven or slow cooker at 300° to 325° for 45 minutes to 1 hour.

salad_info: scramble ingredient salted mixed nut box spoon size shredded wheat pkg cheerio pkg rice chex pretzel pretzel bit c salad oil tbsp worcestershire sauce tbsp garlic salt tbsp seasoned salt direction mix together bake hour stirring every minute
Original_text:
Scramble

Ingredients:
- 2 lb. salted mixed nuts
- 1 (11 oz.) box spoon size Shredded Wheat
- 1 (10 oz.) pkg. Cheerios
- 1 (6 oz.) pkg. Rice Chex
- 1 (7 oz.) can pretzels
- 1 (4 1/2 oz.) can pretzel bits
- 2 c. salad oil
- 2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
- 1 Tbsp. garlic salt
- 1 Tbsp. seasoned salt

Directions:
- Mix together and bake at 250° for 2 hours, stirring every 15 minutes.

salad_info: sweet chocolate sensation ingredient pkg chocolate cake mix c mayonnaise c water egg direction grease flour x inch pan using mixer blend ingredient second low speed beat medium speed minute pour prepared pan bake approximately minute cake pull away side pan spring back touched lightly center cool cake wire rack frost desired store refrigerator
Original_text:
Sweet Chocolate Sensation

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. chocolate cake mix (with pudding in the mix)
- 1 c. mayonnaise (not salad dressing)
- 1 c. water
- 3 eggs

Directions:
- Grease and flour a 9 x 13-inch pan.
- Using mixer, blend all ingredients 30 seconds on low speed; beat at medium speed for 2 minutes.
- Pour into prepared pan; bake at 350° for approximately 35 minutes or until cake pulls away from sides of pan and springs back when touched lightly in center.
- Cool cake on wire rack and frost as desired; store in refrigerator.

salad_info: oriental salad ingredient french green bean bean sprout water chestnut shoepeg corn c cauliflower broken bit jar pimento medium onion chopped c chopped celery c chopped green pepper c sugar tbsp salt c vinegar diluted c water c salad oil direction saucepan combine sugar salt vinegar oil heat boil mix vegetable
Original_text:
Oriental Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can French green beans
- 1 can bean sprouts
- 1 (6 oz.) can water chestnuts
- 1 can Shoepeg corn
- 1 c. cauliflower, broken in bits
- 1 jar pimentos
- 1 medium onion, chopped
- 1 c. chopped celery
- 1 c. chopped green pepper
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 Tbsp. salt
- 1/2 c. vinegar, diluted with 1/2 c. water
- 1/2 c. salad oil

Directions:
- In saucepan, combine sugar, salt, vinegar and oil; heat to a boil.
- Mix in vegetables.

salad_info: bambis salad ingredient head boston lettuce c sliced strawberry c sliced peeled cucumber direction combine lettuce strawberry cucumber toss serve vanilla yogurt dressing
Original_text:
Bambi'S Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/2 head Boston lettuce
- 1/2 c. sliced strawberries
- 1/4 c. sliced, peeled cucumbers

Directions:
- Combine lettuce, strawberries and cucumbers.
- Toss.
- Serve with vanilla yogurt dressing.

salad_info: local orange salad ingredient tbsp chopped pecan c crushed pineapple box diet orange jello cottage cheese c water packed mandarin orange chopped drained plain yogurt whipped tsp vanilla pkg sweet n low direction mix cottage cheese pineapple orange sprinkle diet jello stir well stir pecan stir whipped yogurt mixture chill serf
Original_text:
Lo-Cal Orange Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 Tbsp. chopped pecans
- 1 c. crushed pineapple (unsweetened)
- 1 box diet orange Jell-O
- 12 oz. cottage cheese (low-fat)
- 1/2 c. water packed Mandarin oranges, chopped and drained
- 6 oz. plain yogurt, whipped with 1 tsp. vanilla and 2 pkg. Sweet 'N Low

Directions:
- Mix cottage cheese, pineapple and oranges.
- Sprinkle diet Jell-O over this; stir well.
- Stir in pecans, then stir in the whipped yogurt mixture.
- Chill.
- Serves 6 to 8.

salad_info: fresh pear cake ingredient c chopped pear c chopped apple c salad oil c sugar egg c flour tsp salt tsp soda tsp vanilla tsp cinnamon c chopped pecan direction mix oil sugar blend vanilla egg sift dry ingredient add mixture add pear nut mix well bake greased floured x inch pan cook minute oven cool ice cream cheese icing cut square
Original_text:
Fresh Pear Cake

Ingredients:
- 3 c. chopped pears or 4 c. chopped apples
- 3/4 c. salad oil
- 2 c. sugar
- 2 eggs
- 2 c. flour
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. soda
- 2 tsp. vanilla
- 1 tsp. cinnamon
- 1 c. chopped pecans (optional)

Directions:
- Mix oil and sugar; blend in vanilla and eggs.
- Sift all dry ingredients and add to mixture.
- Add pears and nuts (optional). Mix well.
- Bake in greased and floured 9 x 13-inch pan.
- Cook 45 minutes in 350° oven.
- Cool and ice with Cream Cheese Icing.
- Cut into 24 squares.

salad_info: seven layer salad ingredient head lettuce c bell pepper c celery sweet pea drained black olive drained sliced pt mayonnaise tbsp sugar parmesan cheese bacon bit direction layer large bowl first ingredient order mix mayonnaise sugar spread top covering salad well sprinkle parmesan cheese bacon bit top refrigerate least hour toss serving
Original_text:
Seven Layer Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head lettuce
- 1 c. bell pepper
- 1 c. celery
- 1 can sweet peas, drained
- 1 can black olives, drained and sliced
- 1 pt. mayonnaise
- 1 Tbsp. sugar
- Parmesan cheese
- bacon bits

Directions:
- Layer in very large bowl the first 5 ingredients in order. Mix mayonnaise and sugar and spread on top, covering salad well. Sprinkle Parmesan cheese and bacon bits on top and refrigerate at least 8 hours.
- Toss before serving.

salad_info: salad ingredient small pkg orange jello c boiling water c sliced banana c crushed pineapple c mini marshmallow mandarin orange c pineapple juice tbsp butter c sugar tbsp flour egg pkg whipped dream whip direction mix jello water together let cool add banana drained pineapple marshmallow orange let set
Original_text:
7-Up Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 small pkg. orange Jell-O
- 2 c. boiling water
- 2 c. 7-Up
- 2 sliced bananas
- 1 c. crushed pineapple
- 1 c. mini marshmallows
- 1 can mandarin oranges
- 1 c. pineapple juice
- 1 Tbsp. butter
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 3 Tbsp. flour
- 1 egg
- 1 pkg. whipped Dream Whip

Directions:
- Mix Jell-O, water and 7-Up together; let it cool, then add bananas, drained pineapple, marshmallows and oranges.
- Let this set.

salad_info: german potato salad ingredient bacon large onion c vinegar cooked cubed potato tsp dill salt pepper tbsp sugar direction brown bacon onion add vinegar salt sugar pepper dill browned bacon onion mix potato
Original_text:
German Potato Salad(For Big Group)  

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. bacon
- 1 large onion
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 5 lb. cooked, cubed potatoes
- 1/2 tsp. dill
- salt and pepper
- 3 1/2 Tbsp. sugar

Directions:
- Brown bacon (cut small) with onion.
- Add vinegar with salt, sugar, pepper and dill to browned bacon and onion (don't drain). Mix this with potatoes.
