Original_text:
Pasta Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (12 oz.) box pasta, cooked and drained
- 1 qt. cherry tomatoes
- 2 small cans black olives, sliced
- 1 large green pepper
- 1 medium yellow onion
- 1 bunch each: broccoli and cauliflower
- 1 qt. fresh mushrooms (optional)
- 1 large bottle zesty Italian salad dressing
- 2 lb. grated Parmesan cheese
- fresh parsley

Directions:
- Cook pasta as directed.
- Drain and rinse in cold water. Combine tomatoes (halved or quartered), green pepper (chopped), broccoli, cauliflower, mushrooms and parsley.
- Add pasta and toss. Pour dressing over salad and add cheese.
- Let marinate overnight. Serves 20.

salad_info: layer casserole ingredient c long grain rice cooked c cooked ham diced c sliced onion c broccoli floweret tomato soup mixed equal part half half c shredded sharp cheddar cheese mixed c mzarella salt pepper taste green red pepper slice direction butter large casserole cook broccoli green onion small amount water dash salt minute drain well mix soup half half bowl casserole layer rice broccoli green onion ham pour soup mixture top shredded cheese bake approximately minute cheese melted light brown serve hot oven salad roll make serving
Original_text:
6 Layer Casserole

Ingredients:
- 2 c. long grain rice, cooked
- 2 c. cooked ham, diced
- 1 c. sliced onion
- 2 c. broccoli flowerets
- 1 (15 oz.) can tomato soup, mixed with equal part half and half
- 1 c. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese mixed with 1 c. Mozzarella
- salt and pepper to taste
- green or red pepper slices (garnish)

Directions:
- Butter a large casserole.
- Cook broccoli and green onion in a small amount of water with dash of salt for 5 to 6 minutes.
- Drain well.
- Mix soup and half and half in bowl.
- In casserole, layer rice, broccoli, green onions and ham.
- Pour soup mixture over; top with shredded cheese.
- Bake at 375° for approximately 35 minutes or until cheese is melted and light brown.
- Serve hot from oven with salad and rolls.
- Makes 4 to 6 servings.

salad_info: orange pineapple salad ingredient large pkg orange jello c boiling water small orange juice large crushed pineapple mandarin orange drained small pkg instant vanilla pudding c cold milk small carton cool whip direction blend well jello boiling water add next three ingredient let gel
Original_text:
Orange Pineapple Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large pkg. orange jello
- 2 c. boiling water
- 1 small can orange juice
- 1 large can crushed pineapple (do not drain)
- 1 can Mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 small pkg. instant vanilla pudding
- 1 c. cold milk
- 1 small carton Cool Whip

Directions:
- Blend well the jello and boiling water.
- Add the next three ingredients and let it gel.

salad_info: carrot salad ingredient carrot peeled sliced tomato sauce c granulated sugar c olive oil c red wine vinegar salt pepper taste tsp dry mustard tsp worcestershire sauce dash hot pepper sauce c chopped onion c chopped green pepper whole kernel corn drained c chopped celery direction boil carrot water cook small amount water microwave tender drain place quart covered casserole add onion green pepper corn celery combine remaining ingredient heat minute microwave high stir pour vegetable cool cover marinate overnight refrigerator make serving salad keep refrigerator least one week
Original_text:
Carrot Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. carrots, peeled and sliced
- 1 (16 oz.) can tomato sauce
- 1 c. granulated sugar
- 1/2 c. olive oil (extra light)
- 3/4 c. red wine vinegar
- salt and pepper to taste
- 1 tsp. dry mustard
- 1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
- dash of hot pepper sauce
- 1/2 c. chopped onion
- 1/2 c. chopped green pepper
- 1 (16 oz.) can whole kernel corn, drained
- 1/2 c. chopped celery

Directions:
- Boil carrots in water or cook in small amount of water in microwave just until tender; drain and place in 2-quart covered casserole.
- Add onion, green pepper, corn and celery.
- Combine the remaining ingredients; heat 3 minutes in the microwave on High. Stir and pour over vegetables.
- Cool, cover and marinate overnight in the refrigerator.
- Makes 12 servings.
- This salad will keep in the refrigerator at least one week.

salad_info: orange salad ingredient small pkg tapioca pudding large pkg orange jello c cold water small crushed pineapple small mandarin orange large pkg cool whip c miniature marshmallow direction combine tapioca pudding orange jello cup cold water cook clear boiling stage medium heat cool drain crushed pineapple mandarin orange fold cool whip miniature marshmallow crushed pineapple mandarin orange cooled mixture place x inch pan jello mold refrigerate set
Original_text:
Orange Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 small pkg. tapioca pudding
- 1 large pkg. orange jello
- 3 c. cold water
- 1 small can crushed pineapple
- 1 small can mandarin oranges
- 1 large pkg. Cool Whip
- 2 c. miniature marshmallows

Directions:
- Combine tapioca pudding and orange jello with 3 cups cold water.
- Cook until clear or until boiling stage over medium heat. Cool.
- Drain the crushed pineapple and mandarin oranges.
- Fold Cool Whip, miniature marshmallows, crushed pineapple and mandarin oranges into the cooled mixture.
- Place in 9 x 13-inch pan or jello mold and refrigerate until set.

salad_info: apple salad ingredient crushed pineapple drained c sugar pkg lemon gelatin pkg cream cheese c diced apple c nut c chopped celery c whipped topping direction saucepan combine pineapple sugar bring boil boil minute add gelatin stir dissolved add cream cheese stir cool fold apple nut celery whipped topping pour inch pan chill firm
Original_text:
Apple Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 2/3 c. sugar
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon gelatin (dry)
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 1 c. diced apples (unpeeled)
- 1/2 c. nuts
- 1 c. chopped celery
- 1 c. whipped topping

Directions:
- In saucepan, combine pineapple and sugar; bring to a boil. Boil for 3 minutes; add gelatin and stir until dissolved.
- Add cream cheese.
- Stir; cool.
- Fold in apples, nuts, celery and whipped topping.
- Pour into 9-inch pan.
- Chill until firm (2 hours or so).

salad_info: watergate salad ingredient crushed pineapple small box pistachio instant pudding mix pkg nut c miniature marshmallow container cool whip direction mix pudding mix pineapple add nut marshmallow cool whip
Original_text:
Watergate Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can crushed pineapple (do not drain)
- 1 small box pistachio instant pudding mix
- 1 pkg. nuts
- 1 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 container Cool Whip

Directions:
- Mix pudding mix and pineapple.
- Add nuts, marshmallows and Cool Whip.

salad_info: pineapple salad ingredient large pineapple chunk drained can mandarin orange drained c mini marshmallow c pecan c cool whip tbsp flour pinch salt c sugar egg beaten direction place juice pineapple double boiler hot add sugar flour salt egg cook thick let cool fold cool whip pudding mixture add fruit nut mix well cover let stand refrigerator least hour
Original_text:
Pineapple Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large can pineapple chunks, drained (save juice!!)
- 2 cans mandarin oranges, drained
- 2 c. mini marshmallows
- 1 c. pecans
- 1 c. Cool Whip
- 2 Tbsp. flour
- pinch of salt
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 2 eggs, beaten

Directions:
- Place juice from pineapple into double boiler.
- When hot, add sugar, flour, salt and eggs.
- Cook until thick and let cool.
- Fold Cool Whip into pudding mixture.
- Add fruit and nuts.
- Mix well. Cover and let stand in refrigerator for at least 2 hours.

salad_info: pasta salad ingredient rotelle provolone cheese cubed hard salami cubed pepperoni cubed large green pepper diced stock celery diced red onion chopped tomato diced bottle kraft zesty salad dressing direction mix ingredient together chill
Original_text:
Pasta Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. (16 oz.) rotelle
- 1/2 lb. Provolone cheese, cubed
- 1/2 lb. hard salami, cubed
- 1/2 lb. pepperoni, cubed
- 1 large green pepper, diced
- 1 or 2 stocks celery, diced
- 1 red onion, chopped
- 2 tomatoes, diced
- 1 (16 oz.) bottle Kraft Zesty salad dressing

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together and chill.

salad_info: chili cheese log ingredient sharp cheddar cheese philly cream cheese room temperature c chopped pecan tsp salt tsp garlic powder tbsp miracle whip salad dressing chili powder direction grate cheddar cheese quart bowl add cream cheese ingredient mix well blended shape small log ball roll chili powder waxed paper refrigerate solid wrap waxed paper reynolds wrap store refrigerator ready serve
Original_text:
Chili Cheese Log

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. sharp Cheddar cheese
- 8 oz. Philly cream cheese, room temperature
- 1/2 c. chopped pecans
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 3/4 tsp. garlic powder
- 3 Tbsp. Miracle Whip salad dressing
- chili powder

Directions:
- Grate Cheddar cheese into a 1-quart bowl.
- Add cream cheese and other ingredients.
- Mix until well blended.
- Shape into small logs or balls.
- Roll in chili powder on waxed paper.
- Refrigerate until solid, then wrap in waxed paper and Reynolds Wrap.
- Store in the refrigerator until ready to serve.

salad_info: ham salad spread ingredient c ham cut inch cube medium onion quartered c celery cut inch piece dill pickle quartered c mayonnaise tsp pepper direction position knife blade bowl add ham process ground second transfer mixing bowl reposition knife blade bowl add onion celery pickle process ground second add ham along mayonnaise pepper mix together
Original_text:
Ham Salad Spread(For Food Processor)  

Ingredients:
- 2 c. ham, cut in 1-inch cubes
- 1 medium onion, quartered
- 1 c. celery, cut in 1-inch pieces
- 1 dill pickle, quartered
- 1/4 to 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1/2 tsp. pepper

Directions:
- Position knife blade in bowl.
- Add ham.
- Process until ground, about 10 seconds.
- Transfer to mixing bowl.
- Re-position knife blade in bowl.
- Add onion, celery and pickle.
- Process until ground, about 10 seconds.
- Add to ham along with mayonnaise and pepper.
- Mix together.

salad_info: fren fruit salad ingredient sweetened condensed milk peach cherry pie filling mandarin orange drained crushed pineapple drained c chopped nut cool whip direction combine milk pie filling add orange pineapple nut fold cool whip spread x inch pan cover freeze remove freezer minute serving cut square serve lettucelined plate
Original_text:
Frozen Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (14 oz.) can sweetened condensed milk
- 1 (21 oz.) can peach or cherry pie filling
- 1 (15 oz.) can mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 2/3 c. chopped nuts
- 8 oz. Cool Whip

Directions:
- Combine milk and pie filling.
- Add oranges, pineapple and nuts.
- Fold in Cool Whip.
- Spread in 13 x 9-inch pan.
- cover and freeze.
- Remove from freezer 15 minutes before serving.
- Cut in squares and serve on lettuce-lined plates.

salad_info: quick easy caesar salad ingredient head romaine green leaf lettuce cucumber sliced box caesar crouton pkg fresh grated parmesan cheese bottle kraft caesar salad dressing purple red onion sliced carton cherry tomato salt pepper taste direction large salad bowl place lettuce cucumber box crouton cheese salt pepper add dressing ready serve salad shake dressing well pour approximately dressing salad add salt pepper taste toss salad well garnish individual serving tomato onion sprinkle cheese top desired
Original_text:
Quick And Easy Caesar Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head Romaine or green leaf lettuce
- 1 cucumber, sliced
- 1 box Caesar croutons
- 1 pkg. fresh grated Parmesan cheese
- 1 bottle Kraft Caesar salad dressing
- 1 purple or red onion, sliced (optional)
- 1 carton cherry tomatoes
- salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- In a large salad bowl place lettuce (torn into bite-size pieces), cucumber, 1/2 box of croutons, 1/2 of cheese, salt and pepper.
- Do not add dressing until you are ready to serve salad. Shake dressing well and pour approximately 1/2 to 3/4 of dressing on salad.
- Add salt and pepper to taste.
- Toss salad well.
- Garnish individual servings with tomatoes and onion.
- Sprinkle cheese on top, if desired.

salad_info: vegetable pizza ingredient pkg refrigerated crescent roll pkg softened cream cheese c mayo tsp dried dillweed tsp buttermilk salad dressing mix c desired topping broccoli pepper mushroom etc c shredded cheddar mzarella monterey jack cheese direction crust unroll crescent roll pat x x inch baking pan bake according package instruction cool
Original_text:
Vegetable Pizza

Ingredients:

- 1 tsp. dried dillweed
- 1 tsp. buttermilk salad dressing mix (1/4 of 0.4 oz. pkg.)

- 1 c. shredded Cheddar, Mozzarella or Monterey Jack cheese (we like to mix several types of cheese)

Directions:
- For crust:
- Unroll crescent rolls and pat into a 15 1/2 x 10 1/2 x 2-inch baking pan.
- Bake according to package instructions. Cool.

Cherry Coke Salad

- 6 oz. cherry Jell-O
- 1 can cherry pie filling
- 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple
- 1/2 c. water
- 1 (12 oz.) can Coca-Cola

- 8 oz. Cool Whip
- 3 oz. cream cheese

Directions:
- Heat to semi-boil the cherry pie filling and 1/2 cup water. Remove from heat. Add Jell-O and stir to dissolve. Add the pineapple, Coca-Cola and the nuts. Pour into 9 x 13 pan and chill.

Seven Layer Salad

- 1 c. chopped onion
- 1 c. chopped pepper
- 2 pkg. frozen peas
- 2 2/3 c. mayonnaise
- 16 slices bacon cooked and crumbled
- 12 oz. shredded cheddar cheese

Directions:
- Place peas in boiling water and boil 1 minute, drain and cool.

salad_info: fruit salad ingredient fruit cocktail crushed pineapple banana mandarin orange drained c raisin c sugar heaping tbsp flour cornstarch egg yolk direction drain fruit pineapple make c juice toss fruit cocktail pineapple banana orange set aside mix sugar flour small amount juice add egg beat add raisin rest juice cook raisin puff mixture thick cool add fruit refrigerate
Original_text:
Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can fruit cocktail
- 1 can crushed pineapple
- 3 to 4 bananas
- 1 can mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 c. raisins
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 heaping Tbsp. flour or cornstarch
- 1 egg yolk

Directions:
- Drain fruit and pineapple to make 1 c. of juice.
- Toss fruit cocktail, pineapple, bananas and oranges; set aside.
- Mix sugar, flour and small amount of juice.
- Add egg and beat.
- Add raisins and rest of juice.
- Cook until raisins puff up and mixture is thick.
- Cool.
- Add to fruit.
- Refrigerate.

Original_text:
Garden Macaroni Salad

Ingredients:
- 3/4 c. mayonnaise
- 1/4 tsp. basil
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. elbow macaroni, cooked
- 1 c. diced celery
- 1/4 c. sliced radishes
- 2 Tbsp. thinly sliced green onion
- 2 medium tomatoes, diced
- 1/4 c. diced green pepper (optional)

Directions:
- Stir together first 3 ingredients.
- Add remaining ingredients; toss.
- Cover and chill.
- Makes 8 cups.

Original_text:
Lime Congealed Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small pkg. lime Jell-O
- 2 c. boiling water
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 1 c. whipped cream or chill canned milk and whip
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1 small can pineapple

Directions:
- Dissolve Jell-O in the water. Cut cream cheese in small pieces.
- Add all other ingredients. Put in refrigerator to congeal.

salad_info: baked spaghetti ingredient ground beef large onion chopped small mushroom bit small tomato sauce small tomato paste tsp salad oil sharp cheddar cheese pkg dry spaghetti mix medium green pepper tomato clove garlic finely chopped salt pepper taste box creamettes spaghetti direction partially cook onion garlic chopped green pepper oil add meat slowly brown slightly add spaghetti sauce mix well add mushroom add tomato sauce paste whole pack tomato partially cook spaghetti broken inch piece salt desired combine spaghetti sauce mixture mix well layer large casserole topping layer grated cheese bake hour
Original_text:
Baked Spaghetti

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. ground beef
- 1 large onion, chopped
- 1 small can mushroom bits
- 1 small can tomato sauce
- 1 small can tomato paste
- 1 tsp. salad oil
- 1/4 to 1/2 lb. sharp Cheddar cheese
- 1 pkg. dry spaghetti mix
- 1 medium green pepper
- 1 lb. can tomatoes
- 2 cloves garlic, finely chopped
- salt and pepper to taste
- 1/4 to 1/2 box Creamettes spaghetti

Directions:
- Partially cook the onion, garlic and chopped green pepper in the oil. Add meat slowly (in bite size bits) and brown slightly. Add the spaghetti sauce and mix well. Add mushrooms.
- Add the tomato sauce, paste and whole pack tomatoes.
- Partially cook the spaghetti which has been broken into 3 to 4-inch pieces.
- Salt, if desired.
- Combine the spaghetti with the sauce mixture and mix well.
- Layer into a large casserole, topping each layer with grated cheese. Bake at 350° for about 1 hour.

Original_text:
Cherry Salad

- 2 small boxes cherry jello
- 1 pkg. lemon instant pudding
- 1 can Thank You cherries, let set (put in 9 x 7-inch cake tin)
- 2 c. hot water
- 1 box Dream Whip

Directions:
- Mix and put on top of jello.
- Let set awhile.

salad_info: layer salad ingredient large head lettuce green pepper diced small red onion diced c celery diced pkg fren pea bacon tbsp sugar grated cheddar cheese c salad dressing direction place first ingredient large salad bowl layer mix together spread cup salad dressing seal ingredient sprinkle tablespoon sugar salad dressing fry pound bacon crisp cool crumble sprinkle top also sprinkle pound grated cheddar cheese cover chill hour
Original_text:
7 Layer Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large head lettuce
- 1 green pepper, diced
- 1 small red onion, diced
- 1 c. celery, diced
- 10 oz. pkg. frozen peas
- 1/2 lb. bacon
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1/2 lb. grated Cheddar cheese
- 2 c. salad dressing

Directions:
- Place the first 5 ingredients
- in a large salad bowl.
- Layer them; do not mix them together.
- Spread over 2 cups salad dressing to seal in the 5 ingredients.
- Sprinkle 2 tablespoons sugar over salad dressing.
- Fry 1/2 pound bacon until very crisp, then cool, crumble and sprinkle over the top.
- Also sprinkle 1/2 pound grated Cheddar cheese.
- Cover and chill for 8 hours.

Original_text:
Chicken Avocado Rice Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 c. cubed avocado
- 2 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1 1/2 c. cubed, cooked chicken*
- 1 1/4 c. cooked Basmati rice
- 1/2 c. finely chopped celery
- 1 tsp. chopped green onion
- 1 tsp. salt
- 2 plus Tbsp. low-fat sour cream
- 2 plus Tbsp. low-fat mayonnaise

Directions:
- * Four small to medium-size breast halves on a plate covered with plastic lid will cook in 5 minutes in microwave.

Jiffy Lime Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small pkg. lime gelatin
- 1 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 c. boiling water
- 1 c. crushed pineapple
- 1 c. cottage cheese
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 1 c. chopped pecans

Directions:
- Dissolve gelatin and marshmallows in boiling water in bowl. Cool.
- Stir in remaining ingredients.
- Pour into 1 1/2 quart mold. Chill until firm.
- Unmold on serving plate.
- Garnish with whipped cream and cherries.

Original_text:
Christmas Cranberry Salad

- 1 c. sugar

Directions:
- Follow directions on gelatin using 2 cups of boiling water and plain gelatin.
- Add sugar.
- Mix to dissolve.
- Add the rest of the ingredients.
- Mix well and chill.

- vegetables.

salad_info: hour salad ingredient crushed pineapple c chopped pecan pkg miniature marshmallow pt whipping cream egg tbsp water tbsp vinegar direction mix marshmallow pecan pineapple large bowl beat egg well add water vinegar cook thick stirring constantly pour pecan pineapple marshmallow mix well whip cream pour mixture blend well chill hour
Original_text:
24 Hour Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (2 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple
- 1 c. chopped pecans
- 1 pkg. miniature marshmallows
- 1 pt. whipping cream
- 1 egg
- 3 Tbsp. water
- 2 Tbsp. vinegar

Directions:
- Mix marshmallows, pecans and pineapple in large bowl.
- Beat egg well.
- Add water and vinegar; cook until thick, stirring constantly.
- Pour over pecans, pineapple and marshmallows.
- Mix well.
- Whip the cream; pour over other mixture.
- Blend well and chill 24 hours.

Original_text:
Taco Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. ground beef
- 1 c. French dressing
- 1 c. sharp Cheddar cheese, grated
- 1 can Ranch Style beans
- lettuce
- tomato
- Doritos
- sour cream
- guacamole salad

Directions:
- Brown meat and add French dressing.
- Simmer for 5 minutes. Drain meat and toss with cheese.
- Heat beans.
- Make salad by layering on lettuce all ingredients desired.
- Serve with Doritos.

salad_info: vegetable salad ingredient head cauliflower medium onion green bean wax bean lima bean kidney bean sweet pickle carrot cup vinegar cup water cup sugar splenda tsp salt tsp turmeric tsp dry mustard direction medium saucepan bring dressing ingredient boil boil minute stirring occasionally combine ingredient pour warm dressing combined vegetable stir together refrigerate overnight longer stir serving may drain serving serf
Original_text:
Vegetable Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head cauliflower (cut up & blanched)
- 1 medium onion (sliced)
- 1 can green beans (drained)
- 1 can wax beans (drained)
- 1 can lima beans (drained)
- 1 can kidney beans (drained & rinsed)
- 4 sweet pickles (sliced)
- 3 carrots (sliced & blanched)
- 1 1/2 cups vinegar
- 3/4 cup water
- 1 1/2 cups sugar or splenda
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. turmeric
- 1/4 tsp. dry mustard

Directions:
- In medium saucepan bring dressing ingredients to a boil & boil for 2 minutes,
- stirring occasionally.
- Combine all other ingredients (vegetables).
- Pour warm dressing over combined vegetables, stir together & refrigerate overnight or longer.
- stir before serving (you may drain before serving.
- Serves 12-18.

salad_info: zucchini bread ingredient egg c salad oil c sugar c grated peeled zucchini c flour tsp cinnamon tsp baking powder tsp soda tsp salt c nut tsp grated lemon rind direction beat egg light add sugar salt oil vanilla mixing well thick add zucchini stir thoroughly sift flour cinnamon baking powder soda add stirring smooth add chopped nut lemon rind bake greased floured loan pan hour oven
Original_text:
Zucchini Bread

Ingredients:
- 3 eggs
- 1 c. salad oil
- 2 c. sugar
- 2 c. grated, peeled zucchini
- 2 c. flour
- 1 tsp. cinnamon
- 1/4 tsp. baking powder
- 1/4 tsp. soda
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 c. nuts (optional)
- 1 tsp. grated lemon rind

Directions:
- Beat eggs until light; add sugar, salt, oil and vanilla, mixing well until thick.
- Add zucchini; stir thoroughly.
- Sift flour, cinnamon, baking powder and soda.
- Add, stirring until smooth.
- Add chopped nuts and lemon rind.
- Bake in 2 greased and floured loan pans, about 1 hour in a 350° oven.

Original_text:

- 1 small container Light 'n Lively cottage cheese
- 1 pkg. strawberry jello
- 1 container Cool Whip

- 1 can pineapple chunks, drain juice

Directions:
- Mix ingredients in order and refrigerate.

Original_text:
Marinated Carrot Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 lb. carrots
- 10 3/4 oz. can tomato soup
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 3/4 c. sugar
- 1/3 c. vinegar
- 1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
- 1 tsp. prepared mustard
- 1 small green pepper, chopped

Directions:
- Clean carrots and cook until tender.
- Cool and combine with remaining ingredients.
- Refrigerate overnight to blend flavors.

salad_info: chicken salad ingredient c cubed cooked chicken tsp lemon juice c mayonnaise tsp salt tsp chopped onion c pimento cut cream chicken soup hardboiled egg c chopped celery water chestnut sliced direction mix ingredient together put x inch pan pam sprayed pan put topping refrigerate overnight remove hour baking bake minute make serving
Original_text:
Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 5 c. cubed cooked chicken
- 2 1/2 tsp. lemon juice
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 1/4 tsp. chopped onion
- 1 c. pimento, cut up
- 1 can cream of chicken soup (don't dilute)
- 5 hard-boiled eggs
- 2 c. chopped celery
- 1 can water chestnuts, sliced

Directions:
- Mix ingredients together.
- Put in a 9 x 13-inch pan with Pam sprayed in pan.
- Put topping over it.
- Refrigerate overnight. Remove 1 hour before baking.
- Bake at 400° for 25 minutes.
- Makes 10 to 12 servings.

salad_info: harry truman salad ingredient head lettuce green onion chopped strip bacon egg beaten c sugar c vinegar tbsp sour cream direction break lettuce large bowl add green onion fry bacon drain crumble pour dripping skillet combine rest ingredient beat well add bacon pour skillet cook thick stirring constantly cool pour lettuce bowl toss serf
Original_text:
Harry Truman Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head lettuce
- 4 green onions, chopped
- 4 strips bacon
- 1 egg, beaten
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 1/4 c. vinegar
- 1 Tbsp. sour cream

Directions:
- Break lettuce into large bowl, add green onions.
- Fry bacon, drain and crumble.
- Pour off drippings from skillet.
- Combine rest of ingredients, beat well.
- Add bacon and pour all into skillet.
- Cook until thick, stirring constantly.
- Cool.
- Pour over lettuce in bowl; toss.
- Serves 4 to 6.

Original_text:
Apple Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 medium apple, cored and chopped
- 1 c. diced cooked chicken
- 2 to 4 Tbsp. regular or light mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. diced green pepper
- 1 tsp. chopped pimento
- dash of dried rosemary, crushed
- dash of lemon pepper
- lettuce leaf
- alfalfa sprouts (optional)

Directions:
- In a bowl, combine apples, chicken, mayonnaise, pepper, pimento, rosemary and lemon pepper.
- Chill until ready to serve. Place lettuce leaf on a serving plate and top with the chilled chicken salad.
- Garnish with alfalfa sprouts if desired.

Original_text:
Tuna Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 cans water packed tuna, drained
- 2 tsp. chopped onions
- 2 Tbsp. chopped bell pepper
- 3 Tbsp. chopped sweet pickles
- 2 Tbsp. chopped celery
- few drops hot Tabasco sauce
- salt and pepper to taste
- 4 to 5 Tbsp. salad dressing to taste
- 1/2 apple, chopped
- 2 tsp. chopped pecans
- 2 Tbsp. grated cheese

Directions:
- Mix ingredients together.
- Makes great sandwiches.
- Add lettuce and tomato to sandwich for extra taste and crunch.

Easy Apple Coffee Cake

- 1 cup granulated sugar

- 2 Tbsp salad oil

- 1 cup firmly packed brown sugar
- 1 tsp ground cinnamon
- 1/3 cup melted butter or margarine
- 1/2 cup chopped walnuts

Directions:
- In a bowl, stir together flour, granulated sugar, baking powder and salt.

Rice Salad

- 8 oz. cream cheese

- 1 large can crushed pineapple

Directions:
- Combine cream cheese, sugar and mayonnaise until smooth.
- Add other ingredients, folding Cool Whip in last.
- Refrigerate overnight before serving.

Original_text:
Cherry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 cans cherry pie filling
- 3 bananas, sliced
- 1 c. salted roasted peanuts

- Mix together and chill.

Original_text:
Bleu Cheese Dip

Ingredients:
- 1 package Hidden Valley Dressing Mix (original DRESSING recipe or buttermilk recipe)
- 1 cup Mayonnaise (Do not substitute salad dressing or Miracle Whip)
- 1 cup buttermilk
- 1 oz. crumbled Bleu Cheese

Directions:
- Mix first ingredients with mixer.
- Add bleu cheese and mix on slow to stir in.
- Great with fries, wings, and terrific on baked potatoes.
- ENJOY!

Original_text:
Oriental Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 Tbsp. lime juice (no sugar added)
- 1 Tbsp. honey
- 1 Tbsp. reduced sodium soy sauce
- 4 C. mixed salad greens
- 6 oz. grilled, skinless, boneless chicken breasts, sliced
- 1 kiwi fruit, pared, halved and thinly sliced

Directions:
- In a small bowl or jar with tight fitting top, combine lime juice, honey, soy sauce. Mix or shake well. Refrigerate until ready to use.

salad_info: savory pot roast ingredient roast cream mushroom soup pkg dry onion soup mix can water medium potato cut fourth medium carrot cut inch piece direction preheat oven quart dutch oven put roast mushroom soup dry onion soup mix water potato carrot put oclock sunday morning ready lunch time come home church change clothes make salad
Original_text:
Savory Pot Roast

Ingredients:
- 3 1/2 to 4 lb. roast
- 1 can cream of mushroom soup
- 1 pkg. dry onion soup mix
- 1 1/2 cans water
- about 6 medium potatoes, cut into fourths
- about 6 medium carrots, cut into 2-inch pieces

Directions:
- Preheat oven to 275°.
- In a 6-quart Dutch oven, put the roast, mushroom soup, dry onion soup mix, the water, potatoes and carrots.
- Put in by 8 o'clock on Sunday morning, and it should be ready for lunch by the time that you come home from church, change clothes and make a salad (4 to 5 hours).

Original_text:
Peach Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large can sliced peaches mashed (Save 1 c. juice)
- 1 large package peach jello
- 1 8 oz. cream cheese

Directions:
- Heat 1 c. juice to boiling. Add jello stir to dissolve. Add to soft cream cheese in blender. Blend until smooth, add mashed peaches, refrigerate until cool and thick. Fold in cool whip. Refrigerate.

Broccoli-Cauliflower Salad

- 2 green onions, chopped
- 2 Tbsp. garlic powder

- salt and pepper to taste
- 1 bunch broccoli
- 1 head cauliflower
- 1 pkg. frozen peas

Directions:
- Mix first 5 ingredients.
- Pour over vegetables that have been cut up in small pieces.
- Refrigerate.

Potato Salad

- 1 envelope Ranch buttermilk salad dressing mix
- 3/4 to 1 c. oil
- 3/4 tsp. lemon pepper
- 1/2 tsp. oregano
- 1/4 tsp. garlic powder

Directions:

- Add spices.
- Pour over crackers.
- Put in warm oven (about 200°) and stir several times.
- Heat about 40 minutes or until dressing is gone.

- 2 c. boiling water

- Add frozen strawberries; stir occasionally until thawed.
- Add pineapple and diced bananas. Pour half into an 8 x 8 x 2-inch pan.

Original_text:
Linda Twelves' Broccoli And Cauliflower Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head cauliflower
- 2 heads broccoli
- 2 bunches green onions
- 1/3 c. sugar
- 1/4 c. white vinegar

Directions:
- Chop together; cauliflower, broccoli and onions.

- Mix.

Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. raw cranberries
- 1 1/4 c. water
- 1 c. sugar
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1 pkg. cherry gelatin
- 3/4 c. chopped celery
- 1/2 c. diced apples
- 1/2 broken nuts

Directions:
- Combine cranberries, water and sugar. Cook until cranberries pop and continue to cook 5 minutes. Pour over gelatin; let cool. Then add celery, apples, nuts and salt. Chill until set.

Original_text:
Cherry Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 small boxes cherry Jell-O
- 3 c. hot water
- 1 can cherry pie filling (Comstock)
- 1 small pkg. cream cheese
- 10 large marshmallows
- 1/2 pt. whipping cream

Directions:
- Mix Jell-O and water.
- Immediately stir in can of cherry pie filling; set until solid.

Original_text:
Snicker Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 Snickers bars, chopped
- 3 apples, chopped
- 12 oz. Cool Whip
- 1 pkg. vanilla pudding

- Mix together.
- Right before serving, fold in 3 chopped bananas.

Original_text:
Mom'S Best Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 medium potatoes, boiled, skinned and cut into chunks
- 1/4 c. diced purple onions
- 5 to 6 hard-boiled eggs
- 1/4 tsp. celery salt
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise with enough wine vinegar added to make it the consistency of heavy cream
- 3 to 4 Tbsp. sugar
- salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- Mix ingredients with wire whisk and add to potato mixture. Mix well.

Original_text:
Spinach Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. fresh spinach, torn
- 4 slices bacon, diced
- 1/4 c. green onions
- 1 c. fresh, sliced mushrooms
- 2 tsp. brown sugar
- 1/8 tsp. dry mustard
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. vinegar
- 1/8 tsp. salt

Directions:
- Place spinach in large salad bowl; set aside.
- Cook bacon in saucepan until crisp.
- Add onion and mushrooms; saute until tender.
- Stir in next 5 ingredients.
- Cook thoroughly until well heated, stirring constantly.
- Pour hot mixture over spinach and toss lightly.
- Serve immediately.

Original_text:
Diane'S Mexican Chicken

Ingredients:
- 1 chicken, boiled and deboned (I just used a pkg. of chicken breasts)
- 2 cans cream of chicken soup
- 1 small jar pimentos
- 1 small can chopped chiles
- 1 small jar jalapeno flavored Cheez Whiz
- 1 bag Doritos

Directions:
- Mix chopped chicken and all of ingredients, except Doritos. Heat.
- Also, add 1/2 can of chicken broth or milk.
- Crush Doritos and pour 1/2 of bag in bottom of long casserole dish.
- Pour heated mixture over chips.
- Top with remaining chips and brown a little in the oven.
- Good served with salad and Ranch Style beans.

Original_text:
Congealed Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. lime jello
- 2 c. boiling water
- 1 c. evaporated milk
- 8 oz. cream cheese
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1 small can crushed pineapple

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in boiling water; cool.
- Blend milk, cream cheese and mayonnaise until smooth.
- Fold in pineapple.
- Pour into pan or mold.
- Refrigerate until firm.

- 2 ears corn
- 2 tsp. finely chopped onion
- 1/2 c. thinly sliced celery
- 2 Tbsp. chopped green pepper
- 1 canned pimiento, cut in strips
- 1/4 c. vegetable oil
- 3 Tbsp. wine vinegar
- 1/4 tsp. salt

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together and serve.

Original_text:
Broccoli-Peanut Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/4 c. mayonnaise
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. Italian dressing
- 2 c. diced, raw broccoli
- 1/4 c. pickle relish, drained
- 1/2 medium onion, diced
- 1 hard-cooked egg, chopped
- salt and pepper to taste
- 1/2 c. roasted peanuts

Directions:
- In a bowl, thin mayonnaise with Italian dressing.
- Add remaining ingredients except peanuts.
- Toss to coat with dressing. Add salt and pepper as needed.
- Sprinkle peanuts over top just before serving.

salad_info: baked chicken salad ingredient c cooked diced chicken slice white bread sliced mushroom drained sliced water chestnut drained c mayonnaise c milk slice velveeta cheese egg beaten tsp salt can cream celery soup direction line buttered x inch pan bread top chicken mushroom water chestnut dot mayonnaise top cheese slice combine egg milk salt pour mix soup spoon cover foil refrigerate overnight bake hour uncover top cup bread crumb brown minute longer substitute turkey ham
Original_text:
Baked Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 4 c. cooked diced chicken
- 6 slices white bread
- 1 (4 oz.) can sliced mushrooms, drained
- 1 (4 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts, drained
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 2 c. milk
- 8 slices Velveeta cheese
- 4 eggs, beaten
- 1 tsp. salt
- 2 cans cream of celery soup

Directions:
- Line a buttered 9 x 13-inch pan with bread.
- Top with chicken, mushrooms and water chestnuts.
- Dot with mayonnaise; top with cheese slices.
- Combine eggs, milk and salt; pour over all.
- Mix soups and spoon over.
- Cover with foil; refrigerate overnight. Bake at 350° for 1 1/2 hours.
- Uncover; top with 1 cup bread crumbs.
- Brown 15 minutes longer.
- Can substitute turkey or ham.

salad_info: hour salad holiday ingredient pt whipping cream whipped pkg cream cheese drained pineapple c mini marshmallow chopped maraschino cherry direction whip whipped cream add cream cheese mix pineapple marshmallow cherry add whipped mixture chill hour
Original_text:
24 Hour Salad "Holiday"

Ingredients:
- 1 pt. whipping cream, whipped
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 1 can drained pineapple
- 3 c. mini marshmallows
- a few chopped maraschino cherries (red or green or both)

Directions:
- Whip the whipped cream; add the cream cheese.
- Mix pineapple, marshmallows and cherries and add to whipped mixture.
- Chill 24 hours.

Original_text:
Chicken Santa Maria

Ingredients:
- 2 Tbsp. olive oil
- 4 green onions, chopped
- 2 garlic cloves, minced (optional)
- 4 skinless chicken breasts, cut in small pieces
- 1 jar marinated artichoke hearts, drained and diced
- 1 c. sweet roasted peppers, diced
- 3/4 c. black pitted olives
- 1 pkg. rotini pasta
- 1/2 c. Parmesan cheese

Directions:
- Cook rotini pasta according to directions on package.
- In olive oil, brown chicken with the onions and garlic until tender. Add artichoke hearts, peppers and olives until heated.
- Drain pasta; toss with Parmesan cheese and combine with chicken mixture. Serve with green salad and crusty (or garlic) bread.

Original_text:
Coke Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. orange Jell-O
- 1 small pkg. cream cheese
- 2 (short) Cokes
- chopped nuts

Directions:
- Cream the Jell-O and cream cheese together. Heat the Cokes to boiling.
- Pour into the creamed mixture gradually.
- Grease molds with butter.
- Put as many chopped nuts into each mold as you wish. Pour the mixture of Jell-O, cheese and Cokes into the molds.
- Let stand 2 hours.
- Place in the refrigerator.
- Serve as other congealed salads.

- Mix well and chill.

- Dump all this together.

salad_info: spicy glazed pecan ingredient c sugar tbsp water scant tsp salt tsp cayenne pepper c pecan half direction preheat oven butter heavy large baking sheet combine first ingredient heavy small saucepan stir medium heat sugar dissolve boil minute add pecan stir pecan coated mixture transfer pecan prepared sheet spreading evenly bake light brown transfer cookie sheet separate pecan fork cool completely great added salad romaine blue chunk vinaigrette dressing
Original_text:
Spicy Glazed Pecans

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 3 Tbsp. water
- 1 scant tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
- 2 c. pecan halves

Directions:
- Preheat oven to 350°.
- Butter heavy large baking sheet. Combine first 4 ingredients in heavy small saucepan.
- Stir over medium heat until sugar dissolves.
- Boil 2 minutes.
- Add pecans and stir until pecans are coated with mixture (about 1 minute). Transfer pecans to prepared sheet, spreading evenly.
- Bake until light brown (13 minutes).
- Transfer to cookie sheet (lined with wax paper) and separate pecans with fork.
- Cool completely.
- Great added to salad with romaine, Blue chunks and vinaigrette dressing.

Tomato French Dressing

- 1 1/2 c. salad oil (Mazola)
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 can tomato soup
- 1/4 tsp. paprika
- 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
- 1 grated onion
- 1/2 tsp. mustard
- 1/2 tsp. pepper
- 1 tsp. salt
- garlic

Directions:
- Mix all together and put in glass jar.
- Shake and mix occasionally.
- Keep refrigerated.

salad_info: super coleslaw ingredient head cabbage large onion large bell pepper c sugar taste c vinegar c salad oil tbsp salt tsp dry mustard tsp celery seed direction shred cabbage bowl next layer shredded onion shredded bell pepper sprinkle sugar cover top stir bring ingredient boil pour cabbage hot refrigerate overnight stir ready serve serf stay fresh crisp day
Original_text:
Super Coleslaw

Ingredients:
- 1 head cabbage (large)
- 1 large onion
- 1 large bell pepper
- 3/4 c. sugar or to taste
- 1 c. vinegar
- 3/4 c. salad oil
- 1 Tbsp. salt
- 1 tsp. dry mustard
- 1 tsp. celery seed

Directions:
- Shred cabbage in bowl.
- Next layer shredded onion and shredded bell pepper. Sprinkle sugar to cover top.
- Do not stir!
- Bring other ingredients to a boil.
- Pour over cabbage while hot. Refrigerate overnight.
- Do not stir until ready to serve. Serves 12.
- Stays fresh and crisp 9 to 10 days.

Original_text:
Corn Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (12 oz.) can whole kernel corn, drained
- 1 small onion, chopped
- 1/2 c. chopped green pepper
- 2 Tbsp. minced parsley
- 2 Tbsp. cider vinegar
- 1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
- dash of pepper

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients in small bowl.
- Refrigerate several hours or overnight.
- Makes 4 to 5 servings.

Cracker Salad

Original_text:
Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 8 pieces breasts, broiled (don't let them dry up)
- 1/2 c. onions, diced
- 4 lemons, squeezed
- 1/2 c. spring onions
- 2 tsp. salt to taste (be careful)
- 1/2 c. fresh coconut, grated

Directions:
- Crush onions with salt; add lemon juice.
- Dice chicken into desired chunks.
- Stir lemon-onion mixture over chicken chunks. Add salt and spring onions.
- Add coconut.
- Add pepper if desired.

Original_text:
Spicy Shrimp

Ingredients:
- 1 to 1 1/2 c. raw, peeled shrimp
- 1/2 stick butter
- 1 onion, chopped
- 1 bell pepper, chopped
- green onion top, chopped
- 1 can cream of mushroom soup
- 1 can cream of celery soup
- 1 small jar sliced mushrooms
- salt and pepper to taste
- Tony's Creole seasoning to taste

Directions:
- Saute onion, green onion and pepper in butter.
- Add soup and 2 cans of water.
- Add mushrooms, shrimp and seasoning.
- Cook until shrimp is done.
- Serve over rice with salad and French bread. (You may add a little cornstarch to make sauce thicker.)

Original_text:
Under The Sea Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (16 oz.) can pear halves
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. lime Jell-O
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1/8 tsp. cinnamon

Directions:
- Drain pears, reserving 3/4 cup syrup.
- Dice pears and set aside.
- Dissolve gelatin in boiling water and add reserved syrup and lemon juice.
- Pour 1 1/2 cups into an 8 x 4-inch loaf pan. Chill until set but not firm, about one hour.

- Add Cool Whip, then marshmallows and nuts.
- Put in mold and refrigerate.

Pistachio Salad

- Mix pudding and milk. Add all other ingredients. Refrigerate.

Tossed Salad

salad_info: mkcs potato salad ingredient cream cheese c pimiento c dill relish c mayonnaise c sour cream c purple onion c celery tbsp lemon juice tsp white pepper tsp salt fresh bacon medium red potato c shredded swiss cheese cheddar cheese direction chop celery purple onion fine cook bacon chop bite size mix first ingredient large mixing bowl let set covered cook ingredient boil medium size red potato skin done slice piece fold mixture together mix well put serving dish top shredded cheddar swiss cheese cover put refrigerator hour serve
Original_text:
M.K.C.'S Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 8 oz. cream cheese
- 1/3 c. pimientos
- 1/4 c. dill relish
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1/4 c. sour cream
- 1/2 c. purple onion
- 1 c. celery
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1/2 tsp. white pepper
- 1/3 tsp. salt
- 1/2 lb. fresh bacon
- 6 medium red potatoes
- 1/2 c. shredded Swiss cheese or Cheddar cheese

Directions:
- Chop celery and purple onion fine.
- Cook bacon and chop up bite size.
- Mix first 11 ingredients in large mixing bowl; let set, covered, as you cook the other ingredients.
- Boil medium size red potatoes with skin on until done, then slice into 4 to 6 pieces. Then fold both mixtures together; mix well.
- Put in serving dish. Top with shredded Cheddar Swiss cheese; cover.
- Put in refrigerator for 6 to 8 hours, then serve.

Italian Potato Salad

- oregano and garlic powder to taste
- 1/2 c. Mazola oil

Directions:
- Dice potatoes, add rest of ingredients.
- Toss lightly.

Original_text:
Pasta Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 box or pkg. rotini garden spirals (tomato, spinach and regular)
- 1/2 c. diced celery
- 2 to 3 boiled eggs, diced
- 1/4 to 1/2 c. diced onion
- 1/4 to 1/2 c. diced green pepper
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. grated sharp cheese
- salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- Cook rotini as directed on package.
- Drain and rinse.
- Set aside to cool.
- Mix after cool the rotini, eggs, celery, onion, pepper and enough Miracle Whip to moisten to your preference.
- Add salt and pepper if you choose.
- After your mixing is finished, add grated cheese and if desired, bacon bits.
- Place in a covered container and let chill.
- This is light and lasts several days.

Original_text:
Golden Cheese Spread

Ingredients:
- 2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
- 1/4 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
- 1/8 tsp. each onion salt, garlic salt and celery salt
- 1 pkg. (8 oz.) cream cheese, softened
- 1/4 tsp. Worcestershire sauce

Directions:
- Make your favorite pizza crust and bake.
- Mix a Ranch style dressing packet according to directions and let chill until spreading consistency, then spread over crust.
- Chop up lettuce, shred carrots, broccoli or cauliflower, tomatoes, mushrooms and whatever other vegetable you prefer.
- Spread in layers on the crust.
- Top with shredded cheese.

salad_info: potato salad ingredient potato bacon c chopped celery small onion egg c milk tbsp sugar tbsp vinegar c mayonnaise c milk tbsp sugar tbsp vinegar salt pepper celery seed direction cook potato bacon bacon cooked stir egg milk tablespoon sugar tablespoon vinegar cook thick stirring constantly pour potato celery onion let cool mix miracle whip milk tablespoon sugar tablespoon vinegar pour cooled potato add salt pepper celery seed taste
Original_text:
Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 lb. potatoes
- 1/2 lb. bacon
- 1/2 c. chopped celery
- 1 small onion
- 2 eggs
- 1 1/2 c. milk
- 3 Tbsp. sugar
- 2 Tbsp. vinegar
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise (Miracle Whip)
- 1/2 c. milk
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 Tbsp. vinegar
- salt
- pepper
- celery seed

Directions:
- Cook potatoes and bacon.
- After bacon is cooked, stir in the eggs, milk, 3 tablespoons sugar and 2 tablespoons vinegar.
- Cook until thick, stirring constantly.
- Pour over potatoes, celery and onion.
- Let cool.
- Mix Miracle Whip, milk, 2 tablespoons sugar and 1 tablespoon vinegar; pour over cooled potatoes.
- Add salt, pepper and celery seed to taste.

Original_text:
Condensed Milk Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can Eagle Brand milk
- 1/4 c. lemon juice
- 1 (9 oz.) carton whipped topping, frozen
- 1 (17 oz.) can fruit cocktail, drained
- 1 (14 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 pkg. nuts (variety and amount desired)

Directions:
- Combine milk and lemon juice.
- Let stand until thickened. Fold in thawed whipped topping.
- Add remaining ingredients. Chill.

salad_info: acorn squash cranberry filling ingredient large acorn squash whole cranberry sauce tbsp honey tsp ground allspice small black bean soaked overnight medium onion chopped seeded green pepper chopped c chopped celery leaf carrot sliced clove garlic chopped sliced tsp oregano bay leaf tsp cumin hot pepper flake taste salt taste direction discard soaking water drain rinse bean add fresh water cover inch add vegetable cumin bay leaf oregano simmer slowly hour tender adding water necessary keep covered liquidy add salt pepper flake end taste serve rice dollop sour cream andor salsa serf main dish side salad side dish fewer serving halve recipe
Original_text:
Acorn Squash With Cranberry Filling(Servings:  4)  

Ingredients:
- 2 large acorn squash (about 2 lb. each)
- 1 (16 oz.) can whole cranberry sauce
- 1 Tbsp. honey
- 1/4 tsp. ground allspice
- 1 lb. small black beans, soaked overnight
- 1 medium onion, chopped
- 1 seeded green pepper, chopped
- 3/4 c. chopped celery with leaves
- 3 carrots, sliced
- 1 clove garlic, chopped or sliced
- 1 tsp. oregano
- 1 bay leaf
- 1/2 tsp. cumin
- hot pepper flakes to taste
- salt to taste (at end)

Directions:
- Discard soaking water.
- Drain and rinse beans.
- Add fresh water to cover 1 1/2-inches.
- Add vegetables, cumin, bay leaf and oregano.
- Simmer slowly 3 1/2 hours or until tender, adding more water as necessary.
- Keep covered.
- Should be liquidy.
- Add salt and pepper flakes at end to taste.
- Serve over rice with a dollop of sour cream and/or salsa.
- Serves 8 to 10 as a main dish with side salad.
- For side dish or for fewer servings, halve recipe.

salad_info: date salad ingredient small carton cottage cheese small crushed pineapple box chopped date c chopped nut c cool whip direction mix together chill
Original_text:
Date Salad

- 1 small carton cottage cheese

- 1/4 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Mix together and chill.

Original_text:
Taffy Apple Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple with juice
- 1 Tbsp. flour
- 1 egg
- 2 Tbsp. cider vinegar
- 1 (8 oz.) container whipped topping
- 4 c. Granny Smith apples, pared and cut into small chunks
- 1 c. dry-roasted peanuts, salted

Directions:
- In a medium saucepan, cook sugar, pineapple with juice, flour, egg and vinegar until thick.
- Cool.
- Fold in whipped topping and apples and 1/2 cup peanuts.
- Pour into serving bowl and garnish with remaining peanuts.
- Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve.

salad_info: sugarfree fruity salad pudding ingredient cream cheese c sour cream lite pkg dream whip tub cool whip lite large box vanilla instant pudding crushed pineapple orange peel cut segment c sliced red grape mixed fruit c pecan piece direction mix dry pudding pineapple juice bowl stir rest fruit set aside combine dream whip mixed box indicates cool whip beat cream cheese add sour cream mix well add package sweetener mix together fold fruit pudding mixture sprinkle nut top chill refrigerator hour overnight
Original_text:
Sugar-Free Fruity Salad Pudding

Ingredients:
- 2 (3 oz.) cream cheese
- 1 c. sour cream lite
- 2 pkg. Dream Whip or 1 tub Cool Whip lite
- 1 large box vanilla instant pudding (sugar-free)
- 1 can crushed pineapple (in its own juice)
- 2 oranges, peel and cut in segments
- 1 c. sliced red grapes
- 1 can (sugar-free) mixed fruit
- 1/2 c. pecan pieces

Directions:
- Mix dry pudding and pineapple with juice in bowl.
- Stir in rest of fruit and set aside.
- Combine Dream Whip mixed as box indicates or Cool Whip.
- Beat in cream cheese.
- Add sour cream. Mix well and add 2 packages sweetener.
- Mix together.
- Fold in fruit and pudding mixture.
- Sprinkle nuts on top.
- Chill in refrigerator, 4 to 5 hours, or overnight.

salad_info: mexican beef spread ingredient bacon c diced pimento canned tomato grated american cheese dried beef c salad dressing direction dice fry bacon crisp combine ingredient except bacon heat oven cheese melt remove stir bacon spread cracker bread
Original_text:
Mexican Beef Spread

Ingredients:
- 1/2 lb. bacon
- 1/2 c. diced pimento
- 1/2 can canned tomatoes
- 1/2 lb. grated American cheese
- 1/2 lb. dried beef
- 1/2 c. salad dressing

Directions:
- Dice and fry bacon crisp.
- Combine all ingredients except bacon.
- Heat in 400° oven until cheese melts.
- Remove and stir in bacon.
- Spread on crackers or bread.

Original_text:
Cherry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can sour cherries (with juice)
- 1 small box cherry Jell-O
- 2/3 c. sugar
- 1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple (with juice)
- 1/2 c. pecans

Directions:
- Put cherries in pan.
- Add Jell-O and sugar.
- Place on stove and let it get good and hot while stirring constantly.
- Take off stove and add pineapple and nuts.
- Pour into dish and refrigerate.

Original_text:
Ice Cream And Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 cans crushed pineapple
- 1 small pkg. lime jello
- 1 pt. vanilla ice cream
- 1/2 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Drain juice from pineapple.
- It should equal 1 cup.
- Bring juice to a boil; dissolve jello in it.
- Add ice cream, pineapple and nuts.
- Pour into mold and let set.

salad_info: sauerkraut salad ingredient pkg sauerkraut small jar pimento c chopped celery c chopped onion chopped green pepper c vinegar c sugar direction bring sugar vinegar boil mix ingredient pour vinegar mixture store jar keep week refrigerator excellent pork side dish
Original_text:
Sauerkraut Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. sauerkraut
- 1 small jar pimento
- 1 c. chopped celery
- 1/2 c. chopped onion
- 1 chopped green pepper
- 1 c. vinegar
- 1 c. sugar

Directions:
- Bring sugar and vinegar to a boil.
- Mix all other ingredients. Pour vinegar mixture over.
- Store in jars.
- Keeps 2 to 3 weeks in refrigerator.
- Excellent with pork or as a side dish.

Original_text:
Colorado Taco Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. ground beef, cooked and drained, cool
- 1 small head lettuce, shredded
- 3 to 4 tomatoes, cubed
- 1 can light kidney beans
- 1 onion, diced
- 1/2 lb. shredded Cheddar cheese
- 1 bag Doritos corn chips
- 1 bottle Thousand Island dressing

Directions:
- Mix first 6 ingredients together and gently fold in Doritos corn chips.
- Gently toss with dressing.
- Garnish with extra cheese and tomatoes.

Original_text:
Family Favorite Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 oz. pkg. lemon Jell-O
- 3 oz. pkg. cream cheese, softened
- 2 Tbsp. salad dressing
- 1 c. crushed pineapple, drained
- 1/2 c. nuts, chopped fine
- 1/2 c. maraschino cherries, halved
- 1/4 c. heavy cream, whipped

Directions:
- Prepare Jell-O according to package directions; allow to set slightly.
- Whip cream cheese and salad dressing.
- Mix well and whip into Jell-O.
- Add pineapple, nuts and cherries.
- Allow to set a few minutes to be sure it is thickening before adding the whipped cream.
- Stir whipped cream into Jell-O mixture.
- Pour into a pretty mold.
- Best to set overnight.

Original_text:
Company Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 pkg. lemon jello
- 1 (No. 2) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 3 bananas, cubed
- 1 egg, beaten
- 1/2 c. sugar
- grated sharp Cheddar cheese
- 3 c. boiling water
- 1 1/2 c. mini marshmallows
- 1 c. pineapple juice
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. flour
- 1/2 pt. whipping cream

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in boiling water.
- Cool and add pineapple, bananas and marshmallows.
- Chill in large Pyrex dish until firm. Heat pineapple juice in top of double boiler.
- Add flour and sugar to beaten egg.
- Mix with juice and cook until thick, stirring constantly.
- Cool and fold in whipping cream.
- Spread over jello. Sprinkle with grated cheese generously.
- Cut in squares and serve.

salad_info: easy macaroni salad ingredient c hellmanns best food real light cholesterol free reduced calorie mayonnaise tbsp vinegar tbsp prepared yellow mustard tsp sugar tsp salt tsp freshly ground black pepper eow macaroni cooked rinsed cold water drained c sliced celery c chopped green red bell pepper c chopped onion direction large bowl combine mayonnaise vinegar mustard sugar salt black pepper add macaroni celery green pepper onion toss coat well cover chill garnish desired make serving
Original_text:
Easy Macaroni Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. Hellmann's or Best Foods real, light or cholesterol free reduced calorie mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. vinegar
- 1 Tbsp. prepared yellow mustard
- 1 tsp. sugar
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/4 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
- 8 oz. elbow macaroni, cooked, rinsed with cold water and drained
- 1 c. sliced celery
- 1 c. chopped green or red bell pepper
- 1/4 c. chopped onion

Directions:
- In large bowl, combine mayonnaise, vinegar, mustard, sugar, salt and black pepper.
- Add macaroni, celery, green pepper and onion; toss to coat well.
- Cover; chill.
- Garnish, as desired. Makes about 8 servings.

salad_info: taco salad appetizer ingredient refried bean large jar taco sauce salsa lettuce tomato chopped fine pkg cheddar cheese shredded large bag tortilla chip direction spread bean thin layer x inch pan spread sauce evenly top bean spread cheese add lettuce tomato sprinkle remainder cheese top use chip scoop
Original_text:
Taco Salad Appetizer

Ingredients:
- 1 (2 lb.) can refried beans
- 1 large jar taco sauce or salsa
- lettuce and tomato, chopped fine
- 1 lb. pkg. Cheddar cheese, shredded
- 1 large bag tortilla chips

Directions:
- Spread beans in a thin layer in 13 x 9-inch pan.
- Spread sauce evenly on top of beans.
- Spread 1/2 of cheese.
- Add lettuce, then tomatoes.
- Sprinkle remainder of cheese on top.
- Use chips to scoop.

salad_info: low cholesterol mayonnaise ingredient medium egg white tsp sugar tsp mustard tsp salt tsp garlic powder tsp white pepper c vegetable oil tbsp white vinegar direction beater bowl beat white sugar salt mustard garlic powder pepper quite foamy slowly begin add cup oil beating high must add oil slowly mixture emulsify add tablespoon vinegar continue beating adding oil high oil used beat last tablespoon vinegar pour covered jar keep refrigerated thickens chilling excellent salad
Original_text:
Low Cholesterol Mayonnaise

Ingredients:
- 2 medium egg whites
- 1/2 tsp. sugar
- 1/2 tsp. mustard
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/8 tsp. garlic powder
- 1/8 tsp. white pepper
- 1 c. vegetable oil
- 2 Tbsp. white vinegar

Directions:
- In beater bowl, beat the whites with the sugar, salt, mustard, garlic powder and pepper until quite foamy.
- Slowly begin to add 1/2 cup oil while beating on high.
- You must add oil slowly or the mixture will not emulsify.
- Now add 1 tablespoon of vinegar. Continue beating and adding oil on high until all of the oil is used.
- Then beat in the last tablespoon vinegar.
- Pour into covered jar and keep refrigerated.
- This thickens more on chilling and is excellent for all salads.

salad_info: ham egg salad ingredient c finely chopped cooked ham c diced celery green pepper minced hardcooked egg chopped tbsp mayonnaise tsp green onion tsp lemon juice tbsp dijon mustard hard roll leaf boston lettuce tsp ground ginger direction bowl mix together ham celery green pepper egg mayonnaise ginger lemon juice mustard stir blend thoroughly divide ham salad evenly spread bottom roll top lettuce top roll
Original_text:
Ham And Egg Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. finely chopped cooked ham
- 1/2 c. diced celery
- 1/2 green pepper, minced (1/2 to 3/4 c.)
- 1 hard-cooked egg, chopped
- 6 Tbsp. mayonnaise
- 1/2 tsp. green onion
- 2 tsp. lemon juice
- 1 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
- 6 hard rolls
- 6 leaves Boston lettuce
- 1/2 tsp. ground ginger

Directions:
- In a bowl, mix together the ham, celery, green pepper, egg, mayonnaise, ginger, lemon juice and mustard.
- Stir to blend thoroughly.
- Divide ham salad evenly and spread on bottoms of rolls.
- Top with lettuce and then with tops of rolls.

salad_info: crab salad ingredient pouch imitation crab meat c chopped celery c softened cream cheese tbsp mayonnaise tsp sliced ripe olive tbsp minced green onion top tsp dill weed direction mix ingredient chill serve crisp lettuce leaf
Original_text:
Crab Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (8 oz.) pouch imitation crab meat
- 1/2 c. chopped celery
- 1/4 c. softened cream cheese
- 2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
- 1 tsp. sliced ripe olives
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. minced green onions with tops
- 1/8 tsp. dill weed

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients.
- Chill and serve on crisp lettuce leaves.

Original_text:
Corned Beef Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. lemon Jell-O
- 1 1/2 c. hot water
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 3/4 c. cottage cheese
- 1/2 c. onions, diced
- 1 c. celery, chopped
- 1 can chopped corned beef

Directions:
- Dissolve Jell-O in hot water. Stir in mayonnaise and let cool. Mix remaining ingredients. Refrigerate until set.

Original_text:
Rice Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. chicken-rice prepared mixture
- 1 large jar marinated artichokes, drained (reserve marinade)
- 1/3 c. mayonnaise
- 1/4 tsp. curry powder
- 12 black olives, sliced thin
- 1 can water chestnuts, chopped
- 1/2 bunch scallions, chopped

Directions:
- Prepare chicken-rice mixture according to package directions. Set aside.
- Mix reserved marinade, curry and mayonnaise.
- Add to rice with all other ingredients.
- Chill overnight.
- Serve on bed of lettuce with tomato garnish.

salad_info: microwave mediterranean cod ingredient small onion garlic clove minced tbsp salad oil medium zucchini tomato sliced mushroom tbsp tomato paste c pitted olive cut half cod halibut steak tsp oregano parsley sprig garnish direction quart casserole cook onion garlic oil high covered minute microwave cut zucchini lengthwise half crosswise inch slice add onion mixture next ingredient cook covered high minute stir add olive cover cook minute tender sprinkle fish steak oregano moisten paper towel place fish steak towel twist corner together cook high minute outer edge fish opaque serve sauce fish plate garnish make main dish
Original_text:
Microwave Mediterranean Cod

Ingredients:
- 1 small onion
- 1 garlic clove, minced
- 1 Tbsp. salad oil
- 1 medium zucchini
- 1 (8 1/4 oz.) can tomatoes
- 1/4 lb. sliced mushrooms
- 2 Tbsp. tomato paste
- 1/2 c. pitted olives, cut in half
- 2 (6 oz.) cod or halibut steaks
- 1/4 tsp. oregano
- parsley sprigs for garnish

Directions:
- In 1 1/2 quart casserole, cook onion, garlic and oil on High, covered, 4 to 4 1/2 minutes in microwave.
- Cut zucchini lengthwise in half, then crosswise in 1/4 inch slices.
- Add onion mixture with next 3 ingredients.
- Cook covered on High 10 minutes.
- Stir once.
- Add olives; cover and cook 5 to 7 minutes, until tender. Sprinkle fish steaks with oregano.
- Moisten 2 paper towels; place fish steak on each towel.
- Twist corners together.
- Cook on High 2 1/2 minutes, just until outer edges of fish are opaque.
- Serve sauce and fish on plate with garnish.
- Makes 2 main dishes.

salad_info: bill chicken salad ingredient frying chicken c sweet pickle relish c miracle whip mayonnaise large egg hardboiled chopped c fresh onion minced finely chopped c chopped celery tbsp dried parsley flake tsp black pepper tsp salad style mustard tbsp cavenders allpurpose greek seasoning c chicken broth direction boil chicken completely tender reserve cup broth remove chicken pot allow cool completely skin bone dice chop small mix ingredient well bowl sealed airtight seal refrigerate least four hour flavor blend
Original_text:
Bill'S Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 frying chicken (about 2 1/2 to 3 lb.)
- 1 c. sweet pickle relish
- 1 1/2 c. Miracle Whip or mayonnaise
- 2 large eggs, hard-boiled and chopped
- 1/2 c. fresh onion, minced or finely chopped
- 1/4 c. chopped celery
- 2 Tbsp. dried parsley flakes
- 1/4 tsp. black pepper
- 2 tsp. salad style mustard
- 1 Tbsp. Cavender's all-purpose Greek seasoning
- 1/4 c. chicken broth

Directions:
- Boil the chicken until completely tender (about an hour). Reserve about 1/4 cup of the broth.
- Remove the chicken from the pot and allow to cool completely, then skin, bone, and dice or chop very small.
- Mix ingredients well in a bowl that can be sealed airtight.
- Seal and refrigerate at least four hours for flavors to blend.

Original_text:
Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 large potatoes
- 1 c. onions
- 1 c. chopped sweet pickles
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1/2 tsp. salt

Directions:
- Peel, quarter and cook; then mash potatoes.
- Chop 1 cup onions and 1 cup sweet pickles.
- Add all the ingredients to the potatoes and mix well.

salad_info: pennsylvania dutch hot salad dandelion dressing ingredient egg c vinegar c sugar c water salt pepper taste strip crisp bacon direction mix egg slightly add sugar vinegar mix water add remaining water mix slightly cook low burner curdle curdle beat use egg two egg thicken flour cornstarch tablespoon egg
Original_text:
Pennsylvania Dutch Hot Salad Or Dandelion Dressing

Ingredients:
- 4 eggs
- 1/4 to 1/2 c. vinegar
- 1 c. sugar
- 3 c. water
- salt and pepper to taste
- few strips of crisp bacon (some drippings can be added for flavor)

Directions:
- Mix eggs slightly.
- Add sugar and vinegar.
- Mix with some water; add remaining water.
- Mix again slightly.
- Cook over low burner so it does not curdle.
- If it should curdle, beat.
- You can use 3 eggs or two eggs and then thicken with flour or cornstarch, 1 tablespoon to an egg.

salad_info: green pepper steak ingredient beef chuck round steak fat trimmed c soy sauce clove garlic tsp ground ginger tbsp salad oil c green onion thinly sliced c red andor green pepper cut inch square stalk celery thinly sliced tbsp cornstarch c water tomato cut wedge direction sharp knife cut beef across grain thin strip inch thick combine soy sauce garlic ginger add beef toss set aside preparing vegetable heat oil large frying pan wok add beef toss high heat browned cover simmer minute low heat
Original_text:
Green Pepper Steak

Ingredients:
- 2 or 3 lb. beef chuck or round steak, fat trimmed
- 1/4 c. soy sauce
- 1 clove garlic
- 1/2 tsp. ground ginger
- 2 Tbsp. salad oil
- 1/2 c. green onion, thinly sliced
- 1 c. red and/or green peppers, cut into 1/2-inch squares
- 2 stalks celery, thinly sliced
- 1 Tbsp. cornstarch
- 1 c. water
- 2 tomatoes, cut into wedges (can be omitted)

Directions:
- With a very sharp knife, cut beef across grain into thin strips, 1/8-inch thick.
- Combine soy sauce, garlic and ginger. Add beef.
- Toss and set aside while preparing vegetables.
- Heat oil in large frying pan or wok.
- Add beef and toss over high heat until browned.
- Cover and simmer for 40 to 60 minutes over low heat.

Original_text:
Broccoli And Spaghetti

Ingredients:
- 1 head broccoli
- 2 Tbsp. salt
- 4 cloves garlic, diced
- 1 lb. thin spaghetti or linguine
- 3 qt. water
- 1/2 c. olive oil
- 1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
- anchovies (optional)
- fried bread crumbs (optional)
- 1 tsp. black pepper

Directions:
- Separate broccoli florets and trim tough skins from stalks; cut up.
- Bring to a boil the water and salt.
- Add broccoli.
- Cook 5 to 8 minutes.
- Add spaghetti, cut in halves.
- Cook until both are al dente.
- Drain.
- Heat olive oil in a pan.
- Add garlic and brown.
- Pour mixture over cooked spaghetti and broccoli.
- Add pepper and cheese.
- Serve with salad and crusty bread.

Snowball Salad

- 2 cans fruit cocktail

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together and chill.

Original_text:
Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 bunches broccoli not cooked cut into bite size pieces
- 12 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled
- 1 medium red onion diced
- 1 c. raisins

Directions:
- Blend all of the above ingredients together.
- Mix
- one cup of mayonnaise, 1/2 cup of
- sugar and 2 Tbsp. of
- white vinegar; and pour over broccoli mixture.

salad_info: hungarian goulash ingredient stew meat onion chopped salt pepper paprika tbsp flour water tbsp oil direction heat oil large pan add beef cube brown side stirring every couple minute add onion chopped continue browning meatonion mixture minute sprinkle flour mix stirring constantly adding water slowly prevent clumping flour season salt pepper paprika sauce spicy simmer slowly hour stirring occasionally serve cooked noodle rice salad
Original_text:
Hungarian Goulash

Ingredients:
- 1 to 2 lb. stew meat
- 1 onion, chopped
- salt
- pepper
- paprika
- 1 to 2 Tbsp. flour
- water
- 1 Tbsp. oil

Directions:
- Heat oil in large pan.
- Add beef cubes, brown them on all sides, stirring every couple of minutes.
- Add 1 onion, chopped. Continue browning meat-onion mixture for a minute or so.
- Sprinkle flour on mix, stirring constantly, adding water slowly to prevent clumping of flour.
- Season with salt, pepper and paprika.
- Sauce should be spicy.
- Simmer slowly for 1 hour stirring occasionally. Serve over cooked noodles or rice with a salad.
- (To ensure tender meat, cover pot during simmering.)

salad_info: watergate salad ingredient crushed pineapple drained pkg instant pistachio pudding mix carton whipped topping small bag miniature marshmallow c chopped pecan direction large bowl combine pineapple dry pudding mix stir whipped topping marshmallow nut mix well spread flat dish refrigerate ready serve serf
Original_text:
Watergate Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 (4 oz.) pkg. instant pistachio pudding mix
- 1 (12 oz.) carton whipped topping
- 1 small bag miniature marshmallows
- 3/4 c. chopped pecans

Directions:
- In large bowl, combine pineapple and dry pudding mix.
- Stir in whipped topping, marshmallows and nuts.
- Mix well.
- Spread into flat dish.
- Refrigerate until ready to serve.
- Serves 6.

Fluffy Pink Salad

- 1 can sweetened condensed milk
- 1 medium size can crushed pineapple, drained
- 8 oz. sour cream
- 1 large carton Cool Whip
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together and chill.

Original_text:
Ginger Ale Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. lime jello
- 1 c. hot water
- 1 c. ginger ale
- 4 Tbsp. chopped celery
- 3/4 c. diced apple
- 1 c. diced pineapple
- 4 Tbsp. nuts

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in hot water.
- Add ginger ale and chill. When slightly
- thickened,
- add
- fruits and nuts.
- Chill until firm.

Original_text:
Apple-Nut Cake

Ingredients:
- 3 c. flour
- 2 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. baking powder
- 1 tsp. soda
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1 1/2 c. salad oil
- 3 eggs
- 2 tsp. vanilla
- 3 c. chopped, peeled and cored apples
- 1 c. walnuts or pecans, chopped

Directions:
- Measure all but last 2 ingredients into large bowl.
- Mix on low speed of mixer, scraping sides of bowl.
- Fold in apples and chopped nuts.
- Spread batter in greased, floured 13 x 9-inch pan. Bake 60 to 65 minutes or until toothpick in center comes out clean in a 350° oven.
- Cool 10 minutes.

Original_text:
Pineapple Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 pkg. Dream Whip*
- 1 (8 oz.) cream cheese
- 1 c. nuts
- 1 large can crushed pineapple, drained
- 3 Tbsp. sugar

Directions:
- *Mix as directed, omit vanilla.

Original_text:
Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/2 gal. cooked potatoes, diced
- 6 boiled eggs, diced
- 1/2 c. pickle relish
- 1 large sweet onion, finely chopped
- 1/2 tsp. celery seed
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 1/2 c. water
- 1/2 stick margarine
- 1 Tbsp. mustard

- Mix potatoes, eggs,
- relish,
- onion
- and celery seed in large bowl.
- Boil vinegar, sugar, water, margarine and mustard in a small pan.
- Add flour and milk mixture.
- Stir continuously until mixture boils
- again.
- Remove from heat and pour over potato mixture; stir well.
