Original_text:
Romaine And Cucumber Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 cucumber, peeled
- 1 romaine lettuce, washed, dried and hand torn
- 3 Tbsp. sour cream
- 1 garlic clove finely sliced
- 1 tsp. chopped chives
- salt and pepper

Directions:
- Slice cucumber in half lengthwise.
- Scoop out seed and pulp. Cut into thin slice.
- In a salad bowl, combine lettuce and cucumber and set aside.
- In a small bowl, mix other ingredients.
- Pour over vegetable.
- Toss lightly.

salad_info: potato salad ingredient medium potato tsp salt tsp pepper c chopped celery tbsp chopped onion tbsp chopped sweet pickle tbsp pickle juice tbsp low calorie italian salad dressing hardcooked egg chopped fine tsp prepared mustard c low oil mayonnaise direction cook potato jacket fork tender peel cut small piece add salt pepper celery onion sweet pickle pickle juice italian dressing egg warm toss lightly chill combine mustard mayonnaise mix carefully potato mixture chill make serving containing calorie
Original_text:
Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 5 medium potatoes
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/4 tsp. pepper
- 1 c. chopped celery
- 3 Tbsp. chopped onion
- 2 Tbsp. chopped sweet pickles
- 2 Tbsp. pickle juice
- 3 Tbsp. low calorie Italian salad dressing
- 2 hard-cooked eggs, chopped fine
- 2 tsp. prepared mustard
- 1/4 c. low oil mayonnaise

Directions:
- Cook potatoes in jackets until fork tender; peel and cut into small pieces.
- Add salt, pepper, celery, onion, sweet pickles, pickle juice, Italian dressing and eggs while warm.
- Toss lightly and chill.
- Combine mustard with mayonnaise and mix carefully with potato mixture.
- Chill.
- Makes 8 servings, containing about 100 calories each.

salad_info: fruit salad ingredient pkg fren strawberry undrained peach pie filling undrained pineapple chunk drained mandarin orange drained banana direction combine first ingredient add banana last minute mix together
Original_text:
Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. frozen strawberries, undrained
- 1 can peach pie filling, undrained
- 1 can pineapple chunks, drained
- 1 can mandarin oranges, drained
- 2 bananas

Directions:
- Combine the first 4 ingredients. Add the bananas at the last minute. Mix all together.

salad_info: banana split salad ingredient large carton cool whip sweetened condensed milk cherry pie filling crushed pineapple drained well banana chopped c nut chopped direction combine cool whip condensed milk bowl beating well fold remaining ingredient chill refrigerator serving time
Original_text:
Banana Split Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large carton Cool Whip
- 1 can sweetened condensed milk
- 1 can cherry pie filling
- 1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained well
- 3 bananas, chopped
- 1/2 c. nuts, chopped

Directions:
- Combine Cool Whip and condensed milk in bowl, beating well. Fold in remaining ingredients.
- Chill in refrigerator until serving time.

salad_info: jello salad ingredient large box apricot jello large cool whip crushed pineapple drained mandarin orange drained medium container cottage cheese direction combine dried jello cool whip add pineapple orange cottage cheese chill
Original_text:
Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large box apricot jello (orange will work)
- 1 large Cool Whip
- 1 can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 can mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 medium container cottage cheese

Directions:
- Combine dried jello in Cool Whip.
- Add pineapple, oranges and cottage cheese.
- Chill.

salad_info: strawberry congealed salad ingredient crushed pineapple large pkg strawberry gelatin cool whip c buttermilk c chopped nut direction combine pineapple gelatin cook dissolved cool add nut buttermilk fold cool whip chill hour serving
Original_text:
Strawberry Congealed Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (8 oz.) crushed pineapple
- 1 large pkg. strawberry gelatin
- 1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip
- 2 c. buttermilk
- 1/2 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Combine pineapple and gelatin.
- Cook until dissolved.
- Cool. Add nuts and buttermilk.
- Fold in Cool Whip.
- Chill 2 hours before serving.

salad_info: orange salad ingredient large box orange jello c hot water small crushed pineapple drained tbsp sugar c mandarin orange drained small fren orange juice box instant vanilla pudding mix c cold milk cool whip direction mix jello hot water add crushed pineapple sugar mandarin orange fren orange juice mix together let mixture set well set beat together vanilla pudding mix milk add cup cool whip spread top congealed salad
Original_text:
Orange Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large box orange jello
- 2 c. hot water
- 1 small can crushed pineapple, drained
- 4 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 c. mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 small can frozen orange juice
- 1 box instant vanilla pudding mix
- 1 c. cold milk
- Cool Whip

Directions:
- Mix jello and hot water. Add crushed pineapple (drained), sugar, mandarin oranges (drained) and frozen orange juice. Mix all together and let mixture set well. When set, beat together vanilla pudding mix and milk. Add 1 cup Cool Whip and spread on top of congealed salad.

salad_info: cranberry salad ingredient cup ground cranberry cup sugar miniature marshmallow pint whipped cream cup drained crushed pineapple direction combine cranberry sugar let stand hour add marshmallow whipped cream let stand hour combine chill add nut desired
Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 cups ground cranberries
- 1 cup sugar
- 3/4 lb. miniature marshmallows
- 1 pint whipped cream
- 1 cup drained crushed pineapple

Directions:
- Combine cranberries with sugar and let stand 2 hours.
- Add marshmallows to whipped cream and let stand 2 hours.
- Combine all and chill.
- Add nuts if desired.

salad_info: strawberry salad ingredient pkg strawberry jello c hot water c chilled pt fren strawberry drained c crushed pineapple drained c nut chopped direction dissolve gelatin hot water cool add strawberry pineapple nut chill firm
Original_text:
Strawberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. strawberry Jell-O
- 1 c. hot water
- 1 c. 7-Up, chilled
- 1 pt. frozen strawberries, drained
- 1 c. crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 c. nuts, chopped (optional)

Directions:
- Dissolve gelatin in hot water; cool.
- Add 7-Up, strawberries, pineapple and nuts.
- Chill until firm.

salad_info: macaroni salad ingredient box macaroni cooked drained chilled small tomato small green pepper sweet pickle small onion direction add ingredient chilled macaroni
Original_text:
Macaroni Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (8 oz.) box macaroni, cooked, drained and chilled (with cold water)
- 1 small tomato
- 1 small green pepper
- 3 or 4 sweet pickles
- 1 small onion

Directions:
- Add ingredients to chilled macaroni.

salad_info: cheesy oven fried fish ingredient fresh white fish fillet egg tbsp olive oil salad oil tbsp grated parmesan cheese tbsp italian seasoned bread crumb paprika salt pepper direction preheat oven cut fish serving size piece spray nonstick cookie pan cooking spray
Original_text:
Cheesy Oven Fried Fish

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. fresh white fish fillets (cod, whiting, sole)
- 1 egg
- 2 Tbsp. olive oil or salad oil
- 5 Tbsp. grated parmesan cheese
- 6 Tbsp. Italian seasoned bread crumbs
- Paprika
- salt and pepper

Directions:
- Preheat oven to 450°.
- Cut fish in serving size pieces. Spray a nonstick cookie pan with cooking spray.

salad_info: california stew ingredient head cabbage white onion green pepper small carrot c cider vinegar tbsp sugar tsp salt pinch pepper c salad oil direction chop mix cabbage onion pepper carrot mix remaining ingredient together pour slaw mixture refrigerate stir occasionally time serve longer slaw fridge better taste
Original_text:
California Stew

Ingredients:
- 1 head cabbage
- 1 white onion
- 1 green pepper
- 2 small carrots
- 1/2 c. cider vinegar
- 3 Tbsp. sugar
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- pinch of pepper
- 1/2 c. salad oil

Directions:
- Chop and mix cabbage, onion, pepper and carrots.
- Mix in remaining ingredients together and pour over the slaw mixture. Refrigerate and stir occasionally, until time to serve.
- The longer the slaw is in the fridge, the better it tastes!

salad_info: parsley ham pasta salad ingredient pkg eow macaroni c ham strip c celery slice c green onion chopped c mayonnaise c white wine vinegar c firmly packed parsley finely chopped c grated parmesan cheese small clove garlic minced tsp salt tsp white pepper direction prepare macaroni according package direction drain add ham strip celery green onion blend together mayonnaise vinegar stir parsley cheese garlic salt pepper toss dressing macaroni mixture cover refrigerate hour blend flavor make serving
Original_text:
Parsley, Ham And Pasta Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (7 oz.) pkg. elbow macaroni (2 c. uncooked)
- 2 1/2 c. ham strips
- 1 c. celery slices
- 1/2 c. green onion, chopped
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1/4 c. white wine vinegar
- 1 c. firmly packed parsley, finely chopped
- 1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
- 1 small clove garlic, minced
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1/8 tsp. white pepper

Directions:
- Prepare macaroni according to package directions.
- Drain.
- Add ham strips, celery and green onion.
- Blend together mayonnaise and vinegar; stir in parsley, cheese, garlic, salt and pepper.
- Toss dressing with macaroni mixture.
- Cover; refrigerate 1 to 2 hours to blend flavors.
- Makes 6 to 8 servings.

salad_info: sinful salad ingredient large pkg strawberry gelatin c boiling water medium banana mashed c chopped pecan pkg fren strawberry thawed crushed pineapple drained pt sour cream direction combine gelatin boiling water stirring completely dissolved cool add fruit nut stir combine pour half gelatin mixture x inch pan refrigerate set hour keep remaining gelatin room temperature spread sour cream evenly set gelatin pour remaining gelatin cover refrigerate set hour overnight
Original_text:
Sinful Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large pkg. strawberry gelatin
- 1 c. boiling water
- 3 medium bananas, mashed
- 1 c. chopped pecans
- 2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen strawberries, thawed
- 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 pt. sour cream

Directions:
- Combine gelatin and boiling water, stirring until completely dissolved.
- Cool.
- Add fruits and nuts; stir to combine.
- Pour half of the gelatin mixture into an 8 x 12-inch pan. Refrigerate until set, about 1 hour.
- Keep remaining gelatin at room temperature. Spread sour cream evenly over set gelatin.
- Pour remaining gelatin over this.
- Cover and refrigerate until set, about 1 1/2 hours or overnight.

salad_info: raspberry jello salad ingredient pkg raspberry strawberry jello c boiling water pkg fren raspberry strawberry large banana mashed c crushed pineapple drained c sour cream direction dissolve jello boiling water stir fren fruit banana pineapple take half mixture place mold x inch pan let set spread sour cream set mixture pour remaining mixture let set
Original_text:
Raspberry Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. raspberry or strawberry jello
- 2 c. boiling water
- 2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen raspberries or strawberries
- 2 large bananas, mashed
- 1 c. crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 c. sour cream

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in boiling water.
- Stir in frozen fruit, bananas and pineapple.
- Take half the mixture and place in mold or 8 x 11-inch pan and let set.
- Spread sour cream over set mixture. Pour remaining mixture over that and let set again.

salad_info: baby food spice pound cake ingredient c flour c chopped nut c sugar tsp salt soda ground clove cinnamon c salad oil egg can strained baby fruit direction mix together flour nut sugar salt soda ground clove cinnamon stir oil egg baby fruit beat bake greased bundt pan hour let cool pan minute invert plate
Original_text:
Baby Food Spice Pound Cake

Ingredients:
- 2 c. flour
- 1 c. chopped nuts
- 2 c. sugar
- 2 tsp. each salt, soda, ground cloves and cinnamon
- 1 c. salad oil
- 3 eggs
- 2 cans strained baby fruit (plums and prunes)

Directions:
- Mix together the flour, nuts, sugar, salt, soda, ground cloves and cinnamon. Stir in the oil, eggs and baby fruit.
- Do not beat. Bake in greased Bundt pan at 325° for about 1 hour.
- Let cool in pan 10 minutes. Invert on plate.

salad_info: banananut salad ingredient pkg jello tsp salt c boiling water c cold water tbsp lemon juice medium banana sliced c celery chopped c pecan chopped direction dissolve gelatin salt boiling water add cold water lemon juice chill thickened fold banana slice celery nut pour cup mold chill firm unmold serve crisp lettuce mayonnaise
Original_text:
Banana-Nut Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. jello (strawberry, raspberry or cherry flavor gelatin)
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1 c. boiling water
- 3/4 c. cold water
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1 medium banana, sliced
- 1/4 to 1/3 c. celery, chopped
- 1/4 c. pecans, chopped

Directions:
- Dissolve gelatin and salt in boiling water.
- Add cold water and lemon juice.
- Chill until thickened.
- Fold in banana slices, celery and nuts.
- Pour into 3 or 4-cup mold.
- Chill until firm. Unmold and serve with crisp lettuce and mayonnaise.

salad_info: colombian salad ingredient c canned drained garbanzo bean c olive oil c lemon juice tsp salt tsp white pepper tsp ground coriander onion sliced thin firm cream cheese crisp shredded lettuce direction mix olive oil lemon juice salt pepper coriander pour lettuce onion olive garbanzo bean chill covered minute place cream cheese freezer minute help firm cut cube refrigerate immediately last minute mix lettuce serf
Original_text:
Colombian Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. canned drained garbanzo beans
- 1/2 c. olive oil
- 1/4 c. lemon juice
- 2 tsp. salt
- 1/4 tsp. white pepper
- 1/2 tsp. ground coriander
- 1 onion, sliced very thin
- 1 lb. firm cream cheese
- crisp shredded lettuce

Directions:
- Mix olive oil, lemon juice, salt, pepper and coriander.
- Pour over lettuce, onions, olives and garbanzo beans.
- Chill covered 45 minutes.
- Place cream cheese in freezer for 30 minutes to help firm it up.
- Cut into cubes and refrigerate immediately.
- At very last minute, mix into lettuce.
- Serves 8.

salad_info: mediterranean cucumber salad ingredient small firm cucumber c plain yogurt tbsp raisin c chopped walnut small onion finely chopped salt pepper taste tbsp chopped mint leaf direction peel cucumber slice lengthwise remove discard seed dice cucumber place bowl add remaining ingredient mix well chill serve cold
Original_text:
Mediterranean Cucumber Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 small firm cucumbers
- 1 c. plain yogurt
- 3 Tbsp. raisins
- 1/4 c. chopped walnuts
- 1 small onion, finely chopped
- salt and pepper to taste
- 1 Tbsp. chopped mint leaves

Directions:
- Peel cucumbers.
- Slice lengthwise.
- Remove and discard seeds. Dice cucumbers and place in bowl.
- Add remaining ingredients and mix well.
- Chill and serve very cold.

salad_info: lime jello salad ingredient pear mashed pkg lime jello pkg cream cheese c nut c whipped cream direction heat pear juice boiling add jello cream cheese keep hot dissolved chill partly set add mashed pear nut whipped cream chill firm
Original_text:
Lime Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (29 oz.) can pears, mashed
- 1 pkg. lime jello (4 servings)
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 1/2 to 1 c. nuts (can be omitted)
- 3/4 to 1 c. whipped cream

Directions:
- Heat pear juice to boiling.
- Add jello and cream cheese.
- Keep hot until dissolved.
- Chill until partly set.
- Add mashed pears, nuts (if desired) and whipped cream.
- Chill until firm.

salad_info: christmas cranberry salad ingredient whole cranberry crushed pineapple c chopped pecan pkg jello envelope plain gelatin orange c sugar c hot water direction mix jello plain gelatin hot water stir dissolved add remaining ingredient put dish mold chill firm
Original_text:
Christmas Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can whole cranberries
- 1 can crushed pineapple
- 1/2 c. chopped pecans
- 1 pkg. Jell-O (lemon, small)
- 1 envelope plain gelatin
- 1 orange
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 2 c. hot water

Directions:
- Mix Jell-O, plain gelatin and hot water.
- Stir until dissolved.
- Add remaining ingredients.
- Put in dish or mold and chill until firm.

salad_info: hot chicken salad ingredient chicken breast cooked deboned salt peppered can undiluted cream chicken soup c diced celery c slivered almond c chopped onion c mayonnaise c crushed corn flake stick oleo direction mix together first ingredient plus cup corn flake mix well put casserole dish mix remaining corn flake oleo sprinkle top bake minute serve warm
Original_text:
Hot Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 4 chicken breasts, cooked, deboned, salt and peppered
- 2 cans undiluted cream of chicken soup
- 1 c. diced celery (uncooked)
- 1/2 c. slivered almonds
- 1/3 c. chopped onion
- 1 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 2 c. crushed corn flakes
- 1/2 stick oleo

Directions:
- Mix together first 6 ingredients plus 1 cup of corn flakes; mix well.
- Put in casserole dish.
- Mix remaining corn flakes with oleo and sprinkle on top.
- Bake at 300° for about 45 minutes. Serve warm.

salad_info: strawberry fruit salad ingredient c hot water pkg strawberry jello pkg fren strawberry lg crushed pineapple mashed banana c chopped nut direction dissolve jello hot water add fren strawberry crushed pineapple banana nut chill refrigerator set alternated layer whipped sweetened cream cheese make parfait
Original_text:
Strawberry Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. hot water
- 2 pkg. strawberry Jello
- 2 pkg. frozen strawberries
- 1 lg. can crushed pineapple
- 3 - 4 mashed bananas
- 1 c. chopped nuts (optional)

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in hot water.
- Add frozen strawberries, crushed pineapple, bananas, and nuts.
- Chill in refrigerator until set.
- Can be alternated with layers of whipped, sweetened, cream cheese to make a parfait.

salad_info: copper penny carrot ingredient carrot medium onion medium green pepper tomato soup c salad oil c vinegar c sugar tsp worcestershire tsp salt dash pepper tsp celery seed tsp prepared mustard direction slice carrot cook forktender drain cool add medium onion green pepper sliced
Original_text:
Copper Penny Carrots

Ingredients:
- 2 lb. carrots
- 2 medium onions
- 2 medium green peppers
- 1 can tomato soup
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 3/4 c. vinegar
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. Worcestershire
- 1 tsp. salt
- dash of pepper
- 1 tsp. celery seed
- 1 tsp. prepared mustard

Directions:
- Slice carrots and cook until fork-tender.
- Drain and cool. Add 2 medium onions and green peppers, sliced.

salad_info: cold cornbread salad ingredient pkg cornbread mix prepared directed green pepper chopped c celery diced medium onion chopped slice bacon cooked crumbled tomato chopped c salad dressing salt pepper taste direction crumble cornbread salt pepper taste add onion green pepper celery bacon stir tomato serving add salad dressing
Original_text:
Cold Cornbread Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. cornbread mix, prepared as directed
- 1 green pepper, chopped
- 1/3 c. celery, diced
- 1 medium onion, chopped
- 8 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled
- 2 tomatoes, chopped
- 1 c. salad dressing
- salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- Crumble cornbread; salt and pepper to taste.
- Add onions, green pepper, celery and bacon.
- Stir in tomatoes just before serving, then add salad dressing.

salad_info: cucumber salad ingredient cucumber tsp salt tbsp vinegar tbsp water tbsp sugar pinch pepper direction wash slice cucumber finely sprinkle salt place marinade previously prepared boiling vinegar water sugar pepper together allowing cool leave cold place two hour serving
Original_text:
Cucumber Salad(Agurkesalat)  

Ingredients:
- 1 to 2 cucumbers
- 3 tsp. salt
- 2 Tbsp. vinegar
- 2 Tbsp. water
- 1 Tbsp. sugar
- pinch of pepper

Directions:
- Wash and slice the cucumber finely.
- Sprinkle with salt.
- Place in a marinade previously prepared by boiling the vinegar, water, sugar and pepper together and allowing to cool.
- Leave in a cold place for about two hours before serving.

salad_info: fat free vegetable salad ingredient large tomato bunch broccoli bunch cauliflower medium red onion cucumber squash medium bell pepper direction cut vegetable desired size cover kraft fatfree italian dressing cover dish tightly put refrigerator marinate keep well approximately week
Original_text:
Fat Free Vegetable Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large tomato
- 1 bunch broccoli
- 1 bunch cauliflower
- 1 medium red onion
- 2 cucumbers
- 2 squash
- 1 medium bell pepper

Directions:
- Cut all vegetables in desired size and cover with Kraft fat-free Italian dressing.
- Cover dish tightly and put in refrigerator to marinate.
- Keeps well for approximately a week.

salad_info: pistachio pudding pineapple salad ingredient c whipped cream crushed pineapple drained c small marshmallow pkg instant pistachio pudding direction stir together whipped cream pudding mix add pineapple marshmallow mix chill
Original_text:
Pistachio Pudding Pineapple Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. whipped cream
- 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 2 c. small marshmallows
- 1 pkg. instant pistachio pudding

Directions:
- Stir together whipped cream and pudding mix.
- Add pineapple and marshmallows.
- Mix and chill.

salad_info: paradise salad ingredient cherry pie filling crushed pineapple drained eagle brand cool whip c chopped pecan direction mix ingredient together refrigerate least hour serving best refrigerated overnight
Original_text:
Paradise Salad

Ingredients:
- 20 oz. can cherry pie filling
- 20 oz. can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 can Eagle Brand
- 12 oz. Cool Whip
- 1/2 c. chopped pecans

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together. Refrigerate at least 3 or 4 hours before serving. Best if refrigerated overnight.

salad_info: asparagus tomato salad ingredient fresh asparagus spear cooked drained c mayonnaise tsp salt tsp lemon juice medium tomato peeled diced tsp pepper direction keep asparagus hot small saucepan combine mayonnaise lemon juice salt pepper stir low heat heated stir tomato heat serve asparagus
Original_text:
Asparagus Tomato Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 lb. fresh asparagus spears, cooked and drained
- 1/3 c. mayonnaise
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1 1/4 tsp. lemon juice
- 1 medium tomato, peeled and diced
- 1/4 tsp. pepper

Directions:
- Keep asparagus hot.
- In a small saucepan, combine mayonnaise, lemon juice, salt and pepper.
- Stir over low heat until heated through.
- Stir in tomato; heat through.
- Serve over asparagus.

salad_info: spinach dip ingredient pkg hidden valley ranch salad dressing pkg green giant cream spinach c mayonnaise sour cream cream cheese c shredded cheddar cheese bunch green onion chopped direction let spinach thaw cream cheese soften mix ingredient together refrigerate ready serve
Original_text:
Spinach Dip

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. Hidden Valley Ranch salad dressing
- 1 pkg. Green Giant cream spinach (frozen)
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 (8 oz.) sour cream
- 1 (8 oz.) cream cheese
- 1 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
- 1/2 bunch green onions, chopped

Directions:
- Let spinach thaw and cream cheese soften. Mix all ingredients together. Refrigerate until ready to serve.

salad_info: tropical turkey salad ingredient turkey cooked diced c diet pineapple tidbit c carrot shredded c celery chopped tbsp plain yogurt tsp mayonnaise tsp curry powder tsp garlic powder direction combine first four ingredient bowl mix remaining ingredient use dressing turkey toss gently serf
Original_text:
Tropical Turkey Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 oz. turkey, cooked and diced
- 1 c. diet pineapple tidbits
- 1/2 c. carrot, shredded
- 1/4 c. celery, chopped
- 2 Tbsp. plain yogurt
- 2 tsp. mayonnaise
- 1/4 tsp. curry powder
- 1/8 tsp. garlic powder

Directions:
- Combine first four ingredients in a bowl.
- Mix remaining ingredients to use as a dressing for the turkey.
- Toss gently. Serves 2.

salad_info: strawberry salad ingredient pkg strawberry jello c boiling water pkg fren strawberry thawed large crushed pineapple drained medium banana mashed c chopped pecan pt sour cream direction combine gelatin water large bowl stirring dissolved fold strawberry juice add drained pineapple nut banana mix well turn half mix x inch dish refrigerate firm leave spread top first mix sour cream spread rest strawberry mix refrigerate
Original_text:
Strawberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 pkg. strawberry jello
- 2 c. boiling water
- 2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen strawberries, thawed (do not drain)
- 1 large can crushed pineapple, drained
- 3 medium bananas, mashed
- 1 c. chopped pecans
- 1 pt. sour cream

Directions:
- Combine gelatin with water in large bowl, stirring until dissolved.
- Fold in strawberries with juice.
- Add drained pineapple, nuts and bananas, all at once.
- Mix well.
- Turn half of mix into a 12 x 8-inch dish.
- Refrigerate until firm.
- Leave other out.
- Spread top of first mix with sour cream.
- Then spread on rest of strawberry mix.
- Refrigerate.

salad_info: cheese salad ingredient small crushed pineapple small glass pimento cheese spread c miniature marshmallow small container cool whip direction mix pineapple cheese marshmallow together fold cool whip serve either salad dessert
Original_text:
Cheese Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small can crushed pineapple
- 1 small glass pimento cheese spread
- 1 1/2 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 small container Cool Whip

Directions:
- Mix pineapple (not drained), cheese and marshmallows together. Fold into Cool Whip.
- Serve either as salad or dessert.

salad_info: mary chicken cacciatori ingredient frying chicken cut tbsp shortening mushroom small green pepper sliced tomato medium onion sliced c water direction fry chicken shortening hour low heat use electric skillet coat chicken flour mix mushroom green pepper tomato onion water pour chicken simmer hour basting often serve potato noodle salad
Original_text:
Mary'S Chicken Cacciatori

Ingredients:
- 1 frying chicken, cut up
- 2 Tbsp. shortening
- 1 can mushrooms
- 1 small green pepper, sliced
- 1 can tomatoes
- 1 medium onion, sliced
- 1 c. water

Directions:
- Fry chicken in shortening for 1 hour on low heat.
- Use electric skillet.
- Do not coat chicken with flour.
- Mix mushrooms, green pepper, tomatoes, onion and water.
- Pour over chicken.
- Simmer 1/2 hour, basting often.
- Serve with potatoes or noodles and salad.

salad_info: chicken artichoke spinach casserole ingredient artichoke pkg fren chopped spinach chicken breast half cream chicken soup c hellmanns mayonnaise tbsp lemon juice tsp curry c sharp cheese grated c bread crumb tbsp butter direction cook chicken breast seasoned water remove bone skin pull bone buttered casserole layer artichoke spinach chicken piece evenly distributed bite size piece combine soup lemon juice curry powder spread top sprinkle cheese top bread crumb dot butter bake minute bubble heat thoroughly serve rice cooked consomme bouillon fruit tossed salad serf
Original_text:
Chicken, Artichoke And Spinach Casserole

Ingredients:
- 1 can artichokes
- 1 pkg. frozen chopped spinach
- 3 chicken breast halves
- 1 can cream of chicken soup
- 1/2 c. Hellmann's mayonnaise
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1 tsp. curry
- 3/4 c. sharp cheese, grated
- 1/2 c. bread crumbs (Progresso seasoned)
- 2 Tbsp. butter

Directions:
- Cook chicken breasts in seasoned water (celery, salt and pepper).
- Remove from bone and skin.
- Pull from bone.
- In buttered casserole (11 x 7 x 2-inch), layer artichokes, spinach (which has been thawed, drained and squeezed) and chicken pieces evenly distributed in bite size pieces.
- Combine soup, lemon juice and curry powder and spread on top.
- Sprinkle cheese over and top with bread crumbs.
- Dot with butter.
- Bake at 350° for 20 to 25 minutes until bubbles and heats thoroughly. Serve with rice cooked with consomme or bouillon, fruit or tossed salad.
- Serves 6.

salad_info: btl bite ingredient cherry tomato bacon cooked crumbled c mayonnaise salad dressing c chopped green onion tbsp grated parmesan cheese tbsp snipped fresh parsley direction cut thin slice tomato top scoop discard pulp invert tomato paper towel drain
Original_text:
B.T.L.  Bites

Ingredients:
- 16 to 20 cherry tomatoes
- 1 lb. bacon, cooked and crumbled
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
- 1/3 c. chopped green onions
- 3 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
- 2 Tbsp. snipped, fresh parsley

Directions:
- Cut a thin slice off each tomato top; scoop out and discard pulp.
- Invert the tomatoes on a paper towel to drain.

salad_info: corned beef congealed salad ingredient small pkg lemon jello beef bouillon cube c boiling water hardboiled egg chopped c celery chopped small onion chopped c mayonnaise dash worcestershire sauce corned beef direction dissolve jello bouillon cube boiling water let cool add remaining ingredient mix well pour oiled mold
Original_text:
Corned Beef Congealed Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small pkg. lemon Jell-O
- 1 beef bouillon cube
- 1 c. boiling water
- 3 hard-boiled eggs, chopped
- 1 c. celery, chopped
- 1 small onion, chopped
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- dash of Worcestershire sauce
- 12 oz. can corned beef

Directions:
- Dissolve Jell-O and bouillon cube in boiling water.
- Let cool. Add remaining ingredients.
- Mix well and pour into oiled mold (butter or margarine).

salad_info: three veggie salad ingredient cucumber peeled sliced tomato chopped onion sliced fresh green onion green pepper sliced italian dressing direction combine veggie bowl pour bottle italian dressing chill
Original_text:
Three Veggie Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 to 3 cucumbers, peeled and sliced
- 1 tomato, chopped
- 1/2 onion, sliced or fresh green onion
- 1 green pepper, sliced
- Italian dressing

Directions:
- Combine all veggies in a bowl.
- Pour 1/2 bottle Italian dressing.
- Chill.

salad_info: heavenly hash ingredient c miniature marshmallow fruit cocktail drained small cool whip thawed partially direction mix chill use salad dessert may add cup pineapple chunk cup coconut
Original_text:
Heavenly Hash

Ingredients:
- 1 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 (16 oz.) can fruit cocktail, drained
- 1 small Cool Whip, thawed partially

Directions:
- Mix and chill.
- Can use for salad or dessert.
- May add 1 cup pineapple chunks and 1 cup coconut.

salad_info: fatfree pasta salad ingredient box ruffle pasta onion small bag fren pea cucumber green pepper c sliced carrot cauliflower c celery c broccoli direction boil pasta tender drain cool put large bowl lid add chopped onion fren pea cucumber green pepper head cauliflower cup celery cup broccoli cup carrot add together mix well serve fatfree cracker dressing filling meal fat maybe little pasta last week
Original_text:
Fat-Free Pasta Salad(Use Fat-Free Honey Dijon, Ranch Or Italian Dressing)  

Ingredients:
- 1 box Ruffles pasta
- 1 onion (1/2 c.)
- 1 small bag frozen peas
- 2 cucumbers
- 1 green pepper
- 2 c. sliced carrots
- 1 cauliflower (head)
- 1 c. celery
- 2 c. broccoli

Directions:
- Boil pasta until tender.
- Drain, cool and put into very large bowl with lid.
- Add chopped up onion, frozen peas (do not cook), cucumbers (cut into cubes), green pepper (chopped), 1 head cauliflower, 1 cup celery, 2 cups broccoli and 2 cups carrots.
- (I steam my carrots a little.)
- Add all this together; mix well. Serve with fat-free crackers and dressing.
- Very filling meal. Only fat is maybe a little in pasta.
- Lasts all week.

salad_info: celery seed dressing ingredient c sugar dash salt tsp celery seed tsp dry mustard tbsp finely chopped onion c vinegar c oil direction blend blender make pint good heated used spinach salad
Original_text:
Celery Seed Dressing

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. sugar
- dash of salt
- 2 tsp. celery seed
- 1 tsp. dry mustard
- 2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
- 1/3 c. vinegar
- 1 c. oil

Directions:
- Blend in a blender.
- Makes 1 pint.
- This is very good heated and used over a spinach salad.

salad_info: fruit salad ingredient pineapple tidbit drained peach slice drained mandarin orange drained medium banana sliced medium apple cored chopped small pkg instant vanilla pudding c milk small orange juice concentrate c sour cream direction combine fruit set aside combine pudding milk orange juice beat beat sour cream blend mixture fruit chill serf
Original_text:
Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (20 oz.) can pineapple tidbits, drained
- 1 (16 oz.) peach slices, drained
- 1 (11 oz.) can mandarin oranges, drained
- 3 medium bananas, sliced
- 2 medium apples, cored and chopped
- 1 small pkg. instant vanilla pudding
- 1 1/2 c. milk
- 1/2 small can orange juice concentrate
- 3/4 c. sour cream

Directions:
- Combine fruit and set aside.
- Combine pudding, milk, orange juice and beat.
- Beat in sour cream.
- Blend mixture into fruit and chill.
- Serves 10.

salad_info: raisin bran muffin ingredient kellogg raisin bran cereal c sugar c plain flour tsp soda tsp salt egg beaten c salad oil tbsp apple pie spice tbsp vanilla qt buttermilk c pecan direction mix dry ingredient huge bowl add liquid beaten egg mix well store sealed covered container refrigerator week bake greased muffin tin sprayed cooking spray fill full bake minute dont overcook freeze well good
Original_text:
Raisin Bran Muffins

Ingredients:
- 1 (15 oz.) Kellogg's Raisin Bran cereal
- 3 c. sugar
- 5 c. plain flour
- 5 tsp. soda
- 2 tsp. salt
- 4 eggs, beaten
- 1 c. salad oil
- 1 Tbsp. apple pie spice
- 2 Tbsp. vanilla
- 1 qt. buttermilk
- 2 c. pecans

Directions:
- Mix all dry ingredients in a huge bowl.
- Add the liquids and beaten eggs and mix well.
- You can store in a sealed covered container in refrigerator for up to 6 weeks.
- Bake in greased muffin tins sprayed with cooking spray.
- Fill 2/3 full and bake at 400° for 15 to 18 minutes.
- Don't overcook.
- These freeze well.
- These are very good.

salad_info: orange sherbet salad ingredient box orange jello c hot water pt orange sherbet small mandarin orange small crushed pineapple direction drain mandarin orange crushed pineapple dissolve jello hot water add sherbet stir dissolved add mandarin orange pineapple
Original_text:
Orange Sherbet Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 boxes orange Jell-O
- 1 1/2 c. hot water
- 1 pt. orange sherbet
- 1 small can mandarin oranges
- 1 small can crushed pineapple

Directions:
- Drain mandarin oranges and crushed pineapple.
- Dissolve Jell-O in hot water; add sherbet.
- Stir until dissolved.
- Add mandarin oranges and pineapple.

salad_info: best ever kraut salad ingredient can sauerkraut c diced celery c diced green pepper c diced pimento c chopped onion c water c vinegar c vegetable oil c sugar direction combine first ingredient mix well heat water vinegar oil sugar sugar dissolved pour kraut mixture mix well chill
Original_text:
Best Ever Kraut Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 (No. 303) cans sauerkraut
- 1 c. diced celery
- 1 c. diced green pepper
- 1/2 c. diced pimento
- 1 c. chopped onions
- 1/3 c. water
- 2/3 c. vinegar
- 1/3 c. vegetable oil
- 1 1/4 c. sugar

Directions:
- Combine first 5 ingredients and mix well.
- Heat water, vinegar, oil and sugar until sugar is dissolved.
- Pour over kraut mixture and mix well.
- Chill.

salad_info: kraut salad ingredient chopped sauerkraut drained c wesson oil c vinegar c sugar c green pepper diced c celery diced onion chopped direction combine oil vinegar sugar bring boil remove heat pour remaining ingredient refrigerate overnight delicious long last
Original_text:
Kraut Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (27 oz.) can chopped sauerkraut, drained
- 1/2 c. Wesson oil
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 1 c. green pepper, diced
- 1 c. celery, diced
- 1 onion, chopped

Directions:
- Combine
- oil,
- vinegar
- and
- sugar and bring to a boil. Remove from heat and pour over remaining ingredients.
- Refrigerate overnight.
- Will be delicious as long as it lasts.

salad_info: mandarin orange salad ingredient mandarin orange drained crushed pineapple drained carton cool whip small pkg orange jello carton cottage cheese direction mix jello cottage cheese add remaining ingredient one time mix well chill
Original_text:
Mandarin Orange Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 (8 oz.) carton Cool Whip
- 1 small pkg. orange Jell-O
- 1 (12 oz.) carton cottage cheese (small curd)

Directions:
- Mix Jell-O and cottage cheese.
- Add remaining ingredients, one at a time.
- Mix well and chill.

salad_info: poppy seed cake ingredient pkg duncan hines yellow cake mix pkg instant vanilla pudding mix egg c dry sherry c buttermilk c salad oil c poppy seed direction preheat oven grease flour bundt pan mix ingredient large bowl beat smooth pour prepared pan bake minute cool remove pan sprinkle powdered sugar
Original_text:
Poppy Seed Cake

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. Duncan Hines yellow cake mix
- 1 pkg. instant vanilla pudding mix
- 4 eggs
- 1/2 c. dry sherry
- 1 c. buttermilk
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 1/3 c. poppy seed

Directions:
- Preheat oven to 350°.
- Grease and flour a Bundt pan.
- Mix all ingredients in a large bowl.
- Beat until smooth.
- Pour into prepared pan.
- Bake at 350° for about 40 to 50 minutes.
- Cool. Remove from pan.
- Sprinkle with powdered sugar.

salad_info: pineapple horseradish salad ingredient pkg lemon jello pkg lime jello c hot water pkg cream cheese scant c salad dressing tsp horseradish c pineapple direction cream cream cheese salad dressing together smooth add horseradish crushed pineapple combine jello hot water add cream cheese mixture let set serve lettuce leaf
Original_text:
Pineapple Horseradish Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. lemon jello
- 1 pkg. lime jello
- 3 c. hot water
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 1 scant c. salad dressing
- 3 tsp. horseradish
- 1 c. pineapple

Directions:
- Cream the cream cheese and salad dressing together until smooth.
- Add horseradish and crushed pineapple.
- Combine jello and hot water and add to cream cheese mixture.
- Let set.
- Serve on lettuce leaf.

salad_info: apple celery salad ingredient tart apple pared cored diced c celery sliced c mayonnaise dash allspice c walnut chopped tsp sugar tsp lemon juice direction combine apple celery walnut blend together mayonnaise sugar allspice tossing lightly mix chill serve
Original_text:
Apple Celery Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 tart apples, pared, cored and diced
- 1 1/2 c. celery, sliced
- 1/4 c. mayonnaise
- dash of allspice
- 1/2 c. walnuts, chopped
- 2 tsp. sugar
- 1 tsp. lemon juice

Directions:
- Combine apples, celery and walnuts. Blend together mayonnaise, sugar and allspice, tossing lightly to mix.
- Chill and serve.

salad_info: ham rollups ingredient pkg sliced boiled ham pkg cream cheese softened ranch salad dressing direction mix cream cheese enough ranch dressing make spreadable spread thin layer ham roll lengthwise chill minute slice bite size pinwheel skewer toothpick serve excellent type cracker
Original_text:
Ham Roll-Ups

Ingredients:
- 1 (12 oz.) pkg. sliced, boiled ham
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
- Ranch salad dressing

Directions:
- Mix the cream cheese with enough Ranch dressing to make it spreadable.
- Spread a thin layer on the ham and roll it up lengthwise.
- Chill for about 30 minutes and then slice into bite size pinwheels and skewer with a toothpick, then serve.
- This is excellent with most any type of cracker.

salad_info: cottage cheese jello salad ingredient cottage cheese pkg orange jello crushed pineapple drained mandarin orange cool whip direction mix together refrigerate least hour
Original_text:
Cottage Cheese Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (8 oz.) cottage cheese
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. orange jello
- 1 can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 can mandarin oranges
- 6 oz. Cool Whip

Directions:
- Mix together.
- Refrigerate at least 2 hours.

salad_info: special strawberry salad ingredient box strawberry jello box fren strawberry small crushed pineapple c dairy sour cream direction dissolve jello cup boiling water add pineapple strawberry chill place mixture bowl spread sour cream mixture set add remaining jello mixture chill several hour overnight
Original_text:
Special Strawberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 boxes strawberry Jell-O
- 1 box frozen strawberries
- 1 small can crushed pineapple
- 1 c. dairy sour cream

Directions:
- Dissolve Jell-O in 1 cup boiling water.
- Add pineapple and strawberries.
- Chill.
- Place 1/2 the mixture into a bowl.
- Spread sour cream over mixture that has set.
- Add remaining Jell-O mixture and chill several hours or overnight.

salad_info: sausagespinach pie ingredient loose sausage meat egg pkg fren spinach thawed drained grated mzarella cheese c ricotta cheese tsp salt tsp pepper clove garlic crushed pie crust crust direction cook sausage meat mediumheat skillet browned minute stir often spoon fat reserve egg yolk large bowl combine remaining egg sausage meat spinach mzarella cheese ricotta cheese salt pepper garlic prepare pie crust inch pie pan spoon meat mixture shell roll top crust put filling pie shell make steam vent top shell brush top egg yolk tablespoon water bake hour golden let stand minute cut great salad
Original_text:
Sausage-Spinach Pie

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. Loose It sausage meat
- 6 eggs
- 2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen spinach, thawed and drained (you can also use fresh)
- 1 lb. grated Mozzarella cheese
- 2/3 c. Ricotta cheese
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/8 tsp. pepper
- 2 to 3 cloves garlic, crushed
- pie crust for 2 crusts

Directions:
- Cook sausage meat over medium-heat in skillet until browned, 10 minutes.
- Stir often; spoon off fat.
- Reserve 1 egg yolk.
- In a large bowl, combine remaining eggs, sausage meat, spinach, Mozzarella cheese, Ricotta cheese, salt, pepper and garlic. Prepare pie crust in a 9 or 10-inch pie pan.
- Spoon meat mixture into shell.
- Roll out top crust and put over filling in pie shell. Make steam vent in top shell.
- Brush top with egg yolk and 1 tablespoon water.
- Bake at 375° for 1 1/4 hours, until golden. Let stand 10 minutes.
- Cut.
- Great with a salad.

salad_info: raspberrynut salad ingredient pkg raspberry jello pkg fren raspberry crushed pineapple c boiling water c chopped walnut direction dissolve jello boiling water fold fren berry add pineapple nut pour bowl refrigerate
Original_text:
Raspberry-Nut Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. raspberry Jell-O
- 2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen raspberries
- 1 (No. 2) can crushed pineapple
- 1 1/2 c. boiling water
- 1 c. chopped walnuts

Directions:
- Dissolve Jell-O in boiling water.
- Fold in frozen berries; add pineapple and nuts.
- Pour in bowl and refrigerate.

salad_info: dressing fruit salad ingredient egg stick margarine c pineapple juice tsp salt c sugar tsp flour pt whipping cream direction beat egg boiler add sugar salt margarine fruit juice flour cook thick stirring constantly ready serve whip cream stir mixture use mixed fruit make quart keep week refrigerator also used dip fruit
Original_text:
Dressing For Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 eggs
- 1 stick margarine
- 1/2 c. pineapple juice
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1 c. sugar
- 4 tsp. flour
- 1/2 pt. whipping cream

Directions:
- Beat eggs in boiler.
- Add sugar, salt, margarine, fruit juice and flour.
- Cook until thick, stirring constantly; when ready to serve, whip the cream and stir into mixture.
- Use over mixed fruit.
- This makes a quart and will keep a week in the refrigerator.
- Can also be used as a dip for fruit.

salad_info: hearty tuna salad ingredient pkg fren italian green bean regular tuna drained flaked c thinly sliced celery c mayonnaise salad dressing tbsp lemon juice tsp soy sauce dash garlic powder small chow mein noodle lettuce cup direction cook bean drain cool combine bean flaked tuna sliced celery mayo lemon juice soy sauce garlic powder chill serving add chow mein noodle tuna mixture toss lightly serve lettuce cup
Original_text:
Hearty Tuna Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen Italian green beans or regular
- 1 (6 1/2 or 7 oz.) can tuna, drained and flaked
- 1 c. thinly sliced celery
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1 1/2 tsp. soy sauce
- dash of garlic powder
- 1 small can chow mein noodles
- lettuce cups

Directions:
- Cook beans, drain and cool.
- Combine beans, flaked tuna, sliced celery, mayo, lemon juice, soy sauce and garlic powder. Chill.
- Before serving, add chow mein noodles to tuna mixture. Toss lightly.
- Serve in lettuce cups.

salad_info: white fruit salad ingredient coarsely chopped apple chopped orange sliced banana halved red grape maraschino cherry direction mix fruit together large bowl another bowl beat real whipping cream sugar sweeten fluffy fold prepared fruit serve
Original_text:
White Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- coarsely chopped apple
- chopped orange
- sliced bananas
- halved red grapes
- maraschino cherries

Directions:
- Mix fruit together in a large bowl.
- In another bowl, beat real whipping cream and sugar to sweeten until fluffy.
- Fold into prepared fruit and serve.

salad_info: broccoli salad ingredient head broccoli floweret c chopped celery c chopped red onion c sunflower seed c golden raisin c mayonnaise c sugar direction mix mayonnaise sugar pour vegetable seed raisin mixture toss well add strip crumbled bacon top serving desired
Original_text:
Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head broccoli flowerets
- 1 c. chopped celery
- 1/2 c. chopped red onion
- 1/2 c. sunflower seeds
- 1/2 c. golden raisins
- 3/4 c. mayonnaise
- 1/4 c. sugar

Directions:
- Mix the mayonnaise and sugar and pour over the vegetables, seeds and raisin mixture.
- Toss well and add 6 strips of crumbled bacon to top before serving, if desired.

salad_info: chicken salad twist ingredient pkg corkscrew macaroni c mayonnaise tbsp prepared mustard c ripe olive wedge c diced celery c cooked chicken c italian dressing tbsp lemon juice medium onion chopped c diced cucumber tsp pepper salt lettuce direction cook macaroni following package direction mix cooked chicken italian dressing hot macaroni cool blend mayonnaise lemon juice mustard stir onion cucumber celery pepper add macaroni mixture salt taste mix well chill hour blend flavor serve lettuce cup make serving
Original_text:
Chicken Salad With A Twist

Ingredients:
- 6 oz. pkg. corkscrew macaroni
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1 Tbsp. prepared mustard
- 3/4 c. ripe olive wedges
- 1 c. diced celery
- 3 c. cooked chicken
- 1/2 c. Italian dressing
- 3 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1 medium onion, chopped
- 1 c. diced cucumbers
- 1 tsp. pepper and salt
- lettuce

Directions:
- Cook macaroni following package directions.
- Mix cooked chicken and Italian dressing with hot macaroni.
- Cool.
- Blend mayonnaise, lemon juice and mustard.
- Stir in onion, cucumbers, celery and pepper.
- Add to macaroni mixture.
- Salt to taste.
- Mix well.
- Chill 2 or more hours to blend flavors.
- Serve in lettuce cups.
- Makes 4 to 8 servings.

salad_info: green pepper steak ingredient beef chuck round fat trimmed c soy sauce clove garlic tsp grated fresh ginger tsp ground ginger c salad oil c green onion thinly sliced c red green pepper cut inch square stalk celery thinly sliced tbsp cornstarch c water tomato cut wedge direction sharp knife cut beef across grain thin strip inch thick combine soy sauce garlic ginger add beef toss set aside preparing vegetable heat oil large frying pan wok add beef toss high heat browned taste meat tender cover simmer minute low heat turn heat add vegetable toss vegetable tendercrisp minute mix cornstarch water add pan stir cook thickened add tomato heat make serving
Original_text:
Green Pepper Steak

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. beef chuck or round, fat trimmed
- 1/4 c. soy sauce
- 1 clove garlic
- 1 1/2 tsp. grated fresh ginger or 1/2 tsp. ground ginger
- 1/4 c. salad oil
- 1 c. green onions, thinly sliced
- 1 c. red or green peppers, cut to 1-inch squares
- 2 stalks celery, thinly sliced
- 1 Tbsp. cornstarch
- 1 c. water
- 2 tomatoes, cut into wedges

Directions:
- With a very sharp knife, cut beef across grain into thin strips, 1/8-inch thick.
- Combine soy sauce, garlic and ginger.
- Add beef; toss and set aside while preparing vegetables.
- Heat oil in large frying pan or wok.
- Add beef; toss over high heat until browned.
- Taste meat.
- If it is not tender, cover and simmer for 30 to 40 minutes over low heat.
- Turn heat up.
- Add vegetables; toss until vegetables are tender-crisp, about 10 minutes.
- Mix cornstarch with water; add to pan.
- Stir and cook until thickened. Add tomatoes; heat through.
- Makes 4 servings.

salad_info: spanish rice ingredient tomato sauce c water c chopped onion c chopped pepper c butter tsp salt tsp sugar tsp mustard dash pepper c minute rice direction combine sauce water onion green pepper butter salt sugar mustard pepper saucepan bring boil stir rice cover let stand minute stir fork make serving
Original_text:
Spanish Rice

Ingredients:
- 16 oz. tomato sauce
- 1/2 c. water
- 1/2 c. chopped onion
- 1/3 c. chopped pepper
- 1/4 c. butter
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. sugar
- 1/2 tsp. mustard (salad)
- dash of pepper
- 1 1/3 c. Minute rice

Directions:
- Combine sauce, water, onion, green pepper, butter, salt, sugar, mustard and pepper in saucepan.
- Bring to boil; stir in rice.
- Cover and let stand 5 minutes.
- Stir with fork.
- Makes 5 servings.

salad_info: vermicelli salad ingredient vermicelli spaghetti tbsp salad seasoning italian dressing tomato bell pepper direction boil spaghetti tender cool spaghetti add remaining ingredient cool keep refrigerator week tomato bell pepper optional
Original_text:
Vermicelli Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (12 oz.) vermicelli spaghetti
- 3 Tbsp. salad seasoning
- 1 (8 oz.) Italian dressing
- tomato (optional)
- bell pepper (optional)

Directions:
- Boil spaghetti until tender. Cool spaghetti. Add remaining ingredients. Cool. Will keep in refrigerator for 1 week. Tomato and bell pepper optional.

salad_info: corned beef salad ingredient corned beef tomato mayonnaise pickle relish diced olive direction mash corned beef add enough mayonnaise moisten add rest ingredient mix fork may add take away please taste
Original_text:
Corned Beef Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can corned beef
- 1 tomato
- mayonnaise
- pickle relish
- diced olives

Directions:
- Mash corned beef; add enough mayonnaise to moisten, then add rest of ingredients and mix with fork.
- You may add or take away to please your taste.

salad_info: cranberry salad ingredient cranberry c sugar small lemon jello small cherry jello c boiling water apple peeled orange direction grind fruit berry mix jello sugar water chill firm keep week refrigerator
Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. cranberries
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 small lemon Jell-O
- 1 small cherry Jell-O
- 2 c. boiling water
- 2 apples, peeled
- 2 oranges (peel only 1)

Directions:
- Grind fruit and berries.
- Mix with Jell-O, sugar and water. Chill until firm.
- Keeps for weeks in refrigerator.
