Original_text:
Blueberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large can blueberries (don't drain)
- 1 large pkg. raspberry jello
- 1 small can crushed pineapple
- 1 c. boiling water
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 1 small box sour cream
- 1/2 c. sugar
- pecan pieces

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in water, then add berries and pineapple.
- Put in the refrigerator and jell.
- Mix up topping of cream cheese, sour cream and sugar.
- Spread on jello after jelled.
- Top with pecans.

salad_info: congealed applenut salad ingredient small box lime flavored gelatin c boiling water c cold water tbsp lemon juice c finely chopped celery c chopped apple c chopped pecan direction dissolve gelatin boiling water sprinkle lemon juice apple add cold water celery apple pecan gelatin chill firm serf
Original_text:
Congealed Apple-Nut Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small box lime flavored gelatin
- 1 c. boiling water
- 3/4 c. cold water
- 2 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1/2 c. finely chopped celery
- 1 1/2 c. chopped apples
- 1/4 c. chopped pecans

Directions:
- Dissolve gelatin in boiling water.
- Sprinkle lemon juice over apples.
- Add cold water, celery, apples and pecans to the gelatin. Chill until firm.
- Serves 6.

salad_info: old fashion pineapple salad ingredient pineapple tidbit chuck egg tbsp flour tbsp sugar direction beat egg flour sugar add juice pineapple cook let cool add pineapple marshmallow
Original_text:
Old Fashion Pineapple Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can pineapple, tidbits or chucks
- 1 egg
- 1 Tbsp. flour
- 3 Tbsp. sugar

Directions:
- Beat egg, flour and sugar.
- Add juice of pineapple and cook. Let cool and add pineapple and 15-20 marshmallows.

salad_info: cranberry salad ingredient pkg cranberry pkg cherry jello c boiling water peeled orange c sugar c diced celery tsp salt c chopped nut direction wash cranberry grind cranberry orange add sugar mix jello boiling water add mixture add apple celery salt nut chill set
Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. cranberries
- 1 pkg. cherry jello
- 1 c. boiling water
- 2 peeled oranges
- 1 c. sugar
- 1/2 c. diced celery
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1/4 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Wash cranberries.
- Grind cranberries and oranges and add sugar.
- Mix jello and boiling water; add to mixture.
- Add apple, celery, salt and nuts.
- Chill until set.

salad_info: sauerkraut salad ingredient c chopped sauerkraut medium bell pepper chopped carrot chopped large onion chopped c water c vinegar c sugar direction mix first ingredient together mix remaining ingredient saucepan boil minute pour first mixture let set minute serving good fish
Original_text:
Sauerkraut Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. chopped sauerkraut (cold)
- 1 medium bell pepper, chopped
- 1/2 carrot, chopped
- 1 large onion, chopped
- 1 1/2 c. water
- 1/4 c. vinegar
- 1/2 c. sugar

Directions:
- Mix the first 4 ingredients together.
- Mix the remaining ingredients in a saucepan.
- Boil for 10 minutes; pour over first mixture.
- Let set for 45 minutes before serving.
- Good with fish.

salad_info: crouton salad ingredient c hellmanns mayonnaise tbsp lemon juice tbsp parmesan cheese clove garlic tbsp butter c crouton head lettuce direction make dressing mayonnaise lemon juice cheese garlic chill toss crouton butter low heat golden brown drain
Original_text:
Crouton Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. Hellmann's mayonnaise
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
- 1 clove garlic
- 1 Tbsp. butter
- 1 c. croutons
- 2 heads lettuce

Directions:
- Make dressing of mayonnaise, lemon juice, cheese and garlic. Chill.
- Toss croutons in butter over low heat until golden brown. Drain.

salad_info: cauliflower salad ingredient c cauliflower broken c chopped black olive c chopped green pepper c chopped pimento tbsp chopped onion direction mix together pour dressing let set overnight
Original_text:
Cauliflower Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. cauliflower, broken
- 1/2 c. chopped black olives
- 1/2 c. chopped green pepper
- 1/4 c. chopped pimento
- 3 Tbsp. chopped onion

Directions:
- Mix all together.
- Pour dressing over all and let set overnight.

salad_info: quick n slick chocolate cake ingredient c sifted flour c sugar c cocoa tsp baking soda tsp salt tsp baking powder egg unbeaten c salad oil tsp vanilla c sour milk buttermilk c lukewarm water direction grease flour x inch oblong pan sift together dry ingredient mixing bowl make well center dry ingredient pour rest ingredient depression blend slowly beat medium speed rotary egg beater minute scrape bowl fill pan batter bake minute top peanut butter frosting
Original_text:
Quick 'N' Slick Chocolate Cake

Ingredients:
- 3 c. sifted flour
- 2 c. sugar
- 3/4 c. cocoa
- 2 tsp. baking soda
- 1 tsp. salt
- 2 tsp. baking powder
- 2 eggs, unbeaten
- 1 c. salad oil
- 2 tsp. vanilla
- 1 c. sour milk or buttermilk
- 1 c. lukewarm water

Directions:
- Grease and flour 9 x 12-inch oblong pan.
- Sift together all dry ingredients into mixing bowl.
- Make well in center of dry ingredients; pour rest of ingredients into depression.
- Blend slowly (low speed on electric mixer), then beat at medium speed or with rotary egg beater for 4 minutes.
- Scrape down bowl.
- Fill pan with batter.
- Bake at 350° for 45 minutes.
- Top with peanut butter frosting.

salad_info: strawberry pretzel salad ingredient c pretzel crushed c margarine tbsp sugar cream cheese c sugar c cool whip large box strawberry jello c water pkg fren strawberry direction combine pretzel margarine tablespoon sugar pat bottom x inch pan bake minute combine jello water add strawberry stir well cool soft set
Original_text:
Strawberry Pretzel Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. pretzels, crushed
- 3/4 c. margarine
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 8 oz. cream cheese
- 1 c. sugar
- 2 c. Cool Whip
- 1 large box strawberry Jell-O
- 2 c. water (boiling)
- 20 oz. pkg. frozen strawberries

Directions:
- Combine pretzels,
- margarine
- and
- 2 tablespoons sugar. Pat into bottom of a 13 x 9-inch pan.
- Bake 8 minutes at 400°. Combine Jell-O in water; add strawberries and stir well.
- Cool until soft set.

salad_info: pea cauliflower salad ingredient c hellmanns mayonnaise tsp lawrys seasoned salt tbsp milk tbsp dill weed head cauliflower chopped fine diced onion pkg fren pea stalk celery chopped direction mix first ingredient together well add remaining ingredient mix vegetable dressing refrigerate several hour overnight
Original_text:
Pea And Cauliflower Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. Hellmann's mayonnaise
- 1 1/2 tsp. Lawry's seasoned salt
- 3/4 Tbsp. milk
- 1 Tbsp. dill weed
- 1 head cauliflower, chopped fine
- 1 diced onion (red gives salad nice color)
- 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas
- 3 stalks celery, chopped

Directions:
- Mix first 4 ingredients together well and add remaining ingredients. Mix vegetables with dressing and refrigerate several hours or overnight.

salad_info: fren fruit salad ingredient mandarin orange drained pineapple chunk drained c sugar c whipped cream c salad dressing carton cottage cheese direction blend whipped cream sugar salad dressing cottage cheese mixer smooth fold fruit place x inch plastic container cover freeze cut square place fresh lettuce leaf serve use dessert
Original_text:
Frozen Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 can pineapple chunks, drained
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 2 c. whipped cream
- 1/3 c. salad dressing
- 1 (12 to 15 oz.) carton cottage cheese

Directions:
- Blend the whipped cream, sugar, salad dressing and cottage cheese in the mixer until smooth.
- Fold in fruit.
- Place in an 8 x 8-inch plastic container.
- Cover and freeze.
- Cut out in squares and place on fresh lettuce leaves to serve or just use as a dessert.

salad_info: orange salad ingredient mandarin orange segment drained small pineapple chunk drained angel flake coconut small pkg miniature marshmallow pt sour cream direction mix together keep well refrigerator made ahead time
Original_text:
Orange Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can mandarin orange segments, drained
- 1 small can pineapple chunks, drained
- 1 can Angel Flake coconut
- 1 small pkg. miniature marshmallows
- 1/2 pt. sour cream

Directions:
- Mix together.
- Keeps well in refrigerator and can be made up ahead of time.

salad_info: kc broccoli salad ingredient bunch fresh broccoli small bunch fresh cauliflower bacon cooked crumbled drain grease medium onion c mayonnaise direction wash broccoli well pick leaf peel outer skin cut floret chop well cut chop stem broccoli mix floret wash cauliflower well pick leaf use floret cauliflower chop floret add broccoli mix onion bacon add mayonnaise broccoli cauliflower refrigerate hour serf people
Original_text:
K.C.'S Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 bunches fresh broccoli
- 1 small bunch fresh cauliflower
- 1/2 lb. bacon, cooked and crumbled, drain off all grease
- 1/2 medium onion
- 1 c. mayonnaise

Directions:
- Wash broccoli well; pick off leaves and peel outer skin.
- Cut florets and chop well.
- Cut and chop stem of broccoli and mix with florets.
- Wash cauliflower well; pick off leaves.
- Use only florets of cauliflower; chop florets and add to broccoli.
- Mix in onion and bacon.
- Add mayonnaise to broccoli and cauliflower.
- Refrigerate 1 hour.
- Serves 4 to 6 people.

salad_info: easy turkey salad ingredient campbell condensed cream celery soup c mayonnaise c chopped cooked turkey c finely chopped celery c chopped sweet red pepper c sliced green onion tbsp chopped fresh parsley tsp pepper direction large bowl stir together soup mayonnaise smooth fold turkey celery red pepper onion parsley pepper serve leaf lettuce
Original_text:
Easy Turkey Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can Campbell's condensed cream of celery soup
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 4 c. chopped, cooked turkey
- 1 c. finely chopped celery
- 1/2 c. chopped sweet red pepper
- 1/2 c. sliced green onions
- 2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
- 1/8 tsp. pepper

Directions:
- In large bowl, stir together soup and mayonnaise until smooth. Fold in turkey, celery, red pepper, onions, parsley and pepper. Serve on leaf lettuce.

salad_info: spaghetti chicken ingredient chicken cut tsp salt tsp pepper c salad oil c chopped onion clove garlic minced can tomato grated parmesan cheese tomato sauce tomato paste tbsp snipped parsley tsp salt tsp basil tsp pepper spaghetti cooked drained direction wash chicken piece pat dry season teaspoon salt teaspoon pepper large skillet dutch oven brown chicken oil remove chicken pour tablespoon fat add onion garlic cook stir onion tender stir chicken remaining ingredient except spaghetti cheese cover tightly cook chicken slowly hour tender stirring occasionally adding water necessary skim excess fat serve spaghetti sprinkle parmesan cheese make serving
Original_text:
Spaghetti Chicken

Ingredients:
- 4 to 5 lb. chicken, cut up (I use breasts only)
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/8 tsp. pepper
- 1/4 c. salad oil
- 1/2 c. chopped onion
- 1 clove garlic, minced
- 2 cans (16 oz. each) tomatoes
- grated Parmesan cheese
- 1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
- 1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
- 2 Tbsp. snipped parsley
- 2 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. basil
- 1/4 tsp. pepper
- 7 to 8 oz. spaghetti, cooked and drained

Directions:
- Wash chicken pieces and pat dry.
- Season with 1 teaspoon salt and 1/8 teaspoon pepper.
- In a large skillet or Dutch oven, brown chicken in oil; remove chicken.
- Pour off all but 3 tablespoons of fat.
- Add onions and garlic.
- Cook and stir until onion is tender. Stir in chicken and remaining ingredients, except spaghetti and cheese.
- Cover tightly; cook chicken slowly for 1 to 1 1/2 hours or until tender, stirring occasionally and adding water, if necessary.
- Skim off excess fat.
- Serve on spaghetti; sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
- Makes 4 to 6 servings.

salad_info: spaghetti salad ingredient large bottle italian salad dressing bottle salad supreme pkg spaghetti tomato cucumber green pepper onion direction cook spaghetti drain mix remaining ingredient pour spaghetti let set refrigerator overnight drain dressing serve
Original_text:
Spaghetti Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large bottle Italian salad dressing
- 1 bottle Salad Supreme
- 1 pkg. spaghetti
- 2 tomatoes
- 1 cucumber
- 1 green pepper
- 1 onion

Directions:
- Cook spaghetti; drain.
- Mix remaining ingredients and pour over spaghetti.
- Let set in refrigerator overnight.
- Drain off dressing and serve.

salad_info: special chicken salad ingredient c mayonnaise c french dressing tsp salt tsp pepper c diced cooked chicken c diced celery c drained orange section pineapple c chopped walnut c cold fluffy rice direction combine dressing mayonnaise salt pepper mixing well combine chicken celery orange section pineapple walnut bowl stir mayonnaise mixture add rice mix lightly fork chill least hour serve crisp lettuce make cup serving luncheon entree salad
Original_text:
Special Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/3 c. mayonnaise
- 1/3 c. French dressing
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/3 tsp. pepper
- 1 1/2 c. diced, cooked chicken
- 1 c. diced celery
- 1 c. drained orange sections or pineapple
- 1/2 c. chopped walnuts
- 3 c. cold, fluffy rice

Directions:
- Combine dressing, mayonnaise, salt and pepper, mixing well. Combine chicken, celery, orange sections or pineapple and walnuts into a bowl.
- Stir in mayonnaise mixture.
- Then add rice and mix lightly with fork.
- Chill at least 1 hour.
- Serve on crisp lettuce.
- Make about 6 cups or 4 to 6 servings luncheon on entree salad.

salad_info: marinated tofu salad ingredient tofu parboiled drained dried c vegetable oil c chinese sesame oil tbsp lemon juice c shoyu tamari tbsp rice wine vinegar head chinese cabbage equivalent shredded small carrot shredded scallion chopped handful watercress gomahsio direction shallow pan combine oil lemon juice shoyu vinegar combine wire whisk cut tofu half horizontally diagonally form thin triangle inch thick place bowl marinade chill least hour arrange cabbage center plate top tofu arrange watercress around edge place shredded carrot center scallion pour marinade sprinkle gomahsio
Original_text:
Marinated Tofu Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 lb. tofu, parboiled, drained and dried
- 2/3 c. vegetable oil
- 1/4 c. Chinese sesame oil
- 2 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1/4 c. shoyu or tamari
- 2 Tbsp. rice wine vinegar
- 1 head Chinese cabbage or equivalent, shredded
- 1 small carrot, shredded
- 2 to 3 scallions, chopped
- handful watercress
- gomahsio

Directions:
- In a shallow pan combine oils, lemon juice, shoyu and vinegar.
- Combine with a wire whisk.
- Cut tofu in half horizontally, then diagonally to form thin triangles about 1/4-inch thick.
- Place into the bowl with the marinade and chill for at least an hour.
- Arrange the cabbage on center of the plates.
- Top with tofu.
- Arrange the watercress around the edges. Place some shredded carrots in the center, with the scallions. Pour the marinade over all with a sprinkle of gomahsio.

salad_info: shrimp salad ingredient small shrimp medium tomato diced c cooked macaroni tsp oregano c mayonnaise salad dressing barbecue spice salt pepper direction mix macaroni oregano mayonnaise together fold shrimp diced tomato sprinkle barbecue spice salt pepper taste best allowed set refrigerator overnight
Original_text:
Shrimp Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small can shrimp
- 1 medium tomato, diced
- 4 c. cooked macaroni
- 1/2 tsp. oregano
- 1/4 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
- barbecue spice
- salt and pepper

Directions:
- Mix macaroni, oregano and mayonnaise together.
- Fold in shrimp and diced tomatoes.
- Sprinkle with barbecue spice, salt and pepper to taste.
- Best if allowed to set in refrigerator overnight.

salad_info: cucumber salad ingredient c water c white vinegar c sugar large cucumber peeled thinly sliced medium onion thinly sliced direction combine water vinegar sugar small bowl stirring sugar dissolve combine vinegar mixture cucumber onion shallow quart container stir gently cover chill least hour stirring occasionally serve salad slotted spoon yield serving
Original_text:
Cucumber Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. water
- 1/2 c. white vinegar
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 2 large cucumbers, peeled and thinly sliced
- 1 medium onion, thinly sliced

Directions:
- Combine water, vinegar and sugar in a small bowl, stirring until sugar dissolves.
- Combine vinegar mixture, cucumber and onion in a shallow 2-quart container.
- Stir gently.
- Cover and chill at least 2 hours, stirring occasionally.
- Serve salad with a slotted spoon.
- Yields 6 to 8 servings.

salad_info: aunt lillians kraut salad ingredient kraut washed drained c chopped bell pepper c chopped celery tsp celery seed c chopped onion small jar chopped pimento c sugar c vinegar direction mix first ingredient together bring sugar vinegar boil pour mixture kraut vegetable chill several hour overnight keep refrigerator week
Original_text:
Aunt Lillian'S Kraut Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (No. 303) can kraut, washed and drained
- 1 c. chopped bell pepper
- 1 c. chopped celery or 2 tsp. celery seed
- 1/2 c. chopped onion
- 1 small jar chopped pimentos
- 1 1/2 c. sugar
- 3/4 c. vinegar

Directions:
- Mix the first 5 ingredients together.
- Bring sugar and vinegar to boil and pour over mixture of kraut and vegetables.
- Chill several hours or overnight.
- Will keep in refrigerator for 4 to 5 weeks.

salad_info: hour salad ingredient head lettuce stalk celery medium onion box thawed fren green pea c mayonnaise tbsp sugar tbsp parmesan cheese hardboiled egg direction layer round clear glass bowl order listed lettuce chopped celery chopped onion thawed pea layer mayonnaise sprinkle sugar parmesan cheese refrigerate overnight
Original_text:
24 Hour Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head lettuce
- 4 stalks celery
- 2 medium onions
- 1 to 2 boxes thawed frozen green peas
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. sugar
- 2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
- 2 hard-boiled eggs

Directions:
- Layer in round, clear glass bowl in order listed:
- lettuce (in bite size pieces), chopped celery, chopped onions, thawed peas and layer of mayonnaise.
- Sprinkle with sugar and Parmesan cheese. Refrigerate overnight.

salad_info: pea cheese salad ingredient c salad dressing mayonnaise tsp salt tsp prepared mustard tsp sugar tsp pepper pkg fren green pea thawed drained c diced mild cheddar coy cheese medium stalk celery thinly sliced sweet pickle chopped tbsp finely chopped onion hardboiled egg chopped direction mix mayonnaise salt mustard sugar pepper bowl add pea cheese celery pickle onion toss stir egg cover refrigerate chilled least hour serve lettuce leaf desired
Original_text:
Peas And Cheese Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/3 to 1/2 c. salad dressing or mayonnaise
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. prepared mustard
- 1/4 tsp. sugar
- 1/8 tsp. pepper
- 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen green peas, thawed and drained
- 1 c. diced mild Cheddar or Colby cheese
- 1 medium stalk celery, thinly sliced (1/3 c.)
- 3 sweet pickles, chopped (about 1/4 c.)
- 2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
- 2 hard-boiled eggs, chopped

Directions:
- Mix mayonnaise, salt, mustard, sugar and pepper in bowl.
- Add peas, cheese, celery, pickles and onion.
- Toss.
- Stir in eggs. Cover and refrigerate until chilled at least 1 hour.
- Serve on lettuce leaves, if desired.

salad_info: broccoli puff ingredient pkg fren broccoli cream mushroom soup sharp american cheddar cheese shredded c milk c mayonnaise salad dressing beaten egg c fine dry bread crumb tbsp butter margarine melted direction cook fren broccoli according package direction drain thoroughly place broccoli cut x x inch baking dish stir together mushroom soup shredded cheese gradually add milk mayonnaise beaten egg soup mixture stirring well blended pour broccoli baking dish combine bread crumb melted butter sprinkle evenly soup mixture bake moderate oven minute crumb lightly browned
Original_text:
Broccoli Puff

Ingredients:
- 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen broccoli
- 1 can cream of mushroom soup
- 2 oz. sharp American or Cheddar cheese, shredded
- 1/4 c. milk
- 1/4 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
- 1 beaten egg
- 1/4 c. fine dry bread crumbs
- 1 Tbsp. butter or margarine, melted

Directions:
- Cook
- frozen
- broccoli according to package directions; drain thoroughly.
- Place	broccoli cuts in 10 x 6 x 1 1/2-inch baking dish.
- Stir together mushroom soup and shredded cheese. Gradually add milk, mayonnaise and beaten egg to soup mixture, stirring until
- well
- blended.
- Pour
- over broccoli in baking dish. Combine
- bread
- crumbs
- and
- melted
- butter;
- sprinkle evenly over
- soup mixture.
- Bake in moderate oven at 350° for 45 minutes until crumbs are lightly browned.

salad_info: kraut salad ingredient sauerkraut drained c chopped green pepper medium onion cut fine c celery cut fine salt pepper taste c sugar c vinegar c salad oil direction heat vinegar oil sugar boil pour vegetable mixture let stand hour go well beef dinner
Original_text:
Kraut Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (1 lb.) can sauerkraut, drained
- 1 c. chopped green pepper
- 1 medium onion, cut fine
- 2 c. celery, cut fine
- salt and pepper to taste
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 1/2 c. salad oil

Directions:
- Heat vinegar, oil and sugar.
- Do not boil. Pour over vegetable mixture.
- Let stand for 24 hours.
- This goes well with a beef dinner.

salad_info: green rice ingredient c uncooked rice c milk c salad oil c green parsley chopped c green bell pepper chopped garlic clove chopped c green onion cheddar cheese shredded sharp cheese shredded direction add ingredient mix well cook casserole dish hour cover shredded cheese cover keep moist cooking
Original_text:
Green Rice

Ingredients:
- 2 c. uncooked rice
- 1 1/2 to 2 c. milk
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 1 c. green parsley, chopped
- 1 c. green bell pepper, chopped
- 2 garlic cloves, chopped
- 1 c. green onions (all)
- 1/2 lb. Cheddar cheese, shredded
- 1/2 lb. sharp cheese, shredded

Directions:
- Add all ingredients and mix well (except cheeses).
- Cook in casserole dish for 1 hour at 325°.
- Cover with shredded cheeses and cover to keep moist after cooking.

salad_info: colorful bean salad ingredient tbsp olive vegetable oil tbsp cider vinegar tsp garlic powder tsp ground cumin tsp salt tsp pepper kidney bean rinsed drained mexicorn drained black bean rinsed drained c thinly sliced red onion direction bowl combine first six ingredient mix well add bean corn onion stir coat cover refrigerate serving yield serving
Original_text:
Colorful Bean Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 Tbsp. olive or vegetable oil
- 3 Tbsp. cider vinegar
- 1/2 tsp. garlic powder
- 1/2 tsp. ground cumin
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1/4 tsp. pepper
- 1 (16 oz.) can kidney beans, rinsed and drained
- 1 (11 oz.) can Mexicorn, drained
- 1 (15 oz.) can black beans, rinsed and drained
- 1/4 c. thinly sliced red onion

Directions:
- In a bowl, combine the first six ingredients; mix well.
- Add the beans, corn and onion; stir to coat.
- Cover and refrigerate until serving.
- Yield: 6 servings.

salad_info: layer salad ingredient lettuce chopped shredded tomato chopped fren pea mayonnaise sprinkle sugar bacon crisply cooked crumbled cheddar cheese shredded direction layer ingredient order given shallow serving dish vary amount size dish suit need sliced black olive added
Original_text:
7 Layer Salad

Ingredients:
- lettuce, chopped or shredded
- tomato, chopped
- frozen peas
- mayonnaise
- sprinkle of sugar
- bacon, crisply cooked and crumbled
- Cheddar cheese, shredded

Directions:
- Layer ingredients in order given in a shallow serving dish. Vary amounts and size of dish to suit your needs.
- Sliced black olives can be added.

salad_info: herb dressing ingredient c mayonnaise salad dressing c whipping cream c chopped green onion c minced fresh parsley anchovy fillet drained minced chive lemon juice direction combine ingredient blender food processor smooth cover refrigerate least hour
Original_text:
Herb Dressing(Great On Vegetables)  

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 c mayonnaise or salad dressing
- 2/3 c whipping cream
- 1/2 c chopped green onions
- 1/2 c minced fresh parsley
- 1-2 oz can anchovy fillets, drained (optional)
- 2 T minced chives
- 2 T lemon juice

Directions:
- Combine the ingredients in a blender or food processor until smooth.
- Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour.

salad_info: chinese salad ingredient chinese cabbage chopped diced green onion stick butter pkg ramen noodle c sunflower seed pkg slivered almond sesame seed direction mix cabbage onion put ziploc bag refrigerate saute butter noodle sunflower seed almond sesame seed pour paper towel cool keep ziploc bag ready use
Original_text:
Chinese Salad

Ingredients:
- Chinese cabbage, chopped
- 5 diced green onions
- 1 stick butter
- 2 pkg. Ramen noodles
- 1/2 c. sunflower seeds
- 1 pkg. slivered almonds
- sesame seed

Directions:
- Mix cabbage and onions.
- Put in Ziploc bag and refrigerate. Saute butter, noodles, sunflower seeds, almonds and sesame seed. Pour on paper towels and cool.
- Keep in Ziploc bag until ready to use.

salad_info: fried rice ingredient c long grain rice cubed pork large onion chopped green pepper chopped carrot finely chopped tsp black pepper stalk celery chopped c bean sprout drained tbsp soy sauce direction cook rice brown meat alone brown carrot green pepper onion add vegetable meat add soy sauce pepper celery add rice bean sprout simmer minute serve pineapple jello mold fruit salad
Original_text:
Fried Rice

Ingredients:
- 2 c. long grain rice
- 2 lb. cubed pork
- 1 large onion, chopped
- 2 green peppers, chopped
- 6 carrots, finely chopped
- 1 tsp. black pepper
- 6 stalks celery, chopped
- 2 c. bean sprouts, drained
- 4 Tbsp. soy sauce

Directions:
- Cook rice.
- Brown meat alone.
- Brown carrots, green peppers and onion (do carrots first).
- Add vegetables to meat.
- Add soy sauce, pepper and celery.
- Add rice, then bean sprouts.
- Simmer 30 minutes.
- (Optional:
- Add 6 to 8 tablespoons sweet and sour sauce.)
- Serve with pineapple Jell-O mold or fruit salad.

salad_info: raw cauliflower salad ingredient head cauliflower chopped separated floret c chopped bell pepper c chopped stuffed ripe olive c chopped radish ripe tomato c diced american cheese marinade direction combine chopped cauliflower bell pepper olive radish tomato stir cheese marinate overnight dressing salad reach full flavor day preparation
Original_text:
Raw Cauliflower Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head cauliflower, chopped or separated into florets
- 1/2 c. chopped bell pepper
- 1/2 c. each chopped stuffed and ripe olives
- 1/2 c. chopped radishes
- 2 ripe tomatoes
- 1/2 c. diced American cheese (not pasteurized process cheese)
- marinade

Directions:
- Combine chopped cauliflower, bell pepper, olives, radishes and tomatoes.
- Stir in cheese.
- Marinate overnight in dressing.
- Salad reaches its full flavor 1 to 3 days after preparation.

salad_info: sweet potato salad ingredient cooked peeled cubed sweet potato c chopped onion c chopped green pepper salt pepper taste c mayonnaise dash hot sauce direction combine potato onion green pepper large bowl stir mayonnaise hot sauce mix well cover refrigerate least hour serving serf
Original_text:
Sweet Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 lb. cooked, peeled and cubed sweet potatoes
- 1/2 c. chopped onion
- 1/2 c. chopped green pepper
- salt and pepper to taste
- 1 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- dash of hot sauce

Directions:
- Combine potatoes, onion and green pepper in a large bowl. Stir in mayonnaise and hot sauce; mix well.
- Cover and refrigerate at least 1 hour before serving.
- Serves 10.

salad_info: broccoli salad ingredient bunch broccoli cut bacon cooked crisp c miracle whip tbsp vinegar c shredded cheddar cheese small onion chopped c vinegar dill weed direction mix ingredient refrigerate made couple day ahead marinate well
Original_text:
Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 bunches broccoli, cut up
- 1/2 lb. bacon, cooked crisp
- 1 c. Miracle Whip
- 1 Tbsp. vinegar
- 1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
- 1 small onion, chopped
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- dill weed (optional)

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients and refrigerate.
- Can be made a couple of days ahead to marinate well.

salad_info: cauliflower salad ingredient head cauliflower broken bite size piece head lettuce ripped piece bacon cooked crisp broken piece garbanzo bean large onion chopped fine mayonnaise sprinkle sugar parmesan cheese direction layer dish lid lettuce cauliflower garbanzo bean bacon onion mayonnaise spread top sprinkle sugar mayonnaise sprinkle parmesan cheese cover refrigerate overnight toss right serving
Original_text:
Cauliflower Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head cauliflower, broken into bite size pieces
- 1 head lettuce, ripped into pieces
- 1 lb. bacon, cooked crisp and broken into pieces
- 1 can garbanzo beans
- 1 large onion, chopped fine
- mayonnaise (enough to cover lettuce)
- sprinkle sugar
- Parmesan cheese

Directions:
- Layer in dish with lid (Tupperware kind):
- lettuce, cauliflower, garbanzo beans, bacon, onion and mayonnaise spread over top.
- Sprinkle sugar over mayonnaise and then sprinkle Parmesan cheese over all.
- Cover.
- Refrigerate overnight.
- Toss right before serving.

salad_info: cold spaghetti salad ingredient pkg spaghetti bottle italian dressing morton nature seasoning cucumber diced bell pepper diced onion diced tomato diced direction prepare spaghetti directed box drain cool add vegetable italian dressing seasoning mix taste toss refrigerate
Original_text:
Cold Spaghetti Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. spaghetti
- 1 bottle Italian dressing
- Morton's Nature's seasoning
- 1 to 2 cucumbers, diced
- 1 to 2 bell peppers, diced
- 1 to 2 onions, diced
- 1 to 2 tomatoes, diced

Directions:
- Prepare spaghetti as directed on the box.
- Drain and cool. Add vegetables, Italian dressing and seasoning mix to taste.
- Toss and refrigerate.

Ingredients:
- 2 c. fresh cranberries, chopped or ground
- 1 c. sugar

- 3/4 c. pineapple juice
- 1 c. drained mandarin oranges
- 1 c. drained pineapple chunks
- 1 large banana
- 1 c. sour cream

Directions:
- Combine cranberries and
- sugar.
- Mix to dissolve sugar. Heat pineapple juice.
- Add
- Jell-O
- and	stir until dissolved. Add to cranberries; stir well.
- Stir in fruits, sour cream and Cool Whip. Chill until firm.

Original_text:
German Potato Salad(Kantoffie Salad)  

Ingredients:
- 15 small potatoes
- 1 medium onion, chopped fine
- 1/4 c. water
- 1 Tbsp. flour
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- salt and pepper to taste
- 1/4 lb. bacon pieces, fried crisp

Directions:
- Peel potatoes and slice.
- Simmer onion in bacon drippings and add flour, vinegar, sugar, water and seasoning.
- Mix well all ingredients together and serve warm.

salad_info: waldorf chicken salad ingredient chicken breast drained chopped walnut cup craisins cup salad dressing cup honey tsp nutmeg tsp ground ginger direction combine chicken craisins walnut one bowl
Original_text:
Waldorf Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can chicken breast, drained
- 1/4 chopped walnuts
- 1/4 cup craisins (dried cranberries)
- 2/3 cup salad dressing
- 1/8 cup honey
- 1/8 tsp. nutmeg
- 1 tsp. Ground ginger

Directions:
- Combine chicken, craisins, walnuts in one bowl.

salad_info: blueberry salad ingredient crushed pineapple c boiling water blueberry drained c sugar pkg cream cheese pkg raspberry jello c sour cream c chopped pecan direction drain pineapple keep juice dissolve gelatin boiling water stir pineapple juice chill stir pineapple blueberry pour x inch pan chill combine sour cream cream cheese sugar mix smooth well blended spread salad top pecan
Original_text:
Blueberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple
- 3 c. boiling water
- 1 (15 oz.) can blueberries, drained
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. raspberry jello
- 1 c. sour cream
- 1/4 c. chopped pecans

Directions:
- Drain pineapple.
- Keep juice.
- Dissolve gelatin in boiling water; stir in pineapple juice.
- Chill.
- Stir in pineapple and blueberries.
- Pour in 10 x 6-inch pan.
- Chill.
- Combine sour cream, cream cheese and sugar.
- Mix until smooth and well blended. Spread over salad.
- Top with pecans.

salad_info: cranberry salad ingredient pkg jello c boiling water c pineapple juice whole cranberry sauce chilled c sliced apple c chopped nut direction mix together jello boiling water mix ingredient well doubling recipe use cup pineapple juice
Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. jello (any flavor)
- 1 c. boiling water
- 3/4 c. pineapple juice
- 1 (8 oz.) can whole cranberry sauce, chilled
- 1 c. sliced apples
- 1/3 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Mix together the jello and boiling water.
- Mix all ingredients well.
- If doubling the recipe, use 1 cup pineapple juice.

salad_info: crockpot ham bean soup ingredient c bean c chopped ham chopped onion basil bay leaf ground pepper dash tabasco worcestershire sauce direction soak cup bean overnight drain water place bean fresh water crockpot quart water add ham onion basil bay leaf pepper tabasco worcestershire sauce taste bring pot high reduce low cook day serve cornbread salad fresh vegetable
Original_text:
Crock-Pot Ham And Bean Soup

Ingredients:
- 2 c. beans
- 2 c. chopped ham
- 2 chopped onions
- basil
- bay leaves
- ground pepper
- dash of Tabasco
- Worcestershire sauce

Directions:
- Soak 2 cups of beans (I use 5 or 6 different kinds) overnight. Drain water and place beans and fresh water in crock-pot with 2 quarts of water.
- Add ham, onions, basil, bay leaves, pepper, Tabasco and Worcestershire sauce to taste.
- Bring pot to high, then reduce to low and cook all day.
- Serve with cornbread and salad or fresh vegetables.

salad_info: broccoli cauliflower salad ingredient head cauliflower large bunch broccoli large sweet onion water chestnut ripe olive green olive c real mayonnaise c sour cream direction wash chop broccoli cauliflower slice onion olive water chestnut blend mayonnaise sour cream pour vegetable toss mix chill best allowed marinate refrigerator hour serving
Original_text:
Broccoli And Cauliflower Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head cauliflower
- 1 large bunch broccoli
- 1 large sweet onion
- 1 can water chestnuts
- 1 (No. 2) can ripe olives or green olives
- 1 c. real mayonnaise
- 1 c. sour cream

Directions:
- Wash and chop broccoli and cauliflower.
- Slice onion, olives and water chestnuts.
- Blend mayonnaise and sour cream.
- Pour over vegetables and toss to mix.
- Chill.
- Best if allowed to marinate in refrigerator for 2 to 3 hours before serving.
- (Good.)

Original_text:
Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 small cans mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 large can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 large carton cottage cheese (small curd)
- 1 large (12 oz.) container Cool Whip
- 1 large pkg. orange jello

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together.
- Add jello powder right from box.
- Refrigerate.

salad_info: chicken pasta salad ingredient cooked chicken chopped envelope good season italian salad dressing mix tbsp grated parmesan cheese c medium pasta shell pkg bird eye fren broccoli green bean pearl onion red pepper direction prepare salad dressing directed package set aside cook pasta directed drain rinse cold water drain run cold tap water vegetable thaw completely drain combine pasta vegetable cheese chicken large bowl toss salad dressing chill make serving
Original_text:
Chicken And Pasta Salad

Ingredients:
- 8 oz. cooked chicken, chopped
- 1 envelope Good Seasons Italian salad dressing mix
- 1 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
- 3 c. medium pasta shells
- 1 pkg. Birds Eye frozen broccoli, green beans, pearl onions and red peppers

Directions:
- Prepare salad dressing as directed on package.
- Set aside. Cook pasta as directed.
- Drain, rinse with cold water and drain again.
- Run cold tap water over vegetables to thaw completely. Drain.
- Combine pasta, vegetables, cheese and chicken in a large bowl.
- Toss with salad dressing.
- Chill.
- Makes 8 servings.

Original_text:
Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 eggs, slightly beaten
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. dry mustard
- 1 Tbsp. cornstarch
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/4 c. vinegar
- 3/4 c. water
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1/4 c. parsley
- 6 hard-cooked eggs
- 6 large potatoes, cooked
- 1/4 c. diced onion
- 1 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1 1/4 tsp. pepper

Directions:
- Cook first 7 ingredients over low heat until thick.
- Add mayonnaise, parsley, diced potatoes and onions.
- Salt and pepper to taste.

Original_text:
Christmas Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can cherry pie filling
- 1 can Eagle Brand milk
- 1 (15 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 c. chopped pecans
- 1 c. mini marshmallows
- 1 c. Angel Flake coconut
- 1 (12 oz.) tub Cool Whip

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients and fold into
- Cool Whip. Let set and chill 4 to 5 hours or overnight.

Original_text:
Buffet Salad Bowl

Ingredients:
- 1 c. Italian dressing
- 1 (16 oz.) can cut green beans, drained
- 1 (16 oz.) can whole kernel corn, drained
- 1 (16 oz.) can LeSueur peas, drained
- 1 (4 oz.) can sliced mushrooms, drained
- 1 c. chopped celery
- 1/2 c. minced pimento
- 1 medium red onion, sliced
- 1 tsp. salt
- dash of pepper
- 1 (16 oz.) bean sprouts, drained
- grated Romano cheese

Directions:
- Toss together all ingredients except bean sprouts and cheese. Cover and chill overnight. Before serving, stir in bean sprouts. Sprinkle with cheese.
- Serves 10 to 12.

salad_info: taco salad ingredient hamburger pkg taco seasoning kidney bean head lettuce c thousand island dressing pkg shredded cheddar cheese bag doritos direction fry hamburger add half taco seasoning hamburger fried mix everything else together add rest seasoning
Original_text:
Taco Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. hamburger
- 1 pkg. taco seasoning
- 1 can kidney beans
- 1 head lettuce
- 1 c. Thousand Island dressing
- 1 pkg. shredded Cheddar cheese
- 1 bag Doritos

Directions:
- Fry hamburger.
- Add half taco seasoning to hamburger after fried.
- Mix everything else together.
- Add rest of seasoning.

salad_info: foam salad ingredient pkg orange jello pkg instant vanilla pudding pkg vanilla tapioca pudding c boiling water direction mix first ingredient together dry add boiling water microwave minute let cool add ounce cool whip fold small mandarin orange chill overnight
Original_text:
Foam Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. orange Jell-O
- 1 pkg. instant vanilla pudding
- 1 pkg. vanilla tapioca pudding
- 2 c. boiling water

Directions:
- Mix first 3 ingredients together, dry.
- Add boiling water and microwave 2 minutes.
- Let cool and add 8 ounces Cool Whip, fold in 1 small can mandarin oranges and chill overnight.

salad_info: ribbon salad ingredient pkg red raspberry red cherry jello pkg lime jello cream cheese crushed pineapple envelope plain knox gelatine direction dissolve red jello cup hot water dissolve lime jello cup hot water cool add drained pineapple jello mixture bring pineapple juice boil dissolve knox gelatine cup cold water add pineapple juice stir thoroughly dissolved pineapple juice cool add cream cheese thoroughly blend pour raspberry gelatin inch mold chill firm add pineapplecream cheese mixture chill firm add final layer lime gelatin chill firm
Original_text:
Ribbon Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 pkg. red raspberry or red cherry jello
- 2 pkg. lime jello
- 1 (8 oz.) cream cheese
- 1 (2 lb.) can crushed pineapple
- 1 envelope plain or Knox gelatine

Directions:
- Dissolve the red jello in 1 1/2 cups hot water.
- Dissolve the lime jello in 1 1/2 cups hot water.
- When cool, add the drained pineapple, 1/2 to each of the jello mixtures.
- Bring the pineapple juice to a boil.
- Dissolve the Knox gelatine in 1/4 cup cold water, add to the pineapple juice and stir until thoroughly dissolved.
- When pineapple juice is cool, add the cream cheese and thoroughly blend.
- Pour the raspberry gelatin into an 8-inch mold, chill until firm.
- Add the pineapple-cream cheese mixture, chill until firm, add the final layer of lime gelatin and chill until firm.

salad_info: apple salad ingredient c flour c granulated sugar crushed pineapple drained pt whipping cream unwhipped stick butter diced apple chopped nut cherry direction heavy boiler combine flour sugar pineapple whipping cream cook low heat thickened stirring constantly remove heat add butter stirring melted refrigerate mixture cool place apple serving bowl fold flour pineapple mixture garnish salad nut cherry chill apple peeled color unpeeled
Original_text:
Apple Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/3 c. flour
- 3/4 c. granulated sugar
- 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1/2 pt. whipping cream, unwhipped
- 1/2 stick butter
- 6 diced apples
- chopped nuts and cherries

Directions:
- In heavy boiler, combine flour, sugar, pineapple and whipping cream; cook over low heat until thickened, stirring constantly. Remove from heat, add butter, stirring until melted.
- Refrigerate mixture to cool.
- Place apples in serving bowl; fold in flour, pineapple mixture.
- Garnish salad with nuts and cherries.
- Chill. Apples can be peeled or for more color, unpeeled.

salad_info: strawberry bread ingredient c allpurpose flour tsp salt tsp soda tsp cinnamon c sugar egg well beaten c salad oil c pecan chopped pkg fren sliced strawberry thawed drained direction combine flour salt soda cinnamon sugar make well center dry ingredient add egg oil stirring dry ingredient moistened stir strawberry pecan spoon batter lightly greased inch loaf pan bake hour bread test done
Original_text:
Strawberry Bread

Ingredients:
- 3 c. all-purpose flour
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. soda
- 1 tsp. cinnamon
- 2 c. sugar
- 3 eggs, well beaten
- 1 1/4 c. salad oil
- 1 1/4 c. pecans chopped
- 2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen sliced strawberries, thawed and drained

Directions:
- Combine flour, salt, soda, cinnamon, and sugar. Make a well in center of dry ingredients. Add eggs and oil, stirring only until dry ingredients are moistened. Stir in strawberries and pecans. Spoon batter into 2 lightly greased 8 inch loaf pans. Bake at 350° for 1 hour or until bread tests done.

Original_text:
Artichoke Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 box chicken Rice-A-Roni
- 2 jars marinated artichokes (drain and reserve juice)
- 4 chopped green onions
- 1/2 c. chopped green pepper
- 1 can sliced ripe olives
- 1/4 tsp. curry powder
- 1 chicken, cooked and chopped or use 4 chicken breasts

Directions:
- Cook rice.
- Combine
- artichoke,
- onion,
- pepper, olives and chicken in	a
- large
- bowl.
- Add rice.
- Combine mayonnaise and artichoke liquid.
- Add
- curry powder and mix well.	Add to salad mixture in bowl and refrigerate overnight.	Serves 15.

salad_info: strawberry salad ingredient stick margarine c flour philadelphia cream cheese c confectioner sugar c cool whip large strawberry jello c boiling water box fren strawberry medium crushed pineapple drained direction blend pat first ingredient bottom pan bake minute slightly brown cool mix next ingredient mixer spread crust cool refrigerator dissolve jello water mix defrosted strawberry mix pineapple pour cream cheese mix refrigerate overnight
Original_text:
Strawberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 sticks margarine
- 1 1/2 c. flour
- 1 (8 oz.) Philadelphia cream cheese
- 1 c. confectioners sugar
- 1 c. Cool Whip
- 1 large strawberry jello
- 2 c. boiling water
- 2 boxes frozen strawberries
- 1 medium can crushed pineapple, drained

Directions:
- Blend and pat first 2 ingredients in bottom of pan (9 x 13-inch).
- Bake 15 to 20 minutes at 350° until slightly brown. Cool.
- Mix next 3 ingredients with mixer.
- Spread on crust.
- Cool in refrigerator.
- Dissolve jello and water.
- Mix in defrosted strawberries (slightly defrost strawberries).
- Mix in pineapple. Pour over cream cheese mix and refrigerate overnight.

salad_info: grandma fruit salad ingredient fruit cocktail small crushed pineapple small mandarin orange small box instant vanilla pudding medium banana direction pour can fruit quart casserole drain fruit sprinkle pudding mix fruit slice banana top mix together carefully mash banana fruit refrigerate hour
Original_text:
Grandma'S Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (16 oz.) can fruit cocktail
- 1 small can crushed pineapple
- 1 small can mandarin oranges
- 1 small box instant vanilla pudding
- 1 medium banana (firm)

Directions:
- Pour the cans of fruit into a 1 1/2-quart casserole.
- Do not drain fruit!
- Sprinkle pudding mix over the fruit.
- Slice the banana on top and mix together carefully so as not to mash the banana or fruit.
- Refrigerate 2 to 3 hours.

salad_info: chilled tortellini salad ingredient tricolored cheese tortellini black olive pitted jar broiled mushroom bottle italian dressing grated italian cheese direction cook tortellini according package direction drain put bowl empty olive mushroom chopper chop desired coarseness mix bowl pasta add salad dressing grated cheese toss well refrigerate hour cold serve enjoy
Original_text:
Chilled Tortellini Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. tri-colored cheese tortellini
- 1 (5 oz.) can black olives, pitted
- 1 (4 or 5 oz.) jar or can broiled mushrooms
- 1 bottle Italian dressing
- grated Italian cheese (your choice)

Directions:
- Cook tortellini according to package directions.
- Drain and put into bowl.
- Empty olives and mushrooms in a chopper and chop to desired coarseness; mix into bowl of pasta.
- Add salad dressing and grated cheese and toss well (salad dressing and grated cheese as desired).
- Refrigerate 1 hour or until cold.
- Serve and enjoy!

salad_info: crab meat salad ingredient crab meat diced tomato bunch green onion bell pepper bunch broccoli floweret partially cooked box curly noodle direction mix cup mayonnaise cup zesty italian dressing pour ingredient mix well
Original_text:
Crab Meat Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. crab meat
- 1 diced tomato
- 1 bunch green onions
- 1 bell pepper
- 1 bunch broccoli flowerets, partially cooked
- 1 box curly noodles

Directions:
- Mix 1 cup of mayonnaise and 1 cup of Zesty Italian dressing. Pour over all the ingredients and mix well.

salad_info: broccoli salad ingredient bundle fresh broccoli strip bacon cooked crumbled c sweet onion diced c golden raisin c chopped walnut c mayonnaise c sugar tbsp cider vinegar direction cut hard end broccoli peel remaining stalk slice cut bitesized piece cut bud end dice also place refrigerator dish tight cover add onion used raisin walnut
Original_text:
Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 bundles fresh broccoli
- 4 strips bacon, cooked and crumbled
- 1/4 c. sweet onion, diced (optional)
- 3/4 c. golden raisins
- 1/2 c. chopped walnuts
- 1 c. mayonnaise (lite does not do well)
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 3 Tbsp. cider vinegar

Directions:
- Cut off hard ends of broccoli; peel remaining stalk and slice and cut into bite-sized pieces.
- Cut the bud ends into dice also. Place in a refrigerator dish with a tight cover.
- Add the onion, if used, the raisins and walnuts.

salad_info: fruit salad ingredient box vanilla instant pudding banana libby chunky fruit fruit cocktail mandarin orange pineapple chunk direction slice banana drain fruit pour juice banana minute drain juice banana saving cup juice mix pudding combine fruit mix chill
Original_text:
Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 box vanilla instant pudding
- 4 bananas
- 1 can Libby chunky fruit or fruit cocktail
- 1 can mandarin oranges
- 1 can pineapple chunks

Directions:
- Slice bananas; drain fruit and pour juice over bananas for 3 or 4 minutes.
- Drain juice from bananas, saving 1 1/2 cups juice, and mix with pudding.
- Combine with fruit mix and chill.

salad_info: fruit salad ingredient tbsp butter tbsp flour egg large pineapple small mandarin orange banana c miniature marshmallow c pecan direction melt butter stir flour egg stir juice pineapple cook stir thick pour mixture drained pineapple orange banana marshmallow pecan chill serve
Original_text:
Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 Tbsp. butter
- 2 Tbsp. flour
- 1 egg
- 1 large can pineapple
- 1 small can mandarin oranges
- 4 bananas
- 2 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1/2 c. pecans

Directions:
- Melt the butter, stir in the flour and then the egg.
- Stir in the juice from the can of pineapple.
- Cook and stir until thick. Pour the mixture over the drained pineapple, oranges, bananas, marshmallows and pecans.
- Chill and serve.

salad_info: creamy fruit salad ingredient c miniature marshmallow pt sour cream c mayonnaise dash salt pineapple chunk well drained can mandarin orange well drained banana sliced c seedless grape halved c fresh fruit direction mixing bowl combine marshmallow sour cream mayonnaise salt refrigerate overnight add fruit shortly serving toss gently mix yield serving may doubled
Original_text:
Creamy Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 pt. sour cream
- 1/4 c. mayonnaise
- dash of salt
- 1 can (20 oz.) pineapple chunks, well drained
- 2 cans (11 oz.) mandarin oranges, well drained
- 2 bananas, sliced
- 1 c. seedless grapes, halved
- 2 c. fresh fruit (strawberries, peaches or blueberries)

Directions:
- In mixing bowl combine marshmallows, sour cream, mayonnaise and salt.
- Refrigerate overnight.
- Add fruit shortly before serving.
- Toss gently to mix.
- Yields 12 servings and may be doubled.

salad_info: blueberry salad ingredient pkg blackberry black raspberry jello blueberry drain save juice small crushed pineapple drain save juice c boiling water cream cheese sour cream c sugar tsp vanilla direction stir jello boiling water dissolved use juice cold water adding enough water make cup cool add berry pineapple set whip cream cheese sour cream sugar vanilla spread top sprinkle nut
Original_text:
Blueberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 pkg. blackberry or black raspberry jello
- 1 can blueberries, drain and save juice
- 1 small can crushed pineapple, drain and save juice
- 2 c. boiling water
- 1 (8 oz.) cream cheese
- 1 (8 oz.) sour cream
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. vanilla

Directions:
- Stir jello in boiling water until dissolved.
- Use juices as cold water, adding enough water to make 2 cups.
- Cool, then add berries and pineapple.
- When set, whip cream cheese, sour cream, sugar and vanilla.
- Spread on top and sprinkle with nuts.

salad_info: apple blossom salad ingredient small raspberry jello c hot water c mayonnaise c carnation canned milk c diced apple c finely chopped nut tbsp lemon juice direction mix jello hot water dissolved set mixture refrigerator hour hour mix ingredient together pour mold chill
Original_text:
Apple Blossom Salad(Canadian Friend'S)  

Ingredients:
- 1 small (3 oz.) raspberry jello
- 1 c. hot water
- 1/4 c. mayonnaise
- 1 c. Carnation canned milk
- 1 c. diced apples
- 1/4 c. finely chopped nuts (optional)
- 2 Tbsp. lemon juice

Directions:
- Mix the jello and hot water until dissolved.
- Set the mixture in the refrigerator for 1 hour.
- After the hour is over, mix all the ingredients together.
- Pour into a mold and chill.

salad_info: fresh herbed vermicelli ingredient pkg vermicelli noodle c unsalted butter c chopped green onion c chopped fresh parsley tsp garlic salt tsp coarsely ground pepper direction cook vermicelli according direction drain well set aside saucepan melt butter stir remaining ingredient vermicelli cook medium heat stirring occasionally heated serve green salad great summer lunch serf
Original_text:
Fresh Herbed Vermicelli

Ingredients:
- 1 (6 or 7 oz.) pkg. vermicelli noodles
- 1/3 c. unsalted butter
- 1/2 c. chopped green onions
- 1/2 c. chopped fresh parsley
- 3/4 tsp. garlic salt
- 1/4 tsp. coarsely ground pepper

Directions:
- Cook vermicelli according to directions.
- Drain well.
- Set aside.
- In same saucepan, melt butter.
- Stir in remaining ingredients and vermicelli.
- Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until heated through (3 to 5 minutes).
- Serve with green salad.
- Great summer lunch.
- Serves 6.

salad_info: chicken hacienda ingredient mushroom med onion chopped green pepper chopped tbsp butter margarine pt tomato tsp salt parsley tsp pepper tsp paprika fryer chicken breast c minute rice c sliced green olive fresh cilantro direction drain liquid mushroom broth chicken measure cup saute mushroom green pepper onion butter minute add liquid remaining ingredient except olive rice bring boil cover let simmer low heat minute add rice olive cover simmer minute rice tender liquid absorbed stir frequently dont stick serve toss salad roll
Original_text:
Chicken Hacienda

Ingredients:
- 1 3 oz. can mushrooms
- 1 med. onion chopped
- 1 green pepper chopped
- 3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
- 1 lb. or pt. tomatoes
- 1 tsp. salt and parsley
- 1/4 tsp. pepper
- 1 tsp. paprika
- 1 3 lb. fryer or chicken breast (cooked and deboned)
- 1 c. minute rice
- 1/2 c. sliced green olives
- fresh cilantro

Directions:
- Drain liquid from mushrooms or broth from chicken to measure 1 cup.
- Saute mushrooms, green pepper and onion in butter 2 or 3 minutes.
- Add liquid and remaining ingredients except olives and rice.
- Bring to a boil, cover and let simmer on low heat for 30 minutes.
- Add rice and olives, cover and simmer for 20 minutes until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed.
- Stir frequently so don't stick.
- (Add fresh cilantro to each serving, optional.) Serve with toss salad and rolls.

salad_info: garden macaroni salad ingredient c real mayonnaise pkg cream cheese c sweet relish tbsp mustard c macaroni cooked drained c chopped cucumber c chopped green pepper c radish slice tbsp chopped green onion direction mix cheese mayonnaise together stir relish mustard add remaining ingredient toss lightly spread ring mold chill several hour overnight
Original_text:
Garden Macaroni Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/4 c. real mayonnaise
- 1 pkg. cream cheese
- 1/4 c. sweet relish
- 1 Tbsp. mustard
- 2 c. macaroni, cooked and drained
- 1 c. chopped cucumbers
- 1/2 c. chopped green pepper
- 1/2 c. radish slices
- 2 Tbsp. chopped green onion

Directions:
- Mix cheese and mayonnaise together.
- Stir in relish and mustard.
- Add remaining ingredients and toss lightly.
- Spread into ring mold and chill several hours or overnight.

salad_info: cherry salad ingredient large pkg cherry gelatin dark sweet pitted cherry drained pineapple chunk drained small pkg cream cheese cut cube small pkg pecan chopped direction dissolve gelatin directed package refrigerate gelatin partially set add fruit cream cheese nut return refrigerator firmly set
Original_text:
Cherry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large pkg. cherry gelatin
- 1 can dark sweet pitted cherries, drained (save the juice)
- 1 can pineapple chunks, drained
- 1 small pkg. cream cheese, cut into cubes
- 1 small pkg. pecans, chopped

Directions:
- Dissolve gelatin as directed on package.
- (Can use reserved cherry juice as part of cold water, if chilled.) Refrigerate gelatin until partially set.
- Add fruit, cream cheese and nuts. Return to refrigerator until firmly set.

salad_info: refreshing strawberryspinach salad ingredient raw spinach pt fresh strawberry small white onion c sugar c vinegar tsp dry mustard tsp salt tbsp minced onion tbsp poppy seed c vegetable oil direction clean spinach strawberry cut strawberry half combine bowl slice onion ring add spinach strawberry
Original_text:
Refreshing Strawberry-Spinach Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. raw spinach
- 1 pt. fresh strawberries
- 1 small white onion
- 3/4 c. sugar
- 1/3 c. vinegar
- 1 tsp. dry mustard
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. minced onion
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. poppy seeds
- 1 c. vegetable oil

Directions:
- Clean spinach and strawberries.
- Cut strawberries into halves.
- Combine in a bowl.
- Slice onion into rings and add to spinach and strawberries.

Original_text:
Sauerkraut Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large can kraut, drained
- 1 green pepper, chopped fine
- 1 medium onion, chopped fine
- 2 c. cut celery
- 2 c. sugar
- 1/2 c. vinegar

Directions:
- Heat together the sugar and vinegar until sugar dissolves. Pour over vegetables.
- Make at least 24 hours before serving. Makes 1 1/2 quarts.
- Keeps well.

salad_info: parmesan ovenfried chicken ingredient c fine dried bread crumb c parmesan cheese tbsp diced parsley tsp garlic salt tsp pepper chicken breast skinned chicken thigh c italian local dressing vegetable cooking spray direction combine first ingredient set aside dip chicken salad dressing dredge bread crumb mixture place chicken bone side x x inch baking dish coated cooking spray bake uncovered minute le thigh tender low calorie tasty easy prepare
Original_text:
Parmesan Oven-Fried Chicken

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. fine dried bread crumbs
- 1/3 c. Parmesan cheese
- 2 Tbsp. diced parsley
- 1/4 tsp. garlic salt
- 1/4 tsp. pepper
- 6 chicken breasts or 8 to 9 skinned chicken thighs
- 1/4 c. Italian lo-cal dressing
- vegetable cooking spray

Directions:
- Combine first 5 ingredients and set aside.
- Dip chicken in salad dressing, then dredge in bread crumb mixture.
- Place chicken, bone side down, in a 9 x 13 x 2-inch baking dish, coated with cooking spray.
- Bake, uncovered, for 45 to 50 minutes (breasts), less for thighs, or until tender, at 350°.
- Low calorie and tasty!
- Easy to prepare.

salad_info: chicken salad honey dressing ingredient honey dressing c cut cooked chicken c green red grape c sliced green onion c chopped green bell pepper sliced water chestnut drained orange peeled sectioned head lettuce torn bitesize piece c slivered almond toasted direction prepare honey dressing toss chicken grape onion bell pepper water chestnut dressing large bowl cover refrigerate hour chilled toss chicken mixture orange lettuce serve lettuce leaf desired sprinkle almond yield serving
Original_text:
Chicken Salad With Honey Dressing

Ingredients:
- Honey Dressing
- 3 c. cut up cooked chicken
- 1 1/2 c. green or red grapes
- 1/4 c. sliced green onions
- 1/4 c. chopped green bell pepper
- 1 can (8 oz.) sliced water chestnuts, drained
- 2 oranges, peeled and sectioned
- 1/4 head lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces (about 3 c.)
- 1/4 c. slivered almonds, toasted

Directions:
- Prepare Honey Dressing.
- Toss chicken, grapes, onions, bell pepper, water chestnuts and dressing in large bowl.
- Cover and refrigerate about 2 hours or until chilled.
- Toss chicken mixture, oranges and lettuce.
- Serve on lettuce leaves if desired. Sprinkle with almonds.
- Yields 6 servings.

salad_info: waldorf grape salad ingredient c seedless grape c diced apple c sliced celery c chopped walnut c diced swiss cheese c whipped cream c mayonnaise tsp lemon juice tbsp sugar direction toss grape apple celery walnut cheese add mayo lemon juice sugar mix well fold whipped cream may served served lettuce cup
Original_text:
Waldorf Grape Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. seedless grapes
- 1 c. diced apples
- 1 c. sliced celery
- 1 c. chopped walnuts
- 1 c. diced Swiss cheese
- 1/2 c. whipped cream
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1 tsp. lemon juice
- 1 Tbsp. sugar

Directions:
- Toss grapes, apples, celery, walnuts and cheese.
- Add mayo, lemon juice and sugar.
- Mix well.
- Fold in whipped cream.
- May be served as is or served in lettuce cups.

salad_info: apple salad ingredient c raw apple pineapple tidbit c maraschino cherry c pecan c miniature marshmallow tbsp flour tsp sugar c mayonnaise direction drain pineapple add flour sugar juice heat stirring constantly long enough thicken cool add mayonnaise pour mixture fruit marshmallow store refrigerator one day overnight blend flavor salad keep day
Original_text:
Apple Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. raw apples
- 1 can pineapple tidbits
- 1/2 c. maraschino cherries
- 1/2 c. pecans
- 1 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 Tbsp. flour
- 1 tsp. sugar
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise

Directions:
- Drain pineapple; add flour and sugar to juice.
- Heat, stirring constantly, just long enough to thicken.
- Cool.
- Add mayonnaise. Pour mixture over fruit and marshmallows and store in refrigerator one day or overnight to blend flavor.
- This salad will keep 3 or 4 days.

salad_info: green bean salad ingredient cut green bean drained small onion cut fine c diced celery pimento diced tomato peeled cut inch piece small cucumber peeled diced tsp salt tsp pepper direction marinate green bean french dressing garlic added let stand several hour mix ingredient chill salad served combine bean ingredient add french dressing serve lettuce cup serf
Original_text:
Green Bean Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (No. 2) can cut green beans, drained
- 1 small onion, cut fine
- 1/2 c. diced celery
- 1 pimento, diced
- 1 tomato, peeled and cut in 1-inch pieces
- 1 small cucumber, peeled and diced
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/4 tsp. pepper

Directions:
- Marinate green beans in French dressing to which garlic has been added.
- Let stand several hours.
- Mix all ingredients and chill.
- Just before salad is to be served, combine beans and all other ingredients.
- Add more French dressing and serve in lettuce cups.
- Serves 6.

salad_info: oyster cracker ingredient plain oyster cracker pkg hidden valley ranch buttermilk dry mix tsp lemon pepper tsp dill weed tsp garlic powder c salad oil direction combine hidden valley ranch mix oil add dill weed lemon pepper garlic powder pour cracker stir coat place warm oven minute
Original_text:
Oyster Crackers

Ingredients:
- 12 to 16 oz. plain oyster crackers
- 1 pkg. Hidden Valley Ranch buttermilk dry mix
- 1/4 tsp. lemon pepper
- 1 tsp. dill weed
- 1/4 tsp. garlic powder
- 3/4 c. salad oil

Directions:
- Combine Hidden Valley Ranch mix and oil; add dill weed, lemon pepper and garlic powder.
- Pour over crackers; stir to coat. Place in warm oven for 15 to 20 minutes.

salad_info: heavenly fruit salad ingredient large fruit cocktail drained well large sweet orange cut large apple cut banana cut c small marshmallow direction combine fruit marshmallow add teaspoon vanilla teaspoon sugar fold pint cool whip chill serve
Original_text:
Heavenly Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large can fruit cocktail, drained well
- 1 large sweet orange, cut up
- 1 large apple, cut up
- 2 bananas, cut up
- 1 c. small marshmallows

Directions:
- Combine fruit and marshmallows.
- Add 1 teaspoon vanilla and 1 teaspoon sugar.
- Fold in 1 pint Cool Whip.
- Chill.
- Serve.

salad_info: quick bean salad ingredient kidney bean chickpea cut green bean bottle italian dressing small onion thinly sliced direction drain canned bean mix together add dressing onion mix cover chill hour serving
Original_text:
Quick 3 Bean Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can kidney beans
- 1 can chickpeas
- 1 can cut green beans
- 1 bottle Italian dressing
- 1 small onion, thinly sliced

Directions:
- Drain canned beans.
- Mix together; add dressing and onion. Mix, cover and chill 2 hours before serving.

salad_info: cherry fruit salad ingredient pkg cherry jello pkg strawberry jello pkg cream cheese softened cherry crushed pineapple c chopped pecan c cocacola classic direction drain juice cherry pineapple heat juice boiling pour jello stirring dissolved let cool starting gel beat cheese mixer soft stir pineapple cherry nut add jello mixture blend well stir cocacola blend pour oiled mold congeal make large mold medium size mold
Original_text:
Cherry Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (6 oz.) pkg. cherry Jell-O
- 1 (6 oz.) pkg. strawberry Jell-O
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
- 1 (20 oz.) can cherries (sour, pitted)
- 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple
- 1 c. chopped pecans
- 2 c. Coca-Cola Classic (no substitute)

Directions:
- Drain juices from cherries and pineapple.
- Heat juices to boiling and pour over Jell-O, stirring until dissolved.
- Let cool until starting to gel.
- Beat cheese with mixer until very soft. Stir in pineapple, cherries and nuts.
- Add to Jell-O mixture and blend well.
- Then stir in Coca-Cola and blend again.
- Pour into oiled molds to congeal.
- Makes 1 large mold or 2 medium size molds.

salad_info: vegetable dip ingredient c sour cream c salad dressing tbsp dried parsley tbsp dried onion flake tsp dill weed tsp accent tsp celery salt tsp garlic salt direction mix well store refrigerator hour serving keep week sealed container
Original_text:
Vegetable Dip

Ingredients:
- 1 c. sour cream
- 1 c. salad dressing
- 1 Tbsp. dried parsley
- 1 Tbsp. dried onion flakes
- 1 tsp. dill weed
- 1 tsp. Accent
- 1 tsp. celery salt
- 1 tsp. garlic salt

Directions:
- Mix well and store in refrigerator for 4 hours before serving. Will keep 3 weeks in sealed container.

salad_info: shrimp salad ingredient chicken noodle soup cream cheese box lemon jello c boiling water c mayonnaise shrimp c celery cut fine c green pepper cut fine c green onion cut fine small jar pimento cut fine direction heat soup cream cheese cheese melt cool dissolve lemon jello cup boiling water add mayonnaise add mixture soup cream cheese add shrimp celery green pepper onion pimento chill firm
Original_text:
Shrimp Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (10 3/4 oz.) can chicken noodle soup
- 1 (8 oz.) cream cheese
- 1 (3 oz.) box lemon jello
- 1/4 c. boiling water
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1 can shrimp
- 1/3 c. celery, cut fine
- 1/3 c. green pepper, cut fine
- 1/3 c. green onion, cut fine
- 1 small jar pimentos, cut fine

Directions:
- Heat soup and cream cheese until cheese melts; cool.
- Dissolve lemon jello in 1/4 cup boiling water.
- Add mayonnaise.
- Add this mixture to the soup and cream cheese.
- Add shrimp, celery, green pepper, onion and pimentos.
- Chill until firm.

salad_info: spaghetti salad ingredient spaghetti large bottle italian dressing bottle salad supreme tomato chopped cucumber chopped green pepper chopped onion chopped direction cook spaghetti according package direction drain add bottle salad supreme mix well add dressing chopped vegetable mix well chill
Original_text:
Spaghetti Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 LB. Spaghetti
- 1 large bottle Italian Dressing
- 1 bottle Salad Supreme
- 2-3 Tomatoes chopped
- 2-3 Cucumbers chopped
- 1 Green Pepper chopped
- 1 Onion chopped

Directions:
- Cook spaghetti according to package directions; drain.
- Add bottle of salad supreme; mix well.
- Add dressing and chopped vegetables.
- Mix well and chill.

salad_info: chicken salad ingredient c cooked chicken tsp salt tbsp lemon juice c thinly sliced celery c seedless grape c mayonnaise c toasted slivered almond small pineapple tidbit drained lettuce cup direction combine first ingredient refrigerate several hour toss chicken mixture grape pineapple tidbit mayonnaise almond arrange lettuce
Original_text:
Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 c. cooked chicken
- 1 tsp. salt
- 2 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1 c. thinly sliced celery
- 1 c. seedless grapes
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1/2 c. toasted, slivered almonds
- 1 small can pineapple tidbits, drained
- 6 lettuce cups

Directions:
- Combine the first 4 ingredients and refrigerate several hours. Toss chicken mixture with grapes, pineapple tidbits, mayonnaise and almonds.
- Arrange on lettuce.

salad_info: italian dressing ingredient c vinegar c salad oil tbsp snipped fresh parsley tsp salt tsp sugar tsp dry mustard tsp dried oregano crushed tsp paprika tsp pepper clove garlic peeled minced pressed direction pour vinegar glass mixing bowl gradually add oil beating vigorously wire whip add remaining ingredient beat well blend thoroughly cover let stand least hour blend flavor store fridge shake well using make cup
Original_text:
Italian Dressing

Ingredients:
- 1/4 c. vinegar
- 1 c. salad oil
- 1 Tbsp. snipped fresh parsley
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. sugar
- 1 tsp. dry mustard
- 1/2 tsp. dried oregano, crushed
- 1/2 tsp. paprika
- 1/4 tsp. pepper
- 1 clove garlic, peeled, minced or pressed

Directions:
- Pour vinegar into a glass mixing bowl; gradually add oil, beating vigorously with a wire whip.
- Add remaining ingredients and beat well to blend thoroughly.
- Cover and let stand at least 2 hours to blend flavors.
- Store in the fridge.
- Shake well before using.
- Makes 1 1/2 cups.

Original_text:
Favorite Dressing

Ingredients:
- 1 c. Wesson oil
- 7 Tbsp. vinegar

- 1 tsp. celery seed

Directions:
- Mix in all ingredients; beat with electric mixer until thick. Keep refrigerated, but do not freeze.

Original_text:
Macaroni And Cheese Salad

Directions:

Original_text:
Spinach Dip

Ingredients:
- 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
- 1 (8 oz.) can water chestnuts, drained and chopped
- 1 pkg. dry Mrs. Grass onion soup mix
- 1 c. dairy sour cream
- 1 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing
- 1 round loaf Italian bread (long may be used)

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together.
- Refrigerate.
- Scoop out center of round bread.
- Fill center with the dip.
- Cut scooped out bread into cubes to dip with.
- When cubes are all gone, pull off chunks of round bread.

Original_text:
Cherry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can Eagle Brand milk
- 1 large can pineapple, drained
- 1 (9 oz.) carton whipped topping
- 1 can cherry pie filling
- 1 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 c. nuts

Directions:
- Mix Eagle Brand milk and pineapple together, then add remaining ingredients.

salad_info: pumpkin cooky ingredient c brown sugar c cooked canned pumpkin c salad oil tsp vanilla c sifted flour tsp soda tsp baking powder tsp salt cinnamon nutmeg tsp ginger c raisin c chopped nut direction mixing bowl beat together sugar pumpkin oil vanilla sift together dry ingredient add raisin nut blend mixture together drop spoonful onto oiled baking sheet bake minute
Original_text:
Pumpkin Cookies

Ingredients:
- 2 c. brown sugar
- 2 c. cooked or canned pumpkin
- 1 c. salad oil
- 2 tsp. vanilla
- 4 c. sifted flour
- 2 tsp. soda
- 2 tsp. baking powder
- 1 tsp. each: salt, cinnamon and nutmeg
- 1/2 tsp. ginger
- 2 c. raisins
- 1 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- In mixing bowl, beat together the sugar, pumpkin, oil and vanilla.
- Sift together the dry ingredients.
- Add raisins and nuts.
- Blend both mixtures together.
- Drop by spoonfuls onto oiled baking sheet.
- Bake at 350° for 12 to 15 minutes.

Original_text:
Orange-Pineapple Ice Cream Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. orange-pineapple jello
- 1 small can oranges
- 1 small can pineapple
- 2 pt. vanilla ice cream
- 1/2 c. pecans
- 1 c. grated Longhorn cheese

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in 1 cup hot water and add ice cream until completely melted.
- Add oranges, pineapple, pecans and cheese.

Original_text:
Rice-A-Roni Salad

- 1 box chicken flavor Rice-A-Roni

- 1 can water chestnuts, chopped

Original_text:
Christmas Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (16 oz.) dark red kidney beans, rinsed and drained
- 1 c. celery, thinly sliced
- 1/3 c. onion, thinly sliced
- 1/2 c. green pepper, thinly sliced
- 2 c. sharp Cheddar cheese, diced

Directions:
- Combine thoroughly and chill overnight.

Original_text:
Sharon'S Cauliflower & Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head of each, broccoli & cauliflower, broken in tiny pieces
- 1 c. miracle whip
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 2 Tbsp. vinegar

Directions:

Original_text:
Rainbow Salad

Ingredients:
- cherry, lemon, lime and orange jello
- 1 1/2 c. water each
- 2 c. milk
- 1 c. sugar
- 2 envelopes gelatin
- 4 Tbsp. cold water
- 1 pt. sour cream
- 1 tsp. vanilla

Directions:
- Use a 9 x 13-inch glass pan.
- Mix 1 cup of boiling water with each box of jello; stir until dissolved and add 1/2 cup cold water; let stand.
- Put first jello mixture in 9 x 13-inch pan; refrigerate for at least 20 minutes until firm.

Original_text:
Frozen Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 8 oz. cream cheese
- 1 pt. strawberries
- 12 oz. Cool Whip
- 3/4 c. sugar
- 16 oz. can crushed pineapple
- 1/4 tsp. red coloring

Directions:
- With mixer, mix well.
- Put in long Pyrex dish about 1 to 2 inches high.
- Serves 12 people.
- Keep in freezer at all times.

Original_text:
Pasta Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. box spiral noodles (colored)
- 1/2 head cauliflower (flowerets)
- 1/2 head broccoli (flowerets)
- 2 c. carrots, chopped
- 1 medium onion, chopped
- 4 stalks celery, chopped

Directions:
- Boil noodles until done.
- Add all veggies and mix together. Add one large bottle Zesty Italian dressing.
- Let chill.
- Then ready to munch.

Original_text:
Cherry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can cherry pie filling
- 1 (12 oz.) Cool Whip
- 1 large can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 c. chopped pecans
- 1 c. coconut
- 1 c. mini marshmallows

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together and refrigerate.

Original_text:
Macaroni Vegetable Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. cooked macaroni
- 1 c. diced, cooked carrots
- 1 c. cooked peas
- 1/2 c. chopped celery
- 2 tsp. finely chopped onions
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/4 tsp. pepper

Directions:
- In large bowl, combine macaroni, carrots, and peas.
- Chop up celery and onions;
- add to mixture.
- Stir in salt, pepper, and mayonnaise.
- Serve chilled.

salad_info: hot chicken salad ingredient c chicken cooked cut c cooked rice c celery chopped c onion chopped cream chicken soup tsp lemon juice c mayonnaise hardboiled egg stack ritz cracker stick oleo whole fryer c rice c mayonnaise c chicken broth direction mix place casserole crumble ritz cracker sprinkle top melt oleo pour cracker bake minute slice egg top baking
Original_text:
Hot Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. chicken, cooked and cut up
- 1 c. cooked rice
- 2/3 c. celery, chopped
- 1/4 c. onion, chopped
- 1 can cream of chicken soup
- 1 tsp. lemon juice
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 3 hard-boiled eggs
- 1 stack (34) Ritz crackers
- 1 stick oleo
- 1 whole fryer
- 2 c. rice
- 2/3 c. mayonnaise
- 1/2 c. chicken broth

Directions:
- Mix and place in a casserole.
- Crumble Ritz crackers and sprinkle over top.
- Melt oleo and pour over crackers.
- Bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes.
- Slice eggs over top after baking.

salad_info: cranberry salad ingredient fresh cranberry medium orange unpeeled medium apple unpeeled c chopped nut crushed pineapple drained large box lemon gelatin large box orange gelatin direction grind cranberry orange apple together stir nut pineapple set aside mix box gelatin according package direction reduce amount water required cup chill gelatin start thicken add fruit nut mixture pour bowl mold desired
Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. fresh cranberries
- 1 medium orange, unpeeled
- 1 medium apple, unpeeled
- 1 c. chopped nuts
- 1 (15 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 large box lemon gelatin
- 1 large box orange gelatin

Directions:
- Grind cranberries, orange and apple together.
- Stir in nuts and pineapple and set aside.
- Mix 2 boxes gelatin according to package directions; reduce amount of water required by 1/2 cup. Chill until gelatin starts to thicken (not set), then add fruit and nut mixture.
- Pour in bowl or mold as desired.

salad_info: pineapple nut salad ingredient pkg lemon gelatin c boiling water crushed pineapple c cottage cheese c nondairy creamer tbsp lemon juice c broken walnut pecan direction dissolve gelatin water drain pineapple juice measuring cup add water make cup stir gelatin mixture combine cottage cheese pineapple creamer lemon juice add nut stir gelatin mixture chill
Original_text:
Pineapple Nut Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon gelatin
- 1 c. boiling water
- 1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple
- 1 c. cottage cheese
- 1/2 c. nondairy creamer
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1/2 c. broken walnuts or pecans

Directions:
- Dissolve gelatin in water.
- Drain pineapple juice into measuring cup.
- Add water to make 1 cup.
- Stir into gelatin mixture.
- Combine cottage cheese, pineapple, creamer and lemon juice.
- Add nuts; stir into gelatin mixture.
- Chill.

salad_info: cranberry salad ingredient whole cranberry sauce c boiling water pkg strawberry jello tbsp lemon juice tsp salt c mayonnaise apple diced c chopped walnut direction heat cranberry sauce strain mix liquid boiling water jello stirring completely dissolved add lemon juice salt chill mixture slightly thickened add mayonnaise beat fluffy fold reserved cranberry apple nut
Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (1 lb.) can whole cranberry sauce
- 1 c. boiling water
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. strawberry jello
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1 apple, diced
- 1/4 c. chopped walnuts

Directions:
- Heat cranberry sauce; strain.
- Mix liquid, boiling water and jello, stirring until completely dissolved.
- Add lemon juice and salt.
- Chill mixture until slightly thickened.
- Add mayonnaise; beat until fluffy.
- Fold in reserved cranberries, apples and nuts.

Curried Carrots

- 1 onion
- 1 green pepper

- 1 tsp. mustard
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 can tomato soup
- 1/4 c. vinegar
- 1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
- 2 lb. cooked carrots
- salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- Chop onion and green pepper.
- Mix all ingredients together and mix well.

Original_text:
Day-Ahead Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head lettuce
- 1 c celery
- 1/2 t pepper
- 1 small onion, chopped
- 1 box frozen peas
- 1 1/4 c mayonnaise
- 1 t sugar
- Parmesan cheese, grated
- bacon bits

Directions:
- Layer the lettuce, celery, pepper and onion in a dish.
- Top with the frozen peas but do not mix.
- Add mayonnaise and sugar but do not mix.
- Top with Parmesan cheese and bacon bits.
- Cover with aluminum foil and refrigerate overnight.
- Toss when ready to serve.

Original_text:
Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large box jello (any flavor)
- 1 large container Cool Whip
- 1 large container small curd cottage cheese

- 1 can mandarin oranges

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients well and chill. Good for quick desserts.

Original_text:

Ingredients:

- 2/3 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
- 2 Tbsp. minced onion
- 1 Tbsp. snipped parsley
- 1 Tbsp. dried dill weed
- 1/4 tsp. dry mustard

Directions:
- Stir until well blended and smooth.
- Cover and chill.
- Makes about 1 1/2 cups.

Original_text:
Easy Carrot Cakelubbock, Texas

- 1 2 layer yellow cake mix

- 4 eggs
- 1/4 c. cold water
- 2 tsp. cinnamon
- 2 c. finely shredded carrots
- 1/2 c. walnuts or pecans
- 1 16 oz. tub vanilla ready frosting

Directions:
- Combine cake mix, salad dressing, eggs, water and cinnamon, mixing at medium speed with electric mixer until well blended.

Original_text:
Artichoke Heart Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. chicken Rice-A-Roni
- 1/4 c. finely chopped green peppers
- 1 jar drained and diced marinated artichoke hearts
- salt and pepper to taste

Original_text:
Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. cooked, cubed chicken
- 1/2 c. chopped celery
- 1/4 c. salted almonds or slivered almonds
- 1 c. seedless grapes (red or white)
- mayonnaise
- lettuce
- pimentos and olives

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients except lettuce, pimentos and olives. Serve on lettuce.
- Garnish with pimentos and olives.

Original_text:
Summer Squash Packets

Ingredients:
- 1 medium zucchini
- 1 medium yellow squash
- 1 medium red onion
- 1/4 c. bottled Italian salad dressing

Directions:
- Cut zucchini and squash into 3/4-inch slices or chunks to make about 3 cups.
- Cut red onion onto 8 wedges.
- Mix vegetables together and toss with salad dressing.
- Fold into foil packets. Grill 4-inches from hot coals for 10 to 12 minutes, turning once with tongs or bake foil packets in 400° oven for 30 minutes.
