Original_text:
Broccoli-N-Olive Salad

Ingredients:
- 10 oz. frozen chopped broccoli, thawed and drained
- 1 1/2 c. stuffed olives, finely sliced
- 1 medium onion, chopped
- 6 eggs, hard-boiled and chopped
- 5 oz. water chestnuts, sliced
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise

Directions:
- Combine thawed broccoli, olives, onion, eggs and water chestnuts.
- Coat with mayonnaise.
- Serve chilled in bowl or in hollowed out honeydew melon shell.

salad_info: make ahead salad ingredient head lettuce head cauliflower c mayonnaise medium onion sliced fried crumbled bacon c parmesan cheese c white sugar direction break lettuce cauliflower put layer bowl cover mayonnaise add onion bacon cheese sugar layer cover tightly hour toss serving
Original_text:
Make Ahead Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head lettuce
- 1 head cauliflower
- 2 c. mayonnaise
- 1 medium onion, sliced
- 1 lb. fried and crumbled bacon
- 1/3 c. Parmesan cheese
- 1/4 c. white sugar

Directions:
- Break up lettuce and cauliflower and put in layers in bowl. Cover with mayonnaise and add onion, bacon, cheese and sugar in layers.
- Cover tightly for 24 to 48 hours.
- Toss just before serving.

salad_info: southern chicken salad baked pie shell ingredient whole boneless chicken breast c celery diced c pineapple chunk halved drained c pecan chopped halved c whipping cream whipped c mayonnaise inch baked pie shell direction poach skin chicken cut inch chunk blend mayonnaise whipped cream toss coat chicken celery pineapple nut season salt pepper taste mound baked pie shell chill serve wedge
Original_text:
Southern Chicken Salad In Baked Pie Shell

Ingredients:
- 4 whole boneless chicken breasts
- 2 c. celery, diced
- 2 c. pineapple chunks, halved and drained
- 1 c. pecans, chopped or halved
- 1/2 c. whipping cream, whipped
- 1 c. mayonnaise (Hellmann's or Best Foods)
- 9 or 10-inch baked pie shell

Directions:
- Poach and skin chicken; cut into 1-inch chunks.
- Blend the mayonnaise and whipped cream.
- Toss to coat chicken, celery, pineapple and nuts.
- Season with salt and pepper to taste.
- Mound in baked pie shell.
- Chill; serve in wedges.

salad_info: creamy french dressing ingredient tbsp vinegar tbsp sugar tsp paprika clove garlic minced tsp worcestershire sauce tsp salt tsp dry mustard dash red pepper c salad oil direction small mixing bowl blender combine vinegar sugar paprika garlic worcestershire sauce salt dry mustard red pepper mixer running slowly add oil thin steady stream continue mixing mixture reach desired consistency serve immediately cover store refrigerator week
Original_text:
Creamy French Dressing

Ingredients:
- 3 Tbsp. vinegar
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 2 tsp. paprika
- 1 clove garlic, minced
- 1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1/4 tsp. dry mustard
- dash of red pepper
- 3/4 c. salad oil

Directions:
- In a small mixing bowl or blender, combine vinegar, sugar, paprika, garlic, Worcestershire sauce, salt, dry mustard and red pepper.
- With mixer running, slowly add oil in a thin steady stream.
- Continue mixing until mixture reaches desired consistency. Serve immediately or cover and store in refrigerator for up to 2 weeks.

salad_info: grandma fruit salad ingredient pineapple chunk drained fruit cocktail drained peach sliced pkg instant lemon pudding mix direction place fruit large bowl sprinkle lemon pudding top mix well thickened chill
Original_text:
Grandma'S Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (20 oz.) can pineapple chunks, drained
- 1 (15 oz.) can fruit cocktail, drained
- 1 (29 oz.) can peaches, sliced (do not drain)
- 1 (3.4 oz.) pkg. instant lemon pudding mix

Directions:
- Place fruit in a large bowl. Sprinkle lemon pudding on top and mix well until thickened. Chill.

salad_info: black bean salad ingredient black bean drained rinsed small green pepper cut bitesize strip small carrot coarsely shredded tbsp chopped red onion lettuce leaf tsp salt tbsp vegetable oil tsp shredded lime peel tbsp lime juice tsp ground cumin tsp ground red pepper direction serve high fiber lowfat salad grilled fish poultry rinsing canned bean remove salt added processing also soak cook drain cup dry black bean
Original_text:
Black Bean Salad

Ingredients:
- 15 oz. can black beans, drained and rinsed
- 1 small green pepper, cut in bite-size strips
- 1 small carrot, coarsely shredded
- 1 Tbsp. chopped red onion
- lettuce leaves (optional)
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
- 1/4 tsp. shredded lime peel
- 2 Tbsp. lime juice
- 1/8 tsp. ground cumin
- 1/8 tsp. ground red pepper

Directions:
- Serve this high fiber, low-fat salad with grilled fish or poultry.
- Rinsing canned beans removes some of the salt added during processing.
- You can also soak, cook and drain about 3/4 cup dry black beans (use 1 1/2 cups cooked).

salad_info: chicken cacciatore ingredient frying chicken cut salt pepper c salad oil chopped onion clove garlic crushed sliced mushroom can italian style tomato tsp salt tsp oregano tsp allspice direction sprinkle chicken salt pepper brown oil skillet add onion garlic mushroom cook onion soft combine remaining ingredient pour chicken cover simmer minute uncover simmer minute longer thicken sauce desired serve spaghetti
Original_text:
Chicken Cacciatore

Ingredients:
- 1 frying chicken, cut up
- salt and pepper
- 1/4 c. salad oil
- 1 chopped onion
- 1 clove garlic, crushed
- 2 oz. sliced mushrooms
- 2 (14 oz.) cans Italian style tomatoes
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/4 tsp. oregano
- 1/4 tsp. allspice

Directions:
- Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper.
- Brown in oil in skillet.
- Add onion, garlic and mushrooms.
- Cook until onion is soft.
- Combine remaining ingredients and pour over chicken.
- Cover and simmer 30 minutes.
- Uncover and simmer 15 minutes longer. Thicken sauce if desired.
- Serve over spaghetti.

Original_text:
Rainbow Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 box cherry or strawberry Jell-O
- 1 box lime Jell-O
- 1 box lemon Jell-O
- 1 pkg. little marshmallows
- 2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
- 1 can crushed pineapple, drained
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 1 bowl whipped cream

Directions:
- Mix cherry or strawberry Jell-O as directed on box and let jell.
- Mix lemon Jell-O with hot water and pineapple juice.
- Mix cream cheese, mayonnaise and whipped cream together.
- Add marshmallows and crushed pineapple and lemon Jell-O.
- Pour over first layer.
- Let jell.
- Mix lime Jell-O and pour on top.
- Let jell.

Original_text:
Kraut Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 qt. drained kraut
- 2 c. diced celery
- 1 medium onion, diced
- 1 green pepper, diced
- 1 small jar red pimentos, diced
- 1 1/4 c. sugar
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 1/4 c. salad oil
- 1 tsp. celery seed

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients thoroughly.
- Chill.
- Refrigerate 8 to 12 hours and serve.

Original_text:
Friendship Cake

Ingredients:
- 1 box orange cake mix or yellow butter cake mix (do not use mix with pudding)
- 1 small box instant vanilla pudding mix
- 1 1/2 c. drained fruit (from friendship cup)
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 4 eggs
- 1 c. nuts
- 1 c. raisins

Directions:
- Mix all together and bake in a Bundt or tube pan for 1 hour at 350° or until done.
- You may want to put a pan of water in bottom of oven for moisture.
- Ice your cake with your favorite frosting or eat plain without frosting.
- Yield:
- 1 cake.

salad_info: cream cheese pineapple salad ingredient medium crushed pineapple c sugar tbsp knox unflavored gelatine cream cheese pt whipping cream envelope dream whip direction heat pineapple sugar sugar dissolved dissolve cold water gelatine add mixture let cream cheese soften room temperature add pineapple mixture let set partially set whip cream fold chill serve lettuce leaf top cherry
Original_text:
Cream Cheese Pineapple Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 medium can crushed pineapple
- 1 c. sugar
- 2 Tbsp. Knox unflavored gelatine
- 8 oz. cream cheese
- 1 pt. whipping cream or 2 to 3 envelopes Dream Whip

Directions:
- Heat pineapple and sugar until sugar is dissolved.
- Dissolve in cold water the gelatine.
- Add to mixture.
- Let cream cheese soften at room temperature, then add to pineapple mixture.
- Let set until partially set.
- Whip the cream and fold in.
- Chill. Serve on lettuce leaf.
- Top with cherry.

salad_info: hot chicken salad ingredient c cooked chicken diced large c celery thinly sliced c bread cube toasted c mayonnaise tsp sugar c almond sliced toasted tbsp lemon juice tsp grated onion tsp salt tsp curry powder c crushed potato chip c mild cheddar cheese grated direction large bowl mix together mayonnaise sugar lemon juice grated onion salt curry powder add chicken celery bread cube toss lightly mix place x inch baking dish sprinkle crushed potato chip cheese bake minute hot serf wonderful lady luncheon company arrives unexpectedly
Original_text:
Hot Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 c. cooked chicken, diced large
- 3 c. celery, thinly sliced
- 1 1/2 c. bread cubes, toasted
- 1 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1 tsp. sugar
- 3/4 c. almonds, sliced and toasted
- 3 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 3 tsp. grated onion
- 3/4 tsp. salt
- 1/8 tsp. curry powder (optional)
- 1 c. crushed potato chips
- 1/2 c. mild Cheddar cheese, grated

Directions:
- In large bowl, mix together mayonnaise, sugar, lemon juice, grated onion, salt and curry powder.
- Add chicken, celery and bread cubes; toss lightly to mix.
- Place in 13 x 9-inch baking dish.
- Sprinkle with crushed potato chips, then cheese.
- Bake at 450° for 15 minutes or until hot.
- Serves 8.
- Wonderful for ladies' luncheons or when company arrives unexpectedly.

Original_text:
Chili

Ingredients:
- 2 lb. hamburger
- 1 onion, chopped
- 2 (6 oz.) cans tomato paste
- 6 cans water
- salt and pepper to taste
- 1 large (12 oz.) can chili beans
- 2 pkg. chili seasoning mix
- 2 Tbsp. hot Pete

Directions:
- Brown hamburger and onions in a large pot.
- Stir in tomato paste and simmer.
- Add remaining ingredients and cook on low heat for 30 minutes.
- Makes a complete meal served with green salad. Serves 8 to 10.

salad_info: cauliflower lima bean salad ingredient large cauliflower tbsp fruit fresh water box fren baby lima bean envelope original hidden valley ranch salad dressing mix c mayonnaise diced pimento direction break cauliflower small floweret add fruit fresh ice cube enough water cover hour drain cook lima bean drain mix mayonnaise dressing mix blend vegetable refrigerate better made least hour serving
Original_text:
Cauliflower - Lima Bean Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large cauliflower
- 2 Tbsp. Fruit Fresh
- water (8 ice cubes)
- 1 (10 oz.) box frozen baby lima beans
- 1 envelope original Hidden Valley Ranch salad dressing mix (do not add milk)
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 (2 oz.) diced pimento (optional)

Directions:
- Break cauliflower in small flowerets.
- Add to Fruit Fresh, ice cubes and enough water to cover for about 2 hours.
- Drain. Cook lima beans.
- Drain.
- Mix mayonnaise and dressing mix.
- Blend with vegetables.
- Refrigerate.
- Better if made at least 12 hours before serving.

salad_info: amigo deep fried ice cream ingredient chocolate chip ice cream cup corn flake crushed tbsp sugar tsp ground cinnamon egg tsp water inch flour tortilla oil deep fry cinnamon sugar mixed whipped cream maraschino cherry direction form ice cream ball place baking pan freeze solid hour mix cereal sugar cinnamon divide mix equally pie plate beat egg water roll ice cream ball crushed corn flake make sure corn flake embed ice cream ball dip ball egg wash roll ice cream ball second pan crushed corn flake press corn flake ice cream freeze ice cream hour shape tortilla hourglass form cutting curved slice two opposite side one end base ice cream end decoration heat oil wok deep fryer place tortilla two ladle salad fork gently place tortilla hot oil fry crisp drain oil sprinkle cinnamonsugar mix deep fry ice cream ball second place fried tortilla large stemmed glass fan part tortilla standing vertically glass set fried ice cream base tortilla top whipped cream cherry make serving
Original_text:
4 Amigos Deep Fried Ice Cream(Guatemala)  

Ingredients:
- 20 oz. chocolate chip ice cream
- 2 cups corn flakes, crushed
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. sugar
- 3 1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
- 2 eggs
- 1 tsp. water
- 1 - 8 inch flour tortilla
- Oil to deep fry
- Cinnamon and sugar mixed
- Whipped Cream
- Maraschino cherries

Directions:
- Form ice cream into 4 balls. Place in a baking pan and freeze solid, about 2 hours. Mix cereal, sugar and cinnamon. Divide mix equally between 2 pie plates. Beat eggs with water. Roll each ice cream ball into crushed corn flakes, make sure corn flakes embed into ice cream balls. Dip ball in egg wash. Roll ice cream ball in second pan of crushed corn flakes, press corn flakes into ice cream again. Freeze ice cream for 6 hours. Shape tortilla into an hourglass form (with narrow waist) by cutting off curved slice from two opposite sides. One end will be the base for the ice cream, the other end is for decoration. Heat oil in wok or deep fryer. Place tortilla between two ladles or salad fork. Gently place tortilla in hot oil. Fry until crisp. Drain oil and sprinkle with cinnamon/sugar mix. Deep fry ice cream balls for 30-45 seconds. Place each fried tortilla in a large stemmed glass, with fan part of tortilla standing vertically above the glass. Set fried ice cream in base of tortilla. Top with whipped cream and a cherry. Makes 4 servings.

salad_info: carrot salad ingredient c shredded carrot c crushed pineapple c raisin tbsp flaked coconut tsp sugar tbsp mayonnaise direction soak raisin boiling water minute drain add ingredient cover chill
Original_text:
Carrot Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 c. shredded carrots
- 1/4 c. crushed pineapple
- 1/2 c. raisins
- 2 Tbsp. flaked coconut
- 1 1/2 tsp. sugar
- 1 Tbsp. mayonnaise

Directions:
- Soak raisins in boiling water for 5 minutes.
- Drain; add all other ingredients.
- Cover and chill.

Original_text:
Macaroni Pea Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 to 3 c. cooked macaroni or other small pasta
- 1 small green pepper, chopped (optional)
- 1 c. celery, diced
- 1/2 c. onion, chopped
- 1 can peas, drained
- 3 hard-boiled eggs, chopped
- 1 c. cubed cheese
- salt and pepper to taste
- Miracle Whip or mayonnaise (enough to coat all vegetables)

Directions:
- In a large bowl, mix all ingredients except dressing. Gradually add enough dressing to properly coat vegetables.

salad_info: crispy oven fish ingredient c finely crushed potato chip tbsp chopped parsley c lemon juice fish fillet c grated parmesan cheese c mayonnaise salad dressing direction preheat oven combine chip cheese parsley small bowl combine mayonnaise tablespoon lemon juice dip fish remaining tablespoon lemon juice mayonnaise mixture chip mixture arrange greased baking dish bake minute fish flake fork refrigerate leftover make serving
Original_text:
Crispy Oven Fish

Ingredients:
- 2 1/2 c. finely crushed potato chips
- 2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
- 1/4 c. lemon juice (from concentrate)
- 1 lb. fish fillets
- 1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing

Directions:
- Preheat oven to 400°.
- Combine chips, cheese and parsley.
- In small bowl, combine mayonnaise and 2 tablespoons lemon juice.
- Dip fish in remaining 2 tablespoons of lemon juice, then mayonnaise mixture, then chip mixture.
- Arrange in greased baking dish. Bake 5 to 10 minutes or until fish flakes with fork.
- Refrigerate leftovers. Makes 4 servings.

salad_info: pea salad ingredient c vinegar tbsp water tsp pepper c sugar tsp salt oil sweet pea pimento c onion shoepeg corn c celery direction combine first ingredient including oil wanted boil minute cool combine remaining ingredient chill overnight
Original_text:
Pea Salad

Ingredients:
- 3/4 c. vinegar
- 1 Tbsp. water
- 1/4 to 1/2 tsp. pepper
- 3/4 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. salt
- some oil (can be added)
- 17 oz. can sweet peas
- 2 oz. pimento
- 1 c. onion
- 12 oz. can Shoepeg corn
- 1 c. celery

Directions:
- Combine first 5 ingredients, including oil if wanted. Boil for 1 minute. Cool and combine with remaining ingredients. Chill overnight.

salad_info: cauliflower salad ingredient small head cauliflower cut small piece small head lettuce shredded c miracle whip c chopped onion bacon cooked crumbled american cheese diced c sugar direction layer large casserole dish order given cover refrigerate overnight serving mix combine serve make serving
Original_text:
Cauliflower Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small head cauliflower, cut into small pieces
- 1 small head lettuce, shredded
- 1/2 c. Miracle Whip (spread over lettuce layer)
- 1/2 c. chopped onion
- 1/2 lb. bacon, cooked and crumbled
- 1/2 to 1 lb. American cheese, diced
- 1/2 c. sugar

Directions:
- Layer in large casserole dish in order given.
- Cover and refrigerate overnight.
- Just before serving, mix to combine and serve.
- Makes 10 to 12 servings.

Oriental Cabbage Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 medium head shredded cabbage

- 1/2 c. sunflower seeds
- 1/2 c. sliced almonds
- Top Ramen Oriental noodles
- 1/2 c. oil
- 3 Tbsp. vinegar
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1/2 tsp. salt and pepper
- seasoning from Top Ramen pkg.

Directions:
- In cruet, mix the oil, vinegar, sugar, salt, pepper and seasoning.
- Toss salad with crushed up Ramen noodles and salad dressing right before serving or the noodles will get soggy.

Original_text:
Creamy Pea Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 16 oz. pkg. frozen peas, thawed
- 1/2 c. diced cheddar cheese
- 1/2 c. diced mozzarella cheese
- 1 medium onion, chopped
- 1 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
- salt and pepper, to taste
- 4 bacon strips, cooked and crumbled

Directions:
- In a bowl, combine the peas, cheeses, onion, mayonnaise, salt and pepper; mix well.
- Refrigerate until serving.
- Sprinkle with bacon.
- Makes 6 to 8 servings.

Original_text:
Three-Bean Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can cut green beans
- 1 can wax beans
- 1 can kidney beans
- 1 red sweet onion, chopped
- 3/4 c. salad oil
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 c. vinegar
- 1 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. pepper

Directions:
- Combine beans and onion.
- Make a marinade of salad oil, sugar, vinegar, salt and pepper.
- Pour over beans and onion.
- Marinate 24 hours, stirring occasionally.

Original_text:
Shrimp-Crab Dip

Ingredients:
- 1/4 c. milk
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. softened cream cheese
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
- 1/4 c. chopped green onions with tops
- 2 tsp. prepared horseradish
- 1/8 tsp. red pepper sauce
- dash of Worcestershire sauce
- 1 small can tiny shrimp or crab meat

Directions:
- Gradually blend with mixer milk and cream cheese.
- Mix in mayonnaise, onions, horseradish, pepper sauce and Worcestershire sauce.
- Stir in shrimp or crab.
- Cover and refrigerate at least one hour.
- Makes 2 1/2 cups.

Original_text:
Blue Cheese Salad Dressing

Ingredients:
- 3 oz. cream cheese, softened
- 1/2 c. salad dressing
- 1/2 c. sour cream
- 1/2 c. Blue cheese

Directions:
- Beat with mixer, cream cheese, salad dressing and sour cream until blended.
- Crumble in Blue cheese and mix by hand.
- Chill to serve.

Original_text:
Orange Congealed Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 12 marshmallows, cut up
- 1 c. grated carrots
- 1 small can crushed pineapple and juice
- 1 c. Cool Whip
- 1 pkg. orange jello
- 1 c. boiling water
- 1/2 c. nuts
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise

Directions:
- Combine boiling water, marshmallows, jello and cream cheese. Stir until melted.
- Add remaining ingredients.
- Congeal.

Original_text:
Sauerkraut Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 qt. sauerkraut, drained
- 1 c. chopped celery
- 1 c. green pepper
- 1 medium onion, diced
- 1 can pimento, chopped
- 1 tsp. salt
- 2 c. sugar (approximately)
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 1/2 c. salad oil

Directions:
- Place sugar, vinegar and oil in pan; let come to a boil.
- Turn heat on low and cook for 10 minutes.
- Cool and pour over other ingredients that have been mixed in large bowl.
- Let stand in refrigerator overnight.
- This will last for several days.

Open-Faced Cucumber Sandwiches

Ingredients:
- cucumbers
- bread
- 1 (8 oz.) cream cheese (soft)
- 1 pkg. Italian salad dressing mix
- 2 or 3 tsp. milk

Directions:
- Slice cucumbers thin.
- Cut bread into circles the size of cucumbers.
- Mix well the cream cheese, salad dressing mix and enough milk to make mixture spreadable.
- Spread on bread circles and top each with a cucumber slice.

Original_text:
Taffy Apple Salad

Ingredients:
- 4 c. cubed apples
- 1 egg
- 1 Tbsp. flour
- 1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip
- 1 c. salted (no skin) peanuts
- 1 (8 1/4 oz.) can pineapple chunks
- 2 Tbsp. cider vinegar
- 1/2 c. sugar

Directions:
- Save the pineapple juice.
- Bring it to a boil. Beat eggs, sugar, vinegar and flour together.
- Add juice until thick, then add Cool Whip.
- Add peanuts, pineapple and apples.
- Mix and refrigerate.

salad_info: chicken salad ingredient c chicken cooked cubed pineapple tidbit drained mandarin orange drained c celery chopped c onion chopped c olive cut crosswise green pepper chopped c mayonnaise tsp prepared mustard direction mix let set least hour overnight last minute add large chow mein noodle
Original_text:
Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 4 c. chicken, cooked and cubed
- 1 (No. 2) can pineapple tidbits, drained
- 1 can mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 c. celery, chopped
- 1/4 c. onion, chopped
- 1/2 c. olives, cut crosswise
- 1 green pepper, chopped
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 tsp. prepared mustard

Directions:
- Mix and let set at least 4 hours or overnight.
- At last minute, add 1 large can chow mein noodles.

Original_text:
Pretzel Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. crushed pretzels
- 3 Tbsp. sugar
- 3/4 c. melted margarine
- 1 (8 oz.) cream cheese
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 (9 oz.) Cool Whip
- 1 (6 oz.) strawberry Jell-O
- 2 c. boiling water
- 2 (10 oz.) frozen strawberries

Directions:
- Mix crushed pretzels, 3 tablespoons sugar and butter.
- Press into a 13-inch baking dish and bake at 400° for 8 minutes, no longer.
- Let cool.

Original_text:
Pasta Marco Polo(Cold Pasta Salad)  

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. linguine
- 1/2 c. onion
- 2 c. sliced black olives
- 2 c. pimentos
- 1/2 lb. roasted pine nuts
- 1 c. parsley, chopped
- 2 c. vinaigrette
- juice of 2 limes
- salt and pepper to taste
- 1/2 c. olive oil

Directions:
- Cook pasta until al dente, remove and rinse.
- Mix with 1/2 cup olive oil and salt and pepper.
- Roast pine nuts in oven until brown.
- Remove.
- Add onion, olives, pimentos, pine nuts, parsley, vinaigrette and limes to pasta.
- Mix well.

Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 pkg. strawberry jello
- 1 can cranberry sauce
- 1 can crushed pineapple, drained (save juice to make 1/4 c.)
- 1 (8 oz.) cream cheese
- 3 c. hot water
- 1/4 Cool Whip
- nuts

Directions:
- Mix cranberry sauce and jello with hot water.
- Add remaining ingredients.
- Refrigerate after jelled.
- Add cream cheese and 1/4 cup pineapple juice, cream cheese and Cool Whip.
- Mix together and spread over jelled mixture.
- Sprinkle with nuts.

Original_text:
Yummy Cherry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. raspberry Jell-O
- 2 c. boiling water, divided
- 1 (22 oz.) can cherry pie filling
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon Jell-O
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
- 1/3 c. mayonnaise
- 1 (8 1/4 oz.) can crushed pineapple
- 1 c. mini marshmallows
- 1/2 pt. whipping cream
- 1/4 c. chopped pecans

Directions:
- Dissolve raspberry Jell-O in 1 cup boiling water.
- Stir in pie filling.
- Pour into 9-inch square pan and chill until partially set.
- Dissolve lemon Jell-O in 1 cup boiling water.
- Combine cheese and mayonnaise and mix well.
- Stir in lemon Jell-O, pineapple and marshmallows.
- Fold in whipped cream.
- Spread lemon mix over cherry layer.
- Sprinkle with pecans.
- Chill until firm. Cut into squares and serve.

Original_text:
Chicken Delight

Ingredients:
- 1/4 c. Italian salad dressing
- 3 to 3 1/2 lb. chicken breast
- 1 egg, slightly beaten
- 2 Tbsp. water
- 1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
- 1/3 c. bread crumbs or crackers
- 2 Tbsp. parsley
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. paprika
- 1/8 tsp. pepper

Directions:
- Pour dressing into pan, add chicken, turning to coat both sides.
- Cover and refrigerate 4 hours.
- Drain dressing from chicken, combine egg and water.

salad_info: chicken salad surprise ingredient c chicken cooked c celery chopped c blanched almond c green pepper chopped c swiss cheese grated tbsp onion chopped tsp salt tbsp lemon juice c mayonnaise tbsp pimento chopped potato chip direction combine ingredient except cheese chip uncovered casserole top cheese chip bake minute serf
Original_text:
Chicken Salad Surprise

Ingredients:
- 2 c. chicken, cooked*
- 2 c. celery, chopped
- 1/2 c. blanched almonds
- 1/3 c. green pepper, chopped
- 1/3 c. Swiss cheese, grated
- 2 Tbsp. onion, chopped
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 2 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. pimento, chopped
- potato chips

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients except cheese and chips in an uncovered casserole.
- Top with cheese and chips.
- Bake at 350° for 25 minutes.
- Serves 6.

Original_text:
Bacony Chicken Breasts

Ingredients:
- 1 (16 oz.) can new potatoes, drained
- 1 (6 oz.) can sliced mushrooms, drained
- salt
- 4 slices bacon, cut into quarters
- 2 Tbsp. butter
- 1 Tbsp. salad oil
- 4 chicken cutlets

Directions:
- Preheat broiler.
- Slice potatoes 1/2-inch thick.
- Pat dry with paper towel.
- Arrange in bottom of a 13 x 9-inch broiler pan. Cover with mushrooms.
- Sprinkle lightly with salt.
- Top with bacon slices.
- Broil 10 minutes, turning occasionally.

salad_info: chicken tuna salad ingredient whole chicken qt shell macaroni tuna c sugar c sliced celery c french dressing hardcooked egg qt c salad dressing bag fren pea c diced onion direction roast chicken cool pick bone dice marinate french dressing overnight next day cook macaroni tender blanch cool boil peel dice egg drain flake tuna mix together diced marinated chicken tuna egg macaroni pea celery onion mix together salad dressing sugar blend ingredient best refrigerated overnight
Original_text:
Chicken Tuna Salad For 100

Ingredients:
- 5 whole chickens
- 3 qt. shell macaroni
- 4 lb. can tuna
- 1 c. sugar
- 2 c. sliced celery
- 2 c. French dressing
- 2 doz. hard-cooked eggs
- 2 qt. and 1 c. salad dressing
- 2 bags frozen peas
- 1 c. diced onion

Directions:
- Roast the chickens.
- Cool and pick off bones. Dice.
- Marinate in French dressing overnight.
- Next day, cook macaroni until tender.
- Blanch and cool. Boil, peel and dice the eggs.
- Drain and flake tuna.
- Mix together diced marinated chicken, tuna, eggs, macaroni, peas, celery and onion.
- Mix together salad dressing and sugar. Blend in with the other ingredients.
- Best if refrigerated overnight.

salad_info: taco salad ingredient ground beef pkg taco sauce mix processed cheese c rotel tomato green chilies head lettuce shredded tomato chopped medium onion chopped pkg corn chip direction prepare taco filling ground beef taco sauce mix according package direction melt cheese tomato green chilies mix shredded lettuce tomato meat corn chip salad bowl pour cheese mixture top remaining corn chip serve immediately serf
Original_text:
Taco Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. ground beef
- 1 (2 oz.) pkg. taco sauce mix
- 3/4 lb. processed cheese
- 1/3 c. Ro-Tel tomatoes and green chilies
- 3/4 head lettuce, shredded
- 2 tomatoes, chopped
- 1/2 medium onion, chopped
- 1 (6 oz.) pkg. corn chips

Directions:
- Prepare taco filling with ground beef and taco sauce mix according to package directions. Melt cheese with tomatoes and green chilies.
- Mix shredded lettuce, tomatoes, meat and 1/4 of the corn chips in a salad bowl.
- Pour cheese mixture over top with remaining corn chips.
- Serve immediately.
- Serves 4.

salad_info: cornbread salad ingredient box jiffy cornbread mix medium bell pepper chopped medium onion finely chopped tomato peeled chopped bacon fried drained crumbled c mayonnaise tbsp sugar c sweet pickled salad cube direction make cornbread according direction crumble cornbread inch x inch dish layer vegetable order given layer bacon saving top mix mayonnaise sugar salad cube spread top dish sprinkle remaining crumbled cornbread bacon
Original_text:
Cornbread Salad

Ingredients:
- 8 oz. box Jiffy cornbread mix
- 1 medium bell pepper, chopped
- 1 medium onion, finely chopped
- 3-5 tomatoes, peeled and chopped
- 1 lb. bacon, fried, drained, crumbled
- 1 1/2 -2 c. mayonnaise
- 1 Tbsp. sugar
- 1/4 c. sweet pickled salad cubes

Directions:
- Make cornbread according to directions.
- Crumble most of the cornbread in a 9 inch x 13 inch dish.
- (Save some for the topping.)
- Layer vegetables in order given above.
- Then layer most of the bacon, saving some for top.	Mix mayonnaise, sugar, and salad cubes.
- Spread on top
- of dish.
- Then sprinkle with remaining crumbled cornbread and bacon.

salad_info: coq au vin ingredient boilingroasting chicken tbsp butter tbsp salad oil piece smoke streaky bacon cubed baby onion stick celery finely chopped c mushroom quartered garlic clove crushed tbsp flour c red burgundy wine c plus tbsp water bay leaf sprig fresh thyme tsp dried thyme salt pepper direction wash dry chicken cut melt butter pan oil fry bacon cube golden brown remove bacon drain fry chicken brown turning put bacon chicken ovenproof casserole fry onion celery pan soft add casserole melt little butter pan add mushroom cook minute drain
Original_text:
Coq Au Vin(Chicken With Wine)  

Ingredients:
- 3 to 4 lb. boiling/roasting chicken
- 3 Tbsp. butter
- 1 Tbsp. salad oil
- 4 oz. piece smokes streaky bacon, cubed
- 12 baby onions
- 2 sticks celery, finely chopped
- 2 c. mushrooms, quartered
- 1 garlic clove, crushed
- 2 Tbsp. flour
- 2 c. red Burgundy wine
- 1/2 c. plus 2 Tbsp. water
- 1 bay leaf
- 1 sprig fresh thyme or 1/4 tsp. dried thyme
- salt and pepper

Directions:
- Wash and dry chicken; cut up.
- Melt butter in a pan with the oil.
- Fry the bacon cubes until golden brown.
- Remove bacon and drain.
- Fry the chicken until brown, turning once.
- Put the bacon and chicken into an ovenproof casserole.
- Fry the onions with the celery in the pan until soft; add to casserole.
- Melt a little more butter in pan; add mushrooms and cook for 2 minutes, then drain.

Original_text:
Seven Bean Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can yellow beans, drained
- 1 can green beans, drained
- 1 can hot chili beans
- 1 can baby lima beans
- 1 can kidney beans
- 1 can Great Northern beans
- 1 can cranberry or pinto beans
- 1 c. brown sugar
- 1/2 c. barbecue sauce
- 1 can tomato paste
- 1 can tomato soup
- 1 chopped green pepper
- onion
- 2 lb. hot sausage

Directions:
- Add brown sugar, barbecue sauce, tomato paste, tomato soup, green pepper and onion (cook green pepper and onion in microwave or skillet first) to the beans.
- Put in 350° oven and bake for 40 minutes.
- Fry hot sausage and drain.
- Cut up and stir into beans when done.
- Can be served hot or cold.

Original_text:
Crunchy Hot Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 c. diced, cooked chicken
- 1 c. finely chopped celery
- 2 tsp. chopped onion
- 1/2 c. sliced almonds
- 1 can cream of chicken soup
- 1 1/2 c. cooked rice
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/4 tsp. pepper
- 3/4 c. mayonnaise
- 1/4 c. water
- 3 hard-boiled eggs, sliced
- 2 c. crushed potato chips
- 3/4 c. shredded Cheddar cheese

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together.
- Put in greased casserole. Sprinkle with crushed potato chips. Bake at 400° for about 30 minutes.

Original_text:
Creamy Italian Pasta Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 clove garlic, minced
- 2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
- 1 Tbsp. chopped, fresh basil or 1 tsp. dried basil
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/4 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
- 1 1/2 c. spiral pasta, cooked, rinsed with cold water and drained
- 1 c. quartered cherry tomatoes
- 1/2 c. coarsely chopped green pepper
- 1/2 c. slivered, pitted, ripe olives

Directions:
- In a large bowl, combine mayonnaise, vinegar, garlic, basil, salt and pepper.
- Stir in pasta, cherry tomatoes, green pepper and olives.
- Cover and chill.
- Then enjoy.

Original_text:
Layered Pea Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small head lettuce
- 1/2 c. thinly sliced green onion
- 1/2 c. sliced celery
- 1/2 c. chopped green pepper
- 1/2 c. sliced water chestnuts
- 1 c. frozen peas, unthawed
- 1 1/4 c. mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 2 hard-cooked eggs, chopped
- 4 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled
- 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese

Directions:
- Tear lettuce into bite-sized pieces; place in bottom of large salad bowl.
- Layer remaining vegetables in order given.
- Combine mayonnaise and sugar; spread over top, completely covering vegetables.
- Sprinkle top with egg, bacon and cheese.

salad_info: mexican blintz ingredient monterey jack cheese whole green chilies flour tortilla salad oil deep frying guacamole salsa direction cut monterey jack cheese x inch sliess cut chilies strip heat tortilla warm place one slice cheese center place chili strip cheese fold end roll secure toothpick repeat tortilla deep fry blintz time golden brown drain paper towel remove toothpick cut half crosswise stand end prevent cheese running serve dip make
Original_text:
Mexican Blintzes

Ingredients:
- 2 lb. Monterey Jack cheese
- 1 can (4 oz.) whole green chilies
- 1 doz. (6-inch) flour tortillas
- salad oil for deep frying
- guacamole or salsa

Directions:
- Cut Monterey Jack cheese into 3 x 1 1/4-inch sliess.
- Cut chilies into strips.
- Heat tortilla until warm; place one slice of cheese in center.
- Place chili strip on cheese.
- Fold over ends and roll up; secure with toothpick.
- Repeat with each tortilla. Deep fry blintzes at 400° a few at a time, until golden brown. Drain on paper towels and remove toothpicks.
- Cut in half crosswise and stand on end to prevent cheese from running.
- Serve with dip.
- Makes 24.

salad_info: cranberry salad ingredient large pkg jello bag cranberry small crushed pineapple orange c nut c sugar direction make jello directed box grind cranberry orange add sugar cranberry orange set aside jello thickens add nut
Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 large pkg. jello (strawberry)
- 1 bag cranberries
- 1 small can crushed pineapple
- 1 orange
- 1/2 c. nuts
- 2 c. sugar

Directions:
- Make jello as directed on box. Grind cranberries and orange. Add sugar to cranberries and orange and set aside until jello thickens.
- Add nuts.

Original_text:
Round Table Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can whole cranberry sauce
- 1 large can crushed pineapple
- 2 diced bananas
- 1 c. yogurt or sour cream
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1/4 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Mix well.
- Put in muffin tins in baking cups.
- Freeze and serve frozen.

Original_text:
Marinated Pea Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 cans LeSueur English peas
- 1 can LeSueur Shoe Peg corn
- 1 small jar chopped pimentos
- 1 small green pepper, chopped small
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1/2 c. salad oil

Directions:
- Drain peas, pimentos and corn in colander.
- Mix vinegar, sugar and oil together thoroughly.
- Stir into vegetable mixture. Marinate overnight.
- Great side dish.

Original_text:
Cola Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. sugar-free cherry Jell-O
- 2 1/2 c. crushed pineapple
- 16 oz. diet Cola
- 45 cherries (frozen black cherries)

Directions:
- Drain fruit; save juices.
- Heat juices and Cola to make 2 cups.
- Bring to boil and dissolve Jell-O in heat of liquid.
- Add fruit; refrigerate.

Easy Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 large can cherry, strawberry or blueberry pie filling
- 1 can Eagle Brand condensed milk
- 1 (8 oz.) container Cool Whip

Directions:
- Crushed nuts may also be added.

salad_info: veggie pizza ingredient can crescent roll egg beaten pkg cream cheese softened c mayonnaise pkg dry ranch dressing c shredded cheddar cheese broccoli cauliflower tomato direction spread roll like crust ungreased pan brush egg bake minute cool combine cream cheese mayonnaise salad dressing spread crust sprinkle veggie cheese
Original_text:
Veggie Pizza

Ingredients:
- 2 cans (8 oz. each) crescent rolls
- 1 egg, beaten
- 2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 (1 oz.) pkg. dry Ranch dressing
- 3/4 c. shredded cheddar cheese
- broccoli, cauliflower, tomato*

Directions:
- Spread rolls out like crust on an ungreased pan. Brush with egg. Bake at 375° for 11 minutes. Cool. Combine cream cheese, mayonnaise and salad dressing. Spread over crust, then sprinkle with veggies and cheese.

salad_info: cherry nut salad ingredient red tart cherry pitted chunk pineapple c nut red food coloring condensed milk c lemon juice c cool whip direction fold cherry pineapple nut condensed milk mixed lemon juice let set overnight refrigerator fold red food coloring cool whip fold salad let set refrigerator least hour serving
Original_text:
Cherry Nut Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can red tart cherries, pitted
- 1 can chunk pineapple
- 1 c. nuts
- red food coloring
- 1 can condensed milk
- 1/3 c. lemon juice
- 2 c. Cool Whip

Directions:
- Fold cherries, pineapple and nuts into condensed milk, that has been mixed with lemon juice.
- Let set overnight in refrigerator.
- Fold red food coloring in Cool Whip and then fold into salad.
- Let set in refrigerator at least 3 hours before serving.

Original_text:
Mandarin Orange Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head iceberg lettuce
- 1 bunch other greens
- 1 ripe avocado, sliced
- 11 oz. can mandarin oranges, drained, reserve juice
- 1/4 c. toasted slivered almonds
- chopped green onions (optional)

Directions:
- Wash greens and chill.
- Place avocado slices in reserved mandarin juice.
- At serving time, toss greens, drained mandarin oranges, avocado slices and almonds.
- Serve with poppy seed dressing.

Original_text:
Crab Cracker Spread

Ingredients:
- 6 oz. cream cheese
- 1 can cream of chicken soup
- 3 to 4 chopped fine green onions
- 1 tsp. (1 pkg.) plain Knox gelatine, dissolved in 3 tsp. cold water
- 1 can crabmeat
- 1 c. finely chopped celery
- 1 c. mayonnaise (not salad dressing)

Directions:
- Heat undiluted soup; dissolve gelatine in warm soup.
- Cool and combine other ingredients.
- Put in an oiled mold.
- Chill overnight.

salad_info: broccoli salad ingredient c broccoli chopped cooked bacon c red onion chopped c raisin c cubed mild coy cheese c mayonnaise c sugar tbsp vinegar direction mix mayonnaise sugar vinegar layer first ingredient pour dressing toss serving
Original_text:
Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 c. broccoli, chopped
- 1 lb. cooked bacon
- 1/4 c. red onion, chopped
- 1 c. raisins
- 1 c. cubed mild Colby cheese (optional)
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 1 Tbsp. vinegar

Directions:
- Mix the mayonnaise, sugar and vinegar. Layer the first 5 ingredients. Pour dressing over and toss before serving.

Original_text:
Fresh Fruit Salad(Low-Fat - Special Diet)  

Ingredients:
- 1/2 lb. medium shell noodles
- 18 oz. carton nonfat plain yogurt
- 1/4 c. frozen orange juice concentrate
- 1 (5 oz.) can pineapple chunks, drained
- 1 large orange, sectioned
- 1 c. red grapes, halved
- 1 c. green grapes, halved
- 1 large apple, chopped
- 1 medium banana, sliced

Directions:
- Prepare shell noodles according to package directions.
- Rinse well with cold water and drain.
- In small bowl, blend yogurt and orange juice concentrate.
- In large bowl, combine shell noodles and remaining ingredients.
- Add yogurt mixture and toss to coat. Cover and chill thoroughly.
- Yields 10 cups.

salad_info: marinated salad ingredient frenchstyle green bean green lima bean sweet green pea c chopped celery jar pimento cut small piece c crisco oil c white vinegar c sugar tsp garlic powder tsp paprika direction mix vegetable together separate bowl mix oil vinegar sugar spice desired pour vegetable marinate refrigerator overnight hour kept refrigerator week stored glass jar plastic container
Original_text:
Marinated Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can French-style green beans
- 1 can green lima beans
- 1 can sweet green peas
- 2 c. chopped celery
- 1 (4 oz.) jar pimentos, cut into small pieces
- 1 c. Crisco oil
- 1 c. white vinegar
- 1 c. sugar
- 1/4 tsp. garlic powder (optional)
- 1 tsp. paprika (optional)

Directions:
- Mix vegetables together.
- In a separate bowl, mix oil, vinegar, sugar and spices, if desired.
- Pour over vegetables.
- Marinate in refrigerator overnight or 12 hours.
- Can be kept in refrigerator for 1 week if stored in glass jar or plastic container.

salad_info: excellent beef casserole ingredient tbsp allpurpose flour tsp salt tsp pepper boneless round steak cut cube tbsp cooking oil c water beef broth garlic clove minced tbsp dried minced onion tsp thyme tsp crushed dried rosemary c sliced fresh mushroom c fren pea thawed whole kernel corn drained c mashed potato tbsp buttermargarine melted paprika direction large resealable bag combine flour salt pepper add beef cube shake coat skillet medium heat brown beef oil place beef dripping greased shallow qt baking dish skillet add water broth garlic onion thyme rosemary bring boil simmer uncovered minute stir mushroom pour meat mix well cover bake hour beef tender sprinkle corn pea meat spread potato evenly top brush butter sprinkle paprika bake minute longer yield serving great homemade dinner roll salad
Original_text:
Excellent Beef Casserole

Ingredients:
- 3 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
- 1 Tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. pepper
- 2 lb. boneless round steak, cut into cubes
- 2 Tbsp. cooking oil
- 1 c. water
- 14 oz. can beef broth
- 1 garlic clove, minced
- 1 Tbsp. dried minced onion
- 1/2 tsp. thyme
- 1/4 tsp. crushed dried rosemary
- 2 c. sliced fresh mushrooms (or canned)
- 2 c. frozen peas, thawed or 1 can whole kernel corn drained
- 3 c. mashed potatoes (mashed with milk & butter)
- 1 Tbsp. butter/margarine, melted
- Paprika

Directions:
- In a large resealable bag combine flour, salt & pepper;
- add beef cubes and shake to coat.
- In a skillet over medium heat, brown the beef in oil.
- Place beef and dripping in a greased shallow 2 1/2 qt. baking dish.
- To skillet add water, broth, garlic, onion, thyme and rosemary; bring to a boil. Simmer uncovered for 5 minutes.
- Stir in mushrooms.
- Pour over meat;
- mix well.
- Cover and bake at 350° for 1 1/2 to 1 3/4 hours or until beef is tender.
- Sprinkle corn or peas over meat.
- Spread potatoes evenly over top.
- Brush with butter;
- sprinkle with paprika.
- Bake 15-20 minutes longer.
- Yield: 6-8 servings.
- Great with homemade dinner rolls and a salad.

salad_info: german potato salad ingredient medium potato slice bacon medium onion chopped tbsp flour c vinegar tbsp sugar c hot water tsp salt taste dash pepper direction boil potato jacket tender fry bacon crisp save tablespoon fat drain bacon well crumble heat bacon fat stir flour onion cook slowly continue stir minute heat add water vinegar mix well return low heat cook stirring smooth thickened add sugar salt pepper bacon cook minute
Original_text:
German Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 12 medium potatoes
- 6 slices bacon
- 1 medium onion, chopped
- 2 1/2 Tbsp. flour
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. sugar
- 3/4 c. hot water
- 1 1/2 tsp. salt to taste
- dash of pepper

Directions:
- Boil potatoes until jackets are tender.
- Fry bacon until crisp; save 4 tablespoons of fat.
- Drain bacon well and crumble (set aside).
- Heat bacon fat and stir in flour and onion.
- Cook slowly.
- Continue to stir for a minute.
- Off heat, add water and vinegar; mix well.
- Return to low heat and cook, stirring, until smooth and thickened.
- Add sugar, salt, pepper and bacon.
- Cook for 10 minutes.

salad_info: onion ring ingredient c flour tsp salt c milk tbsp salad oil egg white tbsp water large onion direction mix together large bowl cut onion slice separate ring deepfry hot oil
Original_text:
Onion Rings

Ingredients:
- 1 c. flour
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1/2 c. milk
- 2 Tbsp. salad oil
- 1 egg white (unbeaten)
- 6 Tbsp. water
- 2 to 3 large onions

Directions:
- Mix together in large bowl.
- Cut onions into slices; separate into rings.
- Deep-fry in hot oil.

salad_info: cheryls overnight salad ingredient head lettuce head cauliflower tbsp finely chopped red onion qt real mayonnaise bacon crisply fried broken c grated parmesan cheese c sugar direction crisply fry pound bacon drain break set aside break lettuce bottom large bowl cut cauliflower layer top lettuce sprinkle onion top desire pour mayo seal edge bowl sprinkle sugar top mayo shake cheese top sugar sprinkle broken bit bacon top layer cover leave undisturbed fridge overnight mix serving
Original_text:
Cheryl'S Overnight Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head lettuce
- 1 head cauliflower
- 2 Tbsp. finely chopped red onion (optional)
- 2/3 to 1 qt. real mayonnaise
- 1 lb. bacon, crisply fried and broken up
- 3/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
- 2/3 c. sugar

Directions:
- Crisply fry 1 pound of bacon.
- Drain, break up and set aside. Break up lettuce in bottom of very large bowl.
- Cut up cauliflower and layer on top of lettuce.
- Sprinkle onion over top if you desire.
- Pour on mayo and seal to edges of bowl.
- Sprinkle sugar on top of mayo and then shake cheese over top of the sugar.
- Sprinkle broken bits of bacon on top of all the layers.
- Cover and leave undisturbed in fridge overnight.
- Mix just before serving.

salad_info: seafood salad ingredient pkg louis kemp crab delight c mayonnaise stalk celery chopped tbsp finely chopped onion direction cut crab delight flake half shred combine mayonnaise celery onion serve sandwich lettuce
Original_text:
Seafood Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. Louis Kemp crab delights (flake style)
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 2 stalks celery, chopped
- 3 Tbsp. finely chopped onion

Directions:
- Cut crab delight flakes in half or shred.
- Combine with mayonnaise, celery and onion.
- Serve as a sandwich or on lettuce.

Original_text:
Fatless Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. nonfat plain yogurt (allow liquid to drain away)
- 1 large potato, boiled and cubed
- 1/2 to 1 tsp. prepared mustard
- 1 to 1 1/2 stalks celery, chopped
- red/green pepper cubes (optional)
- 1/4 onion, minced
- dash of salt
- dash of pepper
- dash of vinegar
- dash of paprika (like it hot)
- dash of cayenne (like it hot)

Directions:
- Mix together in medium-small bowl.
- A tiny glug of Italian or other oil based dressing adds flavor.
- Serves 1.

Original_text:
Cold Italian Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. spaghetti
- 2 c. diced radishes
- 2 c. diced cucumbers
- 1 (8 oz.) bottle Italian dressing
- 1/2 bottle salad seasoning
- 2 c. diced green onions
- 2 c. diced green peppers
- 2 c. cherry tomato halves

Directions:
- Boil pasta, drain and run under cold water.
- Add all vegetables; toss with dressing and salad seasoning.
- Better if made a day ahead.

salad_info: salad ingredient large pkg lemon jello c boiling water c cold water bottle cut banana crushed pineapple pkg small marshmallow c pineapple juice c sugar tbsp flour beaten egg tbsp butter c cool whip dream whip direction dissolve jello boiling water add cold water add banana pineapple pour marshmallow top place refrigerator firm mix pineapple juice sugar flour egg cook mixture thickens add butter stir remove heat cool add cool whip spread top jello mixture chill serve garnish top nut andor maraschino cherry wish
Original_text:
7-Up Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large pkg. lemon jello
- 1 c. boiling water
- 1 c. cold water
- 1 1/2 bottles 7-Up
- 3 cut up bananas
- 1 (7 oz.) can crushed pineapple
- 1 (10 oz.) pkg. small marshmallows
- 1 c. pineapple juice
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 1 Tbsp. flour
- 1 beaten egg
- 2 Tbsp. butter
- 1 c. Cool Whip or Dream Whip

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in boiling water.
- Add 7-Up and cold water.
- Add bananas and pineapple.
- Pour marshmallows on top.
- Place in refrigerator until firm.
- Mix pineapple juice, sugar, flour and egg.
- Cook until mixture thickens.
- Add butter.
- Stir and remove from heat.
- Cool.
- Add Cool Whip and spread on top of jello mixture.
- Chill and serve.
- Garnish top with nuts and/or maraschino cherries if you wish.

salad_info: creamy pineapple salad ingredient crushed pineapple drained pkg lemon orange gelatin pkg cream cheese softened c chopped celery c chopped nut pimento chopped c mayonnaise direction measure juice drained pineapple add water make cup heat liquid boiling dissolve gelatin add ingredient stir well spoon cup mold pan chill refrigerator serf
Original_text:
Creamy Pineapple Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon or orange gelatin
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
- 1 c. chopped celery
- 1 c. chopped nuts
- 1 (3 oz.) can pimento, chopped
- 1 c. mayonnaise

Directions:
- Measure juice drained from pineapple.
- Add water to make 2 cups.
- Heat liquid to boiling and dissolve gelatin in it.
- Add other ingredients and stir well.
- Spoon into a 10-cup mold or pan and chill in refrigerator.
- Serves 10 or 12.

salad_info: seven layer salad ingredient head lettuce torn bite size piece c diced celery c green pepper pkg fren pea pt mayonnaise tsp sugar cheese crumbled slice bacon broken small piece direction order given put veggie bowl cake pan layer sprinkle sugar spread crumbled cheese spread broken bacon piece next cover mayonnaise cover plastic wrap refrigerate best used day
Original_text:
Seven Layer Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head lettuce, torn into bite size pieces
- 1/2 c. diced celery
- 1/2 c. green pepper
- 1 pkg. frozen peas
- 1 pt. mayonnaise
- 2 tsp. sugar
- 6 oz. cheese, crumbled
- 6 slices bacon, broken into small pieces

Directions:
- In order given, put veggies in a bowl or cake pan in layers. Sprinkle with the sugar.
- Spread crumbled cheese over it.
- Spread broken bacon pieces next (fried and cooled).
- Cover all with mayonnaise.
- Cover with plastic wrap; refrigerate.
- Best if used the same day.

salad_info: cauliflower salad ingredient head lettuce chopped head cauliflower chopped pkg fren pea thawed pkg dry italian dressing mix pt mayonnaise slice bacon fried crisp crumbled c parmesan cheese direction place lettuce cauliflower pea layer large salad bowl combine dressing mix mayonnaise make hole center salad pour mixture cover hole lettuce top salad place crumbled bacon parmesan cheese cover tightly refrigerate hour stir serving stir enough eat doesnt last long mixed
Original_text:
Cauliflower Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head lettuce, chopped
- 1 head cauliflower, chopped
- 1 pkg. frozen peas, thawed (do not cook!)
- 1 pkg. dry Italian dressing mix
- 1 pt. mayonnaise
- 6 slices bacon, fried crisp and crumbled
- 1 c. Parmesan cheese

Directions:
- Place lettuce, cauliflower and peas in layers in a large salad bowl.
- Combine dressing mix and mayonnaise.
- Make hole in center of salad and pour this mixture.
- Cover hole with lettuce.
- On top of salad, place the crumbled bacon and Parmesan cheese.
- Cover tightly and refrigerate 24 hours.
- Stir just before serving.
- Only stir enough to eat, it doesn't last long once mixed.

salad_info: cold spaghetti salad ingredient spaghetti tomato cucumber large onion bottle durkee salad seasoning small bottle italian salad dressing direction cook noodle according box direction rinse chill dice tomato cucumber onion combine spaghetti cut smaller piece tomato cucumber onion add seasoning salt mix well ingredient coated pour italian dressing combined ingredient mix together chill delicious summer hamburger chicken steak etc
Original_text:
Cold Spaghetti Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 lb. spaghetti
- 2 tomatoes
- 2 cucumbers
- 1 large onion
- 1/2 bottle Durkee salad seasoning (with or without cheese)
- 1 small bottle Italian salad dressing

Directions:
- Cook noodles according to box directions. Rinse and chill. Dice tomatoes, cucumbers and onion. Combine the spaghetti, which can be cut into smaller pieces, with the tomatoes, cucumbers and onion. Add the seasoning salt and mix well until all ingredients are coated.
- Pour the Italian dressing over combined ingredients. Mix together. Chill.
- Delicious for summer with hamburger, chicken, steak, etc.

Original_text:
Spaghetti Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 Large box of cooked pasta
- 2 cups each:
- carrots
- broccoli
- onion
- cauliflower
- radishes
- 1 1/2 cups shredded cheese
- 1 can chow mein noodles
- 1 bottle italian dressing

Directions:
- Cook pasta and allow to cool.
- Then add shredded cheese and 1 1/2 cups chow mein noodles. Add Italian dressing and pour over all of this and put in refrigerator and let cool, eat
- til you can't eat anymore.

salad_info: fren pink salad ingredient large carton cool whip sweetened condensed milk cherry pie filling crushed pineapple drained c miniature marshmallow c nut direction mix ingredient well pour rectangular baking dish freeze
Original_text:
Frozen Pink Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large carton Cool Whip
- 1 can sweetened condensed milk
- 1 can cherry pie filling
- 1 (No. 2) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 1/2 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 c. nuts

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients well.
- Pour into rectangular baking dish and freeze.

salad_info: taco salad ingredient tbsp cooking oil fresh ground turkey meat medium chopped onion taco seasoning mix tsp chili powder c water c bitesize piece lettuce medium chopped tomato medium chopped green pepper c shredded monterey jack cheddar cheese c corn chip direction heat oil skillet mediumhigh heat hot crumble turkey skillet stir onion cook turkey longer pink onion tender drain stir seasoning mix chili powder water heat boiling reduce heat simmer stirring occasionally minute salt pepper taste layer lettuce tomato green pepper salad bowl spoon turkey mixture top sprinkle cheese garnish corn chip dairy sour cream sliced ripe olive
Original_text:
Taco Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 Tbsp. cooking oil
- 1 1/4 lb. fresh ground turkey or other meat
- 1 medium chopped onion
- 1 1/4 oz. taco seasoning mix
- 1/2 tsp. chili powder
- 1 c. water
- 8 c. bite-size pieces lettuce
- 3 medium chopped tomatoes
- 1 medium, chopped green pepper
- 1 1/2 c. shredded Monterey Jack or Cheddar cheese
- 3 c. corn chips

Directions:
- Heat oil in skillet over medium-high heat until hot.
- Crumble turkey into skillet, stir in onion.
- Cook until turkey is no longer pink and onion is tender, drain.
- Stir in seasoning mix, chili powder and water.
- Heat to boiling, reduce heat.
- Simmer, stirring occasionally, 15 minutes.
- Salt and pepper to taste. Layer lettuce, tomatoes and green pepper in salad bowl.
- Spoon turkey mixture over top.
- Sprinkle with cheese.
- Garnish with corn chips, dairy sour cream and sliced ripe olives.

salad_info: thousand island dressing ingredient c fatfree mayonnaise c reducedcalorie chili sauce c plus tbsp skim milk tbsp finely chopped celery tbsp finely chopped green pepper tbsp sweet pickle relish tbsp grated onion tsp paprika tsp salt direction combine ingredient medium bowl stir well cover chill thoroughly serve salad green yield cup
Original_text:
Thousand Island Dressing

Ingredients:
- 1 c. fat-free mayonnaise
- 1/2 c. reduced-calorie chili sauce
- 1/4 c. plus 2 Tbsp. skim milk
- 2 Tbsp. finely chopped celery
- 2 Tbsp. finely chopped green pepper
- 1 Tbsp. sweet pickle relish
- 1 Tbsp. grated onion
- 1 tsp. paprika
- 1/4 tsp. salt

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients in a medium bowl; stir well.
- Cover and chill thoroughly.
- Serve with salad greens.
- Yield:
- 2 cups (11 calories and 0% fat per tablespoon).

Original_text:
Italian Cole Slaw

Ingredients:
- 1 small head cabbage
- 1 large carrot
- 1 medium onion
- 3/4 c. sugar
- 3/4 c. salad oil
- 1 c. vinegar
- 2 tsp. sugar
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. dry mustard
- 1 tsp. celery seed

Directions:
- Grate cabbage and carrot. Chop onion.
- Pour 3/4 cup sugar over and mix.
- Bring rest of ingredients to a boil and pour over cabbage mixture.
- Mix.
- Will keep weeks in refrigerator.

salad_info: strawberry salad ingredient pkg strawberry gelatin c boiling water pkg fren strawberry banana mashed crushed pineapple drained c chopped pecan c sour cream direction dissolve gelatin boiling water bowl add fren strawberry stir gelatin thickens add banana pineapple pecan mix well pour half mixture x inch dish chill set layer sour cream remaining gelatin top chill set make serving
Original_text:
Strawberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. strawberry gelatin
- 1 1/2 c. boiling water
- 2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen strawberries
- 3 bananas, mashed
- 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 c. chopped pecans
- 1 c. sour cream

Directions:
- Dissolve gelatin in boiling water in a bowl.
- Add frozen strawberries.
- Stir until gelatin thickens.
- Add bananas, pineapple and pecans; mix well.
- Pour half the mixture into 9 x 13-inch dish.
- Chill until set.
- Layer sour cream and remaining gelatin over top.
- Chill until set.
- Makes 10 servings.

salad_info: marinated bean tuna tomato salad ingredient can cannellini bean c olive oil tbsp fresh lemon juice tsp oregano salt pepper dried basil tuna drained chunked medium tomato chopped small onion minced tbsp chopped fresh parsley direction place bean colander rinse cold water dry paper towel transfer large serving bowl combine oil lemon juice oregano salt pepper basil small bowl jar lid stir shake well pour bean add tuna tomato onion parsley toss combine chill well serving
Original_text:
Marinated Bean, Tuna And Tomato Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 (20 oz.) cans cannellini beans (white kidney)
- 1/4 c. olive oil
- 1 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
- 1/2 tsp. oregano, salt, pepper and dried basil
- 1 (12 1/2 to 13 oz.) can tuna, drained and chunked
- 2 medium tomatoes, chopped
- 1 small onion, minced
- 2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley

Directions:
- Place beans in colander and rinse with cold water.
- Dry on paper towels and transfer to a large serving bowl.
- Combine oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt, pepper and basil in a small bowl or jar with lid.
- Stir or shake well.
- Pour over beans.
- Add tuna, tomatoes, onion and parsley; toss to combine.
- Chill well before serving.

- 1/4 c. sliced mushrooms
- 2 Tbsp. sliced green onions

- Mustard Dressing

Directions:
- *You can use turkey.

Original_text:
Salad Dressing Cake

Ingredients:
- 2 c. flour
- 1 c. sugar
- 2 Tbsp. cocoa
- 2 tsp. baking soda
- 1 c. salad dressing (Miracle Whip)
- 1 c. hot water
- 1 Tbsp. vanilla

Directions:
- Thoroughly mix dry ingredients.
- In a separate bowl, mix wet ingredients.
- Combine the two and mix until smooth.
- Pour into greased pan and bake at 325° for 27 to 33 minutes.

Original_text:
Yankee Doodle Salad

Ingredients:
- 4 oz. elbow macaroni, uncooked
- 2 tsp. prepared mustard
- 2 c. (8 oz.) cubed Cheddar cheese
- 1 lb. hot dogs, cut in 1/2-inch pieces (ham can be used)
- 3 Tbsp. vinegar
- 1 c. sour cream
- 1/4 c. sweet pickle relish, drained
- 1/4 c. chopped green pepper
- 1/4 c. chopped green onion

Directions:
- Cook macaroni according to package directions and drain.
- In a large bowl toss macaroni with sour cream, pickle relish, green pepper, onion, vinegar and mustard.
- Fold in cheese and hot dog pieces.
- Chill 3 to 4 hours to blend flavors.
- Makes approximately 6 cups.

Lime Cucumber Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. lime gelatin
- 1 c. boiling water

- 1 c. chopped cucumber
- 1/2 c. chopped onion
- 1/2 c. chopped celery (optional)

- Stir until slightly thickened.
- Add remaining ingredients.
- Pour into mold and chill.

Original_text:
Salmon Salad On The Half Shell

Ingredients:
- 3 avocados
- 1 (15 oz.) can salmon, cold
- 2 Tbsp. sliced celery
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1/8 tsp. dry mustard
- dash of pepper
- lettuce
- 2 Tbsp. sliced green onion
- 1/3 c. oil
- 1 small clove garlic, minced
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1 1/2 tsp. minced parsley

Directions:
- Halve, pit and peel the avocados.
- Arrange on lettuce lined plates.
- Drain salmon and separate into chunks.
- Toss salmon lightly with onion and celery.
- Fill avocados with mixture. Combine remaining ingredients in jar with tight lid.
- Cover and shake jar vigorously.
- Drizzle over salmon and avocados.
- Ready to serve.

salad_info: green jello salad ingredient large pkg lime jello large cream cheese large crushed pineapple c milk c boiling water direction dissolve jello boiling water let cool minute beat cream cheese milk drain pineapple mix cream cheese mixture combine remainder ingredient marshmallow andor nut may added chill firm
Original_text:
Green Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large pkg. lime jello
- 1 large cream cheese
- 1 large can crushed pineapple
- 1 c. milk
- 2 c. boiling water

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in boiling water and let cool 10 to 20 minutes. Beat cream cheese and milk.
- Drain pineapple and mix with cream cheese mixture.
- Combine remainder of ingredients.
- Marshmallows and/or nuts may be added.
- Chill until firm.

salad_info: diabetic fruit salad ingredient crushed unsweetened pineapple fruit cocktail small pkg sugarfree gelatin pkg light cream cheese c pecan pkg low calorie whipped topping mix tbsp lemon juice direction drain fruit reserving juice saucepan cook cup reserved juice medium heat stir gelatin beat cream cheese warm mixture fold fruit remove heat chill refrigerator syrupy minute fold pecan whipped cream topping lemon juice fruit mixture pour mixture inch square pan chill hour cut square serve
Original_text:
Diabetic Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (20 oz.) can crushed, unsweetened pineapple or fruit cocktail
- 1 small pkg. sugar-free gelatin
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. light cream cheese
- 1/3 c. pecans
- 2 pkg. low calorie whipped topping mix
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice (when using pineapple or lemon gelatin)

Directions:
- Drain fruit, reserving juice.
- In saucepan, cook 1 cup reserved juice over medium heat; stir in gelatin.
- Beat cream cheese in warm mixture.
- Fold in fruit.
- Remove from heat, chill in refrigerator until syrupy, 45 minutes.
- Fold pecans, whipped cream topping and lemon juice (if using pineapple) into fruit mixture.
- Pour mixture into 8-inch square pan.
- Chill for 2 hours.
- Cut into squares and serve.

Original_text:
Russian Salmon Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. rice (uncooked)
- 1 c. thinly sliced celery
- 1/2 c. sliced green onions with tops
- 1/2 c. diced sweet pickle
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1/4 c. juice from pickles
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/4 tsp. pepper
- 1 (16 oz.) can salmon, drained
- 1 (10 oz.) pkg. peas, thawed
- endive
- 2 hard-boiled eggs, sliced

Directions:
- Prepare rice according to package directions.
- Add celery, onions and pickles to rice.
- Break salmon into chunks.
- Gently stir salmon and peas into rice mixture.
- Chill 3 to 4 hours or overnight.
- Serve on endive and garnish with eggs.
- Yields 6 (1 cup) servings.

Original_text:
Banana-Pineapple Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (6 oz.) pkg. orange jello
- 2 c. hot water
- 2 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 (No. 2) can crushed pineapple
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 2 Tbsp. flour
- 1 c. pineapple juice
- 2 eggs
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 3 bananas
- 1 large carton Cool Whip
- 1/2 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in hot water.
- Add marshmallows and chill.
- When mixture has set to the consistency of egg whites, stir in crushed pineapple.
- Pour into 9 x 13-inch dish.
- Let mixture set up.
- Mix sugar, flour, pineapple juice and eggs.
- Cook over low heat until thick.
- Add cream cheese and stir until smooth, then fold in Cool Whip.
- Cool.
- When jello mixture is set, slice bananas on top.
- Put cream cheese mixture on top of that, then sprinkle with nuts.

- 1 - 15 oz. can salmon

- 2 tomatoes, seeded and diced
- 3/4 c. cucumber, seeded and diced

- Cook peas in boiling water for 1 minute.
- Cool.

- Measure all ingredients into a jar.

Original_text:
*Orzo Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. orzo, uncooked
- 1 c. (4 oz.) Feta cheese, diced
- 3 Tbsp. parsley (fresh), chopped
- 3 Tbsp. dill (fresh), chopped
- 1 large tomato, seeded and chopped
- 1/3 c. olive oil
- 1/4 c. lemon juice
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/4 tsp. pepper

Directions:
- Cook orzo according to package directions (al dente).
- Drain and rinse with cold water. Drain again. Add Feta cheese, parsley, dill and tomato. In a jar with a tight fitting lid, combine oil, lemon juice, salt and pepper.
- Cover and shake.
- Pour over the salad and toss until the orzo is well covered. Refrigerate until cool. Toss again before serving.
- Makes 8 servings.

Original_text:
Heavenly Hash Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can pineapple tidbits
- 3/4 c. water
- 1/2 c. rice
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/2 c. miniature marshmallows
- 6 maraschino cherries

Directions:
- Drain tidbits; mix the syrup and water.
- Boil.
- Add rice and salt.
- Reduce heat; cover and cook.
- Cool.
- Fold in pineapple, marshmallows, cherries (quartered) and whipped cream.
- Chill. Serves 8.

Original_text:
Strawberry Pretzel Salad

Ingredients:

- 3/4 c. melted margarine
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 8 oz. cream cheese, softened
- 8 oz. whipped topping
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 large pkg. strawberry jello
- 2 c. boiling water
- 2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen strawberries

Directions:
- Combine pretzels, margarine and 2 tablespoons sugar in bowl; mix well.
- Press into 9 x 13-inch baking dish.
- Bake at 400° for 8 minutes.
- Cool.
- Beat cream cheese, whipped topping and 1/2 cup sugar in mixer bowl until well blended.
- Spread over cooled crust.
- Dissolve gelatin in boiling water in bowl.
- Add frozen strawberries and stir until thawed.
- Spoon over cream cheese mixture.
- Chill until firm.

Original_text:
Chicken Divan

Ingredients:
- 2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen broccoli
- 3 large chicken breasts, cooked and boned
- 2 cans cream of chicken soup
- 1 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
- 1 tsp. lemon juice

- 1/2 c. bread crumbs

Directions:
- Cook broccoli until tender; drain.
- Arrange broccoli in oblong baking dish.
- Arrange chicken on top.

- Pour over chicken.
- Sprinkle with cheese.
- Combine crumbs and butter.
- Sprinkle over all.
- Bake at 350° for 20 to 30 minutes or until heated.

- 1 Tbsp. oil

Directions:
- Mix sauce.
- Coat chicken.
- Place in pan and cover with foil. Cook approximately 1 1/2 hours at 325°, turning chicken after 45 minutes.
- Serve with Uncle Ben's long grain and wild rice.

- Mix ingredients and marinate for approximately 3 hours.

Sweet And Sour Chicken

- 1 (10 oz.) jar apricot preserves

- Mix together; chill for at least one hour.

salad_info: hot chicken salad ingredient c cutup chicken tbsp lemon juice c chopped almond c mayonnaise c sharp cheese grated pimento finely cut c finely chopped celery hardboiled egg chopped c cream chicken soup tsp grated onion c crushed potato chip direction combine except cheese potato chip almond place large buttered dish top chip cheese almond let stand refrigerator overnight bake minute

salad_info: carrot salad ingredient small head red cabbage large carrot raisin taste c mayonnaise tbsp sour cream tsp sugar direction chop cabbage fine grate carrot combine cabbage carrot raisin small bowl combine mayonnaise sour cream sugar blend carrot mixture refrigerate thoroughly chilled flavor blended least hour salad keep week make cup
Original_text:
Carrot Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/2 small head red cabbage
- 2 to 3 large carrots
- raisins to taste
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. sour cream
- 1 tsp. sugar (optional)

Directions:
- Chop cabbage fine.
- Grate carrots.
- Combine cabbage, carrots and raisins.
- In a small bowl, combine mayonnaise with sour cream and sugar.
- Blend with carrot mixture.
- Refrigerate until thoroughly chilled and flavors have blended, at least 4 hours. Salad keeps for about a week.
- Makes 2 to 3 cups.

salad_info: congealed salad ingredient large crushed pineapple c sugar c water pkg lemon jello cottage cheese cool whip c chopped nut c chopped red cherry direction combine saucepan crushed pineapple sugar water bring boiling point add lemon jello cool add cottage cheese cooled fold cool whip nut cherry
Original_text:
Congealed Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large can crushed pineapple
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 1 c. water
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon jello
- 1 (16 oz.) cottage cheese
- 1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip
- 1 c. chopped nuts
- 1/2 c. chopped red cherries

Directions:
- Combine in saucepan the crushed pineapple, sugar and water; bring to boiling point.
- Add lemon jello and cool.
- Then add cottage cheese when cooled and fold in Cool Whip, nuts and cherries.

salad_info: mandarin shrimp salad ingredient boiled shelled deveined shrimp water chestnut drained c mayonnaise c heavy cream whipped mandarin orange segment drained dash tabasco sauce salt white pepper lettuce leaf bunch watercress jar pimiento strip direction slice water chestnut thin possible fold whipped cream mayonnaise salad bowl combine shrimp mayonnaise mixture water chestnut orange segment tabasco sauce add salt white pepper taste let salad marinate refrigerator hour serving line cold dinner plate lettuce leaf spoon salad onto lettuce place large sprig watercress portion salad opposite side serving plate place pimiento strip top salad serving
Original_text:
Mandarin Shrimp Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. (cooked weight) boiled shelled deveined shrimp (2 lb. raw shrimp in shell)
- 5 oz. can water chestnuts, drained
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1/3 c. heavy cream, whipped
- 11 oz. can mandarin orange segments, drained
- 2 dashes Tabasco sauce
- salt and white pepper
- lettuce leaves
- 1 bunch watercress
- 2 oz. jar pimiento strips

Directions:
- Slice the water chestnuts as thin as possible.
- Fold the whipped cream into the mayonnaise.
- In salad bowl, combine the shrimp, mayonnaise mixture, water chestnuts, orange segments and Tabasco sauce.
- Add salt and white pepper to taste.
- Let the salad marinate in refrigerator for 1/2 hour before serving.
- Line cold dinner plates with lettuce leaves.
- Spoon the salad onto the lettuce.
- Place 2 large sprigs of watercress on each portion of salad at opposite sides of serving plates.
- Place the pimiento strips on top of salad just before serving.

salad_info: cheese garlic biscuit ingredient c flour tsp salt tsp garlic powder tsp baking powder mzarella cheese grated sharp cheddar cheese grated tbsp salad oil c milk direction mix dry ingredient add salad oil milk spoon onto greased cookie sheet bake minute golden brown
Original_text:
Cheese Garlic Biscuits

Ingredients:
- 2 c. flour
- 1 tsp. salt
- 2 tsp. garlic powder
- 3 tsp. baking powder
- 3 oz. Mozzarella cheese, grated
- 3 oz. sharp Cheddar cheese, grated
- 4 Tbsp. salad oil
- 1 1/2 c. milk

Directions:
- Mix dry ingredients.
- Add salad oil and milk.
- Spoon onto greased cookie sheet.
- Bake at 425° for 18 minutes or until golden brown.

salad_info: hot chicken salad ingredient c cubed cooked chicken c chopped celery tsp salt c finely chopped onion tbsp lemon juice c mayonnaise c dry vermouth c toasted slivered almond c crushed corn flake c parmesan cheese direction mix chicken first ingredient together let stand hour spread x inch pan sprinkle crushed corn flake parmesan cheese top bake minute hour
Original_text:
Hot Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 4 c. cubed, cooked chicken
- 3 c. chopped celery
- 2 tsp. salt
- 1/4 c. finely chopped onion
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 2 c. mayonnaise
- 1/4 c. dry vermouth
- 1/2 c. toasted, slivered almonds
- 4 c. crushed corn flakes
- 1/2 c. Parmesan cheese

Directions:
- Mix chicken and the first 7 ingredients together.
- Let stand 1 hour.
- Spread in a 9 x 10-inch pan.
- Sprinkle crushed corn flakes and Parmesan cheese on top.
- Bake at 350° for 45 minutes to 1 hour.

salad_info: cauliflower lettuce salad ingredient head cauliflower head lettuce onion chopped crisp bacon c hellmanns parmesan cheese grated direction cut cauliflower tear lettuce crumble bacon mix ingredient together dressing sprinkle cheese top
Original_text:
Cauliflower And Lettuce Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head cauliflower
- 1 head lettuce
- 1 onion (sweet Bermuda or Noon Day), chopped
- 1 lb. crisp bacon
- 1 c. Hellmann's (I prefer salad dressing; your choice)
- Parmesan cheese, grated (optional)

Directions:
- Cut up cauliflower.
- Tear up lettuce (I prefer to use hands instead of knife).
- Crumble up bacon.
- Mix all ingredients together with dressing.
- Sprinkle cheese over top.

salad_info: banana split salad ingredient large tub cool whip eagle brand milk cherry pie filling pineapple well drained banana chopped c chopped nut direction combine cool whip evaporated milk large bowl beat well fold remaining ingredient chill serving time
Original_text:
Banana Split Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large tub Cool Whip
- 1 can Eagle Brand milk
- 1 can cherry pie filling
- 1 (8 oz.) can pineapple, well drained
- 3 bananas, chopped
- 1/2 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Combine Cool Whip and evaporated milk in a large bowl.
- Beat well.
- Fold in remaining ingredients.
- Chill until serving time.

Sawdust Salad

- together
