salad_info: apricot salad ingredient crushed pineapple c sugar pkg apricot gelatin large pkg cream cheese crumbled c diced celery c chopped nut evaporated milk chilled pt whipping cream direction combine pineapple sugar saucepan bring boil add gelatin mixing thoroughly cool congeal slightly add cream cheese beat electric mixer well blended whip milk fold gelatin mixture pour x inch baking dish refrigerate make serving
Original_text:
Apricot Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (No. 2) can crushed pineapple
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 1 (6 oz.) pkg. apricot gelatin
- 1 large pkg. cream cheese, crumbled
- 1 c. diced celery (optional)
- 1 c. chopped nuts (optional)
- 1 (13 oz.) can evaporated milk, chilled
- 1 pt. whipping cream (optional)

Directions:
- Combine pineapple and sugar in saucepan; bring to boil.
- Add gelatin, mixing thoroughly.
- Cool and congeal slightly.
- Add cream cheese; beat with electric mixer until well blended.
- Whip milk; fold into gelatin mixture.
- Pour into 13 x 9-inch baking dish.
- Refrigerate.
- Makes 15 servings.

salad_info: blueberry salad ingredient pkg grape jello pkg c hot water crushed pineapple blueberry pie filling c chopped pecan pkg cream cheese c sour cream c sugar tsp vanilla direction dissolve jello hot water add next ingredient refrigerate gelatin set
Original_text:
Blueberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. grape jello or 1 (6 oz.) pkg.
- 2 c. hot water
- 1 (No. 2) can crushed pineapple
- 1 (No. 2) can blueberry pie filling
- 1 c. chopped pecans
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 1 c. sour cream
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. vanilla

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in hot water; add next 3 ingredients. Refrigerate until gelatin set.

salad_info: campanealle noodle salad ingredient c milk box campanealle noodle lg onion diced lg cucumber diced lg tomato diced yellow pepper diced c mayonnaise direction cook noodle according package direction rinse large bowl combine noodle onion tomato cucumber yellow pepper salt pepper taste small mixing bowl mix mayonnaise milk sugar equal taste mix noodle vegetable chill
Original_text:
Campanealle Noodle Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/4 c. milk
- 1 box campanealle noodles
- 1/2 lg. onion diced
- 1 lg. cucumber diced
- 1 lg. tomato diced
- 1 yellow pepper diced
- 1 1/2 c. mayonnaise

Directions:
- Cook noodles according to package direction, rinse.
- In a large bowl combine noodles, onion, tomato, cucumber, yellow pepper and salt and pepper to taste.
- In a small mixing bowl mix mayonnaise, milk and sugar or equal to taste.
- Mix with noodles and vegetables and chill.

salad_info: easy macaroni salad ingredient c mayonnaise tbsp vinegar tbsp sugar tbsp prepared mustard tsp salt tsp pepper pkg eow macaroni cooked drained c sliced celery c chopped green sweet red pepper c chopped onion direction large bowl stir together first ingredient smooth add remaining ingredient toss coat well cover chill make cup
Original_text:
Easy Macaroni Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 3 Tbsp. vinegar
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 2 Tbsp. prepared mustard
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/4 tsp. pepper
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. elbow macaroni, cooked and drained
- 1 c. sliced celery
- 1 c. chopped green or sweet red pepper
- 1/4 c. chopped onion

Directions:
- In a large bowl, stir together the first 6 ingredients until smooth.
- Add remaining ingredients; toss to coat well.
- Cover; chill.
- Makes 5 cups.

salad_info: maw dees pepper steak ingredient beef c soy sauce tsp ground ginger clove garlic c salad oil c green onion sliced thin c red yellow andor green pepper stalk celery sliced thin tsp cornstarch c warm water tomato cut wedge direction cut beef across grain thin strip combine soy sauce garlic ginger add beef toss set aside heat oil large pan wok add beef toss high heat browned taste meat tender cover simmer minute low heat turn heat add vegetable toss crisp minute mix cornstarch water add pan stir cook thickened add tomato heat serve rice
Original_text:
Maw Dee'S Pepper Steak

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. beef (chuck or round, fat trimmed)
- 1/4 c. soy sauce
- 1/2 tsp. ground ginger
- 1 clove garlic
- 1/4 c. salad oil
- 1 c. green onion, sliced thin
- 1 c. red, yellow and/or green peppers
- 2 stalks celery, sliced thin
- 1 tsp. cornstarch
- 1 c. warm water
- 2 tomatoes, cut into wedges

Directions:
- Cut beef across grain into thin strips.
- Combine soy sauce, garlic and ginger; add beef.
- Toss and set aside.
- Heat oil in large pan or wok.
- Add beef and toss over high heat until browned. Taste meat.
- If not tender, cover and simmer for 30 to 40 minutes over low heat.
- Turn heat up and add vegetables.
- Toss until crisp, 10 minutes.
- Mix cornstarch with water.
- Add to pan; stir and cook until thickened.
- Add tomatoes and heat through.
- Serve over rice.

salad_info: oriental chicken ingredient skinless boneless chicken breast small bottle catalina salad dressing small jar apricot jam direction spread jam chicken casserole pan add catalina salad dressing bake hour great tossed salad baked potato
Original_text:
Oriental Chicken

Ingredients:
- 8 skinless, boneless chicken breasts
- 1 small bottle Catalina salad dressing
- 1 small jar apricot jam

Directions:
- Spread jam over chicken in a casserole pan.
- Add Catalina salad dressing.
- Bake at 350° for 1 hour.
- Great with tossed salad and baked potato.

salad_info: german potato salad ingredient red potato bacon c sugar c vinegar c water tbsp cornstarch tsp salt bunch green onion entirely chopped tsp fresh ground black pepper direction cook potato skin tender drain cool peel slice inch slice desired size cut bacon inch piece fry crisp burnt remove drain bacon saving cup bacon dripping mix cornstarch water together heat sugar vinegar bacon dripping salt pepper add cornstarch mixture thicken stir constantly pour hot mixture potato bacon green onion mix serve hot
Original_text:
German Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 5 lb. red potatoes
- 1 lb. bacon
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 2/3 c. vinegar
- 1 c. water
- 1 Tbsp. cornstarch (rounded)
- 2 tsp. salt
- 2 bunches green onions, entirely chopped
- 1/4 tsp. fresh ground black pepper

Directions:
- Cook potatoes with skins on until tender, drain and cool. Peel and slice into 1/4-inch slices or desired size.
- Cut bacon into 1-inch pieces and fry until crisp but not burnt.
- Remove and drain bacon, saving 1/4 cup bacon drippings.
- Mix cornstarch and water together.
- Heat sugar, vinegar, bacon drippings, salt and pepper.
- Then add cornstarch mixture to thicken.
- Stir constantly. Pour hot mixture over potatoes, bacon and green onions.
- Mix and serve while hot.

salad_info: pink glory rice salad ingredient c minute rice cooked qt water drain cool pkg strawberry jello c hot water c sugar crushed pineapple drained c pineapple juice carton cool whip direction dissolve jello cup hot water stirring dissolved add sugar juice let set slightly jelled add remaining ingredient fold cool whip refrigerate firm
Original_text:
Pink Glory Rice Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. Minute rice, cooked in 1 qt. water, drain and cool
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. strawberry Jell-O
- 1 1/2 c. hot water
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 (No. 303) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1/2 c. pineapple juice
- 1 carton Cool Whip

Directions:
- Dissolve Jell-O in 1 1/2 cups hot water, stirring until dissolved.
- Add sugar and juice.
- Let set until slightly jelled. Add remaining ingredients and fold in Cool Whip.
- Refrigerate until firm.

salad_info: cole slaw dressing ingredient cup sugar cup salad oil cup vinegar tbsp celery seed tbsp mustard seed tsp salt direction blend well refrigerate
Original_text:
Cole Slaw Dressing

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 cups sugar
- 1 1/2 cups salad oil
- 1 cup vinegar
- 1 1/2 tbsp celery seed
- 1 1/2 tbsp. mustard seed
- 1 1/2 tsp. salt

Directions:
- Blend well and refrigerate.

salad_info: baked bean salad ingredient pork sausage crumbled casing removed italian sausage crumbled casing removed c celery chopped c onion chopped pork bean green bean drained yellow bean drained tomato paste tbsp mustard c brown sugar tsp chili powder tomato soup bacon strip direction brown sausage drain mix ingredient together sausage put large rectangular baking dish top bacon strip bake hour serf
Original_text:
Baked Bean Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. pork sausage, crumbled and casing removed
- 1/2 lb. Italian sausage, crumbled and casing removed
- 1 c. celery, chopped
- 2 c. onions, chopped
- 1 can pork and beans (do not drain)
- 1 can green beans, drained
- 1 can yellow beans, drained
- 1 can tomato paste
- 2 Tbsp. mustard
- 1 c. brown sugar
- 1/2 tsp. chili powder
- 1 can tomato soup
- bacon strips

Directions:
- Brown sausage and drain.
- Mix all ingredients together with sausage.
- Put into a large rectangular baking dish.
- Top with bacon strips.
- Bake 1 1/2 hours at 350°.
- Serves 12 to 15.

salad_info: best ever cornbread ingredient c selfrising meal egg creamstyle corn c sour cream c salad oil direction combine ingredient mixing well pour greased inch pie pan bake minute
Original_text:
Best Ever Cornbread

Ingredients:
- 1 c. self-rising meal
- 2 eggs
- 1 can cream-style corn (8 3/4 oz. can)
- 1 c. sour cream
- 1/4 c. salad oil

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients, mixing well and pour into greased 9-inch pie pan.
- Bake at 400° for 20 to 30 minutes.

salad_info: hour layered salad ingredient head lettuce rib celery diced green pepper chopped red onion diced lesueur green pea pt hellmanns mayonnaise parmesan cheese bacon fried crisp direction break lettuce bottom container layer rib diced celery chopped green pepper diced red onion drain lesueur pea place top onion next mayonnaise parmesan cheese crumble bacon top seal well saran wrap refrigerate hour
Original_text:
"24 Hour Layered Salad"

Ingredients:
- 1 head lettuce
- 2 ribs celery, diced
- 1 green pepper, chopped
- 1 red onion, diced
- 1 can LeSueur green peas
- 1 pt. Hellmann's mayonnaise
- 3 oz. can Parmesan cheese
- 1 lb. bacon, fried crisp

Directions:
- Break up lettuce in bottom of container.
- Layer the 2 ribs of diced celery, chopped green pepper and diced red onion.
- Drain can of LeSueur peas and place on top of onion.	Next, the mayonnaise and Parmesan cheese.
- Crumble bacon on top and seal well in Saran Wrap.
- Refrigerate for 24 hours.

salad_info: hawaiian salad ingredient rosmarino pasta can pineapple tidbit c sugar mandarin orange egg slightly beaten jar maraschino cherry tbsp flour cool whip tsp salt direction cook macaroni rinse cool add sugar flour egg fruit juice salt saucepan medium heat thickened stir macaroni refrigerate later fold fruit cool whip
Original_text:
Hawaiian Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. Rosmarino pasta
- 2 cans pineapple tidbits (save juice)
- 3/4 c. sugar
- 1 can mandarin oranges (save juice)
- 2 eggs, slightly beaten
- 1 jar maraschino cherries
- 1 tbsp. flour
- 1 1/2 Cool Whip (9 oz containers)
- 1/2 tsp. salt

Directions:
- Cook macaroni and rinse.
- Cool.
- Add sugar, flour, eggs, fruit juices and salt in saucepan over medium heat until thickened.
- Stir in macaroni and refrigerate. Later, fold in fruit and Cool Whip.

salad_info: christmas salad ingredient c raw cranberry c sugar pkg lemon flavored gelatin c hot water orange c diced celery c pineapple juice c chopped nut direction combine cranberry sugar let stand several hour stirring occasionally dissolve gelatin hot water add ground orange pineapple juice cool add sugared cranberry celery nut chill set serve salad green salad dressing whipped cream
Original_text:
Christmas Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. raw cranberries (ground)
- 2 c. sugar
- 2 pkg. lemon flavored gelatin
- 1 1/2 c. hot water
- 1 orange (ground, rind and all)
- 1 c. diced celery
- 1 c. pineapple juice
- 1/2 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Combine cranberries and sugar; let stand several hours, stirring occasionally.
- Dissolve gelatin in hot water, add ground orange, pineapple juice.
- When cool, add sugared cranberries, celery and nuts.
- Chill until set. Serve on salad greens with salad dressing or whipped cream.

salad_info: coleslaw ingredient small head cabbage shredded large carrot shredded large apple peel shred small onion diced finely tsp dill seed cucumber onion salad dressing direction combine first five ingredient mixing bowl blend salad dressing moisten
Original_text:
Coleslaw

Ingredients:
- 1 small head cabbage, shredded
- 2 large carrots, shredded
- 1 large apple, peel and shred (coat with a little lemon juice)
- 1/2 small onion, diced finely
- 1/2 tsp. dill seed (or enough to suit taste)
- 6 oz. cucumber and onion salad dressing

Directions:
- Combine first five ingredients in a mixing bowl.
- Blend in salad dressing to moisten.

salad_info: ham salad ingredient cheese lunch meat pt jar sweet pickle tbsp mustard bologna hardboiled egg qt jar mayonnaise direction boil egg putting ingredient food grinder chop egg mix ingredient refrigerate ready use
Original_text:
Ham Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/2 lb. cheese
- 2 lb. lunch meat (spiced)
- 1 pt. jar sweet pickles
- 2 Tbsp. mustard
- 1 lb. bologna
- 2 doz. hard-boiled eggs
- 1 qt. jar mayonnaise

Directions:
- Boil the eggs while putting the other ingredients through a food grinder.
- Chop eggs and mix with other ingredients. Refrigerate until ready to use.

salad_info: homemade seasoned herb vinegar ingredient white vinegar fresh herb direction create salad dressing vinegar choose one fresh herb using herb wash leave branch using garlic spear wooden stick
Original_text:
Homemade Seasoned "Herb" Vinegar

Ingredients:
- white vinegar
- fresh herbs (thyme, rosemary, sweet basil, hot peppers, lemon curls, lime curls, dill, tarragon and garlic)

Directions:
- Create your own salad dressing vinegar.
- Choose one or more fresh herbs.
- If using herbs, wash and leave on branches.
- If using garlic, spear on wooden sticks.

salad_info: broccoli salad ingredient pkg fren broccoli mushroom soup tbsp onion chopped egg beaten c mayonnaise c grated cheese direction cook broccoli directed package drain water add rest ingredient except cheese pour slightly greased casserole dish sprinkle cheese top bake minute
Original_text:
Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 pkg. frozen broccoli
- 1 can mushroom soup
- 3 Tbsp. onion, chopped
- 2 eggs, beaten
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 2 c. grated cheese

Directions:
- Cook broccoli as directed on package; drain all water.
- Add rest of ingredients except cheese.
- Pour into a slightly greased casserole dish.
- Sprinkle cheese on top and bake at 350° for 40 minutes.

salad_info: grilled chicken fresh vegetable ingredient boneless skinless chicken breast half bottle vinaigrette salad dressing sweet red pepper small zucchini small carrot scraped medium onion small yellow squash direction shallow dish combine chicken bottle salad dressing cover marinate hour refrigerator cut vegetable bite size piece place another shallow dish add remaining bottle salad dressing chill remove chicken marinade reserving marinade grill minute side basting marinade remove vegetable marinade grill vegetable wire rack steamed sauteed top stove yield serving
Original_text:
Grilled Chicken And Fresh Vegetables

Ingredients:
- 12 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
- 4 (8 oz.) bottles vinaigrette salad dressing
- 6 sweet red peppers
- 6 small zucchini
- 6 small carrots, scraped
- 6 medium onions
- 6 small yellow squash

Directions:
- In shallow dish combine chicken and 2 bottles of the salad dressing.
- Cover and marinate 4 hours in refrigerator.
- Cut vegetables into bite size pieces and place in another shallow dish.
- Add remaining 2 bottles of salad dressing; chill.
- Remove chicken from marinade, reserving marinade.
- Grill 5 to 6 minutes on each side, basting with marinade.
- Remove vegetables from marinade.
- Grill vegetables on wire rack or steamed or sauteed on top of stove.
- Yields 12 servings.

salad_info: bean dip ingredient vegeburger medium onion diced sliced olive refried bean medium tomato chopped cheese shredded c salsa pkg taco sauce mix direction brown vegeburger taco sauce mix set aside vegeburger olive tomato onion take bean rest ingredient mix large bowl spread casserole dish garnish ingredient set aside bake minute edge boil serve warmed chip green salad
Original_text:
Bean Dip

Ingredients:
- 1 can vegeburger
- 1 medium onion, diced
- 1 can sliced olives
- 1 can refried beans
- 2 medium tomatoes, chopped
- 1 lb. cheese, shredded
- 1 1/2 c. salsa
- 1 pkg. taco sauce mix

Directions:
- Brown vegeburger with taco sauce mix.
- Set aside 1/3 of the vegeburger, olives, tomatoes and onion.
- Take all of the beans and the 2/3 of the rest of ingredients and mix in large bowl.
- Spread into casserole dish and garnish with ingredients that were set aside.
- Bake at 375° for 25 to 30 minutes or until edges boil. Serve with warmed chips and green salad!

salad_info: popcorn cake ingredient c popcorn c salad oil c margarine c salted peanut miniature marshmallow c gumdrop candy corn c mm direction melt margarine marshmallow salad oil together keep popcorn warm large pan oven ready make combine popcorn melted mixture peanut candy pack firmly wellgreased angel food bundt pan refrigerate minute invert plate serve
Original_text:
Popcorn Cake

Ingredients:
- 18 c. popcorn
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 1/2 c. margarine
- 1/2 c. salted peanuts
- 1 lb. miniature marshmallows
- 1 c. gumdrops or candy corn
- 1 c. M&M's

Directions:
- Melt the margarine, marshmallows and salad oil together.
- Keep popcorn warm in a large pan in the oven.
- When ready to make, combine the popcorn with the melted mixture, peanuts and candies. Pack firmly in a well-greased (with butter) angel food or Bundt pan.
- Refrigerate 30 minutes.
- Invert on a plate and serve.

salad_info: bean salad ingredient french green bean pea onion chopped c salad oil c vinegar tsp salt lima bean stalk celery chopped chopped pimento c sugar tbsp water direction drain vegetable combine ingredient let stand refrigerator overnight
Original_text:
Bean Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can French green beans
- 1 can peas
- 1 onion, chopped
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 1 c. vinegar
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 can lima beans
- 1 or 2 stalks celery, chopped
- 1 can chopped pimento
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 Tbsp. water

Directions:
- Drain vegetables.
- Combine all ingredients.
- Let stand in refrigerator overnight.

salad_info: tomato zucchini salad ingredient ripe tomato cut wedge small zucchini sliced sweet onion sliced ring sweet pepper sliced c pitted black olive bottle italian dressing direction slice vegetable glass bowl add olive pour italian dressing vegetable much needed cover refrigerate hour
Original_text:
Tomato, Zucchini Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 ripe tomatoes, cut in wedges
- 2 small zucchini, sliced
- 1 sweet onion, sliced in rings
- 1 to 2 sweet peppers (any color), sliced
- 2 c. pitted black olives
- 1 bottle Italian dressing

Directions:
- Slice vegetables in glass bowl.
- Add olives.
- Pour Italian dressing over vegetables as much as needed.
- Cover, refrigerate for 3 to 4 hours.

salad_info: baby food salad ingredient small box orange jello small crushed pineapple undrained c sugar small jar apricot baby food pecan cream cheese soft cool whip direction heat orange jello pineapple dissolved add sugar mix cream cheese add baby food chill slightly jelled fold cool whip add nut top
Original_text:
Baby Food Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small box orange Jell-O (add no water)
- 1 small can crushed pineapple, undrained
- 3/4 c. sugar
- 2 small jars apricot baby food
- pecans (optional)
- 8 oz. cream cheese, very soft
- 12 oz. Cool Whip

Directions:
- Heat orange Jell-O and pineapple until dissolved.
- Add sugar. Mix in cream cheese (mash with fork until mixed well; do not beat). Add baby food. Chill until slightly jelled.
- Fold in Cool Whip. Add nuts on top.

salad_info: christmas cranberry salad ingredient c cranberry c miniature marshmallow c granulated sugar c diced apple c chopped pecan c heavy cream whipped c seedless grape direction blend cranberry well blender mixing bowl combine cranberry marshmallow sugar refrigerate overnight add apple grape pecan cranberry mixture mix well fold whipped cream serve immediately salad look pretty served glass bowl
Original_text:
Christmas Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. cranberries (fresh or frozen)
- 3 c. miniature marshmallows
- 3/4 c. granulated sugar
- 2 c. diced apples (unpeeled)
- 1/2 c. chopped pecans
- 1 c. heavy cream, whipped
- 1/2 c. seedless grapes

Directions:
- Blend cranberries well in blender. In a mixing bowl, combine cranberries, marshmallows and sugar. Refrigerate overnight. Add apples, grapes and pecans to cranberry mixture. Mix well. Fold in whipped cream. Serve immediately. This salad looks pretty served in a glass bowl.

salad_info: impossible blt pie ingredient slice bacon crisply cooked crumbled c shredded swiss cheese c milk c mayonnaise salad dressing egg c biscuit mix tsp pepper tsp salt sliced tomato shredded lettuce direction grease x inch pie plate layer crumbled bacon cheese bottom beat remaining ingredient smooth minute high hand mixer pour plate bacon cheese bake golden brown minute serve lettuce tomato
Original_text:
Impossible B.L.T. Pie

Ingredients:
- 12 slices bacon, crisply cooked and crumbled
- 1 c. shredded Swiss cheese
- 1 1/2 c. milk
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
- 4 eggs
- 1 c. biscuit mix
- 1/8 tsp. pepper
- 1/8 tsp. salt
- sliced tomatoes
- shredded lettuce

Directions:
- Grease 10 x 1-inch pie plate.
- Layer crumbled bacon and cheese in bottom.
- Beat remaining ingredients (except lettuce and tomatoes) until smooth 1 minute on high with hand mixer.
- Pour into plate over bacon and cheese.
- Bake at 400° until golden brown, 30 to 35 minutes.
- Serve with lettuce and tomatoes.

salad_info: hidden valley ranch oyster cracker ingredient pkg hidden valley original salad dressing mix tsp lemon pepper tsp dill weed tsp garlic powder c salad oil c plain oyster cracker direction preheat oven combine salad dressing mix dill weed lemon pepper garlic powder oil pour cracker stir coat
Original_text:
Hidden Valley Ranch Oyster Crackers

Ingredients:
- 1 (1 oz.) pkg. Hidden Valley original salad dressing mix
- 1/4 tsp. lemon pepper
- 1/2 tsp. dill weed
- 1/4 tsp. garlic powder
- 3/4 c. salad oil
- 5 c. plain oyster crackers

Directions:
- Preheat oven to 250°.
- Combine salad dressing mix with dill weed, lemon pepper, garlic powder and oil.
- Pour over crackers. Stir to coat.

salad_info: tres amigo salad ingredient nosaltadded green bean drained wax bean drained kidney bean drained c chopped green bell pepper c chopped green onion c apple juice c cider vinegar tsp sugar tsp pepper tsp dry mustard tsp paprika tsp dried oregano direction combine green bean wax bean kidney bean bell pepper green onion combine apple juice cider vinegar sugar pepper dry mustard paprika dried oregano small jar cover tightly shake vigorously pour vinaigrette salad toss gently cover chill least hour yield serving
Original_text:
Tres Amigos Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (16 oz.) can no-salt-added green beans, drained
- 1 (16 oz.) can wax beans, drained
- 1 (16 oz.) can kidney beans, drained
- 1 c. chopped green bell pepper
- 2/3 c. chopped green onions
- 2/3 c. apple juice
- 1/3 c. cider vinegar
- 2 tsp. sugar
- 1/2 tsp. pepper
- 1/4 tsp. dry mustard
- 1/4 tsp. paprika
- 1/8 tsp. dried oregano

Directions:
- Combine green beans, wax beans, kidney beans, bell pepper and green onions. Combine apple juice, cider vinegar, sugar, pepper, dry mustard, paprika and dried oregano in a small jar; cover tightly and shake vigorously. Pour vinaigrette over salad; toss gently. Cover and chill at least 2 hours. Yield: 12 servings.

- Mix all ingredients; chill several hours or overnight before serving.

Copper Carrot Pennies

- 1 medium onion

- pour over cheese mixture.

Tuna Supreme Salad

- 1 Tbsp. onion, chopped fine

- 1 c. water-packed tuna, rinsed, drained and flaked
- 1/2 c. celery, chopped

Directions:
- In a mixing bowl, whisk the parsley, onion, mayonnaise and lemon juice.
- Stir in the tuna.
- In a salad bowl, combine celery, cabbage and carrots.
- Add the tuna mixture.
- Toss.
- Cover and chill until serving time.

Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 (3 oz.) pkg. raspberry flavored gelatin
- 2 c. boiling water
- 1 (16 oz.) can whole cranberry sauce
- 1 large can undrained crushed pineapple
- 1 large can pears

Directions:
- Dissolve the gelatin in boiling water. Stir in the cranberry sauce, pineapple and pears. Use potato masher to mash and mix all together. Pour into a Tupperware pan of 9 x 9 x 3-inch or larger. Makes about 16 servings.

Original_text:
Light Chicken And Pasta Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 cup low fat cottage cheese, 2%
- 1/3 cup fresh orange juice
- 1 1/2 teaspoons white wine vinegar
- 3/4 teaspoon basil
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1/4 teaspoon pepper
- 1/4 teaspoon grated orange zest
- 1- 8 oz box of bow tie pasta, cooked and drained
- 2 cups chicken breast, cooked and drained
- 2 tablespoons chopped parsley
- 1 tomato, diced

Directions:
- In a blender, puree the first 6 ingredients until smooth.
- When done, stir in orange zest.
- Then stir mix with cooked pasta.
- Add chicken, tomato, and parsley last.
- Refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving.

Rice Salad

Burrito Pie

- 1 medium onion, diced

- 1 medium tomato, diced

Directions:
- In 10-inch skillet over medium heat, in hot salad oil, fry 1 tortilla at a time, about 30 seconds on each side until lightly browned and blistered. With tongs, remove tortilla to paper towels to drain. Discard any remaining oil.

Original_text:
Four Bean Salad

- 1 c. chopped onion
- 1 large garlic clove, minced
- 1 (1 lb.) can butter beans, drained

- 1 (1 lb.) can kidney beans, drained

- 3/4 c. brown sugar

Directions:

- Put all ingredients in mixing bowl, stir and freeze.

salad_info: hummingbird cake ingredient c allpurpose flour c sugar tsp salt tsp soda tsp cinnamon egg beaten c salad oil tsp vanilla crushed pineapple undrained c pecan divided c chopped ripe banana direction combine dry ingredient large mixing bowl add egg oil stirring dry ingredient moistened beat stir vanilla pineapple cup chopped nut banana spoon batter wellgreased inch cake pan bake minute cake test done cool pan minute remove pan cool completely spread cream cheese frosting layer top side cake sprinkle cup chopped nut
Original_text:
Hummingbird Cake

Ingredients:
- 3 c. all-purpose flour
- 2 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. soda
- 1 tsp. cinnamon
- 3 eggs, beaten
- 1 1/2 c. salad oil
- 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
- 1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, undrained
- 2 c. pecans, divided
- 2 c. chopped ripe bananas

Directions:
- Combine dry ingredients in a large mixing bowl. Add eggs and oil, stirring until all dry ingredients are moistened.
- Do not beat. Stir in vanilla, pineapple, 1 cup chopped nuts and bananas. Spoon batter into 3 well-greased 9-inch cake pans. Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes or until cake tests done.
- Cool in pans 10 minutes. Remove from pans and cool completely. Spread Cream Cheese Frosting between layers and on top and sides of cake. Sprinkle with 1 cup chopped nuts.

Strawberry Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. crushed pretzels
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 3/4 c. soft margarine
- 8 oz. cream cheese, softened
- 8 oz. Cool Whip
- 1 c. sugar
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. strawberry jello
- 2 c. boiling water
- 2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen strawberries (do not thaw)

Directions:
- Mix crushed pretzels, sugar and soft margarine and press in 9 x 13-inch pan.
- Bake 8 minutes at 350°; let cool.
- Mix softened cream cheese, Cool Whip and sugar.
- Mix together and pour over crust (be sure to seal edges).
- Mix strawberry jello with boiling water and frozen strawberries (do not thaw; add frozen).
- Pour over cheese mixture.

- Mix and chill.

Original_text:
Lemon Salad Supreme

Ingredients:
- 2 pkg. lime gelatin
- 3 c. boiling water
- 1/4 c. lemon juice
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 2 c. cut cooked chicken or flaked tuna
- 1 (1 lb. 3 oz.) can pineapple chunks, drained
- 1/2 c. toasted almonds

Directions:
- Dissolve gelatin in water.
- Add lemon juice and salad dressing and mix well.
- Chill in refrigerator until mixture begins to congeal.
- Beat well; add remaining ingredients and mix.
- Pour into lightly oiled 2-quart mold.
- Chill until set.
- Unmold on salad greens and garnish as desired.

- 1 block Cheddar cheese, grated
- 1 large bottle Catalina dressing
- 1 head lettuce
- 1 (6 oz.) corn chips

Directions:
- Mix first 5 ingredients, let set several hours or overnight. Wash and tear lettuce when ready to eat.
- Mix dressing with lettuce and top with custard corn chips.

Original_text:
Cherry Salad Supreme

Ingredients:
- 1 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 c. crushed pineapple
- 1/3 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
- nuts
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. raspberry jello
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon jello
- 1 (21 oz.) can cherry pie filling
- 1/2 c. whipping cream

Directions:
- Dissolve raspberry jello in 1 cup boiling water; stir in pie filling.
- Turn into 9 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish.
- Chill until partially set.
- Dissolve lemon jello in 1 cup boiling water.
- Beat together cream cheese and mayonnaise.
- Gradually add lemon jello. Stir in undrained pineapple.
- Whip whipping cream and fold into lemon mixture with marshmallows.
- Spread atop cherry layer; top with 2 tablespoons chopped nuts.
- Chill until set.
- Cut in 12 pieces and serve on shredded lettuce.

Original_text:
Brown Rice

Ingredients:
- 1 large onion
- 1 clove garlic
- 1/4 c. salad oil
- 1 c. uncooked regular rice
- 1 (10 1/2 oz.) can consomme (beef)
- 1 1/4 c. water
- 1 (6 oz.) can sliced mushrooms
- Salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- Lightly brown onion and garlic in salad oil.
- Stir in rice, consomme, water, mushrooms, and salt and pepper.
- Bring to a boil, then lower heat and cook 4 minutes or until rice is tender and liquid absorbed, stirring occasionally.
- Yield: 4 to 6 servings.

- Mix all ingredients together well.

- 1 small onion
- 1 c. Hellmann's mayonnaise
- salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- Boil the macaroni and cool. Cut up crab meat into bite size pieces.

Original_text:
Make Ahead Layered Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 c. lettuce shredded
- 6 boiled eggs, chopped
- 1 (15 oz.) can green peas, drained
- 1 small bunch green onions, chopped
- 1 lb. bacon, fried and crumbled
- 1 c. grated cheese
- 1 small jar mayonnaise (1 1/2 to 2 c.)
- paprika

Directions:
- In a large bowl, layer 1 1/2 cups of lettuce, then chopped eggs, green peas, remainder of lettuce, bacon and cheese.
- Seal top of salad completely with mayonnaise.
- Sprinkle with green onions and paprika.
- Cover and refrigerate 24 hours.

Original_text:
Black Bean And Jicama Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. dried black beans
- 1/2 c. fresh lime juice
- 1 Tbsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. freshly ground pepper
- 1/4 c. olive oil
- 4 c. finely diced jicama (3 lb.)
- 1 large red pepper, diced fine
- 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen whole kernel corn, thawed
- 1/2 c. coarsely chopped fresh cilantro

Directions:
- Soak beans in water to cover by 2-inches in large saucepan overnight. Drain; cover with 6 cups fresh water. Bring to boil; reduce heat and simmer, covered, 40 to 60 minutes, until tender. Drain. (Can be made ahead. Cover and refrigerate up to 2 days.)

German Potato Salad

Original_text:
Hot Seafood Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 3/4 c. uncooked shell macaroni
- 1 can shrimp
- 1 can tuna
- 1 can crab
- 1 green pepper, chopped fine
- 1 pimento, chopped fine or 1 small jar pimento
- 1 small onion, chopped fine

- Cook and cool macaroni.
- Mix remaining ingredients well and combine with macaroni. Store in refrigerator overnight.

- Wonderful!

Original_text:
Vegetable And Cheese Pita Pockets

Ingredients:
- 2 c. peeled, seeded and diced cucumber
- 2 c. quartered cherry tomatoes or chopped tomatoes
- 2 c. romaine lettuce in matchstick pieces
- 4 oz. Feta cheese, crumbled
- 1 c. diced red onion
- 1 Tbsp. chopped fresh mint

Directions:
- In medium bowl, combine cucumber, tomatoes, lettuce, Feta cheese, onion and mint.

Ingredients:
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon gelatin
- 1 c. boiling water
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
- 3 Tbsp. mayonnaise
- 1 (No. 303) can sliced peaches, drained

- 1 c. chopped nuts

salad_info: grandma oatmeal cooky ingredient c flour c sugar tsp baking powder tsp soda tsp salt tsp cinnamon c rolled oat c raisin c salad oil egg c milk scant tbsp vanilla nut direction sift first ingredient together put vanilla bottom cup add enough milk make cup stir salad oil milk egg together add sifted ingredient stir well add raisin oat drop teaspoon ungreased baking sheet bake minute make den
Original_text:
Grandma'S Oatmeal Cookies

Ingredients:
- 2 c. flour
- 1 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. baking powder
- 1/2 tsp. soda
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. cinnamon
- 2 c. rolled oats
- 1 c. raisins
- 1 c. salad oil
- 2 eggs
- 1/2 c. milk
- scant Tbsp. vanilla
- nuts (optional)

Directions:
- Sift first 6 ingredients together.
- Put vanilla in bottom of cup.
- Add enough milk to make 1/2 cup.
- Stir salad oil, milk and eggs together.
- Add to sifted ingredients, then stir well and add raisins and oats.
- Drop from teaspoon on ungreased baking sheet. Bake at 375° for 10 to 12 minutes.
- Makes about 4 dozen.

salad_info: sicilian rolled meat loaf ingredient lean ground chuck egg tbsp italian salad dressing cup chopped onion salt pepper taste fine dry bread crumb thin slice boiled ham slice mzarella cheese large tomato sauce direction mix together meat egg dressing onion seasoning add enough bread crumb bind mixture cut sheet waxed paper rectangle size cookie sheet spread pat meat mixture waxed paper arrange ham slice layer meat mixture arrange cheese slice ham roll like jelly roll place baking dish bake uncovered hour pour tomato sauce top bake minute
Original_text:
Sicilian Rolled Meat Loaf(Serves 6)  

Ingredients:
- 2 lbs. lean ground chuck
- 2 eggs
- 3 tbsp. Italian salad dressing
- 1/4 cup chopped onion
- Salt & pepper to taste
- Fine dry bread crumbs
- 6 thin slices boiled ham
- 6 slices mozzarella cheese
- 1 large can tomato sauce

Directions:
- Mix together meat, eggs, dressing, onion and seasonings.
- Add just enough bread crumbs to bind mixture.
- Cut a sheet of waxed paper into a rectangle the size of a cookie sheet (10 x 15). Spread and pat meat mixture over waxed paper.
- Arrange ham slices in a layer over meat mixture.
- Arrange cheese slices over ham. Roll up like a jelly roll.
- Place in baking dish and bake uncovered at 350 for about 1 1/2 hours.
- Pour tomato sauce over top and bake 20 minutes more.

salad_info: overnight fruit salad ingredient cup pineapple chunk heavy syrup drained reserving tbsp syrup egg yolk beaten tbsp sugar tbsp white vinegar tbsp butter margarine tsp salt can pitted white royal anne cherry drained can mandarin orange drained cup miniature marshmallow cup whipping cream direction chill small bowl beater electric mixer place pineapple chunk large bowl set aside top double boiler hot water combine egg yolk sugar vinegar reserved pineapple syrup butter salt stirring constantly cook mixture minute thickened remove heat allow cool chill minute add cherry mandarin orange marshmallow pineapple chunk stir chilled dressing chilled bowl beat whipping cream peak form fold fruit mixture chill night
Original_text:
Overnight Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 cup (20 oz.) pineapple chunks in heavy syrup, drained reserving 2 Tbsp. syrup
- 3 egg yolks, beaten
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 2 Tbsp. white vinegar
- 1 Tbsp. butter or margarine
- 1/8 tsp. salt
- 2 cans (17 oz. ea.) pitted white Royal Anne cherries, drained
- 2 cans (11 oz. ea.) mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 1/2 cups miniature marshmallows
- 1 cup whipping cream

Directions:
- Chill a small bowl and beaters from an electric mixer.
- Place pineapple chunks in large bowl; set aside.
- In the top of a double boiler over hot water, combine egg yolks, sugar, vinegar, reserved pineapple syrup, butter, and salt.
- Stirring constantly, cook mixture about 4 minutes or until thickened.
- Remove from heat and allow to cool.
- Chill 30 minutes.
- Add cherries, mandarin oranges, and marshmallows to pineapple chunks.
- Stir in chilled dressing. In chilled bowl, beat whipping cream until peaks form; fold into fruit mixture.
- Chill over night.

Rice Napoli

Ingredients:
- 1 Tbsp. margarine
- 1 green pepper, chopped
- 1/2 c. sliced, pitted, ripe olives

- Per serving, contains 344 calories, 17.7 fat grams, 32.6 carbohydrates and 31.9 cholesterol.

Original_text:
Avocado And Potato Salad Of Bacalao

Ingredients:
- 1 1/3 lb. bacalao (salt-dried codfish)
- 1 large potato, cut into chunks and cooked
- 1 medium onion, minced
- 1 small avocado, peeled and cut into chunks
- 1 large tomato, seeded and cut into chunks
- 3 hard-cooked eggs, chopped
- 1 c. olive oil
- 1/2 c. white vinegar
- salt and pepper to taste
- French bread

Directions:
- In saucepan, place bacalao in cold water to cover.
- Simmer 15 minutes.
- Drain and repeat process 3 more times.
- Shred bacalao with fingers.
- Combine bacalao with potatoes, onion, avocado, tomato and eggs.
- Blend olive oil and vinegar.
- Combine with salt and pepper to taste.
- Toss.
- Serve with French bread.
- Makes 4 to 6 servings.

Original_text:
Rice Salad Mold

Ingredients:
- 1 c. long grain rice
- 1/4 c. olive oil
- 2 tsp. Dijon mustard
- 2 c. mixed vegetables, cooked
- 1/2 c. green bell pepper, diced
- 1 cucumber, diced
- salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- Place rice, salt and pepper in small heavy pan with tight fitting lid.
- Add 2 cups water; bring to a boil.
- Cover, then simmer for 20 minutes without lifting lid.
- Put cooked rice in mixing bowl; add oil, vinegar and mustard.
- Toss with a fork to mix well.
- Gently fold in cooked vegetables.
- You will need 2 cups total so use your choice of green peas, carrots, corn and green beans.
- Add the diced green pepper and cucumber.
- Lightly oil a pretty mold; do not use olive oil for this.
- Pack rice mixture into mold and refrigerate until thoroughly chilled.
- Unmold just before serving.
- Yield:
- 8 servings.
- Carbohydrate 20 g, protein 1 g, fat 7 g, calories 149.

salad_info: broccoli cauliflower salad ingredient head broccoli head cauliflower c purple onion c miracle whip tbsp red wine vinegar tsp sugar strip bacon pkg cheddar cheese shredded direction fry bacon crisp let cool chop broccoli cauliflower bitesize piece add chopped onion mix miracle whip vinegar sugar add mixture stir together add cheese bacon dressing desired make another batch
Original_text:
Broccoli And Cauliflower Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head broccoli
- 1 head cauliflower
- 1/2 c. purple onion
- 1/2 c. Miracle Whip
- 2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
- 1/2 tsp. sugar
- 6 to 8 strips bacon
- 1/2 pkg. Cheddar cheese, shredded

Directions:
- Fry bacon until crisp.
- Let cool.
- Chop broccoli and cauliflower into bite-size pieces.
- Add chopped onion.
- Mix Miracle Whip, vinegar and sugar; add to mixture.
- Stir together and add cheese and bacon.
- If more dressing is desired, make another batch.

salad_info: chicken amandine ingredient c dry white wine c olive oil envelope good season gourmet parmesan italian italian salad dressing mix boneless skinless chicken breast half c sliced green onion sliced almond direction mix wine olive oil salad dressing mix heat cup dressing mixture large skillet medium heat add chicken cook minute cooked browned side add remaining dressing mixture onion almond cook minute stirring constantly serve hot cooked pasta make serving
Original_text:
Chicken Amandine

Ingredients:
- 3/4 c. dry white wine
- 1/4 c. olive oil
- 1 envelope Good Seasons gourmet Parmesan Italian or Italian salad dressing mix
- 1 lb. boneless skinless chicken breast halves
- 1/2 c. each: sliced green onions and sliced almonds

Directions:
- Mix wine, olive oil and salad dressing mix.
- Heat 1/4 cup of the dressing mixture in a large skillet on medium heat.
- Add chicken; cook 8 minutes or until cooked through and browned on both sides.
- Add remaining dressing mixture, onions and almonds. Cook 4 minutes, stirring constantly.
- Serve hot over cooked pasta. Makes 4 servings.

salad_info: mom blueberry muffin ingredient c flour c sugar egg c milk c salad oil tsp baking powder tsp salt c berry direction using selfrising flour omit baking powder salt
Original_text:
Mom'S Blueberry Muffins

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 c. flour
- 1/2 to 3/4 c. sugar
- 1 egg
- 1/2 c. milk
- 1/4 c. salad oil
- 2 tsp. baking powder *
- 1/2 tsp. salt *
- 3/4 c. berries

Directions:
- *If using self-rising flour, omit baking powder and salt.

salad_info: sea salad ingredient small pkg lime gelatin c boiling water c pear juice tsp salt tsp vinegar large pkg cream cheese tsp ground ginger c pear diced direction dissolve gelatin boiling water add pear juice salt vinegar pour inch gelatin mold chill firm chill remaining gelatin syrupy place gelatin bowl bowl crushed ice whip thick beat cream cheese ginger fold whipped gelatin fold pear pour firm first layer gelatin chill firmly set serf
Original_text:
Under The Sea Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small pkg. lime gelatin
- 1 1/2 c. boiling water
- 1/2 c. pear juice
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. vinegar
- 1 large pkg. cream cheese
- 1/8 tsp. ground ginger
- 2 c. pears, diced

Directions:
- Dissolve gelatin in boiling water.
- Add the pear juice, salt and vinegar.
- Pour 1/2 inch of gelatin into a mold; chill until firm.
- Chill remaining gelatin until syrupy.
- Place gelatin bowl into a bowl of crushed ice and whip until thick.
- Beat cream cheese with ginger; fold in the whipped gelatin and fold in the pears.
- Pour over the firm first layer of gelatin.
- Chill until firmly set.
- Serves 8 to 10.

salad_info: pistachio pudding salad ingredient cool whip c mini marshmallow small pkg pistachio pudding crushed pineapple juice chopped nut direction put ingredient bowl stir together chill serve
Original_text:
Pistachio Pudding Salad

Ingredients:
- 9 oz. Cool Whip
- 2 c. mini marshmallows
- 1 small pkg. pistachio pudding
- 15 oz. can crushed pineapple with juice
- chopped nuts (optional)

Directions:
- Put all ingredients in a bowl and stir together.
- Chill and serve.

salad_info: cauliflowerbroccoli salad ingredient small head cauliflower chopped small piece bunch broccoli chopped small onion chopped fine pkg mushroom rinsed sliced thin c cherry tomato quartered c mayonnaise c green goddess dressing c hormel real bacon bit piece tbsp apple cider vinegar tbsp sugar direction place vegetable large bowl combine rest ingredient stir well blended pour vegetable toss refrigerate ready serve
Original_text:
Cauliflower-Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small head cauliflower, chopped into small pieces
- 1 or 2 bunches broccoli, chopped (use juste the "beads", not the stalk)
- 1 small onion, chopped fine
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. mushrooms, rinsed and sliced thin
- 1 c. cherry tomatoes, quartered
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 c. Green Goddess dressing
- 1/2 c. Hormel real bacon bits or pieces
- 2 Tbsp. apple cider vinegar
- 2 Tbsp. sugar

Directions:
- Place all vegetables in a large bowl.
- Combine rest of ingredients and stir until well blended.
- Pour over vegetables, toss and refrigerate until ready to serve.

salad_info: pretzel salad ingredient c broken thin pretzel c melted butter pkg cream cheese c granulated sugar cool whip can pineapple cherry pie filling direction preheat oven x inch baking dish spread broken thin pretzel pour melted butter pretzel bake minute remove oven cool mix together cream cheese sugar cool whip pour pretzel crust top pineapple cherry pie filling chill serving
Original_text:
Pretzel Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. broken thin pretzels
- 1 c. melted butter
- 8 oz. pkg. cream cheese
- 1 c. granulated sugar
- 8 oz. Cool Whip
- 2 cans pineapple or cherry pie filling

Directions:
- Preheat oven to 350°.
- In a 13 x 9-inch baking dish, spread broken thin pretzels; pour melted butter over pretzels and bake 10 minutes.
- Remove from oven.
- Cool.
- Mix together cream cheese, sugar and Cool Whip and pour over pretzel crust.
- Top with pineapple or cherry pie filling.
- Chill before serving.

salad_info: broccoli salad ingredient large head broccoli washed cut c grated cheese crisp bacon crumbled onion chopped c mayonnaise c sugar tbsp vinegar direction mix together mayonnaise sugar vinegar pour ingredient stir well mixed
Original_text:
Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large head broccoli, washed and cut up
- 1 c. grated cheese
- 1/2 lb. crisp bacon, crumbled (or Hormel bacon bits)
- 1 onion, chopped
- 3/4 c. mayonnaise
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. vinegar

Directions:
- Mix together the mayonnaise, sugar and vinegar.
- Pour over other ingredients.
- Stir until well mixed.

salad_info: strawberrybanana salad ingredient large pkg strawberry jello c hot water pkg fren sliced strawberry mashed banana large crushed pineapple drained c walnut chopped pt sour cream direction dissolve jello water add fren strawberry separated add banana pineapple nut place mixture bowl let set refrigerator set add sour cream place rest jello mixture top refrigerate
Original_text:
Strawberry-Banana Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large pkg. strawberry Jell-O
- 1 c. hot water
- 2 pkg. frozen sliced strawberries
- 3 mashed bananas
- 1 large can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 c. walnuts, chopped
- 1/4 pt. sour cream

Directions:
- Dissolve Jell-O in water.
- Add frozen strawberries until they have separated.
- Add bananas, pineapple and nuts.
- Place 1/2 mixture in bowl, let it set in refrigerator.
- When set, add sour cream and place rest of Jell-O mixture on top.
- Refrigerate.

salad_info: bean stew ingredient c navy bean cooked medium potato quartered medium carrot scraped cut coin size large onion chopped tbsp garlic powder salt pepper roll eckrich smoked sausage cut bite size piece direction combine ingredient except sausage simmer low heat carrot potato tender add sausage last sure heat thoroughly good served green salad hi ho cracker serf people
Original_text:
Bean Stew

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. navy beans, cooked
- 4 medium potatoes, quartered
- 2 medium carrots, scraped and cut in coin size
- 1 large onion, chopped
- 1 Tbsp. garlic powder
- salt and pepper
- 1/2 roll Eckrich smoked sausage, cut in bite size pieces

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients except sausage and simmer on low. Heat until carrots and potatoes are tender.
- Add sausage last but be sure it heats thoroughly.
- Good served with a green salad and Hi Ho crackers.
- Serves 6 people.

salad_info: seven layer salad ingredient head lettuce shredded small onion chopped c coarsely chopped bell pepper c coarsely chopped celery small green pea drained well c mayonnaise tbsp sugar c parmesan cheese strip bacon cooked drained crumbled direction arrange lettuce bottom glass bowl layer add onion bell pepper celery pea lettuce top mix mayonnaise cheese sugar spread top sprinkle crumbled bacon top refrigerate least hour serving may made night
Original_text:
Seven Layer Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/2 head lettuce, shredded
- 1 small onion, chopped
- 1 c. coarsely chopped bell pepper
- 1 c. coarsely chopped celery
- 1 (16 oz.) can small green peas, drained well
- 1 to 1 1/2 c. mayonnaise (not salad dressing)
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
- 5 strips bacon, cooked, drained and crumbled

Directions:
- Arrange 1/2 lettuce in bottom of glass bowl.
- In layers, add onion, bell pepper, celery, peas and other lettuce on top.
- Mix mayonnaise, cheese and sugar. Spread over top.
- Sprinkle crumbled bacon over top.
- Refrigerate at least 4 hours before serving.
- May be made the night before.

Original_text:
Tomato Jambalaya

Ingredients:
- 1 c. regular long grain rice
- 4 Tbsp. salad oil
- 2 medium onions, diced
- 2 medium green peppers, cut into thin strips
- 8 medium ripe tomatoes (about 3 lb.), cut into wedges (may use canned tomatoes, if desired)
- 2 Tbsp. brown sugar
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. basil
- 1/4 tsp. pepper
- water
- 2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
- 2 (6 oz.) pkg. sliced, cooked ham, diced

Directions:
- About 40 minutes before serving, prepare rice as label directs.
- Keep warm.

Five Cup Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 c. pineapple chunks, drained
- 1 c. sour cream or Cool Whip
- 1 c. mini marshmallows
- 1 c. coconut, shredded

Directions:
- Stir all together and refrigerate.

salad_info: fruit salad pineapple dressing ingredient unsweetened pineapple chunk c sugar tsp cornstarch c lemon juice mandarin orange drained c seedless white grape large banana sliced avocado peeled cut wedge direction drain pineapple reserving juice set aside combine juice sugar cornstarch lemon juice heavy saucepan cook thickened low flame stirring constantly cool combine pineapple remaining ingredient except avocado pour dressing fruit toss gently garnish avocado wedge serving make serving
Original_text:
Fruit Salad With Pineapple Dressing

Ingredients:
- 1 (15 1/4 oz.) can unsweetened pineapple chunks (undrained)
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 4 1/2 tsp. cornstarch
- 1/4 c. lemon juice
- 1 (11 oz.) can mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 1/4 c. seedless white grapes
- 2 large bananas, sliced
- 1 avocado, peeled and cut into wedges

Directions:
- Drain pineapple, reserving juice.
- Set aside.
- Combine juice, sugar, cornstarch and lemon juice in heavy saucepan.
- Cook until thickened over low flame, stirring constantly.
- Cool.
- Combine pineapple and remaining ingredients, except avocado.
- Pour dressing over fruit; toss gently.
- Garnish with avocado wedges before serving.
- Makes 6 to 8 servings.

salad_info: vegetable dip ingredient c sour cream c mayo tbsp minced onion tbsp dried parsley tsp seasoning salt tsp dill weed direction mix ingredient together well let set hour refrigerator
Original_text:
Vegetable Dip

Ingredients:
- 1 c. sour cream
- 1 c. mayo (not salad dressing)
- 1 Tbsp. minced onion
- 1 Tbsp. dried parsley
- 1 tsp. seasoning salt
- 1 tsp. dill weed

Directions:
- Mix ingredients together well.
- Let set for 8 hours in the refrigerator.

salad_info: spring salad ingredient green bean trimmed c celery sliced fresh spinach torn bitesize piece medium green pepper cut ring medium yellow pepper cut ring small onion thinly sliced tbsp parmesan cheese grated tbsp italian dressing tsp salt tsp dried oregano leaf dill fresh ground black pepper taste direction blanch green bean boiling water minute tendercrisp rinse cold water drain rinse spinach thoroughly drain tear bitesize piece large bowl toss ingredient together well blended make serving tasty
Original_text:
Spring Salad

Ingredients:
- 8 oz. green beans, trimmed
- 1 c. celery, sliced
- 1 lb. fresh spinach, torn into bite-size pieces
- 1 medium green pepper, cut into rings
- 1 medium yellow pepper, cut into rings
- 1 small onion, thinly sliced (1/2 c.)
- 4 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese, grated
- 5 Tbsp. Italian dressing
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/4 tsp. dried oregano leaves or dill
- fresh ground black pepper to taste

Directions:
- Blanch green beans in boiling water for 5 minutes, until tender-crisp.
- Rinse under cold water and drain.
- Rinse spinach thoroughly and drain.
- Tear into bite-size pieces.
- In a large bowl, toss all ingredients together until well blended.
- Makes 6 to 8 servings.
- Very tasty!

salad_info: easy fruit salad ingredient large fruit cocktail orange cut apple cut handful pecan handful miniature marshmallow mayonnaise direction drain juice fruit cocktail mix fruit pecan marshmallow enough mayonnaise moisten
Original_text:
Easy Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large can fruit cocktail
- 2 oranges, cut up
- 2 apples, cut up
- handful of pecans
- handful of miniature marshmallows
- mayonnaise

Directions:
- Drain juice from fruit cocktail.
- Mix all fruit, pecans and marshmallows with enough mayonnaise to moisten.

salad_info: taco square ingredient ground beef c chopped onion pkg taco seasoning mix refried bean tomato sauce can crescent dinner roll tbsp salad oil c cornmeal c grated cheddar cheese c grated monterey jack cheese direction preheat oven brown meat onion skillet drain grease necessary stir taco seasoning mix bean tomato sauce simmer minute unroll dough long rectangle place ungreased x inch jellyroll pan press bottom inch side form crust bake minute golden brown sprinkle cheese return oven cheese melted minute cut square top chopped lettuce tomato taco sauce sour cream etc
Original_text:
Taco Squares

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. ground beef
- 1/2 c. chopped onion
- 1.25 oz. pkg. taco seasoning mix
- 16 oz. can refried beans
- 8 oz. can tomato sauce
- 2 cans crescent dinner rolls
- 1 Tbsp. salad oil
- 1/3 c. cornmeal
- 1 c. (4 oz.) grated Cheddar cheese
- 1 c. grated Monterey Jack cheese

Directions:
- Preheat oven to 375°.
- Brown meat and onions in a skillet, drain grease, if necessary.
- Stir in the taco seasoning mix, beans and tomato sauce.
- Simmer 5 minutes.
- Unroll dough into 4 long rectangles.
- Place in ungreased 15 x 10-inch jellyroll pan.
- Press over bottom and 1 inch up sides to form crust.
- Bake at 375° for 25 to 30 minutes or until golden brown.
- Sprinkle with cheese. Return to oven until cheese is melted, about 2 to 3 minutes.
- Cut into squares and top with chopped lettuce, tomatoes, taco sauce, sour cream, etc.

salad_info: party mix ingredient box corn chex box rice chex box cheerio shoestring potato nut c salad oil tbsp brown sugar tbsp worcestershire sauce tbsp garlic salt direction combine dry ingredient add liquid bake oven hour stir frequently
Original_text:
Party Mix

Ingredients:
- 1 box Corn Chex
- 1 box Rice Chex
- 1 box Cheerios
- 1 can shoestring potatoes
- nuts
- 2 c. salad oil
- 1 Tbsp. brown sugar
- 2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
- 1 Tbsp. garlic salt

Directions:
- Combine dry ingredients.
- Add liquid and bake in oven at 250° for 1 1/2 hours; stir frequently.

salad_info: waldorf salad ingredient c chopped apple tsp lemon juice c chopped celery c chopped walnut pecan c raisin whole date snipped pitted c seedless green grape halved c whipping cream c fren whipped dessert topping thawed c mayonnaise salad dressing nutmeg direction bowl toss apple lemon juice stir celery nut raisin desired grape
Original_text:
Waldorf Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. chopped apple
- 1 1/2 tsp. lemon juice
- 1/4 c. chopped celery
- 1/4 c. chopped walnuts or pecans
- 1/4 c. raisins or whole dates, snipped and pitted
- 1/4 c. seedless green grapes, halved (optional)
- 1/3 c. whipping cream or 2/3 c. frozen whipped dessert topping, thawed
- 1/4 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
- nutmeg

Directions:
- In a bowl, toss apple with lemon juice.
- Stir in celery, nuts, raisins and if desired grapes.

salad_info: cranberry salad ingredient pkg orange jello crushed pineapple pkg raspberry jello whole cranberry sauce c chopped pecan direction dissolve jello cup boiling water add cranberry sauce crushed pineapple juice mix well add pecan place refrigerator congeal
Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. orange jello
- 1 (14 oz.) can crushed pineapple
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. raspberry jello
- 1 (16 oz.) can whole cranberry sauce
- 1 c. chopped pecans

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in 2 cups of boiling water.
- Add cranberry sauce and crushed pineapple with juice; mix well.
- Add pecans. Place in refrigerator and congeal.

Original_text:
Chicken-Broccoli Casserole

Ingredients:
- 1 (1 lb.) bag broccoli (frozen), cooked and drained
- 4 to 6 chicken breasts, cooked and boned
- 1/2 c. onion, chopped
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
- 1 can cream of chicken soup
- juice of 1 lemon
- 1 bag Pepperidge Farm stuffing mix (small)
- 1/2 to 1 c. grated Cheddar cheese

Directions:
- Put cooked broccoli in 9 x 13-inch casserole dish.
- Mix onion with chicken and put on top of broccoli.
- Mix mayonnaise, soup and lemon juice.
- Put on top of chicken.
- Prepare stuffing mix as directed.
- Put on top of soup.
- Bake at 350° for 30 minutes. During the last 5 to 10 minutes, add cheese.
- Serves 8 to 10.
- May be divided into 2 small casseroles.
- Freeze one.

Original_text:
Lorene'S Orange-Fruit Congealed Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large pkg. orange Jell-O
- 1 large can crushed pineapple (undrained)
- 1 can mandarin oranges (undrained)
- Cool Whip
- grated cheese

Directions:
- Dissolve Jell-O in 2 cups hot water.
- Combine fruits and juices.
- Top with miniature marshmallows; congeal.
- After salad has congealed, top with Cool Whip and sprinkle with grated cheese.

Original_text:
Hot Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. cooked chicken
- 1 c. sliced celery
- 2 hard-boiled eggs
- 2 tsp. onions
- 1 1/2 c. cooked rice
- 1 can cream of mushroom soup
- 1 tsp. salt
- dash of pepper
- 3/4 c. mayonnaise
- 1/4 c. lemon juice
- 1/2 c. water chestnuts

Directions:
- Mix all together and put in a 9 x 13-inch dish.
- Sprinkle 1 cup potato chips over top.
- Bake at 350° for 20 minutes.

salad_info: mandarin orange salad ingredient pkg orange jello pkg lemon jello c boiling water can mandarin orange large crushed pineapple pkg le miniature marshmallow direction dissolve jello cup boiling water add juice orange pineapple pour jello mixture x inch pan begin congeal add pineapple orange juice drained cover top package le miniature marshmallow pat fruit mixture
Original_text:
Mandarin Orange Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. orange Jell-O
- 1 pkg. lemon Jell-O
- 1 c. boiling water
- 3 cans Mandarin oranges (small can)
- 1 large can crushed pineapple
- 1 pkg. or less miniature marshmallows

Directions:
- Dissolve Jell-O in 1 cup boiling water.
- Add juices from oranges and pineapple.
- Pour Jell-O mixture in 9 x 12-inch pan. When it begins to congeal, add pineapple and oranges after juice was drained.
- Cover top with 1 package or less miniature marshmallows.
- Pat down into fruit mixture.

Original_text:
Beet And Pear Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (16 oz.) can pear halves
- 1 (16 oz.) can sliced beets, drained
- 1/2 c. thinly sliced red onion
- 2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
- 1 Tbsp. white wine vinegar
- 1/3 c. crumbled Blue cheese

Directions:
- Drain pears, reserving 1 tablespoon syrup.
- Cut pears in half lengthwise.
- Place pears, beets and onion in medium bowl.
- Whisk together oil, vinegar and reserved syrup.
- Pour over salad; toss gently.
- Just before serving, add cheese and toss.
- Serve on bed of lettuce leaves.
- Makes 4 to 6 servings.

Original_text:
Creamy Spinach Dip

Ingredients:
- 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and well drained (or you can use 1 can spinach, drained)
- 1 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing or Miracle Whip Light
- 1 c. sour cream
- 1/2 c. chopped parsley
- 1/4 c. green onion slices
- 1 tsp. dill weed
- 1/2 tsp. lemon pepper

Directions:
- Combine ingredients; mix well. Chill and serve with assorted vegetable dippers.

Original_text:
Oriental Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 pkg. Ramen noodles
- 3 chicken breast
- 1 head cabbage
- 1 bunch green onions

- 1/2 c. sliced almonds, toasted

- 1 tsp. pepper

Directions:
- Blend cabbage, cooked chicken, onions, seed, nuts and uncooked Ramen noodles.

salad_info: bea stevens cottage cheese souffle salad ingredient pkg lemon jello c hot water c cold water tbsp vinegar tsp salt c mayonnaise c chopped raw spinach thawed fren c cottage cheese c diced celery tbsp finely chopped onion direction dissolve jello water vinegar salt add mayonnaise beat smooth pour refrigerator tray place freezing compartment minute mixture set inch edge soft center turn bowl beat fluffy fold spinach cottage cheese celery onion turn mold chill firm
Original_text:
Bea Steven'S Cottage Cheese Souffle Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon Jell-O
- 1 c. hot water
- 1/2 c. cold water
- 1 Tbsp. vinegar
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1 c. chopped raw spinach or thawed frozen
- 3/4 c. cottage cheese
- 1/3 c. diced celery
- 1 Tbsp. finely chopped onion

Directions:
- Dissolve Jell-O in water, vinegar and salt.
- Add mayonnaise and beat until smooth.
- Pour into refrigerator tray and place in freezing compartment 15 to 20 minutes until mixture is set about 1-inch from edges, but soft in center.
- Turn into bowl and beat again until fluffy.
- Fold in spinach, cottage cheese, celery and onion.
- Turn into mold and chill until firm.

Original_text:
Cauliflower Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head cauliflower
- 1 bunch broccoli
- 1 large onion
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 1 c. Miracle Whip
- 1/4 c. Pet milk
- 2 Tbsp. vinegar

Directions:
- Cut the cauliflower, broccoli and onion together in a large bowl.
- Mix sugar, milk, vinegar and Miracle Whip together.
- Add to the vegetables; mix well and chill in the refrigerator.

Original_text:
Hot And Spicy Chicken Nuggets

Ingredients:
- 1 c. Miracle Whip
- 3 Tbsp. milk
- 1/2 tsp. ground cumin
- 1/2 tsp. onion powder
- 1/4 tsp. ground red pepper
- 1/4 tsp. garlic powder
- 2 chicken breasts (1 lb. skinless, boneless), cut in 1-inch chunks
- 3/4 c. crushed sesame crackers
- 1/2 c. salsa

Directions:
- Preheat oven to 425°.
- Mix together 1/2 cup salad dressing, milk and seasonings.
- Lightly dip chicken into salad dressing mixture.
- Coat well with crumbs.
- Place on greased cookie sheet. Bake for 18 to 20 minutes.
- Mix remaining salad dressing and salsa. Serve with nuggets on toothpicks.

Original_text:
Orange Vegetable Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lg. pkg. orange jello
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 1/2 c. boiling water
- 2 tsp. vinegar
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 can crushed pineapple
- 1 c. cottage cheese
- 1 c. diced celery

Directions:
- Mix first four ingredients together and add mayonnaise. Beat. Mix the rest of the ingredients together and add cool jello mixture. Use 9 X 13 pan, sprayed with Pam.

Original_text:
Oriental Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. shredded cabbage
- 4 to 6 green onions, chopped
- 2 pkg. Ramen noodles, chicken flavor
- 5 oz. pkg. kernel sunflower seeds
- 1/3 c. apple cider vinegar
- 1/2 c. oil
- 1/2 c. sugar

Directions:
- Combine apple cider, vinegar, oil, sugar and broth packs from Ramen noodles.
- Refrigerate.
- Combine cabbage, green onions, crushed Ramen noodles (uncooked) and sunflower seeds.
- Mix all together just a few minutes before serving.

salad_info: carrot cake ingredient c sugar c flour tsp salt tsp cinnamon tsp baking soda large egg c salad oil c grated carrot direction mix dry ingredient beat egg oil together add dry ingredient mix well add carrot last mix bake greased x inch pan minute brown let cool icing
Original_text:
Carrot Cake

Ingredients:
- 2 c. sugar
- 2 c. flour
- 1 tsp. salt
- 2 tsp. cinnamon
- 2 tsp. baking soda
- 4 large eggs
- 1 1/2 c. salad oil
- 2 c. grated carrots

Directions:
- Mix all dry ingredients.
- Beat eggs and oil together; add to dry ingredients.
- Mix well.
- Add carrots last and mix.
- Bake at 350° in a greased 9 x 13-inch pan for 30 minutes, or until brown. Let cool before icing.

salad_info: hot chicken salad ingredient c chicken chopped tbsp pimento stalk celery chopped c toasted almond chopped c bell pepper chopped tbsp onion grated c mayonnaise tbsp lemon juice tsp salt c cheddar cheese grated c potato chip crushed direction combine ingredient except cheese potato chip place greased casserole dish bake minute bubbly last minute done place cheese crushed chip serf
Original_text:
Hot Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. chicken, chopped
- 2 Tbsp. pimentos
- 2 stalks celery, chopped
- 1/2 c. toasted almonds, chopped
- 3/4 c. bell pepper, chopped
- 2 Tbsp. onion, grated
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1/4 tsp. salt

- 1 c. potato chips, crushed

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients, except cheese and potato chips. Place in greased casserole dish.
- Bake at 350° for 25 minutes, until bubbly.
- Last 5 to 10 minutes before done, place on cheese and crushed chips.
- Serves 6.

salad_info: country chicken salad ingredient c chopped cooked chicken c chopped apple hardcooked egg chopped c kraft mayonnaise c sweet pickle relish drained slivered toasted almond direction combine ingredient except almond mix lightly chill serving garnish almond desired make serving
Original_text:
Country Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. chopped, cooked chicken
- 1 c. chopped apple
- 4 hard-cooked eggs, chopped
- 1/2 c. Kraft mayonnaise
- 1/4 c. sweet pickle relish, drained
- slivered, toasted almonds (optional)

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients except almonds.
- Mix lightly.
- Chill. When serving, garnish with almonds, if desired.
- Makes 4 servings.

salad_info: pasta salmon salad ingredient c medium shell macaroni radish sliced green pepper coarsely chopped green onion sliced thin c shredded carrot c olive oil tbsp white wine vinegar clove garlic minced tsp basil leaf chopped tsp dry mustard c cherry tomato cut half can pink salmon drained direction cook macaroni according direction drain cook place large bowl add radish green pepper onion carrot small bowl combine oil vinegar garlic basil mustard pour pasta vegetable toss well refrigerate hour overnight serving add tomato salmon toss gently
Original_text:
Pasta Salmon Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. medium shell macaroni
- 4 radishes, sliced
- 1/2 green pepper, coarsely chopped
- 2 green onions, sliced thin
- 1/4 c. shredded carrot
- 1/3 c. olive oil
- 2 Tbsp. white wine vinegar
- 1 clove garlic, minced
- 1/2 tsp. basil leaves, chopped
- 1/4 tsp. dry mustard
- 1 c. cherry tomatoes, cut in half
- 2 cans (6 1/2 oz.) pink salmon, drained

Directions:
- Cook macaroni according to directions.
- Drain and cook.
- Place in large bowl and add radishes, green pepper, onion and carrots. In small bowl combine oil, vinegar, garlic, basil and mustard. Pour over pasta and vegetables and toss well.
- Refrigerate 1 to 2 hours or overnight.
- Just before serving, add tomatoes and salmon. Toss gently.

salad_info: apple wilted lettuce salad ingredient c romaine lettuce wash tear c leaf lettuce wash tear golden delicious apple c sliced celery slice bacon c cider vinegar c water tsp sugar c chopped scallion fresh ground pepper good season italian salad dressing mix direction core thinly slice apple place lettuce apple celery bowl cook bacon crisp drain crumble reserve dripping bacon add vinegar water sugar dressing mix heat boiling pour salad sprinkle bacon scallion pepper toss gently serve immediately
Original_text:
Apple And Wilted Lettuce Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 c. romaine lettuce, wash and tear
- 4 c. leaf lettuce, wash and tear
- 2 Golden Delicious apples
- 1/2 c. sliced celery
- 6 slices bacon
- 1/3 c. cider vinegar
- 1/4 c. water
- 2 tsp. sugar
- 1/4 c. chopped scallions
- fresh ground pepper
- 1 (6 oz.) Good Seasons Italian salad dressing mix

Directions:
- Core and thinly slice apples.
- Place lettuce, apples and celery in bowl.
- Cook bacon until crisp; drain and crumble. Reserve drippings from bacon and add vinegar, water, sugar and dressing mix.
- Heat to boiling and pour over salad.
- Sprinkle with bacon, scallions and pepper.
- Toss gently.
- Serve immediately.

salad_info: strawberry salad ingredient large banana mashed small large pkg strawberry jello small crushed pineapple c pecan c sour cream direction dissolve jello cup boiling water add ingredient except sour cream pour half oblong dish let set slightly gelled top sour cream pour rest mixture cream let set refrigerator hour
Original_text:
Strawberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 large bananas, mashed
- 2 small or 1 large pkg. strawberry jello
- 1 small can crushed pineapple
- 1/2 c. pecans
- 1 c. sour cream

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in 2 cups boiling water.
- Add all other ingredients, except for sour cream.
- Pour half into oblong dish and let set until slightly gelled, then top with sour cream.
- Pour rest of mixture over cream.
- Let set in refrigerator for 1 hour.

salad_info: cole slaw ingredient gal shredded cabbage qt salad dressing tbsp salt c sugar c vinegar c chopped onion direction combine salad dressing salt sugar vinegar onion pour cabbage mix well refrigerate ready serve
Original_text:
Cole Slaw For 100

Ingredients:
- 5 1/4 gal. shredded cabbage
- 2 qt. salad dressing
- 2 Tbsp. salt
- 1 1/2 c. sugar
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 1 1/3 c. chopped onion

Directions:
- Combine salad dressing, salt, sugar, vinegar and onion.
- Pour over cabbage.
- Mix well and refrigerate until ready to serve.

salad_info: easy fruit salad ingredient pkg jello cottage cheese cool whip fruit drained direction mix cottage cheese dry jello let sit minute stir well add fruit cool whip refrigerate
Original_text:
Easy Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 oz. pkg. Jell-O
- 12 oz. cottage cheese
- 8 oz. Cool Whip
- 1 can fruit, drained

Directions:
- Mix cottage cheese and dry Jell-O.
- Let sit 5 minutes.
- Stir well again.
- Add fruit and Cool Whip.
- Refrigerate.

Original_text:
German Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 5 lb. potatoes, boiled
- 1 large onion, chopped
- 3 large slices ham, cut small, or 10 strips cooked bacon, cut small
- vinegar
- water
- salt
- sugar

Directions:
- Mix first 3 ingredients together.
- Mix vinegar, water, salt and sugar according to taste in a large measuring cup to sweet-sour consistency.
- Pour over potato mixture, as much as desired.
- May be served warm or cold.

Original_text:
Holiday Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. cranberries
- 1 1/2 c. water
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 small box cherry jello
- 1/2 c. crushed pineapple
- 1/2 c. grapes, halved
- 1 c. diced apples
- 1/2 c. pecans

Directions:
- Boil cranberries, water and sugar until berries pop (5 minutes).
- Add cherry gelatin and stir until dissolved.
- Allow to cool.
- Add remaining ingredients and chill overnight.

salad_info: apple salad ingredient cup apple chopped cup celery chopped cup nut chopped cup raisin cup chopped cheese cup mayonnaise direction peel cut apple mixing bowl add celery nut raisin chopped cheese last add mayonnaise mix together use american cheese
Original_text:
Apple Salad

Ingredients:
- 4 cups apples, chopped
- 1 cup celery, chopped
- 1/2 cup nuts, chopped
- 1/2 cup raisins
- 1/4 cup chopped cheese
- 1/2 cup mayonnaise

Directions:
- Peel and cut up apples.
- In a mixing bowl and add celery, nuts, raisins and chopped cheese.
- Last add mayonnaise and mix together.
- I use American cheese.

Shoe Peg Corn Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 (16 oz.) cans Shoe Peg corn, drained

- Chill overnight.

Original_text:
Cranberry Waldorf Salad(Serves 8 To 10)  

Ingredients:
- 1/2 lb. cranberries, ground
- 3/4 c. sugar
- 2 c. mini marshmallows
- 2 c. apples, diced
- 1/2 c. grapes, quartered
- 1/2 c. nuts, chopped

Directions:
- Grind cranberries.
- Add sugar and marshmallows.
- Let stand overnight in the refrigerator.

salad_info: aztec carrot ingredient c sugar c salad oil c cider vinegar tbsp worcestershire sauce tsp garlic salt tsp celery salt tomato soup green pepper sliced onion chopped stalk celery sliced direction pour sauce carrot green pepper onion celery mix let marinate refrigerator hour serving
Original_text:
Aztec Carrots

Ingredients:
- 1 c. Sugar
- 1/2 c. Salad Oil
- 3/4 c. Cider Vinegar
- 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire Sauce
- 1/4 tsp. Garlic Salt
- 1/4 tsp. Celery Salt
- 1 can Tomato soup

Directions:
- Pour the sauce over the carrots, green peppers, onion and celery.

salad_info: ann anderson perfect pot roast ingredient sirloin tip roast tbsp allpurpose flour tbsp cooking oil c chopped onion c water envelope italian salad dressing mix tsp salt carrot potato tbsp flour c water direction coat roast first tablespoon flour sprinkle salt brown hot oil add onion saute minute combine water salad dressing mix salt pour meat cover simmer hour meat almost tender add pared carrot potato cover simmer hour vegetable tender remove meat vegetable platter combine remaining flour water add broth cook stir thickened bubbly good
Original_text:
Ann Anderson'S Perfect Pot Roast

Ingredients:
- 3 lb. sirloin tip roast
- 2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
- 2 Tbsp. cooking oil
- 1 c. chopped onion
- 1 c. water
- 1 (6 to 10 oz.) envelope Italian salad dressing mix
- 1 tsp. salt
- carrots and potatoes
- 2 Tbsp. flour
- 1/2 c. water

Directions:
- Coat roast with the first 2 tablespoons flour.
- Sprinkle with salt.
- Brown in hot oil.
- Add onions and saute 3 minutes.
- Combine water, salad dressing mix and salt.
- Pour over meat.
- Cover; simmer for 2 1/2 hours until meat is almost tender.
- Add pared carrots and potatoes.
- Cover and simmer for 1/2 hour until vegetables are tender.
- Remove meat and vegetables to platter. Combine remaining flour and water; add to broth.
- Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly.
- Very good.

salad_info: salad recipe ingredient jello c boiling water c applesauce tbsp vinegar direction mix jello boiling water add applesauce vinegar pour cup mold
Original_text:
Salad Recipe

Ingredients:
- 3 oz. jello (raspberry)
- 1 c. boiling water
- 1 c. applesauce
- 1 Tbsp. vinegar

Directions:
- Mix jello with boiling water.
- Add applesauce and vinegar. Pour into a 2-cup mold.

salad_info: candlestick salad ingredient pineapple slice large banana maraschino cherry mayonnaise lettuce leaf direction place pineapple slice lettuce leaf put half peeled banana round side hole pineapple cut another pineapple half using toothpick place cut pineapple side banana like candlestick holder top banana put cherry cut half dribble mayonnaise side banana pretty well delicious
Original_text:
Candlestick Salad

Ingredients:
- 9 pineapple slices
- 3 large bananas
- 3 maraschino cherries
- mayonnaise
- lettuce leaves

Directions:
- Place pineapple slices on lettuce leaf.
- Put half of peeled banana round side up in hole of pineapple.
- Cut another pineapple in half.
- Using toothpicks, place cut pineapple on side of banana like a candlestick holder.
- On top of banana put a cherry cut in half.
- Dribble mayonnaise down side of banana (candlestick).
- This is very pretty as well as delicious.

- 1 c. sliced pitted ripe olives

Directions:

Original_text:
Cole Slaw

Ingredients:
- 1 medium cabbage
- 1 green pepper
- 1 onion
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1/2 tsp. celery seed
- 1/2 tsp. dry mustard
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/2 c. white vinegar
- 3/8 c. salad oil

Directions:
- Process first three ingredients in food processor.
- Sprinkle sugar over mixture and let stand.
- Combine remaining ingredients and bring to a boil on high heat.
- Pour over cabbage mixture while still hot.
- Cover and refrigerate.
- Will stay good for several days.

salad_info: cool tuna salad ingredient cream celery soup c mayonnaise tbsp vinegar tbsp onion powder c rotini pasta c fren mixed vegetable thawed can tuna drained flaked direction mix soup mayonnaise vinegar onion powder large bowl toss pasta vegetable tuna together soup mixture evenly coated refrigerate least hour
Original_text:

Ingredients:
- 1 can cream of celery soup
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. vinegar
- 1 Tbsp. onion powder
- 4 c. rotini pasta (about 3 c.; uncooked)
- 2 c. frozen mixed vegetables, thawed
- 2 cans (6 oz.) tuna, drained and flaked

Directions:
- Mix soup, mayonnaise, vinegar and onion powder in a large bowl.
- Toss pasta, vegetables and tuna together with soup mixture until evenly coated.
- Refrigerate at least 3 hours.

Original_text:
"Waldorf" Turkey Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. skinned, boned, cooked turkey, cut into cubes
- 1 c. diced celery
- 1 large McIntosh apple, cored and cut into cubes
- 2 doz. seedless red grapes, cut lengthwise into halves
- 1/2 c. plain low-fat yogurt
- 2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
- 2 packets instant chicken broth/seasoning mix (e.g. Weight Watchers)
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. sunflower seeds

Directions:
- Combine first 4 ingredients in large salad bowl.
- In a small bowl, blend yogurt, mayonnaise and broth mix.
- Pour over salad and toss to coat thoroughly.
- Sprinkle salad with sunflower seeds. Chill until ready to serve.
- Serves 4 to 6.

Original_text:
Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. cubed, cooked chicken or turkey
- 1/2 c. diced celery
- 1/3 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/4 to 1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning

Directions:
- Combine chicken and celery in a bowl.

- Toss.
- Cover and chill.

salad_info: cranberry salad ingredient fresh cranberry orange c sugar crushed pineapple chopped english walnut c lemon juice c boiling water pkg lemon jello tsp salt direction make relish grinding together cranberry orange including peel one orange mix lemon juice sugar salt fren make salad dissolve jello boiling water stir rest ingredient plus cup cranberry orange mixture jell refrigerator hour make serving
Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. fresh cranberries
- 2 oranges
- 1 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple
- 3 oz. chopped English walnuts
- 1/4 c. lemon juice
- 1 c. boiling water
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon jello
- 1/4 tsp. salt

Directions:
- Make relish by grinding together cranberries and oranges, including the peel of one orange.
- Mix with lemon juice, sugar and salt.
- This can be frozen.
- To make salad, dissolve jello in the boiling water.
- Stir in the rest of the ingredients plus 2 cups of the cranberry, orange mixture.
- Jell in the refrigerator for 4 to 6 hours.
- Makes 8 to 10 servings.

salad_info: bacon potato salad ingredient potato small onion chopped sprig parsley chopped fine tbsp light brown sugar tbsp cider vinegar tsp nutmeg tsp pepper salt direction boil potato skin peel slice fairly thin meanwhile inch skillet slowly cook bacon crisp drain brown paper crumble keep warm reserve bacon fat return tablespoon fat skillet add onion cook gently wilted add parsley sugar vinegar pepper nutmeg stir well heat add hot potato mix well mix bacon salt serve make serving
Original_text:
Bacon Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 1/8 lb. (3 medium) potatoes
- 1/2 lb. small onions, chopped
- few sprigs parsley, chopped fine
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. light brown sugar
- 2 Tbsp. cider vinegar
- 1/4 tsp. nutmeg
- 1/8 tsp. pepper
- salt

Directions:
- Boil potatoes in their skins, peel and slice fairly thin; meanwhile, in a 10-inch skillet slowly cook the bacon (in 2 batches) until crisp; drain on brown paper, crumble and keep warm, reserve bacon fat.
- Return 3 tablespoons of fat to skillet; add the onion and cook gently until wilted.
- Add parsley, sugar, vinegar, pepper and nutmeg.
- Stir well and heat; add hot potatoes; mix well. Mix in the bacon and salt.
- Serve at once.
- Makes 4 servings.
