Shrimp And Papaya Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 lb. medium-sized raw shrimp
- 1 Tbsp. minced parsley
- 1 recipe handmade mayonnaise
- 1 papaya, peeled and seeded
- salt
- 1 head bibb lettuce, washed and dried

Directions:
- Bring a pot with enough water to cover the shrimp to a boil. Add the shrimp and cook only until pink (about 5 minutes).
- Drain, rinse with cold water, peel, shell and remove any black vein, then chill in the refrigerator.
- Mix the parsley into the mayonnaise. Cut papaya in slices or large cubes.
- Toss the shrimp and papaya in the mayonnaise until well coated.
- Add salt to taste.
- Arrange the shrimp mixture on lettuce leaves.

salad_info: cranberry salad ingredient pkg cranberry ground orange c sugar pkg cherry jello c hot water small pineapple c chopped nut direction grind cranberry blender spoon pulp orange cranberry add sugar let set hour dissolve jello water add jello nut pineapple pour mold chill
Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. cranberries, ground
- 1 orange
- 1 1/2 c. sugar
- 2 pkg. cherry Jell-O
- 2 c. hot water
- 1 small can pineapple (crushed)
- 1 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Grind cranberries in blender.
- Spoon pulp from orange in cranberries.
- Add sugar.
- Let set 1 hour.
- Dissolve Jell-O in water.
- Add Jell-O, nuts and pineapple (juice also).
- Pour into mold and chill.

salad_info: economical french dressing ingredient tomato soup c vinegar c sugar c salad oil tsp salt tsp pepper tsp paprika tbsp worcestershire sauce tbsp prepared mustard tsp celery poppy seed direction mix ingredient blender food processor store covered jar refrigerator make quart
Original_text:
Economical French Dressing

Ingredients:
- 1 can tomato soup
- 3/4 c. vinegar
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 1/2 c. salad oil
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. pepper
- 1 tsp. paprika
- 2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
- 1 Tbsp. prepared mustard
- 1 tsp. celery or poppy seed (optional)

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients in blender or food processor.
- Store in covered jar in refrigerator.
- Makes 1 quart.

Poppy Seed Salad Dressing

- 1/2 Tbsp. cornstarch
- 4 packets Equal

Directions:

- the vinegar, lemon juice and cornstarch. Put this cooled
- mixture
- into	the blender with the remaining ingredients. Blend only

- romaine	lettuce
- and slices of fruit, such as oranges, strawberries,
- kiwi,
- apples
- or
- pears.

Original_text:
Best Ever Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 to 2 lb. red grapes
- 1 c. chopped pecans
- 4 medium bananas
- 1 bag coconut
- 1 large can crushed pineapple, drained, save juice

Directions:
- Put all fruit in bowl and chill.

salad_info: greekstyle pasta salad ingredient penne tubular pasta tbsp extravirgin olive oil tbsp red wine vinegar medium cucumber peeled seeded chopped sliced ripe olive drained medium tomato diced scallion chopped c fren green bean thawed green bell pepper chopped tbsp chopped flat leaf parsley tsp oregano garlic clove minced tsp salt tsp pepper c crumbled feta cheese direction large pot boiling salted water cook penne tender minute drain well rinse cold water drain return pasta pot add olive oil vinegar toss coat add cucumber olive tomato scallion green bean bell pepper parsley oregano garlic salt pepper toss mix well sprinkle feta cheese salad serve chilled room temperature
Original_text:
Greek-Style Pasta Salad

Ingredients:
- 8 oz. penne or other tubular pasta
- 3 Tbsp. extra-virgin olive oil
- 2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
- 1 medium cucumber, peeled, seeded and chopped
- 1 (2.2 oz.) can sliced ripe olives, drained
- 3 medium tomatoes, diced
- 2 scallions, chopped
- 1 1/2 c. frozen green beans, thawed
- 1/2 green bell pepper, chopped
- 2 Tbsp. chopped flat leaf parsley
- 2 tsp. oregano
- 1 garlic clove, minced
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1/8 tsp. pepper
- 1 c. crumbled Feta cheese (4 oz.)

Directions:
- In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook penne until just tender, 10 to 12 minutes; drain well.
- Rinse with cold water and drain again.
- Return pasta to pot.
- Add olive oil and vinegar and toss to coat.
- Add cucumber, olives, tomatoes, scallions, green beans, bell pepper, parsley, oregano, garlic, salt and pepper. Toss to mix well.
- Sprinkle Feta cheese over salad.
- Serve chilled or at room temperature.

salad_info: summer salad ingredient large cool whip box instant pistachio pudding mix c nut crushed pineapple well drained miniature marshmallow direction mix dry pudding cool whip well add nut pineapple add marshmallow salad firm chill serve
Original_text:
Summer Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large Cool Whip
- 1 box instant pistachio pudding mix
- 1 c. nuts
- 1 can crushed pineapple, well drained
- miniature marshmallows

Directions:
- Mix dry pudding into Cool Whip well.
- Add nuts and pineapple. Add the marshmallows until salad is firm.
- Chill and serve.

Original_text:
Diabetic Gelatin And Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 envelope dietetic gelatin
- 1 c. water
- 2 exchanges fruit
- 2 leaves lettuce

Directions:
- Prepare gelatin according to package directions.
- Pour into 2 individual ring molds and chill until firm.
- Unmold onto lettuce and fill with 1 fruit exchange each: 1/2 diced banana, 1/2 chopped apple sprinkled with cinnamon or 1/2 cubed pineapple.
- Serves 2. Exchange Per Serving: 1 fruit.
- Calories Per Serving: 40.

salad_info: hot chicken salad ingredient c diced cooked chicken c finely chopped celery c sliced almond toasted c ritz cracker crumb tbsp chopped onion cream chicken soup undiluted c margarine mushroom stem piece drained c ritz crumb top direction combine ingredient except cup crumb top toss gently spoon quart casserole bake minute sprinkle cracker crumb top bake minute longer yield serving
Original_text:
Hot Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. diced cooked chicken
- 1 c. finely chopped celery
- 1/2 c. sliced almonds, toasted
- 1/2 c. Ritz cracker crumbs
- 2 Tbsp. chopped onions
- 1 can cream of chicken soup, undiluted
- 1/2 c. margarine
- 1 (2 oz.) can mushroom stems and pieces, drained
- 1/2 c. Ritz crumbs for top

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients except 1/2 cup crumbs for top.
- Toss gently.
- Spoon into 1 1/2-quart casserole.
- Bake at 375° for 15 minutes.
- Sprinkle cracker crumbs on top and bake 15 minutes longer.
- Yields 4 to 6 servings.

salad_info: summer pocket salad ingredient ripe tomato diced pulp included c canned chickpea drained c cheddar cheese diced black olive sliced tbsp mayonnaise black pepper taste tbsp butter pita pocket bread direction combine first ingredient set aside skillet melt butter place pita skillet turning butter side low heat brown lightly side cut pita half fill pocket salad serf
Original_text:
Summer Pocket Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 ripe tomato, diced with pulp included
- 1/2 c. canned chickpeas, drained
- 1/4 c. Cheddar cheese, diced
- 2 or 3 black olives, sliced
- 3 Tbsp. mayonnaise
- black pepper to taste
- 1 Tbsp. butter
- 1 pita pocket bread

Directions:
- Combine first 6 ingredients.
- Set aside.
- In skillet, melt butter.
- Place pita in skillet, turning to butter both sides. Over low heat, brown lightly on both sides.
- Cut pita in half and fill each pocket with salad.
- Serves 2.

salad_info: cream puff ingredient c bread flour sifted measuring c milk water c butter tsp salt egg direction heat milk water add butter bring ingredient boiling point add sifted flour salt cook stir batter leaf side pan form ball remove heat beat egg one time careful beat egg well blended adding important place spoonful batter inch round greased tin allow inch puff bake oven hour puff cool cut gash side fill whipped cream custard chicken salad
Original_text:
Cream Puffs

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. bread flour, sifted before measuring
- 1/2 c. milk or water
- 1/4 c. butter
- 1/8 tsp. salt
- 2 eggs

Directions:
- Heat the milk or water.
- Add the butter.
- Bring these ingredients to the boiling point.
- Add the sifted flour and salt. Cook and stir the batter until it leaves the sides of the pan and forms a ball.
- Remove it from the heat.
- Beat in the eggs, one at a time.
- Be careful to beat 1 egg until well blended before adding the other.
- Important!
- Place spoonfuls of batter into 2-inch rounds on a greased tin.
- Allow 2 inches between the puffs.
- Bake in a 400° oven for 1/2 hour. When the puffs are cool, cut a gash in the side of each and fill with whipped cream, custard or chicken salad.

salad_info: easy fruit salad ingredient large pineapple chunk mixed fruit banana sliced box instant vanilla pudding tbsp tang orange drink direction drain pineapple mixed fruit combine pudding mix drained juice add tang stir well mix fruit gently chill yield serving
Original_text:
Easy Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large can pineapple chunks
- 1 can mixed fruit
- 2 bananas, sliced
- 1 box instant vanilla pudding
- 3 Tbsp. Tang orange drink

Directions:
- Drain pineapple and mixed fruit.
- Combine pudding mix with drained juice.
- Add Tang; stir well.
- Mix in fruit gently.
- Chill. Yields 4 servings.

salad_info: carrot cake ingredient c flour tsp baking powder tsp salt tsp cinnamon c sugar c salad oil egg c carrot finely grated crushed pineapple drained well c coconut direction mix oil egg sugar add dry ingredient blend carrot pineapple coconut bake done overbake make one x inch round layer ice cream cheese frosting
Original_text:
Carrot Cake

Ingredients:
- 2 c. flour
- 2 tsp. baking powder
- 1 1/2 tsp. salt
- 2 tsp. cinnamon
- 2 c. sugar
- 1 1/2 c. salad oil
- 4 eggs
- 2 c. carrots, finely grated
- 1 can crushed pineapple, drained well
- 1 1/2 c. coconut

Directions:
- Mix oil, eggs and sugar.
- Add dry ingredients.
- Blend in carrots, pineapple and coconut.
- Bake at 350°
- until done.
- Do not overbake.
- Makes one 9 x 13-inch or 3 (9-inch) round layers.
- Ice with cream cheese frosting.

salad_info: classic waldorf salad ingredient c diced apple c julienne celery stick c broken walnut c mayonnaise tbsp sugar tsp lemon juice dash salt c whipping cream whipped direction combine apple celery nut blend mayonnaise sugar lemon juice salt fold whipped cream fold apple mixture chill make serving
Original_text:
Classic Waldorf Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. diced apple
- 1 c. (1-inch) julienne celery sticks
- 1/2 c. broken walnuts
- 1/4 c. mayonnaise
- 1 Tbsp. sugar
- 1/2 tsp. lemon juice
- dash of salt
- 1/2 c. whipping cream, whipped

Directions:
- Combine apple, celery and nuts.
- Blend mayonnaise, sugar, lemon juice and salt.
- Fold in whipped cream.
- Fold into apple mixture; chill.
- Makes 6 servings.

salad_info: ranch chicken salad ingredient pkg hidden valley ranch salad dressing mix c cubed cooked chicken c sliced celery pineapple chunk c mayonnaise c pineapple juice direction combine salad dressing mix cup mayonnaise cup pineapple juice combine chicken celery pineapple mix well coated chill serve
Original_text:
Ranch Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (1 oz.) pkg. Hidden Valley Ranch (milk recipe original) salad dressing mix
- 2 c. cubed, cooked chicken
- 1 c. sliced celery
- 1 (20 oz.) can pineapple chunks (save juice)
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1/4 c. pineapple juice

Directions:
- Combine salad dressing mix with 1/2 cup of mayonnaise and 1/4 cup of pineapple juice.
- Combine chicken, celery and pineapple. Mix the 2 until well coated.
- Chill and serve.

salad_info: wayne broccoli puff ingredient pkg fren broccoli cut c salad dressing egg beaten c shredded sharp process american cheese c milk condensed cream mushroom soup c fine dry bread crumb tbsp butter margarine melted direction cook fren broccoli according package direction omitting salt drain thoroughly place x x inch baking dish mix soup shredded cheese add milk salad dressing beaten egg soup mixture stir well blended pour broccoli combine bread crumb melted butter sprinkle evenly mixture bake minute crumb lightly browned serf
Original_text:
Wayne'S Broccoli Puff

Ingredients:
- 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen broccoli cuts
- 1/4 c. salad dressing
- 1 egg, beaten
- 1/2 c. shredded sharp process American cheese
- 1/4 c. milk
- 1 (10 oz.) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
- 1/4 c. fine dry bread crumbs
- 1 Tbsp. butter or margarine, melted

Directions:
- Cook frozen broccoli according to package directions, omitting salt.
- Drain thoroughly.
- Place in 10 x 6 x 1 1/2-inch baking dish. Mix soup with shredded cheese.
- Add milk, salad dressing and beaten egg to soup mixture.
- Stir until well blended.
- Pour over broccoli. Combine bread crumbs with melted butter; sprinkle evenly over mixture.
- Bake at 350° for 45 minutes until crumbs are lightly browned.
- Serves 6.

Original_text:
Tomato Soup And Cream Cheese Mold

Ingredients:
- 1 can cream of tomato soup
- 1 can water
- 1 carton cream cheese (soft)
- 1/4 cup or 3 tbsp. lemon juice
- several dashes of Worcestershire sauce
- small bottle chopped olives or 1/2 to 3/4 cups
- 2 stalks celery, chopped fine
- 1 small grated onion
- 3 pkg. gelatin (Knox)
- 2 tbsp. mayonnaise or salad dressing

Directions:
- Mix Knox gelatin in 1/2 cup water.
- Boil 1 can of water and add all other ingredients and put in small tupperware mold until firm.

salad_info: tomato pepper relish ingredient c diced tomato c chopped green pepper c italian salad dressing direction toss well mix chill several hour stirring occasionally serving drain well make cup relish
Original_text:
Tomato Pepper Relish

Ingredients:
- 3 c. diced tomato
- 2 c. chopped green pepper
- 2 1/4 c. Italian salad dressing

Directions:
- Toss well and mix.
- Chill several hours, stirring occasionally.
- Just before serving, drain well.
- Makes 4 cups relish.

Original_text:
Marinated Cucumber Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. Italian salad dressing
- 1 c. vinegar
- 1 c. sugar
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 1/4 c. water
- 2 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. pepper
- 6 carrots, sliced (3 c.)
- 2 medium cucumbers, sliced (1 1/2 c.)
- 1 small green pepper, in rings
- 1 medium onion, sliced in rings

Directions:
- Combine first 7 ingredients.
- Stir in carrots, cucumbers, green pepper and onion.
- Cover and refrigerate overnight.

salad_info: waldorf salad ingredient c diced red apple tbsp lemon juice c diced celery c walnut piece c mayonnaise direction add ingredient large bowl toss serf
Original_text:
Waldorf Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 c. diced red apples
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1/2 c. diced celery
- 1/4 c. walnut pieces
- 1/3 c. mayonnaise

Directions:
- Add all ingredients to large bowl and toss.
- Serves 4.

salad_info: mike meat loaf ingredient ground chuck pkg good season italian salad dressing mix tsp pepper tsp seasoned salt large onion chopped green pepper chopped carrot grated tbsp worcestershire sauce c bread crumb bottle heinz chili sauce egg beaten tsp garlic powder c catsup bottle chili sauce c brown sugar tbsp worcestershire sauce direction mix ingredient together except last shape loaf bake hour remove oven top meat loaf mixture catsup chili sauce brown sugar worcestershire sauce cook hour longer remove serve cooling minute
Original_text:
Mike'S Meat Loaf

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 lb. ground chuck
- 1 pkg. Good Seasons Italian salad dressing mix
- 1 tsp. pepper
- 1 tsp. seasoned salt
- 1 large onion, chopped
- 1/2 green pepper, chopped
- 2 carrots, grated
- 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
- 3/4 c. bread crumbs
- 3/4 bottle Heinz chili sauce
- 2 eggs, beaten
- 1/2 tsp. garlic powder
- 1/2 c. catsup
- 1/4 bottle chili sauce
- 1/4 c. brown sugar
- 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together except the last 4 and shape into a loaf.
- Bake at 350° for 1 hour. Remove from oven. Top meat loaf with a mixture of the catsup, chili sauce, brown sugar and Worcestershire sauce.
- Cook 1/2 hour longer, then remove and serve after cooling 15 minutes.

salad_info: lentil frankfurter soup ingredient tbsp salad oil pkg frankfurter cut inch slice medium size red green pepper diced large carrot diced large onion diced garlic clove minced medium size celery stalk diced pkg dry lentil tsp pepper chicken flavor bouillon cube envelope direction hour serving quart dutch oven mediumhigh heat hot salad oil cook frankfurter lightly browned side stirring frequently slotted spoon remove frankfurter bowl cover refrigerate dripping remaining dutch oven medium heat cook celery red pepper carrot onion garlic tender minute stirring occasionally meanwhile rinse lentil running cold water discard stone shriveled lentil add lentil pepper bouillon cup water teaspoon salt vegetable mixture dutch oven high heat heat boiling reduce heat low cover simmer hour lentil tender soup thickened return frankfurter dutch oven cook done
Original_text:
Lentil And Frankfurter Soup

Ingredients:
- 1 Tbsp. salad oil
- 1 (16 oz.) pkg. frankfurters, cut into 1/2-inch slices
- 1 medium size red or green pepper, diced
- 1 large carrot, diced
- 1 large onion, diced
- 1 garlic clove, minced
- 2 medium size celery stalks, diced
- 1 (16 oz.) pkg. dry lentils
- 1/4 tsp. pepper
- 2 chicken flavor bouillon cubes or envelopes

Directions:
- About 2 hours before serving, in 5-quart Dutch oven over medium-high heat in hot salad oil, cook frankfurters until lightly browned on all sides, stirring frequently.
- With slotted spoon, remove frankfurters to bowl; cover and refrigerate.
- In drippings remaining in Dutch oven over medium heat, cook celery, red pepper, carrot, onion and garlic until tender, about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
- Meanwhile, rinse lentils in running cold water and discard any stones or shriveled lentils.
- Add lentils, pepper, bouillon, 11 cups water and 1 teaspoon salt to vegetable mixture in Dutch oven.
- Over high heat, heat to boiling.
- Reduce heat to low; cover and simmer 1 hour or until lentils are very tender and soup has thickened.
- Return frankfurters to Dutch oven and cook until done.

salad_info: caesar salad ingredient head romaine lettuce c parmesan cheese c caesarstyle crouton kraft caesar dressing taste direction wash cut lettuce put salad bowl sprinkle parmesan cheese crouton lettuce pour desired amount dressing toss
Original_text:
Caesar Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/2 head romaine lettuce
- 1/2 to 1 c. Parmesan cheese
- 1 c. Caesar-style croutons
- Kraft Caesar dressing to taste

Directions:
- Wash and cut up lettuce and put in salad bowl.
- Sprinkle Parmesan cheese and croutons over lettuce.
- Pour desired amount of dressing over that and toss.

Original_text:
Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 lb. seedless grapes
- 3 (8 oz.) cans Mandarin orange segments, drained
- 1 (16 oz.) can pineapple chunks, drained
- 2 red apples, diced
- 2 green apples, diced
- 2 yellow apples, diced

- 1/2 cantaloupe, diced
- 1 (16 oz.) can fruit cocktail
- 1/2 tsp. lemon juice
- 1/2 honeydew, diced

Directions:
- Wash strawberries and clean them.
- Mix grapes, oranges, pineapple chunks,
- apples, strawberries, fruit cocktail, lemon juice, cantaloupe
- and
- honeydew together.	Toss lightly.
- May be served on salad greens or lettuce bed.

salad_info: watergate salad ingredient large pineapple drained pkg pistachio pudding c miniature marshmallow large cool whip c nut direction mix pudding pineapple well add marshmallow cool whip nut mix well chill
Original_text:
Watergate Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large can pineapple, drained
- 1 pkg. pistachio pudding
- 1 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 large Cool Whip
- 1/2 c. nuts

Directions:
- Mix pudding and pineapple well; add marshmallows, Cool Whip and nuts.
- Mix well and chill.

salad_info: copper carrot ingredient carrot medium onion small green pepper c sugar tsp worcestershire sauce pinch salt pepper tsp prepared mustard tomato soup c salad oil c vinegar direction slice carrot boil salted water crisp tender minute cool alternate layer carrot onion ring green pepper make marinade remaining ingredient beating well blended pour vegetable refrigerate allow set least day serving keep week refrigerator
Original_text:
Copper Carrots

Ingredients:
- 2 lb. carrots
- 1 medium onion
- 1 small green pepper
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
- pinch of salt and pepper
- 1 tsp. prepared mustard
- 1 can tomato soup
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 3/4 c. vinegar

Directions:
- Slice carrots and boil in salted water until crisp and tender, about 5 minutes.
- When cool, alternate layers of carrots, onion rings and green peppers (thin sliced).
- Make a marinade of the remaining ingredients, beating well until blended.
- Pour over vegetables and refrigerate.
- Allow to set at least 2 days before serving.
- Will keep for 2 weeks in refrigerator.

salad_info: pineapple gelatin salad ingredient pkg lemon gelatin c hot water drained pineapple liquid tbsp vinegar tsp salt c drained crushed pineapple c grated carrot salted direction dissolve gelatin hot water add additional water pineapple liquid make cup add pineapple liquid vinegar salt gelatin chill slightly thickened add pineapple carrot fold gelatin mixture chill firm cut square serve lettuce leaf
Original_text:
Pineapple Gelatin Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 pkg. lemon gelatin
- 1 c. hot water
- drained pineapple liquid
- 1 Tbsp. vinegar
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 2 1/2 c. drained and crushed pineapple (20 oz. can is enough)
- 1 c. grated carrots, salted

Directions:
- Dissolve gelatin in hot water. Add additional water to pineapple liquid to make 1 1/2-cups. Add pineapple liquid, vinegar and salt to gelatin; chill until slightly thickened. Add pineapple to carrots; fold into gelatin mixture. Chill until firm; cut into squares. Serve on lettuce leaf.

salad_info: taco salad ingredient ground beef env dry onion soup mix c water med head lettuce lg tomato cut small onion sliced ring c chopped green pepper c sliced olive pkg corn chip pkg shredded cheddar cheese direction brown beef drain grease sprinkle soup mix meat stir water simmer uncovered minute cool
Original_text:
Taco Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. ground beef
- 1/2 env. dry onion soup mix
- 3/4 c. water
- 1 med. head lettuce
- 1 lg. tomato, cut up
- 1 small onion, sliced into rings
- 1/4 c. chopped green pepper
- 1/2 c. sliced olives (green or black)
- 1 6 oz. pkg. corn chips
- 1 4 oz. pkg. shredded cheddar cheese (sharp/med./mild)

Directions:
- Brown beef and drain grease.
- Sprinkle soup mix over meat. Stir in water. Simmer uncovered 10 minutes.
- Cool.

salad_info: hour salad layer salad ingredient head lettuce c dried onion c celery pkg fren pea c sliced water chestnut pt mayonnaise c parmesan cheese hardboiled egg fried bacon direction layer first ingredient mix mayonnaise cheese top hardboiled egg bacon covered wrap served refrigerator next day
Original_text:
24 Hour Salad Or 7 Layer Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head lettuce
- 1/2 c. dried onions
- 1/2 c. celery
- 1 pkg. frozen peas
- 1 c. sliced water chestnuts
- 1 pt. mayonnaise
- 1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
- 6 hard-boiled eggs
- 1/2 lb. fried bacon

Directions:
- Layer the first 5 ingredients.
- Mix mayonnaise with cheese. Top with the hard-boiled eggs (crumbled) and the bacon (crumbled). Can be covered with wrap and served from refrigerator the next day.

salad_info: potato salad ingredient medium potato tsp sugar tsp vinegar c celery diced c onion finely chopped c sweet pickle chopped tsp salt tsp whole celery seed hardboiled egg mayonnaise direction cook potato salt peel warm slice sprinkle sugar vinegar add celery ingredient mix well add mayonnaise egg cover chill thoroughly
Original_text:
Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 medium potatoes
- 1 tsp. sugar
- 1 tsp. vinegar
- 1/2 c. celery, diced
- 1/3 c. onion, finely chopped
- 1/4 c. sweet pickles, chopped
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. whole celery seed
- 3 hard-boiled eggs
- mayonnaise

Directions:
- Cook potatoes with salt.
- Peel them warm and slice.
- Sprinkle with sugar and vinegar.
- Add celery and other ingredients. Mix well. Add mayonnaise and eggs.
- Cover and chill thoroughly. (Best if chilled overnight.)

salad_info: purple lady salad ingredient pkg red raspberry jello c boiling water blueberry crushed pineapple cool whip c chopped nut direction dissolve gelatin water stir blueberry pineapple chill consistency unbeaten egg white fold cool whip nut chill firm
Original_text:
Purple Lady Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (6 oz.) pkg. red raspberry jello
- 1 c. boiling water
- 1 (15 oz.) can blueberries (undrained)
- 1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple (undrained)
- 1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip
- 1 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Dissolve gelatin in water.
- Stir in blueberries and pineapple. Chill until has consistency of an unbeaten egg white.
- Fold in Cool Whip and nuts.
- Chill until firm.

salad_info: hour salad ingredient head lettuce torn inch piece small onion sliced separated ring c mayonnaise tbsp sugar slice bacon cooked crumbled c shredded cheddar cheese fren pea direction layer lettuce onion pea x inch dish spread mayonnaise cover sprinkle sugar bacon cheese cover plastic wrap refrigerate overnight
Original_text:
24 Hour Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head lettuce, torn into 1-inch pieces
- 1 small onion, sliced and separated into rings
- 2 c. mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 4 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled
- 2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
- 10 oz. frozen peas

Directions:
- Layer lettuce, onion and peas in 13 x 9-inch dish.
- Spread mayonnaise to cover.
- Sprinkle with sugar, bacon and cheese. Cover with plastic wrap.
- Refrigerate overnight.

- 1 pkg. orange Jell-O

Original_text:

- 1 tsp. salt

- 1/2 tsp. garlic salt

Original_text:
German Potato Salad

Ingredients:

- 4 slices bacon
- 1 small onion, chopped
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 Tbsp. flour
- 1 tsp. beef bouillon
- 1 tsp. salt
- dash of pepper
- 1/4 c. vinegar
- 1/2 c. water
- 1/4 tsp. ground allspice (if desired)

Directions:
- Cook unpeeled potatoes.
- In frypan, fry bacon until crisp. Drain on paper towels, reserving 3 tablespoons drippings.
- Crumble bacon.
- To reserve drippings, add onion.
- Cook until tender.
- Add sugar, flour, bouillon and spices.
- Stir until smooth.
- Stir in vinegar and water; bring to boil.
- Peel warm potatoes.
- Slice and add to sauce mixture with bacon.
- Toss lightly to coat.
- Serve warm.
- Makes 4 to 5 servings.

- 1 small jicama peeled and sliced in strips

Directions:
- Caramelized almonds.
- Over low - medium heat coat almonds with sugar until sugar coats almonds.

Pasta Salad

- 1/2 head shredded cabbage
- 1/2 bell pepper, diced

- 2 Tbsp. sunflower nuts
- 1/2 c. slivered almonds

Original_text:
Cranberry Pineapple Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (6 oz.) pkg. raspberry gelatin
- 1 3/4 c. boiling water
- 1 (16 oz.) can jelled cranberry sauce
- 1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple (undrained)
- 3/4 c. orange juice
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1/2 c. chopped walnuts
- lettuce leaves
- mayonnaise or salad dressing

Directions:
- In a bowl, dissolve gelatin in boiling water.
- Break up and stir in cranberry sauce.
- Add pineapple, orange juice and lemon juice.
- Chill until partially set.
- Stir in nuts.
- Pour into an 11 x 7 x 2-inch dish.
- Chill until firm.
- Cut into squares.
- Serve on lettuce leaf and top with a dollop of mayo.
- Yield: 12 servings.

Original_text:
Chicken And Pasta Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 envelope Good Seasons Italian Salad Dressing mix
- 3 cups Ronzoni Medium Shells
- 1 tbsp. grated parmesan cheese
- 8 oz. cooked chicken
- 1 envelope Good Seasons Italian Salad Dressing
- 3 cups Ronzoni Medium Shells
- 1 pkg. (16 oz.) Birds Eye Farm Fresh Broccoli, Green Beans, Pearl Onions and Red Peppers
- 1 tbsp. grated parmesan cheese
- Wesson oil, Vinegar, Water

Directions:
- Prepare salad dressing mix with wesson oil, vinegar, and water as directed on envelope.
- Set aside.
- Cook pasta as directed on package; drain.
- Rinse with cold water and drain.
- Run cold tap water over vegetables in a strainer to thaw completely; drain. Combine pasta, vegetables, chicken and cheese in a large bowl. Toss with salad dressing.
- Chill.

salad_info: sugar spice apple muffin ingredient c unsifted flour c sugar tsp baking powder tsp cinnamon tsp nutmeg egg c milk tsp vanilla c salad oil c cooking apple finely chopped tbsp sugar tsp cinnamon cooking apple cut slice direction sift flour next four dry ingredient combine egg milk vanilla salad oil pour dry ingredient add diced apple stir enough moisten completely spoon greased muffin tin filling twothirds full combine tablespoon sugar teaspoon cinnamon topping dip apple slice cinnamon sugar press one lightly muffin cup bake minute serve warm make large muffin
Original_text:
Sugar And Spice Apple Muffins

Ingredients:
- 2 c. unsifted flour
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 4 tsp. baking powder
- 1/2 tsp. cinnamon
- 1/4 tsp. nutmeg
- 1 egg
- 1 c. milk
- 1/2 tsp. vanilla
- 1/4 c. salad oil
- 1 c. cooking apples, finely chopped
- 2 Tbsp. sugar (for topping)
- 1/2 tsp. cinnamon (for topping)
- 1 cooking apple, cut into 12 slices

Directions:
- Sift flour with next four dry ingredients.
- Combine egg with milk, vanilla and salad oil.
- Pour into dry ingredients.
- Add diced apples, then stir just enough to moisten completely.
- Spoon into greased muffin tins, filling about two-thirds full.
- Combine 2 tablespoons sugar and 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon for topping.
- Dip apple slices into cinnamon sugar and press one lightly into each muffin cup.
- Bake at 400° for 20 minutes.
- Serve warm.
- Makes 12 large muffins.

- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. vanilla pudding
- 3 c. cold water
- 2 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 (No. 2 1/2) apricot halves with juice

Directions:

- Remove from heat and add miniature marshmallows.
- Stir to dissolve, then add apricot halves with juice.
- Stir well.
- Pour into 9 x 13-inch baking dish.
- Chill overnight.

- 1 can Mandarin oranges or pineapple

Copper Pennies(Carrots)

- 1 pkg. young carrots, thickly sliced
- 2 medium onions, sliced
- 1 large bell pepper, chopped
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 1/2 c. sugar

Original_text:
Jeweled Lime Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 enveloped unflavored gelatin
- 1/2 c. cold water
- 1 1/2 c. boiling water
- 1 (14 oz.) pkg. unsweetened lemon-lime flavored soft drink mix
- 1/4 c. reconstituted lime juice
- 1 (8 oz.) container plain yogurt
- 1 large can fruit cocktail, drained
- 1 (14 oz.) can sweetened condensed milk (not evaporated milk)
- lettuce leaves

Directions:
- In large bowl, sprinkle gelatin over cold water; let stand 1 minute.
- Add boiling water and stir until gelatin is dissolved. Add soft drink mix; mix well.
- Stir in sweetened condensed milk, lime juice and yogurt; mix well.
- Fold in fruit cocktail.
- Pour into 8-cup mold.
- Chill 4 hours or until set.
- Unmold into lettuce leaves.
- Garnish as desired.
- Refrigerate leftovers.
- Yields 12 servings.

Original_text:
Summer Corn Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 bunch green onions
- 2 cans Shoe Peg corn
- 1 can Mexicorn
- 1 medium tomato, chopped
- 1 small can ripe olives, chopped
- 2/3 small jar mayonnaise

Directions:
- Chop onions (tops and all).
- Drain corn.
- Mix all ingredients.
- Cover and refrigerate several hours or overnight.

Original_text:
Carrot Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. orange jello
- 3 c. boiling water
- 16 oz. drained crushed pineapple
- 4 c. grated carrots
- 1 c. flaked coconut
- 1/2 c. chopped pecans

Directions:
- Drizzle jello in boiling water.
- Add juice.
- Chill until consistency of unbeaten egg whites.
- Add coconut, carrots, pineapple and pecans.
- Chill in refrigerator.

salad_info: b l chicken salad ingredient c mayonnaise c commercial barbecue sauce tbsp grated onion tbsp lemon juice tsp pepper large tomato chopped c torn leaf lettuce iceberg lettuce c chopped cooked chicken slice bacon cooked crumbled hardcooked egg sliced direction combine mayonnaise barbecue sauce grated onion lemon juice pepper small bowl stir well cover chill dressing mixture thoroughly press chopped tomato several layer paper towel remove excess moisture arrange lettuce individual salad plate top serving tomato chopped cooked chicken serving spoon dressing mixture salad sprinkle crumbled bacon garnish egg slice yield serving
Original_text:
B L T Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1/4 c. commercial barbecue sauce
- 2 Tbsp. grated onion
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1/2 tsp. pepper
- 2 large tomatoes, chopped
- 8 c. torn leaf lettuce or iceberg lettuce
- 3 c. chopped, cooked chicken
- 10 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled
- 2 hard-cooked eggs, sliced

Directions:
- Combine mayonnaise, barbecue sauce, grated onion, lemon juice and pepper in a small bowl; stir well.
- Cover and chill dressing mixture thoroughly.
- Press chopped tomato between several layers of paper towels to remove excess moisture.
- Arrange lettuce on individual salad plates; top each serving with tomatoes and chopped cooked chicken.
- Just before serving, spoon dressing mixture over salads; sprinkle with crumbled bacon and garnish with egg slices.
- Yield:
- 4 servings.

salad_info: corn salad ingredient whole kernel corn drained medium onion chopped large tomato diced tbsp mayonnaise salt pepper taste direction mix ingredient well ready serve
Original_text:
Corn Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (16 oz.) can whole kernel corn, drained
- 1 medium onion, chopped
- 1 large tomato, diced
- 4 Tbsp. mayonnaise
- salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients well.
- It's ready to serve.

Homemade Italian Dressing

Ingredients:
- 1 c. salad oil
- 1/4 c. lemon juice
- 1/4 c. white/cider vinegar
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 Tbsp. sugar
- 1/2 tsp. oregano leaves
- 1/2 tsp. dry mustard
- 1/2 tsp. paprika
- 1/8 tsp. thyme
- 2 cloves crushed garlic

Directions:
- Put all ingredients in a jar and shake well.
- Refrigerate for at least 2 hours to blend all the flavors.

Original_text:
Spaghetti Pasta Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 lb. cooked spaghetti noodles
- 6 cucumbers, peeled, seeded and diced
- 3 firm tomatoes, diced
- 1 onion, diced
- 1 (8 oz.) bottle Italian dressing
- 1 jar McCormick Vegetable Supreme

Directions:
- Toss together all ingredients.

Marinated Tomatoes(6 Servings)  

Ingredients:
- 4 large tomatoes
- 1/4 c. salad oil

- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. garlic

Directions:
- Slice or wedge tomatoes and arrange in shallow dish.

- 1 can sweetened condensed milk

- 1 small container Cool Whip
- chopped pecans
- 1 to 2 Tbsp. lemon juice

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients and chill.

Original_text:
7 Layer Salad

Ingredients:
- 10 to 12 leaves spinach, torn up
- 8 to 10 mushrooms, sliced
- Bermuda onion, sliced

Directions:

Original_text:
Cake Mix Cookies

Ingredients:
- 1 box cake mix (yellow or chocolate)
- 2 eggs
- 1 c. peanut butter
- 1/2 c. salad oil

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients until you can form balls, about the size of a walnut.
- Place on a greased cookie sheet.
- Press crisscross with a fork.
- Bake at 350° for 10 to 12 minutes.

Original_text:
Baked Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 10 to 12 potatoes sliced thin
- 1 c. Hellmann's mayonnaise
- 1 lb. Velveeta cheese
- 1/2 c. green pepper chopped
- 1/2 lb. bacon fried and crumbled
- 1 medium onion chopped

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients in bowl and put in well greased baking dish.
- Cover and bake for one hour and fifteen minutes.
- Remove foil and bake 15 minutes more.
- Bake at 375°.
- Serves 10 to 12 people.

Original_text:
Marinated Carrots

Ingredients:
- 2 lb. carrots, cut up and cooked for 5 minutes
- 1 chopped pepper
- 1 c. chopped celery
- 1 onion, chopped
- 1 can tomato soup (undiluted)
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 3/4 c. sugar
- 3/4 c. vinegar
- 1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
- 1 Tbsp. mustard
- salt and pepper

Directions:
- Bring to boil all the ingredients and pour over veggies. Refrigerate until chilled.

salad_info: chickenavocado salad ingredient pineapple chunk c cubed cooked chicken tbsp minced green onion tbsp minced parsley tsp curry powder tbsp lemon juice tsp salt c plain yogurt tsp pepper avocado direction drain pineapple reserving tablespoon syrup combine pineapple chicken onion parsley curry lemon juice salt pepper combine yogurt pineapple syrup mix cup yogurt mixture chicken mixture toss lightly cut avocado half remove seed spoon chicken avocado half
Original_text:
Chicken-Avocado Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (13 1/2 oz.) can pineapple chunks
- 2 c. cubed, cooked chicken
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. minced green onion
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. minced parsley
- 1 1/2 tsp. curry powder
- 2 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 c. plain yogurt
- 1/8 tsp. pepper
- 3 avocados

Directions:
- Drain pineapple, reserving 3 tablespoons syrup.
- Combine pineapple, chicken, onion, parsley, curry, lemon juice, salt and pepper.
- Combine yogurt with pineapple syrup.
- Mix 1/3 cup yogurt mixture into chicken mixture.
- Toss lightly.
- Cut avocados into halves and remove seed.
- (They may be peeled or not, as desired.) Spoon chicken into avocado halves.

Original_text:
Apple Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 Red Delicious apples
- 2 Granny Smith apples
- 2 peaches (small)
- 1 lb. red grapes
- 1 c. chopped walnuts
- 1 pkg. cream cheese
- 1 can crushed pineapple
- 1/3 c. frozen concentrate orange juice

Directions:
- Make cream sauce of melted butter, a little flour, milk, salt and butter.
- Let stand in icebox overnight.
- Add 1/2 pint of whipped cream next day.
- Add horseradish and Worcestershire sauce to taste.
- Before serving, add 1 cup broiled mushrooms.

Original_text:
Scandanavian Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small jar pimento, chopped
- 1 can green peas, drained
- 1 can French-style green beans, drained
- 4 small carrots, sliced
- 1 green pepper, diced
- 2 c. celery, chopped
- 2 purple onions, chopped
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 1 c. vinegar
- 3/4 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. paprika
- 2 tsp. salt
- pepper to taste

Directions:
- Combine first seven ingredients in bowl.
- Combine remaining ingredients to make dressing.
- Pour dressing over vegetables. Refrigerate 24 hours.
- Drain before serving.

Original_text:
Coke Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large cherry Jell-O
- 1 1/2 c. pecans
- 8 oz. Cool Whip
- 4 c. Coke
- 1 (10 oz.) bottle maraschino cherries

Directions:
- Dissolve Jell-O in 2 cups boiling Coke.
- Then add other 2 cups of room temperature Coke.
- Chill long enough to thicken.
- Add chopped cherries, pecans and Cool Whip.
- Put back into fridge to jell.

- cooked whole chicken plus 1 whole breast
- 2 stalks finely chopped celery
- 2 c. halved, seedless green grapes
- 1 c. chopped almonds
- salt and pepper to taste
- dash of corn flakes
- dash of Worcestershire sauce
- 3 heaping Tbsp. Miracle Whip salad dressing
- shredded lettuce

Directions:
- Dice cooked chicken (don't cut pieces too small). Combine all ingredients and serve on shredded lettuce.

- 1/4 c. dried parsley
- 3 Tbsp. dried minced onion
- 2 tsp. dried chives
- 1 tsp. salt

salad_info: sour cream potato salad ingredient new potato tsp salt c bottled italian dressing hardcooked egg c thinly sliced celery c sliced green onion c mayo c sour cream tbsp prepared mustard tsp salt tsp prepared horseradish tsp celery seed tsp pepper c chopped pared cucumber tbsp sliced green onion top direction advance cook potato water teaspoon salt drain cool minute peel potato slice pour italian dressing potato refrigerate least hour remove egg yolk egg set aside chop white mix egg white celery cup green onion potato set aside press egg yolk sieve reserving tablespoon garnish combine remaining egg yolk mayo sour cream mustard salt horseradish celery seed pepper bowl mix potato cover refrigerate hour serving
Original_text:
Sour Cream Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 4 lb. new potatoes
- 3/4 tsp. salt
- 3/4 c. bottled Italian dressing
- 6 hard-cooked eggs
- 1 c. thinly sliced celery
- 1 c. sliced green onions
- 2 1/4 c. mayo
- 3/4 c. sour cream
- 1 Tbsp. prepared mustard
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. prepared horseradish
- 1/2 tsp. celery seed
- 1/4 tsp. pepper
- 1 c. chopped, pared cucumber
- 2 Tbsp. sliced green onion tops

Directions:
- In advance cook potatoes in water with 3/4 teaspoon salt. Drain; cool 10 minutes.
- Peel potatoes and slice.
- Pour Italian dressing over potatoes and refrigerate for at least 2 hours. Remove egg yolks from egg and set aside.
- Chop whites.
- Mix egg whites, celery and 1 cup green onions with potatoes and set aside. Press egg yolks through sieve reserving 3 tablespoons for garnish. Combine remaining egg yolk, mayo, sour cream, mustard, salt, horseradish, celery seed and pepper in bowl.
- Mix with potatoes. Cover and refrigerate 2 hours before serving.

Original_text:
Three Bean Salad Bowl

Ingredients:
- 1 (1 lb.) can cut green beans, drained
- 1 (1 lb.) can cut wax beans, drained
- 1 (15 oz.) can red kidney beans, drained
- 1/2 c. chopped red onion
- 1/4 c. Wesson oil
- 1/3 c. wine vinegar
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1/2 tsp. garlic salt
- 1/4 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
- 1 medium green pepper, slivered

Directions:
- In large bowl, toss beans, onion and green pepper.
- Combine rest of the ingredients; pour over beans.
- Refrigerate 3 hours.

Original_text:
Pasta Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. pasta
- 1 c. thinly sliced carrots
- 1 c. diced celery
- 1 c. diced cucumbers
- 1 c. chopped onions
- 1 pkg. dry Italian dressing mix
- 2 tsp. garlic salt

Directions:
- Prepare pasta according to package directions. Add vegetables. Prepare Italian dressing according to package directions.
- Mix dressing with garlic salt, then pour over salad, mixing together well.
- Refrigerate 2 hours before serving.

Original_text:
Oyster Crackers(Appetizer)  

Ingredients:
- 1 large box oyster crackers
- 1 pkg. creamy Italian style salad mix
- 1 c. oil

Directions:
- Mix the oil and the creamy Italian style salad mix.
- Pour over the crackers and stir several times.
- If you put the crackers and mixture in a Tupperware bowl with lid, you can just turn the bowl upside down every so often to mix.

Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 boxes raspberry jello
- 2 1/2 c. boiling water
- 1 can whole cranberry sauce
- 1 c. chopped nuts
- 1 small pkg. cream cheese
- 1 can crushed pineapple, not drained (20 oz.)
- 1 pt. sour cream

Directions:
- Dissolve jello.
- When chilled, add cranberries, pineapple and nuts.
- When set, mix sour cream and cream cheese and spread over top.

salad_info: pasta salad ingredient cucumber peeled sliced green pepper chopped stalk celery chopped large bottle italian dressing small bag radish sliced medium tomato cut chunk box small shell direction put cucumber green pepper celery medium bowl pour italian dressing bowl toss let marinate overnight cook shell directed box rinse cold water drain large bowl mix ingredient remaining italian dressing
Original_text:
Pasta Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 cucumbers, peeled and sliced
- 3 green peppers, chopped
- 3 to 4 stalks celery, chopped
- 1 large bottle Italian dressing
- 1 small bag radishes, sliced
- 4 to 5 medium tomatoes, cut in chunks
- 1 box small shells

Directions:
- Put cucumbers, green peppers and celery in medium bowl; pour 3/4 of Italian dressing in bowl and toss.
- Let marinate overnight. Cook shells as directed on box; rinse with cold water and drain. In large bowl, mix all ingredients and remaining 1/4 of Italian dressing.

- 1 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1 1/2 tsp. black pepper
- 2 large tomatoes

Directions:
- Dice peppers, chop onion and rinse beans; toss all ingredients.
- Cover and refrigerate.

French Vinaigrette

- 1 c. light olive oil
- 4 Tbsp. wine vinegar
- 2 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
- 1 clove garlic, finely minced
- 1 Tbsp. each: chopped fresh basil, tarragon and oregano

- Whisk together all ingredients and toss with fresh salad. Serve at once.

Zippy Taco Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. ground beef
- 1 (15 oz.) can kidney beans, drained
- 1/2 c. picante sauce
- 1/2 lb. Velveeta cheese, cubed
- tortilla chips
- 3 c. shredded lettuce

Directions:
- Brown meat; drain. Stir in beans and sauce.
- Cover.
- Simmer 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
- Add Velveeta; stir until melted. For each serving, top chips with lettuce, tomato and meat mixture.

Easy Salad

- Combine all ingredients and chill.

Sauerkraut Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. sauerkraut
- 1/2 c. green onion
- 1/2 c. chopped celery
- 1/2 c. green peppers
- 1 small red pepper or 1 carrot, shredded
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 1/4 c. oil

- Mix all ingredients together.
- Let stand for 2 hours.

Original_text:
Tuna Salad With A Twist

Ingredients:
- 3/4 c. mayonnaise
- 3 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1/2 tsp. grated lemon peel
- 2 cans drained and flaked white tuna
- 1 medium red pepper, cubed
- 1 medium cucumber, sliced and quartered
- 1/3 c. sliced green onions

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients; cover and chill.
- Makes about 4 cups.

salad_info: crab avocado salad ingredient tbsp mayonnaise tbsp lime juice tsp cumin tsp paprika lump crab meat cooked celery stalk thinly sliced medium haas avocado peeled pitted cubed salt pepper bunch watercress washed stem removed green choice direction large bowl mix mayonnaise lime juice cumin paprika add crab meat celery mix well add salt pepper taste gently stir avocado cube divide watercress plate top salad
Original_text:
Crab And Avocado Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 Tbsp. mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. lime juice
- 1 tsp. cumin
- 1/2 tsp. paprika
- 1 lb. lump crab meat, cooked
- 2 celery stalks, thinly sliced
- 1 medium Haas avocado, peeled, pitted and cubed
- salt and pepper
- 2 bunches watercress, washed and stems removed or greens of your choice

Directions:
- In a large bowl, mix mayonnaise, lime juice, cumin and paprika. Add crab meat and celery; mix well. Add salt and pepper to taste. Gently stir in avocado cubes. Divide watercress on 4 plates; top with salad.

salad_info: chilled rice salad ingredient pkg rice pilaf cooked according pkg direction cooled slightly mushroom sliced bunch green onion minced c olive oil tbsp red wine vinegar tsp dijon mustard tsp salt tsp freshly ground pepper direction toss rice mushroom onion together large bowl combine remaining ingredient small bowl jar tight fitting lid blend well
Original_text:
Chilled Rice Salad

Ingredients:
- 9 oz. pkg. rice pilaf, cooked according to pkg. directions and cooled slightly
- 1 lb. mushrooms, sliced
- 1 bunch green onions, minced
- 1/4 c. olive oil
- 3 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
- 1/2 tsp. Dijon mustard
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/4 tsp. freshly ground pepper

Directions:
- Toss rice, mushrooms and onion together in large bowl. Combine remaining ingredients in small bowl or jar with tight fitting lid and blend well.

salad_info: pat corned beef ingredient corned beef small tomato small onion diced pkg baby lima bean direction medium saucepan combine corned beef tomato diced onion baby lima cook low heat minute serve creamed potato salad roll quick easy meal kid love
Original_text:
Pat'S Corned Beef

Ingredients:
- 1 can corned beef
- 1 small can tomatoes
- 1 small onion, diced
- 1 pkg. baby lima beans

Directions:
- In medium saucepan, combine the corned beef, tomatoes, diced onion and baby limas.
- Cook over low heat for 30 minutes.
- Serve with creamed potatoes, salad and rolls for a quick and easy meal the kids will love.

salad_info: lasagna ingredient ragu tomato herb sauce small tomato paste tsp oregano salt pepper taste ground round lasagna noodle shredded fatfree mzarella cheese direction start ragu add tomato paste oregano salt pepper let simmer minute brown ground round skillet done drain well use paper towel pat meat absorb fat add sauce cook lasagna noodle directed drain x inch pan alternate noodle meat mixture mzarella cheese continue used mixture finish top mzarella cheese bake covered minute gram fat per serving serve garden salad italian bread stick
Original_text:
Lasagna

Ingredients:
- Ragu tomato and herb sauce
- 1 small can tomato paste
- 1/4 tsp. oregano
- salt and pepper to taste
- 1 lb. ground round
- lasagna noodles
- shredded fat-free Mozzarella cheese

Directions:
- Start with Ragu.
- Add tomato paste, oregano, salt and pepper. Let simmer for about 20 minutes.
- Brown ground round in skillet until done.
- Drain very well.
- I use a paper towel to pat meat to absorb all the fat.
- Add to sauce.
- Cook lasagna noodles as directed and drain.
- In a 13 x 9-inch pan alternate noodles, meat mixture and Mozzarella cheese.
- Continue until you have used all mixture, finish on top with your Mozzarella cheese.
- Bake, covered, for about 35 minutes.
- There are 8 to 6 grams of fat per serving. Serve with a garden salad and Italian bread sticks.

salad_info: lime congealed salad ingredient box lime jello pkg philadelphia cream cheese c boiling water crushed pineapple c miniature marshmallow pkg cool whip direction cream jello cream cheese add cup boiling water dissolve add cup reserved pineapple juice mix well put refrigerator thickened add crushed pineapple marshmallow cool whip congeal
Original_text:
Lime Congealed Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 box lime jello (3 oz.)
- 1 pkg. Philadelphia cream cheese (3 oz.)
- 1 c. boiling water
- 1 (No. 2) can crushed pineapple (reserve 1 c. juice)
- 2 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. Cool Whip

Directions:
- Cream jello with cream cheese.
- Add 1 cup boiling water. Dissolve.
- Add 1 cup reserved pineapple juice.
- Mix well.
- Put into refrigerator until thickened.
- Add crushed pineapple, marshmallows and Cool Whip.
- Congeal.

Original_text:
Berry Cream Dressing

Ingredients:
- 1 c. sour cream or yogurt
- 1/4 c. whipping cream
- 1 Tbsp. confectioners sugar
- 1/4 c. berry vinegar
- pinch of salt
- 1/4 c. vegetable oil

Directions:
- Whisk together all ingredients, except the oil.
- Add the oil in a slow, steady stream until blended.
- Refrigerate.
- Use on a spinach-cucumber salad.

Original_text:
Corn And Pea Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (16 oz.) can white Shoepeg corn
- 1 large can LeSueur peas
- 1 (4 oz.) jar chopped pimentos
- 1 c. chopped celery
- 1 c. chopped green pepper
- 1/2 c. chopped onion
- 1 c. sugar
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 1/2 c. vegetable oil
- salt and pepper

Directions:
- At least 24 hours before serving, drain corn, peas and pimientos.
- Combine celery, green pepper and onion.

salad_info: broccolibacon salad ingredient head broccoli cut floret red onion minced c raisin bacon cooked crumbled c mayonnaise c sugar tbsp white vinegar direction mix together broccoli onion raisin bacon combine remaining ingredient pour salad adding enough moisten stir gently mix chill
Original_text:
Broccoli-Bacon Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head broccoli, cut in florets
- 1 red onion, minced
- 1/2 c. raisins
- 1/2 lb. bacon, cooked and crumbled
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 2 Tbsp. white vinegar

Directions:
- Mix together broccoli, onion, raisins and bacon.
- Combine remaining ingredients.
- Pour over salad, adding enough to moisten. Stir gently to mix.
- Chill.

Original_text:
"Red" Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pt. fresh strawberries, cut up
- 1 large apple, chopped
- 1 (8 oz.) can pineapple chunks or tidbits, drained
- 3 medium bananas, cut up
- 1 pkg. strawberry glaze

Directions:
- Mix all together and chill.

salad_info: strawberry jello salad ingredient small pkg strawberry jello c boiling water crushed pineapple small pkg fren strawberry thawed mashed banana c walnut pt sour cream direction dissolve jello water add crushed drained pineapple add strawberry banana walnut pour mix pan put fridge jello firm spread pint remaining jello mixture sour cream chill serve
Original_text:
Strawberry Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 small pkg. strawberry Jell-O
- 1 c. boiling water
- 1 (16 oz.) can crushed pineapple
- 2 small pkg. frozen strawberries, thawed
- 3 mashed bananas
- 1 c. walnuts
- 1 pt. sour cream

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in water; add crushed drained pineapple.
- Add strawberries, bananas and walnuts.
- Pour 1/2 mix in pan; put in fridge until jello is firm (about 1/2 hour), then spread 1 pint remaining jello mixture over sour cream.
- Chill and serve.

salad_info: artichoke rice salad ingredient c chicken beef broth c regular rice c diced green pepper c sliced green onion c sliced pimento olive salt pepper taste jar marinated artichoke liquid chopped c mayonnaise tsp dill weed direction cook first ingredient add remaining ingredient chill serving
Original_text:
Artichoke Rice Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. chicken or beef broth
- 1 c. regular rice
- 1/4 c. diced green pepper
- 1/4 c. sliced green onion
- 1/4 c. sliced pimento olives
- salt and pepper to taste
- 1 (6 oz.) jar marinated artichokes with liquid, chopped
- 1/4 c. mayonnaise
- 1/2 tsp. dill weed

Directions:
- Cook the first 2 ingredients and add remaining ingredients. Chill before serving.

salad_info: party fruit salad ingredient crushed pineapple pkg lime gelatin pkg cream cheese c chopped pimiento c heavy cream whipped c diced celery c chopped walnut direction heat pineapple boiling add gelatin stir dissolved chill partially set soften cream cheese stir pimiento add gelatin mixture blend fold whipped cream celery nut pour quart mold chill firm
Original_text:
Party Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (No. 2) can (2 1/2 c.) crushed pineapple
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. lime gelatin
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 1/3 c. chopped pimiento
- 1 c. heavy cream, whipped
- 1 c. diced celery
- 1 c. chopped walnuts

Directions:
- Heat pineapple to boiling; add gelatin and stir until dissolved.
- Chill until partially set.
- Soften cream cheese; stir in pimiento.
- Add to gelatin mixture and blend.
- Fold in whipped cream, celery and nuts.
- Pour into 1 1/2-quart mold and chill until firm.

salad_info: fruited cabbage salad ingredient c shredded cabbage medium red apple diced medium firm banana sliced c chopped pecan tbsp raisin c mayonnaise tbsp milk tbsp sugar tbsp lemon juice direction combine first five ingredient set aside jar tight fitting lid combine mayonnaise milk sugar lemon juice shake well pour cabbage mixture toss coat
Original_text:
Fruited Cabbage Salad

Ingredients:
- 4 c. shredded cabbage
- 1 medium red apple, diced
- 1 medium firm banana, sliced
- 1/3 c. chopped pecans
- 2 Tbsp. raisins
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. milk
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice

Directions:
- Combine first five ingredients and set aside.
- In a jar with a tight fitting lid, combine the mayonnaise, milk, sugar, lemon juice; shake well.
- Pour over cabbage mixture and toss to coat.

salad_info: mignonette beef ingredient c salad oil c lemon juice c dry red wine tsp tabasco tsp dry mustard tsp thyme bay leaf tsp salt medium onion thinly sliced sirloin beef vegetable choice direction mix ingredient well except beef vegetable add beef cut inch cube refrigerate least hour overnight alternate meat vegetable choice skewer broil minute brushing sauce occasionally
Original_text:
Mignonette Of Beef

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 1/4 c. lemon juice
- 1/2 c. dry red wine
- 1/2 tsp. Tabasco
- 1 tsp. dry mustard
- 1/4 tsp. thyme
- 1 bay leaf
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1 medium onion, thinly sliced
- 2 lb. sirloin beef
- vegetables of choice

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients well, except beef and vegetables, then add the beef, cut into 1 1/2 to 2-inch cubes.
- Refrigerate at least 5 hours or overnight.
- Alternate meat and vegetables of your choice on skewer.
- Broil about 20 minutes, brushing with sauce occasionally.

salad_info: one dish ham bake ingredient pkg fren broccoli cut rinsed drained cream mushroom soup cheddar cheese soup c milk c meat cut small piece tsp onion powder c bisquick c milk direction mix broccoli soup cup milk meat onion put x inch pan mix bisquick cup milk pour evenly soup mixture bake minute oven let stand minute serving serve tossed salad french bread complete meal
Original_text:
One Dish Ham Bake(Chicken, Turkey Or Beef Can Be Used.)  

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. frozen broccoli cuts, rinsed and drained
- 1 can cream of mushroom soup
- 1 can Cheddar cheese soup
- 1 c. milk
- 3 c. meat, cut in small pieces
- 1/2 tsp. onion powder (1/4 c. cut up onions can be used)
- 2 c. Bisquick
- 1 1/2 c. milk

Directions:
- Mix broccoli, soups, 1 cup milk, meat and onion.
- Put in 9 x 13-inch pan.
- Mix Bisquick and 1 1/2 cups milk and pour evenly over soup mixture.
- Bake 25 to 30 minutes in 450° oven.
- Let stand for 5 minutes before serving.
- Serve with tossed salad and French bread for complete meal.

salad_info: applepecan caramel salad ingredient c bitesized piece granny smith apple c broken pecan piece toasted c dannon creme caramel light yogurt tbsp light mayonnaise packet sugar substitute tsp ground cinnamon direction combine apple pecan bowl mix yogurt light mayonnaise sugar substitute cinnamon together pour mixture apple toss gently coat chill ready serve serf
Original_text:
Apple-Pecan Caramel Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 c. bite-sized pieces
- Granny Smith apples
- 1/4 c. broken pecan pieces, toasted
- 1/2 c. Dannon creme caramel light yogurt
- 1 Tbsp. light mayonnaise
- 1 packet sugar substitute (optional)
- 1/4 tsp. ground cinnamon

Directions:
- Combine apples and pecans in bowl.
- Mix yogurt, light mayonnaise, sugar substitute and cinnamon together and pour mixture over apples.
- Toss gently to coat.
- Chill until ready to serve.
- Serves 6.

salad_info: steak bag ingredient boneless sirloin top round steak tbsp soft butter large clove garlic mashed tbsp salad oil tsp seasoned salt tsp coarse ground pepper c coarse bread crumb direction roast steak dry heat oven desire roast minute wipe steak dry combine butter garlic oil salt pepper spread butter mixture side steak press crumb firmly onto steak side place brown grocery type bag close paper clip place baking sheet bake minute remove oven let stand minute slide onto carving board carve inch diagonal slice serve
Original_text:
Steak In A Bag

Ingredients:
- 2 1/2 to 3 lb. boneless sirloin or top round steak (about 2 1/2-inch thick)
- 3 Tbsp. soft butter
- 2 large cloves garlic, mashed
- 4 Tbsp. salad oil
- 1 tsp. seasoned salt
- 1 tsp. coarse ground pepper
- 1 c. coarse bread crumbs

Directions:
- You can roast the steak in dry heat in the oven, if you desire.
- Roast at 375° for 40 minutes.
- Wipe steak dry.
- Combine butter, garlic, oil, salt and pepper.
- Spread butter mixture on both sides of steak.
- Press crumbs firmly onto steak on both sides.
- Place in brown grocery type bag.
- Close with paper clips. Place on baking sheet.
- Bake at 375° for 45 minutes.
- Remove from oven.
- Let stand 5 minutes.
- Slide onto carving board.
- Carve into 1/4-inch diagonal slices to serve.

salad_info: fruit salad ingredient strawberry pie filling eagle brand milk cool whip large crushed pineapple drained c pecan direction mix together ingredient chill
Original_text:
Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can strawberry pie filling
- 1 can Eagle Brand milk
- 1 (12 oz.) Cool Whip
- 1 large can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 c. pecans

Directions:
- Mix together all ingredients and chill.

salad_info: wiener schnitzel ingredient weleaten veal cutlet slice gruyere cheese c butter tsp grated cheese bread crumb lemon juice salt pepper flour beaten egg direction sprinkle veal lemon juice salt pepper grated cheese let sit minute roll flour egg breadcrumb fry one side hot butter turn reduce heat place cheese slice cutlet slowly fry side serve crisp salad
Original_text:
Wiener Schnitzel

Ingredients:
- 4 well-beaten veal cutlets
- 4 slices Gruyere cheese
- 1/3 c. butter
- 1 tsp. grated cheese
- bread crumbs
- lemon juice
- salt and pepper
- flour
- 1 beaten egg

Directions:
- Sprinkle veal with lemon juice, salt, pepper and grated cheese.
- Let sit for 5 minutes.
- Then roll in flour, egg and breadcrumbs.
- Fry on one side in hot butter.
- Turn.
- Reduce heat. Place cheese slice on each cutlet.
- Slowly fry other side.
- Serve with crisp salad.

salad_info: chinese chicken salad ingredient chicken breast cooked tender head lettuce broken bite size piece green onion chopped fine c sesame seed pkg c sliced almond fresh ginger diced fine chinese noodle direction chicken cool break small piece store first ingredient ziploc bag ready use skillet brown sesame seed almond ginger store ziploc bag ready use
Original_text:
Chinese Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 or 4 chicken breasts, cooked until tender
- 2 heads lettuce, broken into bite size pieces
- 6 to 8 green onions, chopped fine
- 1 c. sesame seed (2 pkg.)
- 1/2 pkg. or 1 c. sliced almonds
- fresh ginger, diced very fine
- Chinese noodles

Directions:
- When chicken is cool, break into small pieces.
- Store each of the first 3 ingredients in a Ziploc bag until ready to use.
- In a skillet, brown the sesame seed, almonds and ginger.
- Store in Ziploc bag until ready to use.

salad_info: fudge fruit cream salad ingredient pkg vanilla instant pudding c buttermilk carton whipping cream pkg fudge striped cooky mandarin orange drained pineapple tidbit drained direction mix pudding buttermilk fold whipping cream break cooky fold salad add orange pineapple chill
Original_text:
Fudge Fruit And Cream Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. vanilla instant pudding
- 1 1/2 c. buttermilk
- 1 carton whipping cream
- 1 (11 oz.) pkg. fudge striped cookies
- 1 can mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 (15 oz.) can pineapple tidbits, drained

Directions:
- Mix
- pudding and buttermilk.
- Fold in
- whipping
- cream. Break up cookies and fold into salad.
- Add oranges and pineapple. Chill.

salad_info: cool vegetable salad ingredient head broccoli head cauliflower pkg cherry tomato pkg fresh mushroom large bottle italian dressing direction cut vegetable bite size piece put large bowl mix together add dressing cover refrigerate hour overnight stir ready serve serf approximately people
Original_text:
Cool Vegetable Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head broccoli
- 1 head cauliflower
- 1 pkg. cherry tomatoes
- 1 pkg. fresh mushrooms
- 1 large bottle Italian dressing

Directions:
- Cut vegetables into bite size pieces.
- Put in large bowl.
- Mix together and add dressing.
- Cover and refrigerate 6 hours or overnight.
- Stir and ready to serve.
- Serves approximately 10 people.

salad_info: pepper steak ingredient round steak cut thin strip tbsp salad oil medium onion sliced medium green pepper sliced pkg au jus gravy mix c water tsp soy sauce tsp ground ginger c hot cooked rice direction cook meat onion pepper oil browned stir remaining ingredient except rice simmer minute hour stirring occasionally serve rice
Original_text:
Pepper Steak

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. round steak, cut in thin strips
- 2 Tbsp. salad oil
- 1 medium onion, sliced
- 1 medium green pepper, sliced
- 1 pkg. au jus gravy mix
- 1 3/4 c. water
- 4 tsp. soy sauce
- 1/2 tsp. ground ginger
- 3 c. hot cooked rice

Directions:
- Cook meat, onion and pepper in oil until browned.
- Stir in remaining ingredients except rice.
- Simmer for 45 minutes or 1 hour, stirring occasionally.
- Serve over rice.

salad_info: pickle onion salad ingredient onion dill pickle mayonnaise salt pepper direction cut chunk onion pickle mix mayonnaise make sauce salt pepper taste serve fried fish
Original_text:
Pickle And Onion Salad

Ingredients:
- onions
- dill pickles
- mayonnaise
- salt and pepper

Directions:
- Cut into chunks the onions and pickles.
- Mix with mayonnaise to make sauce.
- Salt and pepper to taste.
- Serve with fried fish.

salad_info: easy good salad ingredient cottage cheese cool whip pkg flavor jello large type fruit direction bowl mix together cottage cheese cool whip jello drain fruit blend chill serving
Original_text:
Easy, Good Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 lb. cottage cheese
- 1 (9 oz.) Cool Whip
- 2 pkg. any flavor jello
- 1 large can any type fruit

Directions:
- In a bowl, mix together cottage cheese, Cool Whip and jello. Drain fruit and blend in. Chill before serving.

salad_info: barbecued steak platter ingredient tbsp ketchup tbsp vinegar tbsp salad oil tbsp water tsp worcestershire sauce salt direction combine ingredient heat pour cube steak let stand minute drain place steak rack inch broiler broil minute side basting twice sauce brown bread slice butter margarine arrange steak slice serve onion pickle
Original_text:
Barbecued Steak Platter(Cube Steaks)  

Ingredients:
- 4 Tbsp. ketchup
- 3 Tbsp. vinegar
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. salad oil
- 2 Tbsp. water
- 2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
- salt (if desired)

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients, heat and pour over 4 cube steaks. Let stand for 15 minutes.
- Drain and place steaks on rack 2 inches below broiler.
- Broil 5 minutes on each side, basting once or twice with sauce.
- Brown 4 bread slices in butter or margarine and arrange steaks on slices.
- Serve with onion and pickle.

salad_info: yum yum salad ingredient small crushed pineapple pkg lemon lime jello c shredded cheese c sugar c cold water c chopped nut c cool whip direction boil pineapple sugar together add jello dissolved add cup water refrigerate almost jelled add cheese cool whip nut
Original_text:
Yum Yum Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small can crushed pineapple (juice included)
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon or lime Jell-O
- 1 c. shredded cheese
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 1 c. cold water
- 1/2 c. chopped nuts
- 1 c. Cool Whip

Directions:
- Boil pineapple and sugar together.
- Add Jell-O; when dissolved, add cup water.
- Refrigerate until almost jelled; add cheese, Cool Whip and nuts.

salad_info: satsuma salad ingredient large satsuma tbsp powdered sugar c shredded fresh coconut c sour cream chunk pineapple c nutmeats chopped direction peel satsuma cut crosswise slice sprinkle powdered sugar satsuma slice drain pineapple mix ingredient together let stand refrigerator overnight serve spoon mixture onto lettuce leaf
Original_text:
Satsuma Salad

Ingredients:
- 10 to 12 large satsumas
- 4 Tbsp. powdered sugar
- 1 c. shredded fresh coconut (frozen or packaged is okay)
- 1 c. sour cream
- 1 (No. 2) can chunk pineapple
- 1/2 c. nutmeats, chopped

Directions:
- Peel the satsumas and cut crosswise into slices.
- Sprinkle powdered sugar over satsuma slices.
- Drain pineapple.
- Mix all ingredients together and let stand in refrigerator overnight (or at least 3 to 4 hours).
- To serve, spoon mixture onto lettuce leaves.

salad_info: chicken aspic salad ingredient envelope plain gelatin c cold tomato juice tsp salt tbsp lemon juice dash tabasco c cold chicken stock c mayonnaise c diced chicken cooked c diced celery tbsp green pepper diced direction sprinkle envelope gelatin tomato juice heat stirring dissolved add teaspoon salt tablespoon lemon juice dash tabasco set aside cool separate saucepan sprinkle envelope gelatin chicken stock heat stir dissolved remove heat add teaspoon salt tablespoon lemon juice let cool add chicken celery green pepper pour mixture loaf pan pam coated chill firm add tomato aspic mixture aspic almost firm spread last half chicken mix chill serve lettuce
Original_text:
Chicken Aspic Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 envelopes plain gelatin
- 1 3/4 c. cold tomato juice
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 2 Tbsp. lemon juice
- dash of Tabasco
- 3/4 c. cold chicken stock
- 3/4 c. mayonnaise
- 1 1/2 c. diced chicken, cooked
- 1/2 c. diced celery
- 3 Tbsp. green pepper, diced (optional)

Directions:
- Sprinkle 1 envelope gelatin in tomato juice.
- Heat, stirring, until dissolved.
- Add 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 tablespoon lemon juice and dash of Tabasco.
- Set aside to cool.
- In separate saucepan, sprinkle 1 envelope gelatin in chicken stock.
- Heat; stir until dissolved.
- Remove from heat and add 1/4 teaspoon salt and 1 tablespoon lemon juice.
- Let cool.
- Add chicken, celery and green pepper.
- Pour 1/2 of mixture into loaf pan that has been Pam coated.
- Chill.
- When firm, add tomato aspic mixture.
- When aspic is almost firm, spread last half of chicken mix.
- Chill.
- Serve on lettuce.

salad_info: orange molded salad ingredient orange jello c boiling water mandarin orange section drained c small marshmallow crushed pineapple drained pt orange sherbet cool whip direction dissolve jello boiling water add sherbet place refrigerator partly set add ingredient fold cool whip last chill enjoy
Original_text:
Orange Molded Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 oz. orange jello
- 1 c. boiling water
- 11 oz. mandarin orange sections, drained
- 1 1/2 c. small marshmallows
- 1 (8 1/4 oz.) crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 pt. orange sherbet
- 8 oz. Cool Whip

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in boiling water.
- Add sherbet and place in refrigerator until partly set (watch carefully).
- Add other ingredients and fold in Cool Whip last.
- Chill and enjoy.

salad_info: fruit salad ingredient mandarin orange pineapple chunk peach slice banana red apple direction drain fruit well
Original_text:
Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (11 oz.) can Mandarin oranges
- 1 (20 oz.) can pineapple chunks
- 1 (16 oz.) can peach slices
- 3 bananas
- 2 red apples

Directions:
- Drain all fruit well.

Original_text:
Taco Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. hamburger meat
- 1 pkg. French's Chili-O seasoning mix
- 1 bottle Ortega taco sauce
- 1 can kidney beans
- lettuce
- cheese
- tomatoes
- sour cream
- tostado chips

Directions:
- Brown meat and drain, then add seasoning mix, taco sauce and kidney beans.
- Let all this get hot, then its ready to eat.

salad_info: italian pasta salad ingredient pkg rotini pasta tomato sauce roasted garlic c fat free italian dressing tbsp chopped basil tbsp oregano leaf pint cherry grape tomato halved rom tomato diced cucumber chopped red onion chopped sliced black olive drained direction cook pasta according package direction without adding fat salt drain rinse cold water set aside large bowl combine tomato sauce dressing basil oregano add tomato cucumber onion olive stir coated add pasta gently toss refrigerate least hour
Original_text:
Italian Pasta Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. (16 oz.) rotini pasta
- 1 can (8 oz.) tomato sauce with roasted garlic
- 1 c. fat free italian dressing
- 2 Tbsp. chopped basil
- 1 Tbsp. oregano leaves
- 1 pint cherry or grape tomatoes, halved or 5-6 roma tomatoes diced
- 2 cucumbers, chopped
- 1 red onion, chopped
- 1 can (2.25) sliced black olives, drained

Directions:
- Cook pasta according to package directions without adding fat or salt.
- Drain and rinse with cold water.
- Set aside.
- In a large bowl combine tomato sauce, dressing , basil, and oregano.
- Add tomatoes, cucumber, onion, and olives.
- Stir until coated.
- Add pasta and gently toss.
- Refrigerate at least 2 hours.

salad_info: strawberry salad ingredient pkg whole fren strawberry pkg cream cheese softened c sugar c chopped pecan tub cool whip large pineapple crushed chunk banana c small marshmallow direction cut strawberry half slice banana drain pineapple cream sugar cheese together fold tub cool whip marshmallow mix together fren strawberry pineapple pecan add cheese mixture refrigerate
Original_text:
Strawberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (10 oz.) pkg. whole, frozen strawberries
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 c. chopped pecans
- 1 (9 oz.) tub Cool Whip
- 1 large can pineapple, crushed or chunks
- 2 bananas
- 1 c. small marshmallows

Directions:
- Cut strawberries in half.
- Slice bananas.
- Drain pineapple. Cream sugar and cheese together.
- Fold in tub of Cool Whip and marshmallows.
- Mix together the frozen strawberries, pineapple and pecans.
- Add to cheese mixture.
- Refrigerate.

salad_info: fren fruit salad ingredient crushed pineapple pkg philly cream cheese tbsp miracle whip salad dressing bag miniature marshmallow c cream whipped c chopped maraschino cherry direction cream cream cheese miracle whip whip cream separate bowl fold crushed pineapple marshmallow chopped cherry cream cheese miracle whip last add whipped cream put x inch dish freeze overnight let set room temperature hour eating
Original_text:
Frozen Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can crushed pineapple (juice off)
- 1 pkg. Philly cream cheese
- 2 Tbsp. Miracle Whip salad dressing
- 1 bag miniature marshmallows
- 1 c. cream, whipped
- 2 c. chopped maraschino cherries

Directions:
- Cream the cream cheese and Miracle Whip and whip the cream in separate bowl.
- Fold crushed pineapple, marshmallows and chopped cherries into cream cheese and Miracle Whip.
- Last, add whipped cream.
- Put into 13 x 9-inch dish; freeze overnight.
- Let set at room temperature 1/2 hour before eating.

salad_info: johnny marzetti ingredient wide noodle ground beef chopped onion sharp cheese grated shredded mushroom chopped green pepper small tomato paste small jar salad olive chopped tomato sauce water tbsp worcestershire sauce direction brown beef onion pepper mushroom add tomato paste sauce water worcestershire sauce cook low heat minute arrange small one large oblong dish
Original_text:
Johnny Marzetti

Ingredients:
- 1/2 lb. wide noodles
- 1/2 lb. ground beef (I use 1 lb.)
- chopped onion
- 1/2 lb. sharp cheese, grated or shredded
- 1/2 lb. mushrooms or 1 can chopped
- 1 green pepper
- 1 small can tomato paste
- 1 small jar salad olives, chopped
- 1 can tomato sauce
- 1 can water
- 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce

Directions:
- Brown beef, onions, pepper and mushrooms.
- Add tomato paste, sauce, water and Worcestershire sauce.
- Cook over low heat for 30 minutes.
- Arrange in 2 small or one large oblong dish.

salad_info: crab meat dip ingredient crab meat italian salad dressing cream cheese c sour cream direction bake minute serve triscuits
Original_text:
Crab Meat Dip

Ingredients:
- 1 can crab meat
- Italian salad dressing
- 8 oz. cream cheese
- 1 c. sour cream

Directions:
- Bake at 350° for 20 minutes and serve with Triscuits.

salad_info: chicken salad stuffed shell ingredient ronzoni jumbo shell c plain yogurt c mayonnaise tbsp lemon juice tbsp curry powder tsp prepared mustard garlic clove pressed c cooked chicken strip c red pepper chopped c celery chopped c sliced scallion c sunflower seed direction cook pasta directed drain combine curry yogurt mayonnaise lemon juice mustard garlic add chicken red pepper celery scallion sunflower seed toss lightly spoon tablespoon shell chill serve lettuce
Original_text:
Chicken Salad Stuffed Shells

Ingredients:
- 32 Ronzoni jumbo shells
- 1/2 c. plain yogurt
- 1/3 c. mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1 Tbsp. curry powder
- 1 tsp. prepared mustard
- 2 garlic cloves, pressed

- 1 1/2 c. red pepper, chopped
- 1 c. celery, chopped
- 1/2 c. sliced scallions
- 1/2 c. sunflower seed (unsalted)

Directions:

- Combine curry, yogurt, mayonnaise, lemon juice, mustard and garlic.
- Add chicken, red pepper, celery, scallions and sunflower seed.
- Toss lightly. Spoon 1 1/2 tablespoons into each shell.
- Chill.
- Serve on lettuce.

salad_info: lindas strawberry salad ingredient pkgs strawberry jello crushed pineapple juice strawberry pie filling cup hot water pkg cream cheese container sour cream cup sugar direction mix jello hot water add pineapple juice pie filling mix well place x casserole dish let congeal refrigerator small bowl mix cream cheese sour cream sugar pour mixture congealed salad
Original_text:
Linda'S Strawberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 (3 oz.) pkgs. Strawberry jell-O
- 1 can crushed pineapple with juice
- 1 can strawberry pie filling
- 2 cups hot water
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. Cream cheese
- 1 (8 oz.) container of sour cream
- 1/2 cup sugar

Directions:
- Mix jell-O with hot water.
- Add pineapple with the juice and the pie filling; mix well.
- Place in a 13 x 9 casserole dish.
- Let congeal in refrigerator.
- In a small bowl mix cream cheese, sour cream and sugar.
- Pour this mixture over congealed salad.

salad_info: applesauce salad ingredient pkg raspberry jello c diluted fren orange juice c applesauce crushed pineapple juice direction heat applesauce pan stir gelatin dissolved add orange juice pineapple stir smooth pour mold chill
Original_text:
Applesauce Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 6 oz. pkg. raspberry jello
- 1 3/4 C. diluted frozen orange juice
- 2 C. applesauce
- 1 8 oz. can crushed pineapple with juice

Directions:
- Heat applesauce in pan. Stir in gelatin until dissolved. Add orange juice and pineapple. Stir until smooth. Pour into mold and chill.

salad_info: broccoli salad ingredient c raw chopped broccoli tbsp chopped onion slice cooked crumbled bacon c raisin direction combine ingredient mix sauce
Original_text:
Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 c. raw chopped broccoli
- 2 Tbsp. chopped onion
- 12 slices cooked, crumbled bacon
- 1/2 to 1 c. raisins

Directions:
- Combine ingredients and mix with sauce.

salad_info: potato salad ingredient red bliss potato c mayonnaise tbsp vinegar tbsp sugar medium onion salt pepper taste direction boil potato jacket done peel still hot let cool slice thin round slice mix mayonnaise vinegar sugar grate onion add salt pepper mix chill thoroughly hour
Original_text:
Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 4 lb. Red Bliss potatoes
- 1 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 3 Tbsp. vinegar
- 1 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 medium onion
- salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- Boil potatoes in their jackets until done.
- Peel while still hot; let cool.
- Slice in thin round slices.
- Mix in mayonnaise, vinegar and sugar.
- Grate onion and add with salt and pepper.
- Mix again.
- Chill thoroughly for 3 hours.

salad_info: fren waldorf salad ingredient egg beaten c sugar pineapple tidbit drained c celery diced c chopped apple c seedless grape cut half c chopped walnut pecan cool whip c pineapple juice tsp salt direction place egg pineapple juice sugar salt saucepan blend cook boil cool
Original_text:
Frozen Waldorf Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 eggs, beaten
- 3/4 c. sugar
- 1 (20 oz.) pineapple tidbits, drained
- 3/4 c. celery, diced
- 2 1/2 c. chopped apples (leave some skin for color)
- 1 1/2 c. seedless grapes, cut in half
- 1/2 c. or more chopped walnut or pecans
- 1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip
- 3/4 c. pineapple juice
- 3/4 tsp. salt

Directions:
- Place the eggs, pineapple juice, sugar and salt in a saucepan and blend and cook until it boils.
- Cool.

salad_info: tomato shrimp aspic ingredient envelope knox gelatine c cold water c sugar tsp salt c lemon juice c hot tomato juice drained shrimp c diced celery c finely cut onion c chopped olive direction sprinkle gelatine cold water stir sugar salt lemon juice hot tomato juice dissolved add shrimp celery onion olive pour mold leave overnight ready serve set hot water second unmold platter arrange salad green around outside serve side dish salad dressing
Original_text:
Tomato Shrimp Aspic

Ingredients:
- 2 envelopes Knox gelatine
- 1 c. cold water
- 1/3 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/4 c. lemon juice
- 2 c. hot tomato juice
- 1 can (small) drained shrimp
- 1/2 c. diced celery
- 1/4 c. finely cut onion
- 1/4 c. chopped olives

Directions:
- Sprinkle gelatine over cold water.
- Stir in sugar, salt, lemon juice and hot tomato juice until it's dissolved.
- Add shrimp, celery, onion and olives.
- Pour into mold and leave overnight. When ready to serve, set in hot water for a few seconds and unmold on platter. Arrange salad greens around outside and serve with side dish of salad dressing.

salad_info: potato salad ingredient potato cubed tsp pepper small onion chopped c mayonnaise tsp salt c green pepper chopped c chopped pimento c celery chopped c mayonnaise tbsp vinegar direction cut potato small cube boil tender drain add onion salt pepper combine vinegar cup mayonnaise tablespoon hot water add mixture warm potato let cool add green pepper pimento celery cup mayonnaise potato mixture mix well chill
Original_text:
Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 8 potatoes, cubed
- 1/8 tsp. pepper
- 1 small onion, chopped
- 1/3 c. mayonnaise
- 2 tsp. salt
- 1/2 c. green pepper, chopped
- 1/4 c. chopped pimento
- 1/2 c. celery, chopped
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. vinegar

Directions:
- Cut potatoes into small cubes and boil until just tender. Drain and add onion, salt and pepper.
- Combine vinegar, 1/3 cup mayonnaise and 2 tablespoons of hot water.
- Add mixture to warm potatoes and let cool.
- Add green peppers, pimento, celery and the other 1/2 cup mayonnaise to potato mixture and mix well.
- Chill.

salad_info: shoe peg salad ingredient shoe peg corn frenchcut green bean garden pea small jar pimiento c celery tsp salt c vinegar c oil medium onion chopped c bell pepper diced tsp pepper c sugar tbsp water direction rinse drain corn green bean garden pea bring boil vinegar sugar oil water salt pepper cool mix corn pea bean rest ingredient refrigerate
Original_text:
Shoe Peg Salad
