- 1 can Shoe Peg corn
- 1 can French-cut green beans
- 1 can garden peas
- 1 small jar pimiento
- 1 c. celery
- 1 tsp. salt
- 3/4 c. vinegar
- 1/2 c. oil
- 1 medium onion, chopped
- 1 c. bell pepper, diced
- 1 tsp. pepper
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 Tbsp. water

Directions:
- Rinse and drain the corn, green beans and garden peas.
- Bring to boil vinegar, sugar, oil, water, salt and pepper.
- Cool.
- Mix with corn, peas and beans and rest of the ingredients. Refrigerate.

salad_info: marinated mushroom ingredient fresh mushroom c cider vinegar c salad oil tsp salt clove garlic bay leaf small onion sliced direction parboil mushroom mix ingredient except onion pour parboiled mushroom onion let stand several day
Original_text:
Marinated Mushrooms

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. fresh mushrooms
- 1/2 c. cider vinegar
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 clove garlic
- 1 bay leaf
- 2 small onions, sliced

Directions:
- Parboil mushrooms.
- Mix other ingredients except onions.
- Pour over parboiled mushrooms and onions.
- Let stand several days (stir occasionally).

salad_info: cauliflower salad ingredient pkg fren pea medium head cauliflower stalk celery sliced small onion chopped c hellmanns mayonnaise tsp seasoned salt tbsp milk direction cook pea according package direction drain pea cool break apart cauliflower slice thin combine cauliflower pea add celery onion mix together mayonnaise salt milk mix cauliflower mixture marinate refrigerator hour
Original_text:
Cauliflower Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. frozen peas
- 1 medium head cauliflower
- 3 stalks celery, sliced
- 1 small onion, chopped
- 1 c. Hellmann's mayonnaise
- 1/2 tsp. seasoned salt
- 3 to 4 Tbsp. milk

Directions:
- Cook peas according to package directions; drain. While peas cool, break apart cauliflower and slice thin. Combine cauliflower and peas; add celery and onion. Mix together mayonnaise, salt and milk. Mix with the cauliflower mixture. Marinate in refrigerator 6 hours.

salad_info: brandied fruit salad ingredient c sugar c water tsp salt tbsp grated orange peel c brandy strawberry banana orange pineapple kiwi direction good served main meal andor dessert
Original_text:
Brandied Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. sugar
- 1/2 c. water
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1 Tbsp. grated orange peel
- 1/4 c. brandy
- strawberries
- 3 bananas
- oranges
- pineapple
- 2 kiwi

Directions:
- This is good served with the main meal and/or as a dessert.

salad_info: rosamarina salad hawaiian macaroni salad ingredient rosamarina macaroni c sugar egg lightly beaten tbsp flour tsp salt large can pineapple chunk tidbit small can mandarin orange large jar maraschino cherry bag miniature marshmallow fren whipped topping thawed direction rub wooden bowl garlic mix dressing right bowl use variety fresh torn green lettuce escarole spinach endive watercress toss well every leaf coated dressing
Original_text:
Rosamarina Salad (Or) Hawaiian Macaroni Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. rosamarina macaroni (also called orzo)
- 3/4 c. sugar
- 2 eggs, lightly beaten
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. flour
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 2 large cans pineapple chunks or tidbits (not crushed)
- 2 small cans mandarin oranges
- 1 large jar maraschino cherries
- 1 bag miniature marshmallows
- 1 (16 oz.) frozen whipped topping, thawed

Directions:
- Rub a wooden bowl with garlic and mix the dressing right in the bowl.
- Use a variety of fresh torn greens such as lettuce, escarole, spinach, endive and watercress.
- Toss well until every leaf is coated with the dressing.

salad_info: garlicmayonnaise potato salad ingredient potato c mayonnaise small onion cilantro tsp garlic powder salt pepper taste direction boil potato fork go mash let cool cut inch square whip mayonnaise chopped onion cilantro garlic powder salt pepper stir potato mix well coat maybe eaten cold warm
Original_text:
Garlic-Mayonnaise Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 5 to 10 lb. potatoes
- 3 c. mayonnaise
- 1 small onion
- cilantro (fresh or flakes)
- 1 tsp. garlic powder
- salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- Boil potatoes until fork goes through, but not mashes.
- Let cool.
- Cut up into 1-inch squares.
- Whip up mayonnaise, chopped onion, cilantro (use less if using fresh), garlic powder, salt and pepper.
- Stir in potatoes and mix well to coat.
- Maybe eaten cold or warm.

Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 qt. cranberries or 4 c.
- 2 c. sugar
- juice of 4 oranges or 4 c. canned orange juice
- 1 pkg. raspberry Jell-O
- 1 pkg. orange Jell-O

Directions:
- Chop cranberries in processor or food chopper.
- Pour 2 cups sugar over cranberries.
- Add the raspberry and orange Jell-O to juice.
- Add to cranberries.
- Mold in pans.

Original_text:
Rancher'S Sunday Chicken

Ingredients:
- 3 lb. fryer chicken parts
- 1 c. prepared Hidden Valley Ranch Original salad dressing
- 4 c. cracker or bread crumbs
- salt
- pepper
- paprika

Directions:
- Wash and dry chicken pieces.
- Dip into prepared salad dressing.
- Spoon crumbs over the dressing to cover.
- Place in foil lined pan.
- Sprinkle with salt, pepper and paprika to taste. Bake uncovered at 375° for 1 1/4 hours.

Pistachio Salad

- Fold in one large container Cool Whip.

Original_text:
Pretzel Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. crushed pretzels
- 1 stick butter, melted
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. Philadelphia cream cheese
- 1 (8 oz.) carton Cool Whip
- 1/2 c. sugar

Directions:
- Mix together pretzels, butter and 1/2 cup sugar and put in 5 or 6 cup bowl.
- Cool.
- Mix cream cheese and sugar.
- Fold in Cool Whip. Mix. Pour over pretzels.
- Cool.

Original_text:
Chicken Vegetable Pasta Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. corkscrew pasta, cooked and drained
- 1 1/2 c. cooked chicken, that has been cubed
- 1/2 c. sliced ripe olives
- 1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese

- 4 to 5 c. assorted cooked or raw vegetables (such as zucchini, bell peppers, green onions, cherry tomatoes, broccoli, etc.)

Directions:
- Toss all ingredients in a bowl.
- Chill until ready to serve.

Original_text:
Spaghetti Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. spaghetti
- 1 red onion
- 1 green pepper
- 2 cans tomatoes
- 1 (8 oz.) Viva Italian dressing
- 4 Tbsp. Salad Supreme seasoning

Directions:
- Cook spaghetti as directed on box and drain.
- In large bowl, add remaining ingredients with spaghetti.
- Refrigerate.
- Serve cold.

Original_text:
Spinach Dip

Ingredients:
- 1 (8 oz.) carton sour cream
- 1 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing
- 1 (10 oz.) pkg. chopped, frozen spinach
- 1 can water chestnuts, finely chopped
- 1 small shredded carrot
- 1 round loaf pumpernickel bread or Jewish rye bread

Directions:
- Cook the spinach according to box directions.
- Drain well. Mix all other ingredients.
- Hollow the center of the bread so it looks like a bowl.
- Save the bread from the middle.
- Cube into torn bite-size pieces to place around the loaf to use for dip.

Original_text:
Blueberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. grape jello
- 1 can (20 oz.) crushed pineapple
- 1 can blueberry pie filling
- 2 c. boiling water
- 1/2 c. sour cream
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. vanilla
- 1/2 c. chopped pecans

Directions:
- Mix salad well and let congeal.
- Cream sour cream, cream cheese, sugar and vanilla.
- Spread on top of salad.
- Sprinkle top with nuts.

salad_info: dinner party chicken ingredient envelope good season italian salad dressing mix tbsp margarine chicken breast cut piece condensed cream mushroom soup cream cheese c white wine direction melt margarine large skillet add salad dressing mix add chicken brown slowly golden place content skillet baking dish blend soup cream cheese wine smooth spread chicken bake uncovered hour serve rice serf
Original_text:
Dinner Party Chicken

Ingredients:
- 1 envelope Good Seasons Italian salad dressing mix
- 2 Tbsp. margarine
- 4 chicken breasts, cut into 8 pieces
- 1 can condensed cream of mushroom soup
- 4 oz. cream cheese
- 1/3 c. white wine

Directions:
- Melt margarine in large skillet.
- Add salad dressing mix.
- Add chicken and brown slowly until golden.
- Place contents of skillet in baking dish.
- Blend soup (undiluted), cream cheese and wine until smooth.
- Spread over chicken.
- Bake, uncovered, 1 hour at 325°.
- Serve over rice.
- Serves 4 to 6.

salad_info: sawdust salad ingredient pkg strawberry jello c boiling water c cold water small crushed pineapple drained c sugar tsp vanilla tsp flour c unsweetened pineapple juice banana sliced pkg cream cheese softened bag miniature marshmallow envelope dream whip c chopped pecan direction using large serving bowl x inch glass dish prepare jello boiling water cup cold water add drained pineapple chill firm
Original_text:
Sawdust Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. strawberry Jell-O
- 2 c. boiling water
- 1 1/4 c. cold water
- 1 small can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 c. sugar

- 6 tsp. flour

- 3 bananas, sliced
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
- 1/2 (10 oz.) bag miniature marshmallows
- 1 envelope Dream Whip
- 1 c. chopped pecans

Directions:
- Using a large serving bowl or 9 x 13-inch glass dish, prepare the Jell-O with the boiling water and 1 1/4 cups cold water.
- Add the drained pineapple. Chill until firm.

Original_text:
Pimento Cheese Salad

- 1 c. sugar
- 2 c. boiling water
- 2 glasses pimento cheese spread
- 1 small can crushed pineapple, undrained
- 2 pkg. dessert topping mix (Dream Whip)

Directions:
- Dissolve Jell-O and sugar in boiling water. Cool until syrupy and beat in cheese spread and pineapple.
- Let congeal to syrupy stage and fold in prepared dessert topping mix.
- Refrigerate until set.

Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large pkg. orange Jell-O
- 2 c. hot water
- 1 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 c. chopped celery
- 1 pkg. fresh cranberries
- 1 seedless orange
- juice of 2 oranges

Directions:
- Pour hot water over Jell-O.
- When dissolved, add sugar.
- Cut orange in pieces with peelings and put in blender with cranberries and orange juice.
- Blend.
- Combine all ingredients and chill in refrigerator overnight.

Original_text:
Spicy Bean Salsa With Tortilla Chips

Ingredients:
- 1 (15 1/2 oz.) can black-eyed peas, drained
- 1 (15 oz.) can black beans, drained
- 1 (15 oz.) can whole kernel corn, drained
- 1/2 c. chopped onions
- 1/2 c. chopped green pepper
- 1/2 c. finely chopped jalapeno peppers
- 1 (14 1/2 oz.) can fresh-cut diced tomatoes (undrained)
- 1/2 tsp. garlic salt
- 1 (8 oz.) bottle Italian salad dressing

Directions:
- In a large bowl, combine all ingredients except tortilla chips; mix well. Cover and refrigerate several hours or overnight to blend flavors. Serve with tortilla chips as an appetizer. May also serve as a side dish. Makes 12 servings.

Original_text:
Watergate Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large container Cool Whip
- 1 can chunk pineapple
- 1 can fruit cocktail
- 2 pkg. pistachio instant pudding and pie filling

Directions:
- Beat pudding mix with juices you drain off fruit.
- Mix in fruit and Cool Whip.
- Refrigerate.

Original_text:
Layered Vegetable Salad

- 6 c. chopped lettuce
- 1 c. chopped red cabbage
- 2 c. chopped tomatoes
- 1 large can water chestnuts, sliced
- 1 large green pepper, sliced
- 1 large red onion, sliced
- cauliflower (pull apart)
- broccoli (pull apart)
- 1 can sweet peas

Directions:
- Place lettuce in a 3-quart glass dish. Top lettuce with tomatoes (make layers). Next green pepper, red cabbage, water chestnuts, broccoli, red onion, cauliflower.
- Just arrange it colorfully.
- Use your favorite salad dressing.
- Creamy Italian is great.

Original_text:
Tortellini Salad(Great For A Crowd!)  

Ingredients:
- 2 pkg. tortellini, cooked, drained and cooled
- 3 cloves garlic, crushed
- 1 red onion, diced
- 1 white onion, diced
- 1 red pepper, diced
- 1 green pepper, diced
- 3 stalks celery, chopped
- 1 large jar artichoke hearts
- 1 large can black olives
- 1 can garbanzo beans
- 1 can kidney beans
- 3/4 c. red wine vinegar
- 1 c. olive oil
- 1 bottle Italian dressing

Directions:
- Add all ingredients.
- Toss and marinate at least 2 hours.
- Add avocado or mushrooms if you like.

salad_info: german potato salad ingredient slice bacon small bermuda onion chopped tbsp flour c white vinegar c water c sugar tsp salt dash pepper c sliced cooked potato direction boil red potato skin peel cooked set aside fry bacon crisp drain paper towel reserve tablespoon dripping bacon grease crumble bacon saute onion bacon grease tender blend flour slowly stir vinegar water cook mixture boil becomes thicker add sugar salt pepper simmer minute
Original_text:
German Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 5 slices bacon
- 1 small Bermuda onion, chopped
- 2 Tbsp. flour
- 2/3 c. white vinegar
- 1 1/3 c. water
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. salt
- dash of pepper
- 6 c. sliced, cooked potatoes

Directions:
- Boil red potatoes with skins on.
- Peel after cooked and set aside.
- Fry bacon until crisp.
- Drain on paper towel.
- Reserve 2 to 3 tablespoons drippings of bacon grease.
- Crumble the bacon. Saute onion in bacon grease until tender.
- Blend in flour slowly, then stir in vinegar and water.
- Cook until mixture boils and becomes thicker.
- Add sugar, salt and pepper; simmer 10 minutes.

Cottage Cheese Salad Ring

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. carton cottage cheese
- 1 small pkg. lime-flavored gelatin
- 1 c. hot water
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 c. celery, diced
- 1 c. green pepper, diced

Directions:
- Dissolve gelatin in hot water.
- Chill until partially set. Blend in mayonnaise.
- Fold in celery, green pepper and cottage cheese.
- Pour into a 4-cup ring mold.
- Chill until firm.
- Unmold on lettuce.

- 1 (13 1/2 oz.) Cool Whip

Directions:
- Mix all together and let stand overnight before serving.

Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 small cans crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 can Ocean Spray cranberry sauce (with whole berries)
- 1 c. chopped pecans
- 1 large box cherry Jell-O
- 2 chopped apples

Directions:
- Mix Jell-O according to package directions, then add remaining ingredients. Pour into Jell-O mold or bowl and chill until set.

Frozen Fruit Salad

Ingredients:

- 1 can apricots, drained and chopped

- Soak gelatin in 1/2 cup cold water for five minutes.

Original_text:
Pistachio Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small box instant pistachio pudding
- 1 large can crushed pineapple (undrained)
- 1 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 (12 oz.) carton Cool Whip
- 1/2 c. nuts

Directions:
- Combine dry pudding mix, pineapple and juice.
- Fold in marshmallows and nuts.
- Fold in Cool Whip.
- Refrigerate overnight.

Great Vegetable Salad

Ingredients:

Original_text:
French Roll Pizzas(Snack Or Meal)  

Ingredients:
- 1 (9 oz.) block Cheddar cheese or preferred cheese
- 1 large can mushrooms
- 1 large can tomato sauce
- 2 cans sliced olives
- 1 chopped onion
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- sourdough bread rolls, cut in half the longway

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together and let sit to blend.
- Spread on sourdough bread halves.
- Bake in oven at 325° until cheese is melted and bread is crispy.

Original_text:
Jello Pineapple Cottage Cheese Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (3 oz.) lemon jello
- 1 c. boiling water
- 1 c. pineapple juice
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 1/2 c. crushed pineapple
- 1 1/2 c. cottage cheese
- mayonnaise
- lettuce

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in boiling water.
- Drain pineapple and reserve juice.
- Add pineapple juice, lemon juice and sugar to jello. Stir.
- Chill until thick, but not firm.
- Fold in crushed pineapple and cottage cheese.
- Pour into bowl and chill until set.
- Unmold onto lettuce.
- Dot with mayonnaise.

- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese

- 1 c. chopped pecans

Directions:
- Mix
- jello in boiling water;
- add blueberry pie filling and pineapple.
- Cover and refrigerate overnight.

Original_text:
Cornbread Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pan cornbread, baked, cooled and crumbled
- green onions
- celery
- radishes
- 1 green pepper
- 1 cucumber, seeds removed

Directions:
- Chop vegetables fine and add to crumbled cornbread.
- Toss with 1/2 large bottle buttermilk dressing.
- Store in refrigerator. (Keeps well up to 1 week.)

salad_info: scott potato salad ingredient potato c italian dressing small onion diced hardboiled egg sliced tsp cayenne pepper tsp paprika mayonnaise suit direction peel slice boiled potato pour italian dressing potato allow sit hour pour excess dressing add egg onion spice add mayonnaise desired consistency obtained serve immediately chilled
Original_text:
Scott'S Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 lb. potatoes
- 1 c. Italian dressing
- 1 small onion, diced
- 4 hard-boiled eggs, sliced
- 1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
- 1 tsp. paprika
- mayonnaise to suit

Directions:
- Peel and slice boiled potatoes.
- Pour Italian dressing over potatoes and allow to sit 1 hour.
- Pour off excess dressing and add eggs, onion and spices.
- Add mayonnaise until desired consistency is obtained.
- Serve immediately or chilled.

Original_text:
Pineapple Carrot Salad

Ingredients:
- 2/3 c. pineapple juice
- 2/3 c. water
- 1 small pkg. lemon Jell-O
- 1 (6 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 2/3 c. finely shredded carrots
- 2/3 c. drained crushed pineapple
- 2 Tbsp. vinegar
- 2/3 c. milk

Directions:
- Heat the pineapple juice and water to boiling.
- Stir in the lemon Jell-O until dissolved.
- Cool to room temperature. Meanwhile, mix the cream cheese until light and fluffy.
- Heat milk and add to cheese.
- Mix until well blended.
- Then add carrots, pineapple and vinegar; put the Jell-O mixture into the cheese and mix well.
- Pour into container and chill.

- 2 stalks celery, diced
- 1 small onion, diced
- 4 sprigs parsley, diced
- 1/2 tsp. dill

- salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- Cook, peel and dice potatoes.
- Add diced celery, onion, parsley and dill.
- Add mayonnaise; mix.
- Then add lemon juice and salt and pepper to taste.

Corn Salad

Favorite Muffins

- 1/4 c. salad oil
- 1 1/2 c. Gold Medal flour
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 2 tsp. baking powder
- 1/2 tsp. salt

Directions:
- Heat oven to 400°.
- Grease bottoms and sides of 12 medium muffin tins.
- Beat egg; stir in milk and oil.
- Mix in remaining ingredients just until flour is moistened.
- Batter should be lumpy.
- Fill muffin cups
- 2/3 full.
- Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until golden brown.
- Immediately remove from pan.
- If using self-rising flour, omit baking powder and salt.

salad_info: cranberry salad ingredient crushed pineapple drain save juice pkg lemon jello whole cranberry sauce cool whip cream cheese c pecan piece direction drain pineapple save juice add water make cup liquid heat boiling add jello dissolve cool stir refrigerate partially set mix pineapple cranberry pour dish congeal mix cream cheese cool whip spread top sprinkle pecan piece
Original_text:
7-Up Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (13 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drain and save juice
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon jello
- 1 (1 lb.) can whole cranberry sauce
- 1 (7 oz.) 7-Up
- 1 (10 oz.) Cool Whip
- 1 (8 oz.) cream cheese
- 1/2 c. pecan pieces

Directions:
- Drain pineapple and save juice.
- Add water to make 1 cup liquid.
- Heat to boiling and add jello to dissolve.
- Cool.
- Stir in 7-Up.
- Refrigerate to partially set.
- Mix in pineapple and cranberries.
- Pour into dish to congeal.
- Mix cream cheese and Cool Whip and spread on top.
- Sprinkle with pecan pieces.

salad_info: potato salad ingredient medium potato pkg shredded cheddar cheese fully cooked chopped ham chopped small square fry chopped green onion mayonnaise sour cream direction cut potato would potato salad boil potato drain let potato cool minute large deep serving dish cover slightly bottom layer cooked potato spread light thin layer mayonnaise sour cream half half mixture mayonnaise sour cream mixture top potato sprinkle green pepper cheddar cheese chopped ham sprinkle salt pepper
Original_text:
Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 to 8 medium potatoes
- 1 pkg. shredded Cheddar cheese
- fully cooked chopped ham, chopped into small squares and fry
- 2 to 3 chopped green onions
- mayonnaise or sour cream

Directions:
- Cut up potatoes as you would for potato salad. Boil your potatoes, then drain. Let your potatoes cool 5 to 10 minutes. In a large deep serving dish, cover slightly the bottom with a layer of your cooked potatoes. Then spread a light thin layer of mayonnaise or sour cream or a half and half mixture of mayonnaise and sour cream mixture over the top of your potatoes. Then sprinkle with green peppers, Cheddar cheese and chopped ham. Sprinkle with salt and pepper.

salad_info: easy chicken wine ingredient whole chicken breast cut half c burgundy wine c soy sauce c salad oil tbsp water garlic clove minced tsp powdered ginger tsp oregano leaf crushed tbsp brown sugar direction place chicken breast one layer shallow baking pan mix together ingredient pour sauce chicken cover foil refrigerate spoon sauce chicken couple time
Original_text:
Easy Chicken In Wine

Ingredients:
- 3 or 4 whole chicken breasts, cut in halves
- 1 c. Burgundy wine
- 1/4 c. soy sauce
- 1/4 c. salad oil
- 2 Tbsp. water
- 1 garlic clove, minced
- 1 tsp. powdered ginger
- 1/4 tsp. oregano leaves, crushed
- 1 Tbsp. brown sugar

Directions:
- Place chicken breasts in one layer in a shallow baking pan. Mix together all other ingredients.
- Pour sauce over chicken. Cover with foil. Refrigerate. Spoon sauce over chicken a couple of times.

Original_text:
Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 bunch broccoli (flowerets only)
- 1/2 c. chopped onions
- 1/2 lb. cooked bacon
- 1/2 large (16 oz.) bottle Ranch dressing

Directions:
- Chop washed broccoli and drain on paper towels.
- Add onions. Crumble bacon.
- Reserve 1/4 cup and add to broccoli.
- Add Ranch dressing and mix well.
- Top with remaining bacon bits.

Ingredients:
- 1 medium head cauliflower
- 3 celery stalks, finely sliced
- 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas, slightly cooked
- 1 onion, grated
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. pepper

Directions:
- Trim and wash cauliflower and break into small flowerets. Combine all ingredients.
- Toss lightly and chill well.

salad_info: strawberry salad ingredient small pkg strawberry jello c boiling water small pkg fren strawberry banana chopped c crushed pineapple small container cool whip c chopped nut direction dissolve jello boiling water add strawberry stir thawed add banana nut pour mixture long dish put refrigerator firm combine pineapple cool whip spread layer top remaining mixture refrigerate firm
Original_text:
Strawberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 small pkg. strawberry jello
- 2 1/2 c. boiling water
- 1 small pkg. frozen strawberries
- 2 bananas, chopped
- 1/2 c. crushed pineapple
- 1 small container Cool Whip
- 1/2 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in boiling water.
- Add strawberries and stir until thawed.
- Add bananas and nuts.
- Pour 1/2 mixture into long dish and put in refrigerator until firm.
- Combine pineapple and Cool Whip and spread on layer.
- Top with remaining mixture. Refrigerate until firm.

Original_text:
Budget Cake

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. sugar
- 1 small can coconut
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 2 1/2 tsp. cinnamon
- 2 c. flour
- 1 1/4 c. salad oil
- 1 small can crushed pineapple, drained slightly
- 4 eggs

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients in mixer and beat until mixed well, approximately 2 minutes.
- Pour into two 9-inch cake pans that have been greased and floured.
- Bake at 325° for 35 minutes. Cool before icing with cream cheese frosting.

salad_info: pumpkin loaf ingredient c flour tsp baking soda tsp cinnamon tsp nutmeg tsp ground clove tsp baking powder c salad oil c sugar egg pumpkin tsp salt direction preheat oven grease two x inch loaf pan mix dry ingredient thoroughly add remaining ingredient mix blended turn batter pan bake hour toothpick inserted center come clean clean pan minute remove pan cool completely
Original_text:
Pumpkin Loaves

Ingredients:
- 3 c. flour
- 2 tsp. baking soda
- 1 tsp. cinnamon
- 1 tsp. nutmeg
- 1 tsp. ground cloves
- 1/2 tsp. baking powder
- 2/3 c. salad oil
- 2 c. sugar
- 3 eggs
- 1 (16 oz.) can pumpkin (2 c.)
- 1 tsp. salt

Directions:
- Preheat oven to 350°.
- Grease two 9 x 5-inch loaf pans.
- Mix all dry ingredients thoroughly.
- Add remaining ingredients and mix just until blended.
- Turn batter into pans.
- Bake about 1 hour or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
- Clean in pans 10 minutes; remove from pans and cool completely.

salad_info: fren fruit salad ingredient large crushed pineapple drained cream cheese fren strawberry c chopped nut banana cool whip c sugar c mini marshmallow direction mix ingredient together cover freeze serve fren keep well refrigerator
Original_text:
Frozen Fruit Salad No. 1

Ingredients:
- 1 large can crushed pineapple, drained
- 8 oz. cream cheese
- 10 oz. frozen strawberries
- 1 c. chopped nuts
- 1 banana
- 8 oz. Cool Whip
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 c. mini marshmallows

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together.
- Cover and freeze.
- Serve frozen.

salad_info: hot pineapple salad ingredient large can chunk pineapple drained well c sugar tbsp flour tbsp pineapple juice c grated sharp cheese c ritz cracker stick oleo melted direction mix together first ingredient place x inch pan top finely crushed cracker melted oleo bake cheese melt mixture bubbly serve warm
Original_text:
Hot Pineapple Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 large cans chunk pineapple, drained well
- 1 1/4 c. sugar
- 6 Tbsp. flour
- 8 Tbsp. pineapple juice
- 1 1/2 c. grated sharp cheese
- 1 1/2 c. Ritz crackers
- 1/2 stick oleo, melted

Directions:
- Mix together first 5 ingredients.
- Place in 9 x 13-inch pan. Top with finely crushed crackers and melted oleo.
- Bake at 375° until cheese melts and mixture is bubbly.
- Serve warm.

Original_text:
Layered Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head lettuce, broken in bite size pieces
- 1 bunch celery, chopped
- 1 medium onion, chopped
- 4 hard-boiled eggs, chopped
- 1 bell pepper, sliced
- 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen sweet peas
- 1 pt. jar mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- grated cheese (Cheddar)
- 1 jar Hormel real bacon bits

Directions:
- Mix together the mayonnaise and sugar in a small bowl and set aside.
- Layer the first 6 items in order listed, then spread mayonnaise mixture over top, sealing edges.
- Sprinkle cheese and bacon bits over the top.
- Refrigerate and let sit overnight.

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Cover and chill. Store in refrigerator.

Original_text:
Cucumber And Green Onion Dip

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. cream cheese
- 1 tsp. salad dressing
- 1 tsp. white vinegar

Directions:
- Wash and dry cucumber and onions.
- Chop very fine.

Directions:
- In a large bowl, add pineapple (with juice) and pudding; mix well.

Original_text:
Artichoke Pasta Salad

Ingredients:

- 1 (6 oz.) can black olives, drained
- 1 (6 oz.) jar marinated artichoke hearts, cut in half
- 1 1/2 c. celery, diced

- Combine all ingredients and mix well.

Original_text:
Salad Dressing

Ingredients:
- 3 eggs, well beaten
- 2 Tbsp. water
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 3 Tbsp. vinegar

Directions:
- Cook all ingredients on low heat.
- Stir constantly to prevent sticking until thickened.
- Remove from stove.
- Add lump of butter. Cool; ready for use.

Original_text:
German Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 5 lb. salad potatoes
- 1 lb. bacon, cut in small pieces
- 3 heaping Tbsp. flour
- 1/2 c. vinegar (white)
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 c. water
- salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- Boil potatoes; skin and slice into pieces.
- Fry bacon; drain off all fat.
- Sprinkle flour over bacon; mix it up.
- Pour vinegar, sugar and water over bacon.
- Simmer until thick.
- Pour over potatoes; mix well.
- Serve warm.

Original_text:
Macaroni Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. chopped celery
- 1 green pepper, chopped
- 1/2 c. chopped sweet pickle
- 4 hard-boiled eggs, chopped
- 6 c. cooked macaroni, chilled
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1/2 c. buttermilk
- 1/2 tsp. prepared mustard
- salt and pepper

Directions:
- Combine eggs, celery, green pepper, pickles and chilled macaroni.
- Blend mayonnaise, buttermilk and mustard.
- Fold into macaroni mixture.
- Season with salt and pepper.

- 1 lb. ground beef
- 1 lb. can pork and beans
- 1 lb. can spaghetti in tomato sauce
- 1 tsp. mustard
- 1/4 tsp. pepper
- 1 large onion, chopped
- 1/2 c. ketchup
- 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce

Directions:
- Combine meat, onion and pepper in skillet and brown; drain off grease.
- Add other ingredients.
- Put in a covered 1 1/2-quart casserole dish.
- Bake at 350° for 40 minutes.
- This is a delicious meal with bread and a salad!
- So easy!

- 1 1/2 tsp. poppy seed
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1/8 tsp. ground nutmeg

Directions:
- Beat all above together at medium speed.
- Constantly continue beating while gradually adding 1/4 cup salad oil.
- Cover and chill.
- If it becomes too thick, let stand at room temperature. Use over fresh fruit and walnuts.

- Mix all together.

- Mix all of the ingredients. Let congeal.

Original_text:
Baked Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. crushed potato chips
- 2/3 c. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
- 4 c. chopped, cooked chicken
- 2 c. chopped celery
- 2 Tbsp. chopped onion
- 1/2 c. slivered almonds

- 3/4 c. mayonnaise

- Stir all ingredients together, chill; serve.

Original_text:
Appetizer Oyster Crackers

salad_info: marinated roast cookout ingredient tablespoon dried minced garlic teaspoon black pepper teaspoon ground clove cup red wine vinegar cup salad oil pound sirloin tip roast direction mix first ingredient pour roast glass dish let marinate hour room temperature overnight refrigerator plus two hour room temperature cook desired doneness outdoor grill hour rare hour medium hour well done serf
Original_text:
Marinated Roast Cookout

Ingredients:
- 1 tablespoon dried minced garlic
- 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
- 1/2 teaspoon ground cloves
- 1/2 cup red wine vinegar
- 1/2 cup salad oil

- Mix all together.

salad_info: oven french fry ingredient large potato tbsp salad oil salt pepper paprika direction slice potato half slice half thick crescentshaped piece chill sliced potato minute ice cold water crisp preheat oven drain potato well toss lightly oil spray baking pan pam arrange slice single layer bake minute turning occasionally season serve make serving
Original_text:
Oven French Fries(Dietetic)  

Ingredients:
- 2 large potatoes
- 1 Tbsp. salad oil
- salt, pepper and paprika

Directions:
- Slice potatoes in half and then slice each half into 8 thick crescent-shaped pieces.
- Chill sliced potatoes 10 minutes (or longer) in ice cold water to crisp them.
- Preheat oven to 475°. Drain potatoes well.
- Toss lightly with oil.
- Spray a baking pan with Pam.
- Arrange the slices in a single layer.
- Bake 25 minutes turning occasionally.
- Season and serve.
- Makes 4 (75 calorie) servings.

salad_info: congealed salad ingredient medium size container cottage cheese c serving size orange jello cool whip small crushed pineapple drained mandarin orange slice drained direction mix ingredient together chill refrigerator couple hour
Original_text:
Congealed Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 medium size container cottage cheese
- 4 1/2 c. serving size orange jello
- 1 (9 oz.) Cool Whip
- 1 small can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 can mandarin orange slices, drained

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together.
- Chill in refrigerator for a couple of hours.

salad_info: cranberry salad ingredient c sugar c water pkg fresh cranberry pkg cherry jello c hot water c crushed pineapple drained c celery fine chopped c chopped nut direction cook sugar water add cranberry simmer minute dissolve jello hot water add cranberry mixture pineapple chill slightly fold celery nut put cup mold x inch square dish
Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 c. water
- 1 pkg. fresh cranberries
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. cherry Jell-O
- 1 c. hot water
- 1 c. crushed pineapple, drained
- 1/2 c. celery, fine chopped
- 1/2 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Cook sugar and water.
- Add cranberries.
- Simmer for 10 minutes.
- Dissolve Jell-O in hot water, then add cranberry mixture and pineapple and chill slightly.
- Fold in celery and nuts.
- Put in 5-cup mold or 9 x 9-inch square dish.

salad_info: pineapple orange salad ingredient pkg orange jello crushed pineapple can mandarin orange pt whipped cream nut direction mix jello according direction add pineapple orange chill set top whipped cream sprinkle nut top
Original_text:
Pineapple Orange Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 pkg. orange jello
- 1 can crushed pineapple
- 2 cans mandarin oranges
- 1 pt. whipped cream
- nuts

Directions:
- Mix jello according to directions. Add pineapple and oranges (drain both).
- Chill until set.
- Top with whipped cream.
- Sprinkle nuts on top.

salad_info: broccoli salad ingredient bunch broccoli cut small piece bacon fried crispy broken small piece walnut small onion sliced thin salt pepper taste c mayonnaise c sugar c wine vinegar direction combine broccoli bacon walnut onion salt pepper taste blend mayonnaise sugar wine vinegar pour broccoli mixture stir piece coated
Original_text:
Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 bunch broccoli, cut into small pieces
- 1/2 lb. bacon, fried crispy and broken into small pieces
- walnuts (if desired)
- 1 small onion, sliced very thin
- salt and pepper to taste
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1/4 c. wine vinegar

Directions:
- Combine the broccoli, bacon, walnuts (if desired), onion, salt and pepper to taste.
- Blend the mayonnaise, sugar and wine vinegar.
- Pour over the broccoli mixture. Stir until all pieces are coated.

salad_info: buttermilk salad ingredient large pkg peach gelatin large crushed pineapple c buttermilk large cool whip direction heat pineapple juice hot boiling remove heat add dry gelatin mix well stir buttermilk fold cool whip place x dish refrigerate set congealed
Original_text:
Buttermilk Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large pkg. peach gelatin
- 1 large can crushed pineapple
- 2 c. buttermilk
- 1 large (13 oz.) Cool Whip

Directions:
- Heat pineapple and juice until hot; but not boiling. Remove from heat and add dry gelatin. Mix well. Stir in buttermilk and fold in Cool Whip. Place in 13 x 9 dish and refrigerate until set, congealed.

salad_info: cup salad ingredient c shredded coconut c miniature marshmallow c sour cream drained pineapple tidbit c drained mandarin orange direction mix refrigerate several hour overnight
Original_text:
5-Cup Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. shredded coconut
- 1 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 c. sour cream (8 oz.)
- 1 can drained pineapple tidbits
- 1 c. drained mandarin oranges

Directions:
- Mix and refrigerate for several hours or overnight.

salad_info: frosted cranberry salad ingredient crushed pineapple pkg lemon jello bottle ginger ale cranberry sauce pkg dream whip make per instruction box pkg cream cheese room temperature c chopped nut direction drain pineapple reserve juice make one cup water heat boiling dissolve jello hot liquid gently stir ginger ale chill partially set mix pineapple cranberry sauce fold jello turn x x inch dish chill firm mix cream cheese whipped topping spread jello sprinkle nut top
Original_text:
Frosted Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (13 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon jello
- 1 (7 oz.) bottle ginger ale
- 1 can cranberry sauce
- 1 (2 oz.) pkg. Dream Whip, make per instructions on box
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, room temperature
- 1/2 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Drain pineapple.
- Reserve juice and make up to one cup with water.
- Heat to boiling; dissolve jello in hot liquid.
- Gently stir in ginger ale; chill until partially set.
- Mix pineapple and the cranberry sauce; fold into jello.
- Turn into 9 x 9 x 2-inch dish and chill until firm.
- Mix cream cheese and whipped topping; spread over jello and sprinkle nuts on top.

salad_info: apple salad ingredient large delicious apple c seedless red grape c seedless green grape c miniature marshmallow c peanut butter banana c walnut c mayonnaise tbsp sugar direction dice apple cut grape half slice banana mix together stir marshmallow walnut sugar peanut butter mayonnaise make delicious summer salad
Original_text:
Apple Salad

Ingredients:
- 5 large Delicious apples
- 1 c. seedless red grapes
- 1 c. seedless green grapes
- 1 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1/4 c. peanut butter
- 3 bananas
- 3/4 c. walnuts
- 3/4 c. mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. sugar

Directions:
- Dice apples, cut grapes in half and slice bananas.
- Mix together; stir in marshmallows, walnuts, sugar, peanut butter and mayonnaise.
- Makes a delicious summer salad.

salad_info: old timey potato salad ingredient medium potato tsp salt egg medium onion minced tbsp mayonnaise pinch sugar tbsp vinegar salt pepper direction take irish potato peel wash chop small put small amount salt water boil cook real tender drain water break egg hot potato mash real good hot potato cook egg add onion mayonnaise sugar vinegar salt black pepper stir real good taste see flavored suit taste
Original_text:
Old Timey Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 5 medium potatoes
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1 or 2 eggs
- 1 medium onion, minced
- 2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
- pinch of sugar
- 2 Tbsp. vinegar
- salt and pepper

Directions:
- Take Irish potatoes.
- Peel and wash and chop small.
- Put a small amount of salt in the water you boil them in.
- Cook until real tender.
- Drain water off and break eggs in the hot potatoes. Mash real good, the hot potatoes will cook the eggs.
- Add onion (chopped fine), mayonnaise, sugar, vinegar, salt and black pepper. Stir all this up real good and taste to see if it's flavored to suit your taste.

salad_info: taco dip ingredient philadelphia cream cheese jar chichi salsa direction mix together smooth small platter something flat break lettuce small chop tomato small sprinkle shredded cheese top dip fritos chip dip scoop salad good
Original_text:
Taco Dip

Ingredients:
- 8 oz. Philadelphia cream cheese
- 1/2 jar Chi-Chi's salsa

Directions:
- Mix both together until smooth.
- On a small platter or something flat, break up lettuce small; chop tomatoes small and sprinkle shredded cheese on top.
- Dip Fritos chips into dip, then scoop up salad.
- Good!

salad_info: chicken salad casserole ingredient can cream chicken soup tbsp chopped onion c mayonnaise tbsp lemon juice c cubed cooked chicken c cooked rice c diced celery hardboiled egg chopped italian style bread crumb salt pepper direction mix together soup onion mayonnaise lemon juice add chicken rice celery egg toss lightly put mixture x inch baking dish top bread crumb bake minute
Original_text:
Chicken Salad Casserole

Ingredients:
- 2 cans cream of chicken soup
- 2 Tbsp. chopped onion
- 3/4 c. mayonnaise
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 4 c. cubed, cooked chicken
- 2 c. cooked rice
- 1 1/2 c. diced celery
- 4 hard-boiled eggs, chopped
- Italian style bread crumbs
- salt and pepper (if desired)

Directions:
- Mix together soup, onion, mayonnaise and lemon juice.
- Add chicken, rice, celery and eggs; toss lightly.
- Put mixture in 9 x 13-inch baking dish; top with bread crumbs.
- Bake for 40 minutes at 350°.

salad_info: day slaw ingredient average head cabbage medium onion sliced green pepper chopped c salad oil c vinegar tbsp celery seed tbsp salt c white sugar direction chop shred cabbage add sliced onion chopped green pepper pour white sugar cabbage mixture let stand mixing dressing heat oil vinegar celery seed salt rolling boil pour immediately cabbage store refrigerator keep day
Original_text:
10 Day Slaw

Ingredients:
- 1 average head cabbage
- 2 medium onions, sliced
- 1 green pepper, chopped
- 1 c. salad oil
- 1 c. vinegar
- 2 Tbsp. celery seed
- 2 Tbsp. salt
- 1 c. white sugar

Directions:
- Chop or shred cabbage.
- Add sliced onions and chopped green peppers.
- Pour white sugar over cabbage mixture and let stand while mixing dressing.
- Heat oil, vinegar, celery seed and salt to a rolling boil.
- Pour immediately over cabbage.
- Store in refrigerator.
- Keeps 10 days.

salad_info: spaghetti salad ingredient spaghetti cooked drained medium onion diced medium green pepper diced medium tomato chopped stalk celery chopped bottle italian dressing bottle mccormick salad supreme direction mix ingredient large bowl set night several hour refrigerator eat cold
Original_text:
Spaghetti Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. spaghetti, cooked and drained
- 1 medium onion, diced
- 1 medium green pepper, diced
- 1 medium tomato, chopped
- 3-4 stalks celery, chopped
- 1/2 bottle Italian dressing
- 1/2 bottle McCormick Salad Supreme

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients in large bowl.
- Set over night or for several hours in the refrigerator.
- Eat cold.

salad_info: broccoli raisin salad ingredient fresh broccoli c raisin tbsp onion slice bacon cooked cream cheese tbsp sugar tbsp white vinegar tbsp vegetable oil tbsp mustard clove garlic direction rinse broccoli well cut floweret bitesize piece toss raisin onion crisp bacon piece combine cream cheese remaining ingredient blender pour broccoli mix well serve well chilled
Original_text:
Broccoli Raisin Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. fresh broccoli
- 1/3 c. raisins
- 2 Tbsp. onion
- 2 slices bacon, cooked
- 3 oz. cream cheese
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 2 Tbsp. white vinegar
- 2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
- 1 Tbsp. mustard
- 1 clove garlic

Directions:
- Rinse broccoli well and cut flowerets into bite-size pieces. Toss with raisins, onion and crisp bacon pieces.
- Combine cream cheese and remaining ingredients in blender.
- Pour over broccoli. Mix well.
- Serve well chilled.

salad_info: carrot salad ingredient carrot tomato soup c sugar c vinegar tsp salt tsp pepper tsp dry mustard green pepper finely chopped onion sliced thin separated ring direction slice carrot cook salted water barely tender drain combine soup sugar vinegar seasoning blend well slowly add salad oil beating well mixed add vegetable let set overnight refrigerator
Original_text:
Carrot Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 lb. carrots
- 1 can tomato soup
- 1 c. sugar
- 3/4 c. vinegar
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. pepper
- 1 tsp. dry mustard
- 1 green pepper, finely chopped
- 1 onion, sliced very thin and separated into rings

Directions:
- Slice carrots and cook in salted water only until barely tender.
- (Do not overcook.)
- Drain.
- Combine soup, sugar, vinegar and seasonings; blend well and slowly add salad oil while beating until well mixed.
- Add to vegetables and let set overnight in refrigerator.

salad_info: tuna noodle casserole ingredient medium noodle tuna drained flaked c sliced celery c mayonnaise salad dressing c onion chopped c chopped pepper tsp salt condensed celery soup c shredded sharp american cheese direction cook noodle according direction package drain stir tuna celery mayonnaise onion green pepper salt saucepan combine soup milk heat add cheese heat stir cheese melt add noodle mixture turn quart casserole bake uncovered oven minute make serving
Original_text:
Tuna Noodle Casserole

Ingredients:
- 6 oz. (3 c.) medium noodles
- 1 (6 1/2 or 7 oz.) can tuna, drained and flaked
- 1 c. sliced celery
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
- 1/3 c. onion, chopped
- 1/4 c. chopped pepper
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1 can condensed celery soup
- 1 c. (4 oz.) shredded sharp American cheese

Directions:
- Cook noodles according to directions on package.
- Drain.
- Stir in tuna, celery, mayonnaise, onion, green pepper and salt.
- In saucepan, combine soup and milk; heat through.
- Add cheese.
- Heat and stir until cheese melts.
- Add to noodle mixture.
- Turn into 2-quart casserole.
- Bake, uncovered, in a 425° oven for 20 minutes.
- Makes 6 servings.

salad_info: lowfat potato salad ingredient large potato cooked cooled cubed c celery diced c chopped onion c sliced radish small cucumber diced small green pepper diced c skim milk c kraftfree mayonnaise tbsp yellow mustard tsp salt tsp pepper tsp celery seed direction combine veggie large bowl mix together mayonnaise mustard milk salt pepper celery seed mix smooth pour veggie toss coat chill dressing pale yellow color slightly thin
Original_text:
Low-Fat Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 4 to 6 large potatoes, cooked, cooled and cubed
- 1 c. celery, diced
- 1/2 c. chopped onion
- 1/2 c. sliced radish
- 1 small cucumber, diced
- 1 small green pepper, diced
- 1/2 c. skim milk
- 1 c. Kraft-Free mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. yellow mustard
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. pepper
- 1 tsp. celery seed

Directions:
- Combine veggies in a large bowl.
- Mix together mayonnaise, mustard, milk, salt, pepper and celery seed.
- Mix until smooth. Pour over veggies and toss to coat.
- Chill (overnight is best.) The dressing should be a pale yellow color and slightly thin.

salad_info: quick n hearty mushroom soup ingredient fresh mushroom sliced can mushroom salad oil hamburger whole tomato crushed beef broth soup can water tsp onion powder tsp salt tsp pepper tsp thyme c minute rice direction saute mushroom little oil set aside brown hamburger draining fat add tomato mushroom mix broth water seasoning bring boil reduce heat simmer uncovered minute stir rice cover set aside minute make cup
Original_text:
Quick "N" Hearty Mushroom Soup

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced or 2 cans mushrooms (6 to 8 oz. each)
- salad oil
- 1 lb. hamburger
- 1 can whole tomatoes, crushed
- 1 can (10 3/4 oz. size) beef broth
- 2 soup cans water
- 2 tsp. onion powder
- 1 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/8 tsp. pepper
- 1/2 tsp. thyme
- 1/2 c. Minute rice

Directions:
- Saute mushrooms in a little oil; set aside.
- Brown hamburger, draining off fat.
- Add tomatoes, mushroom mix, broth, water and seasonings.
- Bring to boil.
- Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes.
- Stir in rice and cover.
- Set aside for 5 minutes. Makes 9 cups.

salad_info: cup fruit salad ingredient pkg miniature marshmallow c shredded coconut c sour cream c mandarin orange drained c crushed pineapple drained direction blend ingredient chill serve
Original_text:
5 Cup Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. miniature marshmallows
- 1 c. shredded coconut
- 1 c. sour cream
- 1 c. mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 c. crushed pineapple, drained

Directions:
- Blend all ingredients; chill and serve.

salad_info: dishpan cooky ingredient c brown sugar tsp vanilla egg c white sugar c salad oil c flour tsp baking soda tsp salt c oat c corn flake direction cream together first ingredient add flour soda salt mixture fold oat corn flake bake minute make cooky dishpan full
Original_text:
Dishpan Cookies

Ingredients:
- 2 c. brown sugar
- 2 tsp. vanilla
- 4 eggs
- 2 c. white sugar
- 2 c. salad oil
- 4 c. flour
- 2 tsp. baking soda
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 1/2 c. oats
- 4 c. corn flakes

Directions:
- Cream together first 5 ingredients.
- Add flour, soda and salt to mixture.
- Fold in oats, then corn flakes.
- Bake at 350° for 7 to 8 minutes.
- Makes 100 (2 1/2-inch) cookies.
- "A dishpan full!"

salad_info: mixed fruit salad ingredient c diced pineapple c miniature marshmallow c mandarin orange canned drained c angel flake coconut c sour cream direction mix ingredient together let stand refrigerator
Original_text:
Mixed Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. diced pineapple
- 1 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 c. mandarin oranges, canned and drained
- 1 c. Angel Flake coconut
- 1 c. sour cream

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together.
- Let stand in refrigerator.

salad_info: germanstyle new potato salad ingredient tiny new potato c torn lettuce c torn curly endive hardcooked egg chopped c thinly sliced radish tbsp sliced green onion top slice bacon c vinegar tsp seasoned salt tsp celery seed tsp pepper direction peel strip around center potato cook potato boiling water drain halve large potato bowl combine cooked potato lettuce curly endive egg radish green onion
Original_text:
German-Style New Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. tiny new potatoes
- 2 c. torn lettuce
- 1 c. torn curly endive
- 2 hard-cooked eggs, chopped
- 1/4 c. thinly sliced radishes
- 3 Tbsp. sliced green onion with tops
- 6 slices bacon
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 1 tsp. seasoned salt
- 1/4 tsp. celery seed
- 1/8 tsp. pepper

Directions:
- Peel strip around center of each potato.
- Cook potatoes in boiling water.
- Drain.
- Halve any large potatoes.
- In bowl, combine cooked potatoes, lettuce, curly endive, eggs, radishes and green onion.

salad_info: broccoli salad ingredient bunch fresh broccoli bacon fried crisp c chopped onion pkg shredded cheddar cheese c mayonnaise c sugar tbsp vinegar direction cut broccoli cook mix bacon onion cheese mix together mayo sugar vinegar pour broccoli chill serf
Original_text:
Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 bunches fresh broccoli
- 1 lb. bacon, fried crisp
- 1/2 c. chopped onion
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. shredded Cheddar cheese
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 Tbsp. vinegar

Directions:
- Cut broccoli; do not cook.
- Mix in bacon, onion and cheese. Mix together mayo, sugar and vinegar and pour over broccoli. Chill.
- Serves 6 to 8.

salad_info: cranberry apple salad ingredient pkg cherry flavored gelatin tsp salt c hot water c cranberry sauce c chopped apple c chopped nut direction dissolve gelatin salt hot water break cranberry sauce fork add gelatin mixture chill thickened fold apple nut
Original_text:
Cranberry And Apple Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. cherry flavored gelatin
- 1/8 tsp. salt
- 1 1/4 c. hot water
- 1 1/2 c. cranberry sauce
- 2 c. chopped apples
- 1/2 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Dissolve gelatin and salt in hot water.
- Break up cranberry sauce with fork.
- Add the gelatin mixture; chill until thickened. Fold in apples and nuts.

salad_info: crawfish casserole ingredient pkg yellow rice crawfish tail stick margarine chopped bell pepper cream mushroom soup grated cheese rotel tomato chopped onion direction saute celery bell pepper onion margarine combine tomato steam low fire mix soup cook rice according direction mix rice tomatosoup mixture add grated cheese crawfish bake minute bubbling dont stir enjoy salad french bread serf
Original_text:
Crawfish Casserole

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. yellow rice (1/2 box)
- 1 lb. crawfish tails
- 1 stick margarine
- 1 chopped bell pepper
- 1 can cream of mushroom soup
- 8 oz. grated cheese
- 1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes
- 1 chopped onion

Directions:
- Saute celery, bell pepper and onion in margarine.
- Combine with tomatoes and steam on low fire.
- Mix in soup.
- Cook rice according to directions.
- Mix rice with tomato-soup mixture.
- Add grated cheese and crawfish.
- Bake at 350° about 40 minutes or until bubbling.
- Don't stir.
- Enjoy with salad and French bread. Serves 8.

salad_info: miracle whipup ingredient lean ground beef c miracle whip salad dressing jar favorite spaghetti sauce pkg macaroni cooked c cheddar cheese grated direction brown cook ground beef add salad dressing spaghetti sauce cooked macaroni heat medium heat top grated cheddar cheese serf
Original_text:
Miracle Whip-Up

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. lean ground beef
- 1 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing
- 30 oz. jar of your favorite spaghetti sauce
- 7 oz. pkg. macaroni, cooked
- 1/4 to 1/2 c. Cheddar cheese, grated

Directions:
- Brown and cook the ground beef.
- Add the salad dressing, spaghetti sauce, and cooked macaroni.
- Heat on medium heat.
- Top with grated Cheddar cheese.
- Serves 4 to 6.

salad_info: watergate salad ingredient box pistachio pudding crushed pineapple juice chilled c nut carton cool whip c mini marshmallow direction sprinkle pudding pineapple add ingredient stir together
Original_text:
Watergate Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 box pistachio pudding
- 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple and juice, chilled
- 1/2 c. nuts
- 1 (9 oz.) carton Cool Whip
- 1 1/2 c. mini marshmallows

Directions:
- Sprinkle pudding over pineapple.
- Add other ingredients and stir together.

salad_info: favorite chicken ingredient whole cranberry sauce bottle french salad dressing envelope onion soup mix boneless skinless chicken breast half c hot cooked rice direction preheat oven combine cranberry sauce dressing soup mix small mixing bowl mix well spread half cranberry mixture bottom x inch baking dish arrange chicken single layer prepared layer top remaining cranberry mixture bake minute chicken cooked serve rice yield serving
Original_text:
Favorite Chicken

Ingredients:
- 1 (8 oz.) can whole cranberry sauce
- 1 (8 oz.) bottle French salad dressing
- 1 envelope onion soup mix
- 8 (4 oz.) boneless skinless chicken breast halves
- 4 c. hot cooked rice

Directions:
- Preheat oven to 325°. Combine cranberry sauce, dressing and soup mix in small mixing bowl and mix well. Spread half the cranberry mixture over bottom of 9 x 13-inch baking dish. Arrange chicken in single layer over prepared layer. Top with remaining cranberry mixture. Bake 30 to 45 minutes until chicken is cooked through. Serve over rice. Yield: 8 servings.

salad_info: chicken salad ingredient c cooked chicken c cooked rice bunch green onion c celery chopped box fren baby pea thawed cooked c drained mandarin orange c raisin c cashew peanut direction combine add dressing much desired may much dressing recipe refrigerate overnight
Original_text:
Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. cooked chicken
- 12 c. cooked rice (6 c. wild rice and 6 c. plain rice)
- 2 bunches green onion
- 1 c. celery, chopped
- 1 box frozen baby peas, thawed but not cooked
- 2 c. drained mandarin oranges
- 1 c. raisins
- 1/2 c. cashews or peanuts

Directions:
- Combine all and add dressing as much as desired.
- There may be too much dressing for this recipe.
- Refrigerate overnight.

Original_text:
Snow Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. pecans (broken)
- 26 marshmallows (large)
- 1 large can crushed pineapple
- 1 large pkg. cream cheese
- 4 c. boiling water
- 1 large pkg. lime gelatin

Directions:
- Drop marshmallows in boiling water, dissolve well.
- Add jello and cool.
- Add pineapple to cheese and mix well, then add to cooled gelatin mixture.
- Add whipped cream and nuts, pour into large pan, 8 x 14-inch, chill well and serve.
- May use a large jello mold.

salad_info: polly smith pistachio salad ingredient pkg pistachio pudding c chopped nut c maraschino cherry carton cool whip large crushed pineapple drained c miniature marshmallow direction mix pudding pineapple add remaining ingredient blend everything together refrigerate cold
Original_text:
Polly Smith'S Pistachio Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. pistachio pudding
- 1/2 c. chopped nuts
- 1/2 c. maraschino cherries
- 1 (8 oz.) carton Cool Whip
- 1 large (1 lb.) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 c. miniature marshmallows

Directions:
- Mix the pudding and pineapple.
- Add remaining ingredients and blend everything together.
- Refrigerate until cold.

salad_info: artichoke potato bacon salad fennel flower ingredient artichoke heart new potato slice bacon fried crisp small onion c olive oil fennel flower stalk inch long juice lemon c cider vinegar salt pepper large red yellow green bell pepper direction wash cook potato tender cut onion lengthways quarter cut thinly crosswise soak cold water cut pepper strip x inch long cut artichoke half slice artichoke crosswise inch slice
Original_text:
Artichoke, Potato And Bacon Salad With Fennel Flowers

Ingredients:
- 6 artichoke hearts
- 1 lb. new potatoes
- 6 to 8 slices bacon, fried crisp
- 1 small onion
- 1/4 c. olive oil
- 3 or 4 fennel flowers with stalks 6 to 8-inches long
- juice of 1/2 lemon or 1/2 c. cider vinegar
- salt and pepper
- 1/2 each: large red, yellow and green bell peppers

Directions:
- Wash and cook potatoes just until tender.
- Cut onion lengthways into quarters and cut thinly crosswise.
- Soak in cold water.
- Cut peppers into strips, 1/4 x 1-inch long.
- Cut artichokes in half.
- Slice artichokes crosswise in 1/4-inch slices.

salad_info: hot chicken shrimp crab salad ingredient cooked chicken boned cut pound raw shrimp cooked peeled pound crabmeat cup thinly sliced celery cup cashew teaspoon salt small onion grated cup mayonnaise tablespoon lemon juice cup grated cheese cup crushed potato chip direction combine ingredient except cheese potato chip put casserole combine cheese potato chip sprinkle top bake degree hot minute serf
Original_text:
Hot Chicken, Shrimp Or Crab Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 cooked chicken, boned and cut up or 1 pound raw shrimp, cooked and peeled, or 1 pound crabmeat
- 2 cups thinly sliced celery
- 1/2 cup cashews (optional)
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1 small onion, grated
- 1 cup mayonnaise
- 2 tablespoons lemon juice
- 1/2 cup grated cheese
- 1/2 cup crushed potato chips

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients except cheese and potato chips; put in casserole.
- Combine cheese and potato chips and sprinkle on top. Bake at 350 degrees until hot, 25 to 30 minutes.
- Serves 4 to 6.

Original_text:
Hot Chicken Salad

- 4 c. cooked chicken breasts, shredded
- 4 c. celery, chopped (use only 2 c. if preferred)

- 1/4 c. lemon juice
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 c. mayonnaise

- potato chips (for the top)

Directions:
- Preheat oven to 350°.
- Mix all ingredients, except cheese and chips. Put in a 13 x 9 casserole dish and top with cheese and chips. Bake at 350° for 20 to 25 minutes.

salad_info: broccoli salad ingredient large bunch broccoli c salad dressing c raisin tbsp vinegar tbsp sugar slice bacon fried use whole direction mix together dressing vinegar sugar pour ingredient recipe easily doubled
Original_text:
Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 large bunches broccoli
- 1 c. salad dressing
- 3/4 c. raisins
- 2 Tbsp. vinegar
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 9 slices bacon, fried or use a whole lb.

Directions:
- Mix together dressing, vinegar and sugar.
- Pour over other ingredients.
- Recipe can easily be doubled.

Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 3/4 lb. fresh cranberries, grind and add a little rind
- 1 small orange, grind and add a little rind
- 2 pkg. lemon jello mixed with 2 1/2 c. hot water
- 3/4 c. sugar
- dash of salt
- small can crushed pineapple

Directions:
- Mix together and chill.

salad_info: layer salad ingredient lettuce torn bite size piece medium onion chopped sliced pkg fren green pea uncooked hardboiled egg sliced bacon cooked crumbled c mayonnaise c shredded cheddar cheese direction layer lettuce onion pea egg sprinkle bacon ice top mayonnaise sprinkle top shredded cheese
Original_text:
7 Layer Salad

Ingredients:
- lettuce, torn in bite size pieces
- 1 medium onion, chopped or sliced (purple or green)
- 1 pkg. frozen green peas, uncooked
- 4 hard-boiled eggs, sliced
- 1/2 lb. bacon, cooked and crumbled
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1/2 to 1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese

Directions:
- Layer lettuce, onion, peas and eggs. Sprinkle with bacon.
- Ice top with mayonnaise.
- Sprinkle top with shredded cheese.

salad_info: spinach salad ingredient bag spinach french fried onion ring red onion chopped c cheddar cheese grated boiled egg tomato soup c oil c red wine vinegar tsp dry powder mustard salt pepper taste direction make large salad
Original_text:
Spinach Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 bags spinach
- 1 can French fried onion rings
- 1 red onion, chopped
- 1/2 c. Cheddar cheese, grated
- 3 to 4 boiled eggs
- 1 can tomato soup
- 3/4 c. oil
- 3/4 c. red wine vinegar
- 1 tsp. dry powder mustard
- salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- This makes a very large salad.

salad_info: italian beef ingredient beef rump roast small jar salad pepperoncini tbsp italian spice direction remove string around roast discard place roast roasting pan pour liquid jar pepper roast remove stem pepper discard discard seed chop pepper sprinkle roast place warm oven bedtime early
Original_text:
Italian Beef

Ingredients:
- 3 to 5 lb. beef rump roast
- 1 small jar salad pepperoncini
- 2 Tbsp. Italian spices

Directions:
- Remove string from around roast and discard.
- Place roast in roasting pan.
- Pour liquid from jar of peppers over roast.
- Remove stems from peppers and discard.
- Do not discard seeds.
- Chop peppers and sprinkle over roast.
- Place in warm oven (200°) before bedtime or in early A.M.

salad_info: aunty green bean salad ingredient frenchstyle green bean drained english pea drained sliced onion jar chopped pimento sliced bell pepper c sugar c vinegar c wesson oil direction mix sugar vinegar oil pour vegetable cover place refrigerator salad keep week improves age
Original_text:
Auntie'S Green Bean Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can French-style green beans, drained
- 1 can English peas, drained
- 1 sliced onion (sliced as you would for onion rings)
- 1 jar chopped pimentos
- 1 sliced bell pepper
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 c. vinegar
- 1/2 c. Wesson oil

Directions:
- Mix sugar, vinegar and oil.
- Pour over vegetables.
- Cover and place in refrigerator.
- This salad will keep for weeks and improves with age.

salad_info: watergate salad ingredient crushed pineapple pkg pistachio pudding c miniature marshmallow c cool whip c cashew cherry direction mix ingredient together hand decorate top cherry crushed cashew
Original_text:
Watergate Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can crushed pineapple (with juices)
- 1 pkg. pistachio pudding
- 1 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 c. Cool Whip
- 1/2 c. cashews

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together by hand.

Original_text:
Macaroni Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. macaroni
- 2 cut up tomatoes
- 1 small cut onion
- 1/2 c. green peppers, cut
- 6 slices cheese
- 2 to 3 pickle slices
- 2 Tbsp. pickle juice
- 3 to 4 Tbsp. mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 c. vinegar
- celery seed
- seasoned peppers

Directions:
- Cook macaroni; drain and cool.
- Add tomatoes, onion, peppers, cheese and pickle juice.
- Mix.
- Add remaining ingredients.
- Add celery seed and seasoned peppers to taste.

salad_info: green bean relish ingredient fresh fren green bean c salad oil tsp sugar tsp paprika small onion large lemon tsp salt tsp pepper direction slice bean thin sliver cook minute cool cut onion thin slice add bean along mixture salad oil lemon juice salt sugar pepper paprika chill refrigerator several hour develop flavor serve salad relish
Original_text:
Green Bean Relish

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. fresh or frozen green beans
- 1/3 c. salad oil
- 1 tsp. sugar
- 1/2 tsp. paprika
- 6 small onions
- 1 large lemon
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/4 tsp. pepper

Directions:
- Slice beans in thin slivers. Cook 5 minutes. Cool. Cut onions in thin slices. Add beans along with mixture of salad oil, lemon juice, salt, sugar, pepper and paprika. Chill in refrigerator several hours to develop flavor. Serve as salad or relish.

salad_info: chicken crescent casserole ingredient c cooked chicken cut piece cream chicken soup sliced water chestnut drained mushroom stem piece drained c mayonnaise salad dressing c chopped celery c chopped onion tbsp minced onion c sour cream refrigerated crescent dinner roll c shredded swiss cheese tbsp melted margarine direction large saucepan combine first ingredient cook medium heat hot bubbly place x inch ungreased baking dish place refrigerated dinner roll hot chicken mixture combine cheese melted margarine spread cheese mixture roll bake minute crust golden brown
Original_text:
Chicken Crescent Casserole

Ingredients:
- 3 c. cooked chicken, cut in pieces
- 1 can cream of chicken soup
- 1 (8 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts, drained
- 1 (4 oz.) can mushroom stems and pieces, drained
- 2/3 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
- 1/2 c. chopped celery
- 1/2 c. chopped onion or 2 Tbsp. minced onions
- 1/2 c. sour cream
- 1 (8 oz.) can refrigerated crescent dinner rolls
- 2/3 c. (3 oz.) shredded Swiss cheese
- 2 to 4 Tbsp. melted margarine

Directions:
- In a large saucepan, combine the first 8 ingredients. Cook over medium heat until hot and bubbly.
- Place in an 8 x 12-inch ungreased baking dish. Place the refrigerated dinner rolls over hot chicken mixture. Combine the cheese and melted margarine. Spread cheese mixture on rolls. Bake at 350° for 20 to 25 minutes or until crust is golden brown.

salad_info: layered salad ingredient small head lettuce torn bitesize piece tiny pea drained fren pea thawed bacon cooked drained crumbled tbsp sugar small sour cream bunch fresh spinach torn bitesize piece water chestnut sliced drained c red onion sliced thin hardboiled egg sliced salt pepper taste c mayonnaise c parmesan cheese grated direction place lettuce spinach bottom large salad bowl top pea water chestnut onion crumbled bacon two sliced hardboiled egg sprinkle salt pepper desired combine mayonnaise sour cream stirring well spread mayonnaise mixture salad seal tightly sprinkle cheese sugar garnish remaining hardboiled egg slice chill hour overnight
Original_text:
Layered Salad(Makes 10 To 12 Servings)  

Ingredients:
- 1 small head lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces
- 1 (17 oz.) can tiny peas, drained or 1 (10 oz.) frozen peas, thawed
- 1/2 lb. bacon, cooked, drained and crumbled
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 small sour cream
- 1 bunch fresh spinach, torn into bite-size pieces
- 1 can water chestnuts, sliced and drained
- 1/2 c. red onions, sliced thin
- 4 hard-boiled eggs, sliced
- salt and pepper to taste
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 c. Parmesan cheese, grated

Directions:
- Place lettuce and spinach in the bottom of a large salad bowl. Top with peas, water chestnuts, onion, crumbled bacon and two sliced hard-boiled eggs.
- Sprinkle with salt, then pepper as desired.
- Combine mayonnaise and sour cream, stirring well. Spread mayonnaise mixture over salad to seal tightly.
- Sprinkle with cheese, then sugar.
- Garnish with remaining 2 hard-boiled egg slices.
- Chill 8 hours or overnight.

salad_info: mama pineapple salad ingredient pineapple egg yolk beat well tbsp sugar tbsp butter cut apple c nut direction cook beaten egg yolk pineapple juice sugar butter double boiler done thicken flour pour cooked custard pineapple apple nut chill
Original_text:
Mama'S Pineapple Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can pineapple (save juice)
- 2 egg yolks, beat well
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 2 Tbsp. butter
- 2 cut up apples
- 1/2 c. nuts

Directions:
- Cook beaten egg yolks, pineapple juice, sugar and butter in double boiler until done.
- Thicken with flour.
- Pour this cooked custard over pineapple, apples and nuts and chill.

salad_info: harvest bowl salad ingredient egg c sugar dash salt tbsp lemon juice c whipping cream c apple chopped c pineapple chunk c grape cut half banana sliced c pecan chopped c celery chopped direction beat egg slightly add sugar salt lemon juice cook thick double boiler stirring constantly cool whip cream fold cooled egg mixture combine fruit pecan celery fold dressing serf
Original_text:
Harvest Bowl Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 eggs
- 1/4 c. sugar
- dash of salt
- 2 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 2/3 c. whipping cream
- 2 c. apples, chopped
- 1 c. pineapple chunks
- 1 c. grapes, cut in half
- 2 bananas, sliced
- 1/2 c. pecans, chopped
- 1/2 c. celery, chopped

Directions:
- Beat eggs slightly.
- Add sugar, salt and lemon juice; cook until thick in double boiler, stirring constantly.
- Cool.
- Whip the cream and fold into cooled egg mixture.
- Combine fruits, pecans and celery; fold into dressing.
- Serves 10.

salad_info: tangy tuna cocktail ingredient large chunk light tuna hardcooked egg chopped c chopped dill pickle c sliced radish tsp dijon mustard tsp lemon juice tsp white wine vinegar tsp salt dash cayenne pepper tbsp salad oil shredded lettuce chopped parsley lemon wedge garnish direction lightly mix tuna egg pickle radish small bowl blend mustard lemon juice vinegar salt cayenne gradually stir salad oil fork dressing well blended mix dressing lightly tuna mixture wish cover chill minute hour blend flavor
Original_text:
Tangy Tuna Cocktail

Ingredients:
- 1 large can chunk light tuna
- 2 hard-cooked eggs, chopped
- 1/4 c. chopped dill pickles
- 1/2 c. sliced radishes
- 1 tsp. Dijon mustard
- 1 tsp. lemon juice
- 1 tsp. white wine vinegar
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- dash of cayenne pepper
- 2 Tbsp. salad oil
- shredded lettuce
- chopped parsley and lemon wedges for garnish

Directions:
- Lightly mix tuna, eggs, pickles and radishes.
- In a small bowl, blend mustard, lemon juice, vinegar, salt and cayenne. Gradually stir in salad oil with a fork until dressing is well blended.
- Mix dressing lightly with tuna mixture.
- If you wish, cover and chill for 30 minutes to 2 hours to blend flavors.

salad_info: apricot chicken ingredient piece fryer chicken italian salad dressing envelope onion soup mix jar apricot jam apricotpineapple preserve direction place chicken piece x inch pan mix ingredient pour chicken bake hour serf
Original_text:
Apricot Chicken

Ingredients:
- 8 pieces fryer chicken
- 8 oz. Italian salad dressing
- 1 envelope onion soup mix
- 10 oz. jar apricot jam or apricot/pineapple preserves

Directions:
- Place chicken pieces in a 9 x 13-inch pan.
- Mix other ingredients and pour over chicken.
- Bake for 1 hour at 350°. Serves 4.

Original_text:
Strawberry Nut Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 pkg. strawberry Jell-O
- 1 c. boiling water
- 2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen strawberries
- 1 can crushed pineapple, drained
- 3 medium bananas, mashed
- 1 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Dissolve Jell-O in boiling water.
- Add strawberries, pineapple, bananas and nuts.
- Pour half into 2-quart mold.
- Chill until firm.
- Spread sour cream over.

- Mix all ingredients together and refrigerate.

Original_text:
Sweet And Sour Chicken

Ingredients:
- 1 chicken, cut up
- 1 jar Russian salad dressing
- 1 jar apricot or peach jelly

Directions:
- Mix last 3 ingredients; pour over chicken.
- Bake at 350° for 1 to 1 1/2 hours, basting occasionally.

salad_info: shrimp creole ingredient medium onion minced c diced celery tbsp salad oil garlic clove minced c tomato seasoned tomato sauce tsp sugar tsp salt tsp chili powder tbsp worcestershire sauce dash tabasco sauce tsp cornstarch cleaned cooked shrimp c chopped green pepper direction cook stir onion celery green pepper garlic oil tender brown add tomato tomato sauce seasoning simmer uncovered minute cook low heat mix cornstarch teaspoon water stir sauce add shrimp cover simmer tender minute serve rice make serving
Original_text:
Shrimp Creole

Ingredients:
- 1 medium onion, minced
- 1/2 c. diced celery
- 3 Tbsp. salad oil
- 1 garlic clove, minced
- 1 lb. can or 2 c. tomatoes
- 1 (8 oz.) can seasoned tomato sauce
- 1 tsp. sugar
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/2 to 1 tsp. chili powder
- 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
- dash of Tabasco sauce
- 1 tsp. cornstarch
- 1 lb. cleaned cooked shrimp
- 1/2 c. chopped green pepper

Directions:
- Cook and stir onion, celery, green pepper and garlic in oil until tender, not brown.
- Add tomatoes, tomato sauce and seasoning.
- Simmer, uncovered, 45 minutes.
- Cook over low heat. Mix cornstarch with 2 teaspoons water.
- Stir into sauce.
- Add shrimp.
- Cover and simmer until tender, about 5 minutes.
- Serve over rice.
- Makes 6 servings.

Lime Congealed Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (3 oz.) box lime jello
- 1 (3 oz.) box lemon jello
- 1 large can crushed pineapple
- 1 large box cottage cheese
- 1/2 can Eagle Brand milk

Directions:
- Dissolve
- jello in 2 cups boiling water.
- Add pineapple (with juice).
- When
- cooled,
- add cottage cheese, Eagle Brand and nuts. Stir. Congeal.

salad_info: pea peanut salad ingredient tsp dill seed tsp sugar tsp dry mustard dash salt c spanish peanut tsp vinegar c sour cream c mayonnaise c pea cooked drained direction cook pea drain cool mix sour cream mayonnaise sugar dill seed mustard vinegar salt creamy smooth add pea blend add peanut best served day
Original_text:
Peas And Peanut Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/4 tsp. dill seed
- 1/2 tsp. sugar
- 1/4 tsp. dry mustard
- dash of salt
- 1 c. Spanish peanuts
- 1/2 tsp. vinegar
- 1/4 c. sour cream
- 1/4 c. mayonnaise
- 2 c. peas (frozen), cooked and drained

Directions:
- Cook peas.
- Drain and cool.
- Mix sour cream, mayonnaise, sugar, dill seed, mustard, vinegar and salt until creamy smooth. (I add garlic powder, too.)
- Add peas; blend.
- Add peanuts.
- Best served that same day.

salad_info: hot italian submarine sandwich ingredient submarine sandwich roll ham mzarella cheese lettuce tomato onion wishbone italian salad dressing direction fill sandwich roll ingredient add salt pepper two tablespoon italian salad dressing roll aluminum foil bake minute
Original_text:
Hot Italian Submarine Sandwiches

Ingredients:
- submarine sandwich rolls
- ham (3 to 4 thin slices per sandwich)
- Mozzarella cheese
- lettuce
- tomatoes
- onions
- Wish-Bone Italian salad dressing

Directions:
- Fill sandwich roll with ingredients.

salad_info: one dish supper ingredient rotini qt tomato tsp garlic dried c chopped onion c chopped pepper tsp salt tsp pepper tbsp sugar ground turkey direction fry turkey burger large skillet bring tomato boil turkey add dry rotini boiling mixture cook minute tender add remaining ingredient serve green pea tossed salad garlic toast
Original_text:
One Dish Supper

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. rotini
- 2 qt. tomatoes
- 2 tsp. garlic, dried
- 1/2 c. chopped onion
- 1/2 c. chopped peppers
- 1 tsp. salt
- 3/4 tsp. pepper
- 2 Tbsp. sugar

Directions:
- Fry turkey burger in large skillet.
- Bring tomatoes to boil in turkey (cooked).
- Add dry rotini to boiling mixture.
- Cook about 7 or 8 minutes or until tender.
- Add remaining ingredients.
- Serve with green peas, tossed salad and garlic toast.

salad_info: minted lime mold salad ingredient c water pkg lime jello c diced pear tsp peppermint extract c honeydew melon ball c cantaloupe melon ball mint sprig lettuce leaf fren limeade concentrate c cold water c ginger ale direction heat cup water limeade concentrate boiling pour gelatin large bowl stir dissolved stir cup cold water ginger ale peppermint extract chill partially set stir pear melon ball pour cup jello mold chill firm unmold onto lettuce garnish extra cantaloupe ball mint sprig
Original_text:
Minted Lime Mold Salad(Yield:  6 Servings)  

Ingredients:
- 1 c. water
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. lime Jell-O
- 2 c. diced pears
- 1/8 tsp. peppermint extract
- 1 c. honeydew melon balls
- 1 c. cantaloupe melon balls
- mint sprigs and lettuce leaves (to garnish)
- 1 (6 oz.) can frozen limeade concentrate
- 1/2 c. cold water
- 1 1/4 c. ginger ale

Directions:
- Heat 1 cup water and limeade concentrate to boiling.
- Pour over gelatin in large bowl.
- Stir until dissolved.
- Stir in 1/2 cup cold water, ginger ale and peppermint extract.
- Chill until partially set.
- Stir in pears and melon balls.
- Pour into 7 cup jello mold.
- Chill until firm.
- Unmold onto lettuce and garnish with extra cantaloupe balls and mint sprigs.

salad_info: delicious healthy pancake ingredient c white flour c whole wheat flour tsp baking soda tsp baking powder c buttermilk c skim milk egg white beaten soft peak tsp olive oil salad oil direction preheat frypan griddle medium bowl combine dry ingredient add buttermilk skim milk stir combined fold egg white gently add olive salad oil cook hot griddle sprayed nonstick spray pancake contain cholesterol
Original_text:
Delicious And Healthy Pancakes

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. white flour
- 1/4 c. whole wheat flour
- 1/2 tsp. baking soda
- 1/2 tsp. baking powder
- 1/2 c. buttermilk
- 1/2 c. skim milk
- 1 egg white, beaten to soft peaks
- 2 tsp. olive oil or salad oil

Directions:
- Preheat frypan or griddle.
- In medium bowl, combine dry ingredients.
- Add buttermilk and skim milk; stir just until combined.
- Fold in egg white gently; add olive or salad oil.
- Cook on hot griddle which has been sprayed with nonstick spray.
- These pancakes contain no cholesterol.

- Stir in remaining ingredients until well blended, refrigerate.
