Original_text:
Marinated Shrimp

Ingredients:
- 2 lb. shrimp, cooked and peeled
- 2 medium onions, sliced
- 2 small green peppers, sliced
- 4 carrots, sliced and cooked
- 10 3/4 oz. can tomato soup
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 3/4 c. sugar
- 1 Tbsp. prepared mustard
- 2 cucumbers, sliced

Directions:
- Combine shrimp, carrots, onions and peppers; set aside.
- Mix well soup, vinegar, salad oil, sugar and mustard.
- Pour over shrimp and vegetables.
- Mix lightly.
- Refrigerate overnight. Before serving, add cucumber slices.
- (You can also add orange or apple slices, dew melon cubes, etc.).
- Serves 6.

salad_info: fren cheese salad ingredient condensed milk tbsp lemon juice large pineapple crushed drained cherry pie filling cool whip direction mix together freeze
Original_text:
Frozen Cheese Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can condensed milk
- 4 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1 large can pineapple, crushed and drained
- 1 can cherry pie filling
- 9 oz. Cool Whip

Directions:
- Mix all together and freeze.

salad_info: cauliflower salad ingredient c cauliflower piece c chopped tomato c chopped green onion c chopped pimento chopped olive mayonnaise coat grated cheese crumbled bacon direction mix ingredient chill
Original_text:
Cauliflower Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 c. cauliflower pieces
- 1 c. chopped tomato
- 1 c. chopped green onions
- 1/2 c. chopped pimento
- chopped olives
- mayonnaise to coat
- grated cheese
- crumbled bacon

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients and chill.

salad_info: taco salad ingredient small container sour cream large philadelphia cream cheese envelope taco seasoning mix lettuce onion tomato cheese chopped direction mix first ingredient put bottom container layer shredded lettuce tomato onion place cheese top serve nacho chip
Original_text:
Taco Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small container sour cream
- 2 large Philadelphia cream cheese
- 1 envelope taco seasoning mix
- lettuce, onion, tomatoes and cheese, chopped

Directions:
- Mix first 3 ingredients.
- Put in bottom of container and layer shredded lettuce, tomatoes and onions.
- Place cheese on top. Serve with nacho chips.

salad_info: jello salad ingredient small pkg strawberry jello pt strawberry small crushed pineapple mashed banana carton sour cream direction dissolve jello cup boiling water add strawberry pineapple banana stir well pour half greased pan let jell minute spread sour cream top add half strawberry mixture let jell
Original_text:
Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 small pkg. strawberry jello
- 1 pt. strawberries
- 1 small can crushed pineapple
- 3 mashed bananas
- 1 (8 oz.) carton sour cream

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in 2 cups of boiling water.
- Add strawberries, pineapple and bananas.
- Stir well.
- Pour half (about 2 1/2 cups) in a greased pan.
- Let jell, about 30 minutes.
- Spread sour cream on top.
- Add the other half of strawberry mixture.
- Let jell.

salad_info: frosty cranberry salad ingredient whole cranberry sauce crushed pineapple drained c sour cream c sifted powdered sugar direction combine cranberry pineapple mix powdered sugar sour cream together stir fruit pour shallow dish freeze firm remove freezer let sit minute serving
Original_text:
Frosty Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (16 oz.) can whole cranberry sauce
- 1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 c. sour cream
- 1/4 c. sifted powdered sugar

Directions:
- Combine cranberries and pineapple.
- Mix powdered sugar and sour cream together.
- Stir into fruit.
- Pour into shallow dish and freeze until firm.
- Remove from freezer and let sit a few minutes before serving.

salad_info: sweetheart salad ingredient c crushed pineapple undrained pkg knox plain gelatine c sugar plus tbsp cream cheese tbsp cherry juice c cold water tbsp lemon juice large container cool whip small container small jar cherry chopped direction dissolve gelatine cold water set aside add pineapple sugar together pot stove bring boil add gelatine mixture pineapple mixture stir gelatine dissolved add lemon cherry juice let cool mash cream cheese chopped cherry add pineapple mixture chill slightly thickened add cool whip top chopped walnut cherry desired mix mixer large bowl
Original_text:
Sweetheart Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. crushed pineapple, undrained
- 1 pkg. Knox plain gelatine
- 1/2 c. sugar plus 1 Tbsp.
- 2 (8 oz.) cream cheese
- 2 Tbsp. cherry juice
- 1/4 c. cold water
- 2 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1 large container Cool Whip or 2 small containers
- 1 small jar cherries, chopped

Directions:
- Dissolve gelatine in cold water, set aside.
- Add pineapple and sugar together in pot on stove.
- Bring to a boil.
- Add the gelatine mixture to the pineapple mixture.
- Stir until gelatine is dissolved.
- Add lemon and cherry juice, let cool.
- Mash cream cheese and chopped cherries.
- Add to pineapple mixture.
- Chill to slightly thickened.
- Add Cool Whip.
- Top with chopped walnuts and cherries, if desired.
- Mix with mixer in large bowl.

salad_info: hot potato salad ingredient medium potato slice bacon c bacon fat c chopped onion tbsp flour c sugar sweet desired tsp salt pepper c water c vinegar equal amount sugar used direction boil potato skin peel slice thin cook bacon crisp cook onion bacon fat mix flour sugar salt pepper stir water gradually add vinegar gradually cook stir boil minute pour potato add bacon cover let stand ready serve
Original_text:
Hot Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 medium potatoes
- 5 to 6 slices bacon
- 1/3 c. bacon fat
- 3/4 c. chopped onion
- 2 Tbsp. flour
- 1/2 c. sugar or as sweet as desired
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- pepper
- 3/4 c. water
- 1/2 c. vinegar or equal to amount of sugar used

Directions:
- Boil potatoes in skins. Peel and slice thin. Cook bacon until crisp, then cook onion in bacon fat. Mix in flour, sugar, salt and pepper. Stir water in gradually. Add vinegar gradually. Cook and stir until it boils for 1 minute. Pour over potatoes. Add the bacon. Cover and let stand until ready to serve.

salad_info: zero salad dressing ingredient c tomato juice tbsp lemon juice tbsp finely chopped onion salt pepper taste direction combine ingredient jar tightly fitted top shake well refrigerate shake well use
Original_text:
Zero Salad Dressing

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. tomato juice
- 2 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
- salt (optional)
- pepper to taste

Directions:
- Combine ingredients in a jar with tightly fitted top. Shake well and refrigerate. Shake well before use.

salad_info: cocacola salad ingredient black pitted cherry crushed pineapple pkg black cherry jello pkg strawberry jello c chopped pecan pkg cream cheese cocacola direction cream cream cheese nut set aside drain juice cherry pineapple bring juice boil pour jello dissolve let cool add coke combine ingredient refrigerate
Original_text:
Coca-Cola Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can black pitted cherries
- 1 can crushed pineapple
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. black cherry jello
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. strawberry jello
- 1 c. chopped pecans
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 12 oz. Coca-Cola

Directions:
- Cream the cream cheese and nuts; set aside.
- Drain juice from cherries and pineapple; bring juice to a boil.
- Pour over jello to dissolve.
- Let cool; add Coke.
- Combine all ingredients and refrigerate.

salad_info: b l salad toss ingredient c cherry tomato half c celery slice c salad dressing c chopped green pepper c onion ring crisply cooked bacon slice crumbled qt shredded lettuce direction combine tomato celery salad dressing green pepper onion toss lightly chill add bacon toss lightly spoon vegetable mixture shredded lettuce garnish additional cherry tomato half bacon curl
Original_text:
B L T Salad Toss

Ingredients:
- 2 c. cherry tomato halves
- 2 c. celery slices
- 1 c. salad dressing
- 1/2 c. chopped green pepper
- 1/4 c. onion rings
- 6 crisply cooked bacon slices, crumbled
- 1 qt. shredded lettuce

Directions:
- Combine tomatoes, celery, salad dressing, green pepper and onion; toss lightly.
- Chill.
- Add bacon; toss lightly.
- Spoon vegetable mixture over shredded lettuce.
- Garnish with additional cherry tomato halves and bacon curls.

salad_info: tapioca jello salad ingredient pkg orange jello pkg american tapioca pudding c water envelope dream whip made according pkg direction large crushed pineapple pineapple tidbit drained large mandarin orange drained direction cook first ingredient together thick let cool mix dream whip add cooled jellopudding mixture along drained pineapple orange refrigerate
Original_text:
Tapioca Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. orange jello
- 2 pkg. American tapioca pudding
- 2 1/4 c. water
- 2 envelopes Dream Whip, made according to pkg. directions
- 1 large can crushed pineapple or pineapple tidbits, drained
- 1 large can mandarin oranges, drained

Directions:
- Cook the first 3 ingredients together until thick; let cool. Mix Dream Whip; add to cooled jello-pudding mixture, along with drained pineapple and oranges.
- Refrigerate.

salad_info: korean salad ingredient bag spinach bean sprout drained sliced water chestnut drained chopped hardboiled egg slice bacon c oil c vinegar tbsp worcestershire sauce medium onion grated c catsup c sugar direction cook bacon drain crumble large salad bowl mix spinach sprout water chestnut egg bacon jar combine oil sugar catsup vinegar worcestershire sauce onion shake well sprinkle dressing salad toss serve dressing refrigerates well good salad
Original_text:
Korean Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 bag spinach
- 1 can bean sprouts, drained
- 1 can sliced water chestnuts, drained
- 3 chopped hard-boiled eggs
- 6 slices bacon
- 1 c. oil
- 1/4 c. vinegar
- 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
- 1 medium onion, grated
- 1/3 c. catsup
- 3/4 c. sugar

Directions:
- Cook bacon; drain and crumble.
- In large salad bowl, mix spinach, sprouts, water chestnuts, eggs and bacon.
- In a jar, combine oil, sugar, catsup, vinegar, Worcestershire sauce and onion; shake well.
- Sprinkle dressing on salad and toss.
- Serve. Dressing refrigerates well and is good on any salad.

salad_info: carrotraisin salad ingredient c shredded carrot c mayonnaise salad dressing dash pepper tbsp orange juice c raisin direction mix shredded carrot combined ingredient refrigerate serving
Original_text:
Carrot-Raisin Salad(Makes 4 Servings)  

Ingredients:
- 2 1/2 c. shredded carrots
- 1/4 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
- dash of pepper
- 1 Tbsp. orange juice
- 1/2 c. raisins

Directions:
- Mix shredded carrots with combined ingredients.
- Refrigerate before serving.

salad_info: chicken salad ingredient c diced cooked skinless chicken c diced apple tbsp lemon juice c diced celery tbsp local mayonnaise direction combine chicken apple sprinkle lemon juice toss together mix celery mayonnaise add chicken apple mixture toss lightly chill serve lettuce eat make serving
Original_text:
Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. diced, cooked, skinless chicken (white meat)
- 1 c. diced apple
- 3 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1/2 c. diced celery
- 3 Tbsp. lo-cal mayonnaise

Directions:
- Combine chicken and apple.
- Sprinkle with lemon juice and toss together.
- Mix celery with mayonnaise and add to chicken and apple mixture.
- Toss lightly.
- Chill.
- Serve on lettuce or eat as is. Makes 4 to 5 servings.

salad_info: kraut salad ingredient c kraut c diced onion c mango pepper diced c sugar direction mix ingredient chill serving
Original_text:
Kraut Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. kraut
- 1/2 c. diced onion
- 1/2 c. mango peppers, diced
- 1 c. sugar

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients and chill before serving.

salad_info: taco salad ingredient ground beef envelope taco seasoning c water head lettuce bunch green onion tomato diced shredded longhorn cheese small bottle catalina dressing bag crushed fritos direction brown ground beef add taco seasoning water cook minute cool separate bowl chop lettuce onion tomato add ground beef refrigerate hour serving add cheese dressing crushed fritos
Original_text:
Taco Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 to 1 1/2 lb. ground beef
- 1 envelope taco seasoning
- 1/2 c. water
- 1 head lettuce
- 2 bunches green onion
- 3 tomatoes, diced
- 8 oz. shredded Longhorn cheese
- 1 small bottle Catalina dressing
- 1 bag crushed Fritos

Directions:
- Brown ground beef.
- Add taco seasoning and water.
- Cook 15 minutes.
- Cool.
- In separate bowl, chop the lettuce, onion and tomatoes.
- Add ground beef.
- Refrigerate 1 hour.
- Before serving, add cheese, dressing and crushed Fritos.

salad_info: cucumber salad ingredient cucumber chopped tsp salt tsp pepper tbsp minced onion c sour cream tbsp lemon juice direction prepare salad hour using refrigerate
Original_text:
Cucumber Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 cucumbers, chopped
- 1 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/8 tsp. pepper
- 3 Tbsp. minced onion
- 1 c. sour cream
- 2 Tbsp. lemon juice

Directions:
- Prepare salad 1 hour before using and refrigerate.

salad_info: garden macaroni salad ingredient c eow macaroni c small cubed ham c carrot sliced thin c chopped cucumber tbsp chopped purple onion c mayonnaise salad dressing direction cook macaroni according package direction drain rinse cold water add ham remaining ingredient toss well chill least hour serving
Original_text:
Garden Macaroni Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. elbow macaroni (uncooked)
- 1 c. small cubed ham
- 1 c. carrots, sliced thin
- 1 c. chopped cucumber
- 2 Tbsp. chopped purple onion
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing

Directions:
- Cook macaroni according to package directions. Drain and rinse with cold water. Add ham and remaining ingredients. Toss well. Chill at least 4 hours before serving.

salad_info: italian beef ingredient chuck roast rump roast envelope dried onion soup envelope italian seasoning qt water bouillon beef cube tbsp chili sauce tomato paste beef broth tsp oregano direction cook roast dried onion soup italian seasoning hour crockpot low cool slice shred meat save dripping dripping add remaining ingredient simmer ready serve
Original_text:
Italian Beef

Ingredients:
- 5 to 7 lb. chuck roast or rump roast
- 1 envelope dried onion soup (Lipton)
- 1 envelope Italian seasoning (for making salad dressing)
- 2 qt. water (if needed)
- 2 bouillon beef cubes
- 2 Tbsp. chili sauce
- 6 oz. tomato paste
- 1 can beef broth
- 1 tsp. oregano

Directions:
- Cook the roast with the dried onion soup and Italian seasoning for 12 hours in crock-pot on low.
- Cool and slice or shred meat. Save drippings.
- To drippings, add the remaining ingredients. Simmer until ready to serve.

salad_info: sauerkraut salad ingredient sauerkraut drained c diced celery c chopped onion water chestnut drained sliced c green pepper diced tbsp pimento c grated carrot direction mix together set aside preparing dressing
Original_text:
Sauerkraut Salad

Ingredients:
- 32 oz. sauerkraut, drained
- 1 c. diced celery
- 1 c. chopped onion
- 1 (8 oz.) can water chestnuts, drained and sliced
- 1 c. green pepper, diced
- 2 Tbsp. pimento
- 1/4 c. grated carrot

Directions:
- Mix together and set aside while preparing dressing.

Original_text:
Holiday Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 envelope unflavored jello
- 1/4 c. cold water
- 1 c. nuts
- 1 (16 oz.) can cranberry sauce

Directions:
- Mix jello and cold water; set for a couple minutes and add 1/4 cup boiling water until dissolved.
- Add all ingredients.
- Chill!

Original_text:
Quick Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 lb. small red potatoes, cooked
- 1/2 c. sliced green onions
- 1 c. Hidden Valley Ranch dressing
- paprika or black pepper
- chives
- bacon bits

Directions:
- Cut slightly cooked potatoes into 1 inch cubes.
- In large bowl combine potatoes, onions and salad dressing.
- Toss gently. Dust with paprika.
- Garnish with chives and bacon bits.
- Serve warm or at room temperature.

salad_info: linleys jello salad ingredient small pkg jello c boiling water large cream cheese small crushed pineapple cool whip c direction mix jello water let cool add cream cheese mash fork stir together add pineapple cool whip last add slowly put square pyrex plastic container refrigerate
Original_text:
Linley'S Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small pkg. jello (any flavor)
- 1 c. boiling water
- 1 large cream cheese (room temperature)
- 1 small can crushed pineapple
- 1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip
- 1 c. 7-Up

Directions:
- Mix jello and water.
- Let cool and add cream cheese.
- Mash with a fork and stir together.
- Then add pineapple and Cool Whip. Last, add 7-Up slowly.
- Put into square Pyrex or plastic container.
- Refrigerate.

salad_info: salad dressing ingredient c oil c vinegar c sugar tsp salt tsp pepper tbsp worcestershire sauce tsp dry mustard tsp garlic salt tsp onion salt direction put ingredient mixing bowl mix minute pour pint jar serve garden salad
Original_text:
Salad Dressing

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 c. oil
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 3/4 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/4 tsp. pepper
- 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
- 1 tsp. dry mustard
- 1/2 tsp. garlic salt
- 1 tsp. onion salt

Directions:
- Put all ingredients in a mixing bowl and mix for 5 minutes. Pour into a pint jar.
- Serve on garden salad.

salad_info: thousand island salad dressing ingredient c mayonnaise c catsup tsp sugar tbsp sweet pickle relish direction put mayonnaise catsup sugar blender blend second add relish blend second pour jar container keep refrigerated
Original_text:
Thousand Island Salad Dressing

Ingredients:
- 1/3 c. mayonnaise
- 1/4 c. catsup
- 1/4 tsp. sugar
- 2 1/2 Tbsp. sweet pickle relish

Directions:
- Put mayonnaise, catsup and sugar into blender; blend 10 to 15 seconds.
- Add relish and blend for 2 to 3 seconds.
- Pour into jar or container and keep refrigerated.

salad_info: mayonnaise cake ingredient c flour c water tbsp cocoa tsp vanilla c sugar c salad dressing tsp soda direction blend together sifter flour cocoa sugar soda blend salad dressing gradually add water mixture mixed thoroughly add vanilla cook minute
Original_text:
Mayonnaise Cake

Ingredients:
- 2 c. flour
- 1 c. water
- 5 Tbsp. cocoa
- 1 tsp. vanilla
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 c. salad dressing
- 2 tsp. soda

Directions:
- Blend together in sifter:
- flour, cocoa, sugar and soda. Blend in salad dressing and gradually add water to mixture.
- When mixed thoroughly, add vanilla.
- Cook 30 to 40 minutes at 350°.

salad_info: chicken grape salad ingredient c cubed cooked chicken lemon juice salt pepper hardboiled egg chopped c mayonnaise pkg sliced almond c red seedless grape halved c chopped celery direction sprinkle chicken lemon juice salt pepper taste add remaining ingredient add mayonnaise necessary chicken barely hold together chill serving
Original_text:
Chicken And Grape Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. cubed, cooked chicken
- lemon juice
- salt and pepper
- 2 hard-boiled eggs, chopped
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1 2 oz. pkg. sliced almonds
- 1 c. red seedless grapes, halved
- 1 c. chopped celery

Directions:
- Sprinkle chicken with lemon juice, salt and pepper to taste. Add remaining ingredients. Add more mayonnaise if necessary until chicken barely holds together. Chill before serving.

salad_info: fresh spinach salad ingredient bunch fresh spinach slice bacon c oil c garlic wine vinegar tbsp white wine tbsp soy sauce tsp sugar tsp dry mustard tsp curry powder tsp salt tsp seasoned pepper hardboiled egg chopped direction wash well thoroughly dry spinach tear leaf bitesized piece refrigerate heavy skillet fry bacon crisp drain paper towel crumble shake oil vinegar wine soy sauce sugar mustard curry powder salt seasoned pepper together pour spinach add bacon toss lightly top chopped boiled egg
Original_text:
Fresh Spinach Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 bunch fresh spinach
- 5 slices bacon
- 2/3 c. oil
- 1/4 c. garlic wine vinegar
- 2 Tbsp. white wine
- 2 Tbsp. soy sauce
- 1 tsp. sugar
- 1 tsp. dry mustard
- 1/2 tsp. curry powder
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. seasoned pepper
- 2 hard-boiled eggs, chopped

Directions:
- Wash well and thoroughly dry spinach.
- Tear leaves into bite-sized pieces and refrigerate.
- In a heavy skillet, fry the bacon until crisp.
- Drain on paper towel and crumble.
- Shake the oil, vinegar, wine, soy sauce, sugar, mustard, curry powder, salt and seasoned pepper together and pour over spinach.
- Add bacon and toss lightly.
- Top with chopped boiled eggs.

salad_info: jackies broccoli salad ingredient bunch broccoli c raisin c sunflower seed unsalted possible green onion sliced c light mayonnaise c sugar tbsp vinegar c hormel real bacon bit direction wash cut broccoli floweret bitesized piece add raisin sunflower seed onion mix mayonnaise sugar vinegar pour broccoli mixture mix lightly top bacon bit serf
Original_text:
Jackie'S Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 bunch broccoli
- 1/2 c. raisins
- 1/3 c. sunflower seeds, unsalted, if possible
- 5 green onions, sliced
- 1 c. light mayonnaise
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 2 Tbsp. vinegar
- 1/3 c. Hormel real bacon bits

Directions:
- Wash and cut broccoli flowerets into bite-sized pieces.
- Add raisins, sunflower seeds and onions.
- Mix mayonnaise, sugar and vinegar.
- Pour over broccoli mixture.
- Mix lightly.
- Top with bacon bits.
- Serves 4 to 6.

salad_info: fourcup salad ingredient c chunk pineapple c mandarin orange c angel flake coconut c sour cream direction drain fruit add coconut chill stir sour cream serving
Original_text:
Four-Cup Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. chunk pineapple
- 1 c. or can mandarin oranges
- 1 c. Angel Flake coconut
- 1 c. sour cream

Directions:
- Drain fruit.
- Add coconut and chill. Stir in sour cream just before serving.

salad_info: christmas salad ingredient pkg lime jello small pineapple crushed pkg cottage cheese juice lemon orange tbsp sugar envelope plain gelatin c nut chopped pkg cherry jello direction prepare lime jello according package direction reduce water cup stir pineapple pour large dish pan place refrigerator firm combine cottage cheese lemon juice sugar mash fork mixer smooth dissolve gelatin cup cold water blend cottage cheese add nut spread lime jello prepare cherry jello according package direction pour filling chill firm
Original_text:
Christmas Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. lime jello
- 1 small can pineapple, crushed
- 1 (12 oz.) pkg. cottage cheese
- juice of 1/2 lemon or 1/2 orange
- 1 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 envelope plain gelatin
- 1/2 c. nuts, chopped (if desired)
- 1 pkg. cherry jello

Directions:
- Prepare lime jello according to package directions but reduce water by 1/2 cup and stir in pineapple.
- Pour into large dish or pan.
- Place in refrigerator until firm.
- Combine cottage cheese, lemon juice and sugar and mash with a fork or with mixer until smooth.
- Dissolve gelatin in 1/4 cup cold water.
- Blend into cottage cheese.
- Add nuts.
- Spread over lime jello.
- Prepare cherry jello according to package directions.
- Pour over filling. Chill until firm.

salad_info: macaroni salad ingredient stalk celery chopped small onion c mayonnaise tbsp vinegar tbsp sugar tsp prepared mustard tsp salt pepper desired c cooled drained cooked macaroni hardboiled egg chopped direction mix ingredient except macaroni egg large bowl add macaroni egg mix lightly chill serving
Original_text:
Macaroni Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 stalk celery, chopped
- 1/2 small onion
- 1/3 c. mayonnaise
- 1 Tbsp. vinegar
- 1 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 tsp. prepared mustard
- 3/4 tsp. salt
- pepper as desired
- 3 c. cooled, drained, cooked macaroni (about 1 1/2 c. uncooked)
- 1 hard-boiled egg, chopped

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients, except macaroni and egg, in large bowl. Add macaroni and egg.
- Mix lightly.
- Chill before serving.

salad_info: herbed carrot potato salad ingredient c mayonnaise c sour cream tbsp lemon juice tsp snipped chive tsp worcestershire tsp salt tsp dried dill weed tsp dry mustard tsp pepper medium carrot thinly bias sliced medium potato cooked peeled sliced c thinly bias sliced celery c pitted ripe olive sliced leaf lettuce direction combine mayonnaise salad dressing sour cream lemon juice chive worcestershire salt dill weed mustard pepper well combined medium pan heat small amount water boiling add carrot simmer uncovered minute drain rinse cold water drain large bowl gently toss together sliced potato sliced carrot celery olive add sour cream mixture gently toss coat well cover chill several hour
Original_text:
Herbed Carrot Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 c. sour cream
- 3 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 2 tsp. snipped chives
- 1 tsp. Worcestershire
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. dried dill weed
- 1/2 tsp. dry mustard
- 1/8 tsp. pepper
- 4 medium carrots (2 c.), thinly bias sliced
- 8 medium potatoes, cooked, peeled and sliced (7 c.)
- 1 c. thinly bias sliced celery
- 1/2 c. pitted ripe olives, sliced
- leaf lettuce (optional)

Directions:
- Combine mayonnaise or salad dressing, sour cream, lemon juice, chives, Worcestershire, salt, dill weed, mustard and pepper until well combined.
- In a medium pan, heat small amount of water to boiling; add carrots and simmer, uncovered, for 2 minutes.
- Drain. Rinse with cold water; drain again.
- In a large bowl, gently toss together the sliced potatoes, sliced carrots, celery and olives. Add sour cream mixture.
- Gently toss to coat well.
- Cover and chill several hours.

salad_info: cranberry salad ingredient cream cheese softened tbsp mayonnaise c chopped pecan whole cranberry sauce crushed pineapple drained tbsp sugar c cool whip direction combine first ingredient large bowl fold cool whip pour loaf pan dish freeze
Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 oz. cream cheese, softened
- 2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
- 1/2 c. chopped pecans
- 1 can whole cranberry sauce
- 1 (9 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 c. Cool Whip

Directions:
- Combine first 6 ingredients in a large bowl.
- Fold in Cool Whip.
- Pour into a loaf pan or dish and freeze.

salad_info: gretas taco dip ingredient sour cream can bean dip bunch green onion cheddar cheese shredded pkg taco seasoning mix c salad dressing tomato chopped direction mix taco seasoning mix sour cream salad dressing together set aside
Original_text:
Greta'S Taco Dip

Ingredients:
- 8 oz. sour cream
- 2 or 3 cans bean dip
- 1 or 2 bunches green onions
- 8 oz. Cheddar cheese, shredded
- 1 pkg. taco seasoning mix
- 1/2 c. salad dressing
- 3 or 4 tomatoes, chopped

Directions:
- Mix taco seasoning mix, sour cream and salad dressing together and set aside.

salad_info: apple salad ingredient crushed pineapple red apple diced c pecan slice cheese diced c sugar tbsp flour egg direction drain pineapple set juice aside mix pineapple apple pecan cheese cook pineapple juice sugar flour egg medium heat stirring constantly pour salad
Original_text:
Apple Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (16 oz.) can crushed pineapple (save juice)
- 4 red apples, diced
- 1 c. pecans
- 4 slices cheese, diced
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 2 Tbsp. flour
- 1 egg

Directions:
- Drain pineapple; set juice aside.
- Mix pineapple, apples, pecans and cheese.
- Cook pineapple juice, sugar, flour and egg on medium heat, stirring constantly.
- Pour over salad.

salad_info: pink salad ingredient small crushed pineapple juice small box strawberry jello small carton cottage cheese carton cool whip direction mix ingredient together chill
Original_text:
Pink Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small can crushed pineapple with juice
- 1 small box strawberry jello
- 1 small carton cottage cheese
- 1 (9 oz.) carton Cool Whip

Directions:
- Mix all the ingredients together and chill.

salad_info: chinese chicken salad ingredient chicken breast cooked diced chilled green onion chopped head lettuce chopped bottle sesame seed roasted pkg slivered almond chow mein noodle direction mix chicken onion lettuce add sesame seed almond noodle
Original_text:
Chinese Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 4 chicken breasts, cooked, diced and chilled
- 3 to 4 green onions, chopped
- 1 head lettuce, chopped
- 1 bottle sesame seeds, roasted
- 1 pkg. slivered almonds
- 1 (5 oz.) can chow mein noodles

Directions:
- Mix chicken, onions and lettuce. Add sesame seeds, almonds and noodles.

salad_info: cup salad ingredient c crushed pineapple c mandarin orange c small marshmallow c sour cream c coconut c pecan direction pour pineapple marshmallow let stand mushy mix together let set refrigerate covered dish overnight good ham also add maraschino cherry
Original_text:
6-Cup Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. crushed pineapple
- 1 c. mandarin oranges
- 1 c. small marshmallows
- 1 c. sour cream
- 1 c. coconut
- 1 c. pecans

Directions:
- Pour pineapple over marshmallows and let stand until mushy. Mix all together and let set.
- Refrigerate in covered dish overnight.
- Very good with ham.
- You can also add maraschino cherries.

- 4 eggs

Original_text:
Golden Glow Salad

Ingredients:
- 12 large marshmallows
- 1 c. pineapple juice
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon jello
- 1 c. boiling water
- 1 (No. 2) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 6 medium grated carrots
- 1 (6 oz.) pkg. cream cheese

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in boiling water and cool.
- Melt marshmallows in pineapple juice over low heat.
- Fold until smooth.
- Blend cheese, carrots and pineapple.
- When gelatin cools, blend together all ingredients.
- Pour into mold and chill several hours.

Directions:

Directions:

- Stir in cottage cheese.
- Mix the mayonnaise with 1/3 cup hot jello and add to the rest of mixture.

- Set in refrigerator.

Original_text:
Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 c. potatoes, diced or cubed and cooked
- 2 hard-boiled eggs
- 1/2 c. chopped celery
- 1/2 c. diced onions
- 1/4 c. sweet relish
- salt and pepper to taste
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 tsp. mustard

Directions:
- Cover potatoes with water; bring to boil.
- Lower flame and simmer until tender.
- Drain, peel and cut potatoes into bite size pieces.
- Mix onions, celery, eggs and sweet relish with mayonnaise and mustard.
- Stir in the potatoes.
- Add salt and pepper to taste. Cover bowl and refrigerate for 2 hours.
- Serves 4 persons.

- Mix thoroughly with a fork.

Original_text:
Creamy Pasta With Mushrooms

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. fettuccine (uncooked eggless variety)
- 1/2 c. evaporated skim milk
- 1/3 c. fat-free mayonnaise or salad dressing
- 1 tsp. minced garlic
- 2 Egg Beaters, beaten (1/2 c.)
- 2 (8 oz.) cans sliced mushrooms, drained
- 1/2 c. fat-free Parmesan cheese

Directions:
- Prepare fettuccine as directed on package.
- Drain and set aside. Gradually add skim milk to fat-free mayonnaise and garlic in small saucepan.
- Heat thoroughly, stirring occasionally.
- Remove from heat; blend in Egg Beaters.
- Toss with fettuccine and mushrooms until well coated.
- Add Parmesan cheese and mix well.

Original_text:
Creamy Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (16 oz.) can sliced peaches
- 1 (16 oz.) can apricots, halved
- 1 (16 oz.) can sliced pears
- 1 (16 oz.) can pineapple chunks
- 1 (11 oz.) can mandarin oranges
- 2 c. fresh strawberries
- 1 small jar maraschino cherries
- 5 small bananas, sliced
- 1 box vanilla instant pudding mix

Directions:
- Drain all canned fruits, reserving 2 cups mixed juices.
- Layer drained fruit, strawberries, cherries and bananas in bowl. Combine pudding mix with reserved juices in bowl, beating until thick.
- Pour over fruit.
- Do not toss.
- Chill for 2 hours before serving.
- Yields 15 servings.

- 1/4 c. mayo or salad dressing

- 1/4 c. bread crumbs with 1 Tbsp. butter (topping)

Directions:
- Place broccoli in baking dish.
- Mix rest of ingredients and pour over broccoli.
- Then place topping mixture on top of broccoli and bake at 350° for 45 minutes.

- 1 c. sugar
- 3 1/2 tsp. baking powder
- 1 tsp. salt
- 3 Tbsp. salad oil
- 1 1/4 c. milk
- 1 egg

Directions:
- Heat oven to 350°.
- Grease and flour loaf pan (9 x 5 x 3-inch).
- Measure all of the ingredients into large mixing bowl. Beat on medium speed for 30 seconds.
- Pour into prepared pan. Bake 55 to 65 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean when inserted.
- Allow to cool.

- Pour the ingredients over it; mix well. Return to stove until all is hot.

salad_info: pot roast vegetable ingredient rump roast tbsp salad oil tbsp butter small onion sliced clove garlic crushed tsp dried thyme leaf tsp dried marjoram leaf bay leaf crumbled whole black pepper tsp salt condensed beef broth undiluted small white onion carrot pared halved sprig parsley tbsp flour direction wipe roast paper towel place oil butter quart dutch oven heavy kettle medium heat brown roast sliced onion turning roast wooden spoon brown side add seasoning dripping saute stirring minute add beef broth bring boil reduce simmer cook boiling point covered hour turn meat occasionally add vegetable simmer covered minute vegetable tender
Original_text:
Pot Roast With Vegetables

Ingredients:
- 4 to 5 lb. rump roast
- 2 Tbsp. salad oil
- 2 Tbsp. butter
- 1 small onion, sliced
- 1 clove garlic, crushed
- 1 tsp. dried thyme leaves
- 1 tsp. dried marjoram leaves
- 1 bay leaf, crumbled
- 8 whole black peppers
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 (10 1/2 oz.) can condensed beef broth, undiluted
- 12 small white onions
- 8 carrots (1 lb.), pared and halved
- 1 sprig parsley
- 3 Tbsp. flour

Directions:
- Wipe roast with paper towels.
- Place oil and butter in 5-quart Dutch oven or heavy kettle.
- Over medium heat, brown roast with sliced onion, turning roast with 2 wooden spoons until brown on all sides.
- Add seasonings to drippings and saute, stirring, 1/2 minute.
- Add beef broth; bring to a boil.
- Reduce to simmer and cook just below the boiling point, covered, 2 1/2 hours.
- Turn meat occasionally.
- Add vegetables and simmer, covered, for 30 minutes or until vegetables are tender.

salad_info: soft pretzel ingredient pkg active dry yeast tbsp sugar c warm water c allpurpose flour tsp salt tbsp salad oil egg white beaten tsp salt water coarse salt direction dissolve yeast sugar water let stand minute add cup flour salt oil beat smooth gradually stir flour make soft dough turn dough onto floured surface knead smooth elastic adding flour necessary prevent dough sticky place dough greased bowl cover let raise warm place doubled minute hour punch dough divide ball roll form inch rope twist pretzel shape let rise uncovered minute brush lightly egg white mixture sprinkle salt bake well browned minute
Original_text:
Soft Pretzels

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. active dry yeast
- 1 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 c. warm water
- 2 1/2 to 3 c. all-purpose flour
- 1 tsp. salt
- 2 Tbsp. salad oil
- 1 egg white, beaten with 1 tsp. each: salt and water
- coarse salt

Directions:
- Dissolve yeast and sugar in water; let stand about 10 minutes. Add 2 cups of the flour, salt and oil; beat until smooth. Gradually stir in more flour (about 1/2 cup) to make a soft dough. Turn dough out onto a floured surface.
- Knead until smooth and elastic, adding more flour (up to 1/2 cup) if necessary to prevent dough from being too sticky.
- Place dough in a greased bowl. Cover; let raise in warm place until doubled, 45 minutes to 1 hour. Punch dough down; divide into 12 balls.
- Roll each out to form 18-inch rope.
- Twist into pretzel shape.
- Let rise, uncovered, 20 to 25 minutes.
- Brush lightly with egg white mixture and sprinkle with salt.
- Bake at 425° until well browned, 12 to 15 minutes.

salad_info: pretzel salad ingredient c coarsely chopped pretzel tbsp sugar c melted butter cool whip c boiling water pkg cream cheese c sugar pkg strawberry jello pkg sliced fren strawberry direction mix pretzel sugar butter pat bottom x inch pan bake minute mix cream cheese sugar fold cool whip spread cooled crust dissolve jello boiling water add fren berry mix somewhat thick spread cream cheese mix refrigerate
Original_text:
Pretzel Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. coarsely chopped pretzels
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 3/4 c. melted butter
- 8 oz. Cool Whip
- 2 c. boiling water
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 1 c. sugar
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. strawberry Jell-O
- 2 (10 oz.) pkg. sliced frozen strawberries

Directions:
- Mix pretzel, sugar and butter.
- Pat on bottom of a 13 x 9-inch pan.
- Bake at 400° for 8 minutes.
- Mix cream cheese and sugar. Fold in Cool Whip.
- Spread on cooled crust.
- Dissolve Jell-O in boiling water.
- Add frozen berries. Mix until somewhat thick. Spread over cream cheese mix.
- Refrigerate.

- 1 (16 oz.) can frozen orange juice

Directions:
- Crumble crackers and add sugar and melted margarine.
- Use half for crust and half for top.
- Mix orange juice, mashed oranges and Cool Whip.
- Pour over crust and top with other 1/2 of cracker crumbs.

Original_text:
Korean Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. fresh spinach
- 1 can bean sprouts
- 1 can water chestnuts
- 4 hard-boiled eggs
- 1/2 lb. bacon
- 1 c. Wesson oil
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1/3 c. warm ketchup
- 1 tsp. onion juice
- 1/4 c. vinegar
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce

Directions:
- Break and take the spinach stems out.
- Rinse and drain bean sprouts.
- Slice water chestnuts.
- Chop eggs.
- Cook and break up bacon.
- Mix the spinach, bean sprouts, water chestnuts, eggs and bacon together.

salad_info: strawberry pretzel salad ingredient c margarine tbsp brown sugar c crushed pretzel pkg strawberry gelatin c boiling water pkg fren strawberry slightly thawed pkg cream cheese scant c sugar cool whip direction combine margarine brown sugar pretzel mix well bake lightly buttered x inch pan minute dissolve gelatin water hot add strawberry cool mixture begin set meanwhile cream sugar cream cheese fold cool whip spread cream cheese mixture cooled crust gelatin begin set pour top cheese mixture refrigerate firm
Original_text:
Strawberry Pretzel Salad

Ingredients:
- 3/4 c. margarine
- 3 Tbsp. brown sugar
- 2 1/2 c. crushed pretzels
- 1 (6 oz.) pkg. strawberry gelatin
- 2 c. boiling water
- 1 lb. pkg. frozen strawberries, slightly thawed
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 1 scant c. sugar
- 1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip

Directions:
- Combine margarine, brown sugar and pretzels.
- Mix well and bake in lightly buttered 9 x 13-inch pan at 350° for 10 minutes. Dissolve gelatin in water.
- While hot, add to strawberries.
- Cool until mixture begins to set.
- Meanwhile, cream sugar and cream cheese and fold into Cool Whip.
- Spread cream cheese mixture over cooled crust.
- When gelatin begins to set, pour over top of cheese mixture.
- Refrigerate until firm.

Broccoli Salad

- 12 slices cooked bacon

- Mix chopped broccoli, red onion, cheese and crumbled bacon in bowl.

salad_info: peruvian potato salad ingredient russet potato cream cheese c half half cream can green chilies c lemon juice hardcooked egg red onion tsp ground turmeric tsp ground comino tsp salt ripe pitted black olive direction simmer scrubbed potato large pan inch boiling salted water minute tender drain cool remove skin large saucepan low heat stir cream cheese half half smooth add chopped chili pepper lemon juice turmeric comino salt simmer minute stirring occasionally
Original_text:
Peruvian Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 Russet potatoes
- 16 oz. cream cheese
- 2 c. half and half cream
- 2 cans (4 oz. each) green chilies
- 1/4 c. lemon juice
- 2 hard-cooked eggs
- 1 red onion
- 1 1/2 tsp. ground turmeric
- 1 tsp. ground comino
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 3 oz. can ripe pitted black olives

Directions:
- Simmer scrubbed potatoes in large pan with 1-inch of boiling, salted water for 25 to 30 minutes, until tender.
- Drain, cool and remove skins.
- In large saucepan over low heat, stir cream cheese and half and half until smooth.
- Add chopped chili peppers, lemon juice, turmeric, comino and salt.
- Simmer 1 minute, stirring occasionally.

salad_info: refrigerator cuke ingredient cuke sliced thin c salt ice cube tray ice tbsp celery seed tbsp salad oil c sugar tbsp mustard seed c vinegar onion sliced thin direction soak cuke salt ice hour drain well heat remaining ingredient minute cool add onion mix together put refrigerator quart gallon jar tupperware
Original_text:
Refrigerator Cukes

Ingredients:
- 20 cukes, sliced thin
- 1/2 c. salt
- 2 ice cube trays ice
- 1 Tbsp. celery seed
- 2 Tbsp. salad oil
- 2 c. sugar
- 1 Tbsp. mustard seed
- 2 c. vinegar
- 3 onions, sliced thin

Directions:
- Soak cukes in salt and ice for 2 hours.
- Drain well.
- Heat the remaining ingredients (except onions) for 5 minutes, then cool. Add onions and mix together.
- Put into refrigerator in quart or gallon jars or Tupperware.

salad_info: broccoli salad ingredient c chopped raw broccoli flower tender stem onion chopped bacon cooked crumbled c sunflower roasted seed direction toss first four ingredient ready serve add dressing last serve bed lettuce serf
Original_text:
Broccoli Salad(Serves 16)  

Ingredients:
- 6 c. chopped raw broccoli, flower and tender stems
- 2 onions, chopped
- 1 lb. bacon, cooked and crumbled
- 1 1/2 c. sunflower roasted seeds

Directions:
- Toss first four ingredients when ready to serve.
- Add dressing last.
- Serve on bed of lettuce.
- Serves 16.

salad_info: salad dressing cake ingredient c sugar c flour tbsp cocoa tsp soda c miracle whip salad dressing c lukewarm water tsp vanilla direction preheat oven degree sift dry ingredient together add others use crisco oil pan sparingly bake
Original_text:
Salad Dressing Cake(Heritage Recipe)  

Ingredients:
- 1 c. sugar
- 2 c. flour
- 4 Tbsp. cocoa
- 2 tsp. soda
- 1 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing
- 1 c. lukewarm water
- 1 tsp. vanilla

Directions:
- Preheat oven to 375 degrees.
- Sift all dry ingredients together.
- Then add others, I use Crisco Oil in pan sparingly. (No flour.)
- Bake.

salad_info: salad dressing ingredient c sugar tsp prepared mustard c vinegar tsp horseradish tsp salt pepper paprika c oil direction mix ingredient except oil blend well add oil last
Original_text:
Salad Dressing

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. prepared mustard
- 1/4 c. vinegar (more tart, if desired)
- 1 tsp. horseradish
- 1/2 tsp. each: salt, pepper and paprika
- 1/2 c. oil

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients except oil and blend well.
- Add oil last.

salad_info: orange peach jello salad ingredient pkg orange jello c hot water c peach juice c peach slice tbsp flour tbsp sugar c peach juice direction cook thick sure let cool mix one package dream whip prepared directed fold cool mixture spread jello
Original_text:
Orange Peach Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. orange jello
- 1 c. hot water
- 3/4 c. peach juice
- 2 1/2 c. peach slices
- 2 Tbsp. flour
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 3/4 c. peach juice

Directions:
- Cook until thick.
- Be sure and let cool and mix with one package of Dream Whip, prepared as directed.
- Fold into cool mixture and spread on jello.

salad_info: hot chicken salad ingredient c cubed cooked chicken turkey breast c chopped celery c chopped green pepper c sliced green onion c shredded sharp cheddar cheese jar diced pimiento drained c reducedcalorie mayonnaise tbsp lemon juice tsp worcestershire sauce tsp hot sauce vegetable cooking spray tbsp fine dry bread crumb tbsp reducedcalorie margarine melted direction combine first ingredient large bowl toss combine mayonnaise lemon juice worcestershire sauce hot sauce add chicken mixture mixing well spoon mixture quart casserole coated cooking spray
Original_text:
Hot Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. cubed, cooked chicken or turkey breast
- 1 c. chopped celery
- 1 c. chopped green pepper
- 2/3 c. sliced green onions
- 1/3 c. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
- 1 (4 oz.) jar diced pimiento, drained
- 1/3 c. reduced-calorie mayonnaise
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
- 1/4 tsp. hot sauce
- vegetable cooking spray
- 3 Tbsp. fine, dry bread crumbs
- 1 Tbsp. reduced-calorie margarine, melted

Directions:
- Combine first 6 ingredients in a large bowl; toss.
- Combine mayonnaise, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce and hot sauce; add to chicken mixture, mixing well.
- Spoon mixture into a 1 1/2-quart casserole coated with cooking spray.

salad_info: broccoli casserole ingredient pkg chopped fren broccoli cooked drained well mushroom soup c grated cheddar cheese c mayonnaise egg well beaten tbsp onion chopped fine c cracker crumb direction mix broccoli mushroom soup cheese mayonnaise egg onion together baking dish crumble cracker crumb top bake oven minute bubbly
Original_text:
Broccoli Casserole

Ingredients:
- 2 pkg. chopped, frozen broccoli, cooked and drained well
- 1 can mushroom soup
- 1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
- 1 c. mayonnaise (do not use salad dressing)
- 1 egg, well beaten
- 1 Tbsp. onion, chopped fine
- 1/2 c. cracker crumbs (I always use Ritz crackers)

Directions:
- Mix broccoli, mushroom soup, cheese, mayonnaise, egg and onion together in baking dish.
- Crumble cracker crumbs on top and bake in 350° oven for 30 minutes or until bubbly.

salad_info: fruit yogurt salad ingredient chunk pineapple drained mandarin orange drained tbsp cornstarch plain yogurt tbsp sugar tsp vanilla c grape sliced banana apple cored sliced direction cook liquid cornstarch thick cool combine yogurt sugar vanilla mix cooled mixture stir fruit chill creative add different kind fruit
Original_text:
Fruit Yogurt Salad

Ingredients:
- 20 oz. can chunk pineapple, drained (reserve liquid)
- 11 oz. can mandarin oranges, drained (reserve liquid)
- 2 Tbsp. cornstarch
- 8 oz. plain yogurt
- 1 to 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 tsp. vanilla
- 1 c. grapes
- 1 sliced banana
- 1 apple, cored and sliced

Directions:
- Cook liquids and cornstarch until thick, cool.
- Combine yogurt, sugar and vanilla and mix with cooled mixture.
- Stir in fruit and chill.
- Be creative and add different kinds of fruits.

salad_info: day salad ingredient large head lettuce medium chopped onion medium chopped bell pepper stalk chopped celery crumbled bacon pkg fren english pea cooked drained chilled mayonnaise sugar parmesan cheese grated direction layer lettuce chopped vegetable saving enough lettuce top layer layer pea last layer lettuce cover mayonnaise add thick layer parmesan cheese refrigerate day two crumble pound cooked crisp bacon spread top look pretty deep glass bowl
Original_text:
Day Before Salad(Serves 10)  

Ingredients:
- 1 large head lettuce
- 1 medium chopped onion
- 1 medium chopped bell pepper
- 6 stalks chopped celery
- crumbled bacon
- 1 pkg. frozen English peas, cooked, drained and chilled
- mayonnaise
- sugar
- Parmesan cheese, grated

Directions:
- Layer lettuce and chopped vegetables, saving enough lettuce for top layer.
- Layer the peas and last layer of lettuce.
- Cover with mayonnaise.
- Add thick layer of Parmesan cheese and refrigerate a day or two. Crumble 1/2 pound of cooked crisp bacon and spread on top.
- Looks pretty in deep glass bowl.

salad_info: blue devil salad ingredient pkg raspberry gelatin c boiling water blueberry pie filling crushed pineapple drained cream cheese c sour cream c nut chopped c sugar direction quart dish dissolve gelatin water add pie filling pineapple chill firm combine cream cheese sour cream nut sugar spread gelatin mixture chill
Original_text:
Blue Devil Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (6 oz.) pkg. raspberry gelatin
- 1 c. boiling water
- 1 (21 oz.) blueberry pie filling
- 1 (8 1/4 oz.) crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 (8 oz.) cream cheese
- 1 c. sour cream
- 1 c. nuts, chopped
- 1/2 c. sugar

Directions:
- In a 2-quart dish, dissolve gelatin in water.
- Add pie filling and pineapple.
- Chill until firm.
- Combine cream cheese, sour cream, nuts and sugar.
- Spread over gelatin mixture.
- Chill.

salad_info: play dough ingredient c white flour c salt c water tbsp salad oil direction mix ingredient little hand store ziploc bag add food coloring fun
Original_text:
Play Dough

Ingredients:
- 2 c. white flour
- 3/4 c. salt
- 1/2 c. water
- 1 Tbsp. salad oil

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients with little hands.
- Store in Ziploc bag. Add food coloring for more fun.

salad_info: yummy deviled egg ingredient egg small jar sweet relish tbsp mustard tbsp salad dressing tsp salt tsp sugar direction boil egg minute cool peel slice half place yolk bowl mash fork smooth add salad dressing sweet relish mustard sugar salt pepper taste spoon place center egg half sprinkle paprika refrigerate
Original_text:
Yummy Deviled Eggs

Ingredients:
- 1 doz. eggs
- 1/2 small jar sweet relish
- 1 Tbsp. mustard
- 3 Tbsp. salad dressing
- 2 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. sugar

Directions:
- Boil eggs for 15 minutes.
- Cool off and peel.
- Slice in half. Place yolks in a bowl.
- Mash with a fork until smooth.
- Add salad dressing, sweet relish, mustard and sugar.
- Salt and pepper to taste.
- Spoon up and place in center of each egg half.
- Sprinkle with paprika and refrigerate.

salad_info: frosted cranberry salad ingredient x crushed pineapple x pkg lemon gelatin ginger ale jellied cranberry sauce tub cool whip x pkg cream cheese softened c chopped pecan direction drain pineapple reserve syrup make c water bring boil dissolve gelatin hot liquid allow cool gently stir ginger ale chill partially set whip cranberry sauce stir pineapple fold gelatin turn mold chill firm blend together cool whip cream cheese spread gelatin mold sprinkle pecan
Original_text:
Frosted Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 X 13 1/2 oz. can Crushed pineapple
- 1 x 3oz. pkg. Lemon gelatin
- 7 oz. Ginger ale
- 1 lb. can Jellied cranberry sauce
- 1 tub Cool Whip
- 1 x 8 oz. pkg. Cream cheese, softened
- 1/2 c. Chopped pecans

Directions:
- Drain the pineapple and reserve syrup, make up to 1 c.
- with water. Bring to a boil, dissolve the gelatin in the hot liquid and allow to cool. Gently stir in ginger ale, chill until partially set. Whip the cranberry sauce, stir in pineapple and fold in the gelatin. Turn into a mold and chill until firm. Blend together the Cool Whip and cream cheese, spread over the gelatin mold, sprinkle with pecans.

salad_info: waldorf chicken salad ingredient whole chicken rib celery small pkg slivered almond small granny smith apple small red apple orange c mayonnaise tbsp sugar qt cold water lemon juice direction boil chicken break tear bite size piece discard skin dice celery rib small piece peel cut orange bite size piece take quart water add lemon juice cut apple bite size piece let soak waterlemon mixture add drained apple chicken orange almond mayonnaise sugar together bowl mix together may add mayonnaise sugar taste
Original_text:
Waldorf Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 whole chicken
- 4 ribs celery
- 1 small pkg. slivered almonds
- 2 small Granny Smith apples
- 2 small red apples
- 3 oranges
- 1 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 2 qt. cold water
- 1/4 lemon juice

Directions:
- Boil chicken and break or tear into bite size pieces; discard the skin.
- Dice celery ribs into small pieces.
- Peel and cut oranges into bite size pieces.
- Take 2 quarts of water and add the lemon juice.
- Cut up apples into bite size pieces and let soak in water-lemon mixture.
- (This prevents apples from turning brown.) Add drained apples, chicken, oranges, almonds, mayonnaise and sugar together in a bowl and mix together.
- You may add more mayonnaise and sugar to your own taste.

salad_info: pretzel salad ingredient c crushed pretzel c margarine melted tbsp sugar pkg cream cheese c sugar large cool whip large pkg strawberry jello c boiling water pkg fren strawberry direction combine crushed pretzel melted margarine sugar mix well pour x inch dish bake minute cool cream together cream cheese sugar fold cool whip spread mixture cooled pretzel prepare strawberry jello cup boiling water add fren strawberry jello pour onto cheese mixture slightly thickened refrigerate
Original_text:
Pretzel Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. crushed pretzels
- 1/4 c. margarine, melted
- 4 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 large Cool Whip
- 1 large pkg. strawberry jello
- 2 c. boiling water
- 2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen strawberries

Directions:
- Combine crushed pretzels, melted margarine and sugar; mix well.
- Pour into a 9 x 12-inch dish.
- Bake at 400° for 4 to 6 minutes.
- Cool.
- Cream together the cream cheese and sugar.
- Fold in Cool Whip and spread mixture over cooled pretzels.
- Prepare strawberry jello and 2 cups boiling water.
- Add frozen strawberries to jello.
- Pour onto cheese mixture when slightly thickened.
- Refrigerate.

salad_info: diet orange jello salad ingredient small pkg sugarfree orange jello c hot water tbsp salad dressing c cottage cheese mandarin orange c crushed pineapple drained maraschino cherry cut half direction dissolve jello hot water add salad dressing beat stir cottage cheese orange pineapple cherry refrigerate set
Original_text:
Diet Orange Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 small pkg. sugar-free orange jello
- 2 c. hot water
- 3 Tbsp. salad dressing
- 1 c. cottage cheese
- 1 can mandarin oranges
- 1/2 c. crushed pineapple, drained
- 8 maraschino cherries, cut in half

Directions:
- Dissolve jello and hot water.
- Add salad dressing; beat.
- Stir in cottage cheese, oranges, pineapple and cherries.
- Refrigerate until set.

salad_info: fruit cocktail salad ingredient fruit cocktail vanilla pudding mix banana apple jar cherry direction mix vanilla pudding mix fruit cocktail add apple cherry banana
Original_text:
Fruit Cocktail Salad

Ingredients:
- fruit cocktail (don't drain)
- vanilla pudding mix
- 2 bananas
- 1 apple
- 1 jar cherries

Directions:
- Mix vanilla pudding mix in fruit cocktail, then add apple, cherries and bananas.

salad_info: bacon cheese fry ingredient pkg fren french fry c shredded cheddar cheese c thinly sliced green onion c cooked crumbled bacon ranch salad dressing direction cook french fry according package direction place fry broiler proof dish platter sprinkle cheese onion bacon broil minute cheese melted serve ranch dressing yield serving
Original_text:
Bacon Cheese Fries

Ingredients:
- 1 (32 oz.) pkg. frozen French fries
- 1 c. (4 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese
- 1/2 c. thinly sliced green onions
- 1/4 c. cooked crumbled bacon
- Ranch salad dressing

Directions:
- Cook French fries according to package directions. Place fries on a broiler proof dish or platter. Sprinkle with cheese, onions and bacon. Broil for 1 to 2 minutes or until cheese is melted. Serve with Ranch dressing. Yields 8 to 10 servings.

salad_info: mexican salad ingredient hamburger cooked drained small onion chopped c raw rice cooked c tomato sauce pkg chili seasoning direction large shallow baking pan put layer corn chip layer rice layer hamburger mixture sprinkle grated cheese put oven melt cheese top put layer shredded lettuce layer cherry tomato
Original_text:
Mexican Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. hamburger, cooked and drained
- 1 small onion, chopped
- 1 c. raw rice, cooked
- 1 c. tomato sauce
- 1/2 pkg. chili seasoning

Directions:
- In large shallow baking pan, put 1 layer corn chips (not too thick, as it dries out), 1 layer rice and 1 layer hamburger mixture (hamburger, onion, tomato sauce and chili seasoning).
- Sprinkle with grated cheese (Cheddar).
- Put in oven to melt cheese.
- On top, put 1 layer shredded lettuce and 1 layer cherry tomatoes (or cut up whole tomatoes).

salad_info: chicken n rice ingredient chicken breast half bottle italian salad dressing c uncooked regular rice bag fren broccoli carrot water chestnut red pepper combination durkee french fried onion can chicken broth tsp durkee italian seasoning direction place chicken breast x inch baking dish pour salad dressing chicken bake uncovered minute place rice vegetable durkee french fried onion around chicken combine chicken broth italian seasoning pour mixture chicken vegetable bake uncovered minute top remaining onion bake another minute
Original_text:
Chicken 'N Rice

Ingredients:
- 4 chicken breast halves
- 1/3 bottle Italian salad dressing
- 2/3 c. uncooked regular rice
- 1 (16 oz.) bag frozen broccoli, carrots, water chestnuts and red pepper combination
- 1 (2.8 oz.) can Durkee French fried onions
- 2 cans chicken broth
- 1/2 tsp. Durkee Italian seasoning

Directions:
- Place chicken breasts in an 8 x 12-inch baking dish.
- Pour salad dressing over chicken.
- Bake, uncovered, at 400° for 20 minutes.
- Place rice, vegetables and 1/2 can Durkee French fried onions around and under chicken.
- Combine chicken broth and Italian seasoning and pour the mixture over chicken and vegetables.
- Bake, uncovered, 25 minutes.
- Top with remaining onions and bake another 2 to 3 minutes.

salad_info: dump salad ingredient eagle brand milk large crushed pineapple juice cherry pie filling cool whip chopped nut direction mix ingredient chill hour
Original_text:
Dump Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can Eagle Brand milk
- 1 large can crushed pineapple with juice
- 1 can cherry pie filling
- 12 oz. Cool Whip
- chopped nuts (optional)

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients and chill for 1 hour.

salad_info: orange salad ingredient large carton cool whip large pkg orange jello powder med container cottage cheese mandarin orange slice chunk pineapple pkg coconut direction mix cool whip jello powder stir remaining ingredient chill well garnish extra cool whip
Original_text:
Orange Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large carton Cool Whip
- 1 large pkg. orange jello powder
- 1 med container cottage cheese
- 1 can mandarin orange slices
- 1 can chunk pineapple (cut up)
- 1/2 pkg. coconut (optional)

Directions:
- Mix Cool Whip and jello powder; stir in all remaining ingredients.
- Chill well.
- Garnish with extra Cool Whip (optional).

salad_info: stacys marinated potato salad ingredient cooked potato quartered c italian salad dressing c sliced green onion c chopped parsley c mayonnaise sliced hardboiled egg direction leave skin potato boiling put large bowl boiled drained make following pour potato still warm italian salad dressing sliced green onion chopped parsley pour warm bitesize potato let set hour marinate toss several time add mayonnaise toss completely covered put fridge least hour better chill overnight flavor plenty time blend serving garnish sliced hardboiled egg great
Original_text:
Stacy'S Marinated Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 lb. cooked potatoes, quartered (use "red" potatoes)
- 1/2 c. Italian salad dressing (the bottled type)
- 1/2 c. sliced green onions
- 1/4 c. chopped parsley
- 1 c. mayonnaise *
- sliced hard-boiled eggs

Directions:
- Leave skin on potatoes when boiling.
- Put in large bowl when boiled and after drained.
- Make the following to pour over while potatoes are still warm:
- Italian salad dressing, sliced green onions and chopped parsley.
- Pour over the warm bite-size potatoes and let set for about 1 hour to marinate.
- Toss several times. Then add the mayonnaise.
- Toss until completely covered.
- Put in fridge for at least 2 hours.
- Better to chill overnight so flavors have plenty of time to blend.
- Just before serving, garnish with sliced hard-boiled eggs.
- Great!

salad_info: curried tuna salad ingredient c uncooked shell macaroni c finely chopped green pepper salted sunflower seed green onion c chopped celery pkg fren pea thawed drained can white chunk tuna hardboiled egg direction cook macaroni rinse drain
Original_text:
Curried Tuna Salad(Serves 10 To 12)  

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 c. uncooked shell macaroni
- 1/2 c. each: finely chopped green pepper, salted sunflower seeds, green onions (include the tips)
- 1 c. chopped celery
- 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas, thawed and drained
- 3 cans white chunk tuna
- 3 hard-boiled eggs

Directions:
- Cook macaroni; rinse and drain.

salad_info: strawberry salad ingredient pkg strawberry jello c boiling water pkg fren strawberry small crushed pineapple drained banana grated mashed direction dissolve jello boiling water hot mixture add fruit place half mixture oblong dish place refrigerator let set spread evenly thinly pint sour cream spread remaining half jello mixture let set
Original_text:
Strawberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 pkg. strawberry jello
- 2 c. boiling water
- 2 pkg. frozen strawberries
- 1 small can crushed pineapple, drained
- 2 bananas, grated or mashed

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in boiling water.
- To this hot mixture, add fruit.
- Place half of mixture in oblong dish.
- Place in refrigerator and let set.
- Then spread evenly and thinly 1/2 pint sour cream.
- Spread remaining half of jello mixture and let set.

salad_info: italian mushroom gravy ingredient c fresh mushroom c warm water tbsp olive salad oil c chopped parsley stalk celery c diced carrot c chopped onion c sliced zucchini clove minced garlic tsp rosemary tsp thyme tsp sage can tomato sauce can tomato tsp crushed red pepper salt taste direction heat oil frypan medium heat hot add parsley garlic rosemary thyme sage vegetable cook vegies soft stir tomato sauce tomato liquid plus red pepper chop mushroom add pan along water use dried italian mushroom water soaking liquid cover simmer thick hour add salt taste make quart
Original_text:
Italian Mushroom Gravy

Ingredients:
- 1 c. fresh mushrooms
- 1 1/2 c. warm water
- 3 Tbsp. olive or salad oil
- 1 1/2 c. chopped parsley
- 2 to 3 stalks celery
- 1/2 c. diced carrot
- 1 c. chopped onion
- 1 c. sliced zucchini
- 2 cloves minced garlic
- 1/2 tsp. rosemary
- 1/2 tsp. thyme
- 1/2 tsp. sage
- 2 (15 oz.) cans tomato sauce
- 2 (1 lb.) cans tomatoes
- 1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
- salt to taste

Directions:
- Heat oil in frypan over medium heat.
- When hot, add parsley, garlic, rosemary, thyme, sage and vegetables.
- Cook until vegies are soft.
- Stir in tomato sauce, tomatoes and their liquid (break up tomatoes), plus the red pepper.
- Chop mushrooms and add to pan along with water.
- Can use dried Italian mushrooms with this water as a soaking liquid.
- Cover and simmer until thick, about 3 hours. Add salt to taste.
- Makes about 2 1/2 quarts.

salad_info: date nut bread ingredient c plain flour c sugar tsp baking powder tsp salt tbsp salad oil c milk egg c finely chopped nut c cutup date direction heat oven grease flour loaf pan measure ingredient large mixer bowl beat medium speed minute pour pan bake minute wooden pick inserted center come clean remove pan cool thoroughly slicing
Original_text:
Date Nut Bread

Ingredients:
- 2 1/2 c. plain flour
- 1 c. sugar
- 3 1/2 tsp. baking powder
- 1 tsp. salt
- 3 Tbsp. salad oil
- 1 1/4 c. milk
- 1 egg
- 1 c. finely chopped nuts
- 1 c. cut-up dates

Directions:
- Heat oven to 350°.
- Grease and flour loaf pan(s).
- Measure all ingredients into a large mixer bowl; beat on medium speed 1/2 minute.
- Pour into pan(s).
- Bake 55 to 65 minutes or until a wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean.
- Remove from pan(s).
- Cool thoroughly before slicing.

salad_info: chef salad ingredient head lettuce chicken meat cooked ham swiss cheese hardboiled egg tbsp chopped onion direction shred lettuce put large bowl cut strip chicken ham cheese arrange lettuce top thinly sliced egg scatter onion
Original_text:
Chef'S Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head lettuce
- 1/4 lb. chicken meat
- 1/4 lb. cooked ham
- 1/4 lb. Swiss cheese
- 2 hard-boiled eggs
- 1 Tbsp. chopped onions

Directions:
- Shred lettuce and put into a large bowl.
- Cut into strips the chicken, ham and cheese; arrange over lettuce.
- Top with thinly sliced eggs and scatter over with onions.

salad_info: guacamole ingredient avocado tsp lemon juice tsp salt tsp onion grated tomato chopped hot pepper mashed direction peel mash ripe avocado pulp add remaining ingredient serve salad heaped tomato slice dip chip
Original_text:
Guacamole

Ingredients:
- 3 avocados
- 2 tsp. lemon juice
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. onion, grated
- 1 tomato, chopped
- 1 hot pepper, mashed

Directions:
- Peel and mash ripe avocado pulp.
- Add remaining ingredients. Serve as a salad, heaped on tomato slices, or as a dip for chips.

salad_info: orange sherbet salad ingredient pkg orange jello c boiling water pt orange sherbet mandarin orange drained crushed pineapple drained banana sliced direction dissolve jello boiling water add sherbet allow melt add drained fruit sliced banana chill serf
Original_text:
Orange Sherbet Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. orange Jell-O
- 2 c. boiling water
- 1 pt. orange sherbet
- 1 can mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 can crushed pineapple, drained
- 2 bananas, sliced

Directions:
- Dissolve Jell-O in boiling water.
- Add sherbet and allow to melt.
- Add drained fruit and sliced bananas.
- Chill.
- Serves 12.

salad_info: peach salad ingredient c plain flour c brown sugar c chopped pecan c melted margarine direction mix put greased x inch baking dish bake minute
Original_text:
Peach Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 c. plain flour
- 1/4 c. brown sugar (packed)
- 1/2 c. chopped pecans
- 1/2 c. melted margarine

Directions:
- Mix and put in greased 13 x 9-inch baking dish.
- Bake at 350° for 15 to 20 minutes.

salad_info: vegetable dip ingredient c dannon vanilla yogurt c miracle whip salad dressing tsp dried dill weed tsp lawrys seasoned salt tsp dried parsley direction mix well let stand several hour use variety fresh vegetable
Original_text:
Vegetable Dip

Ingredients:
- 1 c. Dannon vanilla yogurt
- 1 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing
- 1 tsp. dried dill weed
- 1 tsp. Lawry's seasoned salt
- 1 tsp. dried parsley

Directions:
- Mix well and let stand several hours.
- Use with a variety of fresh vegetables.

salad_info: broccoli salad ingredient bunch fresh broccoli chopped small onion chopped c golden raisin c sunflower seed slice crisp bacon crumbled c mayonnaise c sugar tbsp vinegar direction mix first ingredient together mix next ingredient together make dressing pour dressing salad let set least hour serving
Original_text:
Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 bunch fresh broccoli, chopped
- 1 small onion, chopped
- 1 c. golden raisins
- 3/4 c. sunflower seeds
- 12 slices crisp bacon, crumbled
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1/3 c. sugar
- 2 Tbsp. vinegar

Directions:
- Mix first 5
- ingredients together.
- Mix next 3 ingredients together to make
- dressing.
- Pour dressing over salad and let set for at least 2 to 3 hours before serving.

salad_info: caramel apple salad ingredient pkg instant butterscotch pudding container cool whip crushed pineapple c mini marshmallow c apple chopped c dry roasted peanut chopped snicker bar direction mix dry pudding cool whip pineapple juice well blended stir apple marshmallow peanut candy bar thoroughly combined refrigerate served best eaten within hour taste like caramel apple
Original_text:
Caramel Apple Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. instant butterscotch pudding
- 1 (8 oz.) container Cool Whip
- 1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple (with juice)
- 1 c. mini marshmallows
- 3 c. apples (with peelings), chopped
- 1 c. dry roasted peanuts or 3 chopped up Snickers bars

Directions:
- Mix dry pudding, Cool Whip and pineapple and juice until well blended. Stir in apples, marshmallows and peanuts or candy bars until thoroughly combined.
- Refrigerate until served. Best if eaten within 24 hours. Tastes like a caramel apple.

salad_info: pea peanut salad ingredient slice bacon fried crumbled c finely chopped onion fren pea cooked minute drained c celery diced c mayonnaise c salted peanut cherry tomato quartered direction combine ingredient cool chill serving time add
Original_text:
Pea And Peanut Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 slices bacon, fried and crumbled
- 1/2 c. finely chopped onion
- 10 oz. frozen peas, cooked 3 minutes and drained
- 1 c. celery, diced
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1/2 to 3/4 c. salted peanuts
- cherry tomatoes, quartered

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients.
- Cool and chill.
- At serving time, add:

salad_info: molded jello salad ingredient large pkg strawberrybanana jello pkg fren strawberry crushed pineapple c nut c sour cream direction mix jello cup boiling water add fren strawberry stir separated add drained crushed pineapple nut put mixture bowl set refrigerator minute remove refrigerator spread sour cream pour remaining jello top return refrigerator
Original_text:
Molded Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large pkg. strawberry-banana jello
- 1 pkg. frozen strawberries
- 1 can crushed pineapple (8 oz.)
- 1 c. nuts (more if desired)
- 1 c. sour cream

Directions:
- Mix jello with 1 cup boiling water.
- Add frozen strawberries and stir until separated.
- Add drained crushed pineapple and nuts. Put 1/2 mixture in bowl and set in refrigerator 10 to 15 minutes (until slightly gelled).
- Remove from refrigerator and spread with sour cream.
- Pour remaining jello on top and return to refrigerator.
- (Should remaining jello gel, place bowl in warm water and stir until slightly thin.)

salad_info: pasta shrimp salad ingredient vermicelli cooked drained bottle wishbone italian dressing c chopped fresh parsley c mayonnaise tbsp olive oil green onion chopped tsp oregano tsp basil small jar diced pimento garlic salt lemon pepper taste shrimp meat direction toss first ingredient together refrigerate overnight add remaining ingredient refrigerate serving toss shrimp meat
Original_text:
Pasta Shrimp Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. vermicelli, cooked and drained
- 1 (8 oz.) bottle Wish-Bone Italian dressing
- 3/4 c. chopped fresh parsley
- 1 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1 Tbsp. olive oil
- 2 green onions, chopped
- 1 tsp. oregano
- 1 tsp. basil
- 1 small jar diced pimentos
- garlic salt and lemon pepper to taste
- 1 lb. shrimp meat

Directions:
- Toss first 2 ingredients together and refrigerate overnight. Add remaining ingredients (except shrimp). Refrigerate.
- Just before serving, toss in shrimp meat.

salad_info: cocacola salad ingredient fruit cocktail c crushed pecan c water small box red cherry strawberry jello coke direction drain juice cocktail add water make almost cup put jello add coke place refrigerator let almost jel pour pecan fruit cocktail set refrigerator jelled
Original_text:
Coca-Cola Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can fruit cocktail
- 1 c. crushed pecans
- 1 1/2 c. water
- 2 small boxes red cherry or strawberry jello
- 1 (12 oz.) can Coke

Directions:
- Drain juice off cocktail and add water to make almost 2 cups. Put jello in and add Coke.
- Place in refrigerator and let almost jel.
- Pour in pecans and fruit cocktail.
- Set in refrigerator until jelled.

Original_text:
Strawberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 oz. strawberry gelatin
- 1 large can crushed pineapple and juice
- 2 c. buttermilk
- 1 (9 oz.) frozen whipped topping
- 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen strawberries, partially thawed
- 1/2 c. nuts (optional)

Directions:
- Mix gelatin and pineapple in saucepan.
- Bring almost to boil; let cool. Add buttermilk, whipped topping, strawberries and nuts. Spread in 9 x 13 pan. Let congeal in refrigerator.

salad_info: grandma e molded shrimp salad ingredient c cold water c tomato juice small onion chopped fine envelope knox gelatine tsp salt dash cayenne pepper small bay leaf desired tbsp mild vinegar lemon juice small cleaned shrimp diced stalk celery direction mix tomato juice bay leaf salt cayenne pepper chopped onion celery put saucepan simmer minute soften gelatine cold water dissolve hot tomato juice mixture add vinegar remove bay leaf cool
Original_text:
Grandma E'S Molded Shrimp Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/4 c. cold water
- 2 c. tomato juice
- 1 small onion, chopped fine
- 1 envelope Knox gelatine
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- dash cayenne pepper
- small bay leaf, if desired
- 1 Tbsp. mild vinegar or lemon juice
- 1/2 lb. small cleaned shrimp, diced
- 1 stalk celery

Directions:
- Mix tomato juice, bay leaf, salt, cayenne pepper, chopped onion and celery (also chopped).
- Put in saucepan and simmer 10 minutes.
- Soften gelatine in cold water and dissolve in hot tomato juice mixture.
- Add vinegar, remove bay leaf and cool.

salad_info: orange salad ingredient crushed pineapple c sugar orange jello c cold water large cool whip lettuce direction bring pineapple sugar boil cool mix jello water cool pineapple chill refrigerator fold large cool whip chill serve lettuce vegetable
Original_text:
Orange Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can crushed pineapple (small)
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 (3 oz.) orange Jell-O
- 1 c. cold water
- 1 large Cool Whip
- lettuce

Directions:
- Bring pineapple and sugar to a boil, then cool.
- Mix Jell-O and water to cool pineapple.
- Chill in refrigerator.
- Fold in large Cool Whip.
- Chill and serve on lettuce or with any vegetable.

salad_info: hot chicken salad ingredient c diced cooked chicken c diced celery c mayonnaise salad dressing c slivered almond tsp accent tbsp lemon juice tbsp grated onion tsp salt direction pile lightly x inch casserole sprinkle cup grated cheese cup crushed potato chip bake minute hot
Original_text:
Hot Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. diced cooked chicken
- 2 c. diced celery
- 3/4 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
- 1/2 c. slivered almonds
- 1/2 tsp. Accent
- 2 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 2 Tbsp. grated onion
- 1/2 tsp. salt

Directions:
- Pile lightly in an 8 x 9-inch casserole.
- Sprinkle with 1/2 cup grated cheese and 1 cup crushed potato chips (or any kind of crumbs).
- Bake at 425° for 20 minutes or until hot.

salad_info: fresh vegetable salad ingredient bunch broccoli c raisin c toasted sunflower seed chopped onion small head cauliflower bacon fried crumbled grated carrot direction mix ingredient large bowl except sunflower seed toss dressing store covered refrigerator toss sunflower seed serving
Original_text:
Fresh Vegetable Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 bunches broccoli
- 1 c. raisins
- 1/2 c. toasted sunflower seeds
- chopped onion (optional)
- 1 small head cauliflower
- 1/2 lb. bacon, fried and crumbled
- grated carrots (optional)

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients in large bowl except sunflower seeds. Toss with dressing and store covered in refrigerator.
- Toss in sunflower seeds before serving.

salad_info: championship chicken breast ingredient c miracle whip salad dressing tbsp dijon mustard tbsp honey boneless chicken breast half direction mix salad dressing mustard honey place chicken grill rack broiler pan brush half salad dressing mixture grill broil minute turn brush remaining salad dressing mixture continue broiling grilling minute tender make serving
Original_text:
Championship Chicken Breasts

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing
- 2 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
- 1 Tbsp. honey
- 4 boneless chicken breast halves (about 1 1/4 lb.)

Directions:
- Mix salad dressing, mustard and honey.
- Place chicken on grill or rack of broiler pan.
- Brush with half of the salad dressing mixture.
- Grill or broil 8 minutes.
- Turn; brush with remaining salad dressing mixture.
- Continue broiling or grilling 8 to 10 minutes or until tender.
- Makes 4 servings.

salad_info: puffy fried bread ingredient cup flour tsp salt tsp baking powder tbsp sugar tbsp shortening c milk salad oil deep frying direction sift flour measure sift salt baking powder sugar cut shortening add milk make soft dough firm enough roll cover bowl let dough stand min roll inch thick lightly floured surface cut diamond shaped piece heat inch oil frying pan add piece time turn puff evenly turn back brown side drain paper toweling serve butter honey make den
Original_text:
Puffy Fried Bread

Ingredients:
- 4 cups Flour
- 1 1\4 tsp. Salt
- 3 tsp. Baking Powder
- 3 tbsp. Sugar
- 2 tbsp. Shortening
- 1 1\4 C. Milk
- Salad Oil for Deep Frying

Directions:
- Sift flour, measure, and sift again with salt, baking powder, and sugar. Cut in shortening, and add milk to make a soft dough just firm enough to roll. Cover bowl and let dough stand for 30 to 60 min. Roll 1\4 inch thick on lightly floured surface. Cut into diamond shaped pieces.
- Heat about 1 inch of oil in frying pan 370° to 380°. Add a few pieces at a time; turn at once, so they will puff evenly. Then turn back to brown on both sides. Drain on paper toweling. Serve with butter or honey. Makes 4 dozen.

salad_info: cold bean salad ingredient green bean drained small garden pea c chopped pimento c chopped onion small red onion sliced ring c vinegar c salad oil tsp salt tsp black pepper c sugar direction large mixing bowl combine first ingredient combine remaining ingredient store refrigerator overnight
Original_text:
Cold Bean Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can green beans, drained (French-style)
- 1 can small garden peas
- 1/2 c. chopped pimento
- 1/2 c. chopped onion
- 1 small red onion, sliced in rings
- 1 c. vinegar
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 2 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. black pepper
- 1/2 c. sugar

Directions:
- In large mixing bowl, combine first 5 ingredients.
- Combine remaining ingredients and store in refrigerator overnight.

7-Up Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. lime jello
- 1 c. boiling water

Original_text:
Crab Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. crabmeat
- 1 lb. elbow macaroni, cooked and drained
- 1 large onion
- 1 large cucumber
- 2 tomatoes
- 1 to 2 c. salad dressing (Miracle Whip)
- Season-All
- bay seasoning

Directions:
- After macaroni has been cooked and drained, add chopped vegetables and salad dressing.
- Mix and season for taste.
- Chill. (When I don't have fresh crabmeat, I use imitation crabmeat.)

Original_text:
Green Wonder Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 medium onions, sliced thinly
- 1 1/2 c. sliced celery
- 3/4 c. cider vinegar
- 2 small jars mushrooms
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. salt
- 1 Tbsp. pepper
- 1 (No. 2) can Chinese vegetables
- 1 (No. 2) can LeSueur English peas
- 1 (No. 2) can French-style green beans
- 1 (8 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts

Directions:
- Do not drain liquid from vegetables.
- Mix all and marinate overnight. Lasts weeks. Serves 12 to 16.

salad_info: taco pie ingredient pkg crescent roll c chopped onion pkg taco seasoning pkg sour cream ground chuck c shredded cheddar cheese c water bag doritos crushed direction use large glass pie dish x inch glass dish spread roll form crust brown meat onion add taco seasoning water bring boil spread meat mixture roll spread sour cream meat sprinkle cheese sour cream top crushed doritos bake minute serve salad
Original_text:
Taco Pie

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. crescent rolls
- 1/2 c. chopped onion
- 1 pkg. taco seasoning
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. sour cream
- 1 1/2 lb. ground chuck
- 1 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
- 2/3 c. water
- 1 bag Doritos, crushed

Directions:
- Use a large glass pie dish or a 9 x 13-inch glass dish. Spread rolls to form crust.
- (Pam the pan first.)
- Brown meat and onion.
- Add taco seasoning and water.
- I bring to boil.
- Spread meat mixture over rolls.
- Spread sour cream over meat.
- Sprinkle cheese over sour cream.
- Top with crushed Doritos.
- Bake at 350° for 20 minutes.
- Serve with a salad.

salad_info: cranberry orange salad mold ingredient pkg black cherry jello c hot water tbsp gelatin c pineapple juice c sugar tbsp lemon juice c raw cranberry ground c orange peeled ground c crushed pineapple drained c chopped pecan direction dissolve cherry gelatin hot water add sugar lemon juice soak gelatin pineapple juice dissolve hot water add cherry gelatin mixture gelatin begin thicken add ingredient pour mold
Original_text:
Cranberry And Orange Salad Mold

Ingredients:
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. black cherry jello
- 1 c. hot water
- 1 Tbsp. gelatin
- 1 c. pineapple juice
- 3/4 c. sugar
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1 c. raw cranberries, ground
- 2 c. oranges, peeled and ground
- 1 c. crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 c. chopped pecans

Directions:
- Dissolve cherry gelatin in hot water.
- Add sugar and lemon juice.
- Soak gelatin in pineapple juice and dissolve over hot water.
- Add to cherry gelatin mixture.
- When gelatin begins to thicken, add other ingredients.
- Pour into molds.

Original_text:
Frozen Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 large carton Cool Whip
- 1 can cherry pie filling
- 1 can Eagle Brand milk
- 1 can Mandarin oranges
- 1 c. nuts
- 1 c. coconut

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients except pineapple and oranges; mix well. Add pineapple and oranges and freeze.

Original_text:
Chicken Liver Stroganoff

Ingredients:
- 1/4 c. butter
- 1/2 lb. halved chicken livers
- 1 tsp. salt
- dash of pepper
- 1 tsp. paprika
- 1 c. sour cream
- 2 c. onions, thinly sliced

Directions:
- Cook onions in butter until tender, not brown.
- Add chicken livers.
- Season with salt and pepper also paprika.
- Brown livers. Cover; cook over low heat for 10 minutes.
- Add sour cream; heat thoroughly.
- Serve over rice.
- Serve with Sue Tossed Salad in 1988 book, page 19.
