Original_text:
Watergate Salad

Ingredients:
- 9 oz. whipped topping
- 1 box instant pistachio pudding
- 16 oz. can crushed pineapple with juice
- 1 c. mini marshmallows
- 1/2 c. nuts

Directions:
- Fold dry pudding mix into whipped topping.
- Add pineapple, juice, marshmallows and nuts.
- Refrigerate!

Original_text:
Sugar-Free Orange-Pineapple Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large box sugar-free jello (orange)
- 1 large can crushed pineapple in own juice
- 1 1/2 c. water
- 1 can mandarin oranges (optional)

Directions:
- Boil water and add jello.
- Mix thoroughly.
- Add pineapple and mandarin oranges.
- Refrigerate until congealed.

salad_info: sevenlayer salad ingredient head iceberg lettuce torn bitesize piece pea drained stalk celery sliced chopped bermuda onion chopped c mayonnaise c parmesan cheese slice bacon crumbled direction large bowl layer following lettuce pea celery onion mayonnaise cover mayonnaise parmesan cheese top bacon cover refrigerate approximately hour prior serving serf
Original_text:
Seven-Layer Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head iceberg lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces
- 1 (12 oz.) can peas, drained
- 3 to 4 stalks celery, sliced or chopped
- 1 Bermuda onion, chopped
- 1 to 2 c. mayonnaise (spread to cover and seal the first four layers)
- 1 c. Parmesan cheese
- 6 to 10 slices bacon, crumbled

Directions:
- In a large bowl, layer the following:
- lettuce, peas, celery, onion and mayonnaise.
- Cover mayonnaise with Parmesan cheese.
- Top with bacon.
- Cover and refrigerate approximately 8 hours prior to serving.
- Serves 8 to 10.

Original_text:
Cool Creamy Cucumber Salad

Ingredients:
- 5 medium cucumbers
- 1 medium red onion, thinly sliced
- 1 (2 oz.) jar sliced pimento, drained
- 1/2 c. prepared Ranch dressing
- 2 Tbsp. chives
- 1 tsp. dill weed

Directions:
- Combine cucumbers, onion, pimento, chives and dill weed in medium size bowl.
- Add the salad dressing and toss.

salad_info: dinner salad ingredient bunch cauliflower bunch broccoli carrot tomato head lettuce c cheddar cheese grated c cooked cubed ham turkey chicken hardboiled egg c miracle whip favorite dressing direction chop broccoli cauliflower lettuce tomato place vegetable large mixing bowl grate carrot add vegetable mixture stir cheese meat adding hardboiled egg slice mix vegetable mix miracle whip refrigerate hour serve cracker toast
Original_text:
Dinner Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 bunch cauliflower
- 1 bunch broccoli
- 8 carrots
- 3 tomatoes (large)
- 1 head lettuce
- 1 c. Cheddar cheese, grated
- 2 c. cooked and cubed ham, turkey or chicken
- 3 hard-boiled eggs (optional)
- 1 c. Miracle Whip or your favorite dressing

Directions:
- Chop broccoli, cauliflower, lettuce and tomatoes. Place the vegetables in a large mixing bowl.
- Grate carrots and add to vegetable mixture.
- Stir in cheese and meat.
- If adding the hard-boiled eggs, slice them and mix into vegetables. Mix with Miracle Whip and refrigerate 1 hour.
- Serve with crackers or toast.

salad_info: baked seafood rice salad ingredient c rice cooked c chopped celery c green pepper finely chopped green onion finely sliced water chestnut medium shrimp drained crabmeat chicken c mayonnaise c tomato juice grated parmesan cheese direction combine first ingredient put shallow quart casserole sprinkle cheese bake minute make serving
Original_text:
Baked Seafood Rice Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 1/3 c. rice, cooked
- 1 c. chopped celery
- 1/2 c. green pepper, finely chopped
- 3 green onions, finely sliced
- 1 (6 1/2 oz.) can water chestnuts
- 1 (4 1/2 oz.) can medium shrimp, drained
- 1 (6 1/2 oz.) can crabmeat or chicken
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 3/4 c. tomato juice
- grated Parmesan cheese

Directions:
- Combine first 9 ingredients.
- Put in shallow 2 quart casserole and sprinkle with cheese.
- Bake at 350° for 25 minutes.
- Makes 6 servings.

Original_text:
German Potato Salad(Kartoffelsalat)

- 12 slices bacon, diced and fried until crisp (reserve 6 Tbsp. drippings)

- 1 c. less 2 Tbsp. cider vinegar
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. sugar

- 3/4 tsp. pepper
- 2 to 3 lb. potatoes, cooked, peeled and cut in 1/4-inch slices*

Directions:
- *The amount of potatoes used for this tangy hot potato salad will determine the number of servings.

Original_text:
Macaroni Salad(For Large Gathering)  

Ingredients:
- 2 lb. box macaroni
- 2 lb. Colby cheese
- 4 large tomatoes
- 3 or 4 medium cucumbers
- 2 or 3 medium bell peppers
- 1 medium jar sweet pickle relish
- 1 to 1 1/2 qt. Miracle Whip

Directions:
- Cook macaroni.
- Drain and let cool. Cut cheese, tomatoes, cucumbers and bell peppers in little cubes.
- Mix this with cooled macaroni, relish and Miracle Whip to taste.
- (Original recipe did not list quantities or ingredients.)

salad_info: alessas cornbread salad ingredient pkg ranch dressing mix c sour cream c mayonnaise pan cornbread crumbled can pinto bean drained large tomato chopped c chopped green pepper c chopped green onion c shredded cheddar cheese slice bacon cooked crumbled whole kernel corn drained direction combine salad dressing mix sour cream mayonnaise set aside place half crumbled cornbread large bowl top half bean medium bowl combine tomato pepper onion layer half mixture bean layer half cheese bacon corn reserved salad dressing repeat layer using remaining ingredient garnish desired
Original_text:
Alessa'S Cornbread Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (1 oz.) pkg. Ranch dressing mix
- 1 c. sour cream
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 (9-inch) pan cornbread, crumbled
- 2 (16 oz.) cans pinto beans, drained
- 3 large tomatoes, chopped
- 1/2 c. chopped green pepper
- 1/2 c. chopped green onions
- 2 c. (8 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese
- 10 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled
- 1 (17 oz.) can whole kernel corn, drained

Directions:
- Combine salad dressing mix, sour cream and mayonnaise.
- Set aside.
- Place half of crumbled cornbread in a large bowl.
- Top with half of beans.
- In a medium bowl, combine tomatoes, pepper and onions; layer half of this mixture over beans.
- Layer half of cheese, bacon, corn and reserved salad dressing.
- Repeat layers, using remaining ingredients.
- Garnish as desired.

Original_text:
Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lime jello (3 oz. size)
- 1 cream cheese (8 oz.)
- 1 c. crushed pineapple
- marshmallow topping

Directions:
- Mix jello according to directions.
- Beat in cream cheese.
- Add pineapple after draining.
- Add nuts, if you want.
- Sprinkle marshmallow topping on top.
- Chill until firm.
- Any flavor of jello and fruit combination could be substituted.

Green Salad

- 1 small can pineapple
- 1 c. whipped topping
- 2 Tbsp. mayonnaise

Directions:
- Mix Jell-O as directed on package. When it begins to set, add rest of the ingredients. Mix well. Let set. Serve on lettuce with mayonnaise and crackers.

Dilled Macaroni And Cheese Salad(Cold)

- Cook macaroni, omitting salt.
- Drain well; rinse in cold water.
- Combine the next 4 ingredients and the cooked macaroni.

Original_text:
Pea Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 medium can peas
- 1 medium can corn
- 1 c. chopped celery
- 1 c. chopped onion
- 1 c. chopped green pepper
- 1 jar diced pimiento
- 1 c. sugar
- 3/4 c. white vinegar
- 1/4 c. oil
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. pepper

Directions:
- Mix sugar, vinegar, oil, salt and pepper; heat until sugar dissolves.
- Let cool.
- Add peas, corn, celery, onion, green pepper and pimiento.
- Let chill overnight.

salad_info: rich charlies salad ingredient large jar pimento jar marinated artichoke heart red onion cut ring c parmesan cheese c salad oil c red wine vinegar clove garlic chopped tsp salt tsp accent generous dash pepper large head lettuce spinach direction marinate hour add one large head lettuce sprinkle parmesan cheese
Original_text:
Rich And Charlie'S Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large jar pimentos
- 2 jars marinated artichoke hearts
- 1 red onion, cut in rings
- 1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
- 3/4 c. salad oil
- 1/4 c. red wine vinegar
- 1 clove garlic, chopped
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. Accent
- generous dash of pepper
- 1 large head lettuce
- spinach (if desired)

Directions:
- Marinate 3 hours.
- Add one large head of lettuce.
- Sprinkle on more Parmesan cheese.

salad_info: turkey chili ingredient tbsp salad oil ground turkey large onion diced small garlic clove minced tsp chili powder tomato c water tsp salt tsp sugar tsp crushed red pepper red kidney bean direction large skillet mediumhigh heat hot salad oil cook turkey onion garlic pan juice evaporate turkey well browned stirring frequently stir chili powder cook minute stir tomato liquid water salt sugar crushed red pepper high heat heat boiling reduce heat low simmer uncovered minute blend flavor gently stir kidney bean heat
Original_text:
Turkey Chili

Ingredients:
- 1 Tbsp. salad oil
- 16 oz. ground turkey
- 1 large onion, diced
- 1 small garlic clove, minced
- 4 tsp. chili powder
- 1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes
- 1 c. water
- 1 1/2 tsp. salt
- 3/4 tsp. sugar
- 1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
- 15 1/4 oz. can red kidney beans

Directions:
- In a large skillet over medium-high heat, in hot salad oil, cook turkey, onion and garlic until all pan juices evaporate and turkey is well browned, stirring frequently.
- Stir in chili powder and cook 1 minute.
- Stir in tomatoes with their liquid, water, salt, sugar and crushed red pepper.
- Over high heat, heat to boiling.
- Reduce heat to low.
- Simmer uncovered 10 minutes to blend flavors.
- Gently stir in kidney beans and heat through.

salad_info: mushroom steak ingredient top sirloin tbsp butter margarine tbsp worcestershire sauce tsp dried basil tsp dried tarragon c mushroom sliced c dry vermouth c jack cheese shredded tbsp flour direction cut steak serving melt butter skillet add worcestershire sauce basil tarragon place steak skillet cook minute side remove warmed platter cover foil place mushroom skillet add wine salt pepper saute mushroom cooked small bowl toss cheese flour stir mushroom cook cheese melted pour steak great potato salad easy great
Original_text:
Mushrooms And Steak

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 lb. top sirloin
- 3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
- 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
- 1 tsp. dried basil
- 1/2 tsp. dried tarragon
- 3 c. mushrooms, sliced
- 1/2 c. dry vermouth (wine)
- 1/4 c. Jack cheese, shredded
- 1 Tbsp. flour

Directions:
- Cut steak into 4 servings. Melt butter in skillet; add Worcestershire sauce, basil and tarragon.
- Place steaks in skillet. Cook 5 minutes on both sides.
- Remove to warmed platter.
- Cover with foil.
- Place mushrooms in skillet.
- Add wine, salt and pepper.
- Saute until mushrooms are cooked.
- In a small bowl, toss cheese with flour and stir in with mushrooms.
- Cook until cheese is melted.
- Pour over steaks.
- Great with potatoes (baked) and salad.
- This is so easy and great.

Original_text:
Cranberry Congealed Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. cherry Jell-O
- 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple (reserve juice)
- 1 (11 oz.) can mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 can whole berry cranberry sauce

Directions:
- Heat pineapple juice and dissolve Jell-O.
- Stir well.
- Add cranberry sauce and mix well.
- Add pineapple and oranges.
- Mix well and pour into Jell-O mold.
- Chill.

Original_text:
Strawberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 oz. pkg. jello, dissolved
- 1 pkg. sliced drained strawberries
- 1 carton Cool Whip (8 oz.)
- 1 small carton sour cream
- 1 small can crushed drained pineapple

Directions:
- Place sliced strawberries in jello; congeal overnight.
- Mix Cool Whip, sour cream and pineapple.
- Spread over jello.
- Top with chopped pecans.
- Chill again until firm.

Original_text:
Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 7 lb. potatoes
- salt and pepper
- 1/4 c. vinegar
- 1/2 c. oil
- 4 hard-boiled eggs, diced
- 3 c. celery
- 1/2 c. pimento
- 2 c. mayonnaise

Directions:
- Cut up potatoes and boil.
- Add salt, pepper, vinegar and oil to warm potatoes.
- Let cool and add remaining ingredients.

Original_text:
Kraut Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (2 lb.) can kraut
- 2/3 c. vinegar
- 2 c. sugar
- 2 c. celery, chopped
- 1/2 c. onion, chopped
- 1/2 c. green pepper

Directions:
- Bring sugar and vinegar to a boil.
- Set aside to cool.
- Mix vegetables with kraut.
- Pour liquid over mixture.
- Let set in refrigerator for 24 hours.
- Keeps a long time.

salad_info: marinated mushroom veggie ingredient c vinegar c olive salad oil c chopped onion clove garlic minced tsp sugar tsp basil crushed tsp oregano crushed fresh mushroom halved quartered whole carrot artichoke heart drained halved c pitted ripe olive halved c sliced celery jar sliced pimiento drained direction saucepan combine vinegar oil onion garlic teaspoon salt sugar basil oregano teaspoon pepper bring boil simmer uncovered minute combine remaining ingredient bowl pour hot marinade veggie stir chill several hour stirring occasionally drain serving serve lettuce lined bowl make cup great thanksgiving dish
Original_text:
Marinated Mushrooms And Veggies

Ingredients:
- 2/3 c. vinegar
- 2/3 c. olive or salad oil
- 1/4 c. chopped onion
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 tsp. sugar
- 1 tsp. basil, crushed
- 1 tsp. oregano, crushed
- 8 oz. fresh mushrooms, halved or quartered
- 1 (16 oz.) can whole carrots (may be sliced)
- 1 (14 oz.) can artichoke hearts, drained and halved
- 1 c. pitted ripe olives, halved
- 1 c. sliced celery
- 1 (2 oz.) jar sliced pimientos, drained (1/4 c. chopped)

Directions:
- In saucepan, combine vinegar, oil, onion, garlic, 1 teaspoon salt, sugar, basil, oregano and 1/4 teaspoon pepper.
- Bring to a boil; simmer, uncovered, 10 minutes.
- Combine remaining ingredients in a bowl.
- Pour hot marinade over veggies.
- Stir; chill several hours, stirring occasionally.
- Drain before serving.
- Serve in lettuce lined bowl.
- Makes 7 cups.
- Great Thanksgiving dish.

salad_info: cup salad ingredient large pineapple chunk drained mandarin orange segment drained c seedless grape c coconut c miniature marshmallow c nut c sour cream tsp sugar direction mix together except sour cream sugar add sour cream sugar mix well chill
Original_text:
7 Cup Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large can pineapple chunks, drained
- 1 (11 oz.) can mandarin orange segments, drained
- 1 1/2 c. seedless grapes
- 1 c. coconut
- 1 1/2 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 c. nuts
- 3/4 c. sour cream
- 1 tsp. sugar

Directions:
- Mix all together, except sour cream and sugar.
- Now add sour cream and sugar.
- Mix well and chill.

salad_info: wilted spinach salad ingredient strip bacon c vinegar tsp sugar tsp salt tsp pepper tsp dried tarragon c sliced celery small red onion thinly sliced pkg fresh spinach leaf torn medium orange peeled sliced c cashew coarsely broken direction quart casserole snip bacon inch piece cover paper towel microwave high minute crisp slotted spoon place bacon paper towel drain bacon dripping add vinegar sugar salt pepper tarragon microwave high minute mixture boil stir celery onion gradually add spinach hot dressing tossing coat piece add crumbled bacon orange segment cashew toss lightly serve immediately total microwave cooking time minute make serving
Original_text:
Wilted Spinach Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 strips bacon
- 1/4 c. vinegar
- 2 tsp. sugar
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1/8 tsp. pepper
- 1/8 tsp. dried tarragon
- 1/2 c. sliced celery
- 1 small red onion, thinly sliced
- 1 pkg. fresh spinach leaves, torn (about 8 c. total)
- 2 medium oranges, peeled and sliced*
- 1/3 c. cashews, coarsely broken

Directions:
- In 3-quart casserole snip bacon into 1 inch pieces.
- Cover with paper towel.
- Microwave at High (10) 2 to 3 minutes, until crisp.
- With slotted spoon, place bacon on paper towels to drain. To bacon drippings add vinegar, sugar, salt, pepper and tarragon. Microwave at High (10) 2 to 3 minutes, until mixture boils.
- Stir in celery and onion.
- Gradually add spinach to hot dressing, tossing to coat each piece.
- Add crumbled bacon, orange segments and cashews.
- Toss again lightly.
- Serve immediately.
- Total Microwave Cooking Time:
- 4 to 6 minutes.
- Makes 8 to 10 servings.

salad_info: cranberry salad ingredient fresh cranberry ground c sugar c green grape halved c pecan finely cut direction mix cranberry sugar mixture drain overnight colander refrigerator dispose juice mix cranberry mixture grape pecan beat pint whipping cream add sugar taste mix cranberry make festive salad delicious served turkey
Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. fresh cranberries, ground
- 1 c. sugar
- 2 c. green grapes, halved (seedless if possible)
- 1 c. pecans, finely cut

Directions:
- Mix cranberries and sugar; this mixture should drain overnight in a colander in the refrigerator.
- Dispose of juice.
- Mix cranberry mixture with grapes and pecans.
- Beat 1/2 pint of whipping cream; add sugar to taste.
- Mix with cranberries.
- Makes a festive salad.
- Delicious when served with turkey.

salad_info: old fashioned potato salad ingredient red potato diced dill pickle medium onion boiled egg tbsp mustard stick butter tbsp mayonnaise tbsp salt direction cook potato done add salt cooking tender drain water potato add butter mustard mayonnaise mix mixer low speed add remaining chopped boiled egg diced onion diced dill pickle stir together really enjoy
Original_text:
Old Fashioned Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 or 7 red potatoes
- 4 diced dill pickles
- 1 medium onion
- 3 boiled eggs (hard)
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. mustard
- 1/4 stick butter
- 2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
- 1 Tbsp. salt

Directions:
- Cook potatoes until done and add salt while cooking. When tender, drain all water off of potatoes; add butter, mustard and mayonnaise. Mix with mixer on low speed. Add remaining chopped boiled eggs, diced onion and diced dill pickles. Stir together and really enjoy.

Original_text:
Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 bunches broccoli
- 10 slices bacon
- 1 large red onion
- 1/3 c. raisins
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 2 Tbsp. cider vinegar
- 1/2 tsp. black pepper
- 1/2 c. toasted sunflower seeds

Directions:
- Cut broccoli flowerets into smaller than bite-size pieces. Cut off tough outer layer of stalks and chop the tender part into small pieces.
- You need 8 cups of broccoli.
- (Do this the day before and store in plastic bag.)
- Saute bacon until crisp.
- Slice onion lengthwise.
- In large bowl, combine the broccoli, onion and raisins and bacon.
- In small bowl, mix together mayonnaise, sugar, vinegar and pepper.
- Combine dressing with the vegetables; refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving.
- Top with sunflower seeds.

salad_info: quick taco salad ingredient lean ground beef c chopped onion pkg ricearoni beef flavor c salsa tsp chili powder c shredded lettuce medium tomato chopped c shredded monterey jack cheddar cheese c crushed tortilla chip direction step large skillet brown ground beef onion drain remove skillet set aside
Original_text:
Quick Taco Salad

Ingredients:
- 3/4 lb. lean ground beef
- 1/2 c. chopped onion
- 1 pkg. Rice-A-Roni beef flavor
- 1/2 c. salsa
- 1 tsp. chili powder
- 4 c. shredded lettuce
- 1 medium tomato chopped
- 1/2 c. shredded Monterey Jack or Cheddar cheese
- 1/2 c. crushed tortilla chips

Directions:
- Step 1:
- In a large skillet, brown ground beef and onion. Drain.
- Remove from skillet.
- Set aside.

Original_text:
24-Hour Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small head or 1/2 large head lettuce
- 1 pkg. frozen green peas
- 1 chopped green pepper
- 8 celery stalks, chopped
- 1 red onion, chopped
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese
- 6 slices crumbled fried bacon

Directions:
- Make 24 hours before serving.
- Use large casserole or large glass pan.
- Shred or tear lettuce into dish, approximately 1/3 full.
- Layer on top of the following (do not stir): green peas, green pepper, celery, red onion.
- Frost entire top with the following mixture:
- mayonnaise, sour cream and sugar.
- Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
- Right before serving, sprinkle with bacon.

salad_info: cioppino ingredient fresh fren fish fillet c chopped green onion c chopped onion clove garlic minced tbsp cooking oil tomato cut tomato sauce c red wine tbsp snipped parsley tsp oregano tsp basil tsp salt minced clam shrimp rinsed drained dash black pepper direction thaw fish fren cut fish inch piece large saucepan cook green onion onion garlic hot oil tender add tomato tomato sauce wine parsley oregano basil salt pepper bring boiling reduce heat cover simmer minute add fish shrimp undrained clam bring boiling reduce heat cover simmer minute fish flake easily fork stew delicious rice serve salad warm bread
Original_text:
Cioppino

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. fresh or frozen fish fillets
- 3/4 c. chopped green onion
- 1/2 c. chopped onions
- 1 clove garlic, minced
- 1 Tbsp. cooking oil
- 1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes, cut up
- 1 (16 oz.) can tomato sauce
- 1/2 c. red wine
- 3 Tbsp. snipped parsley
- 1/4 tsp. oregano
- 1/4 tsp. basil
- 1/8 tsp. salt
- 1 (6 1/2 oz.) can minced clams
- 1 (4 1/2 oz.) can shrimp, rinsed and drained
- dash of black pepper

Directions:
- Thaw fish if frozen.
- Cut fish into 1-inch pieces.
- In a large saucepan, cook green onion, onion and garlic in hot oil until tender.
- Add tomatoes, tomato sauce, wine, parsley, oregano, basil, salt and pepper.
- Bring to boiling, then reduce heat. Cover and simmer 20 minutes.
- Add fish, shrimp and undrained clams.
- Bring just to boiling, then reduce heat.
- Cover and simmer 5 to 7 minutes or until fish flakes easily with a fork.
- This stew is delicious on its own or over rice.
- Serve with salad and warm bread.

salad_info: mexican salad ingredient head lettuce tomato diced ranch style bean drained small pkg fritos crushed cheddar cheese small bottle italian dressing direction pinch lettuce small piece combine ingredient except fritos add serving
Original_text:
Mexican Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head lettuce
- 1 or 2 tomatoes, diced
- 1 can Ranch Style beans, drained
- 1 small pkg. Fritos, crushed
- Cheddar cheese
- 1 small bottle Italian dressing

Directions:
- Pinch lettuce in small pieces.
- Combine all other ingredients except Fritos.
- Add them just before serving.

Original_text:
Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon Jell-O
- 1 (16 oz.) carton sour cream
- 1 (15 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple

Directions:
- Dissolve Jell-O in 1 cup boiling water.
- Fold in sour cream and pineapple.
- Pour into oiled mold.
- (Halved works well.)

Original_text:
Champagne Salad(Frozen)  

Ingredients:
- 3/4 c. sugar
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
- 1 (8 oz.) container Cool Whip
- 1 small can crushed pineapple, with juice
- 2 to 3 bananas, sliced thin
- 1 (10 oz.) pkg. thawed frozen strawberries
- 1/4 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Fold in fruit and nuts with mixture.
- Freeze in Pyrex dish. Cut into squares.
- Fills a 7 x 11-inch dish.

Original_text:
7 Layer Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/2 head lettuce, chopped
- onion, sliced in rings
- green pepper, sliced in rings
- 1 pkg. frozen peas, blanched
- 1 c. Miracle Whip
- 1 small jar bacon bits
- 2 c. grated cheese
- grated carrot (optional)
- chopped radishes (optional)

Directions:
- Layer in bowl as listed.
- Let sit 8 hours overnight in refrigerator.

Original_text:
Israeli Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 green pepper
- 1 red pepper
- 1 yellow pepper
- 1 bunch radishes
- 2 cucumbers
- 1 to 2 tomatoes
- 1/8 c. oil
- salt and taste
- 1 to 2 fresh lemons

Directions:
- Dice each vegetable into extremely small pieces.
- Add oil, then squeeze in the juice of 1 to 2 lemons depending on your taste.
- Add the salt, then add lemon, oil and salt based on how much salad you need.
- The salad should be tart and refreshing.

Original_text:
Tomato Parmesan Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 1/3 c. vegetable oil or olive oil
- 1 c. red wine vinegar
- 2 garlic cloves, minced
- salt and pepper to taste
- 2 bunches romaine lettuce, torn
- 1 head iceberg lettuce, torn
- 2 small red onions, thinly sliced
- 2 large tomatoes, diced
- 1 (4 oz.) jar diced pimientos, drained
- 2/3 c. shredded Parmesan cheese

Directions:
- In a small bowl or jar with a tight-fitting lid, combine oil, vinegar, garlic, salt and pepper; set aside.
- In a large salad bowl, combine all remaining ingredients.
- Chill until ready to serve.

Original_text:
Garden Green Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. torn romaine lettuce
- 1/2 c. sliced green onions (scallions)
- 1/2 c. thinly sliced celery
- 3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
- 1/2 tsp. dehydrated cane juice
- 1/8 tsp. pepper
- 2 c. torn fresh spinach
- 1 medium cucumber
- 8 cherry tomatoes, halved
- 1 tsp. dried parsley flakes
- 1/4 tsp. dried whole oregano

Directions:
- Combine first 6 ingredients in a large bowl.
- Toss well. Combine lemon juice and remaining ingredients in a jar.
- Cover tightly and shake vigorously.
- Pour over lettuce mixture.
- Toss gently.
- Yields
- 4 servings.

salad_info: fresh fruit salad ingredient banana apple tangerine direction cut fruit mix bowl mix teaspoon plain yogurt teaspoon vanilla fruit
Original_text:
Fresh Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 banana
- 1 apple
- 1 tangerine

Directions:
- Cut up fruit.
- Mix it in a bowl.
- Mix 3 teaspoons of plain yogurt and 1 teaspoon of vanilla with fruit.

Original_text:
Blt Macaroni Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. elbow macaroni (uncooked)
- 5 green onions, finely chopped
- 1 large tomato, diced
- 1 1/4 c. celery, diced
- 1 1/4 c. mayonnaise
- 5 tsp. white vinegar
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1/8 to 1/4 tsp. pepper
- 1 lb. bacon, cooked and crumbled

Directions:
- Cook macaroni; drain and rinse in cold water. In a large bowl, combine the macaroni, green onions, tomato and celery. In a small bowl, combine mayonnaise, vinegar, salt and pepper. Pour over macaroni mixture and toss to coat. Cover and chill for at least 2 hours. Just before serving, add bacon. Yield: 12 servings.

salad_info: valley fresh chicken salad ingredient c mayonnaise tsp garlic powder tsp onion powder tsp dry mustard c diced celery tbsp chopped green onion valley french chunky chicken drained cut piece direction combine ingredient cover chill serving
Original_text:
Valley Fresh Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise

- 1/4 tsp. onion powder
- 1/8 tsp. dry mustard
- 1/2 c. diced celery
- 2 Tbsp. chopped green onion
- 1 can Valley French chunky chicken, drained and cut into pieces

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients.
- Cover and chill before serving.

Original_text:
Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip
- 1 can cherry pie filling
- 1 (No. 2) can peaches, drained
- 1 (16 oz.) can pineapple, drained
- 1 can Eagle Brand milk
- 1 jar maraschino cherries
- pecans or favorite nuts

Directions:
- Drain peaches and pineapple. Mix all together. Garnish with cherries and pecans. Chill.

Original_text:
Fabulous Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pt. strawberries
- 2 to 3 peaches
- 1 pineapple
- 1 pt. blueberries
- 1 pt. raspberries
- 2 to 3 kiwi fruits
- 1 large box instant vanilla pudding mix

Directions:
- All fruits must be fresh, not canned or frozen.
- Prepare and slice all fruit into bite size pieces.
- Mix instant pudding mix powder (not prepared) with fruit and refrigerate overnight in sealed bowl.
- Before serving the next day, toss lightly, mixing thoroughly.
- The juice and pudding mix make a nice fruit pudding.

salad_info: country fair corn stick ingredient c yellow corn meal c flour tbsp sugar tbsp baking powder tsp salt c salad oil medium red bell pepper diced green onion thinly sliced creamstyle corn c milk egg direction preheat oven grease well corn stick mold place oven preparing batter large bowl mix corn meal flour sugar baking powder salt small skillet add oil cook pepper onion tender remove skillet heat stir corn milk egg mixed stir dry ingredient batter blended spoon batter preheated mold bake minute done cool mold wire rack minute remove mold
Original_text:
Country Fair Corn Sticks

Ingredients:
- 3/4 c. yellow corn meal
- 3/4 c. flour
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 Tbsp. baking powder
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/4 c. salad oil
- 1/2 medium red bell pepper, diced
- 2 green onions, thinly sliced
- 1 (8 1/2 to 8 3/4 oz.) can cream-style corn
- 1/2 c. milk
- 1 egg

Directions:
- Preheat oven to 400°.
- Grease well 14 corn stick molds.
- Place in oven while preparing batter.
- In large bowl, mix corn meal, flour, sugar, baking powder and salt.
- In small skillet, add oil and cook pepper and onions until tender.
- Remove skillet from heat.
- Stir in corn and milk, then egg until mixed; stir into dry ingredients until batter is just blended.
- Spoon batter into preheated molds.
- Bake 15 minutes or until done.
- Cool in molds on wire rack 5 minutes.
- Remove from molds.

salad_info: peach salad ingredient crushed pineapple c water c sugar cream cheese tbsp milk cool whip small pkg peach jello small pkg apricot jello direction bring pineapple water sugar boil remove heat add jello chill partially set whip slightly adding ingredient
Original_text:
Peach Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (No. 2) can crushed pineapple
- 1 c. water
- 1 c. sugar
- 8 oz. cream cheese
- 5 Tbsp. milk
- 9 oz. Cool Whip
- 1 small pkg. peach jello
- 1 small pkg. apricot jello

Directions:
- Bring pineapple, water and sugar to a boil; remove from heat. Add jellos.
- Chill until partially set.
- Whip slightly before adding other ingredients.

Original_text:
Tangy Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (20 oz.) can pineapple chunks, juice drained and reserved
- 1 pkg. sugar-free instant vanilla pudding mix
- 1/4 c. sugar-free Tang
- 1 can mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 can light fruit cocktail, drained
- 2 bananas, sliced
- 1 apple, in small slices
- 1 c. blueberries (fresh or frozen)
- 1 c. sliced strawberries

Directions:
- In small bowl, combine reserved pineapple juice, pudding mix and Tang; set aside.
- In large bowl, combine all the fruit.
- Fold juice mixture into fruit.
- Refrigerate before serving.

salad_info: cornbread salad ingredient pkg cornbread cooked crumbled green pepper chopped c onion cut fine c celery cut fine c mayonnaise c tomato cut direction mix ingredient large bowl refrigerate overnight
Original_text:
Cornbread Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. cornbread, cooked and crumbled
- 1 green pepper, chopped
- 1 c. onion, cut fine
- 3/4 c. celery, cut fine
- 3/4 c. mayonnaise
- 1 c. tomatoes, cut up (optional)

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients in large bowl.
- Refrigerate overnight.

salad_info: tomato salad bread bowl ingredient large round crusty peasant bread large cucumber peeled large plum tomato cut piece yellow pepper diced c black olive chopped c thinly sliced onion tsp freshly minced garlic c basil leaf washed slivered coarse salt pepper taste c extra virgin olive oil tbsp red wine vinegar direction cut thin slice top bread carefully cut inside bread leaving shell tear inside large irregular piece toss lightly broiler set aside
Original_text:
Tomato Salad In A Bread Bowl

Ingredients:
- 1 large round crusty peasant bread
- 1 large cucumber, peeled
- 8 large plum tomatoes, cut in 8 pieces
- 1 yellow pepper, diced
- 1 c. black olives, chopped
- 1/2 c. thinly sliced onion
- 1 tsp. freshly minced garlic
- 1 c. basil leaves, washed and slivered
- coarse salt and pepper to taste
- 1/4 c. extra virgin olive oil
- 2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar

Directions:
- Cut a thin slice off top of bread.
- Carefully cut out most of the inside of the bread, leaving a shell.
- Tear insides into large, irregular pieces.
- Toss lightly under broiler.
- Set aside.

salad_info: frog eye salad ingredient c sugar tbsp flour tsp salt c pineapple juice egg beaten tsp lemon juice qt water tbsp cooking oil acinus de pepe can mandarin orange drained pineapple chunk drained carton nondairy whipped topping c miniature marshmallow c coconut direction combine sugar flour salt gradually stir egg pineapple juice cook moderate heat stirring thickened add lemon juice cool room temperature bring water boiling point salt according direction acinus de pepe box add oil cook acinus de pepe tender firm drain rinse well cold water combine egg mixture acinus de pepe mixing lightly refrigerate overnight airtight container next morning add remaining ingredient mix lightly thoroughly refrigerate airtight container well chilled salad may refrigerated week desired
Original_text:
Frog Eye Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 Tbsp. flour
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 3/4 c. pineapple juice
- 1 egg, beaten
- 1 1/2 tsp. lemon juice
- 2 qt. water
- 1/2 Tbsp. cooking oil
- 8 oz. acini de pepe (a BB size pasta product)
- 2 (11 oz. each) cans mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 (20 oz.) can pineapple chunks, drained
- 1 (9 oz.) carton nondairy whipped topping
- 1/2 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1/2 c. coconut

Directions:
- Combine sugar, flour and salt; gradually stir in egg and pineapple juice.
- Cook over moderate heat, stirring until thickened.
- Add lemon juice.
- Cool to room temperature.
- Bring water to boiling point with salt according to directions on acini de pepe box.
- Add oil and cook acini de pepe only until tender but firm.
- Drain and rinse well with cold water.
- Combine egg mixture with acini de pepe, mixing lightly.
- Refrigerate overnight in an airtight container.
- The next morning, add remaining ingredients. Mix lightly but thoroughly.
- Refrigerate in airtight container until well chilled.
- Salad may be refrigerated for a week, if desired.

salad_info: mandarin salad ingredient pt sour cream c miniature marshmallow mandarin orange drained chunk pineapple drained c shredded coconut banana sliced direction mix sour cream marshmallow coconut use wooden spoon stir orange pineapple refrigerate overnight serving add banana serf
Original_text:
Mandarin Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/2 pt. sour cream
- 1 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 can mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 (20 oz.) can chunk pineapple, drained
- 1/4 c. shredded coconut
- 2 or 3 bananas, sliced

Directions:
- Mix the sour cream, marshmallows and coconut.
- Use wooden spoon and stir in oranges and pineapple.
- Refrigerate overnight. Just before serving, add bananas.
- Serves 6.

salad_info: pea salad ingredient can sweet pea hardcooked egg heaping tbsp miracle whip tbsp sugar vinegar direction drain pea mix miracle whip sugar add vinegar cut egg mix ingredient together cover cool
Original_text:
Pea Salad

Ingredients:
- 4 cans sweet peas
- 6 to 8 hard-cooked eggs
- 4 heaping Tbsp. Miracle Whip
- 3 Tbsp. sugar
- vinegar

Directions:
- Drain peas.
- Mix Miracle Whip with sugar; add vinegar (enough to make very tart).
- Cut up eggs.
- Mix all ingredients together. Cover and cool.

salad_info: zesty chicken pot pie ingredient pkg philadelphia cream cheese cubed c chicken broth c chopped chicken turkey pkg fren mixed vegetable thawed envelope good season salad dressing pkg refrigerated pie crust direction cook cream cheese broth large saucepan low heat cheese melted stirring frequently wire whisk stir chicken vegetable salad dressing mix spoon inch pie plate cover pie crust seal flute edge cut several slit permit steam escape cut remaining pie crust decorative shape arrange crust place pie plate cookie sheet bake minute golden brown make serving
Original_text:
Zesty Chicken Pot Pie

Ingredients:
- 2 (8 oz.) pkg. Philadelphia cream cheese, cubed
- 1/2 c. chicken broth
- 3 c. chopped chicken or turkey
- 2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen mixed vegetables, thawed
- 2 envelopes Good Seasons salad dressing
- 1 (15 oz.) pkg. refrigerated pie crusts (2 crusts)

Directions:
- Cook cream cheese and broth in large saucepan on low heat until cheese is melted, stirring frequently with wire whisk. Stir in chicken, vegetables and salad dressing mixes. Spoon into 9-inch pie plate. Cover with 1 pie crust; seal and flute edge. Cut several slits to permit steam to escape. Cut remaining pie crust into decorative shapes; arrange on crust. Place pie plate on cookie sheet. Bake at 425° for 20 to 25 minutes or until golden brown. Makes 8 servings.

salad_info: fruited coleslaw ingredient qt shredded cabbage c miniature marshmallow pineapple tidbit drained c chopped apple c chopped celery miracle whip salad dressing direction combine cabbage marshmallow pineapple apple celery enough salad dressing moisten toss lightly chill
Original_text:
Fruited Coleslaw

Ingredients:
- 1 qt. shredded cabbage
- 1 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 can pineapple tidbits, drained
- 1 c. chopped apples
- 1/2 c. chopped celery
- Miracle Whip salad dressing

Directions:
- Combine cabbage, marshmallows, pineapple, apple, celery and enough salad dressing to moisten. Toss lightly and chill.

salad_info: cranberry salad ingredient pkg small pkg large lemon jello use another flavor c boiling water c sugar c cold water whole orange ground c fresh cranberry ground c chopped apple unpeeled c chopped pecan direction dissolve jello hot water add sugar stir dissolved add cool water set refrigerator cool thick add ground fruit nut liquid mix pour mold refrigerate
Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 pkg. small or 1 pkg. large lemon jello or you can use another flavor
- 1 c. boiling water
- 1 1/2 c. sugar
- 1/4 c. cold water
- 2 whole oranges, ground (about 1/2 skin on)
- 2 c. fresh cranberries, ground
- 2 c. chopped apples, unpeeled
- 1 c. chopped pecans

Directions:
- Dissolve
- jello in hot water.
- Add sugar and stir until dissolved.
- Add cool water.
- Set in refrigerator to cool until thick
- (soft).
- Add ground fruits, nuts and liquids.
- Mix then pour into mold and refrigerate.

Original_text:
Taco Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. hamburger, browned and drained
- 2 cans kidney beans, drained
- 1 head lettuce, broken up
- tomatoes (as many as desired)
- 1 pkg. Doritos, broken up
- salt and pepper
- olives
- 8 oz. grated sharp cheese
- 1 bottle French dressing

Directions:
- Toss all ingredients together.

Original_text:
Pineapple Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 envelopes Knox gelatine
- 1 c. water
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 large can crushed pineapple
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 1/2 pt. whipping cream
- 1/2 c. chopped pecans

Directions:
- Bring water, gelatine, sugar and pineapple to boil.
- Cook for five minutes.
- Remove from stove and while hot add cream cheese and cream.
- Stir until smooth.
- Add pecans.
- Pour into mold or decorative bowl.
- Chill until firm.

salad_info: dressing fresh fruit ingredient container plain lowfat yogurt tsp grated lime peel c milk tbsp honey direction small bowl combine ingredient smooth chill hour serve fresh fruit salad yield cup
Original_text:
Dressing For Fresh Fruits

Ingredients:
- 8 oz. container plain low-fat yogurt
- 1/2 tsp. grated lime peel
- 1/4 c. milk
- 3 Tbsp. honey

Directions:
- In small bowl, combine all ingredients until smooth.
- Chill about 2 hours.
- Serve over fresh fruit salads.
- Yield: 1 1/4 cups.

salad_info: red hot salad ingredient small pkg raspberry jello c hot water c red hots c applesauce direction dissolve red hots hot water add jello blend thoroughly cool add applesauce pour loaf pan jell
Original_text:
Red Hot Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small pkg. raspberry Jell-O
- 1 c. hot water
- 1/4 c. red hots
- 1 1/2 c. applesauce

Directions:
- Dissolve red hots in hot water and add Jell-O.	Blend thoroughly and cool.
- Add applesauce.
- Pour in loaf pan and jell.

salad_info: green bean radish salad sour cream vinaigrette ingredient green bean trimmed tbsp red wine vinegar tbsp olive oil tbsp sour cream c thin sliced radish c minced scallion salt pepper direction bring plenty lightly salted water boil add bean cook tender minute drain run cold water stop cooking transfer bean serving bowl sprinkle tablespoon vinegar sour cream oil whisk dressing smooth season taste salt pepper add radish scallion dressing bean toss salad gently spoon let salad marinate room temperature hour serving turn salad lunch dish adding smoked turkey swiss cheese smoked ham cut julienne strip
Original_text:
Green Bean And Radish Salad In Sour Cream Vinaigrette

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. green beans, trimmed
- 3 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
- 6 Tbsp. olive oil
- 4 Tbsp. sour cream
- 2 c. thin sliced radishes (red and white)
- 1/2 c. minced scallions
- salt and pepper

Directions:
- Bring plenty of lightly salted water to a boil.
- Add the beans and cook until just tender, about 6 or 7 minutes.
- Drain and run under cold water to stop further cooking.
- Transfer the beans to a serving bowl.
- Sprinkle with 1 tablespoon vinegar, sour cream and oil.
- Whisk the dressing until smooth.
- Season to taste with salt and pepper.
- Add the radishes, scallions and dressing to the beans. Toss the salad gently with 2 spoons.
- Let the salad marinate at room temperature for 2 hours before serving.
- Turn salad to lunch dish by adding smoked turkey, Swiss cheese or smoked ham, cut into julienne strips.

salad_info: potato salad ingredient medium potato egg c miracle whip salad dressing tbsp vinegar tbsp sugar salt pepper tsp celery seed large onion direction cook potato skin cool peel cut fine piece cook egg cool peel cut chop peeled onion put together sprinkle salt pepper celery seed mix salad dressing vinegar sugar together may add sugar vinegar make taste real tart mix together potato egg still warm
Original_text:
Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 12 medium potatoes
- 1 doz. eggs
- 2 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing
- 2 Tbsp. vinegar
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- salt and pepper
- 1/2 tsp. celery seed
- 1 large onion

Directions:
- Cook the potatoes in their skins.
- Cool, peel and cut up in fine pieces.
- Cook the eggs and cool, peel and cut up.
- Chop up the peeled onion.
- Put all together.
- Sprinkle the salt, pepper and celery seed over them.
- Then mix the salad dressing, vinegar and sugar together.
- You may have to add more sugar and vinegar to make it taste real tart.
- Mix all together while potatoes and eggs are still warm.

salad_info: st patrick trader vic salad ingredient qt green tbsp salad oil tbsp worcestershire sauce salt pepper c parmesan cheese c crumbled roquefort cheese raw egg c lemon juice c crouton garlic direction mix lettuce crouton toss green top crouton
Original_text:
St. Patrick'S Trader Vic Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 qt. greens
- 6 Tbsp. salad oil
- 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
- salt and pepper
- 1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
- 1/2 c. crumbled Roquefort cheese
- 1 raw egg
- 1/2 c. lemon juice
- 2 c. croutons with garlic

Directions:
- Mix all but lettuce and croutons.
- Toss with greens and top with croutons.

salad_info: fren cranberry salad ingredient carton cool whip whole berry cranberry sauce c crushed pineapple medium banana peeled sliced direction mix ingredient together spoon paper lined muffin cup freeze remove freezer minute serving make serving
Original_text:
Frozen Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (8 oz.) carton Cool Whip
- 1 (16 oz.) can whole berry cranberry sauce
- 1 c. crushed pineapple
- 2 medium bananas, peeled and sliced

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together and spoon into paper lined muffin cup and freeze.
- Remove from freezer a few minutes before serving. Makes 15 servings.

salad_info: fruit salad ingredient c date c raisin c water fruit desired direction cut favorite fruit bowl add chopped walnut shredded coconut desired
Original_text:
Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. dates
- 1/2 c. raisins
- 1 c. water
- fruit as desired

Directions:
- Cut up your favorite fruit into a bowl.
- Add chopped walnuts and shredded coconut, as desired.

salad_info: seasoned brussels sprout parmesan ingredient pkg fren brussels sprout tbsp butter margarine salt tbsp salad crunch seasoned topping parmesan cheese parsley flake direction large saucepan add brussels sprout salt butter inch water bring boil cover cook tender minute drain add salad crunch parsley sprinkle parmesan cover sprout serve warm serf
Original_text:
Seasoned Brussels Sprouts Parmesan

Ingredients:
- 3 pkg. frozen brussels sprouts
- 2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
- salt
- 2 Tbsp. salad crunches, seasoned topping
- Parmesan cheese
- parsley flakes

Directions:
- In large saucepan, add brussels sprouts, salt and butter to 2 inches of water.
- Bring to boil, cover and cook until tender, about 15 to 20 minutes.
- Drain.
- Add salad crunches and parsley and sprinkle parmesan to cover sprouts.
- Serve warm.
- Serves 4 to 6.

salad_info: caramel apple salad ingredient granny smith green apple diced red apple diced pkg chocolatecovered caramel peanut nougat bar chopped c thawed nondairy whipped topping direction mix apple candy well blended gently stir whipped topping refrigerate hour ready serve garnish apple slice additional chopped candy bar desired
Original_text:
Caramel Apple Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 Granny Smith or other green apples, diced
- 3 red apples, diced
- 6 (2.07 oz. each) pkg. chocolate-covered caramel peanut nougat bars, chopped
- 3 1/2 c. thawed nondairy whipped topping

Directions:
- Mix apples and candy until well blended.
- Gently stir in whipped topping.
- Refrigerate 1 hour or until ready to serve. Garnish with apple slices and additional chopped candy bars, if desired.

salad_info: vegetable salad ingredient shoepeg corn small green pea french green bean c chopped celery pimiento c chopped green bell pepper c vinegar c salad oil c sugar salt pepper taste direction drain corn pea bean mix pepper celery pimiento first mixture bring boil oil vinegar sugar salt pepper pour vegetable mix well chill serve keep week
Original_text:
Vegetable Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can Shoepeg corn
- 1 can small green peas
- 1 can French green beans
- 1/2 c. chopped celery
- 1/4 oz. pimientos
- 1/4 c. chopped green bell peppers
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 1 c. sugar
- salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- Drain corn, peas and beans.
- Then mix peppers, celery and pimientos with first mixture.
- Bring to boil the oil, vinegar, sugar, salt and pepper.
- Pour over vegetables; mix well.
- Chill and serve.
- Keeps for weeks.

salad_info: macaroni salad ingredient pkg eow macaroni small boiled red potato boiled egg cup chopped parsley cup chopped red bell peper ranch dressing sour cream tbsp freshly ground black pepper tsp garlic powder tsp onion powder direction mix ingredient together refrigerate time serve
Original_text:
Macaroni Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. elbow macaroni
- 2 small, boiled red potatoes
- 2 boiled eggs
- 1/8 cup chopped parsley
- 1/8 cup chopped red bell peper
- 8 oz. ranch dressing
- 8 oz. sour cream
- 1 Tbsp. freshly ground black pepper
- 1 tsp. garlic powder
- 1 tsp. onion powder

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together and refrigerate until time to serve.

salad_info: summer squash pasta ingredient summer squash zucchini clove garlic large onion tbsp crumbled feta olive oil salt pepper angel hair pasta direction cut zucchini squash fourth lengthwise inch section crosswise dice onion mince garlic fry onion enough oil keep sticking add garlic onion soft add squash cook medium heat stirring occasionally mixture collapse becomes soft remove heat add cheese salt pepper taste serve mix pasta adding olive oil needed serve green salad desired
Original_text:
Summer Squash Pasta

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. summer squash
- 1 lb. zucchini
- 2 cloves garlic
- 1 large onion
- 1/2 Tbsp. crumbled Feta
- olive oil
- salt and pepper
- 1 lb. angel hair pasta

Directions:
- Cut zucchini and squash into fourths lengthwise, then into 1/2-inch sections crosswise.
- Dice onion; mince garlic.
- Fry onion in enough oil to keep it from sticking.
- Add garlic when onion is soft.
- Then add squash.
- Cook on medium heat, stirring occasionally, until mixture collapses and becomes soft.
- Remove from heat and add cheese, the salt and pepper to taste (cheese is quite salty).
- Serve over or mix into pasta adding more olive oil as needed.
- Serve with green salad if desired.

salad_info: hot chicken salad casserole ingredient c diced cooked chicken c celery finely chopped c toasted slivered almond salt grated onion c green pepper chopped c mayonnaise chopped pimiento lemon juice cream chicken soup undiluted hardboiled egg chopped c grated sharp cheese crushed potato chip topping direction combine ingredient except potato chip cheese blend well together spoon lightly greased quart shallow casserole top cheese bake degree minute put sprinkling potato chip surface last minute baking
Original_text:
Hot Chicken Salad Casserole

Ingredients:
- 4 c. diced, cooked chicken
- 1 1/2 c celery, finely chopped
- 1 c toasted, slivered almonds
- 1 t salt
- 4 T grated onion
- 1 c green pepper, chopped
- 1 c mayonnaise
- 4 T chopped pimiento (optional)
- 4 T lemon juice
- 1-10 3/4 oz can cream of chicken soup, undiluted
- 2 hard-boiled eggs, chopped
- 2 c grated sharp cheese
- crushed potato chips for topping

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients except potato chips and cheese; blend well together.
- Spoon into a lightly greased 3 quart shallow casserole.
- Top with cheese.
- Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes. Put sprinkling of potato chips over surface during last 10 minutes of baking.

salad_info: snicker bar salad ingredient apple banana snicker candy bar carton cool whip direction dice apple peeling slice banana refrigerated candy bar bite size piece fold cool whip
Original_text:
Snicker Bar Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 apples
- 3 bananas
- 3 Snicker candy bars
- 1 (8 oz.) carton Cool Whip

Directions:
- Dice apples with peeling on.
- Slice bananas and the refrigerated candy bars into bite size pieces.
- Fold in Cool Whip.

salad_info: strawberry jello salad ingredient small pkg strawberry jello pkg fren strawberry c chopped pecan c boiling water pt sour cream mashed banana direction dissolve jello hot water add strawberry banana nut put mixture glass bowl mold refrigerate firm spread sour cream first mixture jello pour remaining jello mixture top sour cream chill firm spread remaining sour cream top better made day
Original_text:
Strawberry Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 small pkg. strawberry Jell-O
- 2 (8 oz.) pkg. frozen strawberries
- 1/2 c. chopped pecans
- 1 c. boiling water
- 1 pt. sour cream
- 3 mashed bananas

Directions:
- Dissolve Jell-O in hot water; add strawberries, bananas and nuts.
- Put 1/2 of mixture in glass bowl or mold and refrigerate until firm.
- Spread 1/2 of the sour cream on first mixture of Jell-O and pour remaining Jell-O mixture on top of sour cream. Chill again until firm.
- Spread the remaining sour cream on top. Better if made the day before.

salad_info: spaghetti salad ingredient pkg spaghetti large bottle zesty italian dressing bottle salad supreme seasoning mix large green pepper large onion cucumber tomato direction boil spaghetti according direction package drain hot water rinse spaghetti cold water time add zesty italian dressing mix well add least half bottle seasoning mix stir well cut vegetable add spaghetti mixture store refrigerator serve cold
Original_text:
Spaghetti Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. pkg. spaghetti
- 1 large bottle Zesty Italian dressing
- 1 bottle Salad Supreme seasoning mix
- 1 large green pepper
- 1 large onion
- 2 cucumbers
- 2 tomatoes

Directions:
- Boil spaghetti according to directions on package.
- Drain off hot water and rinse spaghetti in cold water 3 times.
- Add Zesty Italian dressing.
- Mix well.
- Add at least a half bottle of seasoning mix.
- Stir well.
- Cut up all vegetables and add them to spaghetti mixture.
- Store in refrigerator.
- Serve cold.

salad_info: torn salad dressing ingredient tbsp sugar tsp celery seed tsp prepared mustard c vinegar tsp salt c salad oil tsp onion garlic clove direction put ingredient blender add roquefort bleu cheese keep well
Original_text:
Torn Salad Dressing

Ingredients:
- 5 Tbsp. sugar
- 1/2 tsp. celery seed
- 2 tsp. prepared mustard
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 1 tsp. onion
- 2 garlic cloves

Directions:
- Put all the ingredients into blender. Can add roquefort or bleu cheese.
- Keeps well.

salad_info: black bean salad ingredient black bean red pepper green pepper purple onion small bag shoe peg corn thawed direction soak bean overnight drain soaking liquid cook hour rinse chill bean mix ingredient pour italian dressing keep several day
Original_text:
Black Bean Salad

Ingredients:
- 8 to 10 oz. black beans
- 1 red pepper
- 1 green pepper
- 1 purple onion
- 1 small bag Shoe Peg corn, thawed

Directions:
- Soak beans overnight. Drain soaking liquid. Cook 1 hour. Rinse and chill beans.
- Mix all ingredients.
- Pour over with Italian dressing. Will keep several days.

salad_info: fresh fruit salad dressing ingredient c orange juice c lemon juice c sugar egg beaten direction mix juice sugar stir beaten egg cook double boiler minute spoon coated good fruit melon
Original_text:
Fresh Fruit Salad Dressing

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. orange juice
- 1/4 c. lemon juice
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 egg, beaten

Directions:
- Mix juices and sugar; stir in beaten egg.
- Cook in double boiler for 5 minutes until spoon is coated.
- Good on fruits and melons.

salad_info: mexican salad ingredient hamburger bell pepper chopped onion chopped tbsp chili powder salt taste velveeta cheese diced rotel bag fritos head lettuce shredded large tomato chopped direction saute hamburger pepper onion together meat brown add seasoning keep mixture warm melt cheese rotel together keep warm individual salad bowl layer fritos meat lettuce tomato cover cheese sauce
Original_text:
Mexican Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 lb. hamburger
- 1 bell pepper, chopped
- 1 onion, chopped
- 2 Tbsp. chili powder
- salt to taste
- 2 lb. Velveeta cheese
- 1 can diced Ro-Tel
- 1 (11 oz.) bag Fritos
- 1 head lettuce, shredded
- 2 large tomatoes, chopped

Directions:
- Saute hamburger, pepper and onion together until meat is brown. Add seasonings and keep mixture warm.
- Melt cheese and Ro-Tel together.
- Keep warm.
- In individual salad bowls, layer Fritos, meat, lettuce and tomatoes.
- Cover with cheese sauce.

salad_info: artichoke rice salad ingredient c raw rice c water can artichoke heart drained quartered green onion sliced c oil c vinegar chicken bouillon cube medium green pepper chopped stuffed green olive sliced tsp curry powder c mayonnaise direction marinate artichoke heart vinegar oil hour drain reserve liquid
Original_text:
Artichoke Rice Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 1/2 c. raw rice
- 7 c. water
- 2 (14 oz.) cans artichoke hearts, drained and quartered
- 8 to 10 green onions, sliced
- 3/4 c. oil
- 3/4 c. vinegar
- 5 chicken bouillon cubes
- 2 medium green peppers, chopped
- 20 to 30 stuffed green olives, sliced once
- 1 to 2 tsp. curry powder
- 1 c. mayonnaise

Directions:
- Marinate artichoke hearts in vinegar and oil for 4 to 6 hours; drain and reserve liquid.

salad_info: cranberry salad ingredient box cherry jello c hot water qt fresh cranberry c sugar c nut small crushed pineapple tbsp realemon juice direction mix ingredient together beat together pineapple juice water lemon juice stir jello dissolved chill set
Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 box cherry Jell-O
- 1 c. hot water
- 1 qt. fresh cranberries
- 1 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 c. nuts
- 1 small can crushed pineapple
- 1 Tbsp. ReaLemon juice

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together (except drain and save pineapple juice).
- Beat together pineapple juice, water and lemon juice. Then stir into Jell-O until dissolved.
- Chill until set.

salad_info: heavenly hash salad ingredient c miniature marshmallow c mandarin orange c pineapple tidbit c coconut c sour cream c fruit cocktail direction drain liquid fruit combine ingredient refrigerate hour serving
Original_text:
Heavenly Hash Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 c. Mandarin oranges
- 1 c. pineapple tidbits
- 1 c. coconut
- 1 c. sour cream
- 1 c. fruit cocktail

Directions:
- Drain
- liquid from fruits.
- Combine all ingredients and refrigerate 3 to 4 hours before serving.

salad_info: taco salad ingredient ground beef large onion pkg taco seasoning mix large head lettuce large tomato large pkg grated cheddar cheese large bag doritos medium size bottle italian salad dressing direction brown ground beef drain chill enough wilt lettuce chop onion tomato cut lettuce salad size large bowl combine lettuce onion tomato taco mix add beef crunch doritos add mixture pour dressing salad serving
Original_text:
Taco Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. ground beef
- 1 large onion
- 1 pkg. taco seasoning mix (any brand)
- 1 large head lettuce
- 2 large tomatoes
- 1 large pkg. grated Cheddar cheese
- 1 large bag Doritos
- 1 medium size bottle Italian salad dressing

Directions:
- Brown ground beef; drain.
- Chill enough so it does not wilt lettuce.
- Chop onion and tomatoes.
- Cut lettuce to salad size.
- In large bowl, combine lettuce, onion, tomatoes and taco mix.
- Add beef.
- Crunch up the Doritos and add to mixture.
- Pour dressing over salad just before serving.

salad_info: nacho cheese dip ingredient pkg velveeta cheese jar salsa hamburger tsp tabasco sauce direction cut cheese cube saucepan add salsa keep cheese sticking brown hamburger drain salt pepper taste add tabasco sauce combine hamburger cheese excellent dip nacho taco salad
Original_text:
Nacho Cheese Dip

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. pkg. Velveeta cheese
- 1 (8 oz.) jar salsa
- 1 lb. hamburger
- 1/2 tsp. Tabasco sauce

Directions:
- Cut cheese into cubes in a saucepan; add salsa to keep cheese from sticking.
- Brown hamburger; drain.
- Salt and pepper to taste. Add Tabasco sauce.
- Combine hamburger and cheese.
- Excellent dip for nachos or taco salad.

salad_info: sherbet jello salad ingredient pkg black raspberry jello c boiling water ginger ale pt raspberry sherbet container cool whip direction dissolve jello water add sherbet stir melted let set jelly like gently stir cool whip let set firm
Original_text:
Sherbet Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (6 oz.) pkg. black raspberry Jello
- 3 c. boiling water or ginger ale
- 1 pt. raspberry sherbet
- 1 (9 oz.) container Cool Whip

Directions:
- Dissolve Jello in water, add sherbet.
- Stir until melted. Let set until jelly like.
- Gently stir in Cool Whip.
- Let set until firm.

salad_info: strawberry salad ingredient small pkg strawberry jello c boiling water large pkg fren strawberry mashed banana c pecan pt sour cream direction dissolve jello boiling water add rest ingredient place refrigerator set serve cool whip
Original_text:
Strawberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 small pkg. strawberry Jell-O
- 2 c. boiling water
- 1 large pkg. frozen strawberries
- 2 mashed bananas
- 1/2 c. pecans
- 1/2 pt. sour cream

Directions:
- Dissolve Jell-O with boiling water.
- Add rest of ingredients. Place in refrigerator to set.
- Serve with Cool Whip.

salad_info: coleslaw salad dressing ingredient egg c vinegar c sugar tsp salt tsp yellow mustard tbsp butter margarine pt mayonnaise direction combine ingredient except mayonnaise beat well mixer cook thick remove pan stove add mayonnaise beat well cool
Original_text:
Coleslaw And Salad Dressing

Ingredients:
- 4 eggs
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. yellow mustard
- 1 Tbsp. butter or margarine
- 1 pt. mayonnaise

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients except mayonnaise. Beat well with mixer.
- Cook until thick. Remove pan from stove and add mayonnaise. Beat well and cool.

Original_text:
Poppy Seed Dressing

Ingredients:
- 3/4 c. sugar
- 2 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. dry mustard
- 2 Tbsp. poppy seed
- 1 tsp. celery seed
- 1 Tbsp. grated onion
- 1/4 tsp. black pepper

- 2 c. salad oil

Directions:
- Blend all ingredients except oil. Drip in oil very slowly; blend well.
- Store in jar in refrigerator.

salad_info: classic lobster seafood salad ingredient imitation lobster chunk c mayonnaise stalk celery chopped tbsp chopped onion lettuce leaf direction mix lobster mayonnaise celery onion serve bed lettuce
Original_text:
Classic Lobster Seafood Salad(4 Servings)  

Ingredients:
- 8 oz. imitation lobster chunks
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1 stalk celery, chopped
- 1 Tbsp. chopped onion
- lettuce leaves

Directions:
- Mix lobster, mayonnaise, celery and onion.
- Serve on bed of lettuce.

salad_info: salad dressing ingredient pt mayonnaise c ketchup tsp vinegar tsp garlic salt c oil c sugar tsp worcestershire sauce tsp paprika direction mix ingredient together stir well blended store refrigerator covered container
Original_text:
Salad Dressing

Ingredients:
- 1 pt. mayonnaise
- 1/2 c. ketchup
- 2 tsp. vinegar
- 1 tsp. garlic salt
- 1/2 c. oil
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
- 1 tsp. paprika

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together.
- Stir until well blended.
- Store in refrigerator in covered container.

salad_info: easy fruit salad ingredient peach pie filling carton fren whole strawberry banana sliced direction combine strawberry pie filling chill several hour add banana serving
Original_text:
Easy Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can peach pie filling
- 1 carton frozen whole strawberries
- 3 bananas, sliced

Directions:
- Combine strawberries and pie filling. Chill for several hours. Add bananas just before serving.

salad_info: limepineapple salad ingredient pkg lime jello c hot water c pineapple juice c crushed pineapple drained tsp horseradish c mayonnaise c cottage cheese direction dissolve jello hot water chill add remaining ingredient let set
Original_text:
Lime-Pineapple Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. lime Jell-O
- 1 c. hot water
- 1/4 c. pineapple juice
- 1 c. crushed pineapple, drained
- 2 1/2 tsp. horseradish
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1 c. cottage cheese

Directions:
- Dissolve Jell-O in hot water.
- Chill.
- Add remaining ingredients and let set.

salad_info: corn salad ingredient shoe peg corn c chopped bell pepper medium onion chopped large tomato chopped tbsp mayonnaise salt pepper taste cucumber peeled sliced celery seed direction drain corn mix ingredient together vinegar oil dash sugar added tasteful salad
Original_text:
Corn Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can Shoe Peg corn
- 1/2 c. chopped bell pepper
- 1/2 medium onion, chopped
- 1 large tomato, chopped
- 1 Tbsp. mayonnaise
- salt and pepper to taste
- cucumber, peeled and sliced
- celery seed

Directions:
- Drain corn and mix all ingredients together. Vinegar, oil and a dash of sugar can be added for a tasteful salad.

salad_info: steamed fish ingredient kumu mullet slice fresh ginger tbsp green onion finely chopped tbsp shoyu tsp ajinomoto tbsp salad oil chinese parsley direction place fish ginger pot boiling water turn flame cover tight fitting lid let stand minute done place fish platter sprinkle finely chopped green onion
Original_text:
Steamed Fish

Ingredients:
- 1 kumu or mullet (1 lb.)
- 2 slices fresh ginger
- 2 Tbsp. green onion, finely chopped
- 2 Tbsp. shoyu
- 1/4 tsp. ajinomoto
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. salad oil
- Chinese parsley

Directions:
- Place fish and ginger in pot of boiling water (water should cover fish).
- Turn flame off and cover with tight fitting lid. Let stand for 30 minutes or until done.
- Place fish on platter. Sprinkle with finely chopped green onion.

salad_info: seafood salad ingredient crabmeat large shrimp cooked peeled c mayonnaise tbsp french dressing c chili sauce tbsp horseradish tbsp minced onion tbsp lemon juice tsp worcestershire tsp seasoned salt tsp salt pepper taste lettuce wedge tomato wedge direction combine crabmeat shrimp combine mayonnaise french dressing chili sauce horseradish onion lemon juice worcestershire sauce seasoning pour crabmeat shrimp cover chill hour serve lettuce garnish tomato wedge
Original_text:
Seafood Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. crabmeat
- 1 lb. large shrimp, cooked and peeled
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. French dressing
- 1/2 c. chili sauce
- 2 Tbsp. horseradish
- 1 Tbsp. minced onion
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1/2 tsp. Worcestershire
- 1 tsp. seasoned salt
- 3/4 tsp. salt
- pepper to taste
- lettuce wedges
- tomato wedges

Directions:
- Combine crabmeat and shrimp.
- Combine mayonnaise, French dressing, chili sauce, horseradish, onion, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce and seasonings.
- Pour over crabmeat and shrimp.
- Cover and chill 2 to 3 hours.
- Serve on lettuce and garnish with tomato wedges.

salad_info: poppy seed dressing ingredient c sugar tsp dry mustard c vinegar tbsp onion juice c salad oil tbsp poppy seed direction mix first ingredient blender electric mixer add oil slowly stir poppy seed serve fresh fruit finely shredded red cabbage seedless fresh grape
Original_text:
Poppy Seed Dressing

Ingredients:
- 3/4 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. dry mustard
- 1/3 c. vinegar
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. onion juice
- 1 c. salad oil
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. poppy seed

Directions:
- Mix first 4 ingredients in blender or electric mixer.
- Add oil slowly.
- Stir in poppy seeds.
- Serve over fresh fruit or finely shredded red cabbage and seedless fresh grapes.

salad_info: scrambled egg spanish style ingredient oil salad oil medium onion tsp dried thyme tsp hot pepper sauce large egg medium size green pepper small garlic clove medium tomato salt parsley garnish direction slice green pepper slice onion thinly inch skillet mediumhigh heat tablespoon hot olive salad oil cook green pepper onion garlic dried thyme leaf teaspoon salt vegetable tendercrisp add tomato hot pepper sauce cook minute tomato softened spoon mixture onto warm large platter keep warm
Original_text:
Scrambled Eggs, Spanish Style

Ingredients:
- oil or salad oil
- 1 medium onion
- 1/4 tsp. dried thyme
- 1/4 tsp. hot pepper sauce
- 8 large eggs
- 2 medium size green pepper
- 1 small garlic clove
- 3 medium tomatoes
- salt
- parsley for garnish

Directions:
- Slice green peppers; slice onion thinly.
- In 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat in tablespoon of hot olive or salad oil, cook green peppers, onion, garlic, dried thyme leaves and 1/2 teaspoon salt until vegetables are tender-crisp; add tomatoes and hot pepper sauce.
- Cook 2 to 3 minutes until tomatoes are softened.
- Spoon mixture onto warm large platter to keep warm.

- Mix all ingredients together.

Avocado Salad

Party Salad

Peach Salad

Original_text:
Turnip Salad

Ingredients:
- 4 medium-size turnips
- 1 or 2 hard-boiled eggs
- salt
- pinch of oregano, if desired
- vinegar
- salad oil

Directions:
- Boil turnips and peel; cut in slices.
- Add chopped onion, salt, oregano, vinegar and oil.
- Toss gently and top with sliced eggs.

Original_text:
April'S Blueberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 pkg. Concord grape jello
- 1 c. boiling water
- 1 c. cold water

Directions:
- Boil 1 cup water and add 2 packages of jello, then add 1 cup cold water.
- Drain pineapple and mix with jello and add blueberry pie filling.

Original_text:
Beef Balls

Ingredients:
- 1 c. chopped roast beef, cut fine and cooked
- 2 Tbsp. chopped Mario salad olives with pimiento strips
- 1/2 c. mayo
- 1 c. pecans, chopped fine
- 1 tsp. salt
- paprika

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients and chill overnight.
- Roll into balls. Place on serving tray.
- Sprinkle with paprika.
- Makes 2 dozen.

salad_info: orange buttermilk salad ingredient crushed pineapple pkg orangeflavored gelatin c buttermilk carton fren whipped topping thawed direction saucepan bring pineapple boil remove heat add gelatin stir dissolve add buttermilk mix well cool room temperature fold whipped topping pour x x inch dish refrigerate several hour overnight cut square yield serving
Original_text:
Orange Buttermilk Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple (undrained)
- 1 (6 oz.) pkg. orange-flavored gelatin
- 2 c. buttermilk
- 1 (8 oz.) carton frozen whipped topping, thawed

Directions:
- In a saucepan, bring pineapple to a boil.
- Remove from heat; add gelatin and stir to dissolve.
- Add buttermilk and mix well. Cool to room temperature.
- Fold in whipped topping.
- Pour into an 11 x 7 x 2-inch dish.
- Refrigerate several hours or overnight. Cut into squares.
- Yields 12 servings.

salad_info: potato salad ingredient potato onion celery rib small block velveeta cheese c pickle relish c mayonnaise c miracle whip salad dressing tbsp mustard tsp celery salt tsp garlic powder salt taste tsp white pepper paprika garnish direction wash boil potato skin tender drain water allow cool peel dice potato desired size peel dice onion wash dice celery dice velveeta small piece place ingredient large bowl mix thoroughly dry add mayonnaise transfer nice clean bowl garnish paprika green olive tail light serf depending appetite
Original_text:
Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 5 to 6 lb. potatoes
- 1 onion
- 5 celery ribs
- 1 small block Velveeta cheese
- 1 1/2 c. pickle relish
- 2 c. mayonnaise
- 2 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing
- 3 Tbsp. mustard
- 2 tsp. celery salt
- 1 tsp. garlic powder
- salt to taste
- 1 tsp. white pepper
- paprika for garnish

Directions:
- Wash and boil potatoes in skins until tender.
- Drain off water and allow to cool.
- Peel and dice potatoes to desired size.
- Peel and dice onion.
- (Dab eyes with dishcloth.) Wash and dice celery. Dice Velveeta into small pieces.
- (Eat a couple of pieces.)
- Place all ingredients into a large bowl and mix thoroughly.
- If too dry, add more mayonnaise.
- Transfer all to a nice clean bowl and garnish with paprika and green olives with tail lights.
- Serves from1 to 12, depending on appetite.

salad_info: orange pineapple salad ingredient cottage cheese large box orange jello small can mandarin orange can crushed pineapple large cool whip c chopped nut jar candied cherry small pkg miniature marshmallow direction mix jello according package direction let set refrigerator minute remove mix ingredient return refrigerator let set night ready serve top pineapple slice cherry center
Original_text:
Orange Pineapple Salad

Ingredients:
- 24 oz. cottage cheese
- 2 large boxes orange jello
- 2 small cans mandarin oranges
- 2 (2 oz.) cans crushed pineapple
- large Cool Whip
- 1/2 c. chopped nuts
- 1 jar candied cherries
- 1 small pkg. miniature marshmallows

Directions:
- Mix jello according to package directions.
- Let set in refrigerator for about 30 minutes.
- Remove and mix all other ingredients with it.
- Return to refrigerator and let it set all night.
- When ready to serve, top with pineapple slices with a cherry in center.

salad_info: tuna salad ingredient drained tuna chopped cucumber chopped tomato chopped dill pickle tbsp mayonnaise direction mix ingredient together chill serve
Original_text:
Tuna Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can drained tuna
- 1 chopped cucumber
- 1 chopped tomato
- 1 chopped dill pickle
- 2 Tbsp. mayonnaise

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together.
- Chill and serve.

salad_info: congealed salad ingredient large crushed pineapple strawberry pie filling small pecan chopped cool whip eagle brand milk direction mix ingredient together put jello mold bowl refrigerate overnight
Original_text:
Congealed Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large can crushed pineapple
- 1 can strawberry pie filling
- 1 small can pecans, chopped
- 1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip
- 1 can Eagle Brand milk

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together; put in a jello mold or just a bowl.
- Refrigerate overnight.

salad_info: chicken casserole ingredient whole chicken cut skinned cream mushroom soup sleeve ritz cracker sour cream stick margarine cream chicken soup stick margarine direction boil chicken done debone place large bowl add can soup sour cream mix well put casserole dish crumble entire sleeve cracker sprinkle top chicken mixture melt stick margarine pour top cracker bake preheated oven bubbly throw together favorite green salad add roll quick meal cream celery onion soup may used soup
Original_text:
Chicken Casserole

Ingredients:
- 1 whole chicken, cut up and skinned
- 1 can cream of mushroom soup
- 1 sleeve Ritz crackers
- 1 (8 oz.) sour cream
- 1 stick margarine
- 1 can cream of chicken soup
- 1 stick margarine

Directions:
- Boil the chicken until done. Debone and place in a large bowl. Add both cans of soup and sour cream; mix well.
- Put in a casserole dish. Crumble up the entire sleeve of crackers and sprinkle on top of the chicken mixture.
- Melt 1 stick of margarine and pour over the top of the crackers.
- Bake in a 350° preheated oven until bubbly. Throw together your favorite green salad, add some rolls and you have a quick meal.
- Cream of celery or onion soup may be used as the soup.

salad_info: pear marmalade ingredient qt cooked pear pkg orangepineapple jello can pineapple direction cook pear like salad pear mash add jello pineapple cook low heat minute put jar
Original_text:
Pear Marmalade

Ingredients:
- 3 qt. cooked pears
- 4 pkg. orange-pineapple jello
- 2 cans pineapple

Directions:
- Cook pears like salad pears, then mash them. Add jello and pineapple. Cook over low heat about 30 minutes, then put in jars.

salad_info: creme sherry wine cake ingredient pkg yellow cake mix pkg instant vanilla pudding egg c salad oil c creme sherry pkg sliced walnut pecan direction preheat oven mix cake mix pudding egg salad oil sherry walnut pecan grease lightly flour bundt pan pour pan bake least minute
Original_text:
Creme Sherry Wine Cake

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. yellow cake mix
- 1 pkg. instant vanilla pudding
- 4 eggs
- 3/4 c. salad oil
- 3/4 c. creme sherry
- 1 pkg. sliced walnuts or pecans

Directions:
- Preheat oven to 350°.
- Mix cake mix, pudding, eggs, salad oil, sherry and walnuts or pecans.
- Grease and lightly flour Bundt pan. Pour in pan and bake at least 45 minutes.

Russian Cream Salad

- 1/2 c. water
- 1 c. sour cream
- 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla

- fresh strawberries

Directions:
- Double these ingredients for one jello mold.

Original_text:
Edith'S Pineapple Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can chunk pineapple
- 2 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 banana
- 1/2 c. cheese chunks
- 1/2 c. pineapple juice
- 2/3 c. sugar

Directions:
- Add first 4 ingredients and refrigerate.

Original_text:
Strawberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 large boxes strawberry jello
- 1 1/2 c. boiling water
- 2 large pkg. strawberries
- 3 mashed bananas
- 1 can crushed pineapple, drained
- 2 small cartons sour cream

Directions:
- Combine strawberry jello with 1 1/2 cups boiling water; mix. Add strawberries and bananas.
- Add pineapple; mix and layer with sour cream.

salad_info: eight layer salad ingredient head lettuce c chopped celery c chopped onion c chopped green pepper pea drained c miracle whip bacon fried crumbled c shredded cheese direction layer x inch pan top shredded cheese
Original_text:
Eight Layer Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/2 head lettuce
- 1/2 c. chopped celery
- 1/2 c. chopped onions (optional)
- 1/2 c. chopped green peppers
- 1 (16 oz.) can peas, drained
- 2 c. Miracle Whip
- 1/2 lb. bacon, fried and crumbled
- 2 c. shredded cheese

Directions:
- Layer in 9 x 13-inch pan.
- Top with shredded cheese.
