Original_text:
Creamy Coleslaw

Ingredients:
- 12 lb. shredded cabbage
- 9 carrots, shredded
- 3 c. chopped bell peppers
- 3 tsp. salt
- 1 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 1/2 c. canned milk
- 1 1/2 c. apple vinegar
- 6 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing

Directions:
- Mix together and refrigerate.
- Reduce 1/3 to 1/4 for family.

salad_info: quick fruit salad ingredient pkg jello crushed pineapple well drained pt cottage cheese cool whip direction large bowl prepare package jello direction indicate add drained pineapple sprinkle remaining package jello mixture stir cottage cheese cool whip blend smooth refrigerate set x x inch pan
Original_text:
Quick Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. Jell-O (any flavor)
- 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple, well drained
- 1 pt. cottage cheese
- 8 oz. Cool Whip

Directions:
- In a large bowl, prepare 1 package of Jell-O as directions indicate.
- Add drained pineapple.
- Sprinkle remaining package of Jell-O over mixture.
- Stir in cottage cheese and Cool Whip.
- Blend until smooth.
- Refrigerate until set in 11 3/4 x 7 1/2 x 1 3/4-inch pan.

salad_info: cornbread salad ingredient c cornbread bacon fried crumbled onion tomato green pepper c sweet pickle chopped direction chop onion tomato green pepper pickle mix cornbread bacon add pickle juice mayonnaise taste dressing
Original_text:
Cornbread Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. cornbread
- 1 lb. bacon, fried and crumbled up
- 2 onions
- 2 tomatoes
- 2 green peppers
- 1/2 c. sweet pickles, chopped

Directions:
- Chop the onions, tomatoes, green peppers and pickles and mix with the cornbread and bacon.
- Add pickle juice and mayonnaise to taste for the dressing.

salad_info: taco salad ingredient ground beef large kidney bean pkg taco seasoning tomato chopped grated cheddar bottle western dressing bag tortilla chip broken tsp salt head lettuce direction brown ground beef drain add bean liquid add salt taco seasoning taste simmer minute drain liquid cool chill serving gently toss lettuce tomato dressing cheese chip together stir meat bean mixture
Original_text:
Taco Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 lb. ground beef
- 1 large can kidney beans
- 2 pkg. taco seasoning
- 4 tomatoes, chopped
- 8 oz. grated Cheddar
- 1 bottle Western dressing
- 1 bag tortilla chips, broken
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1 head lettuce (bite size pieces)

Directions:
- Brown ground beef; drain.
- Add beans with liquid.
- Add salt and taco seasoning to taste.
- Simmer 10 minutes.
- Drain off all liquids and cool.
- Chill before serving.
- Gently toss the lettuce, tomatoes, dressing, cheese and chips together.
- Stir in meat and bean mixture.

salad_info: fren pink salad ingredient cream cheese c mayonnaise c sugar c miniature marshmallow c pecan chopped fruit cocktail drained pint whipping cream whipped well red food color direction thoroughly mix cream cheese mayonnaise sugar together add marshmallow pecan fruit cocktail add desired amount red food color whipped cream fold colored whipped cream freeze thin layer serving dish cut small square serving serve fren partially thawed
Original_text:
Frozen Pink Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (8 oz.) cream cheese
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 4 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 c. pecans, chopped
- 1 can fruit cocktail, drained
- 1 pint whipping cream, whipped well
- red food color

Directions:
- Thoroughly mix cream cheese, mayonnaise and sugar together. Add marshmallows, pecans and fruit cocktail.
- Add desired amount of red food color to the whipped cream.
- Fold in colored whipped cream.
- Freeze in thin layer in serving dish.
- Cut into small squares before serving.
- Serve frozen or only partially thawed. (This was served on a restaurant buffet on Sundays.)

salad_info: mexican salad ingredient medium head lettuce shredded tomato diced diced onion shredded cheddar cheese small kidney bean drained hamburger pkg taco seasoning mix c water bag nacho corn chip pkg good season cheese garlic dressing mixed oil vinegar direction mix first five ingredient together brown hamburger drain mix taco seasoning mix cup water simmer minute let cool add salad
Original_text:
Mexican Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 medium head lettuce, shredded
- 4 tomatoes, diced
- 1 diced onion
- 1 lb. shredded Cheddar cheese
- 1 small can kidney beans, drained
- 1 lb. hamburger
- 1 pkg. taco seasoning mix
- 1/2 c. water
- 1/2 bag nacho corn chips
- 1 pkg. Good Seasons cheese garlic dressing, mixed with oil and vinegar

Directions:
- Mix the first five ingredients together.
- Brown hamburger. Drain and mix with taco seasoning mix and 1/2 cup water.
- Simmer 5 minutes.
- Let cool, then add to salad.

salad_info: asparagus salad ingredient asparagus soup pkg lemon jello pkg philadelphia cream cheese c cold water c real mayonnaise c chopped green pepper c chopped celery tbsp grated onion direction heat soup boiling remove heat add jello stir dissolved add cream cheese mix well blended stir remaining ingredient chill
Original_text:
Asparagus Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can asparagus soup (undiluted)
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon Jell-O
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. Philadelphia cream cheese
- 1/2 c. cold water
- 1/2 c. real mayonnaise
- 2/3 c. chopped green pepper
- 2/3 c. chopped celery
- 1 Tbsp. grated onion

Directions:
- Heat soup to boiling.
- Remove from heat and add Jell-O.
- Stir until dissolved.
- Add cream cheese and mix until well blended. Stir in remaining ingredients.
- Chill.

salad_info: lowfat cucumber salad ingredient c onion pt cottage cheese c cucumber diced box lime jello c water direction dissolve jello water let slightly thicken add rest ingredient store refrigerator
Original_text:
Low-Fat Cucumber Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/4 c. onions
- 1 pt. cottage cheese (fat free)
- 1 c. cucumbers, diced
- 2 boxes lime Jell-O (sugar-free)
- 2 c. water (hot)

Directions:
- Dissolve Jell-O in water; let slightly thicken.
- Add rest of ingredients.
- Store in refrigerator.

salad_info: broccoli supreme salad ingredient broccoli floweret small c raisin c roasted sunflower seed c fatfree mayonnaise tbsp lemon juice c granulated sugar direction mix ingredient together refrigerate least hour serving
Original_text:
Broccoli Supreme Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. (about 4 1/2 to 5 c.) broccoli flowerets, small
- 1/2 c. raisins
- 1/2 c. roasted sunflower seeds
- 1 c. fat-free mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1/4 c. granulated sugar

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together and refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving.

salad_info: cranberry salad ingredient pkg cherry gelatin c boiling water tsp grated orange rind whole cranberry sauce crushed pineapple drained c finely chopped celery c chopped pecan direction saucepan dissolve gelatin boiling water stir orange rind cranberry sauce refrigerate mixture thickened remove refrigerator stir pineapple celery pecan pour mixture lightly oiled quart mold refrigerate salad firm unmold salad lettuce leaf serf
Original_text:
Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (6 oz.) pkg. cherry gelatin
- 1 1/2 c. boiling water
- 2 tsp. grated orange rind (optional)
- 1 (16 oz.) can whole cranberry sauce
- 1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1/2 c. finely chopped celery
- 1/2 c. chopped pecans

Directions:
- In a saucepan, dissolve the gelatin in boiling water and stir in the orange rind and cranberry sauce. Refrigerate the mixture until it is thickened. Remove from the refrigerator and stir in the pineapple, celery and pecans. Pour the mixture into a lightly oiled 1 1/2-quart mold. Refrigerate the salad until it is firm. Unmold the salad on the lettuce leaves. Serves 10 to 12.

salad_info: mucho nacho salad ingredient ground beef tomato shredded cheese pt medium hot salsa large bag nacho cheese chip head lettuce medium onion creamy ranch dressing direction brown ground beef cool chop lettuce tomato onion mix add shredded cheddar cheese creamy ranch dressing sprinkle cheese top serve nacho chip may crushed added individual salad served side use salsa suit taste make large main salad
Original_text:
Mucho Nacho Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. ground beef
- 4 tomatoes
- 8 oz. shredded cheese
- 1 pt. medium hot salsa
- 1 large bag nacho cheese chips
- 1 head lettuce
- 1 medium onion
- 8 oz. creamy Ranch dressing

Directions:
- Brown ground beef and cool.
- Chop lettuce, tomatoes and onion. Mix, then add shredded Cheddar cheese and creamy Ranch dressing. Sprinkle more cheese on top.
- Serve with nacho chips.
- May be crushed and added to each individual salad or served on the side. Use salsa to suit your taste.
- This makes a very large main salad.

salad_info: carrot cake ingredient c flour c sugar c brown sugar tsp baking soda tsp cinnamon tsp salt egg thawed orange juice c salad oil tsp vanilla extract c shredded carrot c golden raisin c chopped pecan small shredded cooking apple direction preheat oven grease flour inch bundt pan large bowl mix flour sugar brown sugar baking soda cinnamon salt small bowl beat egg slightly stir orange juice salad oil vanilla stir egg mixture carrot raisin nut apple flour mixture flour moistened pour batter pan bake minute cool pan minute remove cake pan cool completely
Original_text:
Carrot Cake

Ingredients:
- 2 c. flour
- 1 c. sugar
- 1/2 c. brown sugar
- 2 tsp. baking soda
- 2 tsp. cinnamon
- 1 tsp. salt
- 4 eggs
- 1/2 (6 oz.) can thawed orange juice
- 3/4 c. salad oil
- 1 tsp. vanilla extract
- 2 1/2 c. shredded carrots
- 1/2 c. golden raisins
- 1 c. chopped pecans
- 1 small shredded cooking apple

Directions:
- Preheat oven to 350°.
- Grease and flour a 10-inch Bundt pan. In a large bowl, mix flour, sugar, brown sugar, baking soda, cinnamon and salt.
- In a small bowl, beat eggs slightly; stir in orange juice, salad oil and vanilla.
- Stir egg mixture, carrots, raisins, nuts and apples into flour mixture just until flour is moistened.
- Pour batter into pan.
- Bake 50 to 55 minutes.
- Cool in pan 10 minutes; remove cake from pan and cool completely.

salad_info: dip fresh vegetable ingredient fresh vegetable cut bite size piece container sour cream plain yogurt pkg ranch salad dressing direction mix sour cream yogurt salad dressing serve veggie
Original_text:
Dip For Fresh Vegetables

Ingredients:
- fresh vegetables, cut in bite size pieces
- 16 oz. container sour cream or plain yogurt
- 1 pkg. Ranch salad dressing

Directions:
- Mix sour cream or yogurt with salad dressing.
- Serve with veggies.

salad_info: flag salad ingredient pkg jello c milk envelope unflavored gelatin c water c sugar cream cheese tbsp vanilla c nut wild blueberry direction dissolve red raspberry jello cup water chill firm use x inch pan
Original_text:
Flag Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 pkg. (3 oz.) Jell-O (2 red raspberry and 1 black raspberry)
- 1 c. milk
- 1 envelope unflavored gelatin
- 1/2 c. water
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 (8 oz.) cream cheese
- 1 Tbsp. vanilla
- 1/2 c. nuts
- 1 (15 oz.) can wild blueberries

Directions:
- Dissolve red raspberry Jell-O in 3 1/2 cups water.
- Chill until firm.
- Use 9 x 13-inch pan.

salad_info: dream salad ingredient pkg cool whip pkg orange jello large crushed pineapple drained pt cottage cheese c small marshmallow c chopped nut direction sprinkle jello cool whip mix well stir remaining ingredient chill
Original_text:
Dream Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (9 oz.) pkg. Cool Whip
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. orange Jell-O
- 1 large can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 pt. cottage cheese
- 1 c. small marshmallows
- 1/2 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Sprinkle Jell-O over Cool Whip; mix well.
- Stir in remaining ingredients; chill.

salad_info: cajun jambalaya ingredient chicken thigh andouille sausage c chopped onion chopped bell pepper chopped red yellow pepper tbsp minced garlic tsp salt tsp pepper tsp cayenne pepper bay leaf c white rice c cubed smoked ham c water stock direction brown sausage large deep pot remove add chicken cook chicken done remove throw vegetable ham cook tender add spice add sausage debone chicken stir thoroughly add water cover bring boil turn cover cook minute rice done stir occasionally avoid sticking serve salad garlic bread louisiana favorite
Original_text:
Cajun Jambalaya

Ingredients:
- 5 to 6 chicken thighs
- 1 1/2 lb. Andouille sausage
- 4 c. chopped onion
- 3 chopped bell peppers
- 1 chopped red or yellow pepper
- 1 Tbsp. minced garlic
- 3 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. pepper
- 1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
- 2 bay leaves
- 2 1/2 c. white rice
- 1/2 c. cubed, smoked ham
- 3 1/2 c. water or stock

Directions:
- Brown sausage in large, deep pot.
- Remove and add chicken. Cook chicken until done.
- Remove.
- Throw in vegetables and ham and cook until tender.
- Add spices.
- Add sausage and debone chicken. Stir thoroughly.
- Add water to cover.
- Bring to boil; turn down and cover.
- Cook about 20 minutes until rice is done.
- Stir occasionally to avoid sticking.
- Serve with salad and garlic bread.
- A Louisiana favorite!

salad_info: cold cucumber salad ingredient c sliced cucumber c sliced sweet bell pepper c vinegar tsp celery seed c sliced onion c sugar tsp salt direction mix vinegar salt celery seed sugar dissolved pour rest put covered dish place refrigerator wait hour eating good summer cook
Original_text:
Cold Cucumber Salad

Ingredients:
- 7 c. sliced cucumber
- 1 c. sliced sweet bell pepper
- 1 c. vinegar
- 1 tsp. celery seed
- 1 c. sliced onions
- 1 1/4 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. salt

Directions:
- Mix vinegar, salt, celery seed and sugar until dissolved. Pour over rest and put in covered dish.
- Place in refrigerator. Wait 24 hours before eating.
- Good for a summer cook out.

salad_info: tomato french dressing ingredient tomato soup c salad oil c vinegar tsp dry mustard direction mix electric blender make cup
Original_text:
Tomato French Dressing

Ingredients:
- 1 (10 3/4 oz.) can tomato soup
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 1/4 c. vinegar
- 1/2 tsp. dry mustard

Directions:
- Mix in electric blender.
- Makes about 1 1/2 cups.

salad_info: b c sandwich ingredient c shredded cheddar cheese medium apple finely chopped c salad dressing mayonnaise c finely chopped walnut slice bread toasted buttered bacon strip cooked hardcooked egg sliced tomato slice direction bowl combine cheese apple salad dressing walnut spread slice bread place slice bacon cover egg slice top tomato desired remaining slice bread
Original_text:
"A B C" Sandwich

Ingredients:
- 2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
- 1 medium apple, finely chopped
- 3/4 c. salad dressing or mayonnaise
- 1/2 c. finely chopped walnuts
- 12 slices bread, toasted and buttered
- 12 bacon strips, cooked
- 6 hard-cooked eggs, sliced
- 6 tomato slices (optional)

Directions:
- In a bowl, combine cheese, apple, salad dressing and walnuts. Spread on 6 slices of bread and place 2 slices of bacon on each. Cover with egg slices.
- Top with tomatoes, if desired, and remaining slices of bread.

salad_info: pretty patio salad ingredient c mayonnaise c sour cream tsp lemon juice tsp celery salt tsp poppy seed tsp prepared mustard salt pepper taste direction combine ingredient mix well
Original_text:
Pretty Patio Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1/2 c. sour cream
- 1 tsp. lemon juice
- 1/2 tsp. celery salt
- 1 tsp. poppy seed
- 1 tsp. prepared mustard
- salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients and mix well.

salad_info: watergate salad ingredient crushed pineapple c chopped pecan walnut c miniature marshmallow nondairy whipped topping box instant pistachio pudding mix direction drain pineapple reserve juice place pudding mix large bowl add tablespoon pineapple juice make soft paste mix well add drained pineapple whipped topping marshmallow chopped nut mix well mixture fluffy increase volume refrigerate chilled
Original_text:
Watergate Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple
- 1/2 c. chopped pecans or walnuts
- 1 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 (9 oz.) nondairy whipped topping
- 1 (3 1/2 oz.) box instant pistachio pudding mix

Directions:
- Drain pineapple and reserve juice.
- Place pudding mix in large bowl.
- Add about 4 tablespoons of the pineapple juice to make a soft paste.
- Mix well.
- Add drained pineapple, whipped topping, marshmallows and chopped nuts.
- Mix well until mixture is fluffy and increases in volume.
- Refrigerate until chilled.

salad_info: wild rice rose ingredient c wild rice c grated sharp american cheese c sliced mushroom c chopped olive c chopped onion c hot water c salad oil c canned tomato tsp garlic salt direction soak rice overnight drain wash drain mix remaining ingredient place buttered quart casserole dish cover bake hour serf
Original_text:
Wild Rice Rose(Serve With Lamb Or Chicken)  

Ingredients:
- 1 c. wild rice
- 1 c. grated sharp American cheese
- 1 c. sliced mushrooms
- 1 c. chopped olives
- 1/2 c. chopped onion
- 1 c. hot water
- 1/2 c. salad oil (although I use 1/4)
- 1 c. canned tomatoes
- 1/2 tsp. garlic salt

Directions:
- Soak rice overnight; drain.
- Wash and drain.
- Mix with remaining ingredients.
- Place in buttered 2-quart casserole dish. Cover and bake for 1 hour at 350°.
- Serves 4 to 6.

salad_info: apple jello salad ingredient c applesauce lemon jello lemonlime pop tsp orange peel c orange juice c chopped apple tbsp chopped walnut direction saucepan heat applesauce bubble stir jello cook dissolved remove cool stir pop orange juice peel chill partially set stir apple nut chill set firm
Original_text:
Apple Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. applesauce
- 6 oz. lemon Jell-O
- 12 oz. can lemon/lime pop
- 1 tsp. orange peel
- 1/4 c. orange juice
- 1 c. chopped apple (use a red one and leave skin on)
- 2 Tbsp. chopped walnuts

Directions:
- In a saucepan, heat applesauce until it bubbles.
- Stir in Jell-O and cook until dissolved.
- Remove and cool, then stir in pop, orange juice and peel.
- Chill until partially set, then stir in apples and nuts.
- Chill until set firm.

salad_info: quick fix oyster cracker ingredient pkg oyster cracker pkg hidden valley original salad dressing mix tbsp dill weed c corn oil direction mix ingredient garlic powder taste make day ahead
Original_text:
Quick Fix Oyster Crackers

Ingredients:
- 2 (12 oz.) pkg. oyster crackers
- 1 pkg. Hidden Valley original salad dressing mix
- 2 Tbsp. dill weed
- 1 c. corn oil

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients. Garlic powder to taste. Make a day ahead.

Original_text:
Taco Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head lettuce, shredded
- 2 green onions, chopped
- 1 can pinto beans, drained
- 1 boiled egg, chopped
- 1 c. medium-sharp Cheddar, shredded
- 1 avocado, diced
- 1 tomato, chopped
- 1 bag regular size Fritos

Directions:
- Mix all but Fritos in large bowl.
- Chill, then make Meat Sauce:

salad_info: summer ginger ale salad ingredient pkg lemon jello c boiling water fren lemonade concentrate pt ginger ale c cantaloupe ball c watermelon ball c seedless grape sliced banana direction dissolve jello boiling water add lemonade concentrate stir dissolve add ginger ale chill thick set fold remaining ingredient pour quart mold chill firm make serving
Original_text:
Summer Ginger Ale Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon jello
- 1 c. boiling water
- 6 oz. can frozen lemonade concentrate
- 1 pt. ginger ale
- 1 c. cantaloupe balls
- 1 c. watermelon balls
- 1 c. seedless grapes
- 2 sliced bananas

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in boiling water.
- Add lemonade concentrate and stir to dissolve.
- Add ginger ale.
- Chill until thick, but not set.
- Fold in remaining ingredients.
- Pour into 2 1/2-quart mold. Chill until firm.
- Makes 8 to 10 servings.

salad_info: shortbread salad ingredient pkg instant vanilla pudding c buttermilk can mandarin orange cool whip pkg shortbread cooky direction mix pudding buttermilk add orange cool whip shortbread cooky refrigerate
Original_text:
Shortbread Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 pkg. instant vanilla pudding (3 oz.)
- 2 c. buttermilk
- 2 cans mandarin oranges (small)
- 1 (12 or 16 oz.) Cool Whip
- 1 pkg. shortbread cookies

Directions:
- Mix pudding and buttermilk.
- Add oranges (I drain 1 can), Cool Whip (I use 16 ounces) and shortbread cookies.
- Refrigerate.

Original_text:
Lasagna

Ingredients:
- 1 tsp. salad oil
- 1/4 c. minced onion
- 1/2 lb. ground beef
- 1 clove sliced garlic
- 3/4 tsp. salt
- 1/8 tsp. pepper
- 1/2 tsp. oregano
- 2 Tbsp. snipped parsley
- 1 (No. 303) can tomatoes
- 1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
- 1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
- 1/4 lb. lasagna noodles
- 1/2 lb. thin sliced Mozzarella
- 1/2 lb. Ricotta cheese

Directions:
- In skillet, saute onion.
- Add meat and cook until done. Mash garlic
- with
- salt.
- Add
- to
- meat	with pepper, oregano, parsley, tomatoes,	tomato	sauce
- and 1 tablespoon Parmesan. Simmer, covered, 30 minutes.

salad_info: caesar salad dressing ingredient c olive oil tbsp red wine vinegar tbsp worcestershire sauce tsp salt tsp dry mustard large small garlic clove crushed direction mix ingredient jar shake well store refrigerator
Original_text:
Caesar'S Salad Dressing

Ingredients:
- 3/4 c. olive oil
- 3 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
- 3/4 tsp. salt
- 3/4 tsp. dry mustard
- 1 large or 2 small garlic cloves, crushed

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients in a jar and shake well.
- Store in refrigerator.

salad_info: fruit salad ingredient pineapple chunk small pkg vanilla pudding pie filling large orange peeled divided cut large banana sliced fruit cocktail direction drain juice pineapple fruit cocktail reserve use pudding combine juice pudding small saucepan bring boil stirring constantly mixture thicken become clear cool room temperature large bowl gently combine pineapple chunk orange fruit cocktail pour pudding mixture fruit toss coat fruit refrigerate hour ready serve add banana gently combine serve immediately banana may darken
Original_text:
Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (20 oz.) can pineapple chunks
- 1 small pkg. vanilla pudding and pie filling (not instant)
- 2 large oranges, peeled, divided and cut up
- 2 large bananas, sliced
- 1 can fruit cocktail (reserve 2 c. juice)

Directions:
- Drain juice from pineapple and fruit cocktail.
- Reserve to use with pudding.
- Combine juice and pudding in small saucepan; bring to a boil, stirring constantly.
- Mixture should thicken and become clear.
- Cool to room temperature.
- In large bowl, gently combine the pineapple chunks, oranges and fruit cocktail.
- Pour pudding mixture over fruit and toss to coat fruit.
- Refrigerate for 2 to 3 hours.
- When ready to serve, add bananas and gently combine. Serve immediately.
- Bananas may darken after a while.

salad_info: pineapple rice salad ingredient c minute rice c water box dream whip cool whip large pkg cream cheese c sugar drained crushed pineapple direction cooked cup rice added ingredient mix well serve
Original_text:
Pineapple Rice Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. Minute rice
- 1 1/2 c. water
- 2 boxes Dream Whip or 1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip
- 1 large pkg. cream cheese
- 1/3 c. sugar
- 1 can drained, crushed pineapple

Directions:
- Cooked cup of rice is added to all other ingredients.
- Mix well.
- Serve.

Original_text:
Sauerkraut Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large can sauerkraut
- 1 c. sugar
- 1/2 c. oil
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/2 c. celery, chopped (optional)
- 1 green pepper, chopped
- 1 small jar pimentos
- 1/2 c. green onion, chopped

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients and enjoy.

salad_info: corn bread salad ingredient pan corn bread bell pepper chopped medium onion small bunch fresh onion top chopped tomato diced piece bacon cooked crumbled bacon bit c miracle whip c cubed sharp cheddar cheese shredded direction cook corn bread package direction cool better kept hour crumbled add vegetable cool refrigerator hour stir miracle whip add cheese
Original_text:
Corn Bread Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 pans corn bread
- 1 bell pepper, chopped
- 1 medium onion (purple) or 1 small bunch fresh onions and tops, chopped
- 2 to 3 tomatoes, diced
- 10 pieces bacon, cooked and crumbled, or bacon bits
- 1 c. Miracle Whip
- 1 c. cubed sharp Cheddar cheese (optional), or shredded

Directions:
- Cook corn bread to package directions. Cool. It's better if kept for 24 hours, then crumbled. Add all vegetables. Cool in refrigerator about 1 hour. Stir in Miracle Whip. Add cheese.

salad_info: shrimp salad ingredient can shrimp tomato soup cream cheese envelope knox gelatine c mayonnaise c finely chopped celery c finely chopped onion direction warm tomato soup add gelatine soften add ingredient allow set refrigerator
Original_text:
Shrimp Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 cans shrimp
- 1 can tomato soup
- 8 oz. cream cheese
- 1 envelope Knox gelatine
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 3/4 c. finely chopped celery
- 3/4 c. finely chopped onion

Directions:
- Warm tomato soup; add gelatine to soften.
- Add other ingredients.
- Allow to set up in refrigerator.

salad_info: beef stroganoff ingredient cream celery soup small mushroom c salad dressing green pepper onion large steak direction brown steak green pepper onion cut small bitesize piece combine remaining ingredient pour egg noodle rice
Original_text:
Beef Stroganoff

Ingredients:
- 1 can cream of celery soup
- 1 small can mushrooms
- 1/2 c. salad dressing
- 1 green pepper
- 1 onion
- 1 large steak

Directions:
- Brown steak with green pepper and onion and cut into small bite-size pieces.
- Combine remaining ingredients.
- Pour over egg noodles or rice.

salad_info: macaroni lunch ingredient small pkg eow macaroni cooked drained panfry sausage large tomato small tomato sauce water salt pepper taste tsp canola oil tsp celery seed direction pan fry sausage crumbled piece drain paper towel large boiler bring boil tomato tomato sauce water salt pepper oil celery seed add sausage macaroni stir well turn place lid leave covered minute serve cracker salad coleslaw
Original_text:
Macaroni Lunch

Ingredients:
- 1 small pkg. elbow macaroni, cooked and drained
- 1 1/2 lb. pan-fry sausage
- 1 large can (28 oz.) tomatoes
- 1 small can (8 oz.) tomato sauce and 1 can water*
- salt and pepper to taste
- 1 tsp. canola oil
- 1/2 tsp. celery seed

Directions:
- Pan fry sausage into crumbled pieces and drain on paper towels.
- In a large boiler, bring to boil tomatoes, tomato sauce, water (add more or less water according to your liking), salt and pepper, oil and celery seed.
- Add sausage and macaroni.
- Stir well, turn off, place on lid and leave covered 5 minutes.
- Serve with crackers and salad or coleslaw.
